1b1(rgyud): rmya gar skad du/ A u ma gru pa shA kAlpA r+N+Na/ ded skad du/
1b2(rgyud): 'phags padon yod pa'i zhigs pa'i rngog ni me'i rgyal pa// ngar
1b3(rgyud): po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
2a1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
2a2(rgyud): spyan rus gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
2a3(rgyud): no/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo baiT la ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang shing sA la dang /
2a4(rgyud): tam la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngana'ochang dang / a ti muk+ka ki sna tshogs mang pos lags
2b1(rgyud): par brgyan pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa ya bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu
2b2(rgyud): bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su
2b3(rgyud): bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa na/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu rnams
2b4(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad de// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
2b5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas/
3a1(rgyud): #pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i
3a2(rgyud): bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po zhes
3a3(rgyud): bgyi ba mchis te/ bdag gis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par lta bar de bzhin
3a4(rgyud): gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs
3a5(rgyud): pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
3a6(rgyud): 'dzin du stsal nas/ bdag gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob par
3b1(rgyud): bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang sa phyogs gang du snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs der yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa la sogs
3b2(rgyud): pa lnga'i bu khri nyis stong gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang na don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i
3b3(rgyud): snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de'ang mchod rten du'ang bkur bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la dge
3b4(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba bskyod par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mnyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa 'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa
3b5(rgyud): 'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang
3b6(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod par gyur cing / ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das re zhig de nyid kyis zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te
3b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis na/ tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag pa dang / gtugs pa dang / bsal bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'om/ nyin
4a1(rgyud): gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ de bzhin du rims nyin bdun pa 'am/ mig nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nang ngam/ so'i nad dam/ mchu'i nad dam/ lce/
4a2(rgyud): dang dkan gyi nad dam/ snying nad dam/ lho nad dam/ ro rgyab dang rkeng pa'i nad dam/ yan lag dang nying lag gi nad dam/ gzhan 'brum mam/ pho ba'i nad dam/ tshad pa 'am/ lag pa dang /
4a3(rgyud): rkang pa'i nad dam/ sna nad dam/ klad pa'i nad dam/ sha bkra chen po 'am/ sha gzi gu 'am/ mdze'am/ rkang shu 'am/ 'brum bu phra mo 'am/ lhog pa 'am/ mtshan mar rdol ba
4a4(rgyud): 'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjed byed dam/ byad dam/ gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i gsod pa 'am/ 'ching ba 'am/ rdeg pa'am/ skrod pa 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas skur pa 'debs pa 'am/
4a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mdor na lus kyi gdung ba 'am/ sems kyi gdung ba 'am/ rmi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa lhag par dad pa rnams kyi yodas
4a6(rgyud): su byang bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi 'am/ rigs bzhi las gang dag sgyu dang g.yos bdag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di
4a7(rgyud): nyan par bgyid/ 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ sems can gzhan la'ang sgrog par
4b1(rgyud): bgyid cing / than dung 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi rna khung du gtad de rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid de/ skur ba ma mchis pa dang /
4b2(rgyud): gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / gos pa ma mchis pa dang / sam
4b3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid dang ma bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/ rnal 'byor 'dis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par bgyid na/ de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston par mdzad
4b4(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro// glegs bam du bgyis te khyim du 'chang bar bgyid dam/ rje dpon gyis skrag pas sam/ gzhan gyi ngor
4b5(rgyud): ram/ bzhad gad tsam gyi rgyus mnyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grag pa legs par 'tshal
4b6(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis tsan dan nam/ ga bur ram/ gla rtsi zhig la khros sam/ yongs su spad de rdol btags nas bdag nyid la byugs na tsan
4b7(rgyud): ngan nam/ ga bur ram/ gla rtsi de 'di snyam du/ 'dis bdag la khros sam/ yongs su spad pas dri mnam par mi bgyi'o snyam du mi sems kyi/ gzhan du na de nyid la dri gda' bar bgyid lagra
5a1(rgyud): so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di'ang gang su'ang rung bas bzhad gad tsam gyis zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// bcom ldan
5a2(rgyud): 'das g.yo dang sgyus mchod par bgyid na'ang de nyid sems can dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lags so// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
5a3(rgyud): shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi dri gda' bar bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi/
5a4(rgyud): bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can su'ang rung bas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched du yar gyi
5a5(rgyud): ngo'i tshes brgyad la smyung ba bgyis te/ gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob
5a6(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la las kyi dbang gis nad rnams byung na'ang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing /
5a7(rgyud): lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang dbang po sbas par 'gyur ro// de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i don grub pa'ang chom rkun
5b1(rgyud): gyis mi 'brogs te/ zhugs kyis mi tshig/ tshab kyis mi 'tshal/ rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te/ ser bas ma lags so//
5b2(rgyud): chab kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhing gi phyogs mtsham
5b3(rgyud): dang steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang mdang dbrog par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'thad
5b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// de la mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ byad kyi 'jigs pa/
5b5(rgyud): ma lags/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te/ de la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang / mtshon dang / dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// de la'ang lha
5b6(rgyud): rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/
5b7(rgyud): te/ de la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang chos brgyad thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge
6a1(rgyud): slong gi gzugs su mngon sum duzhal ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// lta ba 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro// lag pa mi g.yob pa dang / rkang pa mi gsos/
6a2(rgyud): pa dang / ba shang gci ma mchis pa dang / khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// kha sbub tu 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i dus
6a3(rgyud): na'ang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro// de'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan
6a4(rgyud): gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// chang dang / sha dang / rkun dong dang / ke'u dang / sgog skya dang 'dres pa dang / lhag rol dang / 'di rnams khyad par du don du gnyer bas spang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i
6a5(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang sems can rnams la mthu mchis pa dang mthu ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyis nas bsgrag par bgyi'o// slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi bgyi'o// 'di ltar/
6a6(rgyud): dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa'/
6a7(rgyud): rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so// byang chub ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags/ sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni thabs lags te/ chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad kho nas thob pa las/
6b1(rgyud): sos gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na/ 'di ltar bdag gis snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bani rnams dang / gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang //
6b2(rgyud): sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrag par bsgrag par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
6b3(rgyud): sems can dag pa de de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad zin te/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams
6b4(rgyud): la ba'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig mi 'dzums par/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
6b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshigs
6b6(rgyud): chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol/ dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa
6b7(rgyud): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
7a1(rgyud): shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
7a2(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
7a3(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/
7a4(rgyud): ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ bi ri bo ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ mahA shud d+ha s+thA/ bu d+h+ya bu d+hu/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ko Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu
7a5(rgyud): ku N+ya/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta a Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ra b+hi re/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA kA/
7a6(rgyud): ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ri ha ra/ ha hA ha hA/ hi hI hi hI/ hu hU hu hU/ oM kA ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra
7a7(rgyud): pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ rasmai sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta/ sha rI rA ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tA ba tA pa/ b+ha ga wAn saM ma/ A de t+yai/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+man+da riShi de ba ga na/ a b+h+ya rtsi ta tsa raN/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu
7b1(rgyud): mu ru pu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra khA sa ga biSh+Nu d+hA nad/ de ga ri Shi nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+yA/ be ba d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hiri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra ya ra la ra ha ra ha ga ma
7b2(rgyud): ra ma ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba rA ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka/ sa man+ta a bi lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa sman ras
7b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal sa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / bdag dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / gdon thams
7b4(rgyud): cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon las yongs su
7b5(rgyud): thar bar mdzad pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la bo d+h+yaM ga/ tsa tur Ar+ya sa t+ya saM pra kA sha ka/ tA pa tA pa/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mo// aM d+ha kA ra bi d+ha/
7b6(rgyud): ma na ShaT bA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Sha ShA Sha Sha/ Ti To Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu nu/ e na ya tsarma kri ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga Na saM b+hany+tsa ka/ ku ru ku ru kha ra ba ra/
7b7(rgyud): ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ mai Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya/ bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shr-i ta ya dzI pa bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dzA shi ra si kri ta ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ ma hA da b+hu ta ka ma la a
8a1(rgyud): la kri ta ka ra d+ha rA ya/ d+hA na sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha A pra kaM bya/ ba hu satwa san+ta ti ba ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma a wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka sar+b+ba bu d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka sar+b+ba AH/
8a2(rgyud): pa ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba satwA sa mA shA saM na ka ra na mo stu te swA hA/ bklags pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams med pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur zhing /
8a3(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// mtshams gcad pa la ni a ka ru'i bdug pa 'am/ thal ba 'am/ chab bam/ yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas so//
8a4(rgyud): rims thams cad la ni skud pas so// nad thams cad la ni mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi'o// byad dgrol ba la ni mtshon gyis so// lto na pa la ni
8a5(rgyud): srung ba'i skud pas so// dug gsad pa la ni sa 'am chab kyis so// mig nad la ni skud pa dkar pos rna ba la gdags par bgyi'o// so na ba la ni shing ka ra wI ra'i so shing gis so// mtshams
8a6(rgyud): gcad pa le ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyis na mtshams chen po bcings
8a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// thams cad srung ba la ni skud pa 'am/ chab bam/ thal bas bya'o// gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pas so// rims thams cad la ni skud pa dkar pos so//
8b1(rgyud): gsan pa dang / khyi rdo dang / ldog pa dang / mgrin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling bsres pas so// mig nad la ni dri chu dang / shing ba la sha'i chu 'am/ shing mngar gyi nus so//
8b2(rgyud): rna ba'i nad la ni 'bru mar gyis so// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa 'gyed pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te la ba shal bar bgyi'o// dpung dang / yul
8b3(rgyud): dang / rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor rnams srung ba la ni bum pa gang ba bzhag la gos gtsang ma bgos pas mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas bklag par bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// des yang
8b4(rgyud): chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te/ sems can thams cad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / glags lta ba rnams la ni
8b5(rgyud): tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te snying khar byug par bgyi'o// mtshams ma mchis pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba ni rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so// khyim srung ba la
8b6(rgyud): ni pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang / gdon thams las srung ba la ni tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis so// dza yA dang / bi dza pA dang / nA ku
8b7(rgyud): lI dang / gan d+ha nA gu lI dang / ba ru ni dang / tse'i dra ba ru Ni dang / a b+ha ya ba ni dang / in dra ba ni dang / gan d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / tsakra dang / ma hA tsakra dang / biSh+Ta kAn+ta dang / so ma rA dzi dang
9a1(rgyud): su nan da rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te nor bur bgyis nas/ spyi bo 'am dpung pa la gdags pas bsrel bar bgyi'o// khye'u rnams la mgul
9a2(rgyud): ba rA ro// bu mo rnams la ni sta zur nas te/ dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsrel na thams cad las srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// dug dang
9a3(rgyud): mes mi tshugs lags so// dug gis gnod pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes na'ang gnod pa skyed par mi bgyid cing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdon rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang / 'brug dang /
9a4(rgyud): ser ba gcad pa dang / chab kyi rgyun dang / ser ba bzlog pa la ni shing ka ra wi ra'i lcug mas te/ las thams cad bgyid pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa ma
9a5(rgyud): bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de nas sgrub par 'tshal na thang sku'i cho ga ni ras la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
9a6(rgyud): phyug gi gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor tsugs dang / e n+ya ya'i pags pa dang / phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can 'drir
9a7(rgyud): srul bar bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog dkar po'i sil ma bkram la spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par
9b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// sna brgyad pa'am/ drug cu rtsa bzhi pa 'am/ gzhan yang lba ba shos sha dang khrag dang ma 'dres pa bshams shing drangs la/ a kA Ta'i 'dug pas bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad brdza/
9b2(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// nyin zhag gcig gam/ nyin zhag gsum du sbyang ba bgyis nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan
9b3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nas bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// ldong ros sam mig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis te mig la bskus na/ de nas mi gda'
9b4(rgyud): bar gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// de ni 'grub pa'o//
9b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ras kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag
9b6(rgyud): po tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs so//
9b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'byam thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan
10a1(rgyud): las langs te tha gos zag pa gcig tu gapar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhungs la btsugs te/ nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer skyong 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i lus kyis
10a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i mthu yid la byed pas
10a3(rgyud): rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang snying brtse bas don thams cad grub par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid grub pa mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la
10a4(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te/ 'di pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid chen po snying por 'phags
10a5(rgyud): pa/ snying por gyur pa/ de kho na nyid grub pa/ pad+ma dam pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po rim par bye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang sgrub pa
10a6(rgyud): gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrag par bgyi'o// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi mang po'i
10a7(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i mdun dang / rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrag par bgyi'o// gang yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha dang / gshin rje
10b1(rgyud): dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / rgyu skar dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa
10b2(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa bklags pas sgrub pa dang bsgobs pas sgrub pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mdun du /
10b3(rgyud): kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing brjod par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam
10b4(rgyud): bar sbas pa/ phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i 'phreng ba dang / spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
10b5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor bzhag nas klad pa la byugs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs/
10b6(rgyud): papa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob kyis/ khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig smros shig/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bzhin byin
10b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa/ gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag byi ba brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
11a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags
11a2(rgyud): 'di dag gsol to// oM pad+ma hasta ma hA a mo g+ha bA sha sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hri da yaM/ tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po yin no// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan
11a3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po Ta la 'di phrag dang / nags tshal dang / rtswa shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang bcas pa
11a4(rgyud): rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing lha'i gnas rnams kyang ldeg par gyur te/ thams cad 'dar 'dar por gyur to// klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur to//
11a5(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// chu gter rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// de ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba
11a6(rgyud): byin to// 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa/ gsang ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das de
11a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gsang ba bklags pa de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa ni legs so legs so// sems dpa'
11b1(rgyud): dag pa khyod kyis gsang ba bklag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par spros shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di
11b2(rgyud): lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang+gA'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste spyi bo la bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra
11b3(rgyud): gsungs te/ gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la sngon bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/ zhig par bgyid do// sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / de bzhin du/
11b4(rgyud): gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do// sdig pa dang / sems can gdug pa rnams dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams 'jig par bgyid de/ 'di la the tshom mi bgyi'o// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan
11b5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin lha 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so// rig sngags 'di'i cho ga sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu khrus bgyis te gos
11b6(rgyud): gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// byams pa dang snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la
11b7(rgyud): mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzu
12a1(rgyud): kyi mdun du thog mar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa bang+ga
12a2(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis te chab dang yungs kar gyi dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdon par bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyis ni dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgyas kyang/
12a3(rgyud): dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bton pa tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i
12a4(rgyud): rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus
12a5(rgyud): las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang snying dga' ba dang spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'di//
12a6(rgyud): ni grub pa'i rtags yin no zhes grub pa'i rtags dang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dgos pa thams cad dang
12a7(rgyud): las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba spyi bo'i
12b1(rgyud): gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag pas/ gsang ba'i snying por gyur pa so sor
12b2(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur ro// dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus kyi rang bzhin mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// don
12b3(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// de lta bas na 'jig rten
12b4(rgyud): gyi khams bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa na khang pa brtsegs ma lags
12b5(rgyud): par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri mchog la/ 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing chos ston pa lta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par
12b6(rgyud): bkrus te gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang / dang ba dang / zhe sa dang / bla mar bgyi'o//
12b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor pa me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / ba dan gyis mchod par
13a1(rgyud): bgyi'o// tshes brgyad nas/ chos bcu gsum gyi bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
13a2(rgyud): snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o/
13a3(rgyud): mchod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul gyi me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas bslang bar bgyi'o// dgug
13a4(rgyud): pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ don yod khams gsum rnam par grags// bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med// gang phyir bdugs pa tsam gyis ni// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
13a5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro// dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
13a6(rgyud): thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la dri chen po'i mchod pa dang /
13a7(rgyud): bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas
13b1(rgyud): su gtogs pa'i sems can gang dag gis bdug pa'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu
13b2(rgyud): ge dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrugs pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdung ba dang / mi bde ba thams cad dang / nad tham
13b3(rgyud): cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad
13b4(rgyud): dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed thams cad dang / rims dang / bza' nyes dang / sgom nye sa dang / gnod sgrib dong / gnod lhas
13b5(rgyud): thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'jigs par 'gyur/ 'gyes par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di dag
13b6(rgyud): tu sbyar bar bgyi'o// 'di ltar tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma
13b7(rgyud): ci 'byor pa dbul bar bgyi'o// snying po dang nye ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs de nyid mdun du nam langs kyi bar du mchis
14a1(rgyud): nyal bar bgyis te/ rmi lam du dbyig gi mdzod mthong ngag/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rin po che'i shing dang bcas/ rin po chebar dang bcas/ ts+li /
14a2(rgyud): dang bcas/ gnas dang bcas/ khang pa brtsegs ma dang bcas/ gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
14a3(rgyud): med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
14a4(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de'ang rig sngags 'a
14a5(rgyud): de la dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing legs so zhes bgyi ba'ang stsol bar mdzad de/ kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang gi skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa
14a6(rgyud): ba mang du bskrun pa dang / khyod kyis lhag par mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang /
14a7(rgyud): gsang sngags rnam par phye ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni grub zin te legs so legs so// khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te tshe brjes nas
14b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bya'ang du skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sring po 'jug gi par dusangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyigang du 'gro bar 'gyur ma nas phyag g.yas pa grang pa'i sgo bar 'jog par gyur ro// jig/
14b2(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol cing / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral 'ang yongs su dag
14b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdur na mchis par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// gzugs kyir mo de'ang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'gyu
14b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// skye bo dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad
14b5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa chen po bla na med pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du/
14b6(rgyud): phyag rgya bcang bar bgyi'o// de nas ches bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor ba'i yon dang bcas pa'i mchod sngon stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid longs spyod par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe'
14b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas la lba ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la lta ba dang / lha rnams la lta bar 'tshal ba na/ de'i tshe bdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan ci bu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pa kyi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
15a1(rgyud): 'das la bdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing / dge ba'am mi dge ba thams cad dam/ nyams pa 'am bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro//
15a2(rgyud): ji tsam tsho mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba'ag/ 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags kyi chog dang / sgrub pa'i don dang / las kyi chog 'ang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o// oM pad+ma d+har/
15a3(rgyud): a mo g+ha dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru swAhA/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags so// oM pad+ma pA sha d+ha rU ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra sats+tshe da ya hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
15a4(rgyud): dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bskul ba'i gsang sngags te/ bdug pa'i
15a5(rgyud): rgyal pos bdugs nas tsha ba dang yungs kar bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bcur gtor na thams cad bskul bar bgyi'o// oM trai lo kya a b+hu hA na/ a mo g+ha pA sha/ pad+ma bi lo ki ta
15a6(rgyud): A ya n+yA b+hu ba ne su ra/ su ru su ru/ bi ma le hUM/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcur gtor bar bgyi ste/ thams
15a7(rgyud): cad nas dgug pa dam pa grub pa lags so// oM badz+ra b+hu dza ma hA pA sha d+hA ra Ni mnA ya ma~M/ a mo g+ha pA sha yan tu b+hu ba swa/ mu ru mu ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang
15b1(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags te/ ril ba sti thugs dang / cha ba dang / me tog dang / choms shing la 'jug pa'i rgyas/
15b2(rgyud): bos bdugs te/ thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngags so// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThAn ku ru ku ru swAt+ma/ sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing bste/ rba ba dang lungs
15b3(rgyud): kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor na dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de thams cad bsrungs pas ni rdo rje sra ba'i sem
15b4(rgyud): su 'gyur ro// dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ba dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur/
15b5(rgyud): ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mi mthong bas rdo rje sra bar 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha pA sha pad mo t+ta ra si hA/ sar+b+ba Ti si ri si ri hUM/ gdan gyi gsang sngags te yungs kar la snying
15b6(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod babyas te sa la gtor na/ pad+ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par dul bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lazhin po che sna bdun las byas
15b7(rgyud): pa'i seng ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/ rig sngags sus
16a1(rgyud): pa'i bad+ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM ma hA kA ru Ni ka pad+ma ma mo g+ha pA ga dra d+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+NI ta Tu ru b+hu ru b+han d+ha re smAng+ga/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na kyim dang / nabs tshal dang \u0f7f/
16a2(rgyud): dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / bsti gnas dang / 'chags dang / phug dang / dgon pa dang / gnas gsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyis/
16a3(rgyud): te/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad gsang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro// nyes par bgyid pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad 'bros par 'gyur te/ gnas
16a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha pA shA na sa man+ta da sha su di k+Shu si ma ban d+hA ya/ tu ru tu ru hUM/ lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad lnga la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
16a5(rgyud): brjod bgyis nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o// lnga pa ni dbus kyi gzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar mtshams bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtsham/
16a6(rgyud): chen po bcing ba bgyes par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha man+tal ban d+hA ya sa ma na/ pad+ma ma hA bad+he/ d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ dri chab dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa gyis nas dkyil 'tsho/
16a7(rgyud): mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang srang du'ang gtor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / shal mchis par 'os pa
16b1(rgyud): thams cad kyis mami bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can gdug pa dang / lnga'am/ klu gdub pa gang su'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ril gyis mnan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa dang /
16b2(rgyud): sems can ngan pa dang / bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha pa ri shud d+he sho d+ha ya sa ma na/ d+hi ra d+ha ri gud d+ha sa twa ma hA pad+me hUM/ 'dis pa'i rnam lha la lan stong rtsa brgyad
16b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag na gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ bya skyibs sam/ tshang tshing ngam/ 'chag sa 'am/ gnas sam/ tshal lam/ nags tshal lam/ skyed mos tshal
16b4(rgyud): lam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ khrang sa 'am/ skyabs sam/ khang pa la gtor na stong pa 'am/ mi stong pa 'am/ 'dam rdza ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / phyag dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas la
16b5(rgyud): sogs te rigs ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro// gnas gtsang mar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la dbang bskur na/ bza' nyes dang / sbom nyes dang / gnod lhas dang /
16b6(rgyud): gnod sgrib kyi gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs par spyod po ma lags pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// snyen
16b7(rgyud): gnas ma 'gyis pa'i bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sra ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / khyad 'jug
17a1(rgyud): chen po dang / gshin rje dang / rgyurtswa dang / lus ngan la sogs pa srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / smra ba'i slad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro 'jig rten thams cad kyi spyang du sdug pa dang /
17a2(rgyud): mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// tshig brtsan par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir
17a3(rgyud): kun tu gtor na 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang / yams dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du bdag/
17a4(rgyud): nyid la dbang bskur ram reg par bgyis na rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par dbye ba dang / las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang dang
17a5(rgyud): gang du mchis pa de dang der cher mchod par 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyis mi bzlog par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin gzhal med khang rgya chen po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba dang //
17a6(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad
17a7(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// rtag tu gtsang mar spyod par gtsang zhing dag par 'gyur ro// rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ 'jod
17b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rmi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing/ shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
17b2(rgyud): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM pad+ma sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya sAhA/ gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi gsang sngags so// oM bi bu la pad+ma a mo g+ha prA sa ra pra big tu/ ku ru kuru swA hA/ 'jug pa'i/
17b3(rgyud): gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hA pad+ma ban d+hu re d+d+he/ slob ma'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma shi ge tu rA tu ru/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra ban d+ha swAhA/ suM gtsug gi bcing ba'i gsang sngags te len nyi shu rtsa bcig
17b4(rgyud): bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma dza lod k+She ba/ b+hi ri b+hi ri hU~M/ chab bteg pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha ba~M ka T+Ta saM b+hA ra pad+ma A sa Ne dza la ba ti/ ku ru kA ru hU~M/ bum pa'i gsang sngags
17b5(rgyud): te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad+mi pra sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma le b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA/ chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags te lan gyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+me swa pad+me/ b+huHka ri d+hi ra d+hi bi ma le swAhA/ lag pa'i/
17b6(rgyud): gsang sngags te lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ sgrub pa thams cad
17b7(rgyud): la bsgrub par brgya 'ang las thams cad la dus thams cad dgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha ba ma la ji shAm sa ga tun bad+mag ma la dzi thA/ se sho d+ha la d+har d+har su bi ma la lAg/ lde sbyang ba'i gsang sngags te/ rje tsa po la lan grong ca
18a1(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ kha bshal la lho'i dri ma yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// pad+ma dang ku mu da'i 'dab ma dang 'dra bar lce gnyen par 'gyur ro// so dang / dkan dang / mgul ba yod+d+ha/
18a2(rgyud): sa dag par 'gyur ro/ oM a mo g+ha gan d+ha ba ti sa rdzas su rba bru rung byA gan te 'dra ba the swAH/ gsang sngags 'das par stsal ba'i rol ba tsun dan dag na ya dang / smr-i ka dang / ut+pal dang / grur gram dang / rmA
18a3(rgyud): lhan cig bslang ba bgyis la/ phye ma zhib mor btags nas ril bu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la/ gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi snod du stsal nas/
18a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe khar stsal nas skad cig tsam zhig bsdad pa bgyis na rtag tu kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyang grags tsam du the tshom med// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin/
18a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' yang dgyes// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshe
18a6(rgyud): gzhib mo'i rgyal po bam po gnyis pa/ bzlas pas bde bar 'grub 'gyur ba/ gdon yod rigs ni bla na med// rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyid pas// dus kun rul dri spang bar bgyi/
18a7(rgyud): mkhris pa bad kan snabs dag dang // de bzhin kun 'jigs myur du ni// kha nas lha yi dri dag 'byung // su la tshig dag spras pa ni// de ni myur du dbang du 'gyul// lha rnams dbang du mchis pa dang // bde sogs
18b1(rgyud): bangadas po dang po dang/ shA rje rnam ma pa dang / pa ma 'dus dang byasas// 'dag rte stong ba pa da/ mas da dag / khamasas sa ya //
18b2(rgyud): srung babyed pa// cig wAn su ma ma la// mtshas pam tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur// rtam tu mi man dbyangs 'gyur te// dri ba'i skyon na rnam par grangs// tshigs bcad stong ni grog pa dang // spyo pa gas
18b3(rgyud): ni nyams mi 'gyur// s+m+R+YuM zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang // lha gang dkrol 'khor gnas pa'ang mchi// paT+Ta tsas bgyis pas bdug pa dang // bgegs dang log 'dren rnam par 'jig/ gnid sbyin srid pyo/
18b4(rgyud): sha za dang // brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba ba// thams cad mod la 'byebyor 'gyur zhing // kha sbub tu yang 'gyel bar 'gyur// ril bu kha na thogs na ni// dus kun tu ni mkhas par 'gyur// grub po myur du
18b5(rgyud): 'gyur te// thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur// tshig mnyen 'jam zhing snyan par 'gyur// ril bu 'di ni bcang bgyis na// don yod pad+ma dri ma med// ril bu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur// oM ma la bi ga te bad+ma 'i
18b6(rgyud): ba re/ sar+b+ba ra ba ba tsa re swAhA// a mo g+ha sid d+he/ sho d+ha ya hUM/ na ga pus pa'i shun pa dang / u shi ra dang / tsan dan dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang / spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / gur kum dang /
18b7(rgyud): pra bun da ri ka dang / e la dang / sa ma ka dang / u gra dang / su gan d+hi ka 'di rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te zhib tu btags nas/ gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i cha ba dang bsres pas khrus
19a1(rgyud): bgyis shing 'tshal ba'am/ brjon pas khrus bgyi ba'am 'tshal bas shin du khrus bgyis pa gsangs dgu pas bag chab ma mchis pa gtong ba cam gyis/ sngon gyi drug pob las rnam pa
19a2(rgyud): gdon kur 'joms par 'grub pa dang // nad kun rnam par nyams pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi/ mun pa mi zad spong bar gsungs// bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni// dri ma kun zhi som nyi med/
19a3(rgyud): dpal gyis lha yi bzhin du 'bar// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'bel// gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pa na// lus ni lha yi bzhin du 'gyur// mi
19a4(rgyud): gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur// ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur// thub min thub par kho nar 'gyur// tshangs par mi spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur// mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang /
19a5(rgyud): rtag tu bro nad ma mchis 'gyur// lus la lha mo'i dri rnams 'byung // pad+mo ku mud mnyen pa'i lus// sngon gyi dri ni rab spangs te// lha ya tsan dan dri dag ni// mda' rgyang gang du som nyi med// rtag tu bde bar nyal ba dang /
19a6(rgyud): bde bar yang ni sad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang // lha min gdug pa log 'dren dang // gdug pa'i bgegs kun mthong mi 'gyur// mi bzad dgra rnams kyis kyang min// lus nyid sbyangs pa
19a7(rgyud): babyis nas su// bzlas brjid brtsod pa'i bsgrub pa bgyi// legs par sgrub pa'i las bgyis na// de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun// de bzhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur/
19b1(rgyud): lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan// dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur du mchi// ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yi// rtag tu dor yong grub par 'gyur// thog mar lus sbyangs cho ga bgyi// de nas gsang sngags legs pan
19b2(rgyud): spyad// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma lo tsa na da bya/ dr-iSh+Ta pa ri shud d+he/ su ru su ru pad+ma ak+Shi sha b+hu ru b+hu ru sa man+ta bya ba lo ka ni swAhA/ ldong ros gi'u wang rgya mtsho wu ba ha sa dza/ ut+pal sbrang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la/
19b3(rgyud): gsang sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs// 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis// kun pas bkra shis shis 'di/
19b4(rgyud): mig nad kun// 'joms par bgyid de g.yar lam bzang po rmi/ yid du mi mchi ba nyid mthong mi 'gyur// ngan par snang dang ngan par lta/ nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gtum po 'joms pa gtum po
19b5(rgyud): dang / lhag ma sbags pa sgom nyes dang // bza' nyes gnod sgrib gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dag/ thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu// mi snang bar ni the tshom med// mig gis bzang po
19b6(rgyud): mthong ba dang // rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur// thab srang du rab sbyar bas// lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// mig yongs su myong ba'o// oM bud d+hA bud d+ha/ bi bungad du pad+ma a mo g+ha mu khaM/ bar ba rang/
19b7(rgyud): rad sna hA/ rig sngags 'dis gi'u wang la len stong rtsa brgyad ba zlas brjod pagyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pagyi'o// khro ba'i rgyal po lan bdun pa bras brjod pagyi'o// su
20a1(rgyud): po dang nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe'ang 'di blangs te dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis te/ thig le lan cig bgyis pas dpral
20a2(rgyud): pa'i steng na skar ma'i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchis// gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang // srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid// thams cad 'jig 'gyur
20a3(rgyud): tshem med// sems can gdug pas gdug bsams kyang // phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te// ma la phye ma leb bzhin no// rtag tu rgyal po skye bor bcas// 'khor bcas
20a4(rgyud): blon por bcas pa dang // blon po che dang mdun na 'don// btsun mo tshogs bcas dbang du 'gyur// dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dag/ thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur// rgyal rigs dmangs rigs nyid dag ste//
20a5(rgyud): thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur// rig sngags lha ni thams cad dang // gang dag dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste// de dag thams cad dam tshig gi/ rjes su sgrub cing skyob
20a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur srung ba bgyid 'gyur zhing // rtag tu grub pa bla med stsol// thig le 'di bgyis grogs med rgyab dag/ chom rkun dang ni chom po g.yon can dang // g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs
20a7(rgyud): pa gang yin pa// kun nas bskal bar 'gyur te som nyi med// seng ge sug dang dom dag dang // glang chen khro bo mo bzad dang // wa dang gdug bcas srog chags dang // so gdug sbrul kun mgo nas pa
20b1(rgyud): gang dag srog chags bdug par bcas// de dag thams cad du 'gyur te/ nam yang 'azung bar mi 'gyur ro// ser ba med dang tshig pa dang / gachar pa mi bzang mtshon nu byad// mkhas pa thig le 'ang bag/
20b2(rgyud): lus/ khyim rdib pas kyang non mi 'gyur// mkhas pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don// thams cad 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur// shin tu ma grub gsal bar yang // 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// bcom
20b3(rgyud): ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis bdag dran par bgyid cig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du bdag mchis nas yid la
20b4(rgyud): bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsungs pa bzhin stsal bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// don yong pa grub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// bden
20b5(rgyud): par dam bcas pas dam tshig rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par bgyid na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de
20b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rjes su gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis sprul bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gis ma
20b7(rgyud): nongs so// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i chog dang cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas/ gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyi ste/ dgos pa de dag thams cad the tsham ma mchis par 'thur
21a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/ oM m+b+ha mo b+ha b+ha shad+ha ras bras rag+ha mchod kyi sogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te/ gnon rnams bkal ba'i spya pa laSh+Ta
21a2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas mdud pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o// oM a ma~M g+ha pra ba ram/ mu ru mu ri di bya ka shi ka/ saM b+ha ba tu ta ra ta ra swA hA/ gos kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM A
21a3(rgyud): mo g+ha bas+t+ra rgyod k+Shi bA mi bo d+hi ni pad+me swAhA/ gos bteg pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM da pyo da ka saM b+hU ta a mo g+ha ba ru Na tsa re b+hi k+Shin ts+ya hUM/ khrus kyi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
21a4(rgyud): bzlas so// oM a mri tA a mo g+ha pad+ma a sa ne/ baR+Sha ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ nye reg gi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a maM g+ha rak+Sha ni/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ bdag bsrung ba ste/ yungs kar dang /
21a5(rgyud): cha ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas rang gi lus la dbang bskur ro// oM a mo g+ha sa ma ya/ ma hA pad me tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sar+b+ba tra a mo g+ha ba bA ti tiH
21a6(rgyud): rak+Sha tu d+hu/ slob ma dang grogs bgyid pasrung ba ste/ thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thig la bgyi'o// oM trail kye pad ma a mo g+ha kra ma ne mi li mi li swAhA/ gom pa 'dor ba'i sngags te lan nyi shuH
21a7(rgyud): gcig bzlas so// oM pad+ma ma hA bad+mes ra sa ra/ sa mnan pa ri beSh+TA ya/ a mo g+ha bA she na su ru su ru swA hA/ tshon srung sA lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bgyi'o// oM bi tsi pra a me g+ha bstan na reg bi shud d+hAm/
21b1(rgyud): ki Ni ki Ni sA hA/ ba dan gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha sha ra badz+ra tur+tha tha ra tha ra swAhA/ mda'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi pu la a mo g+ha ma hA d+ha ra bi shud d+he/ saur sa ra/
21b2(rgyud): swAhA/ rta babs kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// su dag der zhugs na mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro// oM nAnA pa tsi
21b3(rgyud): kyai a mo g+ha pul+la ba la tAkAH pU ra ya/ ba ra pa ra hU~M/ bum pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// e a mo g+ha ri NI ba maH/ kaT tsa/ a dr-iSh+Ta bi byA gan d+ho dza la sA raH/ sa mnan dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hU~M/ pon/
21b4(rgyud): bor gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dz+wa la ba ti/ rat+na g+hA ta/ si ri Ni tu rI tu Ti swA hA/ gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM di bya b+ha dza na a mo g+ha pad+ma bA re b+hA ra ya hUM/ kham por/
21b5(rgyud): gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha saM pu ra Ni dro Na gan d+ha pa ti swA hA/ thig la'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sa ra ni stA ra ya/ a mo g+ha b+ha dza na mA da ne hUM/ rilab mgrin rings kyi gas
21b6(rgyud): sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM ratra p+ta rat+na kum b+ha ba ti s+yA ga ra/ saM pU ra Ni swAhA/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM ba tsid two dz+wa la nA na ra~M ga bi b+ha k+Sha la sa shwad+ha ya hu Ni swAt+ma/ tshan gyis
21b7(rgyud): gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM byi a wa lo ga ni ba b+ha dza la myos mnun sa mar ne sAtra/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pa gyis nye sa sor dbye bar bgyi'o// oM n+dan+da pra pAr Na a mo g+ha mu drA jal/
22a1(rgyud): dz+wa la swA hA/ phyag 'tshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha rat+na sU d+hur/ kiNi ki Ni swAhA/ thig srung kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'tsho/
22a2(rgyud): ram/ ri mo bri nga'i ras sam/ gzhan gzhi ci'ang rung ba la'ang gdape par bgyi'o// oM ba pu la ba ri pra be sha ya/ a mo gra bad+d+he d+hu/ sgo'i chang dbye ba'i gsang sngags te wA re rer yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
22a3(rgyud): so// oM su b+hi b+hak+ti su maM ga la dA ra bA ban ti/ oM di bya bA dzA na/ a mo g+ha pA sha na pa nu ba re/ gi ri gi ri hU~M/ oM saM b+hUr+d+ha/ rU pyA di bya b+ha dza ni/ a mo g+ha pad+me swAhA/ lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o//
22a4(rgyud): oM bi bi d+ha rU pa hA ro pak+Sha ra Na/ tsa la tsa la/ a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM di bya gan d+hA nu sa ra Ni a mo g+ha ba le d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/ mchod yon gyi sngags te lan bdun bzlas so//
22a5(rgyud): gan d+ha s+pha ra Ni sa man+ta/ a mo b+ha pra sU ra hUM/ dri'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM ni ri ma la kA ya sho d+ha ni di bya gan d+ha pra pU ra Ni pU ra ya hU~M/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so//
22a6(rgyud): gar d+ha r+thar+N+Na pra pU ra N-i/ tsu ru tsuru srAr+tha/ dro'i phyi ma'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sams brten/ bi ma le gan d+ho ta ta re swA hA/ bskul ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bkrus so// oM da bya gan d+haH/
22a7(rgyud): pU ra Ni sA ga ra dza la dib bya a d+hiSh+Tha te ka la sho d+ha ra/ pUr+Na pU ra ya dza ya sid d+he swAhA/ bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM ra sa sA gra pa ti/ sar+b+ba bi d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te saM pU ra ya
22b1(rgyud): sgra gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dab bya b+ho dzi na/ sa pU ra ya/ bi pU la pra b+he swA hA/ kha zas kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM tra
22b2(rgyud): shuk+ka b+ho dzi na/ ba li ba pU la ra sA ma ba te su ra pra su ra hU~M/ zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma 'am/ gtor ma gzhan la'ang len nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pha la ba ti sU ra ba ti ba bya ba nas ti/ kAr ta /
22b3(rgyud): ni swAhA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dab bya ku su mod ba la nA nA buSh+Ta pra baR+Sha Ni b+ha ba b+ha ba sA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha la ta puSh+pa pa kuN Shi ta ba na
22b4(rgyud): swa ti A ha ra sa~M pUr+Na/ ku b+he sAhA/ me tog gtor ba'i gsang sngags trai lan bdun bzlas so// oM mahA d+hU pa me g+ha pa Ta la sany+tsa dA ya/ sa man+yen hUM swAhA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
22b5(rgyud): so/ i a thar pa Na dz+wa la dz+wa la de ba mu khe swA hA/ me'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM ba dzi d+hi ma Ni ka nA ka rat+no dz+wa la pU Sha Nam Ni ma Ni a ma g+hu ma Ni swA hA/ ma ning rgyan pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun
22b6(rgyud): bzlas so// oM ba ka ba ma lan la ang grA ni/ sa ma sam sa rba thA ga ta/ a d+hi hrI swA/ bal ma sbyar ba'i gas sngags te lan ci bu rgya gcig brtsam mo// mas na bu tham / shair ba rnyan du ni
22b7(rgyud): masba rom/ mi la mo li hu Ni swA hA/ phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// ed shadi she a b+hi ban d+han pras tu tu/ bskor ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shus gcig bzlas so/ dem
23a1(rgyud): bi ba d+ha mud+hA dz+wa li ta ba ni/ pra dz+wa la pra sUr hU~M/ thal mo'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'azlas so// oM daM ba bya a mo g+ha ba~M bu la sA hA/ re ma d+hu ra nir gyo la ru ten raHhUM/ dril dzuH/
23a2(rgyud): gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do// oM rash+mi dz+wa la sa man+te na a ba b+hA sa yA ma hA ma Ni rat+na shi khe swA hA/ mar me gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM d+hu ru d+harA
23a3(rgyud): a pa bA ya shrI g+h+ra dza be hUM/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM duSh+Tas do bi bo d+ha ni/ sa ma sa ma ya ba re swA hA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gtso/
23a4(rgyud): bzlas so// oM bi tsi tra ma Ni bi pu la pra bar ta ni hUM/ bgrang 'phreng gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM bi tsi tra rat+no dz+wa lo dib bya/ ku su ma ba re puSh+pa ra ti swA hA/ me tog 'phreng ba'i gsang ba'i sngags
23a5(rgyud): te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dbi bya lo tsa ne a mo g+he pra ba re/ sarba dib bya a d+hiSh+Thi ta sid d+ye shud d+ha bi lo ki te swA hA/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+me sa man ta shu b+ha na
23a6(rgyud): ta ra ta ra/ gats+tsha swa b+hA ba na ma swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dibi pya saM pU ra Ni/ nA ga bi lo ki na hUM/ 'khar gsil gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcog
23a7(rgyud): bzlas so// oM bad Ta s+phu ra Ni s+phu ra ya/ a mo g+ha bi ta sa man+ta pra b+he swA hA/ lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dur b+ha sa s+pha ra bi d+h+ya a tiSh+Tha ta pra sa ra/ su ra su ra ri Shi pU dza~M te sAh+ma
23b1(rgyud): gding ba'i gsang lpags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ a dz+wal du ma dz+wa la shi khir shrI gar bye spang / sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM brjon pa dus ne ba bra ba re nA ga byung na/
23b2(rgyud): swAhA/ babab chu dang mtsho'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM kha ga tsa raNi/ ga ma ga ma ya pa da pra tsa ra Ni hUM/ len pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM sarba tra a po g+ha b+hI la/
23b3(rgyud): ma hA ts+tsha ba bi ma le/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAn/ pra ba ra pA Ni b+hu dze pad+me d+hA dze swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// rig sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sar
23b4(rgyud): gzhib mo'i sgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas cho ga bsgrubs na dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i
23b5(rgyud): snod sna tshogs dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i me tog dang / gdugs dang / ba dan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang /
23b6(rgyud): ro sna tshogs kyi mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gtor ma bzang po rnam pa tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
23b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
24a1(rgyud): nam mkha' lding rnams dang / ma 'am ci rnams dang / sgo 'phye chen po rnams la sa so'i gzhal med khang ji wu ba de la bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta dang / kha/
24a2(rgyud): zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad bgyi ba dang / de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga dang / gsang sngags bsgrub pa
24a3(rgyud): rnams bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
24a4(rgyud): po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod
24a5(rgyud): pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags/
24a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de kho na nyid yang dag/
24a7(rgyud): par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsal bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i grub po chen po stsal bar bgyi'o// shin tu rgya che zhing bag tsha ba ma mchis pa dang /
24b1(rgyud): mchod pa dang / bkur skye chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang dpal sbal bar bgyi'o// 'di la yid gnyis dang sos nyi bskyed par mi bgyi dang /
24b2(rgyud): dngos po gzhan du'ang yid la mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o// bu gcig pu bzhin du sem
24b3(rgyud): can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// bden par smra ba dang / bden par dga' ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas dmigs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
24b4(rgyud): bzla bar bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing / phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzla bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la
24b5(rgyud): bgyis nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas/
24b6(rgyud): mngon sum du bsgom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te/ mdun du rtswa'i gding ba bting nas skyil mo krung bcas te mchi
24b7(rgyud): nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyi ste/ 'di ni gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub par
25a1(rgyud): gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa dang / sems can dag pa lag na pad+ma can/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi/
25a2(rgyud): byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po lha min gsang ba pa/ 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang // drag po khyab 'jug
25a3(rgyud): gzhon nu sogs// gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang // drang srong tshegs dang de bzhin du// zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang // de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dang / phyag rgya bcing ba tsam gyis ni// de dag myur du 'dra//
25a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// sgrol ma bdun ni 'du bar 'gyur// de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang // mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can// de bzhin pad+ma gar gyi dbang // rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni// lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags/
25a5(rgyud): sgrog dang // lha mo khro gnyer mA ma kI/ dpe med po nya mo dang ni// 'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang // pad+ma ko ti ut+pal// pad+ma'i so can de bzhin du// ti sa yi ni rtse mo na// 'brog ma 'byung po ma
25a6(rgyud): dag dang // de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu// mthu chen ji bzhin rig 'dzin dbang // rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin du// bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang // sum cu gnyis nus lha dag ni// gsang sngags phyag
25a7(rgyud): rgya bcings tsam gyis// de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do// de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
25b1(rgyud): rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mgon po 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong ba dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa lnga 'tshal bar 'gyur ro
25b2(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags// mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med// mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang // de bzhin rgya mtsho'i glong dang ni// mgon po'i zhal ni bcu gcig
25b3(rgyud): dang / de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang // mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang // de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// phyag rgya bcings pa
25b4(rgyud): tsam gyis ni// mgon pos thams cad ston par mdzad// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams// rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpag med// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor ba// mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur//
25b5(rgyud): gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong dag gi/ chu bo gang+gAd+hA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i// de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya drag stong // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon// phyag rgya bcings
25b6(rgyud): ba tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste// nyin gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang // chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan// de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur/
25b7(rgyud): bas/ de la yid gnyis som nyi the tsom med// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gshung ba 'am mtshams med lnga// mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa' bar chad 'phags pa la// kha
26a1(rgyud): nyid dang dam chos slu ba dang // rgyal bas gsungs spong mnar med gzhol ba dang // mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang // bskal pa 'bum po thams cad skad cig grol// byaH/
26a2(rgyud): rgya gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam// thos sam mthong ngam ming ni gzung bas kyang // sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med// don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang // 'jig rten mgon dang mtshu
26a3(rgyud): te khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gang+gA yi// bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar mtshungs//
26a4(rgyud): don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags mthong na bsod nams phung chen gyis// bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur// de yi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de ni dpag tu med//
26a5(rgyud): par som nyi med// de nas rig sngag 'chang ba gtsang gyur nas// gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang // yo byad sgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang // rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs
26a6(rgyud): bdug pas rab tu bdug bgyis shing // dpung pa lag pa lha yi spos kyis byug/ gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i snyan bshams par// skyil mo krung bcas nas ni byams sems dang // snying rje'i lhag
26a7(rgyud): bsam de nyid mnyam gzhag nas// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi zhing // rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chos la brtson// shin tu rig pas tshig
26b1(rgyud): gzhan mi smra bar// shin tu rig pas srung ba'i chog bgyi// shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus// bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang // sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig rjes mthur/
26b2(rgyud): gyur nas de nas ni// phyag rgya bdi bcing bar bgyi ste/ lag pa pad+ma'i tshul du gzhag la sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du skying khar gzhag go/ phyag rgya 'don don yod pa'i'adrul /
26b3(rgyud): snying po dra ba'i phyag tu ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du stsol bar 'gyur ro// mgon po 'jig dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha bi kur bi ta/ sa man+ta a wa lo ka ya na ma s+t+rai ya d+hA/ a d+hiSh+Thi ta a
26b4(rgyud): mo g+ha pad+me tsa ra sany+tsa ra hUM hUM/ de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad+ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus
26b5(rgyud): gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshog
26b6(rgyud): 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang nas rig sngags
26b7(rgyud): 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// grub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha
27a1(rgyud): bu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / khyab bdag dang / kun 'gyed gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa 'gyid par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcing /
27a2(rgyud): btsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / chad pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad
27a3(rgyud): bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so// don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa/ pad+ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing / mdzub mo gung mo rnams pad+ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyis la/ sen/
27a4(rgyud): mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor brtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha padz+nyA ku sha sa ma yA na/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA
27a5(rgyud): satwa hUM/ phyag rgya bcings te bcings ma thag tu 'am/ gzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
27a6(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgyes pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dang/
27a7(rgyud): pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing / yang nas yang du mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
27b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras/
27b2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin
27b3(rgyud): brtag tu lha 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil pad+ma ltar bgyis la// mdzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing // mthe'u chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma 'chang la bdug pa dang // me tog la sogs dri rnams dang /
27b4(rgyud): 'phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang // ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni// gtor ma mchod yon rab tu dbul// bum pa gang ba'i dri sogs dang // tshon skud sna lnga tshon bye'o// gzhan yang zas ni sna tshog la// phyag rgya 'di
27b5(rgyud): ni kun la mchog/ 'di ni dbul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// thams cad du ni don yod mchog/ go bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs// gung mor nor bu dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni
27b6(rgyud): bag tsha ba med pa'i pad+ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni grub pa dam pa lags so// spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni/ oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ma hA satwa a ya tu mi ha maN+Da le/ bi ri bi ri pad+ma pU dze swA hA/ dus gsu
27b7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // phyag na pad+ma gsol gdab dgug/ lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gyi ni
28a1(rgyud): lha rnams dgug/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yang 'du// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min de/
28a2(rgyud): bzhin du// nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po nyid dag ste// de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing // srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag la// lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnam
28a3(rgyud): pad+ma'i mtshams su bya ste/ gung mo rnams yid tsam bskum pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcing dang // dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba yi// srung ba'i las la bag tsha med// phyag rgya'i
28a4(rgyud): ni bcings tsam dang // gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis// dpag tshad bdun ni 'khor yug tu// mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // srung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dre rgya
28a5(rgyud): pad+ma ban d+hA sa man+ten ma hA sa man+ta rak+Shan+tu mAM/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ de nas don yod phyag rgya ste// grub ldan sems can kun smra na// don yod pa ni phyag rgya ni// khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan// rdo rje thal mo
28a6(rgyud): sbyar nas ni// sor mo rnams mnyam par gzhag ste/ sran lag kha gdengs la sor mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa ni/ da song sna tshogs rgyal po so// pad+ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags// phyag rgya 'di ni las kun
28a7(rgyud): dang / 'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang // dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs// phyag rgya 'di ni gzung tsam dang // gsang sngags dam pas bsrung bgyis na// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur/
28b1(rgyud): dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thar pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam par 'grub par 'gyur// oM badz+re badz+ra/ a d+hiSh+Thi ta pad+me bi shwa rU pa d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ pra be sha tu s+t+rai ya d+hA nu ga ta na d+hi ri tra tra~M swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di ni/
28b2(rgyud): bcings tsam gyis// de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu// g.yo bar 'gyur bar som nyid med// phyag na pad+ma'i lus 'bar nas// mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// rig
28b3(rgyud): sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis// rtag tu lta zhing mdun na mchis// sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang // mtho ris sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na// gnas pa'i lha
28b4(rgyud): rnams sgo 'byed cing // sum cu rtsa gsum gnas sgo na// gnas pa thams cad sgro 'byed do// bde can 'jig rten khams dag ni// sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis/
28b5(rgyud): gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur// phyag rgya sdig pa thams cad 'phrog/ nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod pa thams cad 'jigs par bgyid//
28b6(rgyud): dmyal ba bcu drug rnams las thar// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang // nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid// dmyal ba'i sgo ni gcad par 'gyur//
28b7(rgyud): mi bzad 'jigs las bsgral bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di nyid mthong tsam gyis// mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang // sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// sems can kun la rtag tu sdug/ de bzhin
29a1(rgyud): gshegs kun byin gyis rlob// phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste/ gung mo pad+ma'i ral ba'i tshul du bgyis te/ spyi bo'i ral ba sa la gzhag pa ni/ pad+ma'i/
29a2(rgyud): ral pa'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bsgrags te/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha pad+mo dza le bi sho d+ha ya hUM/
29a3(rgyud): bi ri bi ri bi ma laM swAhA/ phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis// bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su// phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs med pas// rtag tu/
29a4(rgyud): bkrus pa'i mod tsam gyis// mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur// mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang ba dang // tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur// mi thub pas ni thub par 'gyur// bsod nams phung pos lnga/
29a5(rgyud): bzhin 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// 'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug/ gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub// grub pa don yod zhags pa yi// don yod de nyid 'grub par 'gyur// lha rnams kun ni 'du
