29a6(rgyud): 'gyur te// srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// sems dpa' mchod sbyin dag pa po// mchog sbyin rgyun du tham cad du// nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing // tshe 'phel rtag tu nad med/
29a7(rgyud): 'gyur// de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur// thams cad du ni las 'grub ste// gnod pa kun las rnam par grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// thams cad du ni bkra shis mchog/ khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag
29b1(rgyud): ni la don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no// lag gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan// srin lag gnyis yid tsam bskum pa ni pad+ma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te/ kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag/ phyag rgya ting 'dzin/
29b2(rgyud): lta bu 'di// skyil mo krung bcas mchis nas su// phyag rgya 'di dag bcing bgyis shing // mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas// bcings pa tsam gyi mod nas ni// skyil krung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur//
29b3(rgyud): kun nas go cher gyur nas ni// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas// lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams dag tu// de dag thams
29b4(rgyud): cad rgyang ring 'bros// bgegs med par ni las 'grub pa// bzlas pa'i las la som nyi med// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dr-i b+ha pad+me shwa ra hUM/ thal mo mnyam par sbyar la mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug nas mthe bong pad+ma kha phye/
29b5(rgyud): bltar bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// oM pad+me shwa ra a mo g+ha ba rang / b+hi ra b+hi ra swA hA/
29b6(rgyud): 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems pa'i bsam pa rtse gcig pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan cig bzlas pa
29b7(rgyud): tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
30a1(rgyud): rnams kyis rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bgyi ba sgol bar 'gyur ro// dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad do// mgon po
30a2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu
30a3(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
30a4(rgyud): lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas
30a5(rgyud): brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis nas rig
30a6(rgyud): sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol te/ rig sngags 'chang legs se legs so// 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag
30a7(rgyud): nas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ tshur shog bu gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no// khyod rjes su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pas nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi bu bor gyur cig/ rig sngags 'cha
30b1(rgyud): byang kyis don mong ba'i 'gas pa'i nga po grub pas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'thor kyi phyag rgyas par dbya ba dang / cho gzhib po'i rgyal po la brtan par gyis shig/ srung rjechen po'i sas kyisasangs ngan/
30b2(rgyud): cad la goms par gyis shig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / khyod pad+ma'i nang du rdzus te skyes nas rgyur thams cad kyis
30b3(rgyud): brgyan cing mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjed bgyis te/ phyag rgya
30b4(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bcings pas lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang
30b5(rgyud): 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod rgya cher snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gang gi
30b6(rgyud): mthus stong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dpung pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis mchi zhing slar ldog par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis la phyag rgya brgya stong bcings na/ tshe 'di nyid
30b7(rgyud): la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa'i don yod pa'i mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po/
31a1(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / drag po dang / dbang po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan la sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar
31a2(rgyud): ro/ klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar gyur pa de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzlas
31a3(rgyud): brjod sgrub pa 'bum lags so// 'bum bzlas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du snang ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur/
31a4(rgyud): ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir mi ldog par byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcing
31a5(rgyud): te skyil mo krung bcas nas sems cad thams cad la brtse ba dang / 'byung po tham cad la byams pa dang / snying rje ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/
31a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis ma thag kho nar lan drug brgya bzhi bcur bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dran pa dang / blo gros dang / gzi brjid
31a7(rgyud): lus la 'jug par bgyid do// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ri mo'i sku gzugs de la'ang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan
31b1(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang /
31b2(rgyud): slob pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba dang btugs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa rnams kyi dam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas sa /
31b3(rgyud): rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po gsum pa/ thal mo lhan cig
31b4(rgyud): bsdams te sbyar la rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste khar gtad la/ srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed cing gung mo pad+ma la bur bgyis te sngags 'di brjod do// oM tu ru tu ru pad+me a mo g+ha sid d+hi hUM/ phyag rgya 'di ni don
31b5(rgyud): yod grub// las rnams grub dang ldan pa yi// 'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa yis// kun rig myur du 'grub par 'gyur// myur du ston par stsol 'gyur te// rnyed dka' don yod grub pa mchog/ mchog
31b6(rgyud): kun rab tu spobs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin 'jig rten pa// sgrib pa thams cad las ni rnam par grol// bsod nams phung po dag ni rtag tu 'phel// bkra shos sgra ni 'byung bar 'gyur
31b7(rgyud): ba'o// lha rnams rtag tu srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje bcing ba shin tu bcing // rtag tu sems ni brtan por bgyi// mdzub mo dag ni yid bskums nas// snying kha dag tu rab tu brkyang // don yod pa'i pad+mas pad+ma'i dkyil
32a1(rgyud): 'khor phyag rgya dang / snying po gsungs pa dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang don thams cad grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag gsungs nas/ de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsu /
32a2(rgyud): pa/ oM a mo g+ha hr-i da ya/ pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA maN+Da la hri da ya hUM/ snying po phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// pad+ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po yi// grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi med// thams cad du ni las/
32a3(rgyud): rnams thams cad dag/ de ni grub par 'gyur te som nyi med// shin tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzung // shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas// shin tu bkrus pas gos gtsang bgo/ gtsang ma'i sems kyis
32a4(rgyud): 'chang bgyid cing // sems can kun la brtser gyur nas// rtag tu bla ma gus par bsgom// rtag tu shin tu dang bgyi zhing // pad+ma'i phyag la dga' bar bgyi// myur du las 'grub myur du ni// pad+ma 'chang dang sangs
32a5(rgyud): rgyurgyas 'thob// myur du 'jig rten dbang phyug 'thob// myur du sems can kun phan ldan// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang ba tsam gyi khar pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la/ lag pa bsgyur nas mdzub mo gyen du sgreng / mthe bong
32a6(rgyud): yid tsam pa bkug la lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ ser me rnams pad+ma'i tshul du gzhag la mthe bong yid tsam bkug ste/ gung mo don yod pa'i zhags par bgyi ba ni don yod pa'i zhi ba'i cho ga chen po'i mig
32a7(rgyud): sems can thamad la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te/ gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM ba shu pa ti pA shA d+ha ra sa ha swa ra shrI pra ti man ri ta ka ya/ A ka ri ba ni/ sats+tshed ni/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/
32b1(rgyud): amo ga d+hA gsing d+ha rgyu/ phyag rgya 'dis gsang sngags lama'i shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mang po bzlas nas lag pa g.yas bzhags pa'i phyag tu tshul dugadag cig zlar/
32b2(rgyud): yang rangag gnas bzung zhing gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te lan bdun du'ang gdeg go// don yod rgyal po bzlas pas ni// bsam pa mchog tu dag par bgyi// bzlas pa tsam gyi mad la ni/ don
32b3(rgyud): yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// byang chub thams cad dgug pa dang // mod la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dag/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin// mod la grub pa bla
32b4(rgyud): med dang // mod la thams cad dgug par 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min nam mkha' lding // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rig sngags 'chang la blta ba'i phyir// thams cad de yi mod
32b5(rgyud): la du/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dag/ de nyid gzigs pas gzigs par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la blta bgyi'o phyir// byang chub sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur// mgon po 'phags/
32b6(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs// mchog sbyin spyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur// yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi// rang bzhin mod la ston par mdzad// gang dag mnar med song ba dang // sems can mtshams med/
32b7(rgyud): lnga bgyid dang // gang dag 'phags la skur 'debs dang // gang dag dam chos spong ba dang // phyag rgya 'di mthong 'dzin bcug dang // bcad pas mod la sdig pa kun// 'jig 'gyur mod la 'dren pa mdzog
33a1(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam dang // gsang sngags thos par bgyid pa dang // rig sngags 'chang ba mdzang /
33a2(rgyud): bde/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// mngon du mthong bar blta bar bya// tshe rabs brgyud par bskal pa ni// brgya dang stong du bsags pa yi// sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams// phyag rgya bcings sam mthong ma
33a3(rgyud): gyis/ de kun 'byung 'gyur som nyi med// thal mo lhan cig dam du sbyar te/ mkhas pas pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis la mdzub mo nor bur bgyis te/ gung mo yid tsam zhig bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal
33a4(rgyud): mtshan gyi rtse mo ste/ lag pa spyi bor brkyang nas spyi bor dbang bskur ba stsol ba'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM s+yA d+ha nu ga ta/ a b+hi Shany+tsa tu/ sarba s+yA d+hA/ a b+hi She keHpad+ma ma Ni su pad+me/ a mo g+he sarba ta thA ga ta/ oM d+hiSh+Ti/
33a5(rgyud): te hUM/ 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur/
33a6(rgyud): ro// rig sngags 'tshang gi rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gces
33a7(rgyud): gcig pu'i gnas su 'gyur ro// spyi gtsug rdo rje pad+ma bcing // rtag tu sor mo'i rtse mo brkyang // mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyi// rang gi gdong gis khro gnyer bzhin// khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas/ las
33b1(rgyud): kun sgrub par bgyid pa yi// thams cad sgrub bgyid phyag rgyas// kun sgrub dam pas gsang sngags pas/ 'di drad grub pa kun gyi mjog/ oM kr-id+ha rma dz+nyA rnam pa smras po g+ha ha dang na/ san du d+hA d+hu/ drug na/
33b2(rgyud): 'di dran tsam gyis kyang // mthu chen po yi gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa kun ni rnam 'jig ste// ri rab kyang ni snyil bar bgyid// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyis pa yis// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid// sems
33b3(rgyud): can gdug dang gdug pa'i klu/ bgegs dang log 'dren gdug pa ste// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis// lha dang mi dang dge sbyong dang /
33b4(rgyud): bram ze rgyal rigs dmangs gang lags// thams cad dbang du gyur nas ni// mchis par 'gyur bar som nyi med// rgyud ni rtag tu mnyam bzhag la// mthe bong mnyam du bteg nas ni// gung mo yis ni gung mo nyid//
33b5(rgyud): yid tsam bkug nas bsgreng bar bgyi// 'di ni pad+ma chen po yi// lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ste// grub pa bla na med pa yi// thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags// thal mo pad+ma'i tshul du sbyar// mthe bong nyid ni brkyang bgyis/
33b6(rgyud): mdu rlung med tsam bdug pa ni// dkar shas chen po'i drug d+has// 'drin zlab blan med// de r+dz+nyA rdul du thal gyur ngam sa ma shog// shesarab can gyis gams pa'i lag bsgyur ba// thog
33b7(rgyud): 'di ning zhi gros dang / phyag rgya na pa kun 'di rabadu sbyin// log pa gnyis kyi la myur brgya sa ni// gsang bde brgyang bung po bzlam nas sa// ethu chung brgyang nas lcags smag 'dram/ tshu
34a1(rgyud): snying kha'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi// phyag rgya 'din phyag rgya// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// dkyil 'khor kun nas lha dag dang // dkyil 'khor mya kun dga' bar 'gyur// 4/
34a2(rgyud): cad tshogs shing 'du ba dang // kun gyis srung bgyid som nyi med// phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas lag pa ni// thal sbyar pad+ma'i tshul bzhin du byas te// snying khar bzhag pa gnod sbyin po nya mo// 'di ni phyag rgya lags
34a3(rgyud): par legs par bsgrags// dang po rdo rje khu tshur legs bcings la// gung mo lhag ma bskum zhing mthe bong gzhag/ pad+ma'i tshul gyi bzhin dran sgrol mdun gyis// grub pa kun gyi bla med phyag rgya 'di// sdig pa thams
34a4(rgyud): cad 'jig cing nyon mongs kun// nad kun nye bar zhi bar som nyi med// don yod pa'i grub pa bla med kyis// cho ga zhib mo thams cad rab tu 'grub// lag pa gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// rdo rje'i tshul du pad+ma bcing //
34a5(rgyud): mdzub mo bskum pa bgyis nas ni// mthe bong yang ni dgug par bgyi// 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// cho ga zhib mo'i dam pa lags// pad+ma'i tshul du thal mo sbyar// mdzub mos 'khyud la gung mo ni// lcags kyu'i tshul
34a6(rgyud): bsgreng bar bgyi// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di// rgya mtsho'i glong gi kha lta bur// rdo rje za ba nyid kyis gsungs// 'di ni las kun bgyid pa po// grub pa kun gyi bla na med// phyag rgya 'di ni mdzub mo'i mthe bong nyid/
34a7(rgyud): lcags sgrog lhag ma bskum nas pad+ma'i tshul// snying kha'i gnas su banag pa mgrin sngon gyi// 'di ni dogs med las kun phyag rgya lags// lag gnyis pad+ma'i khu tshur te// g.yas g.yon du ni banag nas su// su
34b1(rgyud): nas ni ba'i bzhin du gzhag/ byams pa'i mig gnyis bgyis pa'i// nal ni bcug cig phyag rgya ste// de bzhin kun gyis mi thub pa'o// mthe bong mnyam par mnyam bgyis la// so mo'i rtse mo bslabs pa dag/
34b2(rgyud): badzub mo gnyis ni pad+ma'i tshul// rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya las// phyag rgya 'di nyid dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i tshul du mdzub mo bskum// g.yon pa brkyang ba dbang chen gyi// phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'jom/
34b3(rgyud): lcags sgrog dam du bgyis nas ni// lag pa gnyis po brkyang nas kyang // snying khar bzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste// 'di ni rgyun du gshin rje lags// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// sor mo bsgreng ba'i thor to dgug
34b4(rgyud): g.yas pa snying khar bzhag nas su// mthe bong dang ni mthe'u chung dgug/ lhag ma rnams ni brkyang bgyis te// 'di ni chu lha'i phyag rgya ste// klu kun dgug pa'i mchog lags so// lag pa gnyis ni bsdams bgyis
34b5(rgyud): la/ sor mo bying ga log tu sbrel// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa dag/ snying kha'i gnas su bzhag bgyi ste// phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi// gnod sbyin thams cad skrag par bgyid// lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor yang //
34b6(rgyud): mthe bong mdzub mo dgug bgyid la// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// mdzub mo gyen du bsgreng ba ni// 'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad du ni las sgrub pa'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa yi//
34b7(rgyud): mthe'u chung ser mo dgug bgyis te// drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa'o// lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings la// blta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste// lha min thams cad 'dus/
35a1(rgyud): pa yi// khyab 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// g.yas pa bi dza pu ra bgyi// g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du bgyi// mthe bong mthe'u chung bsgrub pa ni// 'azung po thams cad skrag bgyid/
35a2(rgyud): pa/ 'di ni drag po'i phyag rgyar gsungs// g.yas pa khu tshur bcings nas su// mdzub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni// dkur brten khu tshur bcangs nas gzhag/ sor mo rnams ni brkyang bar bgyi// drag po rgyun du
35a3(rgyud): lha bgyid pa// de bzhin lha yi sde dpon gyi// gzhon nu phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// gyen du lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas// sor mo gsum ni brkyang bgyis te// mthe bong mdzub mo bkug pa ni// 'od zer srung
35a4(rgyud): dag 'phro bgyid pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid sor mo gsum// bkug nas sor mo gnyis gnyis brkyang // skar ma'i tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa// 'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs/
35a5(rgyud): gsang sngags chen po phyag rgya 'di dag ni// las dang don kun grub pa sgrub par bgyid// sdig pa thams cad spong zhing nyon mongs kun// nyams par bgyid cing sgrib pa thams cad 'byung // las kun zad par bgyid
35a6(rgyud): cing don yod pa'i// las sgrub don yod grub pa 'gyur bar 'gyur// oM pad+ma tA re tA ra ya pad+ma b+hu dze hUM/ oM ma hA pad+me shwe taM ge hu ru hu ru swA hA/ oM b+h+ri ku Ti pad+me ta ra ta ra hUM/ oM pad+me pAN+Da ra bA si ni kuN+Da kun+da swA hA/ oM a mo
35a7(rgyud): g+ha pad+ma ba ra de sid d+hi sid d+h+ya hu~M hUM/ oM sarba tra gA mi na A b+ha ya/ ro dra Ni hU~M/ oM a mo g+hA ni tA ra tA ra ya pad+me b+hu dze hU~M/ oM dA ru ta ru la pad+me a mo g+ha hUM/ oM ba Sha ba mu khe ni krin ta ya duSh+Tan hU~M/ oM pad+me nI la kaN+De shwa ra/ b+hu/
35b1(rgyud): rba b+hu ra d+hu/ a sa mya ba dgra sid shwA sa ma ya n+tu/ oM pad+me shwa ri sA d+ha ya d+hA/ oM a mo gre shwa ren+tu/ oM sa ma ri ta ra ta ts+tsha/ oM nA ga badz+rAn d+hA/ oM yak+Sha d+hU ba ti swa rba mra rba dz+nyA/ oM a mo g+ha prad+d+ha pe dz+nyA/ oM sha ba dem/
35b2(rgyud): mo b+ha b+hu dza d+hu/ oM a mo g+ha ban+d+ha rA dza bdA nA b+ha~M/ sa ra sa ra sa ma hA b+hu dzi swAhA/ o rung chu tsa ma la ma la swAH/ oM shak+Sha ti d+ha ri sa mo grwa ba ti swAhA/ oM sa ha su ka raN trA d+ha ti swAt+ma/ oM sa me pra b+hi d+d+ha/ de bzhin byu
35b3(rgyud): rgya gsang sngags gsungs pa yang // phyag rgya tha dad gsang sngags tha dad sgrub// gsang sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i las// rtag tu kun gyis mdoran thams cad bgyid// gtsangs spyod pa
35b4(rgyud): gtsang ma dag/ legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// dri zhim dri yis dpung pa dang // lag pa yan lag byugs nas su// phyag rgya lan re bcings pa na// gsang sngags lan re bzlas par bgyi/
35b5(rgyud): phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa dang // gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mod la ni// brgya stong phrag ni 'bum phrag 'bum// phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa bgyis pa na bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan
35b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lung bstan pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams kyi
35b7(rgyud): mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba dang dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// tsho dpag
36a1(rgyud): tum mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod ba'i rig sngags grub par 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros pag tshab ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ khro gros phogs pa pa
36a2(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dgra dang / bas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang /
36a3(rgyud): gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro// rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / bgegs dang / log
36a4(rgyud): 'dren dang / lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa chen po thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams
36a5(rgyud): cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// thams cad du bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur/
36a6(rgyud): ro// skyon gyi dri ma dang / ser sna dang / pra dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// legs par dran zhing lus shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
36a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig ce
36b1(rgyud): shin tu ngan pa nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro// ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas pa'i yang ma du zla ba ma/
36b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// skye ba na rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// thams cad du pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'ja
36b3(rgyud): rten dbang phyug sprul pa yi// phyag rgya'i rtags ni rjod par bgyid// khru gang kho na'i tshad dag gi/ dkyil 'khor lham gyis bri bar bgyi// gang zhig mthong ba'i mod tsam gyis// dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur// sdig
36b4(rgyud): pa kun las grol ba dang // de nyid dag ni 'grub 'gyur ro// rgyun du gang gi go cha yis// rtag tu go cha bgos par 'gyur// go cha'i go ni 'bar ba dang // mdzes pa rtag tu stsol bar 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo legs grub
36b5(rgyud): ste/ gsang sngags bla med thams cad 'grub// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyis// gnod sbyin srin po 'byer bar 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis gdon kun kyang // 'jig par 'gyur te som nyi med// gan/
36b6(rgyud): ba kun las grol 'gyur te// nad kun las kyang de bzhin no// pha rol dpung ngam rang dpung ngam// mi thub pa yi dgra kun las// rtag tu legs par rgyal bar 'gyur// rtag tu gdon las srung ba dang // dus kun tu
36b7(rgyud): yang 'grub par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang rnams bde bgyi'i phyir// de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag/ dgos pa kun gyi rjes pa/
37a1(rgyud): / par/ gang dang gang du bkod pa dag/ de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// pad+ma kha bye zhes bgyi ba// pad+ma 'dab mas mdzes pa dang // kun nas 'khor bar 'bar ba'i 'breg// rnam par rtog pa med
37a2(rgyud): par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di kun srog las byung // 'di nas thams cad 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje rtse gsum rdo rje'i mda'// dkyil 'khor pad+ma rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i 'phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan// pad+ma rab gnas pad+ma gnyis/
37a3(rgyud): rtag tu pad+ma legs par bgyid// pad+ma'i khu tshur de bzhin du// pad+ma'i mdzub mo pad+ma bgyis// pad+ma'i lcags kyus thal mo sbyar// pad+ma'i lcags sgrog pad+ma'i gzeg// rtag tu pad+ma sems pa dang // nor bu pad+ma/
37a4(rgyud): rdo rjer gsungs// don yod pad+ma de bzhin du// pad+ma'i ral gri pad+ma'i dril// rtse gsum zhes bgyi gtun shing 'chang // nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug/ de bzhin zhags pa gtun shing dang // chu srin 'dzin dung /
37a5(rgyud): 'khor lo byed// bi dza pU ra rtag tu se'u 'bru// zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang // tho ba 'dzin dang tshems shing dang // me tog pur ma bgrang 'breng dang // rdo rje rtse lnga don yod zhags// don yod grub pa de dag ste/
37a6(rgyud): thams cad pad+ma'i steng du dgod// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba// gang dang gang du dgod pa ni// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham// 'di dag kyang ni bri bar bgyi// kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi// nor bu'i rgyan gyis/
37a7(rgyud): grub par bgyi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni// ra ba'am rtsig par bgyis pa'am// ci yang rung ba de dag ste// de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sam// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni// rtag tu sdig pa thams cad
37b1(rgyud): spong // mnar med gnas su gtogs pa dang // mtshams med pa lnga nyid de// thams cad skad cig tsam gyis 'byung // sems can dag pa dran bgyid na/ phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur/ sems dpa' sa/
37b2(rgyud): bcu rab tu gnas// 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas// gang lags dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog sbyin no// rgyun du spyi bo lag na thogs// gang gis phyag rgya 'di bathong ga rgyun
37b3(rgyud): du mchog sbyin 'jig rten dbang // rtag tu mngon sum mthong ba yi// de dang mtshungs te khyad par 'bagos// gsang sngags sum cu rtsa lnga'i chog/ rtag tu dran bgyid thams cad 'grub// de ni dus rnams kun tu
37b4(rgyud): yang / khan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam grol dkyil 'khor rab myur bar// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'od dpag med kyi sras po yi// thu bor 'gyur bar som nyi med// 'jig rten mgon gyi thug
37b5(rgyud): zhal nas// skyes sras rtag tu thu bor 'gyur// 'dren pas 'di ni chos nyid deng // chos las skyes par lung ston 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
37b6(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi sug pa
37b7(rgyud): phyag rgyangad nga gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur ma phyag rgya 'di las 'di lta bu'i pan yon mang zhing che ba mchis par bsgrags so// de la gsang sngags ni/ oM a mo g+ha ma dza'i mal ma la sal smros/
38a1(rgyud): a shA sa yak+Sha Na bi ga te hUM/ oM a b+ha ya ba ra de Ni hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+hi ra d+ha ra hUM/ oM badz+ra hr-i da la muSh+TaM hUM/ oM bi sa ra bi sa ra sar+b+ba m+b+ha lpAn tAd+hA dza ya hUM/ oM badz+ran+tu/
38a2(rgyud): hu ru hu ru hUM/ oM aM ku sha A mo g+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ oM ka ba tsa ya tu ru tu ru hU~M/ oM a mo g+ha shaM ka li mi laM hUM/ oM a mo g+he tsin tA ma Ni tu tit+tA ri hUM/ oM a mo g+ha ma Ni tsi li tsi la~M hUM/ oM badz+ra tu Ti tsi li hUM/ a~M/
38a3(rgyud): a mo g+ha hr-i da ya tsa ra tsa ra shud+d+ha satwa hUM/ oM g+ho Sha bo ti tsi To tsi Ti hUM/ oM bid+yA khadag tsin tA ya sha trun hUM/ oM tr-i ma la pa ri shud+d+he b+hi Ta~M b+ho Ta hU~M/ oM su ru su ru hU~M/ oM ma Ni ma Ni hUM/ oM puMSh+Ta ba ti dza ye hUM/ oM bi d+ha
38a4(rgyud): tsitu pA sha d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ oM pad+ma pA sha bi shud d+he hUM/ oM badz+re pA she b+ha ba tu mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM tsin+ta ma Na pA sha ba ra de hUM/ oM tsakra pA sha sra nir g+hA ta ka d+hu ru d+hu ru hU~M/ oM tri shu lI pA sha bi lo ka tA ra ya hU~M/ oM nA ga bA
38a5(rgyud): sha ban d+ha ya kar+N+Na ya duSh+TA nA ga na pA sha prA ta ya hU~M/ oM dza lod b+ha ba d+ha rA ya hUM/ oM tsan+d+ra bi ma le bi sho d+ha ya an d+ha kA ra rashrI ba re hUM/ oM shrI bo d+ha ya hUM/ oM bi dza ya pUr+Na ba re hUM/ oM pha lod b+ha be tu ro hUM/ oM pUr+d+ha
38a6(rgyud): maN+Da le dza ya hUM/ oM sa ha sra ra sh+mi ki ra Na hUM/ oM sarba duSh+TAn pra ha ra shA sA ya hUM/ oM ma Na bi sho d+ha ya mA yA bi ma le hUM/ oM puSh+pa ba ta su g+ha d+ha ba re hUM/ oM pA sha sa ha sra gu Ni ti k+Sha Nak+Sha Na hUM/ oM badz+rod k+She pa su tsi/
38a7(rgyud): mu Sha tsi Ti tsi TaM hU~M/ oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta pA sha ha ste hU~M/ oM sarba tra a mo g+ha sid+d+had+d+h+ya sid+d+ha sA d+ha ya hUM/ lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang // de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya dag/ lan gcig bzlas pa tsam dang
38b1(rgyud): ni phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas kyang // sdig pa thams cad mod la 'joms// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo myur du 'grub// don yod zhags pa rnam grol ba'i// dkyil 'khor dpa pa
38b2(rgyud): 'phrul bar 'gyur// de la mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ni nor bu rin po che dang / me tog dang / pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / nor bu'i 'breng ba dang / bgrang 'phreng dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyug to dang /
38b3(rgyud): mdung thung dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / mtshon shag tri dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum pa gnyis dang / nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / mtshon shu li dang / las kyi rdo rje dang /
38b4(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu dang / mtshon cha dang / be con dang / dbyug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / sbrul dang / ljon shing dang / byu ru dang / dgra sta dang /
38b5(rgyud): 'khor lo dang / dgra sta yu ba sbom po can dang / lag pa dang / gtsug phud dang / nor bu sgron ma dang / 'od dang / 'od zer dang / gtun shing dang / 'phyang mo nyug pa dang / dgra sta dang / snod zlum po dang /
38b6(rgyud): bum pa dang / brag dang / ri dang / lhun po dang / sbrul 'khyil ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
38b7(rgyud): rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rtse gsum dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ral gri dang / gri dang / pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang / rtse gsum dang / mu sun di dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi dang / mche ba bzhi dang / zlum
39a1(rgyud): po dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / nor bu'i dung dang / pad+ma'i dung dang / urda dang / gos dang / seng ge'i gdong dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la bing ka dang /
39a2(rgyud): dang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang / gdong bzhi pa dang / dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rtse gsum dang / bum pa gang ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba'i/
39a3(rgyud): 'od dang / pad+ma bzhi dang / pad+ma gsum dang / rgya mtsho dang / me tog dang / phur ma dang / glegs bam dang / ri dgas kyi g.yang gzhi dang / rdo rje dang / lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje lcag sgrog dang / rta babs dang / lhung
39a4(rgyud): bzed dang / chos gos dang / 'khar gsil dang / so mangs dang / kha khyer dang / ska rags dang / gtsug pud dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / 'phreng ba chen po dang / gru gsum dang / kun nas rdo rje sde dang / phyag
39a5(rgyud): rgya mtshon cha 'di dag ni// 'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa bzhin// rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di// don yod zhags pa'i cho gar dran// ras sam gos sam rtsig pa 'am// ci yang rung bar 'dri bgyid/
39a6(rgyud): ba/ dogs med legs gsal legs 'byor pas// tshon gsal kun tu pad+mar gzhag/ phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bar bgyi// thams cad srog las byung bas ni// don dang las rnams kun stsol cing // phyag rgya mod
39a7(rgyud): la sdig pa 'phrog/ de ni mod la 'bras bu ster// 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun// phyag rgya 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// sangs rgyas kun dang shAkya yi// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlabs// de lta
39b1(rgyud): bas na mkhas pas su/ rtag tu kun nas mtshon bcangs na/ sangs rgyas rnams ni dbyes 'gyur te// sras kyi thu bor so mnyi med// phyag rgya ma byed dam pa 'chang ba gang // 'jig rten mgon pa'i sras kyi bu
39b2(rgyud): por 'gyur// don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba yi// rnam par grol ba'i snying po bla na med// phyag rgya dang ni gsang sngags dam pa dag/ 'di 'chang ba la myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas don yod pa las
39b3(rgyud): thams cad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i zhags pa bdun bshad par bgyi ste// de nyid 'grub pas ji lta bu'i// cho ga'i cho ga sgrub pa bzhin// so so so sor 'tsham pa yi// de dag kun ni rtogs par bgyi// de nyid grub pas
39b4(rgyud): ji lta bu'i// mtshan nyid gzugs ni ji bzhin pa// de nyid bsgrubs pas zhags pa ni// skud pa lnga las 'grub 'gyur te// gsang sngags 'dzin pas mod la ni// 'grub par 'gyur te som nyi med// ras skud pad+ma
39b5(rgyud): skud pa dang // arga kha che dar dag gi/ skud pa shun pa'i skud pa ste// skud pa 'di dag bkal nas de na nyid kyi cho ga dang // cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas zhags pas ras skud kyi rgyu las langs te/ tshad bzhin bkal nas
39b6(rgyud): rtag tu smyung ba bgyis la legs par bkrus pa gos gtsang ma can tshangs par spyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mdor na byams pa'i
39b7(rgyud): sems dang ldan pas dran par bgyi'o// de nas shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas brgyad sgril du bkal te/ don yod rgyal po thal mo sbyar bas pad+ma kha phye ba thogs pa/ ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis bzhugs pa/
40a1(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lus phyed pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o// bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa gsum du bgyis te/ nges pa'i gzugs dang / khro gnyer gyi bzhin/
40a2(rgyud): dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/ dngul lam gser las bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa srid kyi tshad khru bcu drug pa zhags pa'i thor to gcig rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / skyu ru ra lhan cig sbrel ba gdag
40a3(rgyud): par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga 'am// tshes brgyad la legs par bkrus te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas zhag gcig mchi te skyil mo krung bcas nas/ sangs rgyas
40a4(rgyud): la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ tshig gzhan mi smra bar zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / stan bzang po bshams nas de'i steng du zhags pa gzhag
40a5(rgyud): par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ba dan bzang po la sogs pas mchod par bgyi'o//
40a6(rgyud): a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mar me'ang dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yudra kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa'i steng du
40a7(rgyud): gtor bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la'ang ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te/
40b1(rgyud): ma 'khrugs pas gdugs rtse ba'i bar du mchod pa bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod re re bgyis te zhags pa'i steng du gtor zhing / stong rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du gdugs re re
40b2(rgyud): mchis par bgyi steg rjo tso thogs pas gdugs rtse'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchod par bgyi'o// kha zas ngan pa spang bar bgyi'o// lhag ma dang sbags pa spang bar bgyi'o// gos gtsang ma bgo bar
40b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhag pa 'bar bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i grub na ni me'i kha dog tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grub na ni kha dog sna tshog 'bar bar 'gyur ro//
40b4(rgyud): don yod pa'i lus de'ang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zhags pa 'di grub kyis// khyod
40b5(rgyud): kyis byang chub kyi sems bla na med pa khug cig/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i khongs su gtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig/ 'on te 'jig rten pa'i sgrub na ni yid bzhin gyi nor
40b6(rgyud): bus bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsams shing smon pa bzhin lag pas 'phangs na gsang sngags kyis thams cad sgrub par bgyid de/ thams cad bkug
40b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// phyogs gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de logs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyis te/ mod la bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa
41a1(rgyud): lnga bgyis pa 'am/ mnar med par mchi ba zhig na'ang de'i legs par 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o// khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na/
41a2(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchi bar
41a3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'o bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur ro//
41a4(rgyud): gang gi don du zhags pa 'phags pa'i don de 'grub par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod
41a5(rgyud): la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa'i sems can thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshal na lo 'am/ lo brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhags pas
41a6(rgyud): bcings par 'gyur ro// nam byams pa dang snying rje bskyed nas de'i tshe don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na phyir bkrol bar 'gyur ro// dpung gi nang du 'phangs na dpung rnams zhags pas bcings
41a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su 'phangs na mtshon dang / go mtshon dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / mu sun di dang / 'khor lo dang / thag mdung dang / mtshon cha
41b1(rgyud): thams cad dang / go cha dang / ya lad thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// chab dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa la gdugs gcig
41b2(rgyud): babazhin ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// gang gi don du bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / 'on te mi snang ba sgrub par 'tshal na/
41b3(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pas gong du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pa bzung nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mi
41b4(rgyud): gda' bar 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag
41b5(rgyud): 'bum gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lo bye ba bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang brtson 'grus pha rol gyis zil gyis mi non pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// char pa
41b6(rgyud): 'tshal bas mchod pa bgyis na ji tsam gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches pa dgag pa'i slad du mchod pa bgyis na char pa bkag par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang /
41b7(rgyud): 'tsho ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas/ rig sngags 'chang legs par khrus bgyis pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ lag pas zhags pa blangs te/
42a1(rgyud): gnas mthon por 'dzegs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang zhags pa bcings te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas zhags pa
42a2(rgyud): 'phangs na de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar
42a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas chen po dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba dang / dus ma lags
42a4(rgyud): pa'i char dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya stong khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcings pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar yid la
42a5(rgyud): bsams pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas/ don yod rgyal po mchod par bgyi zhing bzlas brjod bgyi/ gsol bar yang bgyi'o// mchod pa dang gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad phun sum
42a6(rgyud): tshogs par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin las bgyid pa rnams kyi cho ga de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas skad cig de'i mod la
42a7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
42b1(rgyud): phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// dkon mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang / bla mar yid la bsgom par bgyi'o// mi gtsang ba spyod pa gtsang bar bgyi zhing yod
42b2(rgyud): su dag pa'i ngang tshul can du bsgom par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu byang chub dgug par bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga sgrub pa bshad par
42b3(rgyud): bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang de kho na nyid sgrub pas phug tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog phug tu 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / dri za'i/
42b4(rgyud): gnas su 'jug pa dang / lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'jug
42b5(rgyud): ba dang / thang la rgyu ba dang / nyi ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / skar ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / rgyu skar gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang / ri la rgyu ba dang /
42b6(rgyud): 'bab chu chen por 'jug pa ste/ ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga sgrub pa tshogs chung ngu dang / brtsal ba chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur te/
42b7(rgyud): de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal la/ gtsang ma de kho na nyid la gus pas/
43a1(rgyud): #sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// byams pa'i sems la mnyam par banag nas snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i yid kyis chos bcu gsum nas brtsams te/ rma ba nya pa'i ba/
43a2(rgyud): du gsal ba shin tu bkra shis pa la dus gsum du ci 'byor pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyis la/ rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa yi// dus gsum rgyun du bzlas brjod bgyi// nyin par dus gsum lan ga/
43a3(rgyud): ste/ mtshan mo'i dus su lan gsum bgyi// 'khor lo zhags pa bla med 'di// skud pa gsum las bsgrub bgyi ste// ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang // arga'i skud pa sum 'gyur du// de ni legs par tshad bzhin du/
43a4(rgyud): khru ni sum cu rtsa drug bgyi// 'khor lo rnam pa las ni bgyi// rgyar ni sor bzhi'i tshad lags te// snying por bcas shing mu khyud bcas// kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dang // gser dang dngul dang zangs las bgyi// chos
43a5(rgyud): stan legs par brgyan pa yi// bzang po'i stan la gzhag par bgyi// spos kyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi/ sil ma bkram nas bum pa dgod// de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham// ri mo'i gzugs kyi
43a6(rgyud): mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste chos kyi stan bsham par bgyis pa'i steng du 'khor lo'i zhags pa bzhag ste mchod pa bgyis la/ bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
43a7(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas chos bco lnga'i zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyi zhing / bdug pa rnam
43b1(rgyud): pa gsum po a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun na chos kyi spyan mchis pa la mngon du phyogs te mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying ban
43b2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar zhing 'khor lo nam mkha' la mchis nas
43b3(rgyud): 'bar zhing lding bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi lus kyi snod dang spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ri mo'i gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
43b4(rgyud): 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhagra ba'i snying po'i 'khor lo zhags pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di grub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa chen po bgyis la/ don yod khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong
43b5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blang bar bgyi'o// lag pa g.yon pa 'khor lol phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing / g.yas bzhags pa'i phyag rgya dang 'pho/
43b6(rgyud): lo'i tshul la brten nas blangs te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brjod nas phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas phyogs bcu khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid
43b7(rgyud): kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun du bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas phyag rgya'i tshul du bskor ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dam pa chen po 'grub par
44a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa spyi bos blangs nas 'di skad ces kyang smra bar 'gyur/
44a2(rgyud): te/ rig sngags 'chang gis ci bka' stsal pa de bgyi'o zhes ci bsgo ba'i don de dang de thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran gyi rang bzhin gyis thams cad du las bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gang
44a3(rgyud): gi tshe gnas su 'jug par 'tshal bas/ 'di ltar nub gsum du mchis par gyur pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas blang bar bgyi'o// phug gi sgo gang lags pa der zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o//
44a4(rgyud): don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o// zhags pa btab pa tsam gyi mod la gnas kyi phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / phug dang / 'bab
44a5(rgyud): chu chen po dang / brtsegs ma dang / 'bab chu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lam mi bde ba thams cad bsal ba dang / bcom pa dang kha shig par 'gyur ro// gtan pa dang / sgo glegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang /
44a6(rgyud): lcags sgrog rnams dum bu dum bur chad cing gyes par 'gyur/ nyams par 'gyur/ 'jig par 'gyur ro// shin tu dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu rgya che ba'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa rnam par 'phrul pa
44a7(rgyud): dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkra ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// me tog sna tshogs kyi rab shi/
44b1(rgyud): tu dri zhim pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul mngon sum du bgyis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par
44b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa tsam kho nas gnas mchog de'ang rnam pa drug tu 'gul ba dang / g.yo ba dang / ldeg pa dang / khur 'ur chem chem ste/ lnga'i 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos snang bar 'gyur
44b3(rgyud): ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas don yod pa rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i sman bud med kyi gzugs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lha'i gos kyi rgyan gyis klubs pa/ kha dog bzang
44b4(rgyud): bo rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ lha'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba bi dza pu ra thogs pa mchi bar 'gyur ro// sman bud med kyi gzugs 'chang ba de mthong ba tsam kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam nas gzi brjid thams cad
44b5(rgyud): dang / stobs thams cad nye bar sgrub par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa mdun du bcing bar bgyi ste/ mthong ba tsam gyi mong la de'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang /
44b6(rgyud): gzi brjid nyams par 'gyur ro// mthu chung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bud med dgod pa dang / oM zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pa bgyi ste/ kha sbub tu 'gyel nas chab 'byung bar 'gyur te/
44b7(rgyud): chab de la reg par mi bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/ de nas mig tshugs kyis lta bar bgyid na rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas gzhu bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab 'byung ste/ blang ba
45a1(rgyud): bgyid byug par bgyi'o// kun tu byugs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te/ thog mar rlung gi phung po nas 'dzeg par 'gyur ro// mig la byugs nas phyogs bcu thams cad
45a2(rgyud): du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhal med khang dang / gnas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / gang dag bzhugs
45a3(rgyud): shing gzhes la 'tsho ba dag ji ltar lag mthil na mchis pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gang dag 'das pa dang / gang dag ma byon pa dang / gang dag da ltar byung ba dang /
45a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa rnams dang / gang dag ring bsrel snying po'i mchod rten chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang / de bzhin du ji ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// bdag
45a5(rgyud): nyid la kun nas byug te/ des byugs pa tsam gyis pags pa'i mdog lha'i gser dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// skra sngo la cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// mig lha'i ut+pal sngon po mchog 'dra bar 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i
45a6(rgyud): bskal pa brgya stong du 'gyur ro// rag sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'bum phrag brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo brgya ba ni bcu dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / rig sngags
45a7(rgyud): 'chang gi bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang / yid la brnags pa tsam gyis lha'i zas kyi mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun du
45b1(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i btung ba chen po bdud rtsi'i ro bro ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong mdun nas rgyug par bgyid do// dgra/
45b2(rgyud): thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad bcom pa dang / nyams pa dang / gtubs pa dang / gshegs pa dang / brtsal ba dang / gyes pa dang / phye mar bgyis par 'gyur ro// yang na sman gyi bung pod
45b3(rgyud): de'i sgra kun bton te ska rags su bgyis nas bcing bar bgyi'o// gang du bcings pa de'ang rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro// gang du zhugs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad gnas 'chab ba/
45b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// klu thams cad dang / lha ma yin thams cad dang / mi 'am ci thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad de'i dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// 'khor de thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi
45b5(rgyud): bar du de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal zhing / slar yang ldog par 'tshal na sman gyi bud med de dang gtam mi bgyi/ reg par mi bgyi bar lag pa
45b6(rgyud): zhags pa'i phyag rgyas gnas mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas gnas thams cad na gnas pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad phyir byung nas mdun na sdod par 'gyur te/ kha cig
45b7(rgyud): gi lag na ni bum pa gang ba'o// kha cig gi lag na gdugs so// kha cig gi lag na ni lha'i gos thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i nor bu rin po che thogs so// kha cig ni dri dag go// kha cig ni me tog dag go/ kha cig
46a1(rgyud): ni 'phreng ba dag go/ kha cig ni rgyan dang lbab lbub sna tshogs thogs so// kha cig ni byug pa dag go/ kha cig ni dri'i phye ma dag go// kha cig ni spos chu'i rin po che sna bdun gyi snod bkang ba/
46a2(rgyud): dag go// kha cig ni lha'i 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dag go/ kha cig ni lha'i me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu/
46a3(rgyud): sha chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / bar shi ka dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / sna ma dang / yu ti ka dang / klu'i mi/
46a4(rgyud): tog dang / kon ta dang / g+han d+ha bar shi ka'i me tog dag thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i tsan dan go shI ra sha dang / sbrul gyi snying po'i bdug pa dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i bdug pa thogs so//
46a5(rgyud): kha cig gi lag pa na ni rma bya'i bsil yab thogs so// kha cig gi lag pa na ni ral gri'o// kha cig gi lag pa na ni mdung thung ngo // kha cig gi lag pa na ni rdo rje dang / dgra s+t+wa dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung dang /
46a6(rgyud): gtun shing dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / gzong kha gnyis pa dag go// kha cig ni go cha dang ya lang bgos nas srung ba'i phyir kun nas 'dra zhing mchi bar 'gyur ro// kha cig ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod dang / gser
46a7(rgyud): gyi snod dang / dngul gyi snod dag thogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis bkang nas thogs te/ de dag thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do//
46b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis byams pa dang snying rje chen po yid la bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba yid la bgyig/
46b2(rgyud): mchog tu brtse ba yid la bgyid pas bag yod pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar dbugs dbyung bar bgyi zhing lam drang po nas 'jug par bgyi ste/ seng ge'i khri la mngon du mchis nas don yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa
46b3(rgyud): thog mar seng ge'i khri'i steng du gnag par bgyi'o// / 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bzhi pa/ de'i 'og tu rig sngag
46b4(rgyud): 'chang rang nyid mchis steng du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bgyi zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa la'ang phyag bgyi'o// des dgra thams cad pham par
46b5(rgyud): bgyis par 'gyur ro// gal te 'og tu phyogs nas phyag bgyis na/ de nas 'khor los rig sngags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba rnams mgo bcad par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang mchis ma thag tu gnas rnam pa drug
46b6(rgyud): tu g.yos nas sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ca co'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i rol mo'i cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag 'bud par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang gzhal med khang chen
46b7(rgyud): bo nas dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la dbang bskur bar bgyid do// dbang bskur ba tsam gyi mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gser gyi char dang gos kyi char 'bab
47a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / lha'i me tog bkra ba sna tshogs kyi char dang / lha'i rgyan gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu mos rin po che sna bdun/
47a2(rgyud): gyi snod du bdud rtsi'i bcud 'tshal te mchis nas dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis reg par bgyi'o//
47a3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lha'i lus rnam par dag pa thob nas pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sgra lhag par sngo ba dang / mig ut+pa la sngon po ltar lha'i mig yongs su dag par
47a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du 'gyur ro// gal te phyir mi ldog par 'tshal na de'i bcud kyis len mchog las ji tsam 'tshal ba blangs te/ lha'i cha ba tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i nang du
47a5(rgyud): zhugs nas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la phug gi sgo rang 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / ji ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong na ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas kyi gtso bo gcig pur
47a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du rig sngags 'chang 'di'ang mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mas bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// gang du bcud kyis len mchog 'dis reg
47a7(rgyud): na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// rtsig pa 'am/ ri'am/ ka ba 'am/ ljon shing ngam/ snod dam/ bum pa 'am/ rdza bo'am/ gos sam/ bong ba la reg na de dag thams cad 'dzam bu'i rtsa
47b1(rgyud): bo'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ba nas/ dgos pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang klu mo 'am/ lha mo 'am/ mi 'am ci mo 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang de gos gtsang ma bgos nas legs
47b2(rgyud): par khrus bgyi'o// chos brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig gnas par bgyi'o// 'khor lo'i zhag
47b3(rgyud): pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa'i stan bzang po'i steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing mchod pa chen po bgyi ste/ de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar re re nas
47b4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis pa zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang zhags pa de'ang sbrul bzhin du yongs su 'khyil la 'khor lo'i gdengs ka'i tshul du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas
47b5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa blangs te klu gnas pa'i mtsho'am/ mi 'am ci gnas pa'i mtsho'am/ lha mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'gram du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te/ gnas kyi nang du
47b6(rgyud): zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs ma thag kho nar slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/ ji lta bu'i don yid la bsams pa'i don de zhags pas bcings nas ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du bgyi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang /
47b7(rgyud): ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i nor ram/ dbyig gam/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUR+Ya'am/ shang ka shi la 'am/ byu ru 'am/ sa le sbram mam/ dngul lam/ gos sam/ chas sam/ rgyan nam/ gzhan yang
48a1(rgyud): gzhal med khang ji lta bur 'byor pa can dag don du gnyer na zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi ste/ de thams cad 'dren par bgyid do// gang dang gang du 'bangs pa de dang der ji ltar yid la bsams/
48a2(rgyud): pa de nyid shin tu gsal bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ rje'u rigs kyi ci dang
48a3(rgyud): ci bsams pa 'grub par bgyid do// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i ming nas brjod de zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pas bcings nas 'dren par 'gyur ro// tha na ri dgas dang / bya dang
48a4(rgyud): seng ge dang / stag dang / glang po che dang / ma he'ang 'dren par bgyid do// gang gi ming nas brjod de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'phangs na/ de'ang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa
48a5(rgyud): de bzhin du thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdun du mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mngon sum du zhag pa'ang/
48a6(rgyud): nas slar yang drang bar bgyi ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma zhags pas bcings nas drangs par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin dgos pa
48a7(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par bgyid do// 'on te zla ba dang nyi ma'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lag pas blangs te don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas pa dang / rig sngags 'chang nam mkha'al
48b1(rgyud): 'bur nas nyi ma dang zla ba'i sman la ji srid du 'tshal bar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing / slar bde ba dang / ma snad pa dang / ma smas pa dang / legs par 'grub par 'gyur ro// nags khung du 'jug par 'tshal na gtsang ba len/
48b2(rgyud): bar khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bge bar bgyi zhing / nags khung gi sgor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// lag pas zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyis nags khung gi
48b3(rgyud): gnas kyi gzhal med khang gi klu thams cad bcings nas thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang la phyag bgyis nas/ rig sngags 'chang khyod gnas chen po
48b4(rgyud): mchog tu zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas te/ lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o// zhugs pa tsam lo
48b5(rgyud): nas nags kyi gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / dbus kyi nags kyi mtha' na rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing lha'i chab dngas shing rnyog pa ma mchis pa/ shin tu gsal ba/ lha'i tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa/
48b6(rgyud): cang mi grang ga ha cang mi drog reg na bde ba/ ro dang ldan pa/ bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te/ 'di ltar don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rdzing gi dbus su
48b7(rgyud): zhags pa 'bang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bud med rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo'i lus phyed byung nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan cing / rin po sna bdun gyi bum pa
49a1(rgyud): gang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la dbul zhing spyi bo smad de 'dzem pa dang bcas pas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rje btsun rig sngags 'chang khyod ma bzhengs par gnas su zhug/
49a2(rgyud): shig/ rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i tshig gsum brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi don dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub grub ste/ bdag nyid kyi ma dang / sring mo dang /
49a3(rgyud): mngag gzhug ma zhes gar bde bar brjod la/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste/ sring mo kho bo la 'jig rten pha rol gyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o// de yang rig sngags 'chang khyod rang gi
49a4(rgyud): gnas su snoms te zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bgyi zhing / don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas so// de nas gnas chen po mchog rin poche
49a5(rgyud): sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang lha'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / gser dang / gos sbyangs pa/ dar gyi chun 'phyang rab tu sbyangs pa gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu rin po che chen po thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang 'jig rten pa
49a6(rgyud): rol gyi don du rin po che chen po bzhes shig ces dbul bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis stan bshams pa'i steng du zhags pa legs par yongs su bskyil te/ stan du bting la nor bu rin po che chen po de nas
49a7(rgyud): pa'i steng du bzhag cing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o// bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas te 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che chen po de
49b1(rgyud): las yang 'o ma'i cha ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i chab de las blangs la sbyor chu lan bdun du reg par bgyi'o// 'o ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral
49b2(rgyud): zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// don yod snang ba nor bu gzhal med kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dra ba 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi la mthong
49b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma lta bus rnam par 'phrul pa thob par 'gyur zhing / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa
49b4(rgyud): cha lugs 'chang ba rig sngagaso 'chang gi mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag ste/ nga'i rig sngags 'chang gi bu thu bo khyod kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi sku yongasu dag pa
49b5(rgyud): 'thob bo zhes dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// khyod
49b6(rgyud): ni byang chub lam du zhugs// khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob ste// grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba bsgrubs// 'on te rig sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyer na/ de'i tshe gser gyi me tog stsol bar 'gyur te/ blangs/
49b7(rgyud): la bu mo de nyid kyi spyi bor bzhag nas/ oM zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o// oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra brjod nas spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la bu mo de'i mig mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro//
50a1(rgyud): nas rig sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg bgyi'o// nye reg bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil cing lag pa na
50a2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i zhags pa thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bye ba 'bum phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo drug khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing skye ba bdun stong rjes su
50a3(rgyud): dran par 'gyur ro// 'on te gsang sngags 'chang 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga slong na/ de'i tshe 'di lta bur 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi skra 'di sdoms shig ces de'i tshe bud med des rang gi skra'i
50a4(rgyud): ral pa bton nas rig sngags 'chang la 'bul ba na/ sgra thams cad blangs te dum bu gsum du bkum nas srad bu la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi ste/ mgo la btags pas ni/ ji ltar yid la
50a5(rgyud): bsams pa de bzhin du mig 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// bden pa ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro// mgul du btags pas ni mi gda' bar gyur
50a6(rgyud): nas/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpral ba la btags pas ni lha dang klu thams cad dbang
50a7(rgyud): du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/ phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyi 'kho/
50b1(rgyud): los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// dpung ba g.yon pa la btags pas ni rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing bdag/
50b2(rgyud): gi nor du 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / grong khyer dang / yul
50b3(rgyud): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa bya dang / gcan
50b4(rgyud): gzan dang / ri dgas dang / gdug pa dang / gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// brla g.yas pa la btags pas ni tshal lam/ ser ga 'am/ ri khor 'am/
50b5(rgyud): phug gam/ dgon pa 'am/ bsti gnas gang du zhugs te/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la nor thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / lha thams cad rang gi gzugs su mngon nas mchis par 'gyur ro// byin pa
50b6(rgyud): g.yas pa dang rkang pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang rgal bar 'gyur na/ chu klung chen po'i chab kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lha smos kyang ci 'tshal/ byin pa g.yon pa la btags
50b7(rgyud): pas ni nyi ma re re zhing dpag tshad brgyar phyin nas dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// brla g.yon pa la btags nas dur khrod chen por zhugs na dur khrod thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams cad
51a1(rgyud): dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na rig sngags 'chang des lag pa g.yon pas bum pa gang ba bzung zhing / lag pa g.yas pas bud med/
51a2(rgyud): bzung nas gnas chen po'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// gnas mchog de'i dbus na rdzing me tog gis chal par bkram pa bgyi ste/ rdzing der gnyis ka khrus bgyi zhing chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o// bkrus shing reg pa tsam
51a3(rgyud): kho nas 'khor lo rig sngags 'chang zhags pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdun stong gis yongs su bskor cing tshe bskal pa khrir 'gyur ro// skra cung zad
51a4(rgyud): 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dpon po rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal te ma zhes bgyi bas don du gnyer ba ni bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// 'bras
51a5(rgyud): dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / chas dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su grub par bgyid do// sring mo zhes bgyi bas ni dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshang bar stobs par 'gyur zhing yan
51a6(rgyud): lag spong bar bgyid do// nyi ma re re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur/ lha'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid/ lha'i khyim dang gzhal med khang stobs par bgyid do//
51a7(rgyud): mngag gzhug ma zhes bgyi bas ni gang dang gang du mngags pa de dang der mchi bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas sam/ srin po'i gnas sam/ 'byung po'i gnas sam/ gzhan
51b1(rgyud): yang mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsams pa bzhin du bgyid do// nags sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rig sngags 'chang zang la rgyu bar 'tshal na gtsang ma khrus bgyis
51b2(rgyud): pas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi/ gnas dben pa gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis la dri sna tshogs kyis byug// ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor mo bshams la/ a ka ru'i bdug
51b3(rgyud): bas bsregs te/ nub gsum du mchis nas 'khor lo zhags pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgyas don yod rgyal po'i snying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi
51b4(rgyud): dbus nas du ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas skyes pa nag po chen po'i tshul mi sdug pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra gyen du 'greng ba/ mgo
51b5(rgyud): 'bar ba/ mig dmar ba/ mchu dang lce dmar ba/ sen mo dmar ba/ skra sngo ba/ dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa/ gsus pa 'phyangs po// mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ mgo lnga pa/ sbrul ltar lce bsgyur ba/ stag
51b6(rgyud): gi sham thabs bgos pa/ lag na dgra sta dang dril bu thogs pa zhig lus phyed tsam byung nas phyogs bcur lta bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi ste brtan par bgyi lo/ khro bo'i rgyal
51b7(rgyud): bo bzlas nas 'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phangs te mgo gcad la khrag mang du byung ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o// byugs pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid kyi lus mi chod
52a1(rgyud): pa dang mi shigs pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// mig gnyis phyung la rang gi mig phyis nas mig la bskus na lha'i mig tu 'gyur ro// rkang brus te byugs na tshe bskal/
52a2(rgyud): pa stong phrag bcur 'gyur zhing thos pa gsal ba'i rgya mtshor 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// snying phyung ste 'tshal na nam mkha' la mchi'o// khrag gis snying khar
52a3(rgyud): thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lce gcad na ral grir gyur nas dgra thams cad rlag par bgyid do// gal te thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe khro ba'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang 'khor lo la/
52a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'khor lo zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis thal mo sa la brdab par bgyi ste/ lan gsum du thal mo brdabs pa dang / de'i 'og tu thang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin
52a5(rgyud): du 'jug par bgyi ste/ zhugs nas slar yang mchi zhing dgos pa gzhan thams cad bgyid pa dang / thang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro// 'on te nam mkha' la mchi 'tshal na gyen
52a6(rgyud): du bltas nas don yong rgyal po'i snying po yungs mar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag nyid la byugs te/ lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing nam mal
52a7(rgyud): go 'byed par 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lha'i mgul nas bcing bar bgyi zhing / don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ lha bcings pa gang
52b1(rgyud): lags pa de'i ming nas brjod na/ lha de babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rig sngags 'chang la/ rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du
52b2(rgyud): gnyer ba de sdoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis lha'i gnas su 'gro'o zhes brjod par bgyi'o// gal te gzhan bsams pa zhig mchis na mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas lnga'i
52b3(rgyud): gnas nas mchi ba na lha'i gnas lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lag pa na thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tshal bar lha'i gzhal med khang chen por longs spyod par 'gyur zhing / 'on te mi 'tshal na lha'i gnas na
52b4(rgyud): slar yang 'bebs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji ltar rang gi blo gros dang yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad grub par 'gyur te/ de la som nye dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o//
52b5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rig sngags 'chang pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal bas/ rig sngags 'chang de gtsang ma legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o//
52b6(rgyud): nub gsum mchis sam/ nub lnga mchis sam/ nub gcig mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ ras kyi skud pa 'am pad+ma'i skud pa bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog lta bur tshon gyis kha bsgyu
52b7(rgyud): bar bgyi zhing / khru nyi shu rtsa gcig par bkal te/ de la'ang pad+ma bgyi ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma kha bye ba sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyis pad+ma gser gyi 'dab ma dang / dngul gyi 'dab ma dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / in+d+ra nI la dang /
53a1(rgyud): rin po che rka ti ka las bgyi zhing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyi ste/ de nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor to gcig la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya gdags par bgyi'o// de nas legs/
53a2(rgyud): par brgyan pa'i chos kyi snyan bzang po bsham par bgyi'o// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri'i pad+ma bsam par bgyi zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi steng du chos kyi gdan bshams la bum pa ga/
53a3(rgyud): bas brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyi snod kyang gzhag par bgyi'o// pad+ma'i zhags pa de'ang
53a4(rgyud): chos kyi stan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te/ bzlas
53a5(rgyud): pa'i yungs kar re re nas de'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan khri rdzogs nas de nas chos bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyi'o// zhags pa de'ang mchod
53a6(rgyud): par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin mtshan gsum dus gsum du bzlas
53a7(rgyud): brjod dang mchod pa bgyi'o// de nas pad+ma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
53b1(rgyud): byug gi lus la kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i skyil mo krung gis mchis nas mig mi 'dzum zhing bzhin 'dzum pas snying rje chen po yid la bsgom par bgyi/
53b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du bltas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan sum stong bzlas par bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang
53b3(rgyud): bzhin mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa brgyung ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang
53b4(rgyud): nga'i bu snying nas skyes pa'i thu bo bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po dang / mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi mchog dang grub pa'i mchog ste/ khyod kyis don yod rgyal
53b5(rgyud): bo'i snying po grub cing / khyod kyis pad+ma'i zhags pa chen po grub kyis/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du mchog khyer cig/ khyod kyi yid kyi brnag pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod 'khor ba'i 'jig
53b6(rgyud): pargyu ba las ni grol/ khyod skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las thar na/ khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu drug las ni yongs su grol/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i
53b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni yongs su thar/ 'di nas phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las shi 'phos te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig rten
54a1(rgyud): gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// khyod kyis gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i/
54a2(rgyud): rtsa ba cher bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ni ldan/ rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni byas/ khyod rig sngags 'chang chen por ni lung bstun/ dmyal ba dang sngon gyi las kyi sgrib
54a3(rgyud): ba mi bzad pa thams cad las ni grol gyis/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog khyer cig/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rig
54a4(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis pad+ma'i zhags pa de blangs te/ gnas gtsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// nam dgos pa de'i tshe zhags pa blang bar bgyi ste/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// pad+ma ni 'phags
54a5(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa g.yon par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa bzung ste/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ sems can nam lha gang gi ming nas brjod
54a6(rgyud): de bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad chang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mchis nas 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang byang chub tu lung bstan pa don du gnyer bar 'tshal na/
54a7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas/ pad+ma'i zhag
54b1(rgyud): pa de'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor to ya gcig gis ni rang gi mgul du btags la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan skyong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
54b2(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor phyag bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ lung ston
54b3(rgyud): bar mdzad/ yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang sdig pa tshe rabs brgya stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs par gyur/ lhag ma ma lus par gtugs par gyur
54b4(rgyud): nas/ lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs par 'gyur ro// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bgyis nas sams/
54b5(rgyud): can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// mchod par 'os pa dang bla ma'i gnas su'ang 'gyur ro// nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'gums pa'i dus
54b6(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ legs pa'i lam ston par mdzad par yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun
54b7(rgyud): namachis nas dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgyid do// de bde bas shin tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas lus 'dor bar 'gyur ro// bor ba tsam gyi mod la skal ba mnyam pa bde ba
55a1(rgyud): can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras pa'i lus pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/
55a2(rgyud): bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par bye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g.yar thon
55a3(rgyud): du bgyis nas/ sa bcu la gnas shing phyin ci log tu ma gyur pas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / cho 'phrul chen pos lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gzhal med khang dang
55a4(rgyud): gnas mchog dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi
55a5(rgyud): khams mthong ba'i chos kho na la lta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gi gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/ gnas sam/ khang pa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ 'khor gyi khyams sam/ 'chag sa 'am/ khang pa
