55a6(rgyud): brtsegs ma 'am/ spyil po gtsang ma phyi bdar legs par bgyis pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dbyes pa khru gang ba tsam/ khru do pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/ gru bzhi lham pa/ grwa kun nas cha 'byes pa/
55a7(rgyud): sa dang sbyar ba'i lci bas shin tu legs par phyi bdar bgyis la rtsa sngon po mnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cha dbye ba'i thig gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po la pad+ma
55b1(rgyud): rgya chen pos dbyes pa/ 'dab ma brgyab tshon sna brgyad kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi ning 'byes par bgyis la/ rin po na ran po chen ti ka las bgyi'o// pad+ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor la/ grwa ba'ing/
55b2(rgyud): kha khyer sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o// pad+ma'i bar gyi zur zur du ut+pal sngon po legs par bris la/ kha khyer gyi phyi rol nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mtshos bskor bar bgyi'o// lha'i chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gas
55b3(rgyud): med khang gis mdzes par bgyis la/ chab la me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkod pa/ bya sna tshogs gnas 'cha' ba/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la bing+ga dang / bya'i
55b4(rgyud): tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyis la/ nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kun nas rten 'cha' bar bgyid do// mtsho'i 'gram na rin po che'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing sna
55b5(rgyud): tshogs kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rol na lag pa dang thal mo'i phyag rgya bris la sgo bzhi rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la pad+ma'i gdan bzang
55b6(rgyud): po bshams te/ de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob gzhag par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// me
55b7(rgyud): tog sil ma dang / dri dang / byug pa'ang dbul bar bgyi'o// ba dan bzang po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// gtor ma dkar po dbul bar bgyi'o// yon chab dang zhabs bsil gyi snod dang / mar me'i 'phreng ba
56a1(rgyud): dbul bar bgyi'o// pad+ma'i zhags pa 'od dpag med kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma 'igo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyis nas
56a2(rgyud): ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la/ zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas kha shar phyogs su bltas la skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
56a3(rgyud): byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgyi'o// snying rje mchog tu brtse bar gyur pas sems can thams cad la brtse bar bgyis na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyi ste/
56a4(rgyud): ji tsam na thun tha ma la 'od dpag med 'bar bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor chen po de la'ang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang g.yo bar gyur nas lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang /
56a5(rgyud): gis skya rengs shar tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser spungs pa lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis rig sngags
56a6(rgyud): 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas/ phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mi gda' bar gyur pa dang /
56a7(rgyud): shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i gnyid thob nas/ ji ltar nyal ba tsam mam mig btsum pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gzhal med khang dang / gnas dang / 'jig rten dang /
56b1(rgyud): yul ljongs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha' dag dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston par mdzad pa'ang mthong bar gyu/
56b2(rgyud): lags so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mthong bar 'gyur lags so// 'di
56b3(rgyud): nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de sad nas zhags
56b4(rgyud): pal lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung na nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa grub pa rnams dang rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi
56b5(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'khor khri brgyad stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rig sngags 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ shing shu/
56b6(rgyud): dang / ras skud dang / kha cha dar gyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bkal te/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis pa/ tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyis te/ rtse lnga pa 'byung po la sogs pa'i
56b7(rgyud): mgo dang sbrul gyi ska rags bcings la/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i dra ba'i 'phreng bas dkri ba bgyis nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo
57a1(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyi'o// kha'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// rtswa'i stan bting nas ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pa zhags pas mnan nas don yod pa'i zhags/
57a2(rgyud): pa'i snying po khri bzlas so// khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po stong bzlas so// de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur te/ de bzung nas nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigra dang /
57a3(rgyud): nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang / mthu dang / brtson 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro// lag na/
57a4(rgyud): rdo rje dang 'dra bar rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro// lha'i lo khri nyis stong du 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa'i zhags pa steng ngam/ 'og gar/
57a5(rgyud): 'phangs par yid la bsams pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas dgug par bgyid do// phyogs bcur 'phangs te khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ gzhan gang ci'ang rung ba thams cad zhags pas/
57a6(rgyud): bcings nas myur du 'gugs par bgyi ste som nyi mi bgyi'o// gal te lga 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ lto 'phye chen
57a7(rgyud): po thams cad zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gugs par bgyid de som nyi mi bgyi'o// zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo nam
57b1(rgyud): byed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi
57b2(rgyud): mdun na mchis shing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te bran bzhin las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// nags pa la khro bo'i rgyal
57b3(rgyud): bopo lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pas zhags pa blangs te dur khrod du zhugs na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur ro// phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo rje zhags pas
57b4(rgyud): brdabs na phug thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur zhing / 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa thams cad dum bur chag par 'gyur ro// lam ngan pa dang / mi ngan pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'bab chu ngan pa dang / sbrul dang /
57b5(rgyud): dbugs gdug pa dang / srog chags go na sa dang / gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags su gtogs pa thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// mi drang po dang lam drang por ji ltar rang gi gnas sam/ gtsug
57b6(rgyud): lag khang ngam/ khang pa bzhin du zhugs nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te/ slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// rdo rje zhags pa las thams cad bgyid pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//
57b7(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang nor bu'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nor bu stsal bar bgyi ste/ rdo rje 'am/ bai DUR+Ya 'am/ shel rang byung ngam/ mar gad dam/ in+d+ra nI la sor mo'i tshigs pa bas
58a1(rgyud): lhag tsam shin tu phyis pa/ shin tu yongs su dag par bgyis pa/ gser gyi me tog gi tshul du bgyis pa/ mu tig gis dkris pa/ ge sar kha bye ba/ tsam pa ka'i me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du
58a2(rgyud): bgyis la/ ras bzang po'i skud pa tshon rtsis dbyes pas kha bsgyur ba/ shin tu tshad la bab par bkal ba/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ sor mo gung mo'i tshad tsam gyi nor bus brgyan la/ thor to cig shos su ni nor bu 'am/
58a3(rgyud): gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par bkrus nas pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ri mo'i gzugs
58a4(rgyud): kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bgyis la/ grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba gzhag cing pog por gyi snod bshams nas a ka ru'i bdug pa dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul
58a5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi stan bzang po tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/ ba dan sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dang / dri dang / rol mo'i cha byad dag dgod
58a6(rgyud): par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// btung ba ngan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / gnas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang sbags pa rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o// don yod
58a7(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri chig stong bzlas nas lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la mnan no// lan nyi khri chig stong tshang ba dang / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan
58b1(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la
58b2(rgyud): mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la'ang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chos bco lnga'i nya la nyin zhag gcig sprung
58b3(rgyud): bgyis nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi ste/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig re re bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul bar bgyi'o//
58b4(rgyud): de nas skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas brdeg par bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur
58b5(rgyud): ro/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mi mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nor bu'i zhags pa de'ang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo'ang 'bar
58b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor bu'i zhags pa blangs pa na sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid
58b7(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
59a1(rgyud): 'od kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba snol bar 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog
59a2(rgyud): 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bor bzhag nas rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don
59a3(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub bo// khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod dgur sgyur ba thams cad de/ 'phagra/
59a4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i zhags pa thogs nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i grub
59a5(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin 'dis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa la ltos shig/ yid la ji ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs la ltos
59a6(rgyud): shig rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig/ 'on te bde ba can lta bar 'tshal lam/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mchod par 'tshal lam/
59a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang /
59b1(rgyud): klub rlud dang / rgyan dang / gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spu mo'i gtsug tunga'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la me tog dang bdug pa'ang dbul bar bya/ yid bzhin/
59b2(rgyud): gyinar bu chen po don yod zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod yid bzhon nor du'i mchog bzung nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ 'di lta bu'i yid la
59b3(rgyud): bgyis pa chen po rje lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu'ang bsams nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas 'phags bcu/
59b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyis nas gas
59b5(rgyud): sngags bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po lnga pa// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i
59b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag
59b7(rgyud): 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba dang yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na gnas pa 'phags pa byams pa la sogs/
60a1(rgyud): pa tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon
60a2(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dag dbang phyug
60a3(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA pad+ma tsan+d+ra ma Ni ma Ni/ a mo g+ha ma Ni su ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a laM kAr/
60a4(rgyud): ma hA a mo g+ha ma Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra sany+tsa ra/ ni sha tsa tsa re shwa ra ma hA/ pad+ma b+hu dza ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/ pra ba ra ma hA bo d+hi satwa pad+ma d+ha ra pad+ma A sa na pad+ma ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ pad+ma gau ra/ pad+ma a laM kri ta/
60a5(rgyud): nus ha sra b+hu dza sa hA mrane grAn+ma rA b+hu ta/ zla ba raka mu dra bi b+hu She trA sa ha sra b+hu dza/ dza ma dza ya/ sha ta sa ha pra ra shrI pra ti mar+t+ti tA sha rIr/ b+ha ra b+hur/ bi tsi tra/ A b+ha raN d+ha ra/ ma Ni kan ka/ badz+ra bi n+yAn/ ma raka ta/ in
60a6(rgyud): dra nI la pad+ma rA ga b+hu Shi ta sha rI ra/ tsa ra tsi ri/ bi tsi tra/ tsa rar+tha/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba rad brah+ma/ biSh+Ta ma he shwa ra/ rU pA d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra lo ke shwa ra/ a nan+te shwa ra/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra ri Shi ga Na ku mA ra/ sain+da pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/
60a7(rgyud): d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA da b+hu ta be Sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hik+ShI sa ma ya ma nu sma ra b+ha ga ban/ pU ra ya me A tAM shAn+ta ra ya pA ran/ shA ya ya satAM/ ta ra dza ya duSh+TA na pA ta ya big+d+ha na/ mA ra ya tri do sha mA/
60b1(rgyud): as ras pa thA ga pU d+huthA sa pa ra/ sad+h+ya sid+ha/ ma san tAs Ni/ a mo g+ha d+ha ga d+ha ma swa d+ha la sA d+hA ya/ 'apral sa kyi/ ma A ban dab+ha pra la r+N+Na drA kA rba N-i// prad+hAT+TAd+hA/ nas pan /
60b2(rgyud): yas bo d+ha la/ ma hA ba shru ba te Sh+Tha shwA d+hA ma/ an rnaM ba kur b+han/ sa n+ta d+has/ starba tA ma/ tar tar/ ga ga no ba bral bi s+thA na/ san d+ha ma ka ni mam+b+ha ta~M bul pradz+ra ko 'jam mahA sa ma gri sid d+he d+hAd+d+ha/ a bi
60b3(rgyud): tu mAM/ tri b+hu ba na de byA khi pu la kIrti ka re swA hA/ b+hu ba swA hA/ b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/ a mo g+ha pi bu le swAt+ma/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni sid d+hi swA hA/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni sid d+he ba ra de swA hA/ sarba sid d+hi ba ra de swA hA/ oM bi pu la~M shwa ra/ lo ka/
60b4(rgyud): shwa ra mahA tsin+tA ma Ni/ mahA a mo g+ha sid d+he hUM phaT swA hA/ don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhag/
60b5(rgyud): ba lag pas mnan na na mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar
60b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par
60b7(rgyud): 'phrul ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu mchod pa'i char gyi sman chen po 'byung bar 'gyul zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshed pag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen par gnas par 'gyur
61a1(rgyud): ro bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra
61a2(rgyud): de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing mchod pa'i char chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'bebs par 'tshal na/ de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur ro//
61a3(rgyud): 'on te mi 'tshal na nam mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don yod rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba mchog tu 'gyur ro// dpag
61a4(rgyud): tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro// 'on te babs na lo khrir 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// 'jig
61a5(rgyud): rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang gus pa cher bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po/
61a6(rgyud): dag bgyid par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro//
61a7(rgyud): thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/ rang sarba
61b1(rgyud): rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par/
61b2(rgyud): dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba 'am/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba 'am/
61b3(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba 'am/ lha'i zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs
61b4(rgyud): rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba 'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba 'am/ nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des legs
61b5(rgyud): bar bkrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang bdug pa'ang dbul bar
61b6(rgyud): bgyi'o// pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di'ang mchod par bgyi'o// 'phags spyan ras gzi/
61b7(rgyud): dbang phyug gi snying po lar bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / sbyin gtong chen po dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
62a1(rgyud): chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / rgyun dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / kheb rdo ba dang / rin po che'i ljon shing nga/
62a2(rgyud): 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / mar me'i ljon shing dang / dpag bsam gyi ljon shing yid la bgyi ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsams shing don du gnyer ba bzhin
62a3(rgyud): phyogs bcur 'phangs na/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par/ ci bsams pa
62a4(rgyud): bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis
62a5(rgyud): pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen don yod la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas shing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di'ang nyin gcig bzhin du thun
62a6(rgyud): gsum du lan gsum du bzla bar bgyi'o// des na rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / rim gro
62a7(rgyud): bgyis par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag tha
62b1(rgyud): cad kyi rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang / blo gros dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid stsol bar mdzad do// nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu
62b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la
62b3(rgyud): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang / skrag pa dang / sdang ba rnams rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// rims kyis ma lags/ dug gis ma lags/ dug
62b4(rgyud): sbyar mas ma lags/ sbyor bas ma lags/ mtshon gyis ma lags/ mes ma lags/ chus ma lags te/ lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pra
62b5(rgyud): ma lags/ pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ lha'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
62b6(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba dang / sbyor ba rtsub mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig gi
62b7(rgyud): nang tshun chad gzung bar mi nus shing rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/ de la bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can nam/ mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa 'am/
63a1(rgyud): 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de'ang mthong ba'i chos laja/
63a2(rgyud): cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gtugs par 'gyur/ yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing smyung ba lan cig bgyis te bzlas brjod byas na/
63a3(rgyud): de bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir ldog par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams
63a4(rgyud): nyams par 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad+ma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro// bsten pa
63a5(rgyud): tsam mam/ cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su
63a6(rgyud): mchi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang /
63a7(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par bskyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar med pa
63b1(rgyud): gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// chung ngun rig sngags 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i nus pa 'ang/ gum pa'i sha'am/ gum pa'i ro rul pa 'ang/ gum pa'i kun nas/ chung ngun/
63b2(rgyud): gum pa'i gos bor ba 'am/ rtsig pa'i ri mo'i rig sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur na/ sems can gang dag gi dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur pa de dang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams
63b3(rgyud): bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis sam som nyi bskyed par mi bgyid na/ gang dag ches mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang rigs kyi bu po 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/
63b4(rgyud): dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di 'chang bar bgyid/ rjod par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ gdon par bgyid/ sems par
63b5(rgyud): bgyid/ sgom par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid na/ de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la yon
63b6(rgyud): tan chen po brgya stong mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di nyid bcangs na mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs
63b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di nyid re zhig kun chub par bgyis nas mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgos pa mang pos grims par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas rig sngam/
64a1(rgyud): 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas yid la bsams te/ bsam pa'i las thams cad bgyis na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ dgos pa dang bgyi ba thams
64a2(rgyud): cad grub par 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas lung bstan pa bzhin du don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa 'di de bzhin du blta/
64a3(rgyud): bar bgyi ste/ 'di la yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la lag pa g.yas pas nor bu blangs te/ lag pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs na mi gda' bar gyur/
64a4(rgyud): nas gar dga' ba der 'jug par 'gyur te/ mtshan mo'ang nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin/
64a5(rgyud): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / ri sul gyi phug dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / thang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas slar
64a6(rgyud): yang ldog par 'gyur ro// zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ 'on te rig sngags
64a7(rgyud): 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// gtsang ma'i gnas sam phyogs su ba'i
64b1(rgyud): lci ba ste ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o// gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dkram zhing bum pa gang bas brgyan cing spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i/
64b2(rgyud): bdug pa gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du stan bzang po bshams te/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum po bskyil
64b3(rgyud): nas gzhag par bgyi'o// dbus su nor bu gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod par bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po/
64b4(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de'i 'og tu tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtag par
64b5(rgyud): bgyi ste/ zhags pa dang de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gda' ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba 'am/ lha gda' ba 'am/ klu gda' ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dang /
64b6(rgyud): srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci gda' ba 'am/ 'byung po dang / lto 'phye chen po gda' ba 'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa gda' ba 'am/ tshe ring ba gda' ba 'am/ tsho nyams
64b7(rgyud): pa gda' ba 'am/ tshe 'phos pa gda' ba 'am/ rgyal srid gda' ba 'am/ grong 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am/ grong khyer 'thob pa'am/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang /
65a1(rgyud): shang ka shi la dang / b+hu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gda' ba'am/ nor sgyur ba smra ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gte/
65a2(rgyud): smra ba 'am/ 'bru smra ba 'am/ bud med 'phrog pa 'am/ las sgrub pa 'am/ gsang sngags 'grub pa 'am/ dbang du bgyi ba 'am/ ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang na gda' bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba
65a3(rgyud): 'am mi dge ba de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo 'am/ lo phyed dam/ gnod pa 'am/ 'tshe ba 'am/ yams sam/ mi ngas sam/ mi ngas chen po 'am/ phyugs ngas sam/ gor ram/ rta nad dam/ glang
65a4(rgyud): po che'i nad dam/ rang gi dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la ji lta ba de bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so// gang bsams shing gang
65a5(rgyud): gnyer bar 'grub pa 'am/ mi 'grub pa 'am/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te/ de la the tsom dang / yid gnyis dang / som nyi mi bgyi ste/ dngos po don yod gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// char mi
65a6(rgyud): 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu gzhag na ci tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches na nam mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char kar nyis
65a7(rgyud): lastan na nyi ma babs nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// zla ba tshos pa la bstan na zla ba babs nas 'dod dgu thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do// chu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams
65b1(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nags khung du bstan na sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro// ri phug tu bstan na sman thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur te/
65b2(rgyud): ci 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o// 'bru'i phung po la bstan na 'bru thams cad 'du bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma mo'i gnas sam nag po chen po la bstan te spyi bo'i gtsug tu
65b3(rgyud): bzhag na/ nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i mngon sum du/
65b4(rgyud): bstan na yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/ blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byu ru dang
65b5(rgyud): sa la sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyun 'phyang dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro// skye bo'i
65b6(rgyud): tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te/ don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na ji ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gzhal med khang gi char
65b7(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rtse mor bzhag ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba khyim gyi steng ngam khyams su bzhag la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyis sam/
66a1(rgyud): can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas do//
66a2(rgyud): yod yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang bstod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang nas ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du char 'bab par 'gyur ro// nor bu dang / 'bru dang / gos
66a3(rgyud): dang / lhab lhub la sogs pa me tog dang 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yams dang / gnod pa de dag
66a4(rgyud): thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus pas par 'gyur ro// thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang sha khon
66a5(rgyud): thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gdug pa nas/ gcan zan khro bo thams cad kyi bar du'ang byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad mthun par bgyid par 'gyur ro// yid kyi brnag pa thams cad//
66a6(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don yod yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rig sngags 'chang ral gri dang zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gi
66a7(rgyud): lcags chen po las ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis la/ lag zungs kyi ngos dngul las bgyis te gser gyis 'bar bar bri'o// shing shun gyi skud pa dang / arka'i skud pa dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa lhan cig tu
66b1(rgyud): khru bcu drug byung ba shin tu tshad la bab par bkum pa/ sgrub pa'i dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos/
66b2(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos te/ zhags pa dang ral gri mnan la lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste gzung bar bgyi'o// khros pa'i khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras
66b3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas ral gri 'bar bar gyur nas/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phun
66b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing / ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi mthus zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro// lo khri brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'on te lag pa g.yon
66b5(rgyud): pas zhags pa bzung la g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste/ khros pas hUM zhes bgyi bas mnan na mi gda' bar gyur nas mi gda' ba dang / zhags pa dang ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal
66b6(rgyud): po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo khri thub par 'gyur ro// 'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri bskor na bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gdug pa can thams cad dang / 'byung po
66b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro// g.yul gyi dbus su lan cig bskor na g.yul 'gyed pa'i mtshon cha thams cad gtubs par 'gyur/ rengs par bgyis par 'gyur te/ thams cad phyogs bcur
67a1(rgyud): 'byer bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi rig sngags gtubs par 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad stong par 'gyur ro/
67a2(rgyud): phug gi sgor bskor na 'khrul 'khor dang sgo glegs thams cad gtubs par 'gyur ro// sgo dang gtan pa thams cad gtu nges par 'gyur ro// gdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom pa
67a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad du ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro// ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rig sngags 'chang sbrul
67a4(rgyud): gyi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des skud pa lnga las sgrub ste/ tshon rtsi lngas kha bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshad bzhin du gtubs la/ sgrub par shin tu 'os pa las bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas zas
67a5(rgyud): bzang po'i bye ma dang / ma d+hu'i me tog dang / ra sa'i me tog dang / ldong ros dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / na ga bus pa dang / shing arga'i 'o ma lhan cig tu sbyar ba der btsag bsal te/ dus gcig tu lhan cig mnyam du btagra/
67a6(rgyud): shig khri bor legs pa sgris te/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rdza brgyad bzlas brjod dkyis nas sbrul 'khyil ba mgo gsum gyi ba dngas kyi can yongs su 'khyil ba gser gyis g.yogs pa/ legs pas/
67a7(rgyud): sbrel ba ni zhags pa'i mchog legs so// rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas pa'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te dris mchod pa
67b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// me tog gisil ma dang bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// ba dan gyis kun nas brgyan par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gnas su skran bzang po bshams te/ de'i steng du klu'i zhags pa bskyil/
67b2(rgyud): nas gnag par bgyi'o// sbrul gyi mgo'i gdengs ka dbus ma ni kha shar phyogs su ston no// dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon zhabs bsil dkar po'i snod dang / bdug pa rnam pa
67b3(rgyud): gsum po tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka rnams sreg go// 'bras yos dang yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du bzhag la mchod paN+ya
67b4(rgyud): chen po bgyis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o// thog mar don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas tshang ba dang / khro
67b5(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re nas sbrul gyi mgo la gtor bar bgyi'o// sgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni/ rgyun du sbrul ni 'bar bar 'gyur// stan las zhags pa g.yo ba ni// sor
67b6(rgyud): bzhi tsam gyi tshad tsam du// stan las gyen du 'phar bar 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gzung nas mi gda' bar gyur nas klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtshor mchis na klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'byer bar
67b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs te don yong rgyal po bzlas nas sbrul gyi zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas rig sngags 'chang
68a1(rgyud): mngon sum du smra bas rig sngags 'chang zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzung ste bskor nas 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas riH/
68a2(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon de mi mthong zhing nub par 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang / sgo glegs dang / gtan pa thams cad gtubs shing bcag par 'gyur ro// zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo gzugs
68a3(rgyud): bzang mo mdzes ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs ma mdzes ma mchis nas rin po che'i 'phreng ba thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang la dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas spyi bo la gzhag ste/
68a4(rgyud): bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo nam mkha' la 'phur nas nu ma gnyis nas 'o ma zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis bzed nas btung bar bgyis te/ tshe khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad
68a5(rgyud): 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// mthu dang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon por 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
68a6(rgyud): sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la don yod rgyal po'i snying po shing ka ra l+lI ra'i lcug ma la bzlas nas byab par bgyi ste/ gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams pas mod du thams cad 'grub par
68a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab bo// cha ra ha cang che ba'i dus su sbrul gyi zhags pa gnas
68b1(rgyud): mthor por bzhag na char ha cang che ba las 'chad par 'gyur ro// grang ba'i rlung ngam ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su nang par sngar klu'i zhags pa phyogs bzhir bskor na dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu ser ba 'bab par mi
68b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ grang ba'i rlung dang ser drag thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// lo 'khyud 'khor tshang bar mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin doran yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
68b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bsdogs la/ lag pa g.yon pas bskrad pa bgyis na nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zhal zas dang btung ba 'dod dgu thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas
68b4(rgyud): skye ba srong srong 'tshal ma stsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bzung la lag pa g.yon pas klu bzung nas/
68b5(rgyud): depyid dam/ ston ka 'am/ sprin chags pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te/ nam mkha' la 'phangs na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog gang yang rung ba bzang po shin
68b6(rgyud): tu smin pa dang / kha zas shin tu bzang po thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro// gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na/ klu'i gzhal med khang
68b7(rgyud): dang gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'byang dang / rgyan thams cad sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig las lhag par bskor cing khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis
69a1(rgyud): na/ de'i tshe klu'i khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas par sa'i steng du lhung bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar
69a2(rgyud): 'tshal na/ zhags pa bzhag la yungs kar la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bsdum la/ de nas sbrul gyi zhags pa blangs te rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par/
69a3(rgyud): zhags pa bskor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa na khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa g.yul gyi
69a4(rgyud): dbus su 'phangs na sbrul gdug pa mig bgrad pa/ lce sgyur ba/ mig me mdag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ro//
69a5(rgyud): gzhan yang ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i don de lta de lta bur thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi zhags pa
69a6(rgyud): sgrub par 'tshal na 'bri'i rtsid pa dang / rtsid pa chen po lhan cig tu bkal ba dang / lcags las mdung rtse gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
69a7(rgyud): brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin zhag gcig mchis la legs par khrus bgyi ste gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig
69b1(rgyud): gis bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs na 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po/
69b2(rgyud): gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// zhags pa lag par thogs nas dur khrod du zhugs na dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar
69b3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing khyod ci dgar zhugs shig ces ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// ro'i mgul du btags khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra bar 'gyur zhing ci bsgo ba de bgyid par
69b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bkrol na mchi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi mgul du btags te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khros pas drangs nas gnod sbyin de'ang mdun du mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang la rje btsun bka'
69b5(rgyud): stsol cig dang thams cad bgyi'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khro bo'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa'i las gyis shig ces smra bar bgyi ste/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de/
69b6(rgyud): nas nyin gcig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis na las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btags te khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du
69b7(rgyud): mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing / rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis kho bo lam dang / chung ma dang / sring mos bsgrub par bya
70a1(rgyud): ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o// gal te ma zhig tu bgyid na bu gcig pa bzhin du bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'brus
70a2(rgyud): yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// chung ma zhig tu bgyid na mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang bdag por bgyid cing / de dang lhag par dga' bar rtse ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gal te sring mo
70a3(rgyud): zhig tu bgyid na yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// dgas pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyug cing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin/
70a4(rgyud): lhab lhub dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams stsol bar bgyid do// nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo'i don du dgug par bgyid do// rnam thos kyi mgul du btags te khros pas drangs nas khro
70a5(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas rnam thos mchis nas nyin gcig bzhin dong rtse stong stsol bar 'gyur/ gser stong stsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa'ang stsa la/ bsod nams
70a6(rgyud): kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i thal lcag gis brdeg par bgyi'o// nag po chen pos sgra phyung ba na
70a7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang skrag par mi bgyid par slar yang khros pas brdeg par bgyi'o// de nas mchi ba zags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis mchi ma bzed de thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gter tham
70b1(rgyud): cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang thal mos brdeg par bgyi ste// de nas nag po chen po khrag tu skyug pa rig sngags 'chang gis thugs na nam mkha' la mchis nas gnod sbyin /
70b2(rgyud): sderje dpon chen por 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na nag po chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid ce
70b3(rgyud): ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pas dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i tshe
70b4(rgyud): ga'o// de nas zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i// rnam pa'i kha dog
70b5(rgyud): gzugs bstan pa// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi// cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te// lag pastong dang mig stong dang / mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstar// rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs// khams
70b6(rgyud): gsum dag tu bstan pa ni// gdul bya gdul phyir gzugs bstan to// gsang ba 'di yi gzugs bstan pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rig sngags grub pa bla med pa// de nyid zhags pa sgrub phyir ro//
70b7(rgyud): bas rig 'dzin shes rab can// 'jig rten pha rol rjes 'thun pa// sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang // de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba dang // bde can lta bar 'tshal ba dang // de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa yis// 'jig
71a1(rgyud): dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal la// mchog tu gus pas bgyi ba yi// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis// de nyid gus par dad pa dang / shin tu dang ba nyid du bgyi// grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba
71a2(rgyud): la// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bstan te// sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur// don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog/ don yod grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das// don yod 'bras bu dam pa po// don yod kun tu
71a3(rgyud): grub pa 'thob// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten mgon// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa// don yod 'jig rten ci 'tshal ba// mchog 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur//
71a4(rgyud): don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chad// de lta bas na kun bsgrims te// bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyis nas// ji ltar cho ga bkod pa bzhin// rjes su 'phrul par ri mo'i gzugs
71a5(rgyud): rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs lta zhing // zhags pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang // rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang // sbyin sreg rlung lha chu lha dang // khro/
71a6(rgyud): bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang // lha dang klu yang ston pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha min dri za dang // nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun tu// 'jig rten
71a7(rgyud): mgon pos mchog sbyin bstan// gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni// dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang // zla gzugs rgyu skar tshes grangs dang // 'di dag
71b1(rgyud): rnab pa sna tshogs pa'i// gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan// sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas// gdul ba'i don du 'gro ba'i lam// sems can rnams la bstan pas na// de bas som nyi nyid mi/
71b2(rgyud): bgyid mchog tu dad par bgyi ba lags// ji ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams// ji ltar mthun pa bzhin du sgrub// ji ltar mthun pa'i ri mo'i gzugs// ji ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa sgrub// gnas ni gang du 'os pa
71b3(rgyud): dang / gang du sems ni dga' 'gyur ba// goms pa gang gis phyag rgya dang // gang gi dkyil 'khor char dbye ba// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon// kun tu sgrol ba 'dren pa'i gtso// don yod 'bras bu stsol
71b4(rgyud): ba po 'don yod pa yi grub pa 'thob// don yod dgos pa thams cad dang // thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni// mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur// zhags pa dang ri mo sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas don
71b5(rgyud): yod pa'i las dang dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par gyi ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad 'joms pa/ bgegs tham
71b6(rgyud): cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa'i mchog sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog
71b7(rgyud): pa/ mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu 'joms pa/ pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa'i mchog nad thams cad 'joms pa/ mod la 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par
72a1(rgyud): bgyi dag yams kyi nang dang gnod pa 'joms pa/ lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad/
72a2(rgyud): sgrub par bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin tu rnyed par dka' ba/ lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/ klu thams cad dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag/
72a3(rgyud): tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma mchis pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dus kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma
72a4(rgyud): mchis pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas pa srung ba'i don du thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas gtsang ma'i gnas su
72a5(rgyud): mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyis te/ gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs sam// ca co ma mchis dben par ni// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o// zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi// don du sdig pa thams
72a6(rgyud): cad 'joms// rgyas pa rgyas pa 'thob 'gyur te// thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa// gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang // skrag par bgyi
72a7(rgyud): ba drag shul spyod// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg ste// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i bla na med// 'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi// sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o// me lha'i lha dang klu dag dang // de bzhin rig pa 'dzin par/
72b1(rgyud): / dgrag khung brkos de la bad+ma'i tshul// bad+ma rtag tu bri bar bgyi// cho ga rdzi ba nim dung nang gi// pad+mal ni ge sar bgyi// gru ba ni 'ba'i zlum po ste// de lta bur ni brko bar bgyi// legs par thugs shing shin tu bdag
72b2(rgyud): shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab// chos grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang // shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi// bkra shis phyag rgya chen po dang // bzang pos gtor ma'i las bgyi'o// bdug pa me tog la sogs pa
72b3(rgyud): bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod// thog mar me lha bkug nas ni// de nas sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa// legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// gsang sngags bzlas/
72b4(rgyud): pa'i cho ga bgyi// de la mtshams kyang bcing bar bgyi// bdag srung gtsug tor bcing ba dang // gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // de bzhin grogs bgyid srung ba dang / rgyun du a ka'i shing spar te// dri yi shing /
72b5(rgyud): rnams nyid dag dang // mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag/ nyi shu gcig dbul me tog bgyi// de nas me yi lha dgug go// oM na mo ag+ni dz+wA la ma hA dz+wA la/ dz+yed sna pra b+hA maN+Da la/ sar+b+ba bid A hU ti khra hU ti rak+Shi ni rang
72b6(rgyud): tuSh+Ta dz+wa la/ d+hu ma shwa sa/ a tsiSh+Tha pu kha tik+Sh+Na/ ra sh+mid pa ag+ni sh+tsa bi tu ta shru rU ta sha na pu kha na te/ sar+b+ba de bA nAM/ sarba yak+Sha ma hA bIr+ya ma hA dza ya/ ma hA bA la nir ma ri shan/ sar+b+ba da ha na pra pu la A ka ra sha sa mu gang
72b7(rgyud): ka sh+tsa a ba pra saM kA shan/ maN+Da la pU dzi to// ma na ti sar+b+ba tra di bya rU pa bi ShA ra da A bA hA na sar+b+ba tra gAn/ de ba hU ta/ sha na du tra/ sha na ta ma si bi d+ha ma kan/ an d+ha kA ran/ muk+taM rash+mi ma pri yo ku gan d+ha pa lA ha ra sa ra
73a1(rgyud): sa ra a gra dza/ sUk+Sh+ma su tIk+Sh+Na shwA mr-i ti san dzi bi na/ pri yo ba sh+ma puSh+Ta basma bas+thA tsa basma bsu ni/ se ba kam/ basma sany+tsa d+ha ni t+yan d+hu ma mA ku la/ dza ya se/ kha ka sid d+ha ra sa d+ha ra sa grA tsa ra sarba tra/
73a2(rgyud): pra d+ha ba ri shA/ sarba tri ni ra ma ri sha No// ni t+ya spr-iSh+Ta d+haSh+ma naM mun tsa si/ dA tri sha/ b+ha ba no de ba ag+ni/ mu kha de bA ta/ a ru tsi ru dzA ba la ba da ka ma hA na ta/ a tha par No// de ba de ba na/ bi shwa ra da/ a yAn tu sA d+ha ya tad tra
73a3(rgyud): ta/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha sa ma yan/ hu ru hu ru hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du// bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi// gu gul yungs kar mar sbyar ba// spar bdun spar bas me la 'bul/
73a4(rgyud): mchod yon snod rnams dbul ba yang // de bzhin spar ba'i spar bas so// dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang // bdug pa rgya chen dbul bar bgyi// de bzhin 'bras bu spar bar dbul// de nas chab kyis bsang ba bgyi/
73a5(rgyud): ji ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du// nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam// dri zhim shin tu dga' ba dang // bla gang sha u dum ba ra dang /
73a6(rgyud): sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang // kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang // pad+ma ut+pal thang shing dang // de bzhin dri bda'i tsan dan dang // byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang // de bzhin gzhan yang dri gda'i shig/ 'on te
73a7(rgyud): 'bras bu'i shing mang dang // shi ma shi ba'i las lags pas// mchod yon de bzhin rtswa dag ste// de dag gis ni me spar nas// sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o// 'bras yos tsan dan phye ma dang // a ka ru/
73b1(rgyud): dang du dra// kun tu phul sogs pa dang // du ru kar bcas pI ka dang // spang spos pri yang ku blangs te// de dag lhan cig sbyar bsres shing // mar ram mar gsar lhan cig brdzi// don yod rgyal por
73b2(rgyud): gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang // nam byed na me lha
73b3(rgyud): rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa langs nas phyogs bcu ra lta zhing kun tu brtags nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang legs so lag
73b4(rgyud): so/ kha dag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub kyi// mchog slongs shig dang thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams
73b5(rgyud): blang bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar blangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon gyi snod dang zhabs bsil gyi snod dag dbul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bgyi'o// de
73b6(rgyud): nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing / 'bras bu'i shing la me sbar nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa
73b7(rgyud): brgyad tshang ba dang / thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus byed tsam phyung nas dngul gyi gnong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/ pus mo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste khang /
74a1(rgyud): pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang gis lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rig sngag/
74a2(rgyud): 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te
74a3(rgyud): snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na rig sngags 'chang la dbugs
74a4(rgyud): 'byin par bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga de bsgrubs zin gyis/ mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no zhes/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis ci
74a5(rgyud): bsams pa'i mchog smras pa de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de las snod blangs te/ rang gi log nas rig sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do//
74a6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza' bar bgyi'o// 'tshal po tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// lus la me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung
74a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po drug pa/
74b1(rgyud): gaN+DI krung bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i rag sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ga d+hA
74b2(rgyud): klung gi bye mi bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yod rab tu gnas pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna bdun gyi
74b3(rgyud): gzhal med khang ri dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang bcas pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yul ga dang / sbal mig dang / lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa kha cig ni gser gyi me
74b4(rgyud): tog/ kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog/ kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go/ gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / lcug ma'i me tog dang /
74b5(rgyud): ta la dang / g+han da par shi ka dang / sna ma dang / yu thi ka dang / ta ra na dang / kub bya ka'i me tog dag dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gri
74b6(rgyud): mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// lha'i chu klung dang / 'bab chu dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi dri chab kyis yod/
74b7(rgyud): su gang ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang / lha'i pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar pos leg par brgyan pa'i chab gser gyi bye ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal
75a1(rgyud): med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang / dri za mo'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / klu dang / rig 'dzin/
75a2(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / lha'i 'byor pa'i gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur/
75a3(rgyud): ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa nas/ byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do// de bzhin du
75a4(rgyud): grub pa bla na med pa chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par
75a5(rgyud): dka' lags so// phyogs bcu mtha' dog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
75a6(rgyud): mngon sum du chos nyan pa thos par 'gyur ro// de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phags pa spyan ras gzigs
75a7(rgyud): dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub
75b1(rgyud): pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lags so// klu'i rgyal bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtag pa rgyun du/
75b2(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'i macing blto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi gnas
75b3(rgyud): kyi lha rnams kyi bar du rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gzhal med
75b4(rgyud): khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa sbyin
75b5(rgyud): sreg gi cho ga don yod pa sgrub pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te skal ba chung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la/ des snod de/
75b6(rgyud): blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro// de la phyis
75b7(rgyud): kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sems
76a1(rgyud): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod nas gcig
76a2(rgyud): bur 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / sems can thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// tshig btsan zhing don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'gus
76a3(rgyud): pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// /
76a4(rgyud): dus bgyis nas skal ba mnyam pa'i jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchis par mi 'gyur te/
76a5(rgyud): phyis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mchi bar 'gyur ro//
76a6(rgyud): dpral bar thig le bgyis na thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// me lha rtag par rgyun du dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// dgos pa thams
76a7(rgyud): cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod bsgongs pa sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des 'bras dang sran ma shar bsres te bsgral la bsgongs na sa mar dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig brdzis
76b1(rgyud): nas pal ba'i cang sa du 'gyis te/ ro bog tu shing ga sgri mas nas bskongs pa'i re la lan bdun pazlas brjod pa gyis nas ma nang du sbyir theg brgya ma/ nyin lan sasum mtshan lan gsum du bdum
76b2(rgyud): brgya brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar dang me tog ji snyed pa dang bsres te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i dbus su su la bar bgyi'o// 'bras yos dang /
76b3(rgyud): yungs kar dang / khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas ma'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs pas bkang nas/ r-ig
76b4(rgyud): sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis/ lha'i zas bsgongs pa chen po long zhig ces stobs par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zas bsgongs pa'i snod
76b5(rgyud): de blang bar bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam kho nas bcud kyis len du gyur nas nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// pags pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chad
76b6(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba drug khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// me lha gnas dang gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis
76b7(rgyud): nas las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gis zas pa slongs pa la reg pa de'ang thos pa bsags pa'i rgyam tsho chen por 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
77a1(rgyud): phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rim par bye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di nyin gcig bzhin du/
77a2(rgyud): sho lo ka sbyong klog gam 'chang bar bgyid na/ cho brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skyes nas skye ba'i skye badran par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang gyis dran pa brji
77a3(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur te sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas 'byung po dang / gnod
77a4(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs pa de 'tshal na bu gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha
77a5(rgyud): dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs pa dang / mkhas pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas skye bo 'bum la zas sprul par
77a6(rgyud): 'tshal na'o ma'i thug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ gnas gtsangs gcom bskyungs par shing ka ra wI ra phyug mas dkrug cing don yod nags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de nas ma
77a7(rgyud): rgyal po chab dang yungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas zas bskongs pa gcig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas 'o thug gi nang du yul lo// de nas char bgos te thog mar dkon mchog gsum
77b1(rgyud): la bsod snyoms dbul bar 'gyi'o// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang byug la dbul bar 'gyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o// da' dzan/
77b2(rgyud): tu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang /
77b3(rgyud): slong mo pa rnams la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o// ji tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang snod de gang ba 'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bas par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag
77b4(rgyud): sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyi
77b5(rgyud): tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyur ro// nga ro lha ltar mnyen zhing snyan la dga' bar bgyid/
77b6(rgyud): pa mi 'am ci'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bde ba yang dag par stobs par 'gyur ro// tshe brnyas nas bde 'gro thams
77b7(rgyud): cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma'i thug pas lhung bzed bkang nas de gnas mthon po bla gab med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
78a1(rgyud): lhung bzed de dbul bar bgyi'o// bul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gang+gA bye ba 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de
78a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgong ba dang / lha'i 'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram pa 'byung bar
78a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la
78a4(rgyud): lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga shes pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de
78a5(rgyud): dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do// gang gi phyir yon sbyangs nas skal ba dang mthun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang gzhan du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa chen
78a6(rgyud): po'i gser gyis 'byor par 'gyur ro// mdzod dang bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro//
78a7(rgyud): lnga thams cad kyis de la srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des
78b1(rgyud): legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// smon shing dang arba'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me sbar bar bgyi'o//
78b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nung gsum du bgyis nas klu'i
78b3(rgyud): rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub lngar bgyis na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
78b4(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma lags pa thams cad dang / mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur nas mchi bar 'gyur ro// nub bdun du bgyis na rig 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis
78b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nub thams cad du bgyis na brgya byin la sogs te sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babs nas dbang du gyur te/ ji srid/
78b6(rgyud): 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro// zla ba nya nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam gnas stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis la/ an
78b7(rgyud): shing gi yam sreg shing gi me sbar nas gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol
79a1(rgyud): bar bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// nga mnyes par byas kyis/ rig sngags 'chang smros shig dang mchog sbyin te gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no// gter/
79a2(rgyud): smra ba'am/ nor bsgyur ba smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// rgyal po nyid dam/ blon po
79a3(rgyud): dam/ yul bdag nyid dam/ phyug pa nyid dam/ grong rdal 'thob pa'am/ gos 'thob pa 'am/ ba lang dang / rta dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / lug 'thob pa 'am/ nor 'thob pa 'am/ 'bru 'thob pa de dag thams cad
79a4(rgyud): sbyin no// nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa 'am/ gzung 'thob pa 'am/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa 'am/ ro langs bslang ba
79a5(rgyud): 'am/ rig 'dzin grub pa nyid dam/ ral gri'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ nags su 'jug pa 'am/ ril rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no//
79a6(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams shing smras pa de dag thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mod la dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongs su dag
79a7(rgyud): pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma'i me ba'i dbus nas rdzus te pad+ma las skyes nas skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub
79b1(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par bye ba dang bcas pa cho gzhib mo mtha' dag dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te / byang chub kyi sring po lardza/
79b2(rgyud): gi bar du kha ton du gnas par bgyi'o// de nas la ngu'i sbyin sreg gi chog sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des kha zas las la du stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i 'ag
79b3(rgyud): papa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// de nas la du mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// shin tu dri zhim po'i shing gi
79b4(rgyud): lam sreg shing gi ma spar bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas snod lnga'i la dus bkang nas dbul bar 'gyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan bdun
79b5(rgyud): bzlas te khye'u de'i la dul gtor ro// khye'u des rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des
79b6(rgyud): smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang snod kyil du khyer cig dang / 'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu med pa grub par 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no// rig sngags 'chang long zhig/ 'di ni khyod
79b7(rgyud): kyi grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snod gang ba de blangs te khye'u la'ang khyod kyis kho bo'i grogs gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// khye'us smras pa/ dgos pa thams cad 'grub
80a1(rgyud): pa'i grogs bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe gu gul dang tsan dan lhan cig bsres la mar dang yungs kar sbyar nas don yod lcags kyus lan bdun
80a2(rgyud): bzlas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// arga'i shing gi me sbar ro// sbyin sreg bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la bdag bkug pas mod la mchis nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// las thams cad bgyi'o// ji srid
80a3(rgyud): 'tshe ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'o// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis la du
80a4(rgyud): de la reg par bgyis na nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang gi rigs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chad
80a5(rgyud): gi 'khor los sgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa drug khrir 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// la du lhung bzed kyi
80a6(rgyud): nang du stsal te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas don yod rgyal po'i khro bos dbang bskur te/ de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmadra/
80a7(rgyud): rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad stsol bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi/ slar zhing slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du lhung bzed nang na la ru/
80b1(rgyud): mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du skye bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal che bar stsal kyang gtugs par mi 'gyur ro// la dul don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun 'azlas brjod pagyis/
80b2(rgyud): mdo'i 'og tu gang du reg pa de'ang gser bzang por 'gyur ro// la dul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te klu'i gnas su 'phangs na/ de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang
80b3(rgyud): bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par gyur te/ bsgo na char mi 'bab pa bsgo ba bzhin char 'bebs par bgyid do// ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches na bsgo bzhin ha cang
80b4(rgyud): char chen po 'gum par bgyid do// rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do// phug gi sgor la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas phug gi sgor bsnun
80b5(rgyud): na mug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / sgo glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas rig sngags 'ang /
80b6(rgyud): mdun du mchis te bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs na nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na
80b7(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ro// la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro//
81a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad sgren mor gyur nas thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// rma ba byung ba/
81a2(rgyud): mi ro dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la la dul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa gnyis su la du stsal la gos dkar pos ro g.yogs nas/ khro ba'i rgyal po yungs kar dang chab la lan bdun
81a3(rgyud): bzlas nas dbang bskur na ci dris pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nongs pa dang / nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung dang / phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi mdza'
81a4(rgyud): pa'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring ba
81a5(rgyud): 'am tshe thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// dus ma lags pa'i 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor bsgyur ba'i gtam mam/ zhing gi gtam mam/ mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib
81a6(rgyud): mo 'grub pa dang / gsang sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub par smra bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'grub pa dang / ril bu 'grub par smra bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchi ba dang / mi gda' bar bgyi ba dang /
81a7(rgyud): rolangs bslang ba dang / ris mngag pa dang / dgra chad pas bcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// sgyu thabs smra bar 'gyur ro// nyams pa smra bar 'gyur ro// 'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas/ bskal pa
81b1(rgyud): las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi chab kyis khar stsal la la du blangs na ro 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// la dul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
