81b2(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal po'i sgor bskrun na/ rgyal popo btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun ni grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /
81b3(rgyud): bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur zhing nor chen po 'du bar 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro// la dul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/
81b4(rgyud): dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag pa stsal na dpal lha mo chen po dbang du gyur nas nor chen po stsol cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// la dul lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas khrag ma'i nang du su
81b5(rgyud): te mchan khung du bsrel bar bgyi ste/ ji tsam du bsrel ba de srid du mi gda' bar gyur nas gang du sbal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro// gang na shing gcig gam 'bab chu gcig per la dul khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa
81b6(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na 'dod dgur sgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang / ji srid
81b7(rgyud): tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi gtsug tu bzhag la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te cha ba dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur
82a1(rgyud): bar bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas mngag gzhug pa las thams cad gyid par 'gyur ro// la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nag po chen
82a2(rgyud): po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas/
82a3(rgyud): brjod bgyis nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
82a4(rgyud): spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur ro//
82a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang de'i yon sbyong ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// la du la lan brgya rtsa/
82a6(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur la lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis na me thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas arga'i yam sreg shing gis me s+phar la la du
82a7(rgyud): de me thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ mar dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsis bsres pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas/ rig
82b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang la spras pa/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so legs so// bdag tshim par byas so// bdag dga' bar gyur to// rig sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis/ rig sngags 'chang /
82b2(rgyud): ltar yid la bsams shing 'dod pa smos shig dang mchog sbyin no// rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o// me lha des kyang thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas
82b3(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ro// las thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs na 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te chab nas byung ba bzhin no// lag pas ma rnams
82b4(rgyud): tshugs par bgyid do// 'bar ba bzhin du klang ba'i spyi bor bzhag na skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi bgyid de/ me'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsrel na cung zad dro btsam
82b5(rgyud): du'ang mi 'gyur ro// lus la bab na ji ltar tsan dan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro// gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na tshig par mi 'gyur ro// chab kyi na
82b6(rgyud): du stsal na 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa 'di yan grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der/
82b7(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad grub stsol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga sgrub pa thams cad lung 'bogs par 'gyur ro// du ba dang / rlung dang / me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag
83a1(rgyud): tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/
83a2(rgyud): de nas don yod me 'bar ba/ bla med 'bar bzang sgrub 'tshal na// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang // gzi brjid nyi ma dang ma nyams pas// phyogs bcu kho ra kho raru yug gi/ kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyi// sgrub pa rnam pa sgra
83a3(rgyud): tshogs dang // 'chod pa bla na med pa 'grub// bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags// nor bsgyur smra ba bla na med// gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa// sgrub pa bla na med pa lags// ji ltar nyin mtshan gda' bas na/
83a4(rgyud): nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs// lan cig dgos pa sgrub pa na// legs par las bgyis nor bu dang // rdzas bsres legs par bgyis pa la// gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang // gtsang mas spyad pas
83a5(rgyud): sgrub pa dang // don yod chu dang me dang ni// me yi shing rnams brjod par bgyi// me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste// de dag thams cad gcig spud pa'i// yam sreg cho ga bla na med// tsan dan dang ni seng ldeng dang // pa tang
83a6(rgyud): ka ra wI ra dang // arga sha mi smyug ma dang // shir sha ka ra na ri ka dang // 'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing // p+lag sha dang ni snga ma dang // gan d+ha ba ra shi pad+ma yi// rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas// pad+ma dkar po ku mu da /
83a7(rgyud): ut+pal me tog lo ma rtsa// bi dza pu ra bil ba shing // sin du bi ra tsam pa ka/ dre ka bi tsu marde tsa// sa ha ba la tsi dra ka/ shing de kun ka bsdus pa yi// ya ma sreg shing gi las bgyis te// yungs kar mar dang zho dang ni// s+tha
83b1(rgyud): rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg bgyi// bzang po'i zangs las srang gsum dang // mtshal las nyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang // srang gcig tsan dan dkar po nyid// srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste// de dag bsres pan/
83b2(rgyud): rdzas rnams dang // de bzhin yung ni nyis 'gyur dag/ zhi ga dag ni bkang nas su// me thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi// sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du// shin tu mnyam pa nag legs gsal ga/ gtsang ma gtsangs/
83b3(rgyud): spyod pa yi// gos gtsang legs par khrus bgyis pa// dri zhim dri yis bsgos par bgyi// ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang // me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod// bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid// stong rtsa brgyad ni
83b4(rgyud): tshang ba dang // de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang // me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod// dbul te 'o mas mdag ma dgum// 'o mas zhig zhi bar bgyi// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis
83b5(rgyud): nas yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas zhig 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhig de la mchod par bgyi'o// de nas
83b6(rgyud): zangs kyi sgrom bu 'am dngul gyi sgrom bur zhig nas nor bu blangs te/ sgrom bu der gzhag par bgyi ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du 'di'ang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo//
83b7(rgyud): ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nyin mo ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nam 'tshed pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu de bzhag na 'tsho ba dang / sreg pa dang / 'tshed pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// na ma ho ma
84a1(rgyud): bgyid pa de'i tshe thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ sreg thugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na me chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgrol mas gsal bar bgyis pa/
84a2(rgyud): bzhin du 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ ya lad dang go char bsdams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de'i spyi bo'i
84a3(rgyud): gtsug tu bzhag nas gcig pu g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs na de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro// de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnam pham par gyur nas phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas
84a4(rgyud): 'byer bar 'gyur ro// phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dgra dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lag pas nor bu bzung nas phug gi
84a5(rgyud): gnas su zhugs na gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas lag pas nor bu bzung ste gnas kyi nang du zhugs
84a6(rgyud): nachab thams cad kyi phyir mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas klu thams cad mdun du mchis nas bden par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro// dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro// bsgo ba bzhin
84a7(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur ro// lo tog dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// snyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan
84b1(rgyud): ba dang / mi bde ba chung bar yang 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid /
84b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ba ni nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba'i chen po lags so// de nas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste rang gi gzugs su blta bar
84b3(rgyud): 'tshal na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// lus legs par bkrus te spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o// shing arga'i yam sreg shing gis me spar bar bgyi'o// yungs kar
84b4(rgyud): dang / a ka ru dang / tsan dar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bgyi'o// de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyis na/ 'phags pa/
84b5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsam pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do//
84b6(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas mig sman sgrub
84b7(rgyud): par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang nges legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// nub gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ des zangs kyi zam tog bgyis la/ de nas mig sman so bi ra dang yung banyis
85a1(rgyud): 'gyur du bsres pas dgang bar 'gyi'o// de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas thab kyi dbus su gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i steng du u shi ra dang / yungs kar dag tsan dan dang /
85a2(rgyud): zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// shing arga'i me spar bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas mig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhig
85a3(rgyud): tu btags la/ ldong ros dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa
85a4(rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni thams cad du mgul pa legs par sbyar te/ de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcings so// de nas mig
85a5(rgyud): sman gyis byugs na nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le bgyis
85a6(rgyud): na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// mchod pa phal po ches
85a7(rgyud): cher mchod par 'gyur ro// nor 'du ba grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i dus sam bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi lha thams cad
85b1(rgyud): kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyis kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te/ bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bde ba sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod kyi cho ga grub par 'gyur ro// mig la byugs te skye bo mang /
85b2(rgyud): po'i nang du zhugs na de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro// bud med kyang mig mi 'dzums par lta bzhin du bdog nyid
85b3(rgyud): dam nor dbang du 'gyur ro// mig la byugs te dgon pa chen por zhugs na chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan gzan gdug pa dang / sbrul dang / dbyig drug dang / sbrul gyi dug gi 'jig
85b4(rgyud): pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bde legs su slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman bskus na smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te thams cad du rgyal
85b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis nas mig la byugs na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la mig la
85b6(rgyud): bskus na gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la bskus na rims nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro//
85b7(rgyud): dug mi bzad pa 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na dug ma mchis par 'gyur ro// don thams cad kyis zin pa la mig la bskus na gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong las thar par 'gyur ro// mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod/
86a1(rgyud): la byang bar 'gyur ro// klad pa cher bro 'tshal ba la'ang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang brjed byed kyis zin pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis thar pa/
86a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rgyal po khros pas gsad par 'os pa gang su'ang rung ba khrid pa mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad spang ba'i thar par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i mig la bskus na rang gi gzugs kyis dus su
86a3(rgyud): mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol cing dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te mig mi 'dzum par don yod
86a4(rgyud): rgyal po'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na/ dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang 'bru rab tu mang po stsol bar 'gyur ro// nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus te nyal na rmi lam bzang po mang zhing phal che ba
86a5(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro// mig la bskus te tsheg
86a6(rgyud): kyi dbus su zhugs na mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro//
86a7(rgyud): gi'u wang dang lhan cig sbyar te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na dbang phyug rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro// don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro// rgyal
86b1(rgyud): po btsun mo dang / blon po'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po/
86b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / las bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mi ro'i mig la
86b3(rgyud): bsku sa na ldang bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na/ dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang slar
86b4(rgyud): zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// bkres pa'i mig la bskus te grong du zhugs na bza' ba dang btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis 'grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bskus te bsod snyoms la
86b5(rgyud): mchis na kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang yon pal po che 'thob par 'gyur ro// sme ba dang / ling tog dang / rab rib dang / chu bur dang / mtshan mo 'thob pa dang / g.yal ba dang / tshag po dang / mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang / mig
86b6(rgyud): sle bo de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro// lha'i mig dag pa 'dab bzang dang mtshungs pa 'dab bzangs kyi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / dbang du
86b7(rgyud): gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang / don grub pa'ang thob nas dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro// de nas nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang /
87a1(rgyud): don yod me lha dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o// grub pa kun gyi bla na med// don kun grub pas mod la ni// mkhas rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid// dbang phyug skal ba
87a2(rgyud): phun sum tshogs// mod nyid kho nar 'thob 'gyur bar// the tshom du yang mi bgyi zhing // yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so// gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang // legs par bkrus pas las sgrub bo//
87a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg bla na med 'phel ba// 'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab// kar na rtsa ba sdong bur bcas// 'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// arga'i shing dang blag shing gi/ yam sreg dag gis me s+phar la// sa bon bdun
87a4(rgyud): po 'bras dang bcas// 'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang // zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni// yungs mar dag dang bsres pa yi// sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi// khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang /
87a5(rgyud): bskur ba tshang ba dang // de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gu gul dang / ske tshe'i 'bras bu dang / mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang
87a6(rgyud): de'i tshe bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gnas mal dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro// gos sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub dang /
87a7(rgyud): rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug gi 'byor pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur
87b1(rgyud): ro// de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la bskus te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas don yod zhags
87b2(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la mig sman gyis bslus na nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis par 'gyur ro// mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur
87b3(rgyud): ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'dis mig la byugs na nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yang 'gyur ro// 'byung po/
87b4(rgyud): dang/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bdun
87b5(rgyud): pa/ mig sman 'dis mig la byugs nas ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na/ lha gtso bo de dag mig mi 'dzums par lta bar bgyid pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas ma mo dang
87b6(rgyud): lha'i gtso bo thams cad mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tshe'i bar du las thams cad sgrub par bgyid pas mchis par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur
87b7(rgyud): cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas gi'u wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po
88a1(rgyud): grub pa yis// rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing // lha dang lha min mchod pa dang // sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang // dbang du 'gyur ba dam pa dang // mkhal la mchi ba'i dam pa dang /
88a2(rgyud): mi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang // mod la phug tu 'jug pa dang // nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang // ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang // thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang // klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang // de bzhin chu klung che
88a3(rgyud): bsgral dang // rdzu 'phrul grub dang bskyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang // nad kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// g.yul ngor g.yul las rgyal bgyid de// rtag tu
88a4(rgyud): dgra kun rlag par bgyid// gdon rigs kun dag tshar gcod cing // rims rnams thams cad zlog par bgyid// sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing // sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// dbang phyug stsol cing
88a5(rgyud): skal ba stsol// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyid// 'thab pa 'thab mo rtsod pa dang // 'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid// bcing ba dang ni shing sgrog dang // khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar rlog/ rgyal po gdug pa
88a6(rgyud): khros pa yis// gsad par 'os pa sel bar bgyid// da ltar 'di la brten pa nas// mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing // mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang // gnas kun mchis par mchod
88a7(rgyud): par 'os// lus can snying du rtag tu sdug/ rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang // bud med kun
88b1(rgyud): dang de bzhin du// skyes pa khye'u bu mo yi// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// gi'u wang bla na med pa po// 'di la gang dag rtag brten na// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste// mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod pa
88b2(rgyud): bgyid// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nyin dang mtshan du srung ba dang // rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so// gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang // klu yi rgyal po mthu chen dang // 'byung po gnod sbyin srin po dang /
88b3(rgyud): grul bum mi min lto 'phye che// dri za lha mon nyid dag dang // nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te// de dag thams cad srung ba yi// ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu// rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur// gi'u wang
88b4(rgyud): grub pa dam pa po// de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lags// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis// gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgo ste// gi'u wang legs par bsgrubs nas su//
88b5(rgyud): dmar po chen po nyid dag dang // gur kum dag dang mnyam sbyar la// zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas// rgya dar gyis ni kha dgum mo//
88b6(rgyud): de nas seng ldeng gi shing dang // arga'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me spar la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / 'bras dang / til dang bsres la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te lan stong rtsa brgyad
88b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo'ang zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te snod kyi nang du stsal nas/ de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang
89a1(rgyud): bskur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro// de nas dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis nas nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los/
89a2(rgyud): sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// lo dgu khri dgu stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur
89a3(rgyud): dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed
89a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po mthu dang ldan pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// mig la bskus
89a5(rgyud): na ji ltar nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// sa'i phug dang thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// thang gi gnas su zhugs nas thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/
89a6(rgyud): slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro// chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na khyim dang gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// chab la garma
89a7(rgyud): pa gang legs pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag byugs te g.yul ngor g.yul
89b1(rgyud): 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na/ ya lad dang go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas
89b2(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ro// gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang la blangs pa de dag thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// gang la bsgo ba de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro//
89b3(rgyud): khar 'chos nas gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la byugs nas su la
89b4(rgyud): reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa dang / no shas 'tsho ba dang / mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// mdzub
89b5(rgyud): mo g.yas pa la bskus nas ser ba dang / sprin dang / 'brug gi dus su sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra 'khor yug tu/
89b6(rgyud): zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro// char ha cang ches na lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha cang char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil la byuH
89b7(rgyud): nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyur ro// gal te mo da la char pa mi 'bebs na de'i tshe lan lnga brdegs pa dang / klu de
90a1(rgyud): dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe char pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe klu thams cad la klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan bdun bskrun na glub/
90a2(rgyud): rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rig sngags phung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na/ bskus
90a3(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mod la gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims kyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na rims zhag gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi
90a4(rgyud): pa'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na mod la nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// sha bkra dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu rnam
90a5(rgyud): las thar par 'gyur ro// g.ye' ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / shu ba mched pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la
90a6(rgyud): byugs pa tsam gyis mi gdug par 'gyur ro// dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro// ljon pa dang / sman dang / dbu chu dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang /
90a7(rgyud): slong na ba dang / chu son pa dang / gnang nad dang / tshad pa dang / gcin sri ba dang / gsud pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rtug skams la bsros nas 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur zhing / phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod par
90b1(rgyud): bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// 'tshogs mar gi'u wang gi ril bu bgyis te/ phug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa la'ang blugs te/ mgo la thal mo brdabs na phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro//
90b2(rgyud): bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste/ slar cung zad kyang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gnas de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// dgos bsgrub pa
90b3(rgyud): chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rkang pa gnyis la byugs te ma 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na me lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang
90b4(rgyud): bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su zhugs shig/ rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes smra ba na/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/ thams cad
90b5(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brla gnyis la byugs na tshugs ma mchis pa'i gyad du 'gyur ro// byin pa gnyis la byugs na 'bab chu chen
90b6(rgyud): po'i pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro// mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ba/
90b7(rgyud): 'gyur te ci 'tshal ba de blang bar 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi ril bu bgyis te khar bsrel nas ri sul dang sman gshong du zhugs nas skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang sman gshong gi gnas
91a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing las thams cad bgyid par
91a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag la 'dzag la/ bcud srung ba
91a3(rgyud): de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// snying khar thig le bgyis nas snying la cung
91a4(rgyud): zad ci bsams pa dang / yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la grub par 'gyur ro// lto la thig le bgyis na kha zas dang btung ba'i ston mo 'dod dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te//
91a5(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rtsibs logs gnyis la byugs na ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro// sgal tshigs la byugs na ji ltar
91a6(rgyud): yid la bsams pa'i mal dang snyun 'thob par 'gyur ro// rna ba la byugs sam gnang dang gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byugs na ji ltar bsams pa'i rgyan dang lhab lhub thob par 'gyur ro// mjug do la byug
91a7(rgyud): na rta'i bzhon pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar gi'u wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te/ nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags
91b1(rgyud): na 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis na bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun gyis thogs pa mang por 'gyur ro// zhag bcu bzhir bgyis na mi 'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su
91b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyis na thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// ka la bing ka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen cing snyan la rna ba'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro// bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig stsal
91b3(rgyud): na bya rog lta bu dang mo gsham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// btson rar srul ba dang / shing sgrog dang / lcags sgrog dang / gtan pa dang / khong sgril la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bu dum bur
91b4(rgyud): 'chag par 'gyur ro// 'thor bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ tshes bco lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la dbang bskur nas gi'u wang gi ril bu dang
91b5(rgyud): spos cha ba bsres pas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// nub gsum du khrus bgyis na gsang sngags dang / phyag
91b6(rgyud): rgya dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyi
91b7(rgyud): thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi ril bu til mar dang bsres te kha gdong la byugs nas rgyal
92a1(rgyud): de'i mdun du mchis na bu bzhin du yang du 'byud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang / rgyam ma ma za' 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// mus thog thag tu byugs na gas pa dzas/
92a2(rgyud): ba'i lus la'ang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur te/ dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro// mda' 'phangs na lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gnu 'chag par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi ral bu mgul du btag
92a3(rgyud): nas 'brog dgon pa dang / ri dang / nags tshang tshing gi bgrod dka' bar zhugs na chom po dang / g.yo can dang / rkun po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa dang / gcan gzan gdug pa dang /
92a4(rgyud): sbrul gdug pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchod pan/
92a5(rgyud): chen por yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po brdzi ba med pas pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thasa?
92a6(rgyud): cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te// thams cad lha 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// dgos pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// byin pa g.yas pa la btags na dub pa ma mchis par dpag
92a7(rgyud): tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi ril bu khar bsrel la la ga pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyi don yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi smra bar gnas mthon por 'gyur te/ phyogs gang du/
92b1(rgyud): bsams pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na mod la bkug par 'gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro// gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam gnas pa'ig na'ang /
92b2(rgyud): gdon mi 'tshal bar de zhag gsum gyis mchi bar 'gyur te yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// lag pa g.yas pa 'am/ lag pa g.yon pa la ge'u wang gi ril bu btags na gang du reg par nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang /
92b3(rgyud): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / shang ka shi la dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lhub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro// byan tshang du zhuH
92b4(rgyud): nas tshang mang gi sgor thal mo brdabs na/ 'tshed pa dang 'tshed pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der mtsha bar 'gyur ro// spos 'tshong gi tshong khang mang du mchis na tshong khang
92b5(rgyud): gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// chang 'tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// bang ba'i sgor thal mo brdabs na 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// bcud 'byin
92b6(rgyud): pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyis na/ bu ram gyi khu ba dang sha kha re'i glegs bu thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab
92b7(rgyud): tshuchub na thal mo brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid sgrogs par 'gyur ro// dgra bo'i sgor btab na bskrad par 'gyur ro// mtshon mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na mtshon cha dang go cha rnams rengs pa dang
93a1(rgyud): rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// rgyal por sgor btab na pas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / sems can gdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis/
93a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dung la byugs nas gnas mthon por bus na sgra gang du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / gnod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / byad dang / dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / nad las yongs
93a3(rgyud): su thar bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bus na yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyugs lhas su bus na 'o ma thams cad phrogs par 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal
93a4(rgyud): ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// ra lug gi lhas su bus nAr lug gi 'o ma phrogs par 'gyur te/ gang 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bus na thams cad sgren mor gyur nas gos
93a5(rgyud): thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// rdza rngal byugs te 'khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad bcings pa dang bshig par 'gyur te tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// dpag
93a6(rgyud): tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro// grong khyer ram yul 'khor mtha' dag tu bus na nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab
93a7(rgyud): mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi ngas dang mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong bdag bgyid par 'gyur te/ ma/
93b1(rgyud): cang la sbyar bar 'gyi'o// de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong bzhi pa dang rgyas pa nang thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ lams kyi na dang gnod pa thams cad rab tun
93b2(rgyud): bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed thams cad rlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang
93b3(rgyud): gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/ spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la/ gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag cing / sems can thams cad
93b4(rgyud): la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying gdungs pas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste/ arga'i shing dang / sha mi'i shing dang / shing 'o ma can nam/ ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste/ de dag gi yam sreg shing
93b5(rgyud): gi me spar la/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar du bsres par sbyin sreg bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/
93b6(rgyud): de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo // de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i mod kho nar dpag tshad gcig
93b7(rgyud): khor yug tu yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'tsho ba dang / nad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad pa dang / rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams
94a1(rgyud): cang dang / chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun mo dang / gcan gzan gdug pa can dang / sbrul dang / dug mi bzang ba dang / gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad/
94a2(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgyar khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/ gnod pas ma lags/ nad kyis ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon rnams
94a3(rgyud): kyis mi tshugs te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrug dang / 'khrug pa dang / smod pa dang / mdangs gcod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / bsdigs pa rnams kyis
94a4(rgyud): mi tshugs te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro// shin tu lo legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing / me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par
94a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang / shin tu smin pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshang
94a6(rgyud): tshing dang / myu gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchi ba'i reg pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro// yul de na dge sbyong dang / bram ze
94a7(rgyud): dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu nang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bde bar 'tsho ba dang yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro//
94b1(rgyud): byams pa dang snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha me yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par srung
94b2(rgyud): ba'i phyir rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi'ang dpung dang
94b3(rgyud): bcas te yongs su skyong ba dang / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i
94b4(rgyud): bu rnams rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i
94b5(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gzi byin stsol bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba dang / yongs su skyong
94b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par
94b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro//
95a1(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par dgongs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams/
95a2(rgyud): cad la dbugs 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba'i don du nyi ma dang zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas pa legs par 'byor par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa smra/
95a3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun du skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// yongs su bsrung ba dang yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yod/
95a4(rgyud): su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/ yang nas yang du lta bar 'gyur ro// de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang dri chu skyom bgyis te phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na mtshams chen po bcad pa bgyis par 'gyur ro//
95a5(rgyud): nad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na rims thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dri chab dang thal bas khrus bgyis na thams cad kyi sgrib pa
95a6(rgyud): dang sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btson ra na mchis pa 'am phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos la bskus pa na ral bar 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa dang dug gis myos pa thams cad la bskus na
95a7(rgyud): gdug par mi 'gyur ro// me dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod
95b1(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di ni ma bsgrubs par las rgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro// chos grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang // shin tu bkra
95b2(rgyud): shis mchog dge la// legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang bgo/ byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag/ sems can kun la brtse ba dang // snying rje dam pas brgyan pa dang // don yod zhags pa rig sngags che//
95b3(rgyud): grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal// bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag/ 'grub par bgyid de som nyi med// 'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag/ de bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na// lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyis//
95b4(rgyud): phyag na pad+ma rtag tu 'gyur// ji ltar gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la// bsod nams phung po khri khrag bskyed// dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pa dang // sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur// smyung ba
95b5(rgyud): bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig/ mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyis pa// dge slong pha dang dge slong ma// dge bsnyen pho mos de bzhin du// bde ba can du myur du mchi// sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur ba'i//
95b6(rgyud): mongs pa las thar bar 'gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas byang sems dag/ mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med// de nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ bzlas
95b7(rgyud): brjod kyi ni las bgyis na// rig sngags 'chang de nye bar 'grub// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi// mdun du balci'i dkyil 'khor bgyi// gru bzhi kho ra khor yug tu// tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis//
96a1(rgyud): gru bzhi lham par thig gdab bo// ngos bzhi rnams su sgo bzhi dag/ dbus nas ngos bzhir gshis su dpag// tsan dan dkar pos bri ba ni/ dkyil 'khor mchog la pad+ma dag/ 'dag
96a2(rgyud): brgya gum kum gyis gtor cing // pad+ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu// ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni// spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yi// yungs kar ldan pa gzhag par bgyi// a ka ru yi bdug pa dbul// bum pa gang
96a3(rgyud): ba'ang dgod par bgyid// me tog sna tshogs brgyan par bgyi// mchod yon snod kyang bzhi gzhag go// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur par// gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi// legs bkrus rnam par dag
96a4(rgyud): pa dang / gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang // dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal nas su// dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o// dus gsum bzlas brjod bgyi ba ni// don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag/ dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad/
96a5(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ mngon sum skyil mo krung bcas te// bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su// bgrang 'phreng bdag ni blang bar bgyi// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi/
96a6(rgyud): yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag/ ting 'dzin brtan pas lus snyoms par// legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta// tshig gzhan mi smra bzlas brjod bgyi// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la sa chen po/
96a7(rgyud): g.yo bar 'gyur// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te phyag bgyis nas chen po'ang g.yo bar 'gyur// brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags
96b1(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa mthong ba tsam du bris la/ ji tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas so// lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
96b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang de'ang cher snying dga' ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu rab tu dga' bas su
96b3(rgyud): zing zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du blta bar bgyi ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas
96b4(rgyud): legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mig bsgyur bar bgyid cing kun tu legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung na/ rig sngags 'chang gi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nas lus yongs su
96b5(rgyud): dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba sa ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// lus 'jam
96b6(rgyud): ba dang / shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang / mnyen par 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil ba dang / mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro// mig yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa dang /
96b7(rgyud): yid yongs su dag pa dang / gnyer ma dang / skra skya bo spangs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// ji tsam du 'dug ce na/ 'phags pa spyan
97a1(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchi ba 'am//
97a2(rgyud): mi gda' bar bgyi ba 'am/ lha'i mig 'thob pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ gzungs rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub
97a3(rgyud): pa'am/ gtsug lag smra ba 'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ gter smra ba 'am/ nor bsgyur ba smra ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ phug tu 'jug pa
97a4(rgyud): 'am/ klu'i gnas su 'jug pa 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dgug pa 'am/ srin po dgug pa 'am/ ro langs bslang ba 'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba 'am/ grong khyer du 'jug pa 'am
97a5(rgyud): sman lta ba'i phyir 'jug pa'am/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal po 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am/ yul gyi bdag po
97a6(rgyud): nyid dam/ dpung chen po rab tu gzhom pa 'am/ bslad pa 'am/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar gang du 'tshal bar yongs
97a7(rgyud): su skyong bar 'gyur ro// mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par
97b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal te/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la 'phags pa su na ras gzig
97b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas/ legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod
97b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bas mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun du bzlas par bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu po 'am/
97b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen nas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang /
97b5(rgyud): rlangs pa dang / dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas mig la byugs na nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//
97b6(rgyud): ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// phug gi gnas phye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar
97b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang /
98a1(rgyud): pas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// chos brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
98a2(rgyud): gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spya na ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi
98a3(rgyud): gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang / dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyis gzigs pa'i/
98a4(rgyud): byin gyi rlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa stong du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
98a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad pa thos par 'gyur ro// bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
98a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du lha'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// pad+ma snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa brtsegs
98a7(rgyud): ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rang gi lus rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhi ni thob par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spos cha ba des bum pa bkang nas lan drug khri nyis stong
98b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur bas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la lus rdo rje
98b2(rgyud): las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo khror 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'azung po'i gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyu
98b3(rgyud): ro/ lha dang klu thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam mam sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang brjed byed
98b4(rgyud): thams cad babs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bden pa 'am/ mi bden pa 'am/ yang dag pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa 'am/ skal ba dang ldan pa 'am/ skal ba dang mi ldan pa 'am/ byung ba 'am/
98b5(rgyud): ma byung ba 'am/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag/
98b6(rgyud): tu bgyid par 'gyur ro// yang na 'jig rten thams cad so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba 'am/ thams dbang du gyur nas gzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gan
98b7(rgyud): sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par bgyid par 'tshal lam/ don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'tshal lam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'tshal
99a1(rgyud): lam/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so ba bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don
99a2(rgyud): yod pa'i gzugs su bgyis te/ ral pa'i thor tsugs dang / ri dgas e n+ya ya'i pags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung ngam 'greng ba
99a3(rgyud): drung na nor bzang pus mo g.yas pa phab pa/ g.yon na khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ thams
99a4(rgyud): cad ring bsrel dang bcas par bgyi ste/ ri'i steng gi pad+ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig mchis te/ rig sngags 'chab
99a5(rgyud): gis pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// cha ba dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// snying rje chen pos gdungs pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o// gal te 'di lta bu'i tshogs mi bgyid na bkra
99a6(rgyud): pa tsam gyi mod la'ang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi cho gas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de
99a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/ lta bar 'tshal lam/ dge ba'i rtsi ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cad dge
99b1(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu gzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma
99b2(rgyud): 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ btsun mo 'am/ gzhan su'ang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te/ des ci 'byor pa'i gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa
99b3(rgyud): gzugs brnyan bgyi'o// de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ gur kum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ gru bzhi cha 'byes par li khris thig gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma'i 'phreng
99b4(rgyud): ba bgyi'o// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba'i dbus su ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang 'phreng gzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o// spos chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs
99b5(rgyud): par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o// pog por lnga las a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o// dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug spar bar bgyi'o//
99b6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas
99b7(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas phyogs
100a1(rgyud): bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dang sa chen po g.yos par 'gyur ro//
100a2(rgyud): bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral/
100a3(rgyud): pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyur nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan
100a4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// don yod
100a5(rgyud): zhags pa grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
100a6(rgyud): cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya rengs 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas pad+ma dri ma med
100a7(rgyud): pa zhes bgyi ba'i zhags pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// gang su'ang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras
100b1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na de na de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri bzhi stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen/
100b2(rgyud): bo'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lha 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// nang thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbesred pa bgyid par
100b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po brgyad pa/ des ci
100b4(rgyud): 'byor pa'i gser la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la/ de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la gur kum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa legs par 'byes pa
100b5(rgyud): byas te/ li khris thig btab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma bri/ pad+ma'i dbus su ril ba zing ka ra dang / bgrang 'phreng bri/ me tog sna tshogs bkram la bum pa spos chus bkang la me tog ci 'byor pas leg
100b6(rgyud): par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag/ mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bya zhing / bog por lda na sa a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o// spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam ste/ 'phags pa/
100b7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung bcas la don yod pa'i
101a1(rgyud): zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas te/ yid kyis phyag
101a2(rgyud): byas la lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' la 'bar bar snang ngo // de bzhin
101a3(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral pa'i gseb 'bar zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis
101a4(rgyud): pas ni dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mgo ba'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
101a5(rgyud): la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal ston par 'gyur ro// sangs
101a6(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni skya reng shar ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa
101a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ pad+ma'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// rgyal ba 'od dpag med le/
101b1(rgyud): so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro// lha thams/
101b2(rgyud): cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lus ston 'dod par 'gyur ro// nang thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs
101b3(rgyud): pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod
101b4(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du tsan dan dkar po'i dri chab kyis bkang ba gzhag par bya zhing mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o// me tog rdza
101b5(rgyud): tshogs bkram zhing tsan dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam
101b6(rgyud): par bya zhing / bdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu gzhag par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgya
101b7(rgyud): lan bdun bcing ngo // bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
102a1(rgyud): shar phyogs nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur zhing bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo // rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ming
102a2(rgyud): brjod pas dpag tshad stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba de byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa
102a3(rgyud): brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro//
102a4(rgyud): gang bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin dang srin po'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' las 'bab cing
102a5(rgyud): mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo'i lha dang nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad//
102a6(rgyud): lan bzhi bzlas pas klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo la sogs pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro// zangs las byas pa'i 'phag/
102a7(rgyud): papa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la tsan dan dmar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog dmar po bkram la bdug spos kyi snod bzhi nas bdug par bya zhing mar gyi mar me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis
102b1(rgyud): bltab par bya'o// mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o// don yod pa'i nags pa/
102b2(rgyud): phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bcing bar bgyi'o// ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la
102b3(rgyud): bya'o// phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o// sems can dmyal ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o// sems can dmyal ba chen po
102b4(rgyud): brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'i sems kyis blta bar bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing sgra grag par 'gyur la/ dmyal
102b5(rgyud): ba'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing bcom pa dang thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar
102b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing / sems
102b7(rgyud): can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas ni sa'i 'og gi sems can mun gnag pa snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod
103a1(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthus mun gnag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
103a2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi gnas su rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang 'chi ba spang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthu 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob
103a3(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing tshe bskal pa thub por 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing
103a4(rgyud): mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/ yang legs par btags la kun du ru ka
103a5(rgyud): dang / sra rtsi bog dang / gan d+ha ra sa dang / chu dang lhan cig sbyar te/ sha kha ra btab la legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du
103a6(rgyud): byas te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i thor tsugs dang / e n+ya ya'i pags pas bzhag pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad+ma thogs/ gnyis pa zhags pa thogs
103a7(rgyud): gsum pa gsal shing thogs/ bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa/ gdan pad+ma/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags me sgrol ma/ g.yon du dri med 'gro bya'o// 'jig rten
103b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni khro bo'i rgyal po'o// gong du ni 'od dpag med do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sum phrugs bgos la chos
103b2(rgyud): brgyad nas/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// spos sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing chon sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhagra
103b3(rgyud): dang / rig sngags kyi lha pus mo btsugs te gyen du lta ba bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i cha 'byes par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor
103b4(rgyud): khor yug tu pad+ma bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir spos kyis bkang ba gzhag go// sgo bzhir dri dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa gang ba gzhag go// dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mchod yon gyi snod brgyad gzhag go// me tog
103b5(rgyud): sna tshogs dgram par bya zhing a ka ru dang tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ 'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs
103b6(rgyud): kyis legs par brgyan par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan pa bzhag la mchod pa bya'o// ras kyi tshe na skud sna
103b7(rgyud): lnga pa/ srid du khru bcu drug pa/ thor to gcig tu gser gyi yang mig/ thor to gcig tu mu tig gi chun kor btags te/ sbrul 'khyil pa bzhin du bskyil la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ gtsang
104a1(rgyud): mas gos gtsang ma g.yog par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i nags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum rkum
104a2(rgyud): gnyis bcing ba byas la bdag srung ngo // khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas la/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang phyogs bcing ba'ang bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis
104a3(rgyud): rgyas par byas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ mi smra bar yungs kar 'bru re re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srad bu'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ skyong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang ras kyi
104a4(rgyud): srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa
104a5(rgyud): grub kyis long la dgos pa thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma grub pas/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams
104a6(rgyud): cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'ang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spos des dpag tshad drug tsam du
104a7(rgyud): khyab par byed do// gang la dri mnam pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / byad dang / dug dang / dbyig drug dang / phye ma'i
104b1(rgyud): sbyor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs
104b2(rgyud): lo zangs kyi gab tshe bzang po'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o// nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe gtsang mas khrus legs par byas te blang bar bya zhing
104b3(rgyud): dgos par bya'o// nyin re zhing dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang de'ang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su dag par sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing
104b4(rgyud): thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur te/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad+ma'i snying po la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang
104b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du tshe bskal pa brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'ang gang gis mthong ba
104b6(rgyud): tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa zad par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang /
104b7(rgyud): rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ rang nyid nor dang bcas/ dbyig dang bcas/ 'bru dang bcas/ bran pho dang bcas/ bran mo dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i
105a1(rgyud): me tog rnying pa de bsdus la/ gla rtsi dang / pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / ru r+d+ha dang / gur kum dang / spang spos dang / sA ma ka dang / smig ka dang / na la da dang / bo la dang / yungs kar rnams
105a2(rgyud): zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba'i ril bu ni dug med par byed pa'i mchog pad+ma zhes bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang dpal du byed/ nang thams cad sel ba dang rims nad thams cad nye bar
105a3(rgyud): sel bar byed do// brtsog shu dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / rkang shu dang / bol mig dang / lhog pa dang / de thams cad la ni bskus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo // nad de dag thams cad la
105a4(rgyud): khrus byas na sdig pa sel to zhes thub pas gsung ngo // tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do// thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang / bud med rnams dga' ba/
105a5(rgyud): dang / dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no// byang 'joms shing dug dang / dbyig dang / phyi ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba byas pa dag kyang de bzhin no// zas za ba dang khrus byed pa ni thig le'i byug/
105a6(rgyud): pa rtag tu byas na de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar thar par 'gyur ro// zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo // klang pa'i nad mi bzad pa la ni byug par bya'o// mig na ba la ni mig sman gyi thur mas so// /
105a7(rgyud): so na ba la ni khar mur ro// lto na ba la ni chu dron dang ngo // rtsib logs na ba la ni mar dang byug go// yan lag dang nying lag na ba la ni bsku bar bya'o// dbang du bya ba la ni lag mthil la bsku bas so// nad tshabra
105b1(rgyud): po che la ni bsku mnyes dang khrus bya'o// gnod sbyin gyi gdon bsal ba la ni snga nas gtang ba'i las bya'o// bdug pas ni gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyas thebs pa rnams la ni 'tshogs mar
105b2(rgyud): thig le bya'o// snying na ba la ni chu dron dang lan tshwa bsres pa'o// khyim zhi bar bya ba la ni 'bras yos dang gsum sbyar bas zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so// 'thab pa dang /
105b3(rgyud): 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams la ni ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ dri chus bkang ba bzhi gzhag cing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang pog por
105b4(rgyud): bzhi gzhag ste/ a ka ru dang du ru kas bdug go/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lung
105b5(rgyud): kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams la smra ba
105b6(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gal te brgya byin rang dang lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma
105b7(rgyud): yin na/ mi rnams kyis lha ci spos/ brgya byin dgug par 'dod na pad+mal lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te brgya byin gyi ming nas brjod la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhi 'dri chab
106a1(rgyud): kyang dbul lo// gu gul dang / mar dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shing arka'i me sbar la tshes bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang brgya
106a2(rgyud): byin lha'i dbang po dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste/ bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed de/ de ni
106a3(rgyud): sems mi bzad do// tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug ste mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// yid la ci 'dod pa sgrub/
106a4(rgyud): par byed do// gu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te khyab 'jug la bdug cing / chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor gtor na/ khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed
106a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to// hi ran n+ya ka shi pu la'ang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'jug chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na rna ba g.yas
106a6(rgyud): par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spyi bor gtor ro// gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing arga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// de nas dbang phyug chen
106a7(rgyud): po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du/
106b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag po chen po dgug par 'dod pas gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing /
106b2(rgyud): yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas nag po chen po'i steng du gtor na khug par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'khor gyi tshogs dang
106b3(rgyud): bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo bye bar 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa byed do// thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus 'tshams
106b4(rgyud): gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na mtshan mo'i lha 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
106b5(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnas so// mtshan mo longs
106b6(rgyud): spyad par gzhal med khang thams cad sbyin par byed do// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ khrus legs par byas nas bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la
106b7(rgyud): rtag tu brtse ba dang snying rje chen pos lhag par dmigs te bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// / de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/
107a1(rgyud): drag shul spyod pa/ srung gnang thams cad sel ba/ byad 'jig pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o// khyim srung bar 'dod pas arka'i yam sreg shing dang /
107a2(rgyud): pad+ma dang / yungs mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na khyim chen/
107a3(rgyud): po bsrungs par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / gdon
107a4(rgyud): thams cad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang / mi ngas dang / mi ngas chen po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i mi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang / skyab pa dang /
107a5(rgyud): sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po'ang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sku ston bzhed par 'gyur ro//
107a6(rgyud): sbyin sreg gi mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul dang / yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / yul gru dang / ri khrod dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
107a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba nya la me tog dkar po dang / gan d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang /
107b1(rgyud): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / yul gru dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// shing a ba marga'i yam sreg shing zho dang /
107b2(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa dang / me tog dkar po rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul gru stong thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar no dag sbrang rtsi dang /
107b3(rgyud): mar bsres pa dang / pad+ma'i sdong po'i yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo zad pa dang di na ra brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro// me tog ku mud dang / pad+ma sdong bu dang / rtsa ba
107b4(rgyud): dang / 'dab mar bcas pa dang / yungs kar bsres te shing seng ldeng gi me spar la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na log 'dren thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la
107b5(rgyud): smyung ba byas te/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas la/ gos dkar po bgos te tsan dan dang / pri yang ku'i shing dang / 'bras yos dang / mar dang / yungs kar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam byed
