107b6(rgyud): kyi dus su gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas zong lnga stong sbyin par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo chos bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du song la shing bil ba'i me sngar
107b7(rgyud): te/ bil ba'i me tog dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro// nam byed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs
108a1(rgyud): nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o// gdong du mig blta bar mi bya'o// yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dang / rkang pa'i drung du sdod bor nas btud de/
108a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe nam phyed na lan brgya rtsa brgyad
108a3(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad byed cing bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i chos bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste/ stong
108a4(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma'i cho ga yang gzhag par bya zhing / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa rnams las
108a5(rgyud): sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas te/ chu dang yungs kar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdabs na de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te blangs la/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sku bskal
108a6(rgyud): dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o// ba ru ra'i shing gi me s+phar la til dang / 'bras so ba dang / mar bsres pa la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dpung gi tshogs
108a7(rgyud): yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang bcas pa dang / dbyig dang gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// yungs kar dkar po dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang /
108b1(rgyud): pad+mal+li yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bras phub lan tshwa
108b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro// a ga ti'i shing gis me s+phar la sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang / arka'i me tog las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa
108b3(rgyud): brgyad byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na nyin re zhing de na rab rgya 'thob par 'gyur ro// ba la sha'i yam sreg shing dang 'bras yos las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na
108b4(rgyud): gser brgya phrag srong 'thob par 'gyur te/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing bgo bshab byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshes bco lnga zla ba nyal spyad byas te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ chu klu
108b5(rgyud): chen po'i nang rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas khros pas chu klung de la brdeb par bya'o// de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung
108b6(rgyud): nas rin po che mang po dag sbyin par byed de blangs la/ phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod par bya'o// tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la smyung ba
108b7(rgyud): byas te/ nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas a pa marga'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / sra rtsi phog bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
109a1(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas la/ rang gi ming gis sbyin sreg stong byas na sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyu/
109a2(rgyud): ro/ phyir rgol ba thams cad dang mi mdza' ba thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// shing arga dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro//
109a3(rgyud): 'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / yungs kar dang / tsan dan dkar po bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rgyas pa dang mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro// tshes bcu bzhi la ka ra l+li ra'i me tog dang / lan tshwa/
109a4(rgyud): sna bdun bsres pa dang / shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing yungs mar la bsres pas drag shul spyod pa bya'o// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe pad+ma dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig/
109a5(rgyud): bzlas te/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na ji srid 'dod pa de srid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// thal ba de blangs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam
109a6(rgyud): mkha' la gtor na ha cang char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// sprin la mngon du phyogs te gtor na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur
109a7(rgyud): ro/ gzhan gyi sde mnan pa ni til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa ni sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so// phug sgrub pa ni shing arka'i sbyin sreg gis so// arka'i lo ma dang mar
109b1(rgyud): bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu da dang / rgya spos dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur/
109b2(rgyud): zhingag/ sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// shing pa la sha'i me sbar te na le sham brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
109b3(rgyud): nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog dang / kar ni kA ri ka'i me tog dang / ut+pa la rnams mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgyad stong byas na zla ba dang nyi ma 'ongs nas mchog sbyin zhing lu/
109b4(rgyud): la 'od zer btang nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// a shwad thas yam sreg shing byas la shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / arka dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang / mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi
109b5(rgyud): dus 'tshams gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na 'bras so ba dang /
109b6(rgyud): yungs kar dang / lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bgyis te thams cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o// sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o//
109b7(rgyud): de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga'i rgyal po chen po ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa byang bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga
110a1(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ ras khru do gru bzhi lham pa/ kha tshar ma chad pa/ sgra med pa/ thags ran bzang ba/ shin tu dkar ba/ shin tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka' thub can/ bsnyen
110a2(rgyud): gnas la gnas pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ zas dkar gsum za ba/ dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsi snod gser par bzhag ste/ pir gsar pas 'phags pa
110a3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa bzhengs pa 'am/ bzhugs pa 'am/ skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa/ e n+ya ya'i pags pa bsnams pa/
110a4(rgyud): phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu drug pa/ zhal zhi ba/ spyan phye ba/ dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs pa/ zhal g.yas pa'i thor tsugs la zla tshes kyi
110a5(rgyud): brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o// phyag gnyis thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gnyis bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la/ mdzub mo g.yas pa
110a6(rgyud): brkyang ste pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bar na bgrang 'phreng 'dzin par bya'o// phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gcig na rtse gsum/ gnyis pa na pad+ma/ gsum pa na don yod pa'i zhags
110a7(rgyud): pa'i glegs bam/ bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba/ lnga pa na dbugs 'byin pa/ drug pa ni ril ba spyi blugs/ bdun pa na rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod/ brgyad pa na me
110b1(rgyud): tog sna tshogs kyi snod thogs par bya zhing / 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ sku me tog sna tshogs kyis bkra bas mdzes par bya'o// ri bo Ta la'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba na/
110b2(rgyud): zug pa/ khri 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang chu shing gi yal
110b3(rgyud): gas mdzes par byas pa/ g.yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma/ g.yon logs na zla ba/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag lag na me tog sna tshogs pa mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa
110b4(rgyud): bya'o// ri pad+ma 'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par byas shing sdong po dang ldan pa/ mtshos mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho nyas gang zhing chu srin ma ka ra dang / bzhad dang / shang shang te'u dang / ngur pas brgyan pa/ nor bu rin
110b5(rgyud): po che sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i ri de'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan dang seng ge'i khri bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyi
110b6(rgyud): brgyan par bya'o// nang gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// g.yon du dri med 'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin pa/
110b7(rgyud): dang / nor bzang pus mo btsugs pa bya'o// pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus kyi gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa bzhi pa lag na mtshon cha thogs pa ste/ zhags pa dang / dbyug to dang / rtse gsum
111a1(rgyud): dang / pad+ma'o// pad+ma'i stan la skyil mo krung byed bcas la/ lus cung zad btud pa mgo'i steng g.yas g.yon du drang srong bstod rabs byed pa bya'o// de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yon du/
111a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i zom chen po lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po dang / lha'i tshogs dag bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang ri'i bar du brgya byin dang tshangs pa
111a3(rgyud): bya'o// g.yor phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa brel pa bya'o// lha mo chen mo dpal dang / dpyad ldan ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dgas ni
111a4(rgyud): lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo bya'o// dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o// ri dang pho nya mo'i bar du srin mo ral pa gcig ma'o// ri'i khor yug gru bzhi rin po che
111a5(rgyud): sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing / ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs dang / me tog gis brgyan cing mtshe'u mdzes pa me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / seng ge dang stag gis gang ba dang / klu'i phrug gu dang grul
111a6(rgyud): bum dag bya'o// g.yon du gsang ba chen po lnga bya'o// 'og tu klu'i rgyal po chen po lnga bya'o// thams cad brag gi stan dang / lag na rin po che'i me tog gi phor pa thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o// 'phags pa/
111a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs te/ lag na me tog dang pog por thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o// steng gi bang rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba
111b1(rgyud): 'od dpag med dang / rashA kya'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la tshe rabs brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i/
111b2(rgyud): las byed pa de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ sems can drag pa rnams lta ci smos/ dad pas mos pa
111b3(rgyud): rnams dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon mang po dag tu shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag
111b4(rgyud): khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing / de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
111b5(rgyud): phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku'ang ston par 'gyur
111b6(rgyud): ro/ nyam thag pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro// nad kyis thebs pa dang / nad tshabs chen
111b7(rgyud): bos gzer ba dang / nang sna tshogs dang / sdug bsngal brgya stong gis dkrugs pa de dag thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las
112a1(rgyud): yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa dang nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag kyang mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// ras
112a2(rgyud): kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po dang / sil snyan dkrol ba mang po dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis legs par brgyan par byas te/ grong khyer chen po 'am/
112a3(rgyud): rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ ljongs sam/ khyim mam/ grong du zhugs na ras kyi sku gzugs gzhug pa tsam gyi mod la 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / mu ge'i dgon
112a4(rgyud): pa dang / mi ngas dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed
112a5(rgyud): dang / grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang / mi mang po bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su 'gro
112a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// 'di mthong ba tsam gyis shi 'phos nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya stong phrag bdun cu ra tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// /
112a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// pad+ma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi/
112b1(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// ri mo'i sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo'o// / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor
112b2(rgyud): ba shang par bya ste/ chu klung gi 'gram mam/ pad+ma'i mtshe'u 'am/ ut+pa la'i mtshe'u 'am/ me tog gi skyed mos tshal lam/ 'bras bu'i kun dga' ra'am/ khang bzangs gzhi dag cings gzhi yongs sbyangs pa
112b3(rgyud): rtswa dang / shing bal dang / skra dang / phub ma dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / phyag dar gyi phung po dang / gyo mo dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / thod pa'i rus pas gang ba dang / shi ba'i ro rnams spangs
112b4(rgyud): kha'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtshe'u dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu mdzes pa/ lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / shar phyogs gang na
112b5(rgyud): ljon shing gis mdzes par byas pa/ gang nyams dga' ba/ kha dog dang gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas chu dang yungs kar la bzlas te kun tu gtor ro// sa gzhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni mchog yin no//
112b6(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor na kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun chad phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// sdang
112b7(rgyud): ba thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang skad cig kyang mi gnas par phyogs bzhir byer te dong ngo // srog chags sdang ba dang / sdang ba'i sems can dang / sdang ba'i gcan gzan khro bo gang /
113a1(rgyud): yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro// gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bya ste/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ngos re re zhing khru sum cu rtsa
113a2(rgyud): gnyis gzhal bar bya ste/ tsha 'byes pa/ gru bzhi cha mnyam zhing mdzes la sgo bzhi dang rta babs bzhir ldan pa/ 'bras kyi phye ma'i tshon sna bzhir sbyar la/ de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis
113a3(rgyud): thig btab nas tsan dan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la tshes grangs dang rgyu skar bzang po gdams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// dang po ni dkar pos bril
113a4(rgyud): gnyis pa ni dmar pos so// gsum pa ni ser pos so// bzhi pa ni nam mkha'i kha dog gis so// lnga pa ni mig sman gyi kha dog gis te// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med par cha rnam par 'byes shing
113a5(rgyud): gsal bar pir gsar pa dang / tshon dang / snod gsar pas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa kho ra khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing / pad+ma'i 'phreng ba tshon gyis mdzes pa bris la/
113a6(rgyud): de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag med dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po gzhag go// g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
113a7(rgyud): cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer can 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha
113b1(rgyud): mo sgrol ma dang dri med 'gro bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen po dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang ril ba spyi thugs thogs pa'o// de'i 'og tu/
113b2(rgyud): srin mo ral pa gcig pa mche ba gtsigs pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba thogs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo rje dang / dgra skra dang / g.yas pa'i gung mo lha
113b3(rgyud): dang log 'dren la bsdigs pa bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis bzhugs pa/ 'od dpag med kyis thor tsugs brgyan pa
113b4(rgyud): bya'o// g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o// de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / lha mo dbyangs can ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo dang / 'bras bu dang me tog gi
113b5(rgyud): lha mo bya'o// de'i 'og khor yug tu gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa bya'o// ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong gzhag par bya'o// grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa gzhag par bya'o//
113b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar bar du lcags kyu dang / dgra skra dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dag bya'o// phyi rol tu tshangs pa dang / drag po dang / lha mo u ma dang / tshangs pa'i
113b7(rgyud): drung du lha mo dbyangs ldan ma khros pa'i gzugs can no// de gnyis kyi bar du dbyug pa dang ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o// grwa gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos
114a1(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs gzhag go// grwa gcig tu shi bA ba ha gzhag go// de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can gzhag go// lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po kaM
114a2(rgyud): li ki li zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa lag na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa thogs pa bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa pad+ma'i rtse mo nas 'dzin pa bya'o// khyang phyogs
114a3(rgyud): kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs lag na rdo rje dang zhags pa thogs pa bya'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ste/ dar las bcings la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
114a4(rgyud): dngar las g.yogs te me tog gi 'phreng bas brgyan nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag ste/ steng du sna ma'i me tog gi gdu bu gzhag par bya'o// tsan dan dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang
114a5(rgyud): ga bur gyi chu dang / pog por bzhi gzhag cing / a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug go// tshen sna lnga'i ras kyi srang bu mchod phyir gyi srad bu tshad du byas la/ gser gyi yang mig rtse gsum can gdags par bya zhing / thor to gcig
114a6(rgyud): tu me tog pad+ma'i gdub kor dang / mu tig dang / rin po ches spras pa zlum por bskyil ba bum pa'i steng du bzhag la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te/ yungs kar la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong
114a7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas te de la gdab par bya'o// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi'i phye ma'i gos la bgo bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par bya/
114b1(rgyud): zhig gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad gzhag par bya'o// ro dang dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba brgyad dang / zho dang / 'o ma/
114b2(rgyud): dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / gtor ma la sogs pa dbul ba sna brgyad dang / dbul ba sna drug cu rtsa bzhi pa rnams sha dang / khrag dang / kun dong dang / ke'u dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa spangs
114b3(rgyud): te gtsang mas gtsang ma sbyar bar bya'o// me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal dgram par bya zhing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lda ldi dang / ba dan gyis brgyan par bya/ bog por sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhag par bya zhing / bdug
114b4(rgyud): spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug par bya/ spos sna brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor yug tu pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bri bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos
114b5(rgyud): gtsang ma bgo bar bya zhing dus gsum du khrus byas la/ gos gsum bgo bar bya/ grogs gtsang ma bsgrub par bya'o// 'jug pa'i cho ga byas pa nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pos dbang bskur bas dbang
114b6(rgyud): bskur ba'i bar tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung zhing 'jig rten mgon pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang / pad+ma'i rigs pad+ma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i
114b7(rgyud): dngos grub la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro// gang bsams pa thams cad de kho na bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// dam tshig thams cad la don yod par 'jug go// chos nyid thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/
115a1(rgyud): gyi chos la dam tshig grub par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro//
115a2(rgyud): lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyi bsgo skal la dbang bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags la brten par 'gyur ro// brdeg pa dang / spyo ba dang / phur bus
115a3(rgyud): gdab pa dang / bsreg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du bya bas mi tshugs so// gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi lus sam mgo la brgya phrag stong gyur tu 'bab par 'gyur
115a4(rgyud): zhing / gzhan gyis phyir bzlas shing dgrol bar mi nus te/ rig sngags 'chang des dgrol bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang des ri mo'i gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas don
115a5(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o// de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khoragyi
115a6(rgyud): lha rnams las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bum pa de'ang 'bar la/ ras kyi sku gzugs de'ang kha dog sna bdun du 'bar zhing shas cher 'gul bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang snying
115a7(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur zhing / ras kyi sku gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod
115b1(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing / khyod kyis zhags pa 'da'ang grub khyod kyis ying bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di'ang grub kyis/ khyod kyis las thams cad byos shig/ dadakyil 'khor gyi chog/
115b2(rgyud): rgyas pa mchog grub nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba de thang la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te rgyu skar rgyal la khrus bya ba 'am/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes grangs shis pa la khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma med
115b3(rgyud): cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / dngos po lnga'i bdag nyid yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rna ba lnga yongs su dag pa dang / mig lnga yongs su dag pa dang / sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang / lce lnga yongs su
115b4(rgyud): dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po lnga yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing / rtag tu sku ston bzhed par yang
115b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par 'gyur ro// rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang de la srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro//
115b6(rgyud): brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi dpung gi 'khor dang bcas te sa'i phyogs der 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro//
115b7(rgyud): sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gsang ba pa brgya stong phrag ru ma srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur zhing / zhi ba dang bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro// shes pa don yod pa dang / shes
116a1(rgyud): rab don yod pa dang / thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur zhing / sbyin pa don yod pa'i sbyin pa por 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing 'di sa
116a2(rgyud): ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa la mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa/
116a3(rgyud): don yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum chog pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sa ya snyed sa ya brgya phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzog
116a4(rgyud): pa yang dag pa gzung bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya bar 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor/
116a5(rgyud): gyi cho ga'i cho ga zhib mo'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po dgu pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
116a6(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas/
116a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la pad+ma'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil
116b1(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga/ rig sngags chen po'i rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dus pa'i dbus dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de
116b2(rgyud): bdag gis yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das la lta ba bzhin du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di smras so//
116b3(rgyud): nam s+t+rai ya d+hA nu ga ta pra tiSh+Tha te b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaHna maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+har+ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yaHa tI tA nu ga mra t+yud pan ne b+h+yaHna maHsamyaka ga tA nAM/ na maHsamya ka pra ti pan nA rAM/ na maHshA ra dA ti pu tA ya ma hA ma ta ye/
116b4(rgyud): nam Ar+ya me tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yoHma hA bo d+hi satwa Ar+ya ga Na ba re b+h+yaHna ma Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA/
116b5(rgyud): ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA ri Shi Ar+ya go Na ba re b+h+yaHna mis+thi tA i dan Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khong+gIr+N+NaM/ a mo g+ha rA dza na nA ma hri da yan/ ta thA ga ta saM mu khaM b+hu Shi taM ma hA taM paR+Shar+Ya d+h+ye/ a ha mi dA nI mA bar+N+Na yi Sh+ya mi sid+d+haM tu maM man+ta ba dAH
116b6(rgyud): sar+b+ba kAr+ya Ne/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sar+b+ba satwA mAn+d+ha rak+She b+ha ba tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bai ri bi ri/ pi ri bi gi tsi ri tsi ri/ pa ra ma ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ si ri si ri/ bi ra bi ri/ tsi ra tsi ri/ ma hA bad+ba/
116b7(rgyud): haste/ ka la ka la/ ka li ko li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa/ e h+ye hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ka ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma b+hAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/
117a1(rgyud): sany+tsa la san+d+hu la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+hA ra b+hu ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra ha ra ha ra/
117a2(rgyud): ha hA ha hA/ hi hI hi hI/ hu hU hu hU/ oM kA ra ma hA brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra kha ra da/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra dz+wa la dz+wa la/
117a3(rgyud): ta pa ta ga b+hA ga bAn/ so ma A da t+ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+man+na/ ri Shi ga Na a b+hurtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ duSh+Ti/ d+ha na da de ba ra Shi nA ya/
117a4(rgyud): ka kha hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi r-i d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ba/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha rau/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra ba ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka sa man ta aM ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shA
117a5(rgyud): ra ma he shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sar+b+ba sat+kA sh+tsa/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsar+tho pa sarge b+h+yaHsar+b+ba gra he b+h+yaHsar+b+ba byA d+hi b+h+yaHsar+b+ba dzA re b+h+yaHe /
117a6(rgyud): ba d+ha/ ban+d+ha na/ tA Sha na/ tardza na/ rA dza tsi ra/ taska ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka/ bi Sha shas+ya/ pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsi ra tsa ra/ an dri yau/ ba la bo d+h+yaM ga/ tsa tur Ar+Ya sat+ya/ saM pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/
117a7(rgyud): da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mon d+ha kA ra/ bi d+ha ma na bi d+ha ma na/ She Ta ba ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ ShaTha waH/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ e Ne ya tsar+m+ma kri ti pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi I shwa ra ma/
117b1(rgyud): tsa shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU tA ga Na b+hany+dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra ba ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha/ bi Sha ya ni bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe/ ta ya dz+nyA ba b+hI ta/ rat+na mu ku kum+ba l+yA d+hA ra/ sar+b+ba dzA shi ra si kI ta mu ku Ta/ ma d+ha/
117b2(rgyud): b+hu ta/ ka ma la~M kr-i ta ka ra ta la/ d+h+ya na sa mA d+hi bi mok+Sha a pra kam+b+ha/ ba hu satwa sar+b+ba ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ a hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma a ba ra Na Te shod+d+haka/ sar+b+ba bu d+hi pra mo tsa ka/ sar+b+ba A shA pa ra pU ra ka/ sarbA sa
117b3(rgyud): sa mA shA sa ka/ na mo sU te swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bshad pa tsam gyis/ 'khor mang
117b4(rgyud): ri dang nags tshal du bcas pa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung bar gyur to// lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / man da ra ba'i me tog gi char chen
117b5(rgyud): pos pus mo nub pa tsam bab par gyur to// sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa'i sgra dag kyang byung bar gyur to// mtho ris kyi lha dag gis kyang nam mkha' las bcom ldan 'das la rgyan dang lhab lhub dag gi char phab bo//
117b6(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gtsang ma de dag thams cad kyis legs so
117b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po legs so legs so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di bshad cing / dngos grub mchog gi cho ga zhib
118a1(rgyud): mo'i rgyal po 'di bshad pas rin po che'i char chen po 'bab po zhes zer ro// de nas de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du/
118a2(rgyud): khrus bya zhing zas dkar gsum za bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dpal lha mo bzhag ste mchod pa byas la/ yungs kar 'bru re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpal lha mo la/
118a3(rgyud): bskrun pa byas na chos bcu bzhi nas/ bco lnga'i bar du dpal lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur ro// sdig pa tham/
118a4(rgyud): cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// mtshams gcad pa dang zhi bar bya ba la/ a ka ru dang tsan dan gyi bdug spos bsregs la thal ba dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu gdab par bya'o// rims thams cad la bu/
118a5(rgyud): mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btags na rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la mar dang til mar la bzlas
118a6(rgyud): te zangs kyi snod du sangs rgyas la phul ba'i sna ma'i me tog rnying pa dang pad+ma ze ba dang bcas pa btab ste bcos pa 'di ni grub pa yin te/ zas dang / skom dang / bsku ba dang / sna nas gtang ba'i las bya ste/ nyi shu
118a7(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlas pas nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byang gcad na mar dang sbrang rtsi la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te lus la bsku zhing tshigrams dril la/ lus kyi dri ma phyin par bya ste/ gong bu las
118b1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan byas la lan bdun bzlas te mtshon gyis btab na dug sbyar ma dang / byang dang / gsang sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byad chen po 'jig par 'gyur
118b2(rgyud): ro// srung ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te de bzhin du mdud pa dor bar byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / dngang ba thams cad dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams
118b3(rgyud): cad kyis mi tshugs so// lho na ba la tshwa chu 'jam tsam la lan bdun bzlas te byin na lto ba'i nad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// dug gsod na chu la lan bdun bzlas te byin na dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing
118b4(rgyud): mi gdug par 'gyur ro// mig na ba la srad bu dkar po rna ba la btags na mig nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// sdang ba'i dug mi bzad pa la 'jim pa la bzlas te byug pa byas na dug med par 'gyur ro//
118b5(rgyud): so na ba la ka ra wI ra'i so shing ngam/ sna ma'i so shing ngam/ shing pa gu'i so shing la bzlas te zos na so nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// mtshams gcad pa thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i srad bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
118b6(rgyud): bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la btags te phyogs bzhir btsugs na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la tshon skung sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na gdon thams cad
118b7(rgyud): las thar par 'gyur ro// srog chags kI Ta dang / lhog pa dang / mgul pa 'gags pa la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling ldan par byas te byug go// mgul 'gags pa la bldag pa byas na mgul 'gags pa thams cad las
119a1(rgyud): thar par 'gyur ro// mig nang la spos chung ba/ shing ba la sha'i chu dang / pa la sha'i me tog gis bkru bar bya ba'am/ shing mngar gyi tshul lan bdun bzlas te bkrus na mig nang thams
119a2(rgyud): cad las thar par 'gyur ro// rna ba na ba la til mar dang shu ti zangs kyi snod du btsos pas rna ba bkang na rna nad las thar bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug dang / mi snyan pa thams cad la tshul
119a3(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkru ba byas na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpung dang / stobs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / g.yul ngo thams cad du ba lang gi lci/
119a4(rgyud): bas dkyil 'khor byas la bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas don
119a5(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo 'di mchod de bklags pa byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur te/ thams cad byams pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid du 'gyur zhing / thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro//
119a6(rgyud): zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// chu des bdag nyid la kun tu gtor te tsan ngan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te snying par thig le byas te/ rtag tu dran par byas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// khyim tham
119a7(rgyud): cad srung ngan pa dadang / nabu 'i dang / shings na'i me tog par dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na khyim bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ 'byung po'i gdon thams cad las bsrung bar byas par 'gyur ro//
119b1(rgyud): yang na las thams cad la nor bu bsgrub pa'i rdzas 'di dag bsogs la cha mnyam par byas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas las thams cad phyag/ dza sa dang /
119b2(rgyud): bi dza ya dang / nA gu lI dang / gan d+ha nA gu lI dang / ba ru Ni dang / in dra ba ru nI dang / gan d+ha pri yang gu dang / ta ga ra dang / tsakra dang / ma hA tsakra dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su mnad rnams bye ma zhib mor byas te/ char
119b3(rgyud): pa'i chus sbrus la tsan dan dang gur kum sbyar ba'i chus brlan te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar nor bur byas te/ yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas
119b4(rgyud): a ka ru'i bdug pas bdugs la de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du bzhag ste/ ras kyis g.yogs la grib mar bskams te blangs la yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun 'bras pa
119b5(rgyud): bya'ang khra ba'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas brjod byas temago por brdung na/ rgyal po btsun po 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ 'ogs pa'i'i 'jog rnamams
119b6(rgyud): cang dbang du 'gyur mo// blam gcig pur 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang gni byin 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang drug tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / ltu
119b7(rgyud): 'dun dang dbang thug can po'ang rgyab tu bya poban 'brang bar 'gyur ming dus thams cad du mtshog sbyin par 'gyur khyor rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba thams cad kyang d+hag tu ma thun par byed ci dang du 'gyu /
120a1(rgyud): byad mi bzang ba dang / dug sbyar ma dang / phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags dang / g.yengs byed kyis mi tshugs shing thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dpal dang / gzi byin dang /
120a2(rgyud): bsod nams dang / bkra shis dang / dge ba'i tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu ston bzhed par 'gyur ro// thams cad du dus thams
120a3(rgyud): cad na rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang po thogs pa med pa'ang 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa la btags na glang po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa dang dmag thams
120a4(rgyud): cad las rgyal ba chen por 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen por yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo chen po grub par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
120a5(rgyud): 'byung po dang / sha za'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// nam yang de la rmi lam ngan pa dang lhas ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// byis pa rnams la mgul du btags na gdon thams cad
120a6(rgyud): dang / rims nad thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / btsas pa 'phrog pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang
120a7(rgyud): zhing / srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// bud med rnams la ska rags gsar pa btags te khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gsar pa bgos
120b1(rgyud): te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag dang mchod pa byas na skal ba bzang po mchog dang ldan par byed cing bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ khyim thab dang rtag tu rjes su mthun par
120b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ khye'u dang bu mo yod par 'gyur/ shes rab mchog tu 'gyur/ thams cad dga' bas lta bar 'gyur/ de la bud med kyi skyon yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ phyi ma la de lta bu'i bud med kyi lus mi
120b3(rgyud): thob par shes par bya ste/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// nor bu 'di btags na thams cad du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur zhing dug dang / mtshon dang / mas mi tshugs so/
120b4(rgyud): dug byas pa'ang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu 'di btags pas dug med par 'gyur zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// tsher ba skye bar mi 'gyur zhing bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba mnan na chu la lan bdu
120b5(rgyud): bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad mnan par 'gyur ro// bzlog par bya na bal po se'u'i lcug ma 'am ka ra l+li ra'i lcug mas bya'o// dran pa bskyed na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
120b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ nor bu chu dron las btang ba byas ni bklags pa tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa srong 'dzin par 'gyur thos pa mang po rgya mtsho/
120b7(rgyud): bsags par 'gyur ro// rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na lus bsku ba byas na gang du zhugs pa der thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// pus mo gnyis la byugs na chu
121a1(rgyud): klung chen po bus mo nub tsam gyis pha rol tu rgol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te dmag gapa/ g.yul ngo'am/ tshogs pa'i nang ngapa'i khrod dang / tshang tshing dang / ri sul
121a2(rgyud): dang / dgon par phyin pa na bsgreng ba byas na bde ba dang bde legs su rgal bar 'gyur zhing / chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing bltar med
121a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// btson ra thams cad du song ba na byug pa byas na shing sgrog dang / khong sgril dang / lcags sgrog gis bcings pa thams cad chag grugs su 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la bskus na mtshon cha mi snang
121a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// mig gnyis la bskus na gnyid log pa'i tshe rmi lam chen po rmi bar 'gyur zhing / ji ltar bsams shing smon pa snang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par
121a5(rgyud): mdzad cing thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur ro// de la mig nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// kha'i nang du bzhag na gang na bslangs pa sbyin par byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa la dpral ba
121a6(rgyud): la byug pa byas na byugs pa tsam gyis 'bab par 'gyur te/ thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil du bskus na glang po che la reg na dbang du 'gyur zhing gar btang ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dpral ba'i dbus su thig le
121a7(rgyud): byas na 'jig rten thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur ro// mid pa la byugs na mgrin sngon bzhin du bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// 'o ma dang sbyar te mig la
121b1(rgyud): bskus na mtshan mo'ang nyin mo'i bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur zhing gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ klun
121b2(rgyud): gnas kyi mtshor bor na klu chen pos char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// char ha cang che ba'i tshe chu dang bsres te nam mkha' la gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro// sprin la bltas te ser ba'i rgyun la gtor na ser ba 'bab par
121b3(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// lag pa la btags na gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje ngar la btags te me'i nang du zhugs na mes mi tshugs shing tsan dan bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro// ral gri la byugs
121b4(rgyud): te g.yul ngor song na lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar gyur nas/ pha rol gyi dpung thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// nad chen pos thebs pa'i nad pa tshabs po che la bye ma byin/
121b5(rgyud): nand tshabs chen po las thar par 'gyur ro// tshad pa dang pho ba na ba la chu dron las btang na mod la yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// rtsib logs na ba la dar ba las btang na zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la ni zhun mar
121b6(rgyud): dang til mar las sbyar te bsku mnye dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba'i nad dang / snar blugs pa dang / byug pa byas na nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// phug gi sgor khor yug tu
121b7(rgyud): byugs la snying po lan bdun bzlas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas nas zhugs na phug gi sgo chag ste rang gi khyim ji lta ba bzhin du
122a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing sdang ba thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// khar bcug ste mi smra bar snying po'i mdo brjod par byas na yan brgya drug/
122a2(rgyud): stong bzlas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shing rta'i srog shing la byugs na g.yul ngo thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// zong la gton/
122a3(rgyud): na rin chen pos nyo bar 'gyur ro// bu mo'i gdong bkrus na mgo yang bar 'gyur ro// snying khar thig le byas na thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa/ las thams cad
122a4(rgyud): byed pa/ bdag bsrung ba/ gzhan bsrung ba'i nor bu gang dang gang la sbyar zhing bzlas na thams cad du bltar med par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams la ti la dang chu la lan bdun bzlas te byin na
122a5(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// byur ngan po med par bya na ras la dkyil 'khor zlum po bris la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar bzlas brjod
122a6(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya zhing / spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mer me bltam pa byas na bzlas brjod
122a7(rgyud): byas pa tsam gyis mod la byur ngan pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro// dbul ba nyams pa'i don dang / ma grub pa dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa bsal na gser ram dngul gyi
122b1(rgyud): bum pa spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 'brugs na/ de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing 'jig rten pa'i dpal chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad tshar gcad na til
122b2(rgyud): dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// nad dang gnod pa thams cad bsal na tshu la bzlas pas so// dus ma yin par 'chi bzhi par bya na dus gsum du lan gsum gsum du rtag tu bzlas pas dus ma yin/
122b3(rgyud): par 'chi ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcing ba dang / lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril gzhom na nyin re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so// rgyal po dbang du byas na lam po cher brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na rgyal po 'khor dang
122b4(rgyud): bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// chom po dang rkun po rengs par bya na rA dzA ko shA ta ki'i sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gis so// me rengs par bya na seng ldeng gi shing la bzlas te mer bcug nas bzlas na me rengs par byed
122b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// chu rengs par bya na ka la gi'i sa bon chu'i nang du btab na chu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// dug gzhi la na rma bya'i sgro yis so// mtshon rengs par bya na shing gnam lcags kyis tshig pa'i thal ba la
122b6(rgyud): bzlas te gtor na mtshon cha thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin sgrub na ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas na ting nge 'dzin stong thob par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'dod pa'i
122b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am// dge bsnyen ma nges pa lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa cha shin tu 'byes pa byas te/ tsan dan gyis mchod par bya zhing gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis
123a1(rgyud): mchod nas me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag la/ mchod yon gyi snod bzhi
123a2(rgyud): dang / pog por bzhi spos chu'i bum pa'i dbus su gzhag par bya zhing / a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// bum pa'i steng du bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhag par bya/ rgyan thams
123a3(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan par bya zhing / spos kyi mar me bzhi bltam par bya/ mchod pa rgya chen po bya/ ba dan gyis brgyan par bya zhing dkyil 'khor byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du skyil mo krung du 'dug ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa
123a4(rgyud): brgyad bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas bac+doMs byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sku ston par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshegs
123a5(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sems can brgya stong mang po gdul na ri'i rtse mor stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so// bdud la sogs pa sdang ba thams cad gzhom par 'dod pas rdo rje 'am/ mdung rtse gsum la
123a6(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas tsham rngam zhing khro bo'i rgyal po'i bsdigs pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ khros pas lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gsor te/ nam mkha' la 'phangs na bdud la
123a7(rgyud): sogs pa sdang ba thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro// las thams cad grub pa dang / gsang sngags thams cad 'grub pa dang / bsam pa thams cad 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
123b1(rgyud): phyag chu bcings te/ slong nyi shu bzlas na grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'dod pas grong sum cu rtsa gnyis bzlas ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskru/
123b2(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du spos chu'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan sku gdung dang bcas pa la mig gtad de khri bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro//
123b3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung mnan te khri bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bar 'dod pas/ phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mnan te bzlas brjod lan/
123b4(rgyud): stong byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul ba byas na/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing / thams cad du don yod pa'i zhags
123b5(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba byas na/ ma bsgrubs ma bklags par 'grub cing / cho ga zhib mo mtha' yas 'grub par 'gyur ro// snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtse ba dang / byams pa/
123b6(rgyud): dang / shes rab dang ldan pas 'di 'grub par bstan to// go cha bgos pa grub pa mchog thams cad grub pa thob cing bsod nams kyi phung pos 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thog mar khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas pas rtag tu
123b7(rgyud): mtshams gcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / yul bcing ba bya ste/ srung ba mchog tu dkon pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing go cha bgos
124a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dbang bskur ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad 'grub pa dang / dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro// thams cad du don yod rgyal po myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ phyag na
124a2(rgyud): pad+mas 'jig rten du bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa dang / dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// de bas na rtag tu khro bo bklag par bya'o// gal te dbang bskur bar 'dod na'ang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro//
124a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas bden pa ston par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo mchog las khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ shes rab dang byang chub kyi thabs dang
124a4(rgyud): ldan pas 'di 'grub par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan to// na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ Ar+yA ba le ki te shwa ra badz+ra d+ha re b+h+ya oM tsa ra tsa ra tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/
124a5(rgyud): ka la ka la/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra ti/ tsa re shwa ra/ e h+ye hi/ si d+h+ya si d+h+ya khu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/ d+hU ba d+hA ba/ ki Ni ki Ni/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha
124a6(rgyud): d+ha ra/ ha hA/ hi hI/ hu hU/ oM kA ra ma hA brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra tsa ra tsa ra ba ra ba ra/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sa pra ti miN+Da ta shi rI ri/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga bAn/ so mA di t+ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ bra h+man dra/ r-i Shi ga \u0f7f/
124a7(rgyud): de ba gaN+Da b+hu rtsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nata ku mA ra/ ru dra/ diSh+Ta bA sa ga d+ha na da/ de ba r-i Shi nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta ba lo ka/ bi lo ki te/ lo ki shwa ra/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/
124b1(rgyud): bAn+d+ha bar+d+ha ma d+hA Da mA taN mA dza ma mahA/ u ka/ bi la shas pa'i moHka/ ka Na ka m+b+ha ba la ba drugs na rgyas byas ma rba kA sha ka tam ta / sam stu ga ma nata maH/ kA thA shA ma na ma yis/
124b2(rgyud): li/ e Ni ya tsarma kri ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ maT maT/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ shwe ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA shi ra si kri ta/ ka ra bu Ta/ d+h+ya na/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha a pra
124b3(rgyud): kar+ts+tsha Sha Ta bA ra mi tA pU raka/ ba hu satwA san ta ti ba ri pA tsa ka sar+b+ba mA rA da pra duSh+pa pra mdza ka/ sar+b+ba sid d+h+yA shA pa ri pu ra ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a b+hi She kir/ b+ha ga bAn ta/ a mo g+ha rA dza hUM phaT na mom+b+ha
124b4(rgyud): te swA hA/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga snga ma de lta bus las thams cad pa don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo zhes bya ba grub pa mchog las thams cad pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga/
124b5(rgyud): tA yai/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwaR+Sha ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra d+ha/ pA sha ha s+phA ya/ ma hA shud+d+haHsatwA ya/ A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga bAn/ pad+ma ha s+ya/ ba rad ka r-I gu le/ baH/
124b6(rgyud): b+hu dze ma hA ba shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ pra sI da/ shI g+h+raM AM gats+tsha/ ma hA bi ga/ bi bA sha ta rash+mi/ ha sa ha sa/ a mo g+ha shud d+he/ hi sa ha sa/ tsa la tsa la/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn/ a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ ma ma gan
124b7(rgyud): d+ha puSh+pa/ sa ma mardzi na ya ma pra tIts+tsha/ tri rat+na sa t+ye na/ a mo g+ha sid d+he swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa thams cad dgug pa la a ka ru'i bdug pa la lan nyi shu
125a1(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlas pas so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sad+ma gan d+ha ba ti sid ta/ a mo g+ha b+hu dza/ ba rat+na
125a2(rgyud): yaHsar+b+ba gan d+ha mA l+ya bi b+hU Shi ta pri ye/ tsan+nar+d+ha shi ri si bri ye/ gan d+ha gan d+hA nu le pa na sA ma ma pra tIts+tsha/ ba ra ba ra ba ra dA ya swAhA/ lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a/
125a3(rgyud): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sat+kA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hi lo hi li/ mi li mi li/ ma hA pra b+ha/ su bi ma le/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha le su ma ti ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ bi tsi tra puSh+pa mA l+ya bi b+hU Shi te/ ha ra ha ra/
125a4(rgyud): ma ra ma ra/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+hi hr-i da ya pra mo da na ku ru pra tItsA ma ma puSh+pa ba re swA hA/ me tog la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA/
125a5(rgyud): ya ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ba ra de/ sma ra sma ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ sa ma ya/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA shA sid d+he/ b+ha ga bAn/ a ba lo kA ya/ sar+b+ba satwA a ba lo ka ni/ a mo g+ha ba ti pA sha ha ste/ sid d+he sid d+he/
125a6(rgyud): sid d+ha ba ra da sid d+h+yan tu te/ bud+d+ha d+harma/ saM g+ha sa t+yen tu ru tu ru/ sa t+ya sa ma ya pA la ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bya ba'i rig sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a/
125a7(rgyud): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+hu re d+hu re/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma dza be/ bi ga tA ba ra de/ be ga be ga/ d+hu Tu d+hu Tu/ sar+b+ba bi dza pri ye/ bud+d+ha d+harma/ saM g+ha sa t+ye na/ mi li mi li/
125b1(rgyud): sAhAhA gtor ma'i sngags te lan bdun 'azlas te sbyin mo/ na mo rat+natra sA ya/ na ma AR+tha a ba lo ka te shwa d+ha ye/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA la/ a pra ti ha ta/ ta thA ka ta dz+nyA na kA ya b+ha ka
125b2(rgyud): bAn/ A ha ra A ha ra/ pad+hA sa na/ pad+ma b+hu dzo/ shwe taM gi/ shwe ta sa? dzo/ shwe ta pA l+ya bi b+hU Shi te/ d+hu ma d+h+ya ma/ dz+wa la bud+d+ha d+harma/ saM g+ha sa t+yen sA hA/ mar me'i rig sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// na mo rat+na tra lA
125b3(rgyud): ya/ na ma A r+ya.a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA yau/ tad+ya thA/ oM bair dzir/ pad+ma pA Ni/ A ga bA ga mA/ a mo g+ha ta tA sid d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ga ga na ra sh+mi sany+tso da~M te/ sar+b+ba
125b4(rgyud): bi d+yA d+ha ra bi sho d+ha ne/ a mo g+ha sid d+he swA hA/ spos chu'i dri zhim po'i bum pa la lan bdun bzlas te khrus bya'o// khrus kyi rig sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shA rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/
125b5(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA k+Sha ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+hu me d+hu me/ d+hu d+hu me/ pad+me pad+ma nir b+hA se/ shud d+ha shud d+ha/ ka na tsa na/ pra b+hA sa bi ma le/ shud d+ha rA shI/ shu tsi shu tsi shu tsi go tsa ra sid d+he/ pad+mA ga bi ta khra ba ra Ni sAhA/
125b6(rgyud): gos kyi rig sngags te lan bdun bzlas pas so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki twe shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ shA me shA me ya/ sha na ti me/ ma ma sA s+yA na~MH/
125b7(rgyud): ru/ shAn to si me sar+b+ba pA pa shan ta shud d+ha ka l+ya na bi ra dze/ shAn ti bi dza ye/ dza ya sid d+he/ b+ha ge bAn/ Ar+ya a bi lo ki te shwa rI ya/ sa ra sa ra sAhA/ mal cha bsngags te nya la na rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa
126a1(rgyud): thams cad mi mthong ngo // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ nA ga prA ka ra Sha Ne/ di bya dza le/ dza lA ba he/ dza
126a2(rgyud): saM k+Sho ba ya na nA ga dza la saM sho d+ha ni pad+ma sa re/ pad+ma bi shud d+he/ pA Ni dza le saM sho d+ha ya/ Ad man d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa le le swA hA/ chu'i sngags te khrus dang dbang bskur ba'i chu blangs la lan bdun bzlas te spyad do//
126a3(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya kho d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sar+b+ba satwAM hi taM ka rA ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra pra dA ya/ sar+b+ba satwAM man na pA na pra dA ya/ de ba nA gA da ya b+ho dz+ya ba~M d+hi d+ha ra/
126a4(rgyud): sA nu pra dA ya/ sa ka laM b+hu ba ni/ b+hu ba na bi sho d+ha ni/ san+ta dzA ya pra ba ra bi shud d+hi swA hA/ dbul ba'i gsang sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rAH/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/
126a5(rgyud): ya sar+b+ba de b+h+ra su ra na ma smi te/ sa ma sa man+ta pra pU ra Ne/ sa ma gan d+hA ba b+hA si te/ ga ga na bi shud d+he/ muk+ti pra b+he/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dza ya nir mA l+yo ba na ya ti/ puSh+pa mA l+ya gan d+ha bi sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi shud
126a6(rgyud): d+he pad+ma bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ me tog rnying pa dor ba'i rig sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra Ni na d+ha re d+ha ra Ni ban d+he khan d+ha ban
126a7(rgyud): d+hashu kra bi sho d+ha ni/ shu kra mA li ling gi ti/ shu kra bi sho d+ha ni/ shud d+ha bi ma le swA hA/ rtsa ku sha 'am/ ras kyi srang bu 'am/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srang bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi
126b1(rgyud): gu rtsa gcig bor ba byas na khu chu 'gags par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki he shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya b+hU/ dzA le dz+wA le/ bi ma le dz+wa le/ pra b+hA sa/
126b2(rgyud): bi radza/ sUr+yA ba ti/ dza ya pad+ma mA la d+ha re swA hA/ me'i sbyin sreg gi thal ba la lan bdun bzlas te kun tu gtor na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis nam yang mi tshugs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ni ma
126b3(rgyud): Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwo ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dza le dza le/ dza la ba ti/ dza la pra b+hA ba ni/ n+ta ga sra ga Ni/ di byA bA ri Ni/ mi li mi li sA hA/ nye reg gi rig sngags so// na ma/
126b4(rgyud): rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ri Ni ha ri Ni/ piM ga li paM ga li/ hi ri hi ri/ b+ha ga bAn ni tsa la pra tsa la/ pra ti tiSh+Tha mAn rak+Sha rak+Sha ma
126b5(rgyud): ma bud+ha d+harma saM g+ha sa t+ye na swA hA/ stegs bu 'am rtsa ku shaM bting ba lani bdun bzlas pas stan gyi rig sngags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba maN+Da la ni bA si na de ba tA nAM/ na mo bid+yA de tA nAM/ sar+b+ba ka la
126b6(rgyud): ba sid d+hA nAM/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti/ pad+ma sun d+ha ri/ ma hA bid+yA de ba ti/ tsa la tsa la/ pad+ma sun d+ha ri/ be ga ba te/ su ru su ru
126b7(rgyud): sAhAhA/ nyin ma ning me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / gtor ma dang / spos chu bo la mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes pa dang / gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma mchod nas bzlas brjod lan bdun byas na nam yang bgegs tham/
127a1(rgyud): cad kyis mi tshugs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHkro d+ha rA dzA la/ na ma Amyas pa lo kI te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba bi dkul ba sha s+ya//
127a2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha hri da ya pra b+hA bi ni/ sar+b+ba big+h+nA na pra sha ma ni/ A ha ra saM ha ra/ pad+ma pi tho ba biSh+Ta/ ma Ni ka Na ka bi b+hU Shi ta/ ka ma la b+hu dze/ ta ra ta ra/ tA rA ya pa ra ma/ a mo g+ha hri da ya/ dza ye tre ne tre/ ba ra da b+hu/
127a3(rgyud): dzes+phA ra sA ra b+ha ga bAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ bi b+hU Shi ta ta nu/ ma hA b+ha ya ha ra/ a lo ka ya/ bi lo ka ya/ sar+b+ba satwA ba lo ka ni/ ba ra ba ra de swAhA/ las thams cad
127a4(rgyud): pa'i rig sngags te/ sgrub pa'i dus su khyad par du ni rig sngags 'das dkyil 'khor gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i las mi rnams bsrung bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/
127a5(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ pa ra pa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha sa man+te na/ a mo b+ha pA sha ha ste/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha sa t+ye na sA hA/ thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te don
127a6(rgyud): yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas yul bcing ngo // na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ di shwa ban d+ha ni/ a mo g+he/ a pra ti ha te/ mu ru mu
127a7(rgyud): ru su ru su ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sar+b+ba big+h+nan pi nA sha Ni/ pad+ma sa ra bi b+hU Shi te/ bud+d+ha d+harmA saM g+ha sa t+ye na ban d+ha/ a dzi ta ba ba de swAhA/ spyan drangs te phyi nas phyogs bcing bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba
127b1(rgyud): lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ si ri si ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ba ra ba ra/ pra ba ra bi mA na d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+yA ba lo
127b2(rgyud): shwa rA sh+tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha pad+me swA hA/ me tog ci rnyed pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te snyim pa nas phul na slar gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo
127b3(rgyud): rim par phye ba'i cho ga'o// / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po khro bo chen po'i snying po'i mchog sgrub na sgrub sla ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshang par bya'o// cho ga zhib
127b4(rgyud): grub grub pa che// khro bo'i rgyal grub grub pa mchog/ don yod pa ni grub pa'i mchog/ rig sngags 'di ni bshad par bya'o// don yod rgyal po khro chen gyi// snying po dam pa grub pa na// cho ga zhi ba grub grub pa che//
127b5(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po grub pa mchog/ grub pa'i mchog ste don yod pa// rig sngags 'di ni bshad par bya// gang brjod pa tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo'i mchog thams cad 'grub pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong
127b6(rgyud): gis gzigs par 'gyur ba/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgya stong mthong bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba/ bsod nams kyi phung po bla
127b7(rgyud): na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/ stobs dang brtson 'grus bskyed pa/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad don yod pa de kho na nyid sgrub pa 'grub pa/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la ni// sa gzhi yang ni g.yo
128a1(rgyud): 'gyur la// sum cu'i lha rnams g.yo 'gyur zhing // lhar bcas rgya mtsho lhun por bcas// klu rnams 'dar ni yang yod cing // gnod sbyin srin po 'bros 'gyur ba// lha dang lha min
128a2(rgyud): g.yul 'gyed tshe// rig sngags rgyal po bla med kyis// phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bcas// dpung dang bcas shing bzhon bcas pa'i// lus skyes 'bar ba'i 'phreng can kun// 'dar zhing kun tu 'dar yed yed// rgyal
128a3(rgyud): po chen po bzhi po yi// gnas mchog dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // de dag thams cad 'dus gyur nas// 'jig rten dbang la skyabs 'dod zhing // bcom ldan mgon pos bskyabs tu gsol// thugs rje'i bdag/
128a4(rgyud): nyid bskyab tu gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
128a5(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la grub pa don yod pa'i snying po rig sngags rgyal po'i snying po 'di gang gis bklags pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po myur du rab tu 'grub cing //
128a6(rgyud): dran pa tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang lha'i lus kyis lus ston par 'gyur ba/ dngos grub dang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bcom ldan
128a7(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang du bsgrags par bgyi'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA yaM/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA/
128b1(rgyud): ru Ni kA ga tad+ya thA/ oM bad+me bad+me/ khad+ma d+ha ra bi b+hU Shi ta b+hu dze/ tsa ra tsa ra wah+ma ge Sha d+ha ga b+ha ra b+ha ra kho tsa tra ma~M la d+ha ba ma Ni ka na ka badz+ra be d+har+m+ma laM kri tA sha rI pa tA rA ta ra ta rA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti bA ra Nadzu/
128b2(rgyud): ru d+hur+ya/ a mo g+ha bA sha ham+me/ ba ra ba ra ba ra dA ya kaM/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ba ra da pad+ma sa na pad+ma go'u ra/ dz+wA la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka/ a b+hi Shi ka te/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka kha la ba la/
128b3(rgyud): ma hA be b+ha d+ha ra/ bi kr-i tA na ya na/ daMSh+Ta ka rA la ma hA te dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi pu la dza na ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra ba ra pu N+ya saM b+ha ra/ su ga ta d+hA na sam+b+ha d+hi/ sa man+ta a ga
128b4(rgyud): lo ki ta/ I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ duSh+pa di ma ka/ ro dra pra la da ma ka/ kro d+ha rA dza ma hA be g+ha d+ha ra/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA s+thA ma prAb+ha/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya a ti re ka pra b+ha ma la ma la/ sar+b+ba ma la bi shro d+ha ka/ sir+b+ba ro Shi ga Na sar+b+ba ti/
128b5(rgyud): ma hA ma he shwa ra rU pa d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha dzi nA lo kr-i ta dza TA/ dak+Shi Na tsan dU laM kri ta shi ra/ ma tha ma tha/ sar+b+ba yak+Sha rAk+ShA sa b+hU ta ga na b+hany+dza ka/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ga Na sa mA laM krA ta/ nak+Sha tra mA la sar+b+ba big+h+nAn bi nA sha/
128b6(rgyud): na ka ra/ pa ra mai tr-i tsit+ta ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ pa ra ba ra/ pa ri pUr+Na maN+Da la/ sau mya mu kha/ ShaT bA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ e Na ya tsarma ni bA sa na/ byA g+h+ra tsarmod ta ri ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba/
128b7(rgyud): lo ki ta/ tri ne tra tri shU la d+ha ra/ badz+ra dz+wA la d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra rU pa d+ha ra/ nA gen dra rU ba d+ha ra/ bi ma la bi shud d+ha de ha/ sar+b+ba pA pa shA ma ka sar+b+ba ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sar+b+ba ki la bi Sha nA sha ka/
129a1(rgyud): s+t+rai lo kya ba shaM ka ra/ sar+b+ba satwA bi sho d+ha ka/ bo d+hi satwA ba rad / sar+b+ba tathA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM pad+ma bi b+hU Shi ta shud d+he/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ a ba lo ki ya mAn/ sa ma sa ma/ sar+b+ba karma me sA d+hA ya/
129a2(rgyud): a mo g+ha p+la sha hri da ya sid d+hi/ gu h+ya na pi si ni ba rad hUM phaT/ na mo stu te swA hA/ grub pa don yod pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad ma thag tu 'byung po'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgeg
129a3(rgyud): dag log 'dren de dag thams cad khas bub tu 'gyel te gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing / gnas kyang 'bar bar gyur pa dang / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dga' bas ba spu langs te/
129a4(rgyud): skrag par gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / skrag par gyur pa'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong sa/
129a5(rgyud): bkong ba thams cad dang / rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / chu bran thams cad dang / lha dang klu gang dag chun gnas pa thams cad dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i lha dang / lha gang dag lang ka'i grog
129a6(rgyud): khyer na gnas pa thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad dang / gang dag gnas gtsang ma'i 'os kyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha'i lha thams cad 'khrugs par gyur nas nam ma
129a7(rgyud): las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la'ang mchod pa'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang /
129b1(rgyud): ul+lA pa dang / buTa'i ka dang / mnad ri ka dang / man nga rab chen po char dang / lha'i rgyan dang lgab grub kyi char bus mo nub tsam ri bo poT lar bab ste/ lha'i sipa snyan dang klu dbyangs len cing ha ha zhes ca co dang gnang /
129b2(rgyud): sgra bton nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad kyi ri du rig sngags chen po 'di bshad do zhes ched du brjod pa chen po cheng du brjod do// de nas ban/
129b3(rgyud): spyir gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der song ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod pa'i phyir mu tig gi /
129b4(rgyud): shal brgya stong ri ba phul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags chen po cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi mchog bshad do// don yod pa'i rgyal po rig sngags chen po'i snying po 'jig rten mgon po thub pa chen pos
129b5(rgyud): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag don yod pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa'i mchog las thams cad grub pa bshad du gsol// de nas de'i don du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
129b6(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po ras kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i mchog cho ga dang yo byad du bcas pa bshad pa/ ras gru bzhi pa kun nas cha legs par bye ba/
129b7(rgyud): kha tshar ma bcad pa/ sgra med pa/ ri mo mkhan gtsang ma khrus byas pas gos gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang ldan par byas pas tshon lhag ma ma yin pa sdod gsar par gzhag la bri bar bya ste/ dbus su 'phags
130a1(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs shing rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ thor tsugs kyi g.yas su zla chos kyis brgyan pa/ ri dgas e n+ya
130a2(rgyud): yayi'i pags pa gyon pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu gsum/ spyan gsum/ phyag bzhi pa/ ri'i steng na pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ zhal dbus ma zhi ba'i zhal bzhin
130a3(rgyud): 'dzum pa/ zhal g.yas pa 'jigs su rung ba/ khro gnyer can thor tsugs 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu zla chos kyis brgyan pa/ zhal g.yon pa 'jigs su rung ba bzhin bsgyur cing mche ba gtsigs pa/ rgyal
130a4(rgyud): 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/ phyag gcig na pad+ma thogs pa/ gnyis pa rtse gsum thogs pa/ gsum pa don yod pa'i zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzin pa la bcom ldan 'das zhal khri gnyer can don yod zhags pa'i
130a5(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag la spyan gtod par bya zhing / bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag tu bya zhing 'od 'dom gang 'khor yug 'bar ba dang ldan par bya'o// g.yas phyogs na lha mo sgrol ma 'gying bag dang bcas shing lus
130a6(rgyud): btud bar mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la mig gtod pa bya'o// g.yon du pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma 'dzem bag dang bcas pa gsang sngags kyi tshul dang rjes su mthun zhing don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag la mig gtod pa bya'o//
130a7(rgyud): lha mo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i bar du dri med 'gro bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i steng du khro gnyer can bya'o// phyogs gnyis par lha mo dkar mo lag na pad+ma thogs
130b1(rgyud): papabya'o// pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho nya mo gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang ba bya'o// ral pa gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed ma bya'o// gong du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang / brgya
130b2(rgyud): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
130b3(rgyud): phyug gi 'og tu 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba gang rgyangs can khro bo don yod pa'i rgyal po dang smra ba bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri bo bo
130b4(rgyud): Tal na gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mngon sum du mthong bar rig par bya'o// // 'phags pa ngan yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu pa//
130b5(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad las thar bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yongs su thar par 'gyur/ dam pa'i
130b6(rgyud): chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spong bas mthong ba tsam gyis mod la rnam par dag par 'gyur/ mnar med par gzhol ba'i mthar thug pa'ang yongs su grol bar 'gyur
130b7(rgyud): ro// tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
131a1(rgyud): mangs sum du smon par 'gyur zhing dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas me rabs brgya stong zag
131a2(rgyud): lha rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba 'di tha ma yin te/ 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur na/ lhag par mang du byed pa lta ci smos te/ de na
131a3(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen
131a4(rgyud): ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'am/ btsun mo dam pa gang la la zhig gis ras kyi sku gzugs bsgrub par bya ba de'i spyan sngar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran
131a5(rgyud): par byed cing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de la'ang mchod pa byed na/ des na khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag brgya 'gyur du bzlas shing / bzlas brjod//
131a6(rgyud): kyi chog chen po byas pa yin no// gang zhig khro bo don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi smra bar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te chus dbang bskur na/ des na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa/
131a7(rgyud): thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro snyam du de ltar shes par bya'o// gang gis don yod par grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen
131b1(rgyud): pa'i gzungs 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar mngos sum du thal mo skur te 'dug nas lan bdun du bzlas te 'askor ba lan bdun byas ga/ tshum mdzod yon dang wa/
131b2(rgyud): bshos dang / bdug spos dang / me tog phul nas phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras na/ des khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i zhags/
131b3(rgyud): pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs chen po 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
131b4(rgyud): zhal la mig gtad te/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis sbyar la snying khar gzhag cing tshul 'dis phyag rgya re re la lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/
131b5(rgyud): dge slong ma/ dag slong sa 'gadug bsnyen nas/ dge bzhinapa 'ag/ rgyam po'am/ rgyal mo'ang/ btsun po dam pa'am/ btsun mo'i 'khor sa rgyal po dang rgyal bachar po gang la la zhig 'bags pasdum
131b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brgya stong thag khri 'azlas brjod bya bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong phrag khris dbang bskur bar 'dod pa dang / rnam par grol pa'i kyi
131b7(rgyud): mtha' dgag ca gzhib po 'di thogs par lan tu slo badri 'azlas par 'dod pa dag dza med pa' 'gas pa'i bya tu ra rgya byung zag mi bya ba 'ad pa ri ras kyi su gzugs sa thun par sa
132a1(rgyud): ras kyi sku gzugs mngon du banag nas gnas gtsang zhing dper ga/ gnas sam/ chags 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sa pa/ bugags khyi'i rtse mo 'am/ gtsug la ga khang /
132a2(rgyud): bar btsang sbra dang byi dor byas te bser mo'i lci ba legs par mnyes la kha las byung ba lnga dang bsres te bsus la spos sna tshogs kyi byug pas byugs nas/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan kar
132a3(rgyud): bo'i dkyil 'khor bya ste gur gum gyis khru do'i tshad tsam bris la gla rtsi dang ga pur gyis mchod par bya'o// dri chab kyi bum pa dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ ras kyi mgul chings kyis bcings la dkyil
132a4(rgyud): 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya/ me tog dang / bdug spos dri zhim po dang / gtor ma dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba nyi shu rtsa gcig gzhag par bya/ dri chab kyis bkang ba brgyad phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o//
132a5(rgyud): 'oms bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bya/ stegs bu'i drung du 'o mas bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya/ 'o thug dang / sbyar thug dang / khaN+Da kha d+ya dang / 'bras chan dang / lag pan dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang /
132a6(rgyud): zhud mar gyis bkang ba'i snod gzhag par bya/ a ka ru nag po dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / ga pur dang / kun tu ru dang / shi ro bA sa ka dang / cung bad rnams sdong du bzhag nas/ a ka ru'i yam sreg shing gis sbyin
132a7(rgyud): theg bya me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya zhing mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskam par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas chos
132b1(rgyud): 'acu zhim/ ma rdza 'ga' bar du 'phags pa spyas dam gzigs kyi dbang byug gi mas su su gzugs la mchod par byag/ 'ag sung gsugs ma gas sa pa rgyal pa na bdun panas /
132b2(rgyud): dbang 'gyur bar bya dzam med pa'i 'gas pa'i byag rgyal nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ namam smra bar skyil ma krung du 'dug ste/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phreng po la nabargyam brgyung
132b3(rgyud): bzlas par bya/ de'i 'og tu don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byas na/ de nas ras kyi sku gzugs las 'od zer bdun byung nas kun tu snang bar bya ste lan gsum bskor
132b4(rgyud): byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i spyan du zhugs par 'gyur ro// zhugs pa tsam gyis med la sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang yang snying dga' zhing bsu
