132b5(rgyud): ldang bar 'gyur/ mdog mdangs yongs su dag par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gi sor mo las lha'i chu 'dzag par 'gyur/ zhabs gnyis las 'o ma 'dzag
132b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag 'bar bar 'gyur/ phyag na pad+mo'i pad+ma lo ma g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rtse gsum g.yo bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu les/
132b7(rgyud): so legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying ba grub kyis las thams cad phyes shig / khyed kyis don yang grub kyi cho gzhib mo'i rgyal po chen po dam pa grub bo zhes nas/ de nas 'phags pargya
133a1(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston par mdzad do// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do// 'di ni grub pa'i mchog bla na med pa ste/ ma bsgrubs par las byed
133a2(rgyud): pa'o// de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod pa na me tog pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te/ gang gi ming nas brjod pa dbang du 'gyur ro// snga ma'i me tog la la
133a3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul la/ yang lan bdun bzlas nas me tog rnying pa blangs te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa la byin na gdon thams
133a4(rgyud): cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis thebs pa la byin na nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor gtor na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mi ro bsrem/
133a5(rgyud): pa'i sa'i steng du gtor na sems can de sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// mnar med pa na gnas pa'i sems can la gtor na skad cig de la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// nyal ba'i sngas su
133a6(rgyud): bzhag na rmi lam chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par mdzad cing yid du 'ong ba thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro// skye ba 'am bud med gang gi steng du gtor ba de dang
133a7(rgyud): du 'gyur zhing grib ma bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i steng du gtor na bra bzhin du 'gyur ro// lha'i gzugs brnyan gyi steng du bzhag na 'gugs par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
133b1(rgyud): mig sun sgrub par 'dod pas ras kyi sku gzugs kyi phum thar mig ldan slong ros la spyong sa brgyad bzlas na grub pa'i rtags gsas smon par 'gyur te/ 'bar ba dang / dbu ba 'byung ba dang / rung pa 'thungs/
133b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ des mig la bslus na mi spang bar 'gyur ro// gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le byas na zug thams cad du 'jug par
133b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sgo thams cad dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// yan lag dang nying lag la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// spyi khor thig le byas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
133b4(rgyud): phyug gis rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// mig la byugs na khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed do// mtshan mo
133b5(rgyud): mig la bskus na nyin mo bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur zhing gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khas bub tu bzhag nas dor bar bya'o// rang gi lus la byugs na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du go cha bgos pa'i lus su
133b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gnang sbyin dang srin po la sogs pas mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur ro// yang na b.ra' ba dang snyib par bslu ba byas na nag po chen po'i
133b7(rgyud): gzugs su 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad kyi gzugs ston par 'gyur ba nas/ tshangs pa dang / khrab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs mang po ston par 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma
134a1(rgyud): zhon par 'gyur ro// slong ros dang / giru wang dang / so'u ba sa dang / grang sa dang / ga ku dra la ngan yong bar grub pa khri bathag/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snang ba sang chu brgyad brdag /
134a2(rgyud): kho'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te/ thams cad du mi smra bar bya zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar btags la ras kyi sku gzugs la mngon du phyogs te/ gtsang mas gos
134a3(rgyud): gtsang ma bgos la chos bco lnga'i nyal nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas nas phye ma zhib tu btags te/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dang / don yod pa'i grub pa'i rig sngags kyi
134a4(rgyud): rgyal po brgya ma brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag tu bzhag ste/ mchod pa chen po byas nas ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa byas la nyen zhag gcig smyung ba
134a5(rgyud): byas te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/
134a6(rgyud): 'bras brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la/ rmi ba 'gos bsngags lan bdun 'thal te/ de'i 'og tu mig la bskus nas don yod pa'i thub pa'i gsungs bzlas par byas nas bkrus pa tsam gyis 'phags pa sgyur
134a7(rgyud): ram gzigs dbang phyug poT la dang bcas gnas med 'ja dang bcag byang chub sems dpa'i tshags gzhal med 'a dang bcas pa'i 'am tha lan 'das pa mthong zer 'gyur po 'de ba ca gyi //
134b1(rgyud): bya layas mthong bar 'gyur na gad gzhan ga shegs pa 'ad dpas ya man 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ba/ sa pa shang pa des mos par 'gyur ro// gas 'a da
134b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bca/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur zhing chos 'chang ba'i gsung gi bla de'ang thos par 'gyur ro// 'don
134b3(rgyud): ngan gyi rigs su skyes pa dang / mnar med pa la gnol ba dang / mtshams med pa lta byed pa gang yin pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
134b4(rgyud): dbang phyug gis thugs rjes dgongs par 'gyur zhing rmi lam du ston par mdzad do// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur/ mchog thams sbyin par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i/
134b5(rgyud): dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ lha'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing lha'i bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nad kyis thebs pa thams cad la mig sman 'dis bskus na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing rims thams
134b6(rgyud): cad sel bar 'gyur/ dug thams cad la bskus pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad la mig la bskus na mi mthong bar 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / g.yo can dang / chom po
134b7(rgyud): dang / rkun po thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshon gdab pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug la mig la bskus na thams cad las rgyal zhing lan thebs
135a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo thams cad du mig la bslus na g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing dpung gi mchog rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i ba zang du 'gro ba'i tshomag pa
135a2(rgyud): bslus na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mi smra bar grong khyer du song na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo grong khyer na gnas so cog thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mig
135a3(rgyud): g.yas pa la bskus na rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gang mig gos mthong ba de thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mig g.yon pa la bskus na rigs ngan thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spya na ras gzigs dbang //
135a4(rgyud): byug gi phyag g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ don yod pa'i grub pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ des don yod pa'i zhags
135a5(rgyud): ba'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dang / gzungs thams so sor lan stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag drug
135a6(rgyud): cu'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ thams cad kyi ming bzung ba byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong mnyes par byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa bani mngon sum du/
135a7(rgyud): mthong ba thob par 'gyul 'jig rten pa'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ lhor gyi slob pas mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ rnams kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ tshe rabs tsho /
135b1(rgyud): sa skye badran par 'gyur tha thams cad kyang mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhig rab tu srung ba dang / srub pa dang / rma babyed par 'gyur ro/ phyag g.yon pa nas talan spong ma bdud 'bras btod byas na bzlas pa
135b2(rgyud): gyi ming la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa bkug par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur te gnas so// gang gi me dgos pa byung ba de'i mngon yod par gru ba'i ga sngags kyi rtul pa
135b3(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas pa byas na/ lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad kyang las thams cad byed cing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su mnan te bzlas na klu la sogs pa zla
135b4(rgyud): cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// snyan du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na gang dang gang du song ba der skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal mo
135b5(rgyud): 'al/ dge sbyong sa/ bram ze 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas gang bsams pa dang / gang bcol ba dang / gang smras pa'i las de thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// dbu nas bzung ste bzlas na tshangs pa'i
135b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi bar du dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ thams cad la dbang sgyur cing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// thog mar 'bral brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas nas bzlas pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis mnan te skyong
135b7(rgyud): phrag bcu 'azlas pa byas na sa 'og yan chad dbang du byas par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ mngag gzhug thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// pad+ma la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas pad+ma'i mtshe'ur
136a1(rgyud): bor na pad+ma zad mi shes pa 'byung zhing pad+ma dus thams cad par 'gyur ro// ut+pal la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas ut+pa la'i mtsho 'ur bor na/ usbal sngon po pad mi shes pa 'byun
136a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing nams kyang nyams par mi 'gyur te/ dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du snga ma'i me tog dang / gan d+ha bA rI ka dang / yu thi ka dang / na ba ma lI ka'i me tog rnams kyang dus tham
136a3(rgyud): cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur zhing zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// 'bras bu dang me tog la lan brgya rtsa bzlas te/ skyed mos tshal lam nags tshal gyi nang du gtor na/ me tog dang 'bras bu zad mi shes shing dus
136a4(rgyud): thams cad par 'gyur ro// dpal chen mo dgug par 'dod pas spra tshil las lha mo dpal chen mo skyil mo krung phyed du 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus btud pa/ lag pa na pad+ma thogs pa/ brang
136a5(rgyud): rgyas pa byas la 'bras bu dang me tog dgram par bya zhing ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / tsan dan dkar pos mchod pa byas la ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzhag par bya zhing / sngar tsan dan dkar po las byas pa'i
136a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul byar bya/ dpal lha mo chen mo la tsan dan dkar po'i bdug pa dbul ba/
136a7(rgyud): bya zhing gnyis ka la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya/ gtor ma dkar po dang dri chab dbul bar bgyi/ mchod yon gyi snod brgyad dbul bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma dus gsum du khrus byas shing gos gtsang
136b1(rgyud): ma bgos pas mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ gdon yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun byas la ci rnyed pa'i dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / me tog la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa
136b2(rgyud): rgya 'azlas te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i mgo la gdags par bya/ me tog gzhan gyis mchod pa bya zhing tsan dan dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'cha
136b3(rgyud): gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing / yungs kar re re bzlas la dpal lha mo chen mo la bsnun par bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang dpal lha mo chen mo 'bar bar 'gyur zhig/ 'a
136b4(rgyud): pabaspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad gang yin pa thams cad gser du sdang bar 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo ches b+ha kug par 'gyur zhig/ ji srid
136b5(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i dpal rjes su spyod par 'dod na nyin re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dpal lha mo chen mo la dus gsum du mchod pa bya zhing mchod yon gyi sgo
136b6(rgyud): kyang gzhag par bya/ dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya/ sbyin par bya/ longs spyad par bya/ bsod nams kyang bya zhing dpal lha mo chen mo la dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// yang na dpal lha mo chen mo rang gi
136b7(rgyud): gzugs kyis gnas par 'dod pas doran yod pa'i rgyal ba'i khro ba'i snying po srong rtsa brgyad bzlas par byaning can ngas kyi ril bu stong rtsa brgyad kyis bdug par bya/ yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad kyis bsnun par bya 'o//
137a1(rgyud): yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dpal lha mo chen mo rgyan thams kyis brgyan pa/ lha'i nor bu dang / gser dang / mu tig gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i lus snang la zhal pad+ma kha phye blta bu/
137a2(rgyud): spyan ut+pal sngon po lhar gsal ba/ pad+ma bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i 'od/ gdan pad+ma/ nor bu dang / rin po che dang / gser mang po'i pad+ma'i char 'bebs pa/ rin po che 'bar ba'i bum pa stong phrag brgya thogs pa/ lha'i bu
137a3(rgyud): mo dang gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong mang po thams cad lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pas lus gsal zhing 'bar la mdzes pa mang pos yongs su bskor ba mdun na 'khod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'jigs
137a4(rgyud): par mi bya zhing sems dga' bar byas la/ gsang sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA a mo g+ha ba ra dA
137a5(rgyud): ya tad+ya thA/ oM pad+mi Ni/ pad+ma ne tra pad+l-i ge/ pad+ma d+ha re/ pad+ma ba ti/ pad+ma pri ye/ pad+ma gau rI/ pad+ma pra b+he/ pad+ma sa na pra tiSh+Thi te/ a ba lo ki ta pri ye ba ra de/ ba ra dA yi ni/ pra si ta/ pra sA d+ha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta/
137a6(rgyud): ba ra de/ hu ru hu ru/ ba raM gi ni tsa la tsa la/ pad+ma bi b+hU Shi ta/ pad+ma pri ye/ bi tsi tra/ bi mA na d+ha re/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra s+dza sa ya/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA sa me/ sat+su a d+hiSh+Thi ta de bi/ a mo g+ha bA sha ba ra de hUM/ na mo stu
137a7(rgyud): te swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyis lha mo dpol chen mo phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ thugs las
137b1(rgyud): skyeb pa gsung las skyes pa khyod kyis don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po khro bo dang bcas pa grub kyis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pa dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs la zhugs shig/ nga'i gnas/
137b2(rgyud): la khyod rang gi khyim bzhin du las su bya ba thams cad byos shig/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// na mo raH
137b3(rgyud): tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+ha ga ba te/ mA tri dza ne tri/ ba ra ba ra/ a ba lo ka te ba ra de/ a k+Shi ri ni pra ba tu/ a ma pa/ a ma ba/
137b4(rgyud): bi bu la kI rti ka re/ pra ba ra b+hu dze/ a mo g+ha bA sha haste swA hA/ de'i 'og tu lha mo dpal chen mo'i nu ma gnyis las 'o ma'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i rgyun de khas bzed de 'thungs na/ 'thungs pa tsam
137b5(rgyud): gyis mod la lha'i me tog pad+ma dang ku mu da ltar 'jam pa'i lha'i lus su 'gyur/ sgra cung zad 'khyil cing 'khyil la mige ut+pal sngon po lta bu dang / tshig gsal zhing mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par
137b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mngon sum du 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo mang po 'grub par 'gyur/ cho lo stong phrag bcu thub
137b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thabs gcig tu gzhal med khang mchog na chos bgro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur//
138a1(rgyud): nor bu chen po badral lha ba zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur//
138a2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras su 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
138a3(rgyud): dang / mi 'am tsi dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi bu'i gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bu gcig pur 'gyur/ thams cad du stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa
138a4(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po cho ga zhib mo zab pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur/ lha thams
138a5(rgyud): cad kyi gnas dang / klu thams cad kyi gnas dang / mi 'am ci thams cad kyi gnas dang / phug dang / khung gi gnas thams cad sgo 'byed par 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad sgo 'byed par
138a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa bla ma gcig pu 'jig rten mgon po dang 'dra bar mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur//
138a7(rgyud): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa chen por 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin sreg byas na rig sngags 'chang de la bu bzhin du
138b1(rgyud): byams pas rang nyid bsnyen bkur yongs su spyad pas yongs su spyod do// 'dod pa thams cad dang yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu//
138b2(rgyud): dang mu ti ga dang / bai DUrma dang / shang kha shi la dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbrum dang / dngul dang / lha'i nor bu rin po che'i bar thams cad sbyin par byed do// yul ka shi ka'i gos bzang po mang po sbyin par byed cing /
138b3(rgyud): lnga'i bza' ba dang / btung ba'i bar dang / bdud rtsi'i ro'i bar du sbyin par byed do// gnas thams cad du song na'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar ma bul byams pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu phyin bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro bar
138b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi rang gi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can ji lta ba de bzhin du rig sngags 'chang gi gzhal med khang mchog tu 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas na 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin
138b5(rgyud): rgyas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dus kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje 'chang yang rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs thams cad dang / gnod sbyin chen
138b6(rgyud): po gsang ba pa'i 'khor rnams dang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye bas yong
138b7(rgyud): su bskor ba nyin mtshan du srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho nor bu chen po pad+ma la lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i skang po'i cho gzhig
139a1(rgyud): mo'i rgyal po bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
139a2(rgyud): drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
139a3(rgyud): nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis lha'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang / nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun dang / lha'i gser dang gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog mang po dang / lha'i gos dang / lha'i rgyan dang /
139a4(rgyud): lha'i dri dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa rnams re re zhing 'phang du ro'i rgyal po ri rab tsam gyi phung po byas nas/ de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
139a5(rgyud): drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la tshul de lta bus so sor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
139a6(rgyud): la nyin re zhing lo gcig gi bar du dbul bar byed/ mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i til mar rgya mtsho chen po tsam gyis bkang ba'i mar me bltam pa
139a7(rgyud): byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// gal te don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu chen po pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags
139b1(rgyud): pa'i snying po 'di klog pa dang / bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byed ba 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de dang ldan par 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin/
139b2(rgyud): gyis brlabs par 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur/
139b3(rgyud): dpal lha mo chen mo de'ang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dus kun tu de'i khyim du dpal gnas par 'gyur te/ gang na dpal lha mo chen mo gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag
139b4(rgyud): khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul phra mo dang mnyam pas phyogs de nyid du gnas par 'gyur te/ dpal lha mo chen mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// lha dang / klu dang / tshangs
139b5(rgyud): pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / drag shul la spyod pa dang / las sna tshogs gzhan dag pas dpal
139b6(rgyud): lha mo chen mo'i las mchog tu bstan to// dpal lha mo chen mo ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no// dpal lha mo chen mo ni don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa sbyin pa'o//
139b7(rgyud): don yod pa'i grags pa rgya chen po sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i nam mkha'i gzhal med khang 'chang ba'o// don yod pa'i yon tan bsgrags pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o// dpal lha mo chen po ni don yod pa zla ba dang nyi ma'i/
140a1(rgyud): 'od byed pa gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na dpal lha mo chen mo mchog tu bstan to// de nas rig sngags 'amang gtsang ma khrus legs par byas pa/ ni nus pasangs shing bal//
140a2(rgyud): byung ba lngas byugs pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya zhing / chang dang / sha dang / bag btsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u rnams dang 'dres pa dang / 'phags pa rnams yongs su
140a3(rgyud): spang bar bya/ kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa dang / gos ngan pa dang / dri ma can yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can ngan pa sten pa dang / ngan g.yo can dang / gsod skyon can dang / skye bo ngan pa dang /
140a4(rgyud): khrel med pa dang / snying rje med pa dang / byams pa dang bral ba dang / thub chod can gyi skye bo ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya/ gnas ngan pa dang / gnas rten ngan pa dang / 'gom nyes dang / bza' nyes dang /
140a5(rgyud): grib ma ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya/ gcig gis gcig 'bags pa'i kha zas ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing dri dang bdug spos kyis bsangs te/ mi smra bar bzlas brjod bya/ byams pa dang / snying rje
140a6(rgyud): ngang dga' ba'i sems dang / yid bde bar bya/ bkra shis tshang bar bya zhing / snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems su byas nas bzlas brjod bya'o// 'phags pa spyar ras gzis/
140a7(rgyud): dbang byug la a ka tshur 'dug pa dbul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mchim ma la can dan bye bdug spos dbul bar bya 'ong mchod yon
140b1(rgyud): rjod kyang bul bar bya'o/ sa jis pa'i ma tog dbul bar byaste// gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtswa gnyis bzlas te thams cad la dbul par bya'o/ sor shA sa pa/ nas ums pal kyi shAnas/
140b2(rgyud): bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puSh+pa bi lo ki tI/ gan d+ha sa re/ a mo g+ha dza la saM b+ha ra Ni/ pad+ma sam b+hu ri/ ta ra tA ra/ mu di ti b+h+rU~M swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mye tog
140b3(rgyud): bdug spos dang / dri dang / mchod yon dbul lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal
140b4(rgyud): bo lan gsum bzlas la a ka ru'i bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing / ci rnyed pa'i me tog dbul bar bya/ spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / de nyid kyi zhabs drung du skyil mo krung du
140b5(rgyud): 'dug la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas la snying po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ba byas
140b6(rgyud): na bcangs pa tsam gyis mod la sku gzugs g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sku thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur/ tho rangs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sgra ston/
140b7(rgyud): ra 'gyur te/ yid la bsams pa thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ 'dod po'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur dbugs kyang 'byin par 'gyur/ yid du 'ong
141a1(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshe 'di nyid la nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang /
141a2(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang dgra bo thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur//
141a3(rgyud): g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dmag gi nang du gtor bar byas na/ thams cad rengs par byas pa dang rmugs par byas par 'gyur ro//
141a4(rgyud): 'di'i snying po dang gsang sngags ni 'di yin no// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha hri da ya/ pad+ma ni ba ra de/ dz+nyA/
141a5(rgyud): la dz+wa la/ pra sa ri ta pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ snying po'i rig sngags so// oM a ba lo ki te/ pad+mi te/ ba raM gi ni tu ru tu ruM hUM swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i gzungs so// don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma rnam par lta ba'i
141a6(rgyud): dpal dri ma med pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i gzungs 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga zad par 'gyur/ lha mo dpal chen mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchog sbyin par
141a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dus kun tu sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug thams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad las yongs su grol bar
141b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ rims thams cad dang nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la tshon snga lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la gu gul gyis bdun/
141b2(rgyud): te mgul du btags na gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te nag po chen po dang ma mo 'ongs te rgyas btab pa gang yin pa'ang gdon thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// skud pa
141b3(rgyud): nag pos rims nyin gcig pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan dag la ni thams cad du srad bu dkar pos bsal bar bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad la gi'u wang la
141b4(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te thig le byas na thabra cad du thog pa med par 'gyur ro// snying khar thig le byas na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi mthong bar
141b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lag mthil la thig le byas na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la reg pa dbang du 'gyur ro// smin mtshams su thig le byas na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du
141b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mgul par byugs na rje'u rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dbral ba'i sgra mtshams su thig le byas na brab
141b7(rgyud): ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na dmangs rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje ngar la byugs na dpag tshad brgyar ngal ba med par 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur
142a1(rgyud): ro// rkang mthil la bskus na chu klung chen po'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho'i bar du brgal bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na gyad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro//
142a2(rgyud): pus mo gnyis la byugs na me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bar zhugs na tsan dan dang pu shel ci ji bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro// ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te mig la bskus na mtshan mo'ang
142a3(rgyud): nyin mo bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro// gter thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhing gal te de bskal pa brgya stong du bzhag pa zhig na'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lto ba la bskus na ji srid du lho chus ma
142a4(rgyud): bkrus pa de srid du kha zas dang btung ba mi 'dod par 'gyur ro// pho mtshan la bskus na khu ba 'gags pa byas par 'gyur ro// ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te 'thungs na lus dag cing dri ma med la gtsang zhing
142a5(rgyud): spyod pa gtsang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sgom nyes pa dang / bza' nyes pa dang / grib ma ngan pa dang / blta nyes su mi 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams
142a6(rgyud): cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ dug dang / dbyig dang / byad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ gsang sngaH/
142a7(rgyud): dang / sbyor ba dang / gtor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur/ pas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang /
142b1(rgyud): pha rol gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// nun mar dang sgang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te tho rangs kyi dus su ma smra bar byas nas thos na bklags pas tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
142b2(rgyud): sbyor ba zhag bdun du byas na bstan bcos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyor ba byas na gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par
142b3(rgyud): ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig tu sbyor ba byas na thos pa mang po rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba lo gcig gi bar du byas na tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad na bla ma
142b4(rgyud): gcig pur 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro// til mar dang lhan cig bskol te mgo la bskus na sgra cung zad 'khyil cing lcang lo can du 'gyur ro// bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la bskus na ston
142b5(rgyud): ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhing / me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ lus thams cad la byugs na mar dang 'dra bar 'jam por 'gyur zhing / rkang lag shin tu gzhon sha can du 'gyur
142b6(rgyud): ro// rna ba la byugs na rdza ba ji tsam 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/ snga nas btang na klad pa'i nad do cog 'jig par 'gyur zhing snabs dang mchil ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ lha'i spos kyi dri mnam par 'gyur zhing / rnams
142b7(rgyud): kyang yid du bo 'ong ba'i dri marnam par mi 'gyur/ gnyer ma dang swa dkar spangs par 'gyur/ so brgal ba'ang gsar du skye bar 'gyur/ lce bad+ma'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ ming pa'i nad dang ge 'gags pa thams
143a1(rgyud): cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'jam tsam du byas te rna ba bkang na sim par byed cing lha'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// de la
143a2(rgyud): bas na gi'u wang gi cho ga chen po bsgrub par bya'o// / de nas legs par grub pa/ mchog tu dge ba/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa grub par 'gro ba/ dge bar 'gro ba mig rkang zhes bya bar bsha
143a3(rgyud): par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod
143a4(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos shing khrus legs par byas pas kha zas dkar po zos la/ mig rkang gi ril bu khar bcug nas mdor bstan pa/
143a5(rgyud): gzung bar bya ste/ ji snyed bshad pa dang bklags pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ lce pad+ma dang ku mu da'i lo ma lhar 'jam par 'gyur/ mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ de las lha'i sgra'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/

144a2(rgyud): zhib mo dang / gsang sngags rim par bye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro// dus kun tu lus la thogs na mtshon gzas pas lus la mi tshugs so// chom rkun dang g.yon
144a3(rgyud): can thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur/ til mar dang lhan cig bskol te klad pa na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / mig na ba dang / klad pa byed na ba

144a6(rgyud): 'gugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spyan 'dren pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams lnga bskul ga rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi grub pa'i mtha'/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang /

144b1(rgyud): gdug pa'i dug rnams bzlog pa/ mame ba'i dug dang / gnas pa'i dug dang / 'gro ba'i dug thams cad la thogs pa med par grub pa/ rims thams cad 'joms pa/ khyad bar du rims nyin bzhi pa 'jon/
144b2(rgyud): pa/ bzhin dang bar byed pa'i gtso bo// gos bdug pa'i mchog/ gsang sngags dang byad thams cad dbang du byed pa'i mchog/ gang la rgyal po khros nas gshed mas mtshon gzas pa'ang bdug pa
144b3(rgyud): 'dis bdugs na de thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / srog chags lu'u ta dang / sbrul gyis zin pa dang / srog chags gon se dang / gzhan yang srog chags sna tshogs dug dang
144b4(rgyud): bcas pa mchog tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / gal te klu 'jog pos zin na'ang bdugs pa tsam gyis dug thams cad med par 'gyur ro// nad kun 'phrog pa grub pa ste// sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa/
144b5(rgyud): bsod nams phung po che dang mnyam// grub pa lha rnams kun gyis mchod// brgya byin sum cu'i lha dang ni// lha mi lhan cig g.yul 'gyed mo// bdug pa 'di yis bdugs pa dang // lha min de bzhin pa ma
144b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// drag po yis ni sum brtsegs bsregs// khyab 'jug gis ni ba li bcings// mi'u thung gis ni sa gzhi mnan// lha min dbang pos nyi zla dang // gza' rnams pham byas 'khrugs par 'gyur//
144b7(rgyud): bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyad par gyis// mi'u thung ni kun las rgyal// sgyu ma byed pa stong phrag brgya// rtag tu rnam par rgyas par byed// bdug pa'i rgyal pos skya bseng rnams// rnam par pham par the tshom med//
145a1(rgyud): bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// 'dren pas byams pa'i stobs kyis btul// bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthu stobs kyis// sdang ba'i bdud ni yang dag za /
145a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho rnam par dkrug byas pas// rgya mtshor gnas kun gcer bur 'gyur// snod gcig gis ni sum cha bskams// yid bzhin nor bu chud zos pas// don kun grub pa bdag nyid ches// bdug spos
145a3(rgyud): 'di yis bdugs byas nas// slar yang rang gi khyim 'ongs te// rtag tu rgyal mtshan rtser btags nas// bdug pa 'di yis bdugs byas shing // nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ni// rin chen bdun gyi char
145a4(rgyud): pa chag// de ltar bdug pa stobs ldan yin// las kyi don kun sgrub par byed// g.yul chen po lhung ba'i klu'i mtshor dga' bo dang nye dga' bos rgya mtsho chen po la lhun po chen po'i ri rab kyis srubs pra//
145a5(rgyud): dug 'dzags pa mgrin sngon gyis dug 'thungs pa bdug pa'i rgyal pos bskor bas dug med par byas so// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus bdud rtsir yongs su byas so// de ltar 'dug pa'i rgyal
145a6(rgyud): bos dug thams cad 'joms par the tsom med do// gling bzhi pa yi drang srong gis// des ni maN+Dal pham par byas// gtan byed la ni longs spyod pa'i// skra can dbang pos ltung bar bya// bdug pa'i rgyal
145a7(rgyud): po bsams pa yis// brdzun du smra ba de rnams nyams// de phyir bden par smra ba'i phyir// bdug pa 'di ni bden pa ldan// bden pa'i rgyal pos rab tu bsgrags// bden pa'i chos dang bden par sla//
145b1(rgyud): mtha' dag bsdus las byams pa'i sems// 'jig rten kun la rtag tu byams// snying rje dang ni dga' ba nyid// bdug pa gzhan gyis bdugs pa 'di// mtshon cha thams cad 'joms par byed/
145b2(rgyud): bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'dug pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po 'jig rten pa'i rtag tu tha mar gyur pa'o// sems can thams cad
145b3(rgyud): la phan pa'i don du rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi khyad par du dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jigs mi bza' pa dang / 'jigs pa chen pos sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / yi dgas kyi sdug
145b4(rgyud): bsngal gyi 'jigs pa chen po cher mi bzad pa/ rtag tu bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa/ kyi hud ces sgra sgrogs par byed pa'i skrag pa de la skyabs med do// sems can thams cad rjes su brtsa ba la
145b5(rgyud): brtan par kun tu blta bar bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs su gsungs pa ni bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o// bdug pa 'dis bdugs te gang gi don du ming nas smos pa'ang ma rungs pa 'am/ yang na
145b6(rgyud): byams pa'ang rung ste/ yid la bsams pa rnams sgrub par byed do// 'dis 'dugs te brjod pa tsam gyis mod la 'di rnams thams cad rtag tu 'grub par byed de/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsung dge
145b7(rgyud): ba'o// gza' zla ba 'am gza' nyi ma rgyu skar nyam nga ba la gnas pa sgra gcan gyis zos pa rnams dang / mi gang yin pa skye ba'i gnod pa dang / rgyal po 'am/ yang na bud med dam/ blon po chen po dang / blon po dang /
145b8(rgyud): sgraldan skye na 'o//
146a1(rgyud): bkrabs pa dang / mdun na 'don dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / skye bo gzhan dang 'grogs pas gnod pa dang / 'thab pa nyid dang / sdug bsngam/
146a2(rgyud): me bzad pas nye bar 'tshe ba la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs pas de'i skad cig la de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo // gza' ba dang btung ba shin tu zhim po thob ste/ gos med ma'i skye bos gos dang / rgyan dang /
146a3(rgyud): rdzas kyi dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byugs pa dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / khri dang / nye bar bsten pa dang / lhab lhub thams cad skad cig gis 'byung ste/ gal te yang dag par sbyar ba ma yin na'o// bsam pa dang / re ba
146a4(rgyud): dang / yid kyi shing rta thams cad mngon par smras pas 'grub par byed do// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsung ste/ rtag tu 'di dag thams cad 'grub bo// yi dgas rnams kyis zas rnyed cing / lha rdzas kyi gos dang
146a5(rgyud): rgyan mchog rab tu 'byung ngo // bdag gi sdig pa thams cad rtag tu grol bas dmyal ba las grol te/ dmyal ba mi bzad pa thams cad las grol lo// sdug bsngal thams cad las grol te/ skye bo bde ba la rtse bar
146a6(rgyud): bye do// bde zhing bde 'grer 'gro la bde ba thabra cad du thob par byed do// bdug spos 'dis bdugs pas mchog gi dri sdom par byed do// rdul dang mun pa can thams cad bdug pa bsdams pas sangs par byed de/
146a7(rgyud): dper na nyi ma shar bas 'jig rten gyi mun pa rnam par sangs par byed pa bzhin no// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing / dmyal ba thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / 'jigs
146b1(rgyud): bathams cad las grol stes bcu mtha bcang pade 'gro'i las bdang po bstan pa sa gyur bad pa thams cad kyis bdug pa'i rgyal po 'ang gyur ba bya'o// nga nas byang chub sa sa su dpa' sams da ra/
146b2(rgyud): popo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bdug pa chen po'i rgyal po chen po cho ga zhib mo dang rjes su mthun pa 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar mchod rten la sa'i phyogs kang
146b3(rgyud): du bdug pa 'dis bdug par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rtag tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang / thams cad du rgyal ba dang / de bzhin du lung bstan pa'i sa'i phyogs der gang+gA'i bye ma bye ba khrag khrig stong /
146b4(rgyud): snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa der rig sngags 'chang gis gang du bdug spos kyis bdugs pas rdo rje 'chang bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas pa dang /
146b5(rgyud): rtag tu ri gangs ldan dang / de bzhin du nor bu bzang po dang / lngas rtsen dang / gang ba bzang po dang / ke lI ki lA dang / gnod sbyin chen po yang dag shes dang / mi la zhon pa dang / sangs rgyas stobs dang / stobs po che dang /
146b6(rgyud): skra sgrig sbyong dang / na ba kU bar dang / rab 'joms dang / dz+yaT ba ka dang / stobs kyi lha dang / rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/ 'di rnams sde dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas/ bzhon pa dang bcas pas nyin mtshan rtag gnas nA
146b7(rgyud): de bzhin nyid du srung bar byed do// bdag gi dpal sa gsum gyi lha mo rtag tu mchod par byed do// rtag tu sa gzhi gang du bdug pa rab tu 'dug par bya ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin nyid du gsang ba pa dang / chos 'dzin
147a1(rgyud): pa la mkhas pa rnams rtag tu srung bar byed cing / de bzhin nyid du tshangs pa dang / drag po lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du khyab 'jug dang / lha'i ris sum cu rtsa gnyis po
147a2(rgyud): thams cad du dus rtag tu'ang lung bar byed do// zla ba dang / nyi ba dang / de bzhin nyid du sra gcan dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / mtshan po'i lha rnams kyis dus rtag tu srung bar byed do// 'jigs pa
147a3(rgyud): dpal mo dang / dung can ma'i lha rnams dang / dbyangs can ma dang / sa 'dzin gyi lha rnams dang / chu lha dang / ljon pa dang / nags kyi rtse mo'i lha dang / ri'i lha dang / chu klung dang / lteng ka'i lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu'i
147a4(rgyud): lha dang / lus ngan gyi lha dang / gzhon nu'i lha dang / lha'i drang srong bdag nyid che ba dang / lteng ka'i lha dang / chu klung dang / lteng ka dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / de bzhin du/
147a5(rgyud): lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed do// rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang ste/ sa'i phyogs gang du bdug spos 'dis bdugs pa'i sa phyogs su rtag tu lnga'i gnas su
147a6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs so// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / mgon po dang / bla ma dang / rnam par 'dren pa dang / 'jig rten gyi skyabs dang / mchog sbyin par de bzhin nyid du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gnas so// gnas de
147a7(rgyud): bdug spos gang yin pa de dag gis mchog tu bdug par bya'o// dri mnams pa tsam gyis myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo zhes so// sems can kun la phan ngon phyir// sdug bsngal thams cad ldog byed pa'i/
147b1(rgyud): rdzas kyi ming rnams bshad bya yi// mu dang mi rnams mnyan par gyis/ a ka ru dang rgya mos nyid// de bzhin tsan dan ser mor bcas/ theg nyid dang gi ha dang // kun ku ru bcas pa de'i mig yo dang ma yod /
147b2(rgyud): ngag de bzhin gur dkum na la nang // a run bcas dpal bskor ba// sA ma ka dang wang spros bcas// pri yang ku bcag tu rug// ka ya m+ba dang ba yamra// nam rung dgra sang bcus// ru d+ha a ka run pa nyid rdza
147b3(rgyud): dang ni gla rtsi nyid// laM ka gser shing 'bras bu dang // arka'i 'o ma gser 'o ma// sU ha'i 'o ma nyid dang ni// thod pa skal ba ldan nyid dang // so ma rA dza khyab 'jug gnod// shing dga' rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid//
147b4(rgyud): nA ku lI dri nA ku lI// tshangs pa'i bu dang ku mu da// pad+ma'i chu ba sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram dkar po'i khu ba dang // 'di rnams lhan cig sbyar ba yi// bdug pa'i mchog 'di bsgrub par bya// mkhas pas legs par khrus
147b5(rgyud): byas te/ gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bgos shing / zla ba nya 'am bcu bzhi pa// bcu gsum pa'am chos brgyad la// rtag tu sbyor bya nyin mtshan gzung // sngags la mkhas pas bdug spos 'di// so so so
147b6(rgyud): sor kun sbyar nas// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsang sngags dang // me tog bdug spos dri rgya chen// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis dang // gtor ma'i las la mkhas pa dang // mchod yon snong ni gang ba dang // mdo/
147b7(rgyud): la'ang dri dang til mar gyi// mar me legs grub gnas su ni// legs sbas gtsang mar gnas te sgrub// legs sbas gtsang mar gnas pa yi// slob ma mchog gi grogs kyis ni// don yod zhags pa'i
148a1(rgyud): spyan snga ru// 'dug nas yongs su dag pa'i lus// sdom dang byams pa'i sems bzhag nas// sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran sgrom zhing // gsang
148a2(rgyud): sngags bzlas pa mchog gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs te/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad// khra bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyan/
148a3(rgyud): don yod grub pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshig dang yi ge shin tu gsal bar bzlas nas/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma med pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas te/
148a4(rgyud): de nas gsang sngags 'di stong phrag brgya bzlas so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ a mo g+ha hr-i da yan/ tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sA d+ha ya hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA ya/ a mo g+ha pA sha haste swA hA/ de nas/
148a5(rgyud): gsang sngags brjod par bya ste/ mnyam par gzhag pa las thams cad la mkhas pas bdug spos kyi mchog la bzlas pa tsam gyis mod la bdug spos kyi rgyal po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
148a6(rgyud): kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa snang ba rgya che ba nor bu chen po'i sprin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs
148a7(rgyud): la/ 'phags pa spyan rab gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal po yin te/ thog mar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'di lan bdun
148b1(rgyud): bzlas te bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ ma hA a mo g+ha dza ya dza ya swA hA/ de'i 'og tu bdag rang la bdug na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlong par 'gyuraro//
148b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku ston par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang bram
148b3(rgyud): ze'i gzugs kyis de dang lhan cig smra bar byed do// gang la smras pa dang / gang la gtam byas pa de thams cad tshe 'di 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu mtshan mo rang gi gzugs ston par 'gyur zhing mchog
148b4(rgyud): thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// don yod pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa dmyal ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba zad cing mthar
148b5(rgyud): thug par 'gyur ro// gang bdag gis lus la bdugs pa tsam dang mthong ba tsam gyis mod la thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po btsun mo
148b6(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa dang / blon po dang / blon po chen po dang / bkrabs pa dang / bram ze mdun na 'don dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing thams cad 'gyi ba ci bachis zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur ro / gas ni
148b7(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro// chos bcu ban dang / bcom dang / chos brgyad la khrus lebs par byas te/ gos gtsang ma bags la/ ba las byung ba sngas byugs pas khyim rtse thugs su rtsol 'bar byas pa/
149a1(rgyud): me tog dang mchod yon gyi snong gzhag par bya/ gtor ba dkar po nye bar gzhag par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs cad la dmigs/
149a2(rgyud): te phyogs bzhir phyag byas la bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug par byas na/ bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshes
149a3(rgyud): pabapas yongs su gang ba la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa/ lha'i spos kyis bsgos pa/ mi mnyam
149a4(rgyud): pa dang mnyam pa'i bdug spos chen po tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gor shi sha dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / bdug spos mang pos nam mkha'i ngos khebs pas mchod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams
149a5(rgyud): dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'og min gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bar thams cad du bdug pa'i dris rab tu dga'
149a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skAr dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te/ 'di la tho tsam mi bya zhing yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// skad chen pos don yod pa'i nags po'i snying po bzlas pa byas na/
149a7(rgyud): des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ dus
149b1(rgyud): kun tu dgongs par 'gyur/ yang dang yang du gzigs pa'i phyir byon par 'gyur/ bde ba can na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbyu/
149b2(rgyud): phyug dag mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thugs rab tu dgyes par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub stsol bar mdzad/ gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro//
149b3(rgyud): klu thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur zhing ha cang char ches na gcod par byed cing / char mi 'bab na char 'bebs par byed do// rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin thams cad gcod par byed/ bdugs pa
149b4(rgyud): tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur/ ma mo'i gnas su bdugs na rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin thams cad
149b5(rgyud): gcod par byed do// ma mo'i tshogs dang nag po chen po la sogs pa 'gugs par 'gyur zhing dbang du gyur nas 'dug par 'gyur/ bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe bdugs na
149b6(rgyud): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/ thams cad du bdugs pa tsam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur/ thams cad du sbyar bar byas na kun du grub pa chen par 'gyur ro// 'dug pa'i tshe
149b7(rgyud): 'o// / 'phags pa da yang pa' zhags pa'i cho ga zhi mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu gcig pa/ de nas reg zugs 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i
150a1(rgyud): phyir thig le bya ba dang / gdong bkru ba dang / lus bsgru ba byas na ya lang dang go cha bgos pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad par bgyi yis/ bcom ldan 'das gsan du gsol// dod yod/
150a2(rgyud): pa'i nor bu rgya chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu gang sbyor bar byas pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa/ bla na med ga mkhas pas mdzod spu rnams su thig le byas na tshogs kyi nang dang / skye bo mang po dang /
150a3(rgyud): tshogs pa'i nang dang / dge 'dun gyi nang dang / de bzhin du rigs byed kyi tshogs bzhi'i nang du skar ma'i tshogs kyi nang na zla ba tshes pa bzhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa med do// lha rnams thams cad ya mtshan skye/
150a4(rgyud): drag po yi ni cod pan 'chang // 'jig rten mgon po'i g.yas kyi dbu'i// dbu rgyan rtse bran zla tshes bzhin// gdong bkru ba ni mchog yin no// zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// smin ma rna ba dpral ba dang / pad+ma dkar/
150a5(rgyud): sham shin tu 'jam// mig gnyis ut+pal sngon po 'dra// sems can thams cad dga' bas lha// dga' zhing rtag tu tshig btsan 'gyur// de yi mig gis gang mthong ba// thams cad dbang du gyur par 'gyur/
150a6(rgyud): skyes pa dag la bsku byas na// rtag tu rig smra blo che zhing // rtag tu yalang go bgos pa'i// 'jig pa med pa'i lus su 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni mi bzod cing // gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pas// rtag tu
150a7(rgyud): thub par mi 'gyur ro// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang // rtag tu sred med stobs ldan zhing // glang chen srong gi stobs ldan 'gyur// lha rnams 'dar ni yid yod cing // klu rnams mtshon skrag par byed// galaH/
150b1(rgyud): rig sngags smra ba yis// reg na ri rab lhur po yang // g.yo bar 'gyur ba the tsom med// rtag tu sred med stobs ldan zhing // stobs dang gzugs dang rtsal lngar 'gyur/ nor bu rgyal po bla na med/ 'ang thos pa
150b2(rgyud): tsam gyis su// sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing // dug rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// dpal dang skal bzang rtag 'thob 'gyur// gang gi lag tu thob gyur pa// sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhig de
150b3(rgyud): bzhin 'jig rten dga' bar 'gyur// de ni de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// thugs skyes gsung skyes sras su 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bla ma rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing // rig sngags smra ba
150b4(rgyud): dbugs dbyung phyir// de bzhin du ni srung ba dang // rtag tu mchog ni sbyin par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po thub chen gyi// bsod nams phung po chen po 'thob// gang zhig nor bu 'di 'chang ba de de bzhin gshegs pa
150b5(rgyud): badz+ra gra gi byem bye bzlag khrig partso song thab dru zhum pa'i spang las dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'brum ri bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad me zhi dbyasas 'byin par bya ba'i 'thang bar 'gyug//
150b6(rgyud): dpas dang skal pa bzang po thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur// rtag tu lus dang / ngag dang / ying yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa gcig pur 'gyur/ ram thams cad kyis tho mang
150b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur phya ga rdo rjem de la drug tu bzung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur/ phyag na bad+ma'ang rgya ga sum chos spyan par 'gyur ro/ ga sngags 'don de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
151a1(rgyud): lung bstar pa ste/ 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu chen po bzung bas spang ba bdud la sogs pa thams cad dang bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las rgyal te ba/
151a2(rgyud): rol pham par mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// 'di rnga bo che la bskus te brdungs na chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs par 'gyur ro// gang dag sgra thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi mtshams med
151a3(rgyud): lnga'i sdig pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang bya gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /
151a4(rgyud): dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / mnar med pa la gzhol zhing gnas pa dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ dmyal ba chen po bcu drug las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs/
151a5(rgyud): su grol bar 'gyur/ de la dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ me'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mtshon gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi
151a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 'di dung la bskus te bus na chos kyi dung chen po bus par 'gyur/ tha na dung gi sgra zos pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang slar ldog par mi
151a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ skyes pa dang / zung med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / nang dang / 'tshe ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dzin pa'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'don
151b1(rgyud): skye phyi ma yin te/ shinas thams cad ris mthunar par bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyikhams su padulas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ lus rjes bu chen po mtshan dang da'i brad kyi brgya ga rgyar thams na
151b2(rgyud): kyis klubs pa/ pad+ma las skyil mo krung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'od dpag med las mngon sum du chos kyi 'phel gtam thos par 'gyur ro// zla ba yar gyi ngol cod par
151b3(rgyud): dkar po bcings te nor bu chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas bsgreng ba tsam gyis mod la chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs par 'gyur ro// 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa mthong ba tsam gyis de
151b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba mthong bar rig par bya'o// 'di bsgrengs pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag
151b5(rgyud): khrug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas dang / mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba 'jig
151b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung dang ldan pa'i gdug pa'i sems can rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ drug mi bzad pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang /
151b7(rgyud): bye ba dang / sdig sbrul dang / 'bras dang / lo'u ta dang / dug dang / shu ba dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / me bgags pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur/ spang ba'i klu dang / ser ba dang / grang
152a1(rgyud): bdag / rlung gis mi tshugs shing nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde ba dang / dga' ba dang lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang / mi yang pos yongs su gang zhing 'byor /
152a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / zas dang / skom ro zhim pa dang / shin tu 'jam pa phun sum tshogs par
152a3(rgyud): 'gyur thams cad du lha'i reg pa dang bcas pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / 'phra men ma dang / yi dgas dang /
152a4(rgyud): brjed byed dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed dang / grib ma dang / bza' nyes dang / 'gom nyes dang / blta nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag
152a5(rgyud): thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ mchog tu yid bde ba'i gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro// yon tan dang phan yon chen po de dag ni nor bu'i rgyal po chen po'i byin gyi rlabs yin/
152a6(rgyud): no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan spyan bzhin mdzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la 'di
152a7(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i rdzas kyi mchog nor bu gdags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa/ bdag gi snying po chen po yid bzhin
152b1(rgyud): gyi nor bu chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa rjes su bsgrags par bgyi'o// gser dang / na la da dang / gi lu wang dang kha thA dang / khrong ros dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / gung/
152b2(rgyud): kum dang / nag bus pa dang / tA tsa dang / ta ra ga dang / tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / smig ka dang / kA la ka dang / tsurta dang / shu ti dang / pri yang ku dang / he Nu ke dang / sug smel dang / lo d+ha dang / dzA ta ba trika su
152b3(rgyud): man dang / sA ma ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / shing arka'i 'o ma rnams bsags te cha mnyam par byas la gser nyis 'gyur du byas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang tshes grangs shis shing dge ba la khrus legs par
152b4(rgyud): byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas nyin zhag gcig byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste/ phye ma zhib mor byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/
152b5(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gtor la dri chab bzang pos spangs te sbyar la/ gser dang bsres la ga pur dang gla rtsi'i bdug pas bdugs te/ nor bu zho gnyis pa'i tshad du byas nas phug la ras
152b6(rgyud): drung kyis btags te gser gyis g.yogs la/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro ba'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlal te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyam
152b7(rgyud): sngar mi smra bar bsgrub par byas la/ de nyid kyi zhabs drung du thob ma la bsam par bya ste/ byed ngam pani chagaser gyis g.yog par bya zhing byed g.yog par mi bya'o// gangol gser gyis g.yogs pa 'dzin /
153a1(rgyud): la don song ba'i nags pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las chen po sgrub par byed do/
153a2(rgyud): gser gyis ma g.yogs pas ni 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed de/ nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / lu ta dang / 'bras dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / shu ba dang / ldog pa dang /
153a3(rgyud): mtshan mar rdol ba dang / phol mig dang / sha bkra dang / mig nad dang / klang nad dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / mgul ba 'gags pa dang / kha nad dang / sna nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / so nad dang / rkan nas
153a4(rgyud): dang / lce na ba dang / mchun pa dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / gcin sgri ba dang / zug gzer dang / 'khru ba dang / bo ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum
153a5(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa
153a6(rgyud): rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lus kyi nang gi nang thams cad la chu dron dang lhan cig sbyin no// phyi rol gyi nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// thams
153a7(rgyud): cad du dgos pa thams cad la sbyar ba tsam gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ the tsomo mi bya'o// gser gyis g.yogs pa dpung pa la btags na thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur te/ spobs dang / brtson
153b1(rgyud): 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa phyag na rdo rje dang / pad+ma 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa bla na med pa rnam pa gsum po 'di la sbyar bar bya ste/ thig le dang / gdong pa bkra ba dang / lus bkru/
153b2(rgyud): ba'o// yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub pa ste/ the tsom mi bya'o// rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / skye bo dang blon por bcas pa rtag tu bgyi ba ci mchig nas bran bzhir du
153b3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// nor bu spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas rig sngags bzlas na bgegs med par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la btags te rig sngags bzlas na bzlas brjod kyi cho ga stong
153b4(rgyud): phrag brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te/ lan cig bzlas pas stong phrag brgyar rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mgul par btags te bcangs na khrus ma byas pa khrus byas par 'gyur/ mi gtsang ba gtsang bar
153b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ tshangs par mi spyod pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ thub par ma byas pa thub par byas par 'gyur/ smyung ba ma byas pa smyung ba byas par 'gyur/ tshig mi btsan pa tshig btsan par 'gyur/ ma grub pa grub pa
153b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ dam tshig mi shes pa dam tshig shes par 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ sbyin pa gang cung zad ci sbyin po chung ngubang stong phrag brgya 'gyur du sbyin pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/ pha rol tu
153b7(rgyud): byin pa drug rdzogs par 'gyur/ nor bu 'di lag mthil g.yas pa la btags na gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// su la'ang brjod par mi bya ste/ de'i 'og tu de dag thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
154a1(rgyud): rked pa la btags te chu'i nang du zhugs na chu klung chen po'i gting bslabs par 'gyur ro// de nas nor bu sgrung par 'dod pas dngul shin tu yongs su dag pa las pad+ma 'a dang pa sub cu/
154a2(rgyud): rtsa gnyis pa kha phye ba/ dbus kyi snying po dang ze ba za ma tog 'dra ba sor bcu drug pa'i tshad du byas la/ de'i dbus su gser gyi nor bu gzhag par bya'o// ba lang gi lci ba ba lang gi gcin dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor
154a3(rgyud): gruba'i pa byas la tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya ste// kho ra khor yug tu pad+ma bris la/ pad+ma'i dbus kyi bye bar dngul las byas pa'i pad+ma bzhag ste/ bum pa gang ba bzhi dang gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya'i/
154a4(rgyud): me tog dgram par bya/ tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pas bdug cing gtor ma dkar po gzhag par bya/ 'phan gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
154a5(rgyud): brgyan par bya/ mar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya/ 'bras bu dang me tog 'phreng sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par gzhag ste/ rig
154a6(rgyud): sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin mtshan gcig smyung bar byas la chos bco lnga nas/ nyi shu dgu dang gnam stong gi bar dus 'tshams gsum du mchod par bya zhing / pad+ma pa ma tog de
154a7(rgyud): dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'ang mchod pa byas la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su mngon du phyogs te 'dug la bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
154b1(rgyud): te/ yungs kar dang chus dbang bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan stong rtsa brgyad bya/ de bzhin du khro ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bya'o// mi lnga bar dgos pa thams cad byas ra de'i 'og tu chos ra/
154b2(rgyud): lnga zla ba nya'i nang par gyi dus 'tshams su nor bu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang bcas te gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'a
154b3(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas legs mo zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po mthong bar 'gyur/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma 'bar ba de lag pa g.yas
154b4(rgyud): bas blang bar bya ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis mod la nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gser gyi mdog can blta
154b5(rgyud): na sdug pa chen po mdun na gnas par 'gyur/ sdang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad zlog par byed/ 'khor bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur//
154b6(rgyud): tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i dri ma med pa 'bar ba'i rtse mo rnam par lta ba
154b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa 'thob par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis ngas
155a1(rgyud): 'byin par 'gyur/ nor bu chen po yongs su dag pa rdo rje la rnam par lta ba'i 'od kyi lus rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lham
155a2(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bgyi ba ci mchis shes dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ mgo'i spyi bor btags na nor bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nub phyogs su song nas bde ba
155a3(rgyud): can gyi rab tu dbye ba gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ legs par brgyan pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de
155a4(rgyud): dag las chos snang ba'i sgo'i chos bshad pa chen po thos par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang / rgyan dang / gzhal med khang ston par 'gyur/ mgul du btags na phug gi
155a5(rgyud): gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ thams cad du rgyal ba'i rje dpon dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ phug stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo 'bye bar 'gyur/ dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na mi
155a6(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur zhing lus mi snang ba gang+gA'i klung bye ba stong phrag brgya snyed kyi lus mi snang ba rnams kyi mchog rje dpon dang rgyal por 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung ngo
155a7(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad mi snang bar byas par 'gyur/ thams cad kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang sgo bye zhing 'dug par 'gyur ro// rked pa la btagra na gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ pus mo g.yas pa dang brla g.yas
155b1(rgyud): pa la btags na nags kyi dug gi gzhal med khang gi gnas thams cad kyi sgo bye zhing / sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na gnas par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ rkang
155b2(rgyud): pa'i rje ral btags na rlung gi phung po dang po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / cung bad tsam song bas dpag tshad srong phrag bcur 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur/ nyin mtshan gcig gis tho
155b3(rgyud): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rlung chen po'i shugs kyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis song ste/ slan yang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur/ thams cad du dgos pa sgrub pa
155b4(rgyud): thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// rkang mthil la btags na sa'i 'og gi dngos grub chen po thob bar 'gyur zhing / sa'i 'og phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur te/ rang ji ltar 'dod pa der 'jug cing 'byung bar
155b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// khar bcug na nyi ma re re tshigs su bcad pa stong lobs par 'gyur ro// mid pa tsam gyis thos pa rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro// lce'i rtse mor bzhag na lce pad+ma dang ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur zhing
155b6(rgyud): thos pa mang po 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lag pa la byugs na gang la reg pa de bgyi ba ci mchis shes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze thams cad bgyi
155b7(rgyud): ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// nor bu sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ bcom ldan
156a1(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod grub kyi bum pa rab mchog ces bgyi ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga chen po mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sring
156a2(rgyud): po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi mthu bstan pa ji lta ba der/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das bum pa chen po mthu sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lags/
156a3(rgyud): so// rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba lags so// de nas gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs sam/ kham pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan zhing kun
156a4(rgyud): nas shin tu zlum pa/ mgo 'am mgrin par phyin pa'i tshad shin tu 'jam zhing thag thug dang shang shong med pa/ dbyibs legs shing byi dor legs par byas pa/ kun nas yongs su gang ba la mtshal gyi tshon

156a7(rgyud): 'dab ma la dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / bram ze dang / lha dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / khyab bdag dang / brgya byin dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / lha'i tshogs
