188a5(rgyud): phrag brgya bskor ba byas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la'ang mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mig mi 'dzums par
188a6(rgyud): 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'jam po 'jam pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa ni rmang du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i cho 'phrul/ de bzhin
188a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
188b1(rgyud): dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bklags pa dang sgrub par byed par grub pa/ mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po dang 'jig rten las
188b2(rgyud): 'das pa'i mchog sgrub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa lags te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi
188b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten sel ba/ sngon
188b4(rgyud): gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa mi bzad pa 'joms pa/ ngan song thams cad sel ba/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa nges par sreg par byed pa yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o//
188b5(rgyud): mtshams med pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spong ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / mtshams med pa la gzhol ba dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba dang
188b6(rgyud): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad spong bar byed pa de dag gis mnyan pa dang / mthong ba tsam dang / sdom pa tsam dang / lan cig 'bad pa dang / 'chad pa tsam
188b7(rgyud): gyis thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// nga mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad zad par 'gyur/ byang bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / dri ma dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog thams cad bral
189a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang /
189a2(rgyud): nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phung bar byed pa dang / rdeg
189a3(rgyud): pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gshegs 'gyed pa dang / btson du 'dzin pa dang / lcags su 'jug pa dang / rkun ma dang / zol ba dang / mi rgod dang / seng ge
189a4(rgyud): dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / nad ngan pa dag / mu chu dang / sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / g.yon can dang / shu ba dang / shu bran dang / g.yan pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs
189a5(rgyud): byed na ba dang / dom dang / dred dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / sbrul ma rungs pa dang / khwa gdug pa dang / sbrul nag po dang / srog chags go/
189a6(rgyud): na dang / dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags 'jigs pa sna tshogs dang bcas pa dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / g.yangs dang / khyim rdib pa dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / nyi tshan
189a7(rgyud): dang / byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad ni bgrags pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ bung bar 'gyur/ mod la phye mar rlag par 'gyur
189b1(rgyud): ro/ yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba 'di la dogs par mi bya/ yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya/ the tshom mi bya/ sems gnyis su 'gyur ba bskyed par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag rtag tu mngon du dran/
189b2(rgyud): par bgyi ba dang / rtag tu yid la byed pa'i blo 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'ang bzlas par bgyi'o// rmang du byung ba rnam par lta ba/ don yod pa rnam
189b3(rgyud): bar 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul/ rnam par snang mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs dam
189b4(rgyud): tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor/ don yod par rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du yid la kha ton du brjod par bya'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su dran pa
189b5(rgyud): bsgom par bya'o// de dag dran pa bsgom pa tsam dang dran pa tsam gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya'o// phyir mi
189b6(rgyud): ldog pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa dang / lung ston pa dang / byin gyis rlob par 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang
189b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug mthong ste phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / dran pa dang / dus gsum du shin tu gsal bar yid la byed pa dang / mchod cing phyag byed pa de lta smos kyang
190a1(rgyud): ci dgos te/ sems can de ni nga dang 'dra ba yin par rig par bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
190a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o// gang zhig lan mang du shin tu lhag par byed pa lha smos kyang ci dgos te/ sem
190a3(rgyud): can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin par rig par bya'o// bdag kyang dus thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// dus thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par bgyi'o// bsam pa dang re ba
190a4(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de'i tshe bdag gis sems can thams cad myur ba myur bar byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gzhag par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
190a5(rgyud): bdag ni go cha chen po brtan par khas blangs pa la 'chel ba lags pas/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir re ba'i mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshes
190a6(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa'i mchog legs
190a7(rgyud): so legs so// 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga de'i ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis sems can yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub pa dang /
190b1(rgyud): smyung ba'i chog byed pa dang / sdom pa la gnas pa lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ sems can de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// sems can dag padus
190b2(rgyud): l-i bab pa gang yin pa de ni shes na smos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi nal du lta zhing bzhin 'dzum sde/
190b3(rgyud): don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos
190b4(rgyud): kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba'i dkyil
190b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi lha gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / drang srong gi tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
190b6(rgyud): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki te pA sha hri da ye/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+harma d+hA tu bar+b+he tsa ra tsa ra
190b7(rgyud): ma hA pad+ma/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA p+ta sha d+ha re/ ba ra ba ra ba ra/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti mar+thi ta/ sha rI re/ ta ra ta ra/ bi pu la te dza d+ha raM/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ Sha Ta bA ra mi tA da 'i pUr Ni/
191a1(rgyud): pakA la/ ad+hA baH/ me 'gyu / mal ma sa/ sar+b+ba b+hA pa A bar / dz+wa la kAHlanAne/ d+ha d+d+haH/ bo dzIsad+ha/ ung+ge b+h+ya na/ @rdza
191a2(rgyud): bta sa le/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra na maskr-i te/ gu ru phu ru/ brah+ma/ biSh+Ta ma he shwa ra/ ku mA ra/ nan di ke shwa ra/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ re ba pra tra/ ban ti ban di ta mam+ma te/ bi bi d+ha ma Ni mo la
191a3(rgyud): d+ha ru re/ a mi tA b+ha dzen/ mu ku Ta d+ha re/ daM bya ma Ni ka na ka/ badz+ra bai DUR+YaM/ ma ra kA ta/ bad+ma rA ga/ in+da nI la di bya muk+ti ka/ a la~M kr-i ta/ sha rI ra/ shwe ta/ yadz+nye ba b+hi ta d+ha ra/ dza nA mu ku Ta/
191a4(rgyud): maN+Di ta nA mA/ tsin+da/ rA dzi ta/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ pad+mA A sa na/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ tri lo tsa na/ tri shU la d+ha ra/ bA sha d+hu raM/ sar+b+baHthA ga ta/ a b+hi Shi ka ta/ sa ra sa ra/ sar+b+ba pA ba/ pra sha ma na kar
191a5(rgyud): ma hA kA ru Ni ka tu ru tu ru/ sar+b+ba ba ra dA ya ka bo d+hi bo d+hi/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki te/ bo d+hi mar+tha/ a ba lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA tsin ta ma Ni d+ha ra/ bi shwa rU pa/ ma hA
191a6(rgyud): so mya/ ba da na ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/ bo d+hi ya bo d+hi ya/ b+ha ga ban/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ki ta gar+b+he/ ma hA pu N+ya/ te dza/ d+ha ra/ za ba ra/ sid d+hi ka ra/ sarba byA d+hi ha ra/ sarba satwa drA
191a7(rgyud): ya ba ra/ sarba duHkha/ pra mo tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ na mo sU te swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'di ni rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'o//
191b1(rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi snying po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po'o// gzugs sna tshogs chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge
191b2(rgyud): 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/ phyag stong mnga' ba/ dbu stong mnga' ba/ spyan stong gis rnam par gzigs pa/ phyag brgya stong gis byin gyis brlabs pa/ gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag
191b3(rgyud): bcu'i bye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho nad gsang ba la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du
191b4(rgyud): 'jug pa/ byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/ chos kyi sgron me 'bar ba/ bdud la sogs pa ma rung ba thams cad kyi bdud 'joms pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi
191b5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ dmyal ba thams cad sel ba/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad grub par mdzad pa/ cho ga grub pa thams cad kyi mchog sa bcu chen po la so sor 'jog pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas la
191b6(rgyud): rjes su 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba dang byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ don yod pa'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa thob par mdzad pa/ don yod pa'i rnam
191b7(rgyud): par 'phrul pa'i rnam par sprul pa/ don yod par sems rgya mtsho sbed yang dag par 'dzin pa/ don yod par sems can sa bon la so sor 'jog pa/ don yod par byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
192a1(rgyud): 'phrul pa la 'jug pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su sgrogs pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa dang bsnyen//
192a2(rgyud): bkur gyi sprin rab tu byed pa/ don yod par sems can thams cad mi 'jigs pa'i khyim du 'dzud pa/ don yod par sbyin pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ don yod par lha rdzas
192a3(rgyud): kyi me tob dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'breng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / chos gos sna
192a4(rgyud): tshogs dang / rin po che bdun gyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par tshe yongs su brjes te sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu brgyan pa sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par lta ba/ don
192a5(rgyud): yod par bsod nams kyi phung po chen po rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skyed pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / grub pa dang / cho 'phrul/
192a6(rgyud): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa/ don yod par dbang phyug grub pa/ don yod par rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par bye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo yang dag par ston pa/ don yod
192a7(rgyud): par grub pa mthong ba/ don yod par cho ga mthong ba/ don yod par tshe rab tu 'phel ba/ don yod par snyan par grags pa rab tu ston pa/ don yod par 'khor ba las rab tu sgrol ba/ don yod par skye ba dang //
192b1(rgyud): rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su sgrol ba/ don yod par mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ don yod par bzlas brjod dang cho ga rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par rig
192b2(rgyud): 'dzin 'khor lo sgyur ba thob par yang dag par ston pa/ don yod par lho'i gnas dang gzhal med khang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jug pa/
192b3(rgyud): don yod par 'og min gyi gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su brgya byin lha'i rgyal por 'jug pa/ don yod par ri rab chen po lag pa gcig gis skul ba/ don yod par
192b4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs ston pa/ don yod par mi snang ba ston pa/ don yod par stobs 'phel ba/ don yod par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor lo sgyur ba so sor 'thob pa ston pa/ don yod par yid bzhin
192b5(rgyud): gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par 'bru'i char 'bebs pa/ don yod par gos kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par rgyan dang / chos gos dang / mu tig gi chun/
192b6(rgyud): 'phyang dang / gdub kor dang / gser gyi cong tsong dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa yang dag par ston pa/ don yod par ro sngam pa sna tshogs ro'i mchog ro brgya'i kha zas kyi cha
192b7(rgyud): 'bebs pa/ don yod par sems can pa sna tshogs grol ba ston pa/ don yod par bstan bcos dang / tshig le'ur bcang ba dang / tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / mdo sde dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs
193a1(rgyud): su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmang du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag sna tshogs dang /
193a2(rgyud): chos mngon pa dang / tshogs kyi gtam yang dag par ston pa dang / don yod par theg pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa rab tu ston pa/ don yod par gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
193a3(rgyud): 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren snga tshogs nyes pa dang / gsod pa dang / shin tu sel ba yang dag par smon pa yin no//
193a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de ltar na yon tan chen po can gyi gzungs ngan song thams cad rab tu na par 'gyur ba/ thams cad du mi 'jigs pa'i gnas rab tu ston pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam legs pa'i lam
193a5(rgyud): rab tu ston pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam rab tu ston pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas dang sangs rgyas nyid sbyin par mdzad pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das don yod par rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying
193a6(rgyud): po'i gzungs chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po yon tan khyad par yongs su bsgrags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba la rab tu gnas pa lags so// de nas
193a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dkon
193b1(rgyud): ba'i gzungs 'di'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa bshad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa
193b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po yongs su bsgrags pa legs so legs so// de dag ni sems can thams cad la lam mchog/ shin tu mchog tu gyur pa/ gya nom pa/ bla ma bla na med pa/ mchog tu dkor pa'i gzungs kyi
193b3(rgyud): snyi po gsang ba yongs su bsgrags pa ste/ gang gis 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu bo chen po dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sems can thams cad pha rol tu sgrol ba yin no// spya rA ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs
193b4(rgyud): kyi bu bo 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pa 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs
193b5(rgyud): gang la la zhig gam/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas don yod par rnam par lta ba'i snying po 'di dang / rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/
193b6(rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dam tshig chen po dkyil 'khor gyi
193b7(rgyud): ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung chen po dang ldan par yongs su 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis
194a1(rgyud): kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du mthong ba dang / mngon du chos thos pa dang / mngon du byang thos pa dang / mngon dus
194a2(rgyud): bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can chen po de dag gis ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu che ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de gzungs gang yin pa dang
194a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / ming sna tshogs da ltar thos pa dang / yang na klog pa dang / yang na lta ba tsam mthong ba ni de dang mnyam pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu po 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nam
194a4(rgyud): kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba'ang de dang mnyam pa yin na/ dka' ba byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du thos pa dang mthong bar 'gyur ro//
194a5(rgyud): gang dag gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'bad de stobs dang brtson 'grus pha rol gnon par byed pa dang / tshol ba dang / 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
194a6(rgyud): grub par byed pa dang / 'bad par byed pa de ni dka' ba chen po la zhugs pa yin no// de dang mnyam pa yin no// dka' ba gang zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
194a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba la zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar yin no// rigs kyi bu bo 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba
194b1(rgyud): 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang yin pa 'am//
194b2(rgyud): sems can gzhan gang yang rung bas gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga stobs chen po dang / pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga tshol ba yin
194b3(rgyud): no// 'di lha ste/ 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor lta ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya bcings te sgrub pa dang /
194b4(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ thos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sems pa dang / dus gsum du lan gsum ngon yod pa'i zhags pa'i
194b5(rgyud): snying po dran pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba dang / gzungs 'di'ang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dran pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pas rnying brlan pa dang
194b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba lhur byed pa de ni dka' bar spyod pa chen po la zhugs pa yin no// bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa la zhugs pa dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yin
194b7(rgyud): de tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid du so sor gnas pa yin no// / 'phags pa don yod/
195a1(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu gsum pa// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'jig rten
195a2(rgyud): dbang phyug rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu phyag g.yas pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag tu zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro//
195a3(rgyud): de ltar ni yon tan rgya chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa yin no// gzungs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam dang / rna ba'i bu gar 'dir
195a4(rgyud): sgra lan bdun du nges par lhung na/ de 'chi 'pho ba tsam dang bsams pa tsam gyis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar
195a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya rnams kha ton du kun tu
195a6(rgyud): gnas shing tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// dbang po drug yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'ang so sor thob bo// tsam la rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / chags
195a7(rgyud): dang / dbyibs yongs su dag pa de'i phyir/ stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi sem can thams cad sna tshogs 'dzin pa dang mnyan par bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kha ton du bgyi/ ser sna'i dri ma dang bral ba dang /
195b1(rgyud): brag dog dang bral bar bgyi/ sems can thams cad byams pa dang / snying rje la sogs pa mchog dang yang dag par ldan par bgyi'o// gzungs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di mnyan par bgyi/ blta bar bgyi
195b2(rgyud): 'jug par bgyi'o// phyi ma'i dus dang phyi ma'i tshe ma yin par phul du byung ba'i don la brtson par bgyi'o zhes pa'o// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga 'di ni bla na med pa zhes bgyi'o// mang du spos
195b3(rgyud): ci 'tshal te/ de la 'gran sems kyis kyang mnyan par bgyi'o zhes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs 'di gsungs pa'i
195b4(rgyud): ma thag tu/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis po Ta la'i ri bo 'di rin po sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gyur to// me tog gi shing ljon pa dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa gang yin pa rnams kyang / rin po che sna bdun
195b5(rgyud): gyi rang bzhin gyi khang pa brtsegs par rab tu gyur to// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams 'bum phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam par rab tu gyur to// lha rdzas kyi me tog
195b6(rgyud): dang 'bras bu rnam par bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams pham par byas pa'i rgyan rnam par bkra bas rnam par bkra zhing / dril bu gser ka'i dra ba dang gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba'i bla re dpyangs pa rnams dang
195b7(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri yongs su bshams pa rnams kyang re re zhing khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na/ seng ge'i khri bshams pa brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur rab tu byung bar gyur te/ seng ge'i khri thams cad
196a1(rgyud): la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par byon te bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
196a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog par mdzad cing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par mdzad do// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs
196a3(rgyud): so legs so// mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam chen po rab tu bstan pas sems can thams cad pha rol tu 'gro bar byed pa dang / gang gis thos pa tsam gyis
196a4(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa so sor khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam tshol ba la rjes su 'gro'o// 'on kyang bzlas pa dang / 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang
196a5(rgyud): 'jug pa ches mang ba'i dbang du byas pa'i sems can rnams dam tshig la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba de skye ba 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus su rig par bya'o// de nas bo Ta la'i gnas kyi ri bo
196a6(rgyud): dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags de rnams thams cad la mi gang tsam du mtho ba nyid dang / shing rta'i 'khol lo'i tshad tsam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi pad+ma rnams rab
196a7(rgyud): subyung ste/ 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / sdong bu bai DUR+Ya dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi kha dog lhar dmar pa'i mu tig gi ze'u 'bru dang / lha rdzas kyi mu tig gi ge sar gyis khor yug tu bskor ba
196b1(rgyud): gang yin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad kyang chos la gus pas thams cad pus mo btsugs te/ gzungs 'di'i
196b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya mthong ba'i don du mu tig gi do shal brgya stong rib byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon par bkab par gyur to//
196b3(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa 'di'ang ches cher g.yos par gyur to// lha'i me tog gi char chen po mang po rab tu phab ste/ de bzhin gshegs
196b4(rgyud): pa thams cad mchod pa'i don dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i don dang / gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dam pa la mchod pa'i don du char rab tu phab bo// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde
196b5(rgyud): dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bzhin 'dzum zhing rdo rje bskor bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
196b6(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang
196b7(rgyud): cho 'phrul ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed par blta bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po
197a1(rgyud): 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu dkon par blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/
197a2(rgyud): ro/ gang gis thos pa tsam gyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang phan yon so sor thob bo// kun tu snang bar byed par 'gyur ba 'di nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
197a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug ma gtogs par/ sems can thams cad kyi gzhan su'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no// lag na rdo rje
197a4(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ma dang phar gyur pa 'di gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di sems can
197a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi rab skong pa dang / skyob pa dang / skyabs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpung gnyen byed pa nas/ ji srid bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang /
197a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi bar la rab tu 'god par byed do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi stobs dang
197a7(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pas sngon sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du zhugs pa yin no// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i
197b1(rgyud): nor bu rin po che chen po thogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
197b2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ nor bu rin po che chen po de'ang mngon par dgab par phul lo// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pas gcal du bkram
197b3(rgyud): pa mchod pa'i don du rab tu bkod nas rang gi stan la 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa don yod pa dri ma med
197b4(rgyud): cing rnam par dag pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang gis spyi bo'i mtshams su gdugs kyi
197b5(rgyud): rnam pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa kun tu gnas par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa byung ngo // 'od zer sna tshogs pa'i snang ba des kyang nam mkha'i mthil du rdzu 'phrul
197b6(rgyud): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan to// 'od zer gyi snang ba re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rab tu bstan
197b7(rgyud): to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can
198a1(rgyud): chen po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya 'di bshad pa 'di legs so legs so// 'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i
198a2(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'bar bar byed pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa
198a3(rgyud): bdud bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gnon par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa/ mi 'jim
198a4(rgyud): pa bzhis gnon par byed pa/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mthas pha rol gnon par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad sgom
198a5(rgyud): par byed pa'o// 'di ni lam rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi lam du 'chag par byed pa/ bsam pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ ngan song du 'gro bar rgyu ba rnams kyi bde 'gro'i lam du
198a6(rgyud): 'gro bar byed pa/ 'di ni byang chub chen po'i snying po'i sa bon dang 'bras bu rab tu ston par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
198a7(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags
198b1(rgyud): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga shod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan
198b2(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan snga nas bskul ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jog rten las 'das pa'i cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang sgrub thabs gsungs so// gnas bzang
198b3(rgyud): sa gzhi dge ba dang // sa gzhi gtsang zhing ne'u gsang la// ljon shing me tog 'bras bus khyab// me tog 'khri shing 'gram dang ni// sa gzhi mnyen la dag pa dang / gang du chu bo 'bab pa dang /
198b4(rgyud): gzi brjid ldan zhing yid dga' ba// sa gzhi sems ni dga' bar 'os// yid kyi shing rta rgyas byed cing // go skabs legs par gnas pa dang // shin tu dag cing thun tshags bral// rus pa
198b5(rgyud): gseg ma gyo mo dang // phub ma sol ba yongs su spangs// gtsang zhing gtsang la legs dag pa'i// sa gzhi yongs su zlum pa der// mkhas pas rgyar ni gzings tshad du// gzhal nas
198b6(rgyud): shin tu rnam 'byes shing // gtsang zhing mnyen la 'jam par bya// gnas der dkyil 'khor legs par bsgrubs// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// 'jig rten las 'das khyad 'phags par
198b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs// sa yi cha las dpangs su ni// mi gang tshad du brko bar bya// dmar po 'am yang na gur kum kha dog dang // sa rdul dkar po sdum pa ni// mar gsar 'dra ba
199a1(rgyud): 'jam pa yin// sa yi khyad par dbye ba de// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bsngags// byang chub snying pos der mtshungs// ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dang // de ni/
199a2(rgyud): mtshungs par gyur pa yin// brkos pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis// slar yang sa des dgang bar bya// ji srid dong bu mnyam par dgang // de ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o// nyung dang lhag pa bsngags pa min//
199a3(rgyud): 'dir ni 'grub pa med par bskrun// khru ni sum cu rtsa gnyis tshad// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thog dag gdab// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang // yang na khru ni bco lngar bya// mnyam zhing grwa bzhir legs par
199a4(rgyud): dbye// pa yi lci ba dag dang ni// sa dang bsres te bsku bya ba// shin tu zhen par bajig pa dang // 'jam zhing mnyen par bya ba yin// de la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// sna tshogs tshon gyis kun tu dbye//
199a5(rgyud): sgo ba ni rnam par 'byes pa dang // rtsubabs bzhi dang ldan par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po ni// rnam par phye ste gru bzhi tshad// khru gsum yang ni khru bzhi ni// thig skud tshon gyis rnam par dbye/
199a6(rgyud): nang gi thig gi tshad dag tu// mdung rtse gsum pa dag dang ni// nor bu rin chen sna tshog bya// bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu// pad+ma dang ni rdo rje dang // kun tu bri bar bya ba yin// phyi yi thig gi tshad dag
199a7(rgyud): tu// rdo rje rnam pa'i stegs bu dang // rin chen sna tshogs gzhal med khang // stegs bu dag kyang bri bar bya// pad+ma'i dbus su gzhal med khang // gnal yas khang pa gnas par bya// dkyil 'khor
199b1(rgyud): dbus kyi pad+mal// rnam par snang mdzad thub pa bya// g.yon du 'od ni dpag med pa// g.yas phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs// shAkya'i rgyal po dag dang ni// don yod rgyal po 'jig rten gyi/
199b2(rgyud): dbang phyug mgon la mngon sum du// btud de thal mo sbyor ba ni// phyag bzhi par ni bya ba yin// phyag gnyis kyis ni sna tshogs pa'i// me tog rnams ni 'chang ba dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan
199b3(rgyud): par bya// 'od dpag med pa'i mdun du ni// khro bo'i rgyal po phyag bzhi pa// btud de thal mo sbyor ba dang // lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs pa// lag pa gnyis na thogs pa dang // sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan
199b4(rgyud): par bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan// sna tshogs dar gyis mdzes par byas// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya che// pad+ma'i gdan dang rnam brgyan pa// 'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya//
199b5(rgyud): grwa bzhi dag ni byas na ni// gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste// dbus kyi gnas su 'jigs med pa// shar gyi gnas su gnas pa ni// lha mo sgrol ma rnam par brgyar// g.yas kyi gnas su gnas pa ni// gos
199b6(rgyud): dkar mo ni rnam par brgyan// nub kyi gnas na gnas pa ni// lha mo dkar mo rnam par brgyan// byang gi gnas na gnas pa ni// lha mo pad+ma mdzes dgas brgyan// dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams su/
199b7(rgyud): rgyal chen bzhi ni gzhag par bya// bar gyi gnas su gzhag pa ni// ral pa gcig pa gtum mo shar// nub tu pho nya bzhin sgyur ma// g.yas phyogs su ni bzhin sgyur ma// rdo rje lcags sgrog bya ba yin/
200a1(rgyud): byang phyog srin po khro gnyer gdong // kun kyang me dbus 'jig pa med// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa bzhin// phyi rol thig le pad+mo'i 'breg// rdo rje rtse gsum gzhag pa ni//
200a2(rgyud): kun tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng bar bcas// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// bri bya rtags dang phyag rgya dang // lha ni dbang phyug dbang phyug che// tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang / chu lha dbang po lus ngan po/
200a3(rgyud): dbang sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi/ lha nas 'og min gnas kyi bar// lha rnams bri bar bya ba yin// sum cu rtsa gsung lha rnams dang rtags ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // kun kyang bad+mo'i gdan la
200a4(rgyud): gnas// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang // zhags pa dang ni dgra sta dang // legasu mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no// mdung rtse gsum dang paT+Ta sa// ngos la dbyug pa tho ba dang /
200a5(rgyud): rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i 'phreng // 'khor lo dung dang dga' da dang // ral gri dang ni tom rab// bum pa gang ba dag dang ni// mi snang ba yi 'bag sha dang // pad+ma dang ni ut+pa la/ rgyal mtshan gdugs dang
200a6(rgyud): nor bu dang / dbyug pa dang ni rdo rje dang // grwa bzhir rdo rjes mtshan pa yin// nor bu rdo rje dag dang ni// dgra sta rdo rje dag dang ni// phyag rgya ba ni dang dga' ba 'khyil// bya ma bum dang kun di dang // ril bsgring
200a7(rgyud): ga ri dang ni// ri dgas e n+ya'i pags pa la// mchod phyir thogs pa'i snam bu dang // steng du rgyu skar bcas pa yi// zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no// kun kyang 'bar ba'i nang du 'dug/ so sor cha ni dbye bar bya//
200b1(rgyud): mkhas pas shar gyi sgor bri ba// 'bying bag mthong na 'jigs su rung // lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa med// rdo rje 'chang ba 'bar ba'i nang // ke la ke la gtum po che// lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru gnag rug/
200b2(rgyud): tu rdo rje bing ga la// mthong na 'jigs su rung ba yi byang du nges par gnod mdzes bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// pad+ma'i 'phreng dang ut+pal 'breg/ grwa dag dang ni grwa rnams su/ bkru yi rgyal po/
200b3(rgyud): bzhi rnams bri// sgo srungs pa dag bri ba ni// nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang // stobs kyi lha dang lngas rtsen yin// sgo yi gnas kyi bar dag tu/ chu bo bzhi ni bri byang ba// gang+gA dang ni sI ta dang // puk+Shu dang ni
200b4(rgyud): sin d+hA yin// 'phreng ba'i nang rol thog thag tu// dpal gyi lha mo ba san ti// dpe med mdangs yi lha// lo tog sman gyi lha mo dang // sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jigs ldan ma// de bzhin me yi lha dag dang // 'brog
200b5(rgyud): ma dang ni dung can ma// gtum mo dang ni me tog so// de dag bri bar bya ba yin// khrus byas 'dri mkhan gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma'i snod du tshon rnams ni// lhag ma min pas kun tu bri// zas ni dkar gsum
200b6(rgyud): grub par bya// khyad par 'dod pas zas ngan pa// spang bar bya ba nya sha dang // btsong dang sgog skya ke'u rnams// 'dres pa spang bar bya ba ni// log 'dren glags tshol spang phyir ro// khrus byas gos ni gsar
200b7(rgyud): pa bgos// gtsang mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// kun tu brgyan par bya ba ni// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' dang ni// lha rdza sa dar ni
201a1(rgyud): sbyang ba dang / kha dan yang ni spyang bar bya// tshon skung sna lnga'i srad bu yis// kun tu yongs su bskor bar bya// zangs las byas pa'i pad+ma'i tshad// sor bzhi 'dab ma kha bye ga
201a2(rgyud): mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// pad+ma brgyad ni gzhag pa dag/ gser las byas pa bzhi gzhag cing // de bzhin dngul las byas pa bzhi// kun tu byu
201a3(rgyud): ru'i 'phreng ba dang / mu tig 'phreng ba de bzhin no// kun tu gser gyi srang bu dang // rin chen sna tshogs gzhag par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig bar du// gser gyi snod ni bzhi dag dang // dngul
201a4(rgyud): gyi snod ni bzhi gzhag go/ dngul gyi bum pa gang ba bzhi la dngul dang // gser dang / zangs las byas pa'i me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs kyis spras pa gzhag par bya'o// gser gyi bum pa gang
201a5(rgyud): ba bzhi bzhag pa la mu tig dang / byu ru dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / mar gad dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / dngul dang / gser dang / me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs gzhag par bya'o// gla rtsi dang / ga pur
201a6(rgyud): dang / gur kum dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod bkang ba dang / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog mu tig gis brgyan cing chen
201a7(rgyud): po che sna tshogs pas spras pa gzhag par bya// cod pan gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/ tshon sna tshogs can dang dar dmar po sbyang bar bya/ dngul gyi pog por
201b1(rgyud): bzhi gzhag ste/ tsan dan dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur kum gyi bdug pas bdug par bya/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa gser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ rin no//
201b2(rgyud): chetshe sna bdun dang ldan par bgyis la/ bkang ba la dar gtsang mas bcings la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du zangs las byas pa'i me tog bzhag nas/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma'i steng du/
201b3(rgyud): gzhag par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu dri dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi chab kyis dngul gyi snod dang
201b4(rgyud): zangs kyi snod bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o// lcags kyi snod bum pa gang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o// me tog dang / mgo lcogs dang / pog por bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o//
201b5(rgyud): bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya'o// sgo bzhir zangs dang lcags kyi dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyad cing spud pa gzhag par bya'o// sna ma'i me tog gis gdu bu'i steng du mda' la ba dan btags pa drug
201b6(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhi btsugs te/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa'i mda' dang nor bu'i 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu sa dang bsres
201b7(rgyud): pa'i ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la/ dri chab kyis bskus te tshon sna lnga'i srad bus thig btab la sgo bzhi rnam par phye ste/ seng ldeng gi phur bu tshad sor bcu gnyis pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gdab bo// tshon sna lnga'i
202a1(rgyud): srad bus dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor bar bya'o// bum bu dang / bum pa dang / bya ma bum drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba gzhag go / kham por zlum po drug cu rtsa
202a2(rgyud): bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba gzhag go/ gtor ma tshul sna tshogs pa drug cu rtsa bzhi so sor gzhag go// snod tshon sna lnga pa drug cu rtsa bzhi kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bca' ba rnam pa/
202a3(rgyud): sna tshogs blugs pa dang / gtor ma dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag go yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag go// 'bras bu sna tshogs dang me tog sna tshogs
202a4(rgyud): dgram mo// 'phreng ba brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du sbyang bar bya ste/ byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la drug cu rtsa bzhi/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sum cu rtsa gnyis gdags so// me mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud
202a5(rgyud): par bya'o// gtor ma brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi dang dkyil 'khor thog thag tu mar me bud par bya'o// chang dang / sha dang / beg cong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / tshod sngon dang / la phug spangs pa'i gtor ma gzhan rnam
202a6(rgyud): pasna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i grwa bzhir don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya ste/ sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// chos klog pa legs
202a7(rgyud): par khrus byas te/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyis dkris te gtsang ma la dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i gas gtsang ma gsar pa bgos te/ chos kyi sun shin tu brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la 'dug nas tshig 'jam
202b1(rgyud): bo 'jam po tshig mnyen pos bklag par bya'o// nub kyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor mthon po la bde ba can gyi bkod pa bris pa/ 'od dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu/
202b2(rgyud): chen thob pa'i gzugs bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o// shar gyi phyogs chal dkyil 'khor zla bzhi mthon po byas la/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
202b3(rgyud): la shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i khro bo'i gzugs bris pa ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go// lho'i phyogs cha la ri 'dra ba'i
202b4(rgyud): gnas mthon po byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa ras la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor
202b5(rgyud): la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go// byang gi phyogs cha la khro bo'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor
202b6(rgyud): la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go// stegs bu'i rnam pa mthon por byas pa thams cad legs par brgyan par bya'o// dar gyi 'phreng bas brgyan par bya'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / bum pa gang ba
202b7(rgyud): gzhag pa dang / dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / ro'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma'i kha zas kyi ro dbul ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsod snyoms gzhag pa dang /
203a1(rgyud): tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur kum dang bsres pa'i bdug pa ras kyi sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas/
203a2(rgyud): dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes te/ dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o// tshes brgyad nas brtsams te chos bco lnga tshang gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi
203a3(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying
203a4(rgyud): po dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ba
203a5(rgyud): dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// zla ba nyar thug gi bar du zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// chos bco lnga'i nyin mtshan thog thag tu don
203a6(rgyud): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dpag tu med par bzlas brjod bya'o// mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas kyang ngal ba med pa dang / lus snyoms pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o// byams pa dang snying rje'i
203a7(rgyud): lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho gson nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / dkyil 'khor bsdam la
203b1(rgyud): byas ras/ de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dam tshig la gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las zin nas mchod pa brtsam mo// mchod pa'i cho ga zin pa dang / de nas
203b2(rgyud): bzlas brjod brtsam par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod byas la/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyi/
203b3(rgyud): dbang bskur ro// bzlas brjod lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu 'bar zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing legs so zhes bya
203b4(rgyud): ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs shin tu 'bar zhing 'od 'phro ba/ nyi ma stong
203b5(rgyud): phrag brgya pas lhag pa'i 'od zer can/ don yod pa'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nas mngon sum du gshegs te/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun la rnam
203b6(rgyud): par gzigs shing rig sngags 'chang ba legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang ba'i spyi bo la bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog shin tu brgyan cing
203b7(rgyud): spras pa 'di ni shin tu bzang ba yin te legs so legs so// 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis
204a1(rgyud): brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
204a2(rgyud): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po rnams kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor// bdud thams cad pham par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor/ bgegs dang
204a3(rgyud): rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'joms pa/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / tha na byol song gi skye gnas su
204a4(rgyud): gtogs pa'i bya'ang rung ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gcong rong las sgrol ba yin no// 'di ni sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / nad dang / skye ba
204a5(rgyud): dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su thar par byed cing 'jigs pa med pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa yin no// 'di ni rnam par thar par byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po dang gsang sngags su bcas/
204a6(rgyud): parnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di rig sngags 'chang ba de dang des ming brjod pa dang / gang dran pa tsam la sogs pa dang / lta ba dang / nyan pa dang /
204a7(rgyud): ming 'dzin pa'ang 'khor ba'i pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa nyid dus bcu bgrong nas bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de gang zhe na/ gang zhib
204b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mngon du mthong ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzugs 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bzlas brjod byed pa dang / klog pa dang / dran pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
204b2(rgyud): lan 'ga' smyung bas mthong ba dang / thang cig dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam gyis mthong ba ni nga dang mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no zhes smra'o// bdag ni sems can de la de bzhin gshegs pa
204b3(rgyud): yin par yang 'dzin te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pas spyi bos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang bas zung zhig dang / mchog ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar yid la re ba dang
204b4(rgyud): bsam pa de thams cad rjes su gzung zhing sbyin par mdzad do// de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang bas yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog smras na/ de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa
204b5(rgyud): rnam par grol ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba dang mnyam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro/
204b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor de'i dam tshig tu zhugs pa ni dam tshig shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin te/ de dag thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
204b7(rgyud): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/ lung bstan pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin/ de ni mngal na gnas pa skye ba'i tha ma ste/ phyis mngal na gnas pa'i dri
205a1(rgyud): mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de pad+mo'i nang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs
205a2(rgyud): kun tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po chos kyi 'khor/
205a3(rgyud): lo bskor ba/ dam tshig chen po 'di kha tor byed phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan
205a4(rgyud): sngar legs so zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu skye ba blangs pa legs par skye ba yin pas legs so legs so// phyir mi ldog par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas pa yin/
205a5(rgyud): no// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer 'bum phrag bye bas mdzes par gyur cing / bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can
205a6(rgyud): brkyang nas spyi bor phyag 'jog cing dbugs 'byin par yang mdzad do// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos 'bel ba'i gtam mngon sum du sgrogs par mdzad do// tha na dkyil 'khor chen por rol mo'i sgra
205a7(rgyud): rnga bo che dang / rnga phran dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rol mo'i sgra gang dag grag pa la/ sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos nas rna ba'i bu ga tsam du song ba de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag
205b1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// tha na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa bya'i rna bar sgra thos pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de ltar na rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshe
205b2(rgyud): 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa yin no// rigs kyi bu po 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngag dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
205b3(rgyud): bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u'i rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ 'ga' zhig gi rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'ang/
205b4(rgyud): 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa dang / sems can gang gis sgra de thos nas sgra dbyangs de dang ming thos pa rna ba'i bu gar song bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang sdig pa mi bzang ba las bral bar 'gyur ro//
205b5(rgyud): sngon gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras su rig par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu
205b6(rgyud): bo yin no// rtag par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dbugs 'byin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du
205b7(rgyud): rtag tu rjes su srung bar mdzad do// sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogs su song ste/ sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs
206a1(rgyud): shing sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de'i sa rdul rlung gis bdas te lus la phog pa gang yin pa de dang / tha na sems can ngan pa'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir/
206a2(rgyud): mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad las yongs su grol ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
206a3(rgyud): ba thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs byung bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyu
206a4(rgyud): ro/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ltar na sgra thos pa tsam dang / ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga
206a5(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad sreg cing sdug bsngal drag po las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya mtsho dang 'khor ba las sgrol ba 'grub bo/ phyir mi ldog pa'i
206a6(rgyud): gnas bla na med par dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa ston pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
206a7(rgyud): ston pa/ lha'i stegs sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis mod la the tsom med par me lha dang / dbang po dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang /
206b1(rgyud): lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams sbyin sreg byas pa 'di tsam gyis mod la thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// the tsom med par lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang ga lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
206b2(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / grul bum thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mong la rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la rtag tu 'dud par byed do// de bzhin du nyin
206b3(rgyud): mtshan du kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po chen po bcu'ang phyogs bcur srung bar byed de/ mi bsrun pa ma rungs pa sel cing dmyal
206b4(rgyud): ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / dug drag po dang / sems can ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byed do// de ma thag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun po dang / bsod nams chen po'i phung po bla na med pa skye bar
206b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tsan dan srang nyi shu dang / a ka ru srang lnga dang / du ru ka srang bdun dang / ga pur dang gla rtsi srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang / gur kum srang gcig dang / lce pog kun tu ra srang lnga dang / gu gul srang
206b6(rgyud): bdun dang / 'di rnams gcig tu bsres te bye mar byas la/ kha ra dkar po dang sbrang rtsis ril bu zho re'i tshad tsam du byas pa stong rtsa brgyad dang / yungs kar dang 'bras yos bsres te ril bu dang bsres
206b7(rgyud): nas mar gyi nang du bsnyugs te sbyin sreg bya'o// shing su ra b+hi dang / shing arka dang / shing sha mya'i yam shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o// gang dang gang gi tshe stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas
207a1(rgyud): na de dang de'i tshe sdig pa dang sgrib pa drag po thams cad sreg par 'gyur ro// de dang de'i tshe de nang thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de dang de'i tshe gcong thams cad/
207a2(rgyud): las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de dang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs
207a3(rgyud): dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang / byur thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad
207a4(rgyud): dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gshegs 'gyed pa thams cad dang / rang gi 'khor dang / gzhan gyi 'khor gyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgras 'jigs
207a5(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dang / rkun po dang / zol pa dang / mi rgod dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag
207a6(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag gis de'i dri
207a7(rgyud): tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// tshe brjes nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/
207b1(rgyud): su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / pad+mo'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir mi/
207b2(rgyud): ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba de ji lta ji ltar sbyin sreg byed pa/
207b3(rgyud): de lta de ltar de'i lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// stong rtsa brgyad tshang na rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
207b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rig sngags 'chang ba legs so legs so// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog/ rnam par
207b5(rgyud): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga yin no// 'di ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po
207b6(rgyud): dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren tshar gcod pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no// 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song ste chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no//
207b7(rgyud): 'di ni byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'tshang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag 'jog
208a1(rgyud): par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan/
208a2(rgyud): gyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mdun du bzhugs te bka' stsal pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam
208a3(rgyud): par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga chen po grub pa legs so legs so// zung zhig dang / mchog ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags
208a4(rgyud): 'chang bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog smra sa na/ de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag banag pa dang /
208a5(rgyud): phyag bzhag ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang ba nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba thob par
208a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa dang phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad/
208a7(rgyud): kyi zhing la bsnyen bkur byas nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa chos 'chad pa/ byang chub kyi snying po
208b1(rgyud): la thug gi bar du mngon sum du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas ho khung bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi gnas bla na med pa ni pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar byas pa/ zlum po khru gsum pa sa dang /
208b2(rgyud): ba'i lci ba bsres pa dang ldan par byas te/ pad+ma'i snying po la ho khung zabs su brko ba dang / zad ka kun tu khru gang ba brko bar bya'o// nang du pad+ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa bzhag la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis pad+ma de
208b3(rgyud): brgyan par bya'o// pad+ma'i phyi 'khor du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la dri sna tshogs kyis gtor ba dang brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba bzhi dang / dngul gyi snod gang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi
208b4(rgyud): chus bkang ba'i dngul gyi snod bzhi dang / rol mo dang dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i gser gyi snod bzhi dang / ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag pa ni gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna
208b5(rgyud): chogs bzhag pa dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs sbyangs la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs pa dang / sgo bzhi cha dbye ba dang /
208b6(rgyud): bum pa bzhag pa ni legs par brgyan cing dri chus yongs su bkang ba bya'o// sgo bzhir chos smra ba shin tu brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o// grwa bzhir chos smra ba chos kyi
208b7(rgyud): star legs par brgyan pa la 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya'o// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod par bya'o//
209a1(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos/ dri zhim pos bsgos te gtsang mar byas la/ ril bu la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o//
209a2(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas don yod pa 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa
209a3(rgyud): brgyad sbyin sreg bya ba ni mi smra bar byams pa'i sems dang / snying thag pa nas brtse ba dang / snying rje bar bya ba ni las bla na med pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
209a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ oM pad+ma ma bA ni/ tsa ra tsa ra pad+ma b+hu dze/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hU ta sha ne/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ bi mok+Sha b+hu dze/ da ha da ha/
209a5(rgyud): sar+b+ba ma lA na/ a mo g+ha pA Ni ba ra de/ hUM hUM ni ra da ha/ pA paM/ sha ma sha ma ni/ lo kot+tA ra Ni/ sa man+ta ra sh+mi ba ra ta/ tu ru tu ru Na pra ba re/ a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ oM b+hAr+N+Na ba/ na mo stu te swA hA/ de ni rnam par grol ba'i
209a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa chen po'i snying po dang gzungs kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas thal ba des rmad du byung ba chen po'i bya ba thams
209a7(rgyud): cad bya'o// thal ba des gang gi lus la byugs pa de ni sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le byas na de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rims las thar par 'gyur ro// zhag gnyis pa
209b1(rgyud): dang / zhag gsum pa dang / mtshan mo pa dang / nyin par pa dang / nam phyed pa dang / nyin phyed pa dang / lo gcig pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / grang ba'i rims lan 'ag/
209b2(rgyud): yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya 'das te 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'tshog mar thig le byas na gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las thar par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang phyogs bcur dpag tshad
209b3(rgyud): stong du 'bros par 'gyur ro// thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gang du lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / brtad byed dang /
209b4(rgyud): bgegs dang / log 'dren phyir gnas par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad 'bros so// phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na slar 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// snying khar thig le byas na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i
209b5(rgyud): gnas su thig le byas na lto ba'i nang gi nad thams cad mod la sos par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa la bskus na dug med par 'gyur ro// dug gis myos pa la byin na dug med par 'gyur ro// thal bas khrus byas
209b6(rgyud): na byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sngags dang / dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / shu phran mched pa dang / 'brum bu dang / ldog pa dang / me dpal dang / 'brum
209b7(rgyud): braphran rnams byung na chu dron mo dang sbyar te bskus la/ mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bskus na mong la nad thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// sprin logs su gtor na sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba
210a1(rgyud): thams cad mi 'bab bo// rlung ldang ba'i logs su gtor na rlung bsdams par 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor kun tu gtor na me tog dang /
210a2(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / le tog dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / shing gi yal ga dang / ldum ra dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / ri dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad legs par bsrungs par/
210a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya tshun chad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir gtor na der 'jug pa dang phyir 'byung ba'i sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u
210a4(rgyud): dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya de dag
210a5(rgyud): thams cad sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'gongs pa tsam gyis nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tshe yongs su brjes nas bde ba can
210a6(rgyud): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dur khrod dam ro bsregs pa'i steng du thal bas gtor na/ dmyal bar skyes
210a7(rgyud): pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mod la dmyal ba nas thar te/ mngon par dga' ba 'am bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ khyim mam/
210b1(rgyud): dgon pa'i gnas sam/ yul 'khor kun tu gtor na mtshams chen po bcad cing zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gtor na rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dgra thams cad lnga legs par bsrungs/
210b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor ba tsam gyis mong la skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bye ba stong phrag
210b3(rgyud): brgya byed pas rang 'dod pa la rang gi blos thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rter las 'das pa'i sku gzugs ras la bri ba bshad/
210b4(rgyud): bar bya'o// dar ram ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru do 'am/ khru gsum mam/ khru bzhi pa de'i dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan
210b5(rgyud): gyis brgyan pa/ cod pan rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang g.yas su zla ba chos pa can gyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa bri ba ni ri bo bo Ta la lcug
210b6(rgyud): ma me tog can sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lcug mas gang ba bya'o// de'i steng du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa seng ge'i khri bya'o// seng ge'i khri'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan bya'o// de'i steng du
210b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs par bya ste/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs shing gzugs de phyag dbugs 'byin pa bya'o// dbu'i gong man chad gzhal med khang
211a1(rgyud): chen po lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ dbus su mtho ba dang bcas pa bya'o// dbus mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun tshad dang 'thun par pad+ma'i gdan/
211a2(rgyud): la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gong gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
211a3(rgyud): 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te gzhal med khang gi nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od
211a4(rgyud): 'dom gang ba la 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye 'khor kun tu 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs dang mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba bya'o//
211a5(rgyud): de nyid kyi nye 'khor du lha sum cu rtsa gnyis bya'o// gong gi dbus su rdo rje 'chang ba khro gnyer can gtum po rdo rje gsor bar bya'o// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po
211a6(rgyud): dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po dang / 'og min gnas kyi lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / zla ba dang nyi ma'i lha'i bu dang / rgyal
211a7(rgyud): po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / me lha dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / stobs lha dang / gang ba/
211b1(rgyud): bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs la//
211b2(rgyud): ba nas 'phrul pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu bzhi pa//
211b3(rgyud): lha rnams kyi pha rol thog thag tu pad+ma'i 'phreng ba rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pas spras pa'i pad+ma'i 'phreng bas kun tu 'khor bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags ma sgrol ma skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te
211b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ ut+pa la dang nor bu rin po che phyag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal du blta bar bya'o// de'i rgyab tu khro gnyer ma me tog sna
211b5(rgyud): tshogs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// g.yon du dkar mo zhes bya ba ni skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ku mu da dang nor bu rin po che lag na thogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan thatha
211b6(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// dkar mo de'i rgyab tu pad+ma mdzes dga' ma me tog sna tshogs thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma dang
211b7(rgyud): dkar mo'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo thams cad kyang dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/ na bza' dkar po gsol ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhengs pa bya'o// g.yas phyogs su srin mo ngal
212a1(rgyud): pa gcig ma gtum mo skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje lag na thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras
212a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// g.yon du po nya mo zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pa
212a3(rgyud): phyag na thogs pa/ skyil mo krung byed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// ri bai bo Ta la'i ngos kyi gseb tu klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo//
212a4(rgyud): dang / klu'i bu mo klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs shing / gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'thor bar bya'o// ri'i slad du lha mo dpe med ma dang / lha mo ba
212a5(rgyud): san ti dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dpal lha mo dang / lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dung can ma bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa me tog sna tshogs
212a6(rgyud): dang nor bu rin po che thogs pa bya'o// gzhal med khang gi gong du mchod rten chen po brgyad 'phreng bar sbrengs la/ mchod rten gyi rgyan ji ltar brgyan pa de ltar brgyan par bya'o// mchod rten gyi 'og g.yas rol du
212a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la 'jig rten dbang phyug mngon du mchod pa mdzad pa bya'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu drang srong dang lha'i bu me
212b1(rgyud): tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bya ste/ kun dga' bo dang / rdo rje 'chang ba lag na rnga yab kyis bcom ldan 'das
212b2(rgyud): la mngon du g.yo ba par bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po bcom ldan
212b3(rgyud): 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu drang srong dang lha'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyi rol thog thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
212b4(rgyud): sku gzugs brgya rtsa brgyad pad+mo'i gdan la tshad ji lta ba bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi seng ge'i gdan gyi zhag
212b5(rgyud): drung du rig sngags 'chang ba pus mo btsugs te/ me tog dang / pog por dang / bgrang 'phreng lag na thogs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du blta bar bya'o// ri mo mkhan khrus byas shing
212b6(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang bar byas la/ ro sna tshogs pa'i zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// snod gsar pa gtsang ma'i nang nas tshon lhag ma ma yin pas bri bar bya'o// 'di'ang kha zas mi gtsang ba sna tshogs
212b7(rgyud): dang gos ngan pa mi gtsang ba yongs su spang bar bya'o// tshig ngan pa dang sems ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// chang dang / sha dang / beg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang 'dres pa yongs su spang bar bya'o//
213a1(rgyud): nyi ma re re zhing ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o// dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar bya'o// byams pa dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dang pa
213a2(rgyud): lhag par bya ste/ ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o// ga pur dang gla rtsis bsgos pa'i tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya'o// dben zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spang bar bya'o// rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spang bar bya'o//
213a3(rgyud): de ltar ri mo bri ba ni las legs par byas pa yin no// zla ba yar gyi ngol bri bar bya'o// rgyu skar shin tu bkra shis pa dang / tshes grangs dang nyi ma shin tu bkra shis pa la brtsam par bya'o// rgyu skar rgyal ni bkra shis/
213a4(rgyud): pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu/
213a5(rgyud): mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang /
213a6(rgyud): bu mo gang la la zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par gzigs pa/ byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang
213a7(rgyud): ba/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyis mod la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / mnar med pa la
213b1(rgyud): gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams kyang /
213b2(rgyud): mthong ba tsam la sogs pas sdig pa thams cad phye mar rlog go// rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// sdom pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu
213b3(rgyud): snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni gzhal med khang gnas dang
213b4(rgyud): bcas pa'i ri bo po Ta la na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te mngon du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra ste/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// yid gnyis bskyed par mi
213b5(rgyud): bya'o// sems kyi skad cig gcig rab tu dang ba byas na bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
213b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gis dgongs te mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// lus dang sems yid las byung ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//
213b7(rgyud): dbang po thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa thams cad dga' ba dang bla mar lta bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring por 'gyur ro// nad
214a1(rgyud): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye/
214a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'di gang gis mchod pa de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad//
214a3(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur ro// 'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i tha ma yin te/ phyis ma rig pa'i mun pa'i nang du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar na mi mnyam pa dang 'dra ba yin te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'jig rten
214a4(rgyud): las 'das pa sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni dam pa yin no// de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa brjod par bya'o// gang gis dran pa tsam gyis mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
214a5(rgyud): mngon sum du mthong nas 'dug pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgo phye te 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon du mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa dang / dkyil
214a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis mngon du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur/
214a7(rgyud): ro/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lus su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
214b1(rgyud): 'phags pa'i tshogs mchog thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha a ba lo//
214b2(rgyud): ki te ma hA maN+Da la pad+ma sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa na ma skr-i te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ a mo g+ha ma hA brah+ma/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ma hA bo d+ha ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ pad+ma bi bo/
214b3(rgyud): d+ha ni/ sar+b+ba pA pa an d+ha ka ra/ pra sha ma ni/ sar+b+ba durga ti/ b+hA ra ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ba hu baM bi drA/ be Sha d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gar+b+he/ hu ru hu ru/ a mo g+ha gar+b+he/ tu ru hu ru/ a mo g+ha bA sha ha ste/ mu ru
214b4(rgyud): mu ru/ bi mok+Sha b+hu dze/ k+Shi NaM k+Shi Ni/ sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he/ b+ha ra b+hai ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ba ri pU ra Ni/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya mAn/ a ba lo kA ya/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ ma Ni ka na ka/ bi b+hU Shi ta/ bA hu/ da ma da ma/
214b5(rgyud): dur dA na tA nAn/ ma hA bo d+h+waM satwa ba rA da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba de ba ga Na na maskr-i ta/ ri Shi ga Na/ sta bi ta/ sha ta sa ha sra tsan+ta sUr+yA/ a ti re ka/ rash+mi/ a ba b+hA si ta/ ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ ba ra
