214b6(rgyud): ma/ shud+d+ha satwa/ a ba lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ ba ra ma/ kA ru Ni ka/ maN+Da le shwa ra/ su pra bud+d+ha/ ma hA pad+ma/ b+hu dze shwa ra/ ma hA ba~M d+yA d+ha re shwa ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA bi mo k+Sha/ man+da la d+ha ra sar+b+ba ta/
214b7(rgyud): thA ga ta/ guh+ya/ mu dra sa ma ya d+ha ra/ ma hA ba la bid+yA d+ha ra/ ma hA ma Ni/ mau li d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra bA sha d+ha re shwa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ Sha
215a1(rgyud): ma/ ma hA mai tri/ a ba lo ki ta/ sar+b+ba satwAM san+ta ra ga/ sid+ha sid+d+h+ya sha/ pa ri pU ra ka/ ma hA ba ra/ pra mo da na na mo sU te swA hA/ 'di ni thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
215a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i mchog gsang ba/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa
215a3(rgyud): thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par sbyong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su 'jug pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dus
215a4(rgyud): gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bI ri bI ra/ ma hA man+da la/ bi shwa rU pa Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ ba ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa/ na mas+thi ta/ ba ra/
215a5(rgyud): ma bi pu la/ bi mok+Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pA sha/ bi lo ki ta/ a mo g+ha pA sha dz+wa li ta/ ma hA dzA la a ba lo ki ta/ ma hA ma Ni/ biSh+pa d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba b+hA si ta/ dz+wa la dzA la/ ma hA gam b+hI ra/ bi mok+Sha pA sha d+ha
215a6(rgyud): ra/ ba la bo d+h+ya ga/ A kaR+Sha ka/ oM brah+ma rU ba/ ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ sar+b+ba satwa/ bi lo ki ta/ ba ra pra da/ na mo sU te swA hA/ 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i
215a7(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
215b1(rgyud): thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bi bu d+hA/ bi bu d+h+ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ta ra ta ra/ ta rA ya/ ma hA ar+Na ba pA raM/ ma hA b+hu dza bi lo kA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa/
215b2(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha pA sha/ ma hA dA na bA ra mi tA/ pa'i
215b3(rgyud): pU ra ya/ hUM da ra da ra/ bi bi d+hA/ bi tsi traM/ sar+b+ba satwa/ u pa b+ho ga/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dA na/ pU dzA me g+ha/ pra brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya/ ma hA pad+ma pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
215b4(rgyud): zhags pa chen po'i snying po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam yang sbyin pa byin te/ dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyir sbyin pa rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po
215b5(rgyud): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
215b6(rgyud): phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM oM mo g+ha shI la/ saM b+hA ra ka sa~M b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa/ pad+ma bi b+hU Shi ta/ b+hu dza d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki te hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di
215b7(rgyud): smyung ba byas te gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya'o// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis
216a1(rgyud): mong la tshul khrims yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po'i dri ma
216a2(rgyud): po lus las 'byung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dge slong gang zhig
216a3(rgyud): tshul khrims nyams pas smyung ba byas te 'di bzlas brjod byas na bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
216a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thagro cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ma hA hrIH/
216a5(rgyud): a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/ ba ra ba ra/ dri b+ha b+hIr+ya/ ma phA ba la/ ba la ba la/ ma hA bo d+h+yaM ga/ ba la bo d+ha ni hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dus rtag tu yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis dran par byas na/ dran pa
216a6(rgyud): tsam gyis mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de/
216a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha k+ShAn ti/
216b1(rgyud): sar+b+ba bo d+hi kA mi Na/ kA nA k+Sha Na/ ma hA mai tri/ kA ru Na/ sar+b+ba satwa btA sa la/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba satwa kA mi Na hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa chen po dang / sI
216b2(rgyud): chen po dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis dmyal ba na gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa ri dgas dang bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang
216b3(rgyud): yin pa de rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir gang zhig gzungs kyi mchog dran par byed no// dmyal ba'i sems can las thar par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po gnas pa gang yin pa ram sa grol bar 'gyur ro// nam
216b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas kyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
216b5(rgyud): bo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA a mo g+ha/ ka ru Na/ d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/ sar+b+ba bi mok+Sha/ a pra kaM bya ka/ tsu ru tsu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzung
216b6(rgyud): 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dmigs nas yid rtse gcig tu byas te dran par byas na/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la des bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// /
216b7(rgyud): gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang
217a1(rgyud): sbyar bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen/
217a2(rgyud): po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha/ ma hA pradz+nyA/ a ba b+hA sa/ sA ra Na/ bud d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man+ta bud d+hi/ a ba lo ki te/ b+ha ga bAn pradz+nyA/ a ba lo ki ta/ tsak+Shu ShA mar+b+ba pradz+nyA/ ba ra da/ b+hA Ni/ maH/
217a3(rgyud): brapradz+radz+nyA/ pad+ma d+hA ra Ni/ b+hu dze hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba chen po'i blo 'phe
217a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
217a5(rgyud): rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab dang blor 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
217a6(rgyud): shes rab kyi blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub la thug gi bar du rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzungs chen po yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
217a7(rgyud): lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha gi mok+Sha/ maN+Da la ma hAd b+hu ta bi ma le/ d+har d+har/
217b1(rgyud): d+hi ra d+hi ri/ ma hA b+hU ta/ a mi tA b+hA/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra hUM phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor der yungs kar dang dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas nas chus kun tu chag chag btab na/ chag chan
217b2(rgyud): btab pa tsam gyis mod la dkyil 'khor kun tu dpag tshad gcig gi nang du sa sbyangs te yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// ji ltar shel gong dang rin po che sna tshogs pa dag pa dri ma med pa mdzes pa de 'dra ba'i sa
217b3(rgyud): gzhir 'gyur ro// shin tu dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu nyams dga' ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro// shin tu sa gzhi dpa' bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de'i bud med dang / skyes pa
217b4(rgyud): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad
217b5(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
217b6(rgyud): rgya ba'i bar du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs por 'gyur ro// gang dag byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang bya de dag phyogs der 'gro zhing rab tu 'jug pa de dag
217b7(rgyud): thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gis de'i sa lag par 'ongs te reg pa de dag thams cad nang dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rims
218a1(rgyud): dang bral ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de dag phyis lus la tshor ba'i nang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu bde bas tshim pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// sa ro
218a2(rgyud): su sbyong ba'i rig sngags so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyog 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/
218a3(rgyud): o a mo g+ha dru ma/ la ta br-ik+Sha/ shaM kha pa tra/ puSh+pa pa la/ bi Ta pa A ro ha/ na hi bA ga/ pu shwa ri Na/ ud sa hr-i da/ sun+da ra pra sra pa Ni/ bi bi d+ha/ bi tsi tra/ pa ri shra d+ha ya/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ sa ma sa ma/ sa mad+he na/ ba'i/
218a4(rgyud): maN+Da la/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ ma la ma la/ bi ma la bi ma la nirma la su pa ri shud d+ha/ pad+ma ud pa lib+ha/ dza la ma lAn bi shud d+ha/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ pa ra ma ma hA shud d+hA ya/ satwa hU~M phaT swA hAM/ na maHtri b+hu ba ne hUM
218a5(rgyud): phaT swAhA/ 'dis tsan dan dang / pad+ma dang / chu dang / yungs kar la yongs su bzlas te/ ljon pa'i sdong po dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / sna tshogs pa'i lcug ma dang / rtswa dang / shi
218a6(rgyud): gel ba dang / sman dang / chu klung dang / mtsho phran dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu dang / 'bab chu mdzes pa'i gleng du gtor bar bya ste/ de rnams thams cad la bdud rtsi blug par 'gyur ro// de rnams thams cad
218a7(rgyud): la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bur 'gyur ro// tha na lha'i rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// gang la reg pa tsam gyis reg pa de thams cad ser sna'i dri ma dang bral zhing
218b1(rgyud): phrag dog spangs par 'gyur ro// mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / mchil ma dang bral zhing / lus kyi phyi dang nang gi dri mi zhim pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gang yang lus kyi nang gi nang dang gnod/
218b2(rgyud): pa sna tshogs pa de rnams thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par nyams pa dang / legs par yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma med par 'gyur ro zhes so// de la chus khrus byas/
218b3(rgyud): pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang / lha'i chu dang byang chub yan lag gi chus khrus byas par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad bkrus par 'gyur ro// yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkrus par
218b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// des so shing zos pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rjes su dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing zhugs pa thams cad yongs su
218b5(rgyud): spangs pa dang / rtag tu kha nas ut+pa la'i dri bro bar 'gyur ro// ngag 'jam zhing snyan par yang 'gyur zhing ngag mnyen par yang 'gyur ro// dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur zhing skye bo thams cad yid dga' bar/
218b6(rgyud): yang 'gyur ro// mi 'am ci'i dbyangs su'ang 'gyur ro// bstan bcos dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / theg pa chen po thams cad thos pa tsam gyis kun tu 'dzin par byed cing kha ton du'ang gan
218b7(rgyud): par byed do// me tog de la mnams pa dang / 'phreng ba mgul par 'ching bar byed pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang / byang chub yan lag gi me tog gi 'phreng ba bcings par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
219a1(rgyud): dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// sna yongs su dag par yang 'gyur te/ lha'i dri dang reg pa dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs/
219a2(rgyud): par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// lha'i so dang mtshungs pa'i kha dog tu 'gyur/ bud med dang / skyes bu dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la gtam smras pa de rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ro// shi 'phos shing skye ba
219a3(rgyud): brjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro zhes pa'o// 'bras bu dang / me tog dang / chu dang / nags kyi
219a4(rgyud): bdag po dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
219a5(rgyud): dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha a ma le tri ma le/ bi ma le/ nirma le/ di bya pa ri shud+d+he sar+b+ba ma lo pa kaR+Shi ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra de pra ba ra pra ri shud+d+he/ mahA ma Ni rat+na kA ya/
219a6(rgyud): pa ri shud+d+he/ ma Ni ma Ni sho d+ha ni mahA a mo g+ha tsin+tu ma Ni shud+d+ha/ hr-i da ya shud+d+he/ kA ya naMrma la ma hA Ni pa ri shud+d+he/ hu ru hu ru pra ba ra bA Ni ma hA b+hu dza ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru / ma hA satwa ba ta sa le/ pa ri sho d+ha ya mA
219a7(rgyud): sarba bA su bi shu d+d+he ma le swAhA/ rig sngags 'dis rig sngags 'chang gis bdag nyid kyi lus yongs su sbyang bar bya ste/ tsan dan gyi chu dang / gur kum dang / gla rtsi'i chu dang / ga pur gyi chu dang / yungs
219b1(rgyud): kar dang / ba byung lnga bsres pas rdza gsar pa'i bum pa bkang ste/ rig sngags 'di stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'o// ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing lan bdun du srang bdun btung bar bya'o// khrus byas/
219b2(rgyud): pa tsam gyis mod la khro bo'i rgyal pos bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o// khrus byas pa tsam dang / dbang bskur ba tsam gyis bdag rang gi phyi nang yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang /
219b3(rgyud): sgrib pa dang / dug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rga ba la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa thams
219b4(rgyud): cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur zhing / bar chad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang ba'i
219b5(rgyud): drung du slar 'ong nus par mi 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bde bar sgrub pa dang / bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar bsad pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du bde bar gnas pa dang / dri ma thams cad spangs pa dang /
219b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong ste shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// bde ba can
219b7(rgyud): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// pad+mo'i nang nas rdzus te skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
219b8(rgyud): dam re bzhin gnags pa 'a
220a1(rgyud): dang / lus mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
220a2(rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde
220a3(rgyud): gzung sna tshogs rnam padum kha ton byed par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong phrag brgya tshun chad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma/ bi ma le pra sa ra/ sa mar+tha/ mu khe swA hA/ dkyil 'khor char phye/
220a4(rgyud): thig ga ba pa'i sngags so// oM a mo gra bi bi d+ha/ rU pa bi tsi tra/ gan d+ha/ ra san d+ha ra/ pra ba ra/ b+hu dzo swAt+ma/ tshon rtsi'i sngags dang / sku gzugs gzhag pa dang / mtshan ma dang rtags bri nga/
220a5(rgyud): sngags so// oM a mo g+ha san+ta pa ri man la/ pA sha ban d+hi hUM/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bsdam par bya'o// oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta/ da sha dig ma hA sI man/
220a6(rgyud): d+ha ya/ d+hu ru d+hu ru hUM phaT swA hA/ yungs kar dang chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams gcang ba'o// oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Na/ pA sha ha ste/ b+hu ru b+hu ru swA hA/ yungs kar dang dri chab la lan
220a7(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bdag bsrung ba'o// oM a mo g+ha/ tsU Da ma Ni/ phu ru hu ru/ nA ga bA sha ban tre hUM swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas spyi gtsug bcing ba'i sngags so//
220b1(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha sa man te na/ ma hA pA she/ b+hu ru b+hu ru swAhA/ slob ma dang grogs rnams bsrung ba'i sngags te/ yungs kar dang thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bsrung bar bya'o//
220b2(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha/ dza la bi ma le su ru su ru swA hA/ dri chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas khrus bya ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta/ bin+d+ha tsa ra tsa ra swA hA/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so//
220b3(rgyud): oM a mo g+ha di byA bas+t+re tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ gos kyi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha b+hu dza ka/ ka ba tsa/ ba ra de/ tsi ri tsi ri swAhA/ go cha'i sngags yin te yungs kar dang gur kum gyi chus bya'o// oM a mo b+ha/
220b4(rgyud): brah+ma b+hu dze bAr+ya na te pra sa ra swA hA/ mchod phyir thogs kyi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha tsU DA ma Ni pad+me/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya/ ma ma~M sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She kaM ma Ni ma Ni swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// oM
220b5(rgyud): a mo g+ha pad+ma ba sun d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra Ni/ maN+De hUM/ stan gyi gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta par+yang ke/ b+hu bi swAhA/ skyil mo krung bca' ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha su ra d+hi/ pad+me pa
220b6(rgyud): ra ba ra hUM/ me tog gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha/ ga na d+ha/ pra sa raM/ pUr+Na b+hu dze swA hA/ dri'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha le pa na pra ba re pi ri bi ri swA hA/ byug pa'i sngags so// oM a/
220b7(rgyud): mo g+ha ga ga na s+pha ra Na/ ma yai b+hu ru b+hu ru hUM/ bdug pa'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha shu kA ra sa ra sa ra/ a gra d+ha ra bi d+ha ra hUM/ gtor ma'i sngags te thams cad du bya'o// oM a mo g+ha/ pra ba ra/
221a1(rgyud): nu bi lo ki ni/ ki ri ki ri hUM/ zas dang gtor ma'i sngags so// oM bi bi d+ha/ a mo g+ha/ ba la/ ba ra ba ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ang b+hU ta gan d+ha ba re hUM/
221a2(rgyud): mchod yon gyi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ ma Ni/ b+hu Sha Na pa re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM/ rgyan dang / thod dang / dar sbyang ba dang / mda' dang / tshon lnga lnga dang / thig skud kyi sngags so// oM a mo
221a3(rgyud): g+ha khi bi d+hA/ b+ha dza ne/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/ snod kyi sngags te thams cad du sbyar ro// oM a mo g+ha/ pra bar b+ha ba na/ b+hu be tha ra tha ra swA hA/ gzhug pa'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha na maska ra Na/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga/
221a4(rgyud): ta/ oM dza le hUM/ phyag 'tshal ba dang thal mo sbyor ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha tsakre du ru du ru pra du ru swA hA/ bskor ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha sa man+te b+ha ba ne b+ha ba b+ha ba swAhA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags
221a5(rgyud): so// oM a mo g+ho tsin+ta ma Ni prA kaR+Sha ya du ru du ru swA hA/ gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha nirban+ta NaM bi mok+Sha maN+Da le mi li mi li swAhA/ blan gsan dbab pa'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ma hA ra shrI dz+nyA/
221a6(rgyud): la dz+wA la sa man+ta swA hA/ mar ma'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste pra sa ra gats+tsha swa b+hA ba nan bi sar+thi ta si sa ra sa ri hUM phaT swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha bA sha bar+N+Na sa
221a7(rgyud): man+ta ma hA sa ma ya/ dr-i d+he hUM phaT swA hA/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha sa man+te/ bri ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra ma hA b+hU te shwa ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis la du dang / mo daM ka
221b1(rgyud): ra dang / zan dang / rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / gtor ba dkar po dang / tshogs chen po'i bdag po'i gtor ma sbyin pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa'i sbyin pa byas na phyis bgegs byed nus par mi 'gyur/
221b2(rgyud): ro// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// phyag rgya de nas brjod byas te// gang gis bzung ba tsam gyis ni// sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa dang // dug rnams
221b3(rgyud): thams cad rnam par bcom// rnam grol dkyil 'khor rigs kyi ni// dam tshig phyag rgya yang dag yin// lag gnyis padra 'drar byas la// sor mo rnams ni mnyam bzhag ste// gung mo lcags kyu
221b4(rgyud): 'dra bar bya// lag gnyis mnyam par bzhag pa yi// phyag rgya rnam grol dam tshig 'di// don yod zhags par byin gyis brlabs// 'jig rten 'das pa khyad par gyi// lam gyi 'bras bu thob par byed//
221b5(rgyud): oM pad+ma b+hu dze/ pad+ma ka re/ pad+ma bi ma le swA hA/ dam tshig rtse mo'i rtse shes pas// rdo rje pad+ma rtag tu bya// gung mo cung zad bskums nas ni// lag gnyis pad+mor 'dra bar bya// gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba//
221b6(rgyud): 'jig rten rnams kyi dbang phyug dag/ mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ba yin// rnab grol phyag rgyas ngogs med par// sangs rgyas mtshungs med 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis ni// phyag byas
221b7(rgyud): ba yi phyag rgya 'di// rnam grol dkyil 'khor rmad du byung // oM pad+me su pad+me/ bi mok+Sha maN+Da la/ pad+ma b+hu dze swAhA/ rdo rje bcing ba mnyam bzhag ste// rdo rje pad+mo gung mo ni// bskums na de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// rna ba
222a1(rgyud): grol gsang ba'i zug rgya 'di g.yang dag grol ba rab tu bstan/ phyag rtsu'ang bstan pas ni/ ngan par byas pa thabs cad 'jig o ma mo sa badz+ra dadu du byams pa'i sna /
222a2(rgyud): lag gnyis thal mo khong stong las// mdor na nor bu 'dra bar bcing // nor bu'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'dra// ying bzhin nor bur brjod pa yin// las ni don yod thams cad byed// don yod mchod pa'i char 'bebs
222a3(rgyud): shing 'don yod pha rol byin drug rdzogs// don yod sangs rgyas rnams dang ni// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yin// don yod rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsag ga mtshams med lbu po sbyong bar mdzad// oM a ma/
222a4(rgyud): g+ha/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ pad+ma Ni swAhA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar// pad+ma kha bye 'dra bar rgyas/ gung mo lcags kyu 'dra ba yi// phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu bzang // phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis// 'bras
222a5(rgyud): bu chen po rmad du byung // 'jig rten 'das pa khyad par 'phagaso// dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// oM a mo g+ha/ badz+re ma hA pad+me/ dzA le su dz+wa le/ ma pA dz+wa le swA hA/ snying khar rdo rje pad+ma nyid// rdo rje ba
222a6(rgyud): ba phun sum tshogs// mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra ba ni// btsir bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di// gzi brjid chen po dag dang ni// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang // thams cad grub par byed pa'i gnas// thams cad
222a7(rgyud): grub par rab tu spyir// 'jig rten 'das pa grub pa che// sangs rgyas nyid phyir bla na med// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa grub// gsang sngags grub pa bla na med// oM a mo g+ha sid+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+he/ a ba 'o//
222b1(rgyud): kA ya sid+d+he/ ma hA bi bu la sid+d+he/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag ste// gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba dang // srin lag mthe bong so sor dgyed// gung mo yid tsam dgug bya ba// pad+ma'i dbang phyug
222b2(rgyud): sems dpa' che// 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma ste/ rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor ni// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis// phyag rgya byas pa 'di yin no// phyag rgya 'di dang don yod pa'i zhags
222b3(rgyud): pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya de dag mthong ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no// phyag rgya mchog 'di mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin te/ phyir mi
222b4(rgyud): ldog par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam mthong bas mod la dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// mthong ba dang bzung ba tsam gyis mod la 'bras bu chen po 'thob cing / mod la sangs rgyas
222b5(rgyud): kyis byang chub bla na med pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal
222b6(rgyud): lo/ oM a ba lo ki tA/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa sa ra sa ra/ sa man+ta e ba b+hA sa/ kuN+Da la/ d+ha la/ a mi tA b+hA/ ma ku Ta d+ha ba dzA Ta ma ku Tu/ na ba badz+nye p+pa man+di ta/ tsa ra tsa ga saM b+ha ra/ b+hu ba Ne shwa ra badz+ra b+hu dze hAH/
222b7(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston pa/ rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma'i 'jig rten mgon po'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yin no//
223a1(rgyud): phyag rgya bdun ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba yin te/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de gang du bcings shing phyag rgya mchog bzung ba ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag
223a2(rgyud): bdun brgya bcings par 'gyur ro// bzung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// bstod par 'gyur ro// ming 'dzin pa byas par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bdun po de dag
223a3(rgyud): ni gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang / kun tu las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yin no// gang zhig phyag rgya de dag bcings
223a4(rgyud): pa mthong zhing khrus legs par byas te/ gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrib pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mod la yang dag
223a5(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun tu bzung bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su
223a6(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'deb
223a7(rgyud): pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyis ci ste phyag rgya bzung ba tsam dang / bstan pa tsam gyis mod la sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
223b1(rgyud): thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang //
223b2(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / gzhon nu rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rgyun du rjes su
223b3(rgyud): 'brang ba byed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchod rten du gyur pa yin par 'dod pa dang / lus ring bsrel gyi snying po yin par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ltar mkhregs
223b4(rgyud): pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// dug gis mi tshugs/ mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ dbyig dug gi 'jigs pas ma yin/ seng ges ma yin/ gcan gzan gtum pos ma yin//
223b5(rgyud): dug mi bzad pas ma yin/ rkun po dang mi rgod kyis ma yin/ khyim rdib pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur/ nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus la dug
223b6(rgyud): sbyar ma dang / byad dang / spod gtong gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang
223b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang
224a1(rgyud): par 'dis mthong bar dgyes par 'gyur ro// rtag tu yon tan dang bsod nams 'bar ro// dpal gyis lus la shin tu 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'di mchod par/
224a2(rgyud): 'os pa chen por 'gyur te/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas su sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du'ang dgyes
224a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur te mchod par byed do// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bdag po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lba dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang /
224a4(rgyud): drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyang rtag tu de mthong bar 'dod par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dgyes par ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags
224a5(rgyud): 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang mar byas la dri sna tshogs kyis lus bsku ba dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa byas la/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis lag pa gnyis
224a6(rgyud): bskus te/ ga pur dang gla rtsis bsgos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ras ris kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku
224a7(rgyud): gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bya'o// mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi drung du phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshogs yon chab la sogs pa/
224b1(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// byabs pa dang snying rje'i sems su bya'o// sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang snying rje'i sems bsgom par bya'o// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par/
224b2(rgyud): bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yod la dran par bya'o// sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni bcing ba byas na phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdun bcing
224b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas mthu brjod par bya'o// mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rang bzhin gyi sku mngon du mthong ba yin no// rgyal po/
224b4(rgyud): 'am/ btsun mo'i nang du 'am/ skye bo mang po'i nang du tshogs pa 'am/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du 'am/ 'khor du bcas pa'i nang du'am/ rig byed bzhi tshogs pa dang / dge sbyong dang /
224b5(rgyud): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rje'u rigs dang / dam dra rig dang bcas pa de dag gi nang du de dag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul 'jig rten las 'das
224b6(rgyud): pa mod la mngon du mthong ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes nas yang dag par dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu dang / dge ba dang mi dge bas shi ba
224b7(rgyud): dang / skyes nas phyug po 'am/ dbul po 'am/ rgyal po thob pa 'am/ lha'i longs spyod dang / lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / rtag tung dbang phyub
225a1(rgyud): chen por 'gyur ba dang / klu'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi bzad par skye ba dang / mtshams med pa/
225a2(rgyud): la thug gi bar du mthong ba dang / bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dag 'jig rten mgon po'i mthus mngon sum du mthong bar
225a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / mi ngas dang / yams
225a4(rgyud): kyi nad dang / pha rol gyi 'khor ram/ rang gi 'khor la gnod pa dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul sprod pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / nad 'byung ba dang /
225a5(rgyud): nad med pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / shin tu char 'bab pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par 'bab pa dang / dar ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'byor pa dang / mi 'byor pa dang / 'ong ba
225a6(rgyud): dang / 'gro ba dang / nor dang / 'bru rnyed pa dang / 'phel ba dang / bri ba dang / lo nyes pa mthong ba dang / 'khor ba na da ltar gyi las gang cung zad legs par byed pa dang / nyes par byed pa dang / dge
225a7(rgyud): ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba legs par skye ba 'am/ ngan par skye ba 'am/ bu 'byung ba bu po 'am/ bu mo 'am/ bu bzang po 'am/ bu ngan pa 'am/ bsod
225b1(rgyud): nams can nam/ bsod nams med pa mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa nyid du mthong ste/ las kyi cho ga legs par byas pas the tsom mi bya'o// tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin mtshan
225b2(rgyud): brjod par bya mi dgos kyi/ bzlas brjod dang / gtor ma dang / gtsang sbra dang / bkru ba shal dang / shin tu khrus bya ba dang / gos gtsang ma bcang ba dang / bden par smra ba dang / byams pa'i sems
225b3(rgyud): dang / bla ma la legs par mnyan pa de gzung ba kho nar bya'o// zas dang / skom gtsang ma dang / chang dang / sha dang / beg cong dang / sgrog sgyu dang / ke'u dang / 'dres par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i zas
225b4(rgyud): yongs su spang ba dang / shin tu 'bags pa dang / de dag ni khyad par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar byas nas/ las 'di ni mod la thams cad mngon du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dka' thub spyod pa/
225b5(rgyud): la brnyas sems mi bya/ ma gus pa mi bya'i/ lkog tu'ang mi bya'o// rjes su bstan pa de dag ni mchog yin no// bsgrub par bya ba mchog de dag ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon pos bka' stsal pa
225b6(rgyud): yin no// dngul las me long chu zheng du sor bcu drug pa byas la/ zangs las pad+mo'i gdan khru gang gi tshad sdong bu dang bcas par bya'o// me long gi gong du dngul lam gser las 'phags pa
225b7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ste/ tshad sor bzhi pa/ gdan pad+mo// phyag bzhi la mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa dang / pad+ma dang / nor bu rin po che thogs par bya ba ni
226a1(rgyud): 'jog skyong legs par byas pa/ 'jam po 'od byin pa tsam du sbyang bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long gi gong gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku la ring bsrel gzhag
226a2(rgyud): par bya'o// ga pur dang gla rtsis sku la mchod par bya'o// me long gi nye 'khor thog thag tu dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i 'phreng ba gdags par bya'o// dbang
226a3(rgyud): bskur ba'i dar gdags par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long de la nyi ma re re zhing dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ ji tsam brgyad stong tshang
226a4(rgyud): gi bar du bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas me long 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gcig kho nar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku gzugs de las
226a5(rgyud): lha rdzas kyi chu 'dzag go// 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro// don yod par dga' ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
226a6(rgyud): snying po'i cho ga zhib mo grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// lus shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du don yod pa'i zhags pa
226a7(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa 'grub pa bstan par bya dgos pas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang bas sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyar khru bzhi/ 'phang du khru do ba byas pa/ shin tu mkhregs pa/ shin tu
226b1(rgyud): 'jam par bya'o// thig skud kyis rnam par phye zhing tshon sna tshogs rnam par dbye zhing sgo bzhi rnam par phye nas dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po rnam par phye ste/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad tshon gyis gsal
226b2(rgyud): bar bri zhing pad+ma'i dkyil du ge sar dang ze ba bya'o// stegs bu gru bzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / stegs bu'i grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa/ gtum pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i
226b3(rgyud): gzugs bri bar bya'o// stegs bu'i dbus kyi gnas par bar du lha dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /
226b4(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dbang phyug chen po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / ral pa gcig pa dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo dang / khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pho nya mo rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis bri zhing rgyan thams cad
226b5(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol du mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i 'phreng ba dang / pad+ma'i 'phreng ba kun tu bya'o// 'phreng ba'i bar dbus dang grwa'i bar du lga
226b6(rgyud): mo brgyad bya ste/ 'jigs byed ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ba san ti dang / dpal dang / sgra dbyangs dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dung can ma dang / pus pa dan ti rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshog/
226b7(rgyud): dang rin po che'i snod thogs par bya'o// phyi rol thog thag tu 'phreng ba'i bar bar du dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyis mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o// ga pur dang gla rtsis
227a1(rgyud): mchod cing dkyil 'khor kun tu dar sna tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang / rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi cung bang gis bkang ste gzhag par bya'o//
227a2(rgyud): dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis dgang bar bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu gzhag par bya'o// snod brgyad ro sna tshogs kyi gtor mas dgang bar bya'o// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs
227a3(rgyud): gzhag par bya'o// kha zas bza' ba dang gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// dri sna tshogs dang byug pas dngul gyi snod bkang ste gzhag par bya'o// dngul gyi pog por brgyad tsan dan dang / a
227a4(rgyud): ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / ga pur dang / glu rtsi dang / zur kum dang / sra rtsi bog dang / pog gis gang bar bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs pa bsreg go// dngul dang / zangs dang / gser gyi me tog gi
227a5(rgyud): bo'i dkyil 'khor du gcal du dgram mo// phyi'i dkyil 'khor du ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gcal du dgram par bya ste/ 'greng ba rnams khor yug tu bskor nas bzhag ste/ de la'ang me long legs par brgyan
227a6(rgyud): par byas nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma'i ge sar dang ze'u 'bru la shar du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor
227a7(rgyud): las dang bya ba thams cad byas nas/ me long la mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug par gyur nas/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod dbul bar bya ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa
227b1(rgyud): brgyad rdzogs pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ro// dba' bskur ba tsam gyis mod la 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum dang / 'khor chen po'i dbus su me long gi dbus der / 'phags pa spyan ras
227b2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ste/ me long gi dbus de nas rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so// bdag
227b3(rgyud): la don yod pa'i me long la 'bebs pa'i de kho na nyid dam par gyur pa 'di thams cad yang dag par mthong ste/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa zhes bya ba yongs su dag
227b4(rgyud): pa nyid do// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mtshungs pa med pa thob bo// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
227b5(rgyud): sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya grub bo// rig sngags 'chang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog gang 'dod pa spros shig/ de thams cad sbyin par bya'o//
227b6(rgyud): zhes so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchog gang don du gnyer ba de blangs na thams cad 'bral nyid du sbyin bar byed do// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa der kun nas 'ongs pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa
227b7(rgyud): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdun na 'don dang / btsun mo'i 'khor du kun
228a1(rgyud): 'ongs pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa 'am/ bsod nams dang mi ldan pa 'am/ yongs su dag pa 'am/ lta ba ngan pa 'am/ gzhan dmyal ba pa'i sems can gti mug gi mun pa la/
228a2(rgyud): lhung ba/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad la'ang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
228a3(rgyud): phyuphyag gi lus de la ston par byed/ thams cad du smra bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed/ thams cad du rang gi las dge ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de thams cad ston par byed do// rig sngags
228a4(rgyud): kyis chom rkun dang / gdol pa dang / rig sngags spong zhing nyams par byed pa dang / rig sngags sun 'byin par byed pa dang / rig sngags la ma dad cing gus pas mi nyan pa de'i mi mthong ba ni ma gtogs te/
228a5(rgyud): gzhan du na rang gi las kyi 'bras bu sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nges par 'byung bar mthong ngo // de nas sems can de rnams gang 'dod pa'i don yid la byed pa 'jug ste/ 'jig rten pa 'am 'jig rten las
228a6(rgyud): 'das pa de thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por rang rang gi 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba/ bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mthong bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
228a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang mthong ngo // po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal yas khang rnams bcom ldan 'das
228b1(rgyud): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal yas khang na lha dang klus yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo // gzhan ji lta da ltar gyi dge ba dang //
228b2(rgyud): mi dge ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / nad dang / 'chi ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / g.yul dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'jigs pa
228b3(rgyud): dang / rgyal ba 'am/ 'pham pa 'am/ brlag pa 'am/ ma brlag pa 'am/ yams sam/ char ches pa 'am/ dus ma yin pa'i char ram/ char med pa 'am/ rlung ngam/ sad dam/ tshang ba'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad
228b4(rgyud): mthong ngo // nor dang ldan pa 'am/ nyams pa 'am/ baphel ba 'am/ lo tog gam/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'phel ba'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad mthong ngo // chom rkun dang / rkun po dang / dug dang / mtshon
228b5(rgyud): cha'i 'jigs pa 'am/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa de thams cad mthong ngo // nor chen po 'am nor med pa de thams cad mthong
228b6(rgyud): / 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mthong ngo // bu thob pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul dang / ljongs thob pa dang / bud med thob pa de thams cad mthong ste/ 'di la dogs pa dang / yid gnyis dang / the tsom bskyed
228b7(rgyud): par mi bya zhing / mchog tu dang ba dang gus pas shin tu 'bad de cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogs
229a1(rgyud): so// / de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
229a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsungs pa cho ga zhib mo'i nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / ras
229a3(rgyud): ris shin tu zab pa/ shin tu gting dpag dka' zhing / shin tu rgya che la/ shin tu sgrub dka' ba dang / dkyil 'khor mang po dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / ras ris mang po yongs su bsgrags/
229a4(rgyud): pa rnams ni raba'i ba dang bral bar mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po drug can pa zab pa lta bu/ lhun po chen po dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ rdul phra ba lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang
229a5(rgyud): mtshungs pa lta bu/ bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ tshad meng pa/ bskal pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar bya ba med pa'i bskal pa'i tshad ma dang / bskal pa bsam gyis mi
229a6(rgyud): khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / lha'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / klu'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / sems can gyi tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan la snang ba'i
229a7(rgyud): tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la kun tu snang ba'i tshad ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshad ma dang / bdud kyi yul gyi tshad ma rnams kyis thog mar dmigs pa ma lags so// bcom
229b1(rgyud): ldan 'das par du'ang dmigs pa ma lags/ tha mar yang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar yongs su shes par bgyi/ sgrub thabs kyi tshogs bsgrub par bya ba ni du zhig lags/ gsang sngags ni ru/
229b2(rgyud): zhig phyag rgya ni du zhig/ dkyil 'khor ni du zhig/ bri bar bya ba'i phyag rgya ni du zhig/ lag pa'i phyag rgya ni du zhig/ bdug pa'i sbyor ba ni du zhig/ mig sman ni du zhig/ ril bu ni du zhig/ 'dug pa ni ngu zhig
229b3(rgyud): ras ras ni du zhig/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig/ snying po ni du zhig/ nye ba'i snying po ni du zhig/ khro bo'i gsang sngags ni du zhig/ drag po ni du zhig/ zhi ba ni du zhig/ yi ge gcig pa ni du zhig/ yi ge gnyi
229b4(rgyud): ba ni du zhig/ yi ge gsum pa ni du zhig/ yi ge bzhi pa ni du zhig/ yi ge lnga pa ni du zhig/ yi ge drug pa ni du zhig/ yi ge bdun pa ni du zhig/ yi ge brgyad pa ni du zhig/ yi ge dgu pa ni du zhig/ yi ge bcu pa ni
229b5(rgyud): du zhig lags/ smyung bar gnas pa ji ltar lags/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo ni ji ltar/ khrus kyi cho ga ni ji ltar/ gos bgo ba ni ji ltar/ phyogs bcing ba ni ji ltar/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni ji ltar/ gtsug
229b6(rgyud): tor bcing ba ni ji ltar/ bdag bsrung ba ni ji ltar/ gzhan bsrung ba ni ji ltar/ grogs bsrung ba ni ji ltar/ slob ma bsrung ba ni ji ltar/ rab tu 'jug pa ni ji ltar/ phyag bya ba ni ji ltar/ bskor ba bya ba ni ji ltar/
229b7(rgyud): mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul ba ni ji ltar/ gtor ma 'bul ba ni ji ltar/ me tog 'bul ba ni ji ltar/ bdug pa ni ji ltar/ dri ni ji ltar/ mar me ni ji ltar/ nye reg ni ji ltar/ lha bshos ni ji ltar/ thams
230a1(rgyud): cad du spyan drang ba ni ji ltar/ snyan gsan dbab pa ni ji ltar/ rmi las bskul ba ni ji ltar/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni ji ltar lags/ zhi ba can ni du zhig lags/ rnas pa can ni du zhig/ mngon/
230a2(rgyud): spyod can ni du zhig/ zhags pa ni du zhig/ rdo rje ni du zhig/ pad+ma ni du zhig/ gshegs su gsol ba ni du zhig/ nye bar 'pho bar byed pa'i bya ba ni du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan nyid ci 'dra/
230a3(rgyud): ba dang / rgyu mtshan ci 'dra ba dang / kun tu spyod par 'gyur ba ni mi shes so// bcom ldan 'das bdag las sgrub pa'i cho ga du zhig gis rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i
230a4(rgyud): tshe na sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ dngos grub du zhig rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems can bla na med par 'gyur bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la bdag 'khrugs par gyur
230a5(rgyud): cing bdag la spobs pa med do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes par mi nus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga'i mtshan nyid ji lta ba de dag bdag la gsung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la the
230a6(rgyud): com mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi the tsom gcad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas zhu ba
230a7(rgyud): yongs su zhus par gyur pa gsan nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di dri ba yongs su dris pa ni legs so lesra
230b1(rgyud): so// lag na rdo rje khyod la yongs su 'dri bar byed pa'i spobs pa skyes pa ni/ lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir don gyi ched du yongs su zhus pa'i phyir dang / rig sngags 'chang thams/
230b2(rgyud): cad kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du yongs su nus pa'i phyir dang / lag na rdo rje 'di ni mchog tu rmad du byung bas te phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo // lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshungs pa'o//
230b3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga/ rgya mtsho chen po dugacan pa dang zab par mtshungs pa ste/ 'di ni gting dpag dka' ba'o// lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho chen po
230b4(rgyud): thigs pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar nus kyi/ lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so// lag na rdo rje ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni rdul phra rab tu gtor ba'i grangs kyi mthar thug
230b5(rgyud): par bya bar nus shing / slar yang ri'i rgyal po'i ri rab tu gnas par 'dod pas rang gi gnas su rab tu gzhag par nus kyi/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so// de
230b6(rgyud): ltar rgya che ba/ de ltar gting dpag dka' ba/ de ltar zab pa ste/ lag na rdo rje 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyis mkhyen pa dang / gting dpag
230b7(rgyud): bar mi nus so// don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i tshad 'dzin par ni mi rus so// lag na rdo rje sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de dang / snying po dang ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de dang / zhags pa dang sgyu ma lta bu'i
231a1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang /
231a2(rgyud): dbyibs sna tshogs pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su mthong bar byed de/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i ched dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje 'di ni
231a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyar ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du mnyam par 'gro ba ste/ gang du chu dang 'o ma mnyam pas mnyam pa bzhin no// thams cad du mnyam pas
231a4(rgyud): khyams pa dang snying rje chen po rgyas par byed do// don yod pa'i zhags pas 'gugs par byed la sgrol bar byed do// 'chi ba med pa'i thang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'jog par byed do// dman pa dang / mchog dang khar/
231a5(rgyud): ma dang / rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa rnams thams cad du mnyam par dran par byed cing ming smos pa tsam gyis
231a6(rgyud): 'dzin par byed cing / sems can thams cad bla na med par byed la/ dub pa dang / ngal ba dang / yid la gcags par 'gyur ba med do// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
231a7(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / yi dgas dang / nags dang / gshin rje'i gnas ji srid du sa 'og gi nang du son pa rnams dang / srid pa'i rtse mo nas
231b1(rgyud): mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / ji srid du 'og min gyi srid pa'i bar du gcig tu sems bskyed pas yongs su rgyug go// lha dang klu dang bcas pa nas ji srid dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar thams cad dang / bud
231b2(rgyud): med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams bla na med par byed do// dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni mun pas mdongs pa thams cad sel bar byed de/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du mnyam par snang bar byed do//
231b3(rgyud): de bzhin nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad du snying rje chen pos kun tu snang bar byed cing / thams cad la thams cad du mnyam par gnas
231b4(rgyud): te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'ching ba rnams thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal yong
231b5(rgyud): su grol bar byed do// mtho ris la gzhol ba la sogs pa'i lam thams cad du 'god par byed do// de ltar snying rje chen po dang byams pa chen pos thams cad du mnyam par rjes su 'gro ste/ thams cad du mnyam
231b6(rgyud): par mchog tu byed cing / thams cad du mnyam par byang chub kyi lam la rab tu dgod par byed do// thams cad du mnyam par skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
231b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni brtan pa dang / go cha dang / spro ba chen pos rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du zhugs pa'o// lag na rdo rje
232a1(rgyud): 'di ni thabs gcig tu 'jug pa chen po ste/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa chen po'i lam las so sor ldog par byed pa'o// bde ba nas bde bar gshegs pa'i lam du 'god/
232a2(rgyud): par byed pa'o// rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med la bsam pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// sems kyis yid la gcags par 'gyur ba med do// de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag
232a3(rgyud): nardo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan bsngags pa chen po 'di thos nas dga' ba dang / mthu
232a4(rgyud): ba dang / yi mas pa dang / rab tu rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas ched du brjod pa ni ched du brjod par gyur to// e ma mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug/ e ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma/
232a5(rgyud): khyod kyi ming gi yon tan bskyed pas ngan 'gro thams cad grol bar byed do// phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi bla ma mgon po// 'di ni 'jig rten gyi yab chen
232a6(rgyud): bo/ 'di ni 'jig rten sgrol bar byed pa'i mgon po// thub pa nyid mo'i nyi ma'o// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de lta bur lag na rdo rje ji ltar smra bar bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
232a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug can song la mngon par phyag 'tshal nas yongs su nus shig/ mchog tu gyur pa'i dam tshis
232b1(rgyud): gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du snying po dang / de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin de rnams ston par byed do// don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur zhing lung
232b2(rgyud): 'bogs par byed do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes zab mo zab pa rtogs shing khong du chud de seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro zhing / rdo rje skor bar byed bzhin pas zla ba mdzes pa dri ma
232b3(rgyud): da pa'i me tog bzung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
232b4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog phul te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
232b5(rgyud): btsugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shin tu rmongs pa dang ldan pa/ dran pa
232b6(rgyud): yongs su nyams pa/ blo'i dpal zhum pa ste/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / ras ris kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rgyas pa 'di dang de dag mi shes so// sngon ma ni du zhig/
232b7(rgyud): bar ma ni du zhig/ tha ma ni du zhig/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni du zhig/ snying po ni du zhig/ nye ba'i snying po ni du zhig/ ji srid du yi ge bcu pa'i bar gyi gsang sngags ni ru zhig/ dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhing mo
233a1(rgyud): dang / ras ris ni du zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la skabs dbye bar gsol zhes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzugs dpa /
233a2(rgyud): phyug gis/ phyag na rdo rje la brtse ba'i don du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du nam mkha'i dbyings su gtor ro// gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
233a3(rgyud): steng gi mtshams su 'khor lo'i rnam par gnas so// dpag tshad lnga brgyar khyab cing sa gzhi las gyer du 'phags pa nyid kyi ji srid 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du gnas te/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po chen po'i sdong bu la/
233a4(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi dril bu dbyangs pa'i ba dan bcings pas mdzes shing 'bar bar yongs su gyur to// 'khor lo'i rnam pa legs par yongs su 'khor ba ni nyi ma bye ba brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i
233a5(rgyud): tu sdang ba/ legs par yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ shin tu dri ma med pa'i gser gyi mchod sdong rnam par mdzes par shin tu gnas pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs pas spras pa/ dga' ba
233a6(rgyud): byag yid kyi shing rta rab tu tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar bya ba mthong ba/ lha dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa dang / rjed par bya bar 'os pa dang / drang srong rnams kyis bstod par 'os pa dang / sang
233a7(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par 'os pa ste/ thams cad du zla ba mdzes pa dri ma med pa'i me tog gi ge sar la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsed/
233b1(rgyud): par 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas bzhugs pa la/ gdugs kun nas yongs su 'khor ba'i lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang / lha dang / klu dang / chus byung dang / lha'i bu mo dang / klu'i bu mo//
233b2(rgyud): dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyir dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag gis lha rdzas kyi
233b3(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / gos dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan cing / dar dpyangs dang / ba dan dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang /
233b4(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed par gyur to// lha rdzas sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab par gyur cing /
233b5(rgyud): lha'i dri za'i glu dbyangs yang dag par len cing / rnga dang pheg rdo ba rnams kyis mchod pa'i don du rol mo byed par gyur to// po Ta la'i ri bor gzhal med khang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa ru tsa co'i sgra chen
233b6(rgyud): po sgrogs par gyur to// po Ta la kar gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang yin pa rnams kyang sems tshims
233b7(rgyud): par thob cing rmad du byung ba thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil
234a1(rgyud): 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha gang yin pa rnams dang / glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'i lha gang yin pa rnams dang / dkyil
234a2(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad mchog tu ya mtshan pa dang ldan zhing rmad du byung ba thob ste/ sems tshim pa skyes la ngo mtshar ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin du kun tu
234a3(rgyud): gnas par gyur to// zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / lha dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / dga' byed
234a4(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / neg po chen po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gang ba babang po dang / stobs kyi/
234a5(rgyud): lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan gyi lha rnams dang / gzhon nu'i lha rnams gdugs kyi yu ba nas bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// lha'i gzhal med khang chen po lha'i rnam
234a6(rgyud): par sprul pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi mchod pa byed do// gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khor yug gi nang du dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / lha'i gnas thams cad du lha'i bus yongs su bskor ba gang yin pa de
234a7(rgyud): nam mkha' la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byed do// sa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
234b1(rgyud): dri za gang yin pa rnams dang / sa gzhi'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang / nags kyi lha dang / lo tog gi lha dang / sman gyi lha gang yin pa de rnams thams cad sa'i mthil gyi gzhal yas khang de sbyong bar byed par gyur te/
234b2(rgyud): dri sna tshogs pa'i chus chag chag 'debs shing / dri sna tshogs pa'i phye mas byug par byed/ me tog sna tshogs gcal du 'grems shing / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas sa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag
234b3(rgyud): par brgyan par gyur to// de ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i go skabs rgya chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po/
234b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yangs pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ shin tu ya mtshan pa thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/ 'di ltar sems par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sem
234b5(rgyud): dpra' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bstan pa ni shin tu ya mtshan no// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
234b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la slar yang gsol ba btab bo// bcom ldan 'das skabs dbye bar mdzod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
234b7(rgyud): gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje dogs pa bsal ba dang the tsom gcod pa la rjes su gzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ab
235a1(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
235a2(rgyud): sngar 'khor ras mig mi 'dzum zhing bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa lus 'od zer 'bar bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang
235a3(rgyud): pad+ma yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / pad+ma gtsug tor gyi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i gsang ba sgyu ma lta bu'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor
235a4(rgyud): chen po'i rim par phye ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o// sgrub pa sgra ning bklags pas 'grub pa dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'i
235a5(rgyud): snying po nye bar bstan par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas phyag gser gyi kha dog can/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gis yang dag par brgyan pa
235a6(rgyud): brkyang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag 'jog par mdzad cing / sems can dag pa chen po lags so legs so// spyan ras gzigs
235a7(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug nga lnga de'i dus la bab par shes na spros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig mas
235b1(rgyud): phyogs bcur kun tu bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la kun tu bltas te/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor
235b2(rgyud): gyi nor bu don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsungs so// don yod pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang po ni/ dus gsum du gshes
235b3(rgyud): shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor don yod pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang /
235b4(rgyud): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi snying po'i dam tshig rnams
235b5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po 'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byam/
235b6(rgyud): pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags
235b7(rgyud): pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor 'chang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
236a1(rgyud): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal
236a2(rgyud): lo// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsungs pa/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
236a3(rgyud): gsungs pa 'di bdag gis da ltar 'khor chen po la bshad par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ oM pad+moSh+Ti 'ab rang hUM/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsir tsa ra/ bi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ra/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni/
236a4(rgyud): ma ri mi ra/ tsi ra tsi ri/ bai ba raM/ za ba ra/ mahA pad+mA hastAM/ ka la ka la/ kai li ki la~M/ ku lu ku lu/ mahA shud d+hA satwA/ e h+ya hi/ bud+d+ha b+had+d+ha/ d+hA bad+hA ba/ ka r+Na kaN/ ki Ni kaMH/ bdaN+Da ku N+Ta/ pa ram shud d+ha saH/
236a5(rgyud): ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+pa/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la/ a TaT e TaT/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hai ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA bi ma laM/ pad+moSh+NI Sha bi ra dza sA d+ha ya hUM hUM/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka
236a6(rgyud): ma / ma tu ma mabyu du myi chubs sa pa samam pa @mdu d+ha ba sa seM/ pa [।] smra/
236a7(rgyud): pa d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu rma d+hu ru/ mahA pad+ma dzA lA d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ pad+ma pA sha d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra ba ra ba ra/ ba rar sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra/ pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI rA ye/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta ba ta ra/
236b1(rgyud): b+ha ga bAn so ma A di t+ya ya ma/ ba ru na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma/ in+da/ rai Shi ga Na/ de ba ga Na/ a b+hu rtsi ta/ tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nata ku mA ra/ ru tra khA sa ga biSh+Ta/ d+ha nad/ de ba
236b2(rgyud): rai Shi nA ya ka/ ba hu/ bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pad+ma dar+Na d+ha rA bA sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra sa raM/ tsa ra tsa ra kha ra
236b3(rgyud): bi ra mahA ba ra dA ya ka/ sa man+ta maN+Da la/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu phu mu phu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ b+ha ba ban Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma ma sarba b+ha ye b+h+ya
236b4(rgyud): sarba u pa dra bye b+h+yaHsarba gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba dzA re b+h+yaH/ sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH/ ban d+ha ban d+ha na tA Sha na tardza na/ rA dza tso ra/ taskA ra/ ag+ni/ u da kaHbi Sha/ shas+dza/ pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/
236b5(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra/ in+d+ri ba la/ bo d+h+yaM ga/ tsa tu rAr+ya sa t+ya/ saM pra kA sha ka/ ta ma tam/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mon+ta kA ra/ bi d+ha ma na/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Sha rba
236b6(rgyud): Sha Sha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ dza Thi dzaM tri/ Tu Tu Tu N+ya/ dru dzu tru dz+ra/ e ne ya tsarma kr-i ta bA ri ka ra e h+ye hi/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga Na/ sa b+hany+dza ka/ ma hA sid+d+hi swa ra/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra ba ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/
236b7(rgyud): mthum Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi lam/ ni b+ha sa ma/ ma hA ny+dza rba/ k+Sha/ shwe sa ma dz+nyA ba bI tar tan ma suT/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba d+hA shi ra si matam ku Ta ya har+dz+dza sa ma lA ma la ti/ ki ra ta la/ d+hu na sa m+ba d+hi/ bi bo tha /
237a1(rgyud): hu satwa san+ta ti/ pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA rma ti ka/ sarba karma a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba byA d+hi pra mo tsa ka/ sarba A shA pa ra pU ra ka/ sarba satwa sa ma shA sa ka/ oM pad+mo d+b+ha Sha bA sha tra
237a2(rgyud): maN+Da la na mo sU te swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten/
237a3(rgyud): gyi khams kyi sa gzhi cher g.yos par gyur te/ ri dang / nags dang / dgon par bcas pa rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos par gyur to// kun nas sa'i mthil 'di'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi
237a4(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan kun nas bting bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+mo'i lte ba'i gnas na pad+mo chen po gyen du 'phags pa 'dab ma stong pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po chen po'i sdong
237a5(rgyud): bu dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi snying po dang / mu tig dmar po'i ze'u 'bru dang / lha'i mu tig chen po'i ge sar dang gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ sngon
237a6(rgyud): bo dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsong dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog tu snang bzhin pas 'bar zhing rnam par gsal la ljang ngo'o// phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su
237a7(rgyud): kun tu snang bar byed do// lha'i gnas dang / klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas dang / srin po'i gnas dang / dri za'i gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas dang / mi 'am ci'i
237b1(rgyud): gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kun tu sdang bar byed do// rab tu tshim par byed do// yang dag par skul bar byed do// yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do// dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po rna pA/
237b2(rgyud): kun tu snang zhing reg pas dmyal ba chen po de rnams kyang pad+ma can chen por skyes par gyur to// sems can dmyal ba de rnams kyang kun nas snang zhing reg pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad yongs su grol te//
237b3(rgyud): bsams pa tsam gyis mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skyes shing / lha'i lus la rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / gos dang / sdud pas rnam par brgyan cing / skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran
237b4(rgyud): par skyes so// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams kun nas snang bas/ ri dgas dang bya de dag thams cad kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas las yongs su grol te/ mtho rigs su rna rgyan dri ma med
237b5(rgyud): cing g.yo ba 'dzin par skyes so// de bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad kun tu snang zhing reg pa de rnams thams cad sa chen po brgyad pa la rab tu gnas par gyur to// des kyang 'khor
237b6(rgyud): chen po kun tu 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de rnams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu bkod par gyur to// rig sngags 'cha
237b7(rgyud): gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang don yod par pad+ma'i gtsug tor chen po'i snying po gsang ba don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub so sor thob par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams
238a1(rgyud): cad kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan so sor snang bar gyur to// lha'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang 'od 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// gnod sbyin drung /
238a2(rgyud): srin po gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang du gnas par gyur to// 'byung po'i 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to//
238a3(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi 'khor gang yin pa de rnams thams cad rdo rje'i go cha dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi ya lang bgos par gyur to// nam mkha' lding gi 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang rdo rje mchu rtse mo chen po'i stobs kyi shwa
238a4(rgyud): rjes su thob par gyur to// mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor gang yin pa thams cad kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par gyur to// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / bud med dang / skyes pa/
238a5(rgyud): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sku las li ma'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od ze
238a6(rgyud): chen po snang bar spros te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar rjes su zhugs so// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs kar zhugs
238a7(rgyud): ma thag tu/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa la ltos shig/ lag na rdo rjes
238b1(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lags so// sems dpa' dag pa bdag gis mthong lags so// sems dpa' chen po dag pa 'di'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
238b2(rgyud): pad+ma'i dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu zab pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ rmad du byung ba chen po// dngos grub mchog sgrub par byed
238b3(rgyud): ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das mtha' dag rgyas par gsungs shig/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba/ nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa ni/ sems can
238b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sdig pa rnam par 'joms pa'i don dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi mchog 'grub pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyar sngar gsungs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
238b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje don yod zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba gtsun
238b6(rgyud): tor thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ dri ma dang rnyog ma thams cad sel bar byed
238b7(rgyud): ga nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ sdig pa dang / ma rungs pa'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs dang log
239a1(rgyud): par 'dren pa thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ bdud la sogs pa'i ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ dug dang / mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / mche
239a2(rgyud): kha'i dug dang / seng ge dang / rgyal po dang / gnod sbyin rnams ldog par byed pa/ dug dang / byad snyems dang / g.yeng byed dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ don yod zhags pa'i
239a3(rgyud): snying po de kho na nyid gces pa/ rmad du byung ba/ de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i sgrub pa bla na med pa bklags pas grub pa 'di rjes su zung zhig/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bzhin 'dzum zhing /
239a4(rgyud): gdong khro gnyer dang bral bas rdo rje skor bar byed bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das don yod zhags pa'i snying
239a5(rgyud): po dam par gyur pa gsang ba pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor de rnams du zhig lags/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
239a6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab par rig nas/ phyag g.yas pas lte ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgya'i rnam pa la reg go// reg ma thag tu phyag g.yas pa'i
239a7(rgyud): pad+ma la snying po'i rig sngags de'ang pad+ma'i steng du 'dug ste/ rang gi ngo bo gzhal med khang tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ don yod pa'i gzugs spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par
239b1(rgyud): brgyan pa/ nor bu gser gyi cod pan can/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis spud pa/ zla ba byed pas rnam par mdzes pa/ zhags pa 'chang ba dang / pad+ma'i
239b2(rgyud): gtsug tor 'chang ba dang / nor bu'i dbyug pa 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'chang ba/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ 'od zer 'bar bas yang dag par brgyan pa/ gos rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs pa dang /
239b3(rgyud): spyan nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag par 'bar bas rnam par mdzes pa/ pad+ma rnams kyi steng na mdzes bzhin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyes par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
239b4(rgyud): kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa/ lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa/ klu thams cad kyis rjes su gzung bar 'os pa/ drang srong thams cad kyis dga' bar 'os/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
239b5(rgyud): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis rjes su 'gro bar 'os pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bla mar 'os pa mthong ste/ de lta bu'i snang ba rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
239b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ de kho na nyid gces pa'i snying por gyur pa'i snying po nye bar bstan no// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de mthong ba tsam/
239b7(rgyud): gyis mod la snying po gsang ba/ don yod pa'i pad+ma dri ma med pa'i gtsug tor 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob par gyur to// ting nge 'dzin so sor thob pa gang gis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
240a1(rgyud): nang du chud par gyur to// de rnams thams cad rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis zhabs dag gi rjes la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a'agra/
240a2(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags 'di smras so// oM a mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da ya pad+moSh+NI Sha ku m+bA ra be Sha d+ha ra pad+me shwa ra/ A be sha ya/ sarba a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya/
240a3(rgyud): hr-id ya/ sarba sid+d+hi a mo g+ha pra ya r+yA pad+ma/ padz+ra pU hUM ra mo stu te swA hA/ 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i snying po bklags pas grub pa'i sgrub thibs so// oM a mo g+ha pad+mod+d+hi She shwa ra/ pad+me shwa ra/ sa ma d+ha ya sarba taH
240a4(rgyud): ga ta nAM/ a mo g+hi pad+moSh+NI Sha sa ma yaM A kaR+Sha ya/ pra bi sha ya/ sarba karma sid+d+hi pra yats+tsha me a ba lo ki twe shwa ra hUM hUM/ ma hA badz+roSh+mA Sha b+hu dze swAhA/ rigs kyi rgyal po'o gsang sngags so// oM ma hA tsaN+DA pad+me shwa/
240a5(rgyud): ra bi bi d+ha rU pa/ bi ka Ta/ pad+ma daSh+T+rA ka rA la b+hI Sha Na/ bak+ka sarba duSh+Ta hri da yaM/ khA da ya/ big+h+nAM/ prad+ma d+h+r-i ka/ tsi Ti/ dri Ta hU~M swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i rigs kyi snying po'o// nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i las
240a6(rgyud): rnams so// oM a mo g+ha pad+moSh+NI She pad+ma pA shi kro d+ha ka mA ya karma pra be sha ya ma hA shu pa ti/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA tsaN+Da be ga a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya/ bad+me hUM hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po
240a7(rgyud): don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'o// de nas dor yod pa'i snying po'i las rnams su 'gyur te/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pas gcig
240b1(rgyud): tu mtshungs par 'gyur ro// tshe dpag med dang mnyam pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa/
240b2(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur ro// mtshungs shing mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mthong ngo // pad+ma'i phyag gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi phyag gis 'jig rten dbang
240b3(rgyud): byug dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i gtsug tor bcings pa nyid kyis spyi bo'i gtsug tu mngon par dbang bskur na/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par dbang bskur/
240b4(rgyud): ro// pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis don yod par dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po rgyas par 'gyur ba thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag dang bla na med pa'i dpal thob bo// rigs kyi rgyal po'i
240b5(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyas par gyur pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor du rigs kyi rgyal po legs par grub par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rigs kyi rgyal po'i dngos grub bzang po rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rigs/
240b6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do// pad+mo'i phyag gis rjes su 'jug cing / don yod pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub ji
