240b7(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du 'grub ste/ bklags pas grub pa 'di la the tsom med do// pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rigs kyi dngos grub dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor ram/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du bklags
241a1(rgyud): gnas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po dang rig sngags kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de thams cad du dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi cho ga zhib mo dang phyag
241a2(rgyud): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rigs thun mong ba thams cad du rgyal po'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag rnams dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye
241a3(rgyud): ma dang mnyam pa'i zhing du rgyal por 'gyur ro// rigs kyi rig pas lha'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i tshogs rnams kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rtag tu'ang gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams su gyur pa dang /
241a4(rgyud): dri za rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid du thams cad du rgyal po dang dbang phyug tu rtag tu 'gyur te the tshom med do// nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang /
241a5(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / thams cad du ji srid byang chub la yang dag par gnas kyi bar du rigs kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam dang / drag po de yid la sems pa tsam gyis mod
241a6(rgyud): la 'phral du ri rab lhung bar byed cing / khor yug gi ri rnam par 'thor bar byed do// rgya mtsho chen po kun nas dkrug cing / rgya mtsho chen po nye bar skye bar byed do// kun tu gsal bar byed do// klu'i gnas thams
241a7(rgyud): cad du klu'i gnas 'bar bar yang byed do// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyi skad cig tsam gyis steng du bdug par byed do// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gza' dang / brjed
241b1(rgyud): byed dang / mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po'i gsang ba pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig la gnas pa dang / dkyil 'khor du phyag rgya
241b2(rgyud): gnas pa dang / gsang sngags kyi lha gzhan gang yin pa rnams kyis khro bo'i rgyal po dran pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do// de rnams thams cad rjes su 'bras
241b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing gnas par byed do// 'ga' zhig gang du 'gro ba 'am 'dug pa de la dbang po dang / skabs gsum pa'i lha dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu
241b4(rgyud): lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / gzhon nu dang / sde dpon dang / de bzhin du rgyal po chen po ni dus rtag tu rig sngags 'chang gi rjes su 'brang bar byed do// the tshom med do// khros
241b5(rgyud): pa'i las rnams sam/ de bzhin du drag po'i las rnams thams cad kyang hUM yig tsam gyis de la dngos grub mthong ngo // phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / sems can ma rungs pa shin tu mi bzad pa rnams dang /
241b6(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'jigs pa dang / rnam par 'gras pa'i skye bo dang / sdig pa de rnams thams cad hUM yig gis mchog tu gzir ba tsam gyis thal bar 'jig par 'gyur ro// sdang ba dang /
241b7(rgyud): tan sems pa'i sems can dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / byas pa la 'khon pa thams cad drag po'i hUM yig bzlas pa tsam gyis skad cig la sreg ste/ dper na me yis phye ma leb bzhin no// las gzhan
242a1(rgyud): stong phrag rnams dang / las brgya stong phrag nyid bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la las thams cad 'grub bo// de nas don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor dran pa tsam/
242a2(rgyud): gyis bya ba thams cad ni gnyis su 'gyur te/ ji ltar gang cung zad yid la byed pas las byed do// dkyil 'khor ram gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do/
242a3(rgyud): zhes so// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bco lnga pa// de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgos pa/
242a4(rgyud): thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ oM zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig pa'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum
242a5(rgyud): dran par byas nas dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal ba mi bzad pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur//
242a6(rgyud): ro// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro// 'phagra
242a7(rgyud): bskrun ras gathags dbang phyug drug tu 'chog sbyin pa badzad do// gsang thags oM zhes bya ba dran nam che 'thos par 'jis rten gyi khams ba pa can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gas klags kyi mi me gcig

242b3(rgyud): gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas ri gru 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// oM bad+me/ gsang sngags kyi yi ge gsum

243a2(rgyud): cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go// mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur zhing / phyir zhing nam yang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi

243a7(rgyud): tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po rim par phye ba grub cing rig sngags 'chang khyod sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad spangs kyis/ bya ba thams cad gyis shig/ yid la bya

248b3(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ri dgas dang / bya dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sems can
248b4(rgyud): gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum bzung ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas/
248b5(rgyud): sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur la/ tshe brdzes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs nas/
248b6(rgyud): tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tsan dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'khor sa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang ngam/ rgyal po
248b7(rgyud): po brang du bdugs na/ gang dag der dri ma rnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos gos la bdugs nas gang gi lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa
249a1(rgyud): thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus la bab pa tsam gyis dri ma dang / ser sna dang / skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// gos bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams
249a2(rgyud): cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyi gos de bdugs nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla
249a3(rgyud): mar yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na dge slong thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'os par 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na nor chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing mchod pa
249a4(rgyud): chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro// ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i khar bdugs nas gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mod la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par
249a5(rgyud): byed do// gu gul dang bsres nas lha chen po'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing / gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun byab pa byas na mod nyid la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dug
249a6(rgyud): nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong bar byed do// bo la dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul bsres nas sred med kyi bu'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing / gsang sngags rtsa ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig lus kyi yan lag
249a7(rgyud): la byab pa byas na/ sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug cing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed la/ dngos po sna tshogs kyang sbyin par byed do// yungs kar dang bsres nas tshangs pa la bdug
249b1(rgyud): cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bcu bzhi byab pa byas na/ tshangs pa rang gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug la mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// pad+ma'i phye ma dang bsres nas nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs la bdun/
249b2(rgyud): na/ nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing mchog dang bya ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// na ga puSh+pa dang / sbrul gyi shun pa dang bsres pa'i bdug pa
249b3(rgyud): klu'i mtshor bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas klu'i mtshor gtor la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing dran par byas na klu dang / klu mo dang
249b4(rgyud): klu'i bu po dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la bdud cing gang bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed la/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// lan gsum
249b5(rgyud): sbyar na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'ang 'ong ngo // klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'ang 'ong zhing thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed la dbang du gyur nas 'dug go/ gnod sbyin dang srin po dgug par 'dod pas dur khrod
249b6(rgyud): kyi nang du mi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas bdugs la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba gsang mthon pos lan bdun brjod cing dran na gnod sbyin dang srin po dag rgyug cing 'ong la/ rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la
249b7(rgyud): btud nas/ rje btsun bka' stsol cig ces zer ba dang / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis de bsgo ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas na bsgo ba thams cad byed la/ mngag pa'i las byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar
250a1(rgyud): du 'dug go// thod pa sbyar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas thod pa bkang ba'i bdug pas bdugs na 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur la/ las byed/
250a2(rgyud): pabapar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas btsag gis gnod sbyin mo bris la/ ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas par phyes pad+ma'i ri mo bri zhing / phye'i gtor ma pad+ma lta bur byas pa bzhag la bdug pa
250a3(rgyud): 'dis bdug cing / gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnod sbyin mo la brdeg pa byas na gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug
250a4(rgyud): cing / lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'gro la/ slar yang 'ong ste don gsang ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur ro// yang na ma 'am/ chung ma 'am/ sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas na bu la sdug
250a5(rgyud): pa longs spyod dang / gzhal med khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jug la/ rgyal po'i bu bzhin yongs su skyong bar byed do// gal te sring mor byas na rnam thos la 'gran par 'gyur ro// gal te chung mar byas na sum cu
250a6(rgyud): rtsa gsum gyi bdag po ltar dga' ba'i longs spyod dag la rtser 'jug par byed do// lha mo dpal la bdugs la gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing lha mo dpal gyi mgo la byugs na/ lha mo
250a7(rgyud): chen mo dpal rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing nor gyi phung po chen po 'bul bar byed de/ nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing nor chen po nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na
250b1(rgyud): gser sra stong sbyin par byed do// nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs na gser gyi dong tshe stong sbyin par byed do// tshal gseb tu bdugs na tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cig rdzas
250b2(rgyud): dang ldan thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdud na 'dug go// rnams la bdugs na du dang / shing gil ba dang / sman dang / rdzas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnams su bdugs na/
250b3(rgyud): grong khyer kun tu khams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dag/ 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'brog tu bdugs na rkun mong
250b4(rgyud): g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / seng ge dang / skrag dang / sbrul dang / dred dang / dom gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / ri dgas gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
250b5(rgyud): ro// rims thams cad la bdugs na rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'gegs pa tsan dan gyi bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o// / de nas thig le yang
250b6(rgyud): dag par bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags sgrub pa ni nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing skar ma'i rnam pa ltar 'bar ba yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba/
250b7(rgyud): ni bsod nams kyi phung po rnam par 'phel lo// lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur gyis/ rig sngags #
251a1(rgyud): gis the tsom mi bya'o// dpral ba'i steng du thig le byed pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin te/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsal zhing shel ltar dag pa mdog dkar sham ltar dri zhim
251a2(rgyud): pab dang / glang po che'i bya la dang / dpral ba dang / ba lang gi gnas lhur skyon med cing mnyam par mthun la shin tu dul ba/ ded dpon gcig pu'i nor bur gyur cing gsang sngags 'bum bzlas pas legs
251a3(rgyud): par bab pa/ gser dang gos ltar kun tu 'bar ba ni thig le yin no// smin mtshams kyi bar dpral ba na shin tu phra ba rtag tu rtag par mdzes pa ni zla ba nya ba mkha' la 'gro ba lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na gsal
251a4(rgyud): ba ni rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zla ba dbus na gnas pa bzhin rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na lha rnams kyi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin lta bu yin la/ skye bo'i dbus na ni 'jig rten gyi rgyal po gdugs gcig pa ltar 'bar ba yin/
251a5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi nang na gdugs gcig pa bde bar gshegs pa ltar shin tu dul ba yin la/ shAkya'i rigs kyi brgyud ltar sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du nor bu mchog rnam par dag pa
251a6(rgyud): ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa yin no// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug gcig pu lhur mchog dang rab mchog sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin par byed de//
251a7(rgyud): de ltar thig le nor bu'i mthu ni 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur zhing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po dbang po dbang du 'gyur bar rjes su 'gro
251b1(rgyud): ba dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dod par gyur pa thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ba ni nam mkha' la skar ma ltar dpral bar rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin/
251b2(rgyud): te/ sems can thams cad kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag tu 'dud la mes mi 'tshig/ chus mi 'khyer zhing / lus la dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / bye ma'i dug dang / byang mi bzang ba dang / ngan sngags dang /
251b3(rgyud): sdang ba'i rnam pas mi tshugs par 'gyur te/ nor bu lta bu'i mthus de dag thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// rims dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nang dang / rlung dang / klad nad chen po la thig le bya
251b4(rgyud): pas mod la de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can btson du gzung ba 'am/ chad pas gcad pa 'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la thig le lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// smin
251b5(rgyud): mtshams sam dpral bar thig le lta bu byas na de'i mod la gnod sbyin brgya stong dang / srin po drag po'i gzugs can gdon brgya stong rnams lus la 'jug par mi 'gyur zhing / glang po che dang / ri dgas kyi
251b6(rgyud): bdag po'i khyu dang / chom rkun gyi lam dang / shod kyi lam dang / ri'i lam dang / ri sul dang / ngam grog dang / glog dang / grang ba dang / rlung sbrul dang / sdang 'jigs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/
251b7(rgyud): thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i de brgya stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang / 'thab mo dang / tha snyad mod nyid la zhi bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor
252a1(rgyud): btags pa gang yin pa dang / thig le'ang byas nas 'khor lo la byugs la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na/ bdag nyid gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag/
252a2(rgyud): bzhi pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham pa byas par 'gyur zhing / phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// thig le byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du
252a3(rgyud): zhugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas nye bar 'khod do// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas par nor bu btags la yan lag dang yan lag
252a4(rgyud): dag tu thig le byas na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing reg pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la/ don gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang de thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// ril bu dag ni khar bcug nas/ lhan cig 'dug
252a5(rgyud): la smras na ni// thams cad dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am/ dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang // rgyal rigs dang ni dmangs rigs nyid// skyes pa dang ni bud med dang // khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyang rang
252a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// kun tu mngags pa'i las rnams byed// ril bu zos pa tsam gyis ni// nad rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig/ gang gi nyin bzhi pa yi rims// gang dag khong skem nad kyis
252a7(rgyud): nyams// gang zhig rtag pa'i rims kyis btab// gang du 'thab mo 'byung ba dang // de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can// bdag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnor// skem byed skem pa brjed byed dang / gang zhig gdon
252b1(rgyud): gzhan mi bzang pa// sdig pa'i las ni kun tu spyod// sngon gyi las ni mi bzad pa// de kun skad cig tsam gyis 'jig/ ril bus khrus byas tsam gyis ni// 'bras dang shu bar gyur rnams dang // ldog pa dang ni rkang shu/
252b2(rgyud): dadang/ mtshan par rdol dang me dpal dang // khyi rngo mdzes dang rkang pa'i nang // mi bzad de rnams kun dang ni// gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin// byugs pa tsam gyis mod la mi// thams cad dug med zhi bar 'gyur//
252b3(rgyud): ril bu thams cad las byed pa// lha rdzas shi ba sos par byed// ril bu dag ni 'chang byed cing // thig le dag ni byas pa yis// thams cad du ni mchod pa 'thob// thams cad du ni nor dag 'du// dpal 'dod
252b4(rgyud): ba ni dpal 'thob cing // 'bru 'dod 'bru yi phung po 'phel// lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing // klu rnams kyang ni dga' dang bcas// gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang // lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci// lho 'phye chen
252b5(rgyud): po thams cad dang // 'byung po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas// rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing // thams cad dbang du gyur nas 'khod// 'khod kun bram byed ci bya zer// gang zhig ril bu de dag bsten/
252b6(rgyud): ril bu thig le rtag byed la// de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // de nyid rig la rtag tu ni// mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad// bsod nams
252b7(rgyud): phung po stong dag ni// nyi ma re re bsogs par byed// 'jig rten pa yi bde spyad cing // 'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde// tshe brje ba ni 'phos nas su// bde ba can du mod la 'gro/ gang dang gang du skye bar ni//
253a1(rgyud): rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dran// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing // g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// dus kun tu ni srung ba dang // skyob dang sbed dang srung /
253a2(rgyud): bar byed// gang zhig bu ni med pa dang // bud med bu ni 'dod pa la// ril bu gcig cig sbyar nas su// mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags ni// mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi ngor// 'bum ni tshang bar bzlas nas
253a3(rgyud): su zla ba nya ste bco lnga la// skyes pa bud med khrus bya zhing // yan lag yan lag thig le bya// dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing // bram ze dag kyang mchod ston byed// srung ba'i cho ga byas nas su/
253a4(rgyud): gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsham// bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan nas su// gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas// snying rje sems can sdug par byed// bsam pa dag cing
253a5(rgyud): des pa dang // bla mar rtag tu gus par bya// me tog sna tshogs rab dgang zhing // spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang // du rus tsan dan sa la ki/ lha yi bdug pas bdug bya zhing // bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni// ril bu leg
253a6(rgyud): sbyar bza' bar bya// gsang ba 'di 'thungs mod la ni// btung dang kha za bza' bar bya// mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya// byams mdzad de yi zhabs drung du// mtshan mo//
253a7(rgyud): nyal dang nang par ni// mthong ba mchog 'di thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // mchog sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing // mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par mdzad// bud med de ni bu skyed cing //
253b1(rgyud): gzugs bzang mchog tu blta na sdug/ stobs ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// lha yi dpal gyi rjes su 'gro// chos ldan mkhas shing gsal ba dang // tshe ring dbang phyug tshad med 'gyur// dpa' bo dgra
253b2(rgyud): las rgyal ba dang // sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// yang na dran pa'i blo skyed par 'dod pas thos pa la brten nas 'dug cing // rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma zhag bdun du nyin re zhing mar dang 'o ma
253b3(rgyud): bskol ba der ril bu bdun bcug ste/ zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas 'jam tsam pa 'thungs la phyis kha bas bza' bar bya// nag bdun gyis thos pa'i rgya mtsho chen
253b4(rgyud): po bsags par 'gyur te/ bstan bcos thams cad dang / chos lugs dang / 'dul ba dang / snyan dngags dang / brda sprod pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / tshig su bcad pa'i sde dang /
253b5(rgyud): gleng gzhi'i sde dang / chud du brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / chos mngon pa dang / rtsis dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa
253b6(rgyud): chen po thams cad kha ton du lobs par 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar ba byas na stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur te/ glang po che khri'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig
253b7(rgyud): tsam sbyar ba byas na lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gnyer ma dang sgra dkar spangs la/ sgra lcang lo 'khril zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi mdog pad+ma dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro// lo gcig tu sbyar na lha'i
254a1(rgyud): sman bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cing nam mkha'i steng du lha rnams dang lhan cig mthun par 'gyur la/ brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mom/
254a2(rgyud): tshogs dang lha'i gzhal med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na 'dug par 'gyur/ nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro/
254a3(rgyud): bar byed/ gzi brjid shin tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la the tsom mi bya'o// las thams cad sgrub pa'i thig le dang / ril bu sgrub pa'i cho ga bzhi pa'o//
254a4(rgyud): de nas mi snang bar bya ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub pa bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de kho na yin no// sman dngul
254a5(rgyud): dang / brah+ma k+Shi ra dang / su bar+Na kI ra dang / shel sngo bsangs dang / ku k+Shi dang / su gan d+hi dang / ka~M kuSh+pa skyon med pa dang / ut+pal bzang po dang / pad+ma k+Sha dang / gu gul dang / pe lu pa ta trA dang / gur kum dang
254a6(rgyud): rA ga puSh+pa dang bcas pa dang / spang spos dang / shi ri Sha'i me tog dang / tsan dan dkar po dang bcas pa bsres nas zhib tu btags pa'i bye ma la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi rgyal pos
254a7(rgyud): sngags kyis shin tu brtson par lar brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing / khro bo'i gsang sngags lan brgyad srong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig pa lan 'bum
254b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya/ dro'i tsho gsang sngags bcu po so sor lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas sman dor yod pa rgya ba gsal ba zhes bya ba/
254b2(rgyud): sman gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzheg la grib ma la bskam par bya'o// yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad
254b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas nas snod gtsang ma'i nang du bcug la/ nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe thams cad du sgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas lus legs/
254b4(rgyud): bar khrus byas la spos chus byugs te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ sman gyi mchog 'di yungs mar gyis sbrus la rang gi lus la byug par bya ste/ lan cig bskus pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la/ gnas
254b5(rgyud): gsang bar bya ba'i sgo bcad pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad byed par 'gyur// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
254b6(rgyud): sha za la sogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rjes
254b7(rgyud): su 'jug par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'dug la/ klu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdun du 'khod nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing / las su bya ba
255a1(rgyud): dang dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing nyin mtshan du gnas la/ de nas klu thams cad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro//
255a2(rgyud): sman la sing ha dzi hra dang ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas mgo kun byugs na ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang / rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs ston par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston/
255a3(rgyud): par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad 'khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugs sde tshogs ston par byed/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do// spos
255a4(rgyud): kyi ti la mar dang smras nas byin pa dang rkang pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la/ gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu'i steng du 'gro zhing rnams kyang
255a5(rgyud): phyir sa la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na gang dang gang la lag pa reg pa de 'ong bar 'gyur la sus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la
255a6(rgyud): bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed do// don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang sus kyang mi mthong ngo // bud med gang dang phrad na sus kyang mi mthong la/
255a7(rgyud): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug kyang sus kyang mi shes so// khar byugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang / bzhad gad byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs na bya ba thams cad byed la lus ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo // /
255b1(rgyud): bum pa la byugs nas chus bkang na chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni mi mngon no// gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbus byugs na chu de gang bar snang la bum pa de ni mi snang ngo // bdag nyid la byugs nas bum pa chung/
255b2(rgyud): bkang ba lag na thogs na bum pa las chu 'byung ba ni sdang la mi de'i lus ni mi snang ngo // mig la bskus nas skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i sgra ni thos shing rang gi lus ni mi mngon no//
255b3(rgyud): gaganas su gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs na rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo // su'ang rung ba'i mig la bskus la/ lus la'ang bskus na de dag thams cad mi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / gang dang
255b4(rgyud): gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi snang bar 'gyur la/ khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur ro// lus kun la bskus nas mdzad chen po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ gser dang / dngul dang / 'dra
255b5(rgyud): men dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byu ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / margad dang / mthon kha dang / gos dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub gang yang rung ba nyid 'dod na thams
255b6(rgyud): cad blangs nas song na sus kyang mi mthong la gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du khrus ma byas pa de srid du rang gis mi mthong la/ khrus byas na thams cad du mthong ngo // rig sngags 'chang bud med kyi nang
255b7(rgyud): du 'jug par 'dod pa gtsang mar khrus bya'o// de nas spos chus khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba gcin gyis khrus bya'o// yang gur kum gyis khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba'i rnams lngas khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ti
256a1(rgyud): mar dang lhan cig bsres pa'i ril bu des lus bsku bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu bud med gzhon nu'i nu zho dang sbyar bas mig la bslus la/ de nas ril bu gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la
256a2(rgyud): gdags par bya'o// de nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas la/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur te/ lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo // nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma
256a3(rgyud): gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khrus byas la bud med de dag gi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ yongs su spyod par byed kyang sus kyang mi shes la 'jug
256a4(rgyud): cing phyir 'gro ba na sus kyang glags mi rnyed de/ ji srid du khrus ma byas pa'i bar du rang gi lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro// phug tu 'jug na lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byugs la phug tu zhugs na phug
256a5(rgyud): gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la ji lta ji ltar las su bya ba de lta de ltar gyis shig/ chu'i nang du zhugs na ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug bzhin chus mi rlan la/ chus gos
256a6(rgyud): pabapar yang mi 'gyur ro// me'i nang du zhugs na mes lus la mi rag cing tsan dan lhar bsil bar 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs na gnas na 'khod pa rnams kyis de mi mthong gis/ ji ltar rang gi yid
256a7(rgyud): la las su bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang byis shig/ mi sdang bar bya ba ril bu'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga
256b1(rgyud): zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu drug pa// de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ las thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas/ sdig pa
256b2(rgyud): thams cad 'brog pa/ de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag po/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ gnod sbyin thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms
256b3(rgyud): par byed pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs par rgyal ba sbyin pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa nyid dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshon cha'i dra ba thams cad las sgrol bar byed pa
256b4(rgyud): grub pa don yod pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ rig sngags 'tshong thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub/ phyag rgya 'pho ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi rim par bye
256b5(rgyud): ba'i sgrub pa las thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub kyang 'grub ste 'di la the tsom med do// bde ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug ma yin pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / lha
256b6(rgyud): dang klu thams cad spyan 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / bdud dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba dang / gdon mi bzang pa dang / brjed byed mi bzang pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po/
256b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad thams cad du sgrol bar byed par grub pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dus rtag tu tshar gcod par the tsom med do// rims thams cad rtag tu rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad zlog par byed pa
257a1(rgyud): dug thams cad gsod par byed pa/ 'bral du sreg blugs byin pa tsam gyis thams cad du rtag tu gnang chen po dang / thams cad du mthong na dga' ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla/
257a2(rgyud): mar mchod par bya ba dang / thams cad du stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mthong ba'ang sbyin par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom med do// byang chub sems dpa'
257a3(rgyud): rtag tu kun tu snang ba dang / dus thams cad kyi tshe las thams cad la shin tu dga' ba dang / skye ba nas skye bar tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// thams cad du bla ma la sri'u che ba dang / thams cad du mchod par
257a4(rgyud): 'os pa'i bla ma'o// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu'ang srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar byed pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha nyid kyis kyang dus rtag tu srung ba dang / skyab
257a5(rgyud): pa dang / sba bar byed par the tsom med do// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyis srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar byed cing
257a6(rgyud): rtag tu legs par kha los sgyur bar gnas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / drag po dang / gzhon nu dang / nor bu bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang /
257a7(rgyud): lngas rtsen dang / gar mkhan mchog ste/ 'di rnams kyis rtag tu srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba bar byed cing gnas te 'di la the tsom med do// me'i lha gzi brjid chen po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / rgyu skar gyi lha
257b1(rgyud): rnams kyis srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar byed cing mchog tu mchod pa byed pas gnas par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg tsam 'di ni bya ba thams cad bla na med pa'i dngos grub rnams la'o// 'bras thug po che
257b2(rgyud): dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad mchog sbyin par 'gyur te/ bya ba thatha
257b3(rgyud): cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dang / pad+ma'i chu ba dang / 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / a ka ru dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bar bsres pas sa mi'i shing gis zhi ba'i me sbar te stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg
257b4(rgyud): bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar gnas te/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// bya ba thams cad kyi dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// yid kyi shing rta
257b5(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// thams cad du don yod pa thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// bsod nams thams cad
257b6(rgyud): 'gugs pa'i dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
257b7(rgyud): cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba la rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// seng ldeng dang nis pa'i shing gi lam shing gis 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / mar dang / lan tshwa dang bsres pas sbyin sreg slong
258a1(rgyud): phrag brgyad byas na/ bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon thams cad dang / gdug pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do//
258a2(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las sgrol bar byed do// mtshon ma thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur/
258a3(rgyud): ro// tsan dan dang / 'bras yos dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ yul 'khor dang / ri brag dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs rnams su kun nas dpag
258a4(rgyud): tshad stong phrag gcig kho ra khor yug tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par
258a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nad thams cad thams cad du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gcan gzan gtum po thams cad dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad byams par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / yul 'khor
258a6(rgyud): dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba thams cad shis pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// ma ta ma ga dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / 'bras yos rnams bsres pas arka'i
258a7(rgyud): shing gi yam shing gis me sbar la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na char mi 'bab par byed pa la/ de nas klu chen po rnams kyis char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed de/ ji srid char pa 'bab par 'dod pa'i bar
258b1(rgyud): du'o// me tog dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman gyi rdzas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// legs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po
258b2(rgyud): chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi dga' ba chen por 'gyur zhing / dus dus su ji lta ba bzhin du char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do// ha cang char ches na de nyid kyi thal bas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na
258b3(rgyud): cangad char ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'bras yos dang / gol dang / yungs kar dang / gtum po'i sa bon mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na rlung dang ser ba thams cad zlog par byed do// dpag tshad srong
258b4(rgyud): phrag khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro// rlung bcing ba la yungs kar dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing bar byas
258b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du be ram b+ha'i rlung gi bar du bcings par 'gyur ro// klu bcing ba la ni yungs kar dang til gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na lo bcu gnyis su klu bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// na
258b6(rgyud): thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni yungs kar mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// pha rol gyi dpag tshogs ldog pa la ni ka ra l+li ra'i shing gis me
258b7(rgyud): sbar te/ nim pa'i 'dab ma dang / lan cha dang / phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyang byas na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du phyis
259a1(rgyud): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// phyogs bcing ba la dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug gis so// til dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg
259a2(rgyud): stong phrag brgyad byas na/ dpag tshad stong phrag khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// log 'dren thams cad bcing ba la ni yungs kar nag po dang / til nag dang / sran mo dang /
259a3(rgyud): til dang mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// gnod
259a4(rgyud): sbyin 'byin pa la ni b+ha ga'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa dang / til mar bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed la sogs pa thams
259a5(rgyud): cad 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du nges par 'byin par 'gyur ro// yams dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// dge legs
259a6(rgyud): thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze dbang du byed pa la 'bras yos dang arka'i yam shing mar gyis btags pas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs
259a7(rgyud): dbang du byed pa la bu ram dang / mar dang / 'bras yos dang / arka'i 'dab mas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la/
259b1(rgyud): smyos byed kyi 'bras bu dang dong ka'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dmangs rigs thams cad dbang du byed pa'i mchog 'grub bo// rje'u rigs dbang du byed pa la mar rnam pa gsum gyis bsres/
259b2(rgyud): pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rje'u rigs thams cad dbang du byed do// snga ma'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro//
259b3(rgyud): gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la chu'i me tog mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gzhon nu ma thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa la 'bru dang
259b4(rgyud): mar gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na 'jigs pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// nor dang 'bru 'phel bar byed pa la 'bru bdun mar gyis
259b5(rgyud): btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nor dang 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug thob pa la yungs kar dang / mad+d+haHdang / sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po 'phel bar 'gyur
259b6(rgyud): ro// yul thob pa la tsha ba gsum mar dang / mad+h+ya dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na yul chen po thob par 'gyur ro// grong gi don du ka rawI ra'i me tog dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos
259b7(rgyud): mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na grong rnyed par 'gyur ro// gter gdon pa la ni pad+ma'i chu ba mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na gter chen po so sor rnyed do// gno/
260a1(rgyud): sbyin spyan drang bar 'dod pas gu gul dang / gtum po'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ gnod sbyin rang gi gzugs kyis mdun dute/
260a2(rgyud): bar 'dug ste/ ci bsgo ba byed cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma spyan drang bar 'dod pas 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i/
260a3(rgyud): dri dang pri yang ku yis ka ra l+lI ri'i shing gi yam shing gis me spa nas sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ de'i 'og tu 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma 'ongs te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod par byed do// rnam pa gsum
260a4(rgyud): brjod par bya ste/ ma dang / chung ma dang / sring mo'o// gal te ma yin na bu la zhen pas nor dang / 'bru dang / longs spyod chen po rnam par 'phel zhing phun sum tshogs par byed de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi 'bral
260a5(rgyud): bar kun tu gnas par byed do// gal te chung ma yin na rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba du mas rtse zhing longs spyod la yongs su spyod par byed de/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub
260a6(rgyud): dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod cing / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mal stan dang / nor dang / 'bru dang
260a7(rgyud): mdzod dang / bang ba dang bcas pa rnam par 'phel ba dang yongs su spyod de/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// srog kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do// gal te sri
260b1(rgyud): yin na de'i tshe rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i gzhal med khang gi longs spyod la yongs su spyod cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed do// pha rol gyi dmag chog
260b2(rgyud): zlog pa la phub ma dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis dpag tshad brgya stong phrag gi nang du dgra mi 'byung ste/ sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na g.yul dang 'khrug pa chen po las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma
260b3(rgyud): 'bab par byed pa la ri'i rtse mor sbrang rtsi dang / na le sham dang / 'bras thug po che dang / mar gyis btogs pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na nyin re re zhing nyi ma 'bab par byed de/ mchog thams
260b4(rgyud): cad rjes su stsol bar byed cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dod pa tsam gyis bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed cing nye bar gnas so// zla ba dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par 'dod pas gnas
260b5(rgyud): mthon por tsha ba gsum dang / rgyam tshwa dang / lan tshwa dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg byas na zla ba dang / rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs 'bab par byed de/ 'dod pa dang /
260b6(rgyud): yid kyi shing rta dang / skal ba dang / dbang phyug thams cad cher 'phel ba rab tu sbyin no// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur
260b7(rgyud): ro/ nyi ma re re zhing mthong bar 'dod na 'bab par byed do// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa
261a1(rgyud): dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs thams cad 'gugs pa la til dang /
261a2(rgyud): yungs kar dang / 'bras thug po che dang / sman sna tshogs dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na 'gugs pa chen po'i dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ 'jig
261a3(rgyud): rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa'i 'khor du 'gyur te/ rtag tu de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur la ngag gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/
261a4(rgyud): ro bdag nyid kyis sam nor gyis kyang rung ste/ thams cad du bla ma gcig pur mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// / de nas mi 'phrul pa sha
261a5(rgyud): par bya ste/ don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched du las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba la mkhas pa rnams kyi bde ba sbyin pa/ rtag tu dbul po rnams/
261a6(rgyud): kyis bde ba thob par byed pa'o// de nas rtogs pa'i mod la 'bru mchog tu 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma nyid du mchod par bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / dbang phyug sbyin
261a7(rgyud): zhing longs spyod chen po 'phel ba dang / rgyal po'i bde ba dang ldan pa dang / phyogs phyogs su rab mchog sbyin par byed do// gi'u wang dang / cu gang dang / ldong ros dang / mu zi dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / ut+pa
261b1(rgyud): la sngon po dang / li kha ra dang / gur kum dang / rgya mtsho lbu ba dang / gnyis dang / gser gyi 'dab ma stong phrag sbyar te/ phye ma shin tu zhib mor byas la/ legs par bsgongs la ga pur dang grwa rtsi tsam gyi/
261b2(rgyud): blangs la/ sngags kyi stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa mkhas pas rnam pa gsum du sbyar bar bya ste/ skye bos gang ba nyid la lnga mnyam pa'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mig sman gyi snying pos
261b3(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la mig la byug par bya ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i dbus su nam mkha' la nye bar gnas par byed do// hUM yig gis mthong bar bya'o// nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do//
261b4(rgyud): gnas par byed do// nyal bar byed do// rgyug par byed do// bskus na lus la me 'bar bar mthong ste/ de ston par byed do// ngu ba'i rgyal mtshan ston par byed do// rkang pa'i mthil la kun tu byugs nas chu bo dang
261b5(rgyud): chu klung chen po'i steng nas 'gro ste rkang pa la chus gos par mi 'gyur ro// me chen po 'bar ba'i nang du 'jug ste sreg par mi byed cing / ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang 'byi bar mi 'gyur ro// bye mas phyogs
261b6(rgyud): bzhir nam mkha' kun tu gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i char gyi rgyun ltung bar byed do// rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do// lus mtha' dag la byug par bya zhing /
261b7(rgyud): skye bo'i mig sman bsku zhing phye nas gtor nas ljongs chen po'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ de cung zad kyang mi mthong ngo // ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du rmongs pa chen po'i sgyu ma ston par byed de/ rgyal po dang /
262a1(rgyud): dmag sde chen po dang / drang srong gi gzugs dang / gser gyi bum pa can dang / mi'i seng ge dang / phag dang / dga' byed kyi mtshan nyid dang / rol skyed ma phrogs pa dang / zla 'od mgo/
262a2(rgyud): bo yongs su gtong ba ston par byed do// 'joms pa dang / gsod pa dang / srog 'dor ba ston par byed do// me tog gi char ram/ 'bras bu'i char ram/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / 'bru'i char ston par
262a3(rgyud): byed do// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam 'gyur rnams ston par byed de/ gzhal med khang chen po'i rnam pa rnams bsams pa tsam gyis ston par byed do// dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug na/ rnam par 'phrul pa rnam
262a4(rgyud): pasna tshogs pa la sogs pa ya ma zung gzhal du med pa ston par byed do// bdag nyid kyi mgo bo la bskus nas mgrin pa tsam gyis dri za/ til mar gyis bsgos pa'i phye mas gtor bar bya zhing / mig sa/
262a5(rgyud): gyis byug par bya/ phye mas lus mtha' dag la bdug par bya/ rkang pa la byug par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na yang dag par shes bzhin dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / zung tsam du mthong ngo //
262a6(rgyud): de nas zhugs pa tsam gyis mo'i khams su mthong bar byed do// mthong bar byed do// sems par mthong bar byed do// nam mkha' la gnas par byed do// 'chag par byed do// 'dug par byed cing mal stan la
262a7(rgyud): rtog par byed do// 'ong bar byed cing 'gro bar byed do// me tog 'bab par byed do// nam mkha' la rnga'i sgra ston par byed do// rig byed bzhi pa'i nang du shing arka'i 'o mas bsgos nas byugs pa tsam gyis
262b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do// lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su mthong bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar yid la byed bzhin pa'i b+ha ra ta dang dga' byed rnams mthong bar byed do//
262b2(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i dbus su rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gar mkhan rnams su ston par byed do// rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal po chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i dbus su lha'i gar mkhan sna tshogs pa rnams su
262b3(rgyud): mthong bar byed do// gling gi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sna tshogs pa dang / mAn d+hA ta dang / yid ldan dang / shing rta bcu pa dang / rin chen 'od dang / drag pos 'od byin dang / mi bdag dang /
262b4(rgyud): mnga' bdag dang / tshong pa dang / ded dpon dang / zhi ba dang / mche bzang dang / snying rje can dang / pad+ma dkar po la sogs pa rnams dang lhan cig pa'i gar mkhan rnams su mthong ngo // rin po che'i char
262b5(rgyud): dang / gos kyi char dang / rgyan gyi char dang / spud pa'i char dang / lhab lhub kyi char mthong bar byed do// me tog gi gzhal med khang dang / 'bras bu'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do// gzhal med khang la
262b6(rgyud): sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa mthong bar byed do// de ltar na mig sman dang bye ma mthu chen po bsku ba dang sbyor bas gzhal med khang dang / gar mkhan dang / gzhal med khang mthong bar byed de/ ji srid sgra
262b7(rgyud): sgrogs dang / 'jigs byed dang / bum pa dang / gzhal med khang mthong ba dang / ha ru ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed pa dang / gar mkhan rmongs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang mthong bar byed do// ji srid
263a1(rgyud): bdud 'joms pa la sogs pa dmag sde sna tshogs pa'i mchog gi gzugs kyi bar du mthong bar byed do// stobs dang brtson 'grus chen po mthong bar byed do// mig sman dang
263a2(rgyud): phye ma'i sbyor ba gsum tsam gyi dngos grub ni bsku ba dang / bklags pa dang / yang dag par sbyar bas tshe'i dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro// sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul sna tshogs pa 'grub ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor/
263a3(rgyud): bu ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis dngos grub chen po rgya che ba 'jig rten thams cad kyis mngon sum du 'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i dngos
263a4(rgyud): grub bla na med pa'i cho ga rmongs pa chen po'i cho ga'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ de kho na nyid dngos grub bla na med pa dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dngos
263a5(rgyud): grub dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid bla na med pa'o// dang por sdig pa zad par byed pa de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi
263a6(rgyud): dngos grub dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / sngags kyi dngos grub dang / mchog gi dngos grub dang / gzungs thob pa'i dngos grub rnams dang / sa bcu la rab tu 'jug par byed pa grub
263a7(rgyud): gsangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs de kho na nyid mthong ba rmad du byung ba/ byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar byed pa/ rdo rje gdan gyi gnas su yang dag par lhag par gnas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo
263b1(rgyud): sbyor bar byed pa/ bdud 'joms shing tshar gcod pa/ bgegs thams cad lhung bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gnas mthong bar byed pa/ de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
263b2(rgyud): kyis byin gyis rlob pa'i gnas dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba'o// de nas po Ta la ka'i gzhal med khang dang mnyam pa'i gnas/ don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
263b3(rgyud): gnas/ skad cig la mnar med pa'i gnas dang mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas dang mnyam pa/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams
263b4(rgyud): cad kyi rigs kyi mchog/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i gnas/ de bzhin du rdo rje snying po'i dge ba 'phel ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rig sngags kyi dngos grub dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i
263b5(rgyud): rigs dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs dang / de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo gcig pur zhugs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i gnas/
263b6(rgyud): de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po lta bu/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas thams cad du son pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa'i gnas/ yid kyi shing rta
263b7(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ re ba phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i gnas/ thams cad du mchog sbyin pa po// 'di ni byang chub kyi sa bon gyi gnas te/ sems can thams cad rtag tu sgrol pa
264a1(rgyud): byed pa/ don yod pa'i gnas gsang zhing rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa bla na med pa'o// bsod nams thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i gnas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel
264a2(rgyud): bar byed pa/ 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po'i gnas/ chos kyi mdzod dang rtag tu mnyam pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzod/ mdzod chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi mdzod la mkhas pa/ rtag tu pad+ma'i mdzod/ de bzhin
264a3(rgyud): du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod/ rdo rje'i mdzod/ de bzhin du nor bu chen po nyid kyi mdzod/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab bo/ mi g.yo ba/ mi 'gul ba/ zil gyis mi non pa'o// bdud dang / log
264a4(rgyud): par 'dren pa dang / bgegs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / srin po thams cad kyis sdang ba'i sems kyis 'jug par mi nus so// de la mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnyed dka' zhing
264a5(rgyud): bla na med pa'o// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bya ste/ ba byung dang yang dag par ldan pa/ khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bya'o// yang na khru brgyad par bya ste/ de phyed dang gnyis kyi khru'i tshad kyi thig skud kyis tshad rnam
264a6(rgyud): par phye ste gdab par bya'o// grwa bzhi mnyam par bye ba/ logs bzhi legs par rnam par bye ba/ shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu legs par bcags pa/ mnyen la 'jam zhing brgyan pa/ sa gzhi bai DUR+Ya'i
264a7(rgyud): kha dog la dkyil 'khor mdzes pa thig gis char rnam pa dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhi rnam par phye ga skud pa la tshon sna lnga byin te/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gru bzhi par rnam par dbye'o// khru
264b1(rgyud): gnyis kyi tshad kyi re kha lnga rnam par dbye'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dab ma sumacu rtsa gnyis pa kun nas rgyas pa bri bar bya ste/ dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor bya ste/
264b2(rgyud): pad+ma byed kha bye ba'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du pad+ma la zhal gsum par bri bar bya ste/ bde ba'i gzugs dang mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi rnam pa 'bar ba'i snying po 'khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri'o//
264b3(rgyud): gzhogs g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ dbul 'od dpag med 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can no// gzhogs g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras
264b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs rol pa dang rgyan bcings pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus dang dbul pad+ma gtsug tor gyi khor yug tu 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'o// phyi rol du tsam pa ka dang / bA rI ka dang / ut+pa la
264b5(rgyud): sngon po'i me tog gi 'phreng ba bcing bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i gru bzhi'i gnas rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya ste/ go cha dang ya lad bgos pa drag po'i gzugs can/ 'jigs par
264b6(rgyud): byedag/ 'bar ba'i 'breng ba'i lus so// dkyil 'khor gyi re kha sngon ma la rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pa'i re kha 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// re kha rim par phye ba gnyis pa la me tog gi re kha bri bar bya'o//
264b7(rgyud): gsum pa la nor bu rin po che chen po'i skud pa'i re kha bri bar bya'o// re kha bzhi pa la lag pa'i phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o// re kha lnga pa la kha khyer gyi rnam pa bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna tshogs pas
265b1(rgyud): bzhi'i nang du tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / pog dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing / de bzhin du s+thik+ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / 'bo la dang / ga pur tsam dang yang dang /
265b2(rgyud): par ldan pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi byug pa 'di nye bar gzhag par bya'o// tsan dan dang / gur kum dang / de bzhin du dze g+ha dang bal+li ka'i phye ma rnams thams cad yang dag par sbyar ba 'dri/
265b3(rgyud): phye mar sbyar bas bsgos pa'o// me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram zhing / ji ltar 'dod pa/ ji ltar stong pa dang / ji ltar thob pa'i me tog mdzes pa mngon par gtor bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu dri'i
265b4(rgyud): chus gang ba'i bum pa ma reg pa dang / gser dang dngul las byung ba'i sdod gsar pa nyid dang / zangs dang sa las byung ba'i mchog dang / dri sna tshogs sbyar bas dgang bar bya'o// bum pa dang bkra shis bcing bar bya/
265b5(rgyud): zhing pi wang dang / gos bzang po dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o// ring bsrel pad+ma'i steng du bzhag nas/ bum pa dang / gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid dang / snga ma'i me tog dang / gdu bu byas nA/
265b6(rgyud): gzhag par bya'o// dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po nyid kyi gsang sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas so// de nas gtor ma'i las la mnyam par bzhag nas/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs rnam
265b7(rgyud): pa sna tshogs dang / dkar po dang / de bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i gzugs nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i ro gzhag par bya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs su phye ba'i sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa dang / sna
266a1(rgyud): tshogs pa'i kha dog dang / ro nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i yul du rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni gtor mar brjod de/ 'byor pa'i gtor mar bshad do// dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu rgyan gdags te/ hA/
266a2(rgyud): tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rgya chen po dang / sna tshogs pa'i lo ma sngon po'i 'phreng ba dang / mar me'i 'breng ba brgya rtsa brgya dang / ji ltar rnyed pa'i mar dang / ti la mar gyis kun nas bkang ba brgya rtsa brgyad do// bdag
266a3(rgyud): dngos grub 'dod pa rnams bye dang / la phug dang / dkar dang / la du dang / sran ma mung ga'i la du dang / 'bras bu rnams de bzhin du log 'dren la gtor mar byin pas las thams cad bde thag tu 'grub bo//
266a4(rgyud): bye'i zan dang / zho'i nying khu dang / lo ma sngon po nyid gnod sbyin dang srin po kun nas phyogs bzhir gnas pa rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// zho'i zan dang 'o ma'ang ste/ 'di ni 'byung po'i gtor mar bshad do// /
266a5(rgyud): lo ma'i gong du dang / khye dang / 'bras thug po che'i phan dang / de bzhin du 'khrur ba rtsub po ste/ 'di 'i phyogs pa nir yi dgas dang sha ba rnams la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// 'bras thug po che dang 'o ma'i ngan ni/
266a6(rgyud): zla ba dang ni pa'i tshogs kyi lhan cig pa'i lha dang rgya gar rnams kyi gtor bar bya'o// rtag tu can da gyi grang pa de bzhin du tog dpa'i ma'i bran ni ma can mo'i lha la gto nasar smin par bya ste/ las kyi cho
266a7(rgyud): grub bla na med pa'o// 'bru bdun mdzes pa chen po dang / shing sU ha mchog tu mdzes pa dang / 'bras A ma khu bskol ba mdzes pa dang // zho dang 'o ma so sor mnyam pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas
266b1(rgyud): rnam pa bdun po ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// sa kuza ka dang / srab mo dang / 'bras thub po che bcos pa'i bu ba dang ldan pa 'di rlung d+ha'i gtor mar brjod de/ rlung gi dkyil 'bor babyas
266b2(rgyud): cad dgyes par byed do// zho dang / 'o ma bskol ba dang / 'bras thug po che dang / hwags dang bcas shing / bu rab dang bcas par ldan pa/ 'khur ba zlum po dang / mar gyis gang ba'i 'khur ba 'dir klu'i rgyal po ram
266b3(rgyud): kyi gtor mar brjod de/ las thams cad sgrub pa'o// 'khur ba zlum po dang / kha byung lnga dang / pu shel ci dang / ma la ya'i tsan dan dang / 'bras thug po che dang / zhabs bsil dang / mchod yon rnams bdud kyi
266b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// gur kum gyi chu dang 'bras thug po che la dri bzang pos bsgos te chu klung gi rgyal po la gtor mar sbyin par bya'o// thams cad du las thams cad sgrub par byed do// rtswa du
266b5(rgyud): ba'i chu dang / 'o ma dang / gtum pa'i sa bon bcos pa dang / 'bras thug po che ni tshangs pa'i srin po nyid dang / gsang ba pa rnams la gtor mar dbul bar bya ste/ thams cad rigs pas so// 'di ni gtor mar
266b6(rgyud): brjod de/ bgegs rnams kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa la bgegs rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dga' bar 'gyur te the tsom med do// de'i phyir rig sngags 'chang mkhas pas thams cad legs par bsgrub/
266b7(rgyud): bar bya'o// zho dang / 'o ma dang / lo thug dang / bu ram dang / mar dang / li khar dang ldan pa 'dis bdag skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha la gtor mar sbyin par bya ste/ tshe'i dngos grub dang / de bzhin du rgyas pa dang / zhi ba da
267a1(rgyud): sdig pa thams zlog par byed do// 'di ni gtor mar brjod de/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bde thob pa'o// bya ba gang yin pa de rnams la bdag gis gtos thun sum du byas/
267a2(rgyud): ma rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis rig sngags dang gsang sngags bde thag tu 'grub ste the tsom med do// de'i bgegs thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / sdang ba rnams nam yang bar du gcod par mi nus te/
267a3(rgyud): nam yang phyis sdig pa mi 'byung ngo // rtag tu gtor ma rgyas pa thob par byed cing / stobs dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / thams cad thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de lta bu byed bzhin pa'i rig sngags smra
267a4(rgyud): ba'i mi mkhas pa de bgegs rnams thams cad kyis de nam du'ang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha zas sdang bar byed pa med do// nad med cing rgyal po'i dpal mi//
267a5(rgyud): med la/ skes byed dang skyes pa med la/ brjed byed dang / klu dang / gza' dang / rims med cing thams cad kyi mo cung zad kyang med do// drug med cing sbyar ba'i dug nyid kyang med la/ byad snyems thams
267a6(rgyud): cad kyang nam yang mi yongs ste/ kun nas dpag tshad stong phrag tu ring du 'bros par byed do// kun nas stobs nyid kyang rgyas pa dang / de bzhin du'ang dga' ba dang / de bzhin du'ang grobs dang / brtson 'gyu
267a7(rgyud): dpaga'i brjid 'phel bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga zha mo thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par byed do// tshe ring du 'phel zhing / lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod/
267b1(rgyud): pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// skyes pa'i rgyu skar gyi lha gang yin pa'ang dri yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / de rnams thams cad kyi ji srid 'tsho'i bar du stobs dang brtson 'grus 'phel bar byed par/
267b2(rgyud): the tsom med do// de la dgra mi 'byung zhing nam du'ang phyir rgol ba dang dgra bo med de/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa nyid med kyang dkyil 'khor gyi mchog tu zhugs pa tsam gyis mod la 'am/ yang na 'jug pa'i dkyi
267b3(rgyud): 'khor mthong ba tsam la/ de rnams kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i
267b4(rgyud): klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye bar 'gyur te/ ri rab chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin
267b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga
267b6(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags rnams kyi dngos grub chen po so sor rnyed do// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
267b7(rgyud): ris thun mong ba'i cho gas bsdus pa'i sar bgrod de phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// su bcu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i gnas na gnas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i tshogs dang lhan cig
268a1(rgyud): thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po du ma rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis yod/
268a2(rgyud): su bskor zhing rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / snga ba'i ched du yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ro// stobs chen po dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / mdangs kyi rnam pa so/
268a3(rgyud): sor rnyed par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis mod la bskal pa bye bar brgyud nas bsags pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams dang / mnar med pa la gnol ba de 'akra
268a4(rgyud): cad yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// don yod pa'i bya ba'i dngos grub so sor rnyed do// sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa'i dri ma dang / ser sna'i dri ma tha
268a5(rgyud): cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad dga' ba dang / bla ma chen po mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'dod par yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan pa
268a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis rtag tu mchog stsol bar byed cing bla mar 'gyur ro// 'chi 'phos te skye ba brdze ba na bsams pa nyid kyi mod la bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur
268a7(rgyud): rmo dkyil 'khor gyi slong dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bla mar shes par bya/ mchod par bya/ 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob kyi bkod pa/
268b1(rgyud): dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o// des na rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des kyang dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa byas nas/ kun nas mtshams bcing ba byas shing bsrung ba'i cho ga byas la/ bdag bci
268b2(rgyud): ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba byas te/ de'i 'og tu kha shar du phyogs te/ dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs pas skyil mo krung gis 'dug la/ don yod pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor skyong dras
268b3(rgyud): brgyad bzlas par bya'o// gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbus kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i ge sar gyi dbus
268b4(rgyud): su tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs te bzhengs nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chad la bka' stsa la pa/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs
268b5(rgyud): so// khyod kyis rig pa 'dzin pa grub bo// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rjes su zung zhig/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa bzhin du 'dod pa'i mchog tha
268b6(rgyud): cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'di ni rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi mngal du gnas pa'i skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ skye ba brjes nas thams cad du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du tshe rabs/
268b7(rgyud): dran par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du skye ba dran par skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba nas skye ba thams cad du don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mtha' dag kha ton du byed do//
269a1(rgyud): don yod nags pa'i gtsug tor drib med ga ba ton du kun tu gnas so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'a'agras bu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bcod yon pa/
269a2(rgyud): zhabs bsil dbul bar bya/ a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ me tog ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya/ gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi snang bar
269a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de lta bu byas nas rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro'o// don yod pa'i gtsug tor pad+ma dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob ste/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
269a4(rgyud): sto phrag drug cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur zhing / pad+ma'i ris kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
269a5(rgyud): dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// / de nas de'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/ dor yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig pas ras khru bzhi pa byas nas sam/ yang na daral bal tshor sna/
269a6(rgyud): pas rnam par phye ste/ lha'i gzugs mchog tu mdzes pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ 'od zer gyis 'khor bar bya'o// ras ris sgrub pa ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga la tshon lhag ma min pa snod gsar par bzhag
269a7(rgyud): pas ri mo mkhan gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pas 'drir gzhug par bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ pad+ma rgyas pas yongs su bskor ba bya ste/
269b1(rgyud): khor yug tu 'ong 'angos gang ba/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can// phyag bzhi pa/ zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ zla ba tshems klas pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pana'achang ga bdu rtse
269b2(rgyud): gsum 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnam par bkra ba'i pad+ma'i zhag pa 'chang ba/ phyag g.yon par me tog 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i steng du pad+ma gtsug tor bya'o// 'dab ma byed kha bye ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i 'dab
269b3(rgyud): ma la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgul yan chad tsam cod pan 'chang ba/ dbu 'bar ba'i snying por yod par bri bar bya'o// phyag gcig ni dbugs 'byin pa 'chang zhing rin po che'i char 'beb
269b4(rgyud): ga 'bar ba'i snying po can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos 'chang ba bya'o// pad+ma'i gdan la klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo mgo bo dgu pa/ klus yongs su bskor ba
269b5(rgyud): dang bcas pa/ thal mo 'chang zhing lus phyed par bya'o// nya dang / chu srin dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu shel dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te lus yang dag par brgyan pa'i kha khyer dang
269b6(rgyud): bcas pas spras pa'o// gzhogs g.yas su sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ thal mo sbyar ba smad de 'dzin pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can bya'o// yon du gos dkar mo gos dkar po
269b7(rgyud): 'chang ga rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i lus can/ thal mo smad de 'chang ba'o// gzhogs g.yas su khro gnyer can skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu
270a1(rgyud): dkar sham ma gos dkar po 'chang ba bya'o// g.yon du srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma bya ste/ phyag brgyang pa drag mo drag tu rgod pa'i pho nya mo bya'o// bzhin khro gnyer can/ thams ca
270a2(rgyud): skyil krung byed pas bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ thams cad pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa bya'o// steng du tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i dbang
270a3(rgyud): rnams nam mkha' nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// 'og tu pad+ma ma gshin rje dang / chu lba dang / lus ngan dang / gzhon nu rnams khrus bya ste// skyil krung byed pas bzhugs pa bya'o//
270a4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams bya ste/ drag po'i gzugs skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa ste/ de rnams thams cad kyang pad+ma 'dzin pa'i gzugs su bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ni bcom ldan 'das dang /
270a5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pad+ma'i gdan la rig sngags 'chang pus mo gtsugs pa bya ste/ pog bor dang / lag na me tog gi phor pa dang / bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa/
270a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la lta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o// de lta bu'i ras ris kyi bya ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi nang du gtogs par 'gyur
270a7(rgyud): ro mthong ba tsam gyis mod la sdug 'asngal dang / sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// nyes pa
270b1(rgyud): byas pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga las rnam par thar par byed do// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la don yod pa'i dngos grub so sor
270b2(rgyud): thob bo// sems can thams cad kyis kun tu bskor bar bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// dgongs pa thams cad legs par sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// bde bar byed par 'gyur ro//
270b3(rgyud): nor dang / gzugs byed pa dang / bkra shis dang / longs spyod dang / rigs dang / dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / spobs pa dang / bsod nams dang / skal ba bzang por byed pa dang / bdag nyid chen po'i yon tan gyi phye
270b4(rgyud): brag 'phel ba dang / bsod nams bsags pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'phel ba dang / phun sum tshogs par byed do// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la las su byabar 'os pa'i bya ba thams cad byed do// de ltar ras ris
270b5(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis mod la yon tan gyi bye brag lhag par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes so// ras ris sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// / de nas phyag rgya bshad par bya ste/ phyag
270b6(rgyud): rgya rnams kyi don yod pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ phyag rgya chen po bla na med pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gis rgyas btab pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ don yod pa'i phyag rgya thams cad dang
270b7(rgyud): sgrub thabs thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa nyid dang / phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa/ phyag rgya bzung ba tsam gyis mnar med pa'ang skems par byed pa/
271a1(rgyud): dmyal ba pa rnams skems par byed pa ste/ gang gis bzung ba tsam la sogs pas dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar byed cing skebs par byed do// dus gsum pa'i de bzhi/
271a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang / rgyal ba de rnams thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu kun tu gzigs par 'gyur te the tsom med do// dus gsum pa'i rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
271a3(rgyud): tshogs thams cad dang / de bzhin du badra'i phyag gis rtag tu mchog sbyin pa dang / rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa dang / lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing dga' ba dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / lha'i dbang /
271a4(rgyud): po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha thams cad kyis srung bar byed cing kun nas yongs su skyong bar byed de/ thams cad la cho ga bzhin du bdag nyid kyi snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du dge ba dang / ni
271a5(rgyud): ba dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus nyid dang / mdangs kyang rab tu 'jug par byed cing / de bzhin du'ang tshe 'phel lo// phyag rgya 'di rnams bzung bas bkra mi shes pa thams cad nyams par byed do// bgesa?/
271a6(rgyud): thams cad nyams par byed cing / bdud dang / log par 'dren pa dang / bdug pa'i gnod sbyin rnam par nyams par byed do// gdug pa'i srin po dang / yi dgas thams cad kyang phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pa'i skad
271a7(rgyud): cig de la mgo bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas shing mig 'byin par byed do// brgya byin dang tshogs dang bcas pa'i gdug pa thams cad rab tu nyams par byed do// de'i phyir yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa la lag
271b1(rgyud): pa'i thal mo pad+ma 'dra ba/ pad+ma 'byung ba'i gtsug tor don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas sdigs mdzub yongs su dkris la/ mthe bong gi sor mo dang / gung mo'i sor mo rab tu brkyang la lcags kyu'i rnam par bkug
271b2(rgyud): skye/ ming med dang mthe'u chung lag pa'i nang du bcug nas rtag tu snying kha'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi sngags dang phyag rgyar brjod do// de bzung
271b3(rgyud): ba tsam dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags brjod pa nyid kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos te char 'bab par byed do// me tog gi char dang / lha
271b4(rgyud): rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub rnams mchod pa'i don du kun nas char bab bo// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi
271b5(rgyud): phung po chen po stong phrag bskyed do// phyag rgya de bzung ba tsam gyis skad cig de la phyag rgya gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba stong phrag bye ba'i grangs su bgrangs pa'i phyag rgya bcings par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bzung ba
271b6(rgyud): tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis rlob bo// ri rab kyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyis rin po che'i phung por byas te/ dus gsum du
271b7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa so so so so la phul ba dang / rgyal ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa'i grangs kyi tshogs nyid kyang phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'di'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/
272a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzigs par the tsom med do zhes so// phyag rgya 'di nyid las g.yas pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ste rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan cig brjod
272a2(rgyud): do// phyag rgya 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi stobs spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po zhes bya ste/ thams cad du las thams cad legs par thob par byed do// phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam
272a3(rgyud): gyis kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / spyan ras gzigs don yod pa dri ma med pa'i dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa dag pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya yang dag
272a4(rgyud): pabar 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bzung ba tsam dang / dang po bcings pa tsam gyis ri rab chen po ltar 'gyur te/
272a5(rgyud): bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis mi 'gul zhing mi g.yo la zil gyis mi non par yang 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba dang dgra'i 'jigs pa
272a6(rgyud): thams cad las yongs su grol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi byi ma dang mnyam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur
272a7(rgyud): ro la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mngon sum du mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i lhag par 'dren pa 'di 'ching bzhin pa de de bzhin
272b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gang cung zad yod pa de mig gis gsal bar mthong ngo // thams cad du rab tu 'ching zhing 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting
272b2(rgyud): nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / phyag stong gi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / glang po'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / don yod
272b3(rgyud): zhags pa'i yangs pa rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / mgrin sngon gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / gzhan phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa ka
272b4(rgyud): yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang / phyag rgya 'di gcig pu bcings pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing yang dag par bzung bar 'gyur la/ kun tu bcangs pa dang mchod par yang 'gyur ro// 'di ni
272b5(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gdugs gcig pur gyur pa ste/ ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bzhin du phyag rgya
272b6(rgyud): 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i phyag rgya'i rnam par 'phrul pa ste/ las thams cad la phyag rgya 'di sbyar na/ gang dang gang la rab tu sbyar ba de thogs pa med par 'grub bo// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis brkyang
272b7(rgyud): la lcags kyu'i rnam pa tsam du bkug pa 'di ni gnas pa'i phyag rgya 'di spyan drang ba dang / bod pa dang / yang dag par bskul ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin nyid kyang yin te/ dam tshig dang / phyag byed pa dang / 'jug pa
273a1(rgyud): dang / skor ba byed pa nyid dang / gang na dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba zhes pa dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / bdag zung ba dang / gzhan srung
273a2(rgyud): ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang / khrus dang / gos bgo ba dang / nye reg byed pa nyid dang / spyir sreg dang / de bzhin du sngags bzlas pa dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dag 'phreng ba dang / byug pa
273a3(rgyud): dang / gtor ma 'bul ba'i las dang / de bzhin du gshegs su gsol ba nyid dang / de bzhin du 'gugs pa ste/ thams cad la phyag rgya 'di bya'o// sa bcu gnon pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags bcu la'ang phyag
273a4(rgyud): rgya 'di bya ste/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyang thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po nyid dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / rigs kyi gsang sngags dang / gzhan la'ang phyag rgya 'di dang / phyag rgya
273a5(rgyud): 'di'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po nyid kyang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / rig sngags kyi gsang sngags gzhan la'ang gnas thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o zhes so//
273a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i cho ga dang sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// / phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa/ phyag rgya de dag yang dag bstan// bzang po gtso bo chen po ste// mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no// phyag rgya/
273a7(rgyud): gya nom bla na med// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin// snying po de nyid gyur pa ste// phyag rgya dkyil chen legs par bsgrubs// sangs rgyas byang chub phyag rgya 'di// dus gsum gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs//
273b1(rgyud): kun gyis 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya dus gsung gshegs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pas phyag rgyar btab// de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa// thub pa snang mdzad kyis kyang btab// de bzhin
