273b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs dkyil gyi// gsang nyid kun tu bzhugs pa yin// de nas gsang sngags gsang ba nyid// dngos grub bla med bshad par bya// oM a mo g+hu hrid ya/ khadz+ra uSh+NI Sha a kaR+Sha ya/ sA d+ha ya/
273b3(rgyud): d+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ ma hA parme swAhA/ bskul ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha maN+Da le hUM/ dkyil 'khor srung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang /
273b4(rgyud): mtshams gcad pa dang / dri chab dang / chu dang / yungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o// oM pad+me shaM kha re hUM/ spyi gtsug bcing ba yin te/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so//
273b5(rgyud): oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha dza le hUM/ khrus bya ba'i sngags te/ yungs kar dang chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM bi ma lo shud+d+he hUM/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so// oM saM ts+tsha da ya pad+me hUM/ gos bgo/
273b6(rgyud): ba'i sngags so// oM mi li mi li shud+d+he hU~M/ lus yongs su sbyang ba'i sngags te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa At+ma shud+d+he hUM/ dbang
273b7(rgyud): bskur ba'i sngags te/ dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM pad+ma ka ba tse/ dri D+ha ban+d+ha hUM dz+wa la swA hA/ go cha'i sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM badz+ra a d+hiSh+Tha/
274a1(rgyud): na ban+ded+hA/ byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la badz+ra d+hA ra ha d+hU/ sa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma a g+na ga cu gcal tsal d+ha/ gdan gyi sngags so// oM daM d+ya badz+re / me tog gi sngaH
274a2(rgyud): so// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha sa~M b+ha ra Ni sAhA/ bdug spos kyi sngags so// oM pad+ma gan d+ha I shwa ri hUM/ byug spos kyi sngags so// oM pad+ma pra kIr+Ne d+ha ra Ni sa me swAhA/ 'bras yos dang me tog dgram pa'i sngags so//
274a3(rgyud): oM pad+ma dza le su gan d+ha ba ti hUM/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so// oM shukra ba re ra sa ya na shud+d+ha hUM/ lha bshos kyi sngags so// oM su ru sarba ku b+hA ba te swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngags so// oM ma hA pad+ma a
274a4(rgyud): shri ni sA d+ha ya hUM/ gtor ma zar gzug pa'i sngags so// oM pha la bi shud+d+he pra ba ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngags so// oM pra ba ra puSh+pA dza ya swA hA/ 'phreng ba'i sngags so// oM dz+wA la dz+wA la ya ra sa ra swa gri Ni hUM/
274a5(rgyud): gtor ma bcos pa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma dI pa ya dz+wa la hUM/ mar me'i sngags so// oM sa ma pad+ma b+hA ba ne ShA sa ra hUM/ 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma uSh+NI Sha a mo g+ha mu ni hUM/ phyag bya ba'i sngags so//
274a6(rgyud): oM tsakra maN+Da le sa pan+ta pad+me hUM/ skor ba'i sngags so// oM sa man+ta pra kIr+Na bad+me sam+b+ha ra hUM/ me tog dor ba'i sngags so// oM pad+ma sa ma ya uSh+NI Sha/ ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ dam tshig gi sngags so//
274a7(rgyud): oM sa man+ta sA d+ha ra Na pad+me hUM phaT/ skyil mo krung gi sngags so// oM a pa ri mi ta dz+wa la pad+me hUM/ bgrang 'phreng gi sngags so// oM sha ta sa ha sra dz+wa li ta pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ bzlas brjod kyi sngags so// oM sa
274b1(rgyud): san+ya d+ha ri sha badz+re d+hU/ rmi lam gyi sngags so// oM sa man+ta rakA ra Ni bad+me hUM/ srung ba'i sngags so// oM sa man+ta me ru dri D+ham+b+hi ri d+hu/ ra ba'i sngags so// oM sa man+ta/ dz+wa lA pA lA gar+b+he/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA pad+ma dz+wA le
274b2(rgyud): hUM/ me'i sngags so// oM d+ha ru d+hu ru/ pra sA ra/ d+hA sa ra man+te swA hA/ sreg blugs kyi sngags so// oM sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta gu h+ye/ b+hU yu dza be pad+ma bi ge ni swAt+ma/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sngags so// oM
274b3(rgyud): shrI b+ha s+ya d+hI ra Ni pad+ma b+hU dzo hUM/ mtshan cha'i sngags so// oM sa man+ta A kar+N+Na Ne pra sa ra gu h+ye hUM/ drang ba'i sngags so// nas/ tri b+hu ba nA/ i shwa rA ya/ lo ke shwa rA yai a he shwa rA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra sa man+ta/ a ba /
274b4(rgyud): ki ta/ gu h+yaM/ A gats+tsha b+ha ga ban d+ha ri d+hi ri/ ma hA bi ri/ ma naM ka na ga badz+ra bai DUr+Ya/ ma ra ka ta pad+ma rA ga/ in+d+ra nI la/ ma hA muk+ti ka khi b+hu Shi ta sha rI ra/ ma hA pad+me b+hu dza/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo/
274b5(rgyud): ki ka ba ra drA ba ra dA ya ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga ban shI b+hA sa ma ya/ ma nu pA ra/ bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ ya ma bA ru Na/ ku be ra na mam+ma ta/ I shwa ra ma h+ye shwa ra/
274b6(rgyud): pad+me shwa ra/ mo ki shwa ra/ e haM b+ha ga ban/ shrI g+h+ra A gats+tsha/ sarba bi d+yA maN+Da la/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha Sha/ de ri sha na sA ra pa nu khi bi d+ha te dza d+ha ra/ sa man+ta ra l+li dz+wa la gar+b+ha sha rI ra/ ma hA kA ru d+hi ka so ma s+ya mu kha/
274b7(rgyud): pa ri pU raH/ tsan+d+ra maN+Da la mu kha na ba tsan+da dza Ta d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+hA/ maM ku Ta d+ha ra/ ma hA brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra tri lo tsa na a mo g+ha ba ra da / b+hu ru b+hu ru / ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ pad+ma bA sha a ba lo ki taM/ shud+d+ha sa twa khar/
275a1(rgyud): dA ya ka/ na mo stu te swahA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// rig sngags 'dis gu gul nag po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
275a2(rgyud): byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o// bdugs pa tsam gyis mod nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis ston par mdzad cing mchog thams cad
275a3(rgyud): sbyin mdzad do// gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med par gzhol ba des kyang bdugs pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad na/ dge slong tshangs par spyod pa/ bsam pa dag pa/ dad pa can/ mos pa
275a4(rgyud): lha spos kyang ci dgos/ mod nyid la rang gi gzugs rang gi ngo bo yongs su dag pa mngon sum du ston par mdzad cing / mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad la/ don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub sbyin par
275a5(rgyud): mdzad do// drag po la bdugs na gzugs mngon sum du mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa dang dgos pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do// sred med kyi bu la bdugs na gzugs brnyan 'gul zhing
275a6(rgyud): tshig 'byin la/ yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed do//
275a7(rgyud): mamamo'i gnas su nag po chen po la bdugs na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas 'dug la las dang bya ba thams cad grub par byed/ thams cad du dngos grub chen po sgrub par byed/
275b1(rgyud): do// tshogs kyi dbang phyug la bdugs na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na sdang ba dang / bdud dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de
275b2(rgyud): ngag thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor bdugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas dbang du 'gyur te/ nye bar gnas la 'dod pa dang bya ba tham
275b3(rgyud): cad byed do// nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na nyi ma 'bab cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do// bla ba nya la bdugs na zla ba 'bab cing dbang phyug 'byor pa chen
275b4(rgyud): bo sbyin par byed do// rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na nor 'phel ba chen po sbyin par byed do// lha mo chen mo dpal la bdugs na dpal 'thob par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam
275b5(rgyud): byis 'bab cing phyogs bcur 'bros so// zin pa 'am ma zin pa la bdugs na mod la 'ong ngo // dur khrod kyi mi rol bdugs na ro langs ldang bar 'gyur ro// thod pa la dadugs na bab cing gar byed/ glu
275b6(rgyud): len/ rgyug par byed cing sbod gtong byed do// rdo rje la bdugs na 'bar ro// mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed do// 'khor lo la bdugs na nam mkha' la 'gro'o// thag pa la bdugs na sbrul
275b7(rgyud): bzhin 'khril bar byed do// rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byed do// lhung bzed la bdugs na rang nyid 'gro bar byed do// ral grol/
276a1(rgyud): bdugs na 'bab par byed cing 'bar bar byed la rang nyid 'gro bar byed do// dung la bdugs nas bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag thams cad du 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa
276a2(rgyud): dang / 'gyed pa dang / yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa dang / nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams
276a3(rgyud): cad las thar par 'gyur zhing sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la bdugs na rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin bzhi pa la bdug cing gsang sngags kyang rjes su dran
276a4(rgyud): na rims nyin bzhi pa ku co 'don cing 'bros par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtshor bdugs na mod nyid la char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs par byed do// char ches na gnas mthon por bdugs na char ches pa gcod
276a5(rgyud): par byed do// sprin la mngon du phyogs nas bdugs na grang lpags dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad gcod par byed la/ lo gcig gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// ri mthon po'i
276a6(rgyud): rtser bdugs na phyogs bzhi thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / dpag tshad stong gi bar du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / bcings par 'gyur
276a7(rgyud): la/ dpag tshad stong gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la bdugs sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro//
276b1(rgyud): bu mo la 'dugs na bag mar blangs par 'gyur ro// tshong zong la bdugs na rin che bar lom par 'gyur ro// khang ba la bdugs na 'bru 'phel ba mang bar 'gyur ro// btung ba'i gnas su bdugs na btung ba
276b2(rgyud): 'phel ba mang por 'gyur ro// gos la bdugs na gos thob par 'gyur ro// me tog dang 'bras bu la bdugs na gang la byin pa de dag bdag nyid dam nor gyi sgo nas dbang du 'gyur ro// 'phreng ba la bdugs
276b3(rgyud): nas gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gang gi mgo la bcings pa de la 'bab par byed cing / ya mtshan byung ba dang 'byung ba smra'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdugs na rig sngags
276b4(rgyud): chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad do// gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris pa la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun
276b5(rgyud): dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin po 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing las byed par 'gyur la/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/ sbyor ba mo la bdugs na sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma
276b6(rgyud): thams cad dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can ma la bdugs na 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o zhes sman/
276b7(rgyud): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad dang longs spyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtse bas dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyur ro// dril bu la bdugs nas
277a1(rgyud): sgra dkrol na 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur la/ bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ khyim gyi nang du dkrol na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang /
277a2(rgyud): brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad byung nas phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha pA sha padra uSh+NI Sha/ ta ra ta ra/ a pa ta raM tu/ b+ha ga ban gats+tshan tu/ swa b+hA ba nan/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA
277a3(rgyud): pad+ma pU dze swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ bdug spos gu gul dang / chu dang / yungs kar dang bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du slar gshegs su gsol
277a4(rgyud): ba'i sngags byas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i tshig dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
277a5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lha'i mchod
277a6(rgyud): po'i sprin chen pos mchod de lar gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces
277a7(rgyud): smras so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags chen po 'jig rten du cher bstan lags so// gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa
277b1(rgyud): pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i snying po rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag lags
277b2(rgyud): so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bgyi ba rig
277b3(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag bkug cing g.yar drangs par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags sgrub cing yongs su spyod
277b4(rgyud): ba la rim gro bgyi ba dang / rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa'i dngos grub mchog stsal bar bgyi ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su bskang bar bgyi ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
277b5(rgyud): sngar 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i mngon sum du rig sngags kyi rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ lha mo sgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha mo chen mo sgrol ma
277b6(rgyud): rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nga'i byin gyi rlabs kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs kyis shod cig/ de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol mas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod par sgrol ba dri
277b7(rgyud): ma med pa parma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi snying po smras pa/ na maHs+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM/ shAkya rA dzA ya a d+hiSh+ThA na na maskr-i tA nAM/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya a ba lo ki te/
278a1(rgyud): shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ na maHtA rA yai/ ma hA de gi/ oM tA ra Ni twA ra Ni tA re/ pad+ma bi b+hU Shi ta tA re/ ma Ni ka na ka/ khi tsi tri ta mA la/ dzA Ta ma ku Ta nan/
278a2(rgyud): di ta pad+me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru pad+ma pA sha b+hu dze/ oM mo g+ha pA sha hasti/ tA ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hA sid+d+hi/ ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA tA ra Ni/ ba ra de/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ sid d+he/ a mo g+ha ba ra de sA hA/ oM a mo g+ha ba/
278a3(rgyud): ni tA re swA hA/ snying po'o// oM ma Ni tA re hUM/ te ba'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'din bdag gi gsang sngags nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi snying po'i zhags pa
278a4(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la mchog stsal ba rab tu su la bar bgyi ba'i slad du rjes su stsal ba lags so//
278a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ du ru ka dang / gu gul dang / sprig ka gcig tu bgyis la/ gsang sngags kyi snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod/
278a6(rgyud): bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la bcom ldan 'das bdag dgug pa dang g.yar drangs par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di sgrub
278a7(rgyud): pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang / srin
278b1(rgyud): po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi khasam pa thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyi/ mchog
278b2(rgyud): sprul bar bgyi/ bde legs dang / dge legs bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ba na bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'dis bdag la bdugs shing / bdag gi srib
278b3(rgyud): kho nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na bdugs pa tsam gyis mod dang / dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs yongs su dag
278b4(rgyud): pa bstan cing mngon sum du mchis par bgyi/ mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ byung ba dang 'byung ba'i bka' mchid bgyi'o// dran pa tsam gyis mod la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa'i/
278b5(rgyud): snying po 'di dran pa tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ sdang ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang /
278b6(rgyud): bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po sgrub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bkra shis kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams
278b7(rgyud): cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bsod nams drang ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal
279a1(rgyud): bar bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'cha/
279a2(rgyud): par rig sngags 'chang gi bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang 'gus pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la bab
279a3(rgyud): ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rtag tu mngon sum du bstan cing mdun na nye bar mchis par bgyi/ sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa shin tu dran pas dus las 'da' bar bgyis pa dang / ji ltar sprul pags/
279a4(rgyud): pa brjes pa bzhin lus brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skal ba dang mnyam par pad+ma dag las rdzus te skye la/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ de/
279a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus rdo rjer 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chud par 'gyur/ sa bcu la gnas par yang 'gyur/ phyir mi
279a6(rgyud): ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par yang 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du/
279a7(rgyud): ston par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags par 'gyur/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gdug pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i dam tshig
279b1(rgyud): rtogs pa dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ lhamo/
279b2(rgyud): chen po sgrol ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen po legs so legs so// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di khyod kyis bshad pa mchog tu legs so// cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
279b3(rgyud): rab sngags 'chang de'ang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir dang / dngos grub rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir khyod kyis yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag
279b4(rgyud): na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po nag po chen po dang / rig sngags dang / dkyil
279b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi lha du ma dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / lngas rtsen dang / gar mkhan mchog dang / stobs can dang / stobs po che dang / ljang sngo dang / dung can dang / de bzhin du 'jigs byed dang / dbyangs ldan mad
279b6(rgyud): dpe med ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / me tog tshems te/ thams cad 'dus nas mthun par stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
279b7(rgyud): ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe rig sngags
280a1(rgyud): 'chang de dang / rig sngags smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'ag/ rigs kyi bu lo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong pa 'am/ dge bsnyen nag/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang skyes pa'am/ bud med/
280a2(rgyud): ngam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug tor 'di sgrub par bgyid dag/ klog par bgyid dam/ 'don tam/ tha na ming tsam yang 'dzin par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag
280a3(rgyud): kun nas mthun par rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gzi brjid gzhug par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad
280a4(rgyud): kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ nyes par bgyis pa thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du rtag tu
280a5(rgyud): rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ grogs po dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis bya ba de ltar yin te/ reg sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di ngas gtams shing yongs su
280a6(rgyud): btad do zhes bka' stsal to// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rdo rje chen po'i snying po gas nga rdzogs so// / rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang /
280a7(rgyud): pa bstan pa bklags pas grub pa cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ang dz+ra/
280b1(rgyud): baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
280b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di na bdag la pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i rigs kyi snying por gyur pa gsang ba de kho na nyid bstan pa mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i don yod pa'i
280b3(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / sngags tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba yong
280b4(rgyud): su bsgrags par bgyi/ sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar gyur pa grub pa ni 'di lags te/ rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i
280b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor pad+ma yangs pa'i dam tshig don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su stsal bar bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag la gnang bar mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
280b6(rgyud): rigs kyi dam tshig byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / spyi'i dam tshig 'grub par 'gyur/ spyi'i byin gyi rlabs dang
280b7(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa thams cad kyi dngos grub de kho na nyid du 'gyur/ de bzhin/
281a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyi rlabs kyi de kho na nyid du 'gyur lags so// de/
281a2(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad
281a3(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dam tshig rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig
281a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo de'i dus la da bab par shes na shod cig/ ngas byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang la phyag rgya chen pos btab nas byin gyis brlabs
281a5(rgyud): so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// sems can thams
281a6(rgyud): cad kyi don du de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / dam tshig chen por byin gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa/
281a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa don yod pa mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum
281b1(rgyud): du byas nas/ ting nge 'dzin des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis sdang bar byas/ lha'i gnas thams cad sdang bar byas/ klu'i gnas tham+ba/
281b2(rgyud): cad sdang bar byas/ gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ 'byung po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
281b3(rgyud): gnas thams cad snang bar byos/ sa'i 'og tu gtogs pa 'og na gnas pa thams cad snang bar byas/ bar snang gi gnas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snang bar byas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen
281b4(rgyud): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por gyur pa dang / g.yo ba'i mthungs de dag thams cad bskul bar gyur to// bskul ba tsam gyis mod nyid la de dag thams cad lhags te/ ri gru 'dzin na 'khor/
281b5(rgyud): mang po 'dus par mthun par lhags nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po 'dus par mkhyen nas/ don yod pa'i zhags
281b6(rgyud): ba'i cha byad du zhugs shing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad du rigs spyi'i dam tshig gi tshul du zhugs la/ ral pa'i thor tsugs kyi
281b7(rgyud): rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag med thor tsugs su thogs pa/ tshangs pa'i gzugs can/ phyag bco brgyad la rang gi ngo bo zhags pa thogs pa/ thal mo sbyar ga sku byed na phyag g.yon pa brten pa/ mdung
282a1(rgyud): gsum pa bsdams pa/ ril ba spyi thugs dang bgrang 'breng bsdams pa/ pad+ma bsdams pa/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya bsdams pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang rgyal mtshan bsdams pa/
282a2(rgyud): me tog gi phur ma dang bi dza pu ra bsdams pa/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ rin po che'i char 'bebs par mdzad pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ spyi bor phyag rgya mdzad pa/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya
282a3(rgyud): mdzad pa/ pad+ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang nor bu'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ gzugs zhi ba/ spyan gsum pa/ mchod phyir thog/
282a4(rgyud): pa/ gdan padz+ra/ sku 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba/ sgrol ma bdun rjes su 'brang ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcus bskor ga brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan pos brjo/
282a5(rgyud): ba/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang chen dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
282a6(rgyud): pa'i spyan sngar 'khod nas mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzum pas/ me tog sna tshogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la 'thor te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog shA la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang
282a7(rgyud): sho kA bar+Na dang / kha bye 'khyil ba dang / gan d+ha bArI ka dang / mthon kha dang / mthon kha chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / mdog mdzes pa dang / su ma n+ya ka dang / skya sngar dang / cher gsal ba dang / dri med gzi brjid dang /
282b1(rgyud): dri dga' dang / rab sim dang / pa la sha dang / za ba dang / mA raN+Da ka dang / gzi brjid bsil dang / dri med dang / gzi yangs ldan dang / shin tu bstan dang / lha dga' dang / yid dga' dang / yu thi ka dang /
282b2(rgyud): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pa la dang / ut+pa la dmar po dang / ta ra Na gu h+ya dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod
282b3(rgyud): pa ni mngon sum du rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa'i rgyal po 'di smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
282b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs kyi dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rigs dang phyag rgya thams cad la
282b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rtogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang
282b6(rgyud): dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa 'phags pa'i tshogs
282b7(rgyud): kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
283a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po de dag dang 'phags pa'i tshe/
283a2(rgyud): kyi mchog de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum
283a3(rgyud): du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis da bzlas kyis/ bdag gi dgos pa thams cad grub par gyur cig/ 'jigs pa thams cad du srung bar gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu
283a4(rgyud): tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bi ri bi ri/ pi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pa ra ma ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ mas+t+ra shud+d+ha satwa/ e n+ye
283a5(rgyud): hi/ bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ ka NA ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ kuNu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ mahA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Tar+tha/
283a6(rgyud): d+ha ra b+ha ra~M / b+hai ri b+hai ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ya hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti dwe Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsA ga ga ra ha ra/ dI hA hA hA/ hI hrI hI/ hU hU hU hA/ oM kA ra prah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi
283a7(rgyud): d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ rash+mi sha ta/ sa ha sra pra ti/ maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga ban/ sa ma A di t+yan ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma it+ma/
283b1(rgyud): riShi de ba ga Na/ a b+h+yartsi ta tsa raN/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa na ta ku mA ra ru dra ba sa ga/ biSh+Nu d+ha nad/ bA yu de nga ri Shi nA ya ka/ bi nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi /
283b2(rgyud): d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka/ sa mar+tha a ba lo ki te/ bi lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu hu lu hu/
283b3(rgyud): mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams
283b4(rgyud): kyi nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad las srung du gsol srung du gsol/ gnod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / rdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / gnod byed pa
283b5(rgyud): me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshan las yongs su thar par mdzad pa/ ka Na kaN/ ki Ni kai Na~M/ kuN+Da ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la bo d+h+yad+ha/ mA ra ka/ tsa turA \u0f7fsa twA/ sam pra kA sha ka/ ta ma tA ma/
283b6(rgyud): da ma da ma/ sha ma sha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mon d+hA ka ra/ bi d+ha ma na/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Sha Sha Sha tra/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ thi Shi Shi Shi/ ShuSh+TaShA Shu/ e Ne ya tsama?
283b7(rgyud): kri ta/ pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma he shwa ra/ mi hA b+hU ta/ ga Na b+haM dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si ni/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ shwe ta yadz+nyo pa bI tA ya/ ran+ta ma/
284a1(rgyud): ku Ta/ mA la d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta/ dza TA ma ku Ta ma hAd b+hU ta/ ka ma la kri ta/ ka ra ta la/ d+hu na sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha/ a pra kas+t+ya/ kha hu satwa/ san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka
284a2(rgyud): sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba bI d+hi pa ri mo tsaM ka/ sarba A Sha ba ri pU ra ka/ sarba satwa sa mA shA sa ka rad mo stu te swA hA/ oM brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+ta/ dz+wA la a mo g+ha hUM/
284a3(rgyud): don yod pa'i snying po// a/ yi ge gcig pu ni kun nas gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa/ rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i yin te bklags
284a4(rgyud): pas grub pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po yi ge gcig pu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi
284a5(rgyud): gsang ba spyi'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa tsam gyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing / lha'i me tog gi char rab tu bab la/ kun nas rin
284a6(rgyud): bopoche'i char rab tu bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag skyong phyogs kun nas gshegs nas nam mkha'i dkyil la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs so// don
284a7(rgyud): yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i sprin lha'i rin po che sna bdun phab la 'bab pas khebs pa dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog rnams dang / lha'i rgyan dang / gos sna tshogs pa'i char bcom ldan 'das dang /
284b1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du zhugs pa la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir rab tu phab bo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra
284b2(rgyud): 'byin par mdzad de/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog bstan pa legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang /
284b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags kyi gnas rim par phye ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge gcig pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nyi ma gcig sha
284b4(rgyud): ba yin no// gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rdzogs par sa
284b5(rgyud): rgyas 'byung ba gcig gis thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin zhing / snying po yi ge gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / dam tshig gcig gis rjes su zhug/
284b6(rgyud): pa yin no// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bzang po 'di ni don yod pa'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas drangs shing sku gcig gi dam tshig la bkod
284b7(rgyud): pa yin te/ de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar byin gyis brlabs so// snying po yi ge gcig pa'i gzungs sngags ni rtag tu bklags pas grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab
285a1(rgyud): pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes/
285a2(rgyud): bya ba byin te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa legs so legs so// de kho na nyid bsgrub pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi'i dam tshig thams cad grub pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgrub pa bkrag/
285a3(rgyud): pas 'grub pa 'di ni mchog tu bzang ba yin gyis/ yon tan gyi phung po shod cig/ snying po yi ge gcig pa 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga sgrub pa bde ba/ bklags pas grub pa/ phyag rgya dang /
285a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / sku gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa srung pa'i cho ga bla na med pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan
285a5(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi snying
285a6(rgyud): po gsang ba chen po dang / rigs spyi'i sgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad par bgyi yis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis dras
285a7(rgyud): ba tsam gyis bdag mdun na nye bar mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
285b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so// de ltar khyod kyis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya zhing / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyis
285b2(rgyud): rab tu sbyin par gyis shig/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / yi ge gcig pu rigs spyi'i rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pas byir gyis brlabs kyis/ yo byad
285b3(rgyud): dang sgrub pa'i cho ga shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba dag thos nas snying shin tu dga'
285b4(rgyud): ste/ yo byad dang cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum nyid du sdig pa sreg cing ma lus par zad par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba rtsa ba nas 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/
285b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas su// dbus su pad+ma'i 'khor lo bya// tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par dbye// pad+ma ze ba'i dbus su ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs par bya// bum pa bkang dang 'phan rnam
285b6(rgyud): kyis/ dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya// me tog sna tshogs legs par dgram// spos dri bzang pos bsgos pa yi// mar me'i 'phreng ba kun tu bud// mchod yon chu dag gzhag par bya// gu gul
285b7(rgyud): dang ni sal la ki/ a ka ru dang du ru kas// bdug spos snod bzhi dag nas bdug/ rig sngags 'chang ba khrus byas nas// gos gtsang bgos te smyung ba la// nye bar gnas nas tshes brgyad dam// bcu
286a1(rgyud): bzhi 'am chos ni bco lnga ste// zla ba yar gyi ngo la sgrub// shar du kha bltas 'dug nas su// don yod zhags pa dus gsum du// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya// snying po'ang /
286a2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyang du bzlas// yi ge gcig pu 'bum du ni// mtshan mo bar chad med par bzlas// skya rengs shar nas 'jig rten dbang // ze ba'i dbus na 'bar 'gyur zhing // 'gul 'gyur 'gul pa de yis
286a3(rgyud): niHdmyal ba chen po bcu drug gi/ sgo rnams ngag ni bye bar 'gyur// dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis// g.yo la g.yos pa tsam des ni// dmyal ba'i tshor kun rnam par 'jig/ dpral ba de'i yang
286a4(rgyud): rnam par 'joms// sems can dmyal ba de dag ni// thar nas phyogs bcur rgyug pa yi// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las grol// mtho ris lam du zhugs par 'gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug
286a5(rgyud): bsngal thams cad dud 'gro rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad mthar gtugs par yongs su zad par 'gyur/
286a6(rgyud): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi
286a7(rgyud): mdog can du ston par mdzad la/ mchog thams cad skyid par mdzad do// don song ba'i dri ba med pa'i ye shes rgyal po bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang bral ba sems
286b1(rgyud): rgyan rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu po rnams mod nyid la mngon sum du ston par mdzad
286b2(rgyud): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur
286b3(rgyud): 'jig rten pa kun gyis gcig pu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzun
286b4(rgyud): kyis mngon sum du ston cing / nye 'khor la kun nas srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur/ dngos grub dang dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams cad bar ma
286b5(rgyud): gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can du mi mthong / des sgrib pa dang sdig pa lhag ma ma lus par shes par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga
286b6(rgyud): smyung ba gnyis pa byas pa dang / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad phyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te bzlas brjod kyi cho ga sbyang ba gsum pa byed na bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gsum
286b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang bteg ste/ mod la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i can du 'od dpag med kyi spyar sngar 'jog par mdzad la/
287a1(rgyud): mngon sum du bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad de/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// gal te sems
287a2(rgyud): can gzhan rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba gang zhig sdig pa dang sgrib pa zad
287a3(rgyud): par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang khrus byas la gos gtsang bgos/ smyung ba byas pa des dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang cho ga byed pas gsang sngags rjes su dran par
287a4(rgyud): byas nas rma bya'i smos byab par bya'o// de tsam gyis yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ nang thams cad dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / na ba thams
287a5(rgyud): cad dang / mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te the tshom med do// sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid thob par 'gyur zhing tshig gzung bar nges par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyis gzung zhing kun nas srung bar
287a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzigs bzhed par 'gyur/ tshe ring ba dang / sgrib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas
287a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur te/ snying rje dang byams pa chen po yid la bya ba
287b1(rgyud): rtse gcig tu bya zhing smyung ba dang bzlas brjod bya'o// sdig pa dang sgrib bzang bar bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o// / 'phags pa don song pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga nig/
287b2(rgyud): mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu bdun pa/ de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du legs par phye ba/ gruba'i pa/ rgyar gci
287b3(rgyud): kyi tshad kyis shin tu rnam par bye ba bya ste/ dri'i tshon rtsi rnam par bkra ba kun nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang rdo rje'i ge sar la btsun pa'i dbus su pad+ma bya'o// rdo rje'i thig skud kyis kun nas bskor ba'i dbus kyi
287b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i ge sar la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa dgod par bya'o// nyi ma re re zhing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing / nya ma re re zhing a ka ru'i bdug pa dang
287b5(rgyud): khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod rgyal po'i bzlas brjod dang phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod thun gsum du ldan gsum mam/ lan bdun nam/ lan nyi shu rtsa
287b6(rgyud): gcig tu bzlas so// zas ngan pa bcu yongs su spang bar bya zhing / sems can ngan pa'ang spang bar bya'o// sgrub skabs kyi de kho na nyid las thams cad du 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub bo// 'jigs pa
287b7(rgyud): chen po mi bzang ba brgyad po de rnams las grol lo// don yod pa'i rgyal po dran pas nad thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// dug dang / sbyar dug dang / byang snyems dang / gdon thams cad dang / 'jigs pa
288a1(rgyud): dang / sdang ba dang / skrag pa dang / rims dang / nang thams cad dang / phol mig dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / g.yan pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / mgo bo na ba dang / mig na/
288a2(rgyud): ba dang / rna ba na pa dang / sna na pa dang / kha na pa dang / rkan na pa dang / mgul na ba dang / snying na ba dang / ljon pa dang / so dang mchun pa dang / lag pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / po ba'i nad dang /
288a3(rgyud): ma zhu ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad na ba dang / tshad pa dang / gzhang nad dang / gcin nad dang / gsung ba dang / 'khogs pa la lan cig brjod de byabs pa tsam gyis
288a4(rgyud): thams cad sel bar byed de/ myur du rab tu zhi bar byed cing skad cig de nyid la'ang yang dag par gnas par byed do// 'jig rten pa'i bya ba gzhan thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba
288a5(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyi ma re re zhing skyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang
288a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// don che zhing che ba dag 'ong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dpon po lhun gyis grub pa nyid du rnyed do// rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog tu bcas pas
288a7(rgyud): gcig tu mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// nyi ma re re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba so sor thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
288b1(rgyud): yang dag par brgyan pa mthong ngo // tshes brgyad dang bco lnga la po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal med khang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs
288b2(rgyud): te/ 'khor chen po la chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa dang / 'od dpag med bde ba can gyi gnas na bzhugs pa mthong ste/ ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar du mthong ngo // 'chi 'phos pa na bsams pa nyid kyi mod la
288b3(rgyud): bde ba can gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob pa don yod pa'i 'od zer
288b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// ting nge 'dzin gang zhig thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag snyed las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
288b5(rgyud): mngon par phyag byas nas/ se gol gtogs pa tsam nyid la slar yang 'ong ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// ting nge 'dzin gzhan khrag khrig brgya stong phrag so sor thob cing / bzlas pa'i cho ga gcig
288b6(rgyud): pus las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes so// bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o// / de nas khrus kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ khrus byed pa la mkhas pa gang gis
288b7(rgyud): dri ma thams cad sel bar byed cing mdzes pa/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i de kho na nyid bsod nams dang gzi brjid rab tu 'phel bar byed pa/ nad thams
289a1(rgyud): cud sel bar byung ba/ sdig pa dang TIg tonyams par byed pa/ de bzhin du za ba dang nyams pa bcom pa// dug dang byad sems nyams pa/ nad yun ring po yongs su spangs pa/
289a2(rgyud): bzhin du gcod yun ring po dang rims yongs su spangs pa ste/ 'di dag khrus kyis 'grub ste/ rig sngags gang yin pa des 'grub par don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yongs su bsgrags/
289a3(rgyud): so// bgegs kyis reg pa gang yin pa dang / grib gnon gyi gdon mi bzad pas reg pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa la'ang dgra
289a4(rgyud): rnams kyis pham pa dang / skye bo sdang ba dang / gang gi 'khrug pa'i g.yul du song ba dang / rgyu skar gyis bcom pa gang yin pa dang / blo'i skye ba zad pa dang / ma ning dang / nyams pa'i ma ning dang / dbang po
289a5(rgyud): nyams pa'i bar gang yin pa rnams dang / bu mi 'tsho ba gang yin pa rnams kyi bu mthun par skye bar 'gyur ro// gsad cing gzhom pa thob pa gang yin pa dang / 'ching ba dang gsod par song ba gang yin pa dang //
289a6(rgyud): chom rkun nam/ rkun mo'i nang ngam/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'i nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / mche ba gdug pa dang / dug gi khrod du song bas dug
289a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa mi bzad pa zos pa gang yin po dang / khyim rdib pa dang / g.yang sa dang / byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa rnams dang / mi mngon par sdig pa byed pa gang yin pa dang / mtshams med pa byed pa gang
289b1(rgyud): yin pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba 'di rnams dkyil 'khor du khrus byas pas thams cad yang dag par zad par 'gro zhing / myur du thams cad rim par nya
289b2(rgyud): par byed de/ rtswa rnams mes sreg pa bzhin du sngon bsags pa'i mi bzad pa'i las 'di dag thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma dang rtag tu mchod par 'os par
289b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tshe yun ring por gnas te/ rtag tu bde ba dang dga' bar byed do// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nad med cing rims med pa nyid du gnas so// bde blag tu bya ba byed cing / de'i skye ba bdun dran par 'gyur/
289b4(rgyud): ro lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing / mthar thug rtag tu dpal bar byed do// sangs rgyas rnams rtag tu mthong ba dang / rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin par byed pa dang / rtag tu
289b5(rgyud): mthong bar 'dod pa'ang thun mtshams rtag tu mngon sum du mthong bas gnas par byed do// rtag tu rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang / rig sngags kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ rtag tu dkyil 'khor gyi
289b6(rgyud): mchog gang yin pa'ang sgrub par byed do// rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs
289b7(rgyud): pas bkra ba/ sgo bzhi kun nas rnam par phye ba dang / las rnams legs par zin nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'khor lo yang dag par bri'o// pad+ma'i lte ba dang snying po nyid kyang 'bar bar bya'o// zur
290a1(rgyud): dang zur rnams su zhags pa 'bar ba pad+ma la gnas par bya'o// rig sngags 'dod pas khrus dang gtor ma dkar po'ang 'dir dgod par bya'o// a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul zhing /
290a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o// las gzhan sgrub pa ni ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor mas mchod par bya zhing / sna tshogs pa'i bdug spos dbul lo// bum pa
290a3(rgyud): chus bkang nas rdzas kyi phye ma rnams der gzhug cing / rin chen sna bdun bcug ste/ de la rgya dar gyis bcings la/ don yod zhugs pa lan brgya dang / snying po nyid kyang lan brgyar bzlas so// yi ge gcig pa
290a4(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// tsan dan dang / sa mI dang / si ri Sha dang / ha ba shang tsi'u dang / gu kum dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma ge sar rnams legs par btags nas bum pa bkang bar bya ste/ 'di rnams kyis/
290a5(rgyud): khrus bya'o// nye'u shing dang / shu ti dang / bil ba ste/ 'di rnams kyis nyed pa dang / rtag tu sngon du byab par byas la/ de nas mkhas pas khrus bya'o// de nas srung ba'i cho ga ni don yod rgyal pos bya'o// de nas rtswa
290a6(rgyud): dur ba bting nas/ de la skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bum pa'i chus khrus bya zhing / pad+ma'i phyag rgya'ang byed du gzhug go// de nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsug tor bcing bar bya zhing / sngon du bcus
290a7(rgyud): ba 'bul ba dang bskor 'byas nas sgo dang sgo nas phyag bya'o// shar gyi sgor zhugs la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sring por skyil krung gis 'dug la/ don yod pa'i rgyal pos lan bdun du byab par bya'o// lag
290b1(rgyud): tu rdo rje dang bzung 'phreng gis mngon par dbang bskur zhing / rgyu dang / lungs kar dang / phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byo'o// 'di ni nus kyi mtsho sbyor 'jig rten dab rgyun
290b2(rgyud): gis gsungs so// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams la khyad par du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha thams cad kyis mchod pa dang
290b3(rgyud): don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gdon mi za bar byed do// gang dang gang du las la nges par sbyar ba thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad du 'di la the tshom med do// sngags kyi
290b4(rgyud): dngos grub bla na med pa ma grub pa'ang grub par 'gyur te/ don yod pa'i dngos grub thob cing 'phral nyid du 'bras bu mthong ba yin no// lus yongs su dag cing shin tu dri ma med pa dang / legs par khrus byas
290b5(rgyud): par de brjod par bya'o// sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed pa ste/ mdor na thams cad du dngos grub so sor rnyed
290b6(rgyud): cing/ dpal chen por lhag par 'gro'o// rig sngags don du gnyer ba thob ste/ rig sngags don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid las bu 'dod pas ni bu thob bo// nor 'dod pas ni nor thob bo// dbang phyug
290b7(rgyud): 'dod pas de dbang phyug thob bo// myur du dngal 'dod pas ni dngal thob bo// mngon par 'dong pa thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzozhes par byed do zhes so// chus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//
291a1(rgyud): de nas nor bu'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrub pa rmang du byung ba don yod pa'i nor bu'i dngos grub dang bya ba thams/
291a2(rgyud): cad sgrub par byed pa/ thams cad du lhung ba'i sdug bsngal las byung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob par byed pa/ gsod thob pa mngon par thar par byed pa/ mtshon cha dang / khong bsgril gcog par
291a3(rgyud): byed par the tsom med do// sdig pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ mtshams med pa zad par byed pa/ rtag tu gsod pa med pa'i gnas thams cad du son par byed pa/ rtag tu 'khrugs pa dang g.yul
291a4(rgyud): ngo las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// chom rkun gyi nang nas grol bar 'gyur zhing / rkun mo las kyang sgrol bar byed do// gcan gzan gtum po seng ge dang / glang po che dang / dom dang / gzigs dang /
291a5(rgyud): dreng dang / khyi dang / phag dang / lce spyad rnams las nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i mod la thams cad du sgrol bar byed do// dug dang / sbrul thams cad dam/ mche ba gdug pa dang / sbrul go na sa
291a6(rgyud): dang / bta sa nA b+ha dang / dug nyid dang / dug shring ga dang / dug mus+tha ka nyid dang / da ra da'i dug dang / lus la byas pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dug dang / dug ha la ha la dang / sdig pa la sogs pa gang yin pa/
291a7(rgyud): dang / mthong ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa'i dug 'jigs pa dang / 'jog pos kyang zin pa dang / gzhan yang srog chags mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs
291b1(rgyud): ba'i dug mi bzad pa rnams dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang / nor du reg pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad 'phral du drug med par 'gyur ro// gal te gang gar 'bab pa'i dug 'thungs kyang 'phral du/
291b2(rgyud): 'joms par byed do// nam mkha' lding gis sbrul nyid dang klu bzhin no// mes mi 'tshig go// slar yang chus 'khyer bar mi 'gyur ro// byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / de la rgyal po khro bar mi da
291b3(rgyud): do nam yang phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / 'thab mo dang / 'khrul 'khor byed pa dang / sdang ba gang yin pa de rnams med de/ cho ga 'di ni mchog go/ dug dang / byad snyems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba la sogs pa
291b4(rgyud): thams cad skad cig de la nyams par byed do// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgras dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren rnams dkyil
291b5(rgyud): 'khor mthong ba tsam dang / nor bu gzung ba nyid kyis thams cad 'bros par byed de 'di la the tsom med do// 'di thams cad kyis thun mong du nor bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la bsam pa gang yin pa'i
291b6(rgyud): bsam pa de thams cad yid la don du gnyer bar bya ba gang yin pa rnams kyang / nor bu gzung ba nyid la thams cad myur du phun sum tshogs par byed do// tshe 'phel ba dang sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med
291b7(rgyud): nga grub bo// bkra shis pa dang / dam pa dang / bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa nyams pa dang / 'phral du rmi lam bzang por byed pa nyid dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas dang byang
292a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang / rtag tu lha rnams 'gugs pa nyid dang / rtag tu 'byor pa thams cad byed pa dang / rtag tu zla ba nyab ltar 'od zer 'bar bas rnam par mdzes/
292a2(rgyud): pa dang / tshig btsun pa dang / rtag tu dga' ba dang / thams cad du mchod par bya ba'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi rdzas kyi sbyor ba bya ste/ cha mnyam par legs par bye la gtso bo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o//
292a3(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / nA ku li dang / dri'i nA ku li dang / a ru ra dang / lag pa dang / dbang po lag pa dang / dri'i pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po
292a4(rgyud): dang / khyab 'jug gnon pa dang / sau ma rA dza dang / su nan da dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / ma la ya'i tsan dan dang / na la dA dang / gur kum dang / ba bla dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / tsam
292a5(rgyud): pa ka'i me tog dang / ba TA dang / brag skyes dang / spang spos dang / snga ma ka rnams mnyam par byas te phye ma zhib mor legs par btags la/ pu shel ci dang tsan dan gyi chus sbrus te zangs kyi snod du gzhag
292a6(rgyud): lakhrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkod de/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ snying po brgya rtsa brgyad nyid dang / yi ge gcig pa 'bum du bzlas pas rdzas kyi snod 'bar bar byed do//
292a7(rgyud): de nas nor bu mgo bo la bcings pa 'am/ lag pa la bcings la gzungs par bya ste/ mchog tu skal ba bzang po thob cing / dbang phyug gi mchog dang dpon po thob bo// rje'u rigs bu med pas kyang mangs
292b1(rgyud): nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang rab tu 'joms shing / lung ba'i mchog tu rnyeng par dka' bas te/ nor bu gang du gnas pa der grog gi gnod pa med do// de dbyig la gdug pa'i 'jig sa
292b2(rgyud): dang g.yo ba mi 'byung ngo // nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i gnas 'di mchod rten du bskur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed cing / rtag tu'ang rgyal po chen po bzhi
292b3(rgyud): dang / lag na rdo rje stobs po ches rtag tu'ang srung zhing / dus rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te the tsom med do// dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyi logs bzhi pa/ zur bzhi pa/
292b4(rgyud): shin tu bcags pa/ legs par sbyar ba/ mchog tu mdzes pa bya'o// khor yug tu me tog sna tshogs kyi mgo lcogs kyis bkra ba bris la/ shar gyi sgo rnam par phye ste/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma rdo rje'i
292b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la yang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rdzas kyi snod gzhag par bya
292b6(rgyud): zhing me tog gcal du bkram par byas la/ dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya ste/ dri dang yon chab dbul bar bya zhing / tsan dan gyi bdug pa sreg go// nyin mtshan du gos gtsang ma bgo zhing bcang bar bya/ shin
292b7(rgyud): tu dri ma med pa'i sems su 'gyur bar bya/ byams pa dang snying rje mchog tu 'gyur bar bya zhing / de nas nor bu'i rdzas sgrub bo zhes so// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas ljong/
293a1(rgyud): ros kyi mig smad gyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rgyur gzings kyi cha'i mthar thug pus dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ dri sna tshogs dang rnam par bkra bab ri/
293a2(rgyud): sngags 'chang ni grwa rnams su mkhas pas bri bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dab ma phyed kha bye ba'o// lag pa gnyis kyi dbus su pad+ma ge sar rgyas pa 'chang ba'o// shar gyi sgo rnam
293a3(rgyud): par phye ba bya ste/ ldong ros dngul gyi snod du gzhag nas dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i steng du dgod par bya'o// sdod kyi khor yug tu dar dmar po'i gos bzang pos g.yog par bya'o// yang na pad+ma'i 'dab ma
293a4(rgyud): 'am/ yang na byang chub shing gi 'dab ma 'am/ yang na shing 'dzam bu'i 'dab mas g.yog par bya'o// a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa/
293a5(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i drung du dgod par bya'o// me tog dang dris mchod par bya/ rig sngags 'chang gis dkar gsum zos la 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas su 'gyur ba
293a6(rgyud): bya'o// yang na nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas par bya/ zla ba yang ngo'am/ tshes bco lnga'i wa'am/ chos bcu bzhi 'am/ tshes brgyad la gtsang mar khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ don yod zhags
293a7(rgyud): pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad ba thos shing / snying po brgya rtsa brgyad kyang bzlas par bya/ yi ge gcig pa stong phrag bcur bzlas la/ dkyil 'khor nye bar spras shing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang /
293b1(rgyud): gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'phang bar bya'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyis mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus/
293b2(rgyud): las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin par byed do// ldong ros kyi sdong de'ang 'bar bar byed de/ 'bar ba tsam gyis mong la mig la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro'o// don yod pa'i ye shes yangs pa yid bzhin gyi
293b3(rgyud): bu'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// don yod pa'i 'khor lo kun nas rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi
293b4(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du gnas kyi mnga' bdag rgyal por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
293b5(rgyud): cad du 'gro zhing / tshe bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul so sor thob ste/ rdzu 'phrul gang gis
293b6(rgyud): se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dngos grub yangs pa'i/
293b7(rgyud): mchod pa byed par 'gyur zhing / skad cig gis slar yang 'ong bar byed do// rang gi lus la 'od zer brgya stong phrag dus 'bar bar byed do// gang 'dod pa de thams cad byed do// de nas du ba 'phrul bzhin pa ni bskus
294a1(rgyud): na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ mi snang ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dag 'byung /
294a2(rgyud): kho dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas gnas te/ gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par byed do// gnas thams cad na gnas pa rnams
294a3(rgyud): 'bangs su gyur nas gnas te ci bsgo ba byed do// sems can thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pas mchod pa dang / bla mar bya ba'i gnas
294a4(rgyud): gcig pur 'gyur ro// bka' bsgo ba'ang bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang byed cing gnas so// dbu ba 'byung bzhin pa bskus na cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs/
294a5(rgyud): pa thams cad rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig mngon du gyur nas gnas te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rnams ston du gyur nas
294a6(rgyud): gnas so// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad yang dag par rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i ched du rtag pa kho nar rjes su 'gro'o// sangs rgyas
294a7(rgyud): ngang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob ste/ sa'i steng nas sor bzhi'i tshang du 'phags pa'i nas
294b1(rgyud): mtha' la gnas so// rdza chos la bzlas nas mig la bslus na mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ rgyal po dang / tsun mo'i 'khor dang / thor to dag brlangs pa dang / bdun na 'dod du/
294b2(rgyud): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas so//
294b3(rgyud): tha na ri dgas dang bya'ang lta bar byed bzhin du dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so// 'dis byugs po'i mig gis nad dang / gnod pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// lus kyi gdu
294b4(rgyud): ba dang / sems kyi gdung ba thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis par gyur pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// skye ba brjes nas kyang spyan lnga yongs su dag pa so
294b5(rgyud): sor thob bo// tshe rabs dran par yang skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang sgrib pa dang bral zhing / don yod pa legs par rab tu gnas par kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i lus dag pa so sor thob bo// kun nas
294b6(rgyud): don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig so sor thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems
294b7(rgyud): dpa'i dbang bskur ba so sor thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rtag tu'ang 'grogs shing gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes so// mig sman gyi dkyil/
295a1(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas bdug pa rim par phye ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog tu rmad du byung ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
295a2(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i don dang / de bzhin nyid du 'jig rten gsum po thams cad 'gugs pa grub pa dang / lha thams cad spyan drang ba dang / dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang /
295a3(rgyud): phyug chen po rnams sdigs par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / gdon ma rungs pa de rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par byed par the tsom med do// bgegs dang / log par 'dren
295a4(rgyud): bo nyid dang / sdang ba dang / de bzhin du bdud kyang rung ste/ bdug pa'i dris rnam par zhig par 'gyur zhing / yan lag dang nying lag rnam par 'thor bar byed do// rang gi dmag dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
295a5(rgyud): dang / shin tu 'gras pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / de bzhin du dgra bo nyid dang / skye bo sdang ba dang / gang du 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul nyid kyang bdug pa'i dris thams cad rab tu ni
295a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do// gal te skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze nyid dang / de bzhin du dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma
295a7(rgyud): dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal phran dang / de bzhin du rgyal mo dang / btsun mo'i 'khor yang rung ste/ legs par khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug spos 'dis bdugs na/ gang gis bdugs pa'i dri
295b1(rgyud): mnams pa dang / de lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol lo// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom med do// mtshams med pa
295b2(rgyud): lnga'i sdig pa rnams 'phral du thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes so// bdug pa 'di bdugs pa tsam gyis skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dris kun tu 'grengs te/ sum cu
295b3(rgyud): rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas nas ji srid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dris kun tu 'gengs so// stobs dang shugs chen pos lha'i gnas thams cad 'gul bar byed cing skyod par byed do// chu rgyun gyi klu
295b4(rgyud): rnams 'gul bar byed cing / ri rab las gzhan pa'i ri gang yin pa 'dar yang yod byed do// gsang bar gnas pa rnams rnam par skrag par byed do// dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jigs pa rnams rnam par
295b5(rgyud): zhig par byed do// de bzhin du sa'i mthil thams cad kyang dkar bsil du snang bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sdug bsngal mi bzang ba de rnams thams cad yongs
295b6(rgyud): su grol te/ bde ba can du'ang 'gro'o// mtho ris thams cad du ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so// dmyal ba thams cad nyams te pad+ma can du rab tu 'gyur ro// nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gnan rnam
295b7(rgyud): dang \u0f7fsa 'og gi nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / dgon pa dang / ri dang / tshang tshing dang / dgon dung dang / ga yang sar gnas pa'i dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba gang yin pa rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dris yod/
296a1(rgyud): su grol lo// mi gtsang ba za ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za gang yin pa rnams dang / bshang ba dang gci bza ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mchil ma dang sbubs zab
296a2(rgyud): gang yin pa rnams dang / 'dres pa za ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dri mnams pa tsam gyis yongs su grol nas 'phral nyid du lha'i 'jig rten du skye'o// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i
296a3(rgyud): mchog dang / dri zhim po'i kha zas rnyed par 'gyur ro// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags ri dgas dang / bya rnams thams cad dri la mnams pa tsam gyis nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo// /
296a4(rgyud): bdug pa mnams pa tsam 'dis nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo// rims thams cad las yongs su grol lo// na ba thams cad las yongs su grol lo// 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa
296a5(rgyud): dang / me dpal dang / shu ba dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa dang / mig na ba dang / mgo bo na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / sna na ba dang / so na ba dang / kha na ba dang / lba ba dang / 'jigs pa dang //
296a6(rgyud): skrag pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad bdug pa'i dri bsnams pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de dang / don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
296a7(rgyud): snying po'i mthus sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing / rnam par grol te mi 'jigs pa'i grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas rdzas rnams kyi rang gi cha shas
296b1(rgyud): rnam par bye ba dang ldan pa bshad par bya ste/ tsan dan srang gsum dang / a ka ru srang gsum dang / tu ru ka srang lnga dang / gur kum srang bcu dang / smi ka srang gnyis dang / na lan da grang gnyis dang / matse'i mib zan
296b2(rgyud): nyi shu dang / sra rtsi pog srung bcu dang / bo la srang gsum dang / sal+la k+Shi srang brgyad dang / rgya spos srung gnyis dang / spang spos srang gcig dang / shA ma ka srang gcig dang / gan+d+ha pa tra srang gcig dang / pad+ma ga
296b3(rgyud): sar srang gcig dang / shri rI ma'i me tog srang gcig dang / li kha ra dkar po srang bcu dang / dri'i pri yang ku srang gcig dang / pu shel ci srang lnga dang / stag sen srang gcig dang / sug spel srang gsum dang /
296b4(rgyud): bA la ka srang lnga dang / gur kum dang gla rtsi tshor ba ste/ thams cad legs par rnam par dbye bar byas nas/ phye mar byas la mthar thams cad gcig tu bsdoms te sbrang rtsis slu bar bya'o// chos bco lnga la
296b5(rgyud): rgyu skar dang chos grangs kyi lha dge ba la/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ legs par khrus byas par gyur pas brtul zhugs spyad pas bdug pa'i mchog sbyar bar bya'o//
296b6(rgyud): de nas bdug pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa tshad shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/ gzings kyi tshad kyi shin tu bcags pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa la tshon rnam pa sna tshogs pas sgo bzhi shin tu rnam
296b7(rgyud): par bye ba/ mdzes par bri bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bri'o// dbus kyi pad+ma byed kha bye ba'i 'breng ba bri ste/ lag pa gnyis 'thon nas sna tshogs pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa 'dzin par byed/
297a1(rgyud): pa'o// de'i steng du bdug pa'i snod bkod nas/ me'i kha dog can gyi gos kyis g.yogs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi gru bzhi rnams su rlung gi rgyal po bri'o// sgo bzhir zhags pa bris nas
297a2(rgyud): khor yug tu lag pa'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba las nges par 'thon pa'o// bdug spos 'khyil pa 'chang bar byed pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du smras par bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma dang me tog dbul bar
297a3(rgyud): bya/ mchod yon gyi snod dang / gang ba'i bum pa dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / skud pa dmar pos mtshams bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor la dngul dang gser gzhag cing / khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang dri sna tshogs
297a4(rgyud): rgya chen po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkod nas kha shar du phyogs nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba la nye bar dgod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bdug pa'i rgyal po la yongs su bzlas par/
297a5(rgyud): bya ste/ nyi ma bdun la thun gsum du don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// don yod pa'i snying po yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas brjod 'bum rdzogs pa ste/ stong phrag brgya
297a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'o// / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / slar yang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /
297a7(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o// de nas thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug pa dbul lo// 'di
297b1(rgyud): ni bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub par 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bya ba de sgrub par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar gyi 'bras bu gcig gi tshad tsam gyi bdug pas de bzhin
297b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'dod pa dang / stong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dri gcig gis rgyas par 'dod pa dang / bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pas kun nas g.yogs par
297b3(rgyud): 'dod pa dang / dri sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs par 'dod pa des/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdug pa de rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'ang
297b4(rgyud): gis nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas la/ me tog gcal du bkram par bya'o// mchod yon dang zhabs bsil
297b5(rgyud): yang gzhag par bya/ bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug par bya zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po dus gcig tu brjod par bya ste/ phyogs bcur bdug pa'i pog por dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
297b6(rgyud): thams cad yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can 'byung po thams cad la byams pa bsgom par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa thams cad dri ma med pa'i sems kyis yid la bsgom par bya//
297b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil phul te yi ge gcig pa yid la brjod cing / phyag rgya'ang lan cig bcings la phyag bya'o zhes so// phul ba tsam gyis mod la phyogs re re nas
298a1(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bye ba la dris khyab par byed cing / bdug pa chen po 'khrigs pas nam mkha'i mthil du khyab par 'gyur //
298a2(rgyud): dri sna tshogs kyi char 'bar bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
298a3(rgyud): mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dus dus su don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byed pa srung ba'i don dang /
298a4(rgyud): phyag rgya 'ching bar byed pa de srung ba'i don du legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa rgyas par byed pa de bzhin du bya'o// don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub kyang
298a5(rgyud): sbyin par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po nye bar sogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po dang /
298a6(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs par byed do// ji ltar rig sngags 'chang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i cho ga byed byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam pa du ma de bzhin gshes pa re re zhing gi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur
298a7(rgyud): ro// rig sngags 'chang nyi ma bdun du rab tu brtson pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang bla ma mchod do// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba stsol bar byed do// de rnams thams/
298b1(rgyud): cad kyis dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ mchog rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// sa bcu ya dag pa /
298b2(rgyud): te mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i 'dug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de bzhin nyid du 'jig rten las 'das pa la 'chi'abo ban de bzhi gshegs pa'i spyan tham napa
298b3(rgyud): drung ngu pad+mal rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro bar byed pa de thams cad du'ang / de bzhin gshegs pas rig sngags 'chang
298b4(rgyud): la lung ston par 'gyur ro// phyis kyang skye ba gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// lus 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur nas/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song ste/ sangs rgyas bcom lda
298b5(rgyud): 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do// tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'di'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par so sor thob bo// 'di ni 'jig
298b6(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i khyad par ro// de nas 'jig rten pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga brgya stong phrag du ma 'grub par byed do// ji lta ba nur 'dug pa nyid yid la byed pa de la de ltar thams cad yang dag par
298b7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas su bdugs pa tsam gyis mongs klu'i rgyal pos char rgyun chen po 'byin par byed do// rgyal po'i sgor bdugs na rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas
299a1(rgyud): gnas so// skye bo mang po'i dbus su bdugs na rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas gnas so// bdag nyid la bdugs na thams cad du mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// nad thams cad/
299a2(rgyud): la bdugs na nad thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do// dug la bdugs na dug med par 'gyur ro// mtshams kyi nang du bdugs na me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad ro zhim pa dang / legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// lo
299a3(rgyud): tog la bdugs na 'bru'i phung po chen por 'gyur ro// khyim mam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer la bdugs na dug dang / sbyar dug dang / dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags thams cad nam yang mi 'byung ngo //
299a4(rgyud): g.yul gyi dbus su bdugs na cher rgyal bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid dam/ gzhan rnams sam/ don mthun pa rnams la bdugs nas lam du 'gro ba na chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / rkun mo dang / gcan gzan gtum
299a5(rgyud): po'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang legs pas rang gi khyim du 'ong ngo // dpag tshad stong du 'gro'ang ngal ba med cing / slar yang 'ong bar byed do// dung la bdugs nas mthon por bus na//
299a6(rgyud): ji srid dung gi sgra thos pa de srid du gnod pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / mtshon cha dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo/
299a7(rgyud): dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// yams thams cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad rnam par nyams par
299b1(rgyud): byed do// bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' bar 'os par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dod par 'gyur ro// nad med pa dang / gnod pa meng ba dang / rims med pa dang / thang chad pa med par ji srid
299b2(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du gnas so// khang pa'i steng mthon por phyogs bzhir bdugs na rlung dang / sad dang / sprin gyi ser ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur te/ ji srid yid la byed pa nar mar yod pa de srid du mtshams bcing bar byas/
299b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// khyim gyi nang du bdugs na bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / bran po dang / bran mo thams cad dang / ji srid du rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa thams cad byams pa'i yid du 'gyur te dbang
299b4(rgyud): du gyur nas so// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed do// slar yang yid gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bdugs na dri ma rnams pa'i mthu des sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa skyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba
299b5(rgyud): brag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong ba so sor thob ste/ phyis kyang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho ba na bde
299b6(rgyud): ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sam/ mngon par dga' bar skyes te/ 'di la dogs pa dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya zhing / the tshom bskyed par mi bya'o zhes so// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyim la bdugs na nag
