299b7(rgyud): bo chen po la sogs pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dbang du gyur par 'gyur te/ mdun du nye bar gnos par byed do// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / nag po chen po'i gzugs
300a1(rgyud): brnyad bya rgyu bo'i gtsug tu bdugs na bdugs btsam rgyas mod la kha nas khrag skyug go// rig sngags 'chang gis de blangs te thig le byas nas rnam mapa' la lding bar byed do// mig la
300a2(rgyud): byugs na mi sdang bar 'gyur te/ bde blag tu 'byung po'i bdag po chen por 'gyur ro// lto bar yongs su byugs ni gnod sbyin dang srin po'i dpon po'o// lus mtha' dag la byugs na/ stongs dang / brtson 'grus dang /
300a3(rgyud): rtsal chen po nag po chen po dang mtshungs pa'i shugs su 'gyur te/ de nyid kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro// 'khor gyi tshogs chen por yang 'gyur ro// tshangs pa la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la 'o ma 'ja
300a4(rgyud): bablang bar bya ste lus la byug par bya'o// tshangs pa dang 'dra ba'i stobs dang shugs su 'gyur te nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed do// khyab 'jug la bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la lus la ba lA sha'i 'do
300a5(rgyud): gi dri'i chu 'dzag ste/ raMg sngags 'chang gi lus la byug par bya'o// sred med kyi bu'i gzugs dang / spobs dang / shugs 'changa' bar 'gyur te/ lag na 'khor lo thogs pas nam mkha' la 'gro'o// dbang phyug /
300a6(rgyud): bopo la bdugs na dbang phyug chen po'i lus la rdul 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus la byug par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ lag na mdung rtse gsum dang / stobs dang / brtson
300a7(rgyud): 'grus dang / rtsal gyis 'byung po'i bdag po chen por 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la 'gro'o// thams cad la don yod rgyal po'i bzlas brjod lan gsum gsum rna bar sbyin par bya'o// snying po yi ge gcig pas skye/
300b1(rgyud): khor bzlas brjod lan bdun du bzlas brjod sbyid par bya'o// spra tshil las byung ba'i klu mgo bo dgu pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bya ste/ gser gyis g.yog par bya zhing dri'i dkyil 'khor bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng /
300b2(rgyud): gnag par bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// bdug pa 'dis bdugs pas klu ldang bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang gis 'jigs pa med par bya ste/ khro do'i rgyal po yungs
300b3(rgyud): kar la bzlas te/ spyi bo'i gtsug tu brdegs na lding bar byed do// gang du 'dod pa der gnas nas klu chen po'i mtsho dang / gnas dang / gzhal med khang rab tu 'byung ngo // chu gang yin pa de rnams kyang 'thung
300b4(rgyud): bar byed pa dang / khrus byed pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song bas 'thung ba dang khrus byed pa de rnams thams cad kyang nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
300b5(rgyud): sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang bral ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur ro// klu rnams kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun chen po 'byin par byed cing / char 'bebs par byed do// dus dus su me tog
300b6(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog rnams rdzogs par byed de/ ro zhim po'i ro myong bar 'gyur ro// phyir zhing log par lhung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// phug dang khung bu'i sgor 'khrul 'khor gyi sgo glegs la bdugs
300b7(rgyud): na bye zhing gcog par 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa'i dus su bdugs na 'bam par 'gyur ro// lag mthil la bdugs na gang dang gang la reg pa thams cad dbang du byed do// bdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshe
301a1(rgyud): ga'o// / de nas sman gyi dkyil 'dor gyi mog bshad par bya ste/ don yod par thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thungab ga/ nang thams cad sel bar grub pa/ thams cad /
301a2(rgyud): du dug 'joms par byed pa na ba thams cad sel bar grub pa/ sdang ba thams cad log par byed ga 'byung po thams cad la mi 'jigs pa/ mtshon dang / me dang / chu dang / dug rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag/
301a3(rgyud): tu srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba bar byed pa/ dgra rnams dang gzhan rgyal ba ldog par byed pa/ rgyal po dang / rgyal phran dang / btsun mo'i 'khor du song ba dang / gtso bo rtag tu dbang du byed cing thams cad du
301a4(rgyud): thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'khrug pa dang / g.yul rnams rtag tu rab tu 'joms par byed pa gang gi tshe chom rkun gyi nang du song ba nyid dang / don 'thun gyi nang dang / rkun mo
301a5(rgyud): dang / seng ge dang / stag gi nang du song ba de'i tshe thams cad du sman gyis rgyal ba ster ro// tshe ring por 'gyur te/ rtag tu pad+ma'i phyag gi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed do// gnod
301a6(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldang nyid dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po nyid dang / mi ma yin gdug pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad nyin dang mtshan du srung ba'i don du yang
301a7(rgyud): dag par sgrub par 'gyur te the tsom med do// rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas pa dang /
301b1(rgyud): skabs gsum pa'i lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha de rnams thams cad mthun pas rtag tu srung bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyis rnam par gzigs shing rta
301b2(rgyud): tu'ang mthong ba stsol bar mdzad do// gang sman lag tu phyin par 'gyur ba 'di/ yang nas yang du rig sngags kyi dngos grub myur du thob bo// khyad snyems 'pho ba med do// de la dug med cing sdig pa med la/
301b3(rgyud): mi bzad pa'i sbyor ba dang / phye ma'i sbyor bas gnon par mi 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrib pa nyams par byed do// de bzhin du'ang sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa gang yin pa dang /
301b4(rgyud): gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sdang po nyid de/ de rnams thams cad myur du rnam par nyams par byed do// sma na gang du gnas pa'i dpag tshad khor yug tu srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du mtshams bcing bar byed
301b5(rgyud): do// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du bdud dam sdang ba de rnams thams cad rab tu 'bros par byed do// sman gang du gnas par gdon rab tu 'bros par byed do// mkha' 'gro ma
301b6(rgyud): gang yin pa dang / rnal 'byor ma gang yin pa dang / skes byed dang / gza' dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon gang yin pa dang / mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha rnam
301b7(rgyud): der gnas par byed cing / 'khrul 'khor la sman a ga da de mchog go zhes so// rgyal bas dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad kyi de kho na nyid stsol bar mdzad do// rtag tu 'jig rten
302a1(rgyud): dbang phyug gis mchog stsol zhing / rtag pa'i mthar mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa myur du 'grub ste/ sman 'chang ba la sman gang du gnas par gang gi/
302a2(rgyud): kyang glags mi rnyed do// don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes bya ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu sman gyi mchog rab tu 'bad pas bcangs pas legs par bsgrub par bya ba dngos grub kyi mchog las thams cad byed/
302a3(rgyud): pa de nyid de'i tshe shi ba yang dag par 'tsho bar byed pa/ lo rdzogs par bsten te/ sngags dang phyag rgyas gso bar bya'o// lo stong phrag tu rtag tu bde ba dang dga' bar byed do// dbang phyug dang / nor thob pa dang /
302a4(rgyud): 'bru 'brel ba dang / bla na med pa dang / rgyal po dga' bar 'gyur te rtag tu gnas so// 'bangs dang / ci bgyi ba dang / mchod pa chen po rnyed do// thams cad du de rtag tu tshig btsun pa'o// thos pas dngos
302a5(rgyud): grub mchog gyur pa'i// rdzas kyang 'dir ni bshad bya ste// tsan dan rgyu spos ru rta dang // spri k+ka shing tsha bA la ka khrag skyes spang spos sA ma kang // sug spel 'bras dgang na la da// pad+ma ut+pal pri yang ru/
302a6(rgyud): shing kun 'dab ma tsha ba gsum// shi rI sha yi me tog dang // de bzhin pa ri pai la ba// 'di rnams cha ni mnyam par ldan// thams cad legs gzhal legs par sbyar// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
302a7(rgyud): pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ yi ge gcig pas stong phrag bcur bzlas so// 'dir sman rnams bgrang 'phreng gi tshad tsam du bsgongs nas grib ma la yongs su bskam par bya'o// gla rtsi dang ga
302b1(rgyud): bur gyi blang la legs par sbyor ba'i bya ba byas pa dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ni ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dam tshig la rab tu 'jug pa la/ shar
302b2(rgyud): gyi sgo ru phyag byas nas dkyil 'khor mchog la bskor ba bya ste/ sgo dang sgo ru phyag bya zhing shar gyi sgo ru 'jug par bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
302b3(rgyud): la mngon du phyogs par pad+ma'i ge sar la 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ mngon par dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
302b4(rgyud): phyag rgya dang gsang sngags legs par sgrub bo// de nas mchod pas 'jig rten mgon po'i dngos grub mthong bar byed cing rtag tu g.yo bar byed la/ 'jig rten mgon po'i 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab
302b5(rgyud): tu grol lo// dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ gru bzhi po ko la'i tshad du cha legs par phye ba/ gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi yod pa/ them skas kyi rim pa can du tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas thig gdab cing dkyil
302b6(rgyud): 'khor gyi snying po mdzes par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+ma mchog kha phye ba 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ snying po dang ze ba shin tu mdzes pa/ snying po las pad+ma byung ba kha phyed bye ba dang / lag sa
302b7(rgyud): gnyis byung bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dzin pa bris pa'i dngul gyi snod kyi nang du sman bkang ste dar gyis kha g.yogs nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du gzhag par bya 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
303a1(rgyud): rtag tu tshangs pa'i cha byad du bzhugs ga dar gyi cod pan bcings shing brgyan pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun tu phyag rgya'i rtags rnams gsal
303a2(rgyud): bar bri'o// sgo sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma'i steng du gzhag pa kha dog dang 'od zer 'bar ba bri'o// grA g+ha ra bum pa gang ba bri'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phan dang / bum pa gang ba dang / 'bras bu dang
303a3(rgyud): me tog bsres pa mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// mchod yon gyi chu dbul bar bya/ tsan dan dang a ka ru'i bdug spos dang / spos sna tshogs dbul bar bya/
303a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog 'phreng ba dgod cing kun tu 'bras yos dang yungs kar dgram par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bya zhing gos gtsa
303a5(rgyud): ma bgos pa 'jigs pa med pas zla ba yar gyi ngo nya la bsgrub par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur cing byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub par bya'o// gang gis
303a6(rgyud): lag gis gzung ba tsam dang / reg pa tsam gyis mod la de dga' ba thob cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ mtshams med pa byed pa rnams las grol bar
303a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ mod la nang thams cad 'byang zhing ngan 'gro thams cad 'jigs par byed pa na bsod nams chen po'i spongs kyi dngos grub rlan gyi de khon cid mthong ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung brgya
303b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sprul pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis bsnga/
303b2(rgyud): pa/ rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ lha thams cad kyis bsrungs pa/ klu'i dbang po thams cad rjes su 'brang ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab
303b3(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / ga shin rje dag chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / nyi ma dang / zla bas mchod pa/ de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / gza' kun dang / mjug rings dang / de bzhin du gza'i khyim dang /
303b4(rgyud): thams cad du bkra shis kyis mchod pa/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / bzlas brjod thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ rigs spyi/
303b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mchog dbang bskur ba/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
303b6(rgyud): kyis lung bstan pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu thams cad dang mthun pa'i sman ni sman gyi rdzas bkra shis pa bye ba phrag gam/ lhag par gyur pa gzhan gang yang med do// sman de lta bu ni rtag tu mchog/ gtso go/
303b7(rgyud): 'byin pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba yin no// de'i phyir thams cad sman 'chang bar 'dod pas gnas gang yang rung bar sbyar bar bya ste/ gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa des sbyar bar bya'o// ji lta ji lta
304a1(rgyud): bkra shis kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa de lha de ltar bsam pa yid la byed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sbyar ba tsam gyis mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'dod pa thams cad
304a2(rgyud): kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ spos chus legs par khrus byas la/ nyin re sman re re don yon pa'i rgyal pos bzlas brjod byas te
304a3(rgyud): bos na/ zos pa tsam gyis mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs shing
304a4(rgyud): ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur/ nyin nag gsum du sbyar na ngag rnam par dag pa thob bo// nyin zhag lhur sbyar na dran pa rnam par dag pa thob bo// nyin zhag bdun du sbyar na rig sngags chen po'i cho ga zhing mo
304a5(rgyud): rnam par dag pa thob bo// nyin zhag bcu bzhir sbyar na don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig chen po thob bo// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig
304a6(rgyud): kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi dngos grub thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub thob bo// zla ba gcig gi bar du sbyar
304a7(rgyud): na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dngos grub kyu ma khu bus brgyad pa thob cing tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// zla ba gsum du sbyar na lus yongs su dag pa dang mdog yongs su dag pa thob bo// lo gcig
304b1(rgyud): tshang bar sbyar na don yod pa'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ mig mtho na mthing mdog bung ba lta bu skra ral bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ tshe lo bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang mthun par
304b2(rgyud): 'gyur la/ tshe bskal pa 'bum thub par 'gyur ro// brdar nas bdag nyid lo byugs na gang dri mnams pa tsam gyis bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgra
304b3(rgyud): dang sleb byed dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong du 'bros so// gal te myur du mi 'bros na ni spyi bo dum du 'dus
304b4(rgyud): du 'gas shing yan lag dang / nying lag rnams zhig par 'gyur la bu dang chung mar bcas pa 'jigs par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba myong bar
304b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba mtshams med pa lnga dag 'jig par 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / mi shis pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ spos mnams pa tsam gyis rgyal po da
304b6(rgyud): rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// byugs pa tsam gyis 'bras dang / bol mig dang /
304b7(rgyud): lhog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / me dpal dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / khyi rngo dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rma dang / khong gi rma yongs su sos par 'gyur/ dug thams cad dang / zos
305a1(rgyud): ba dang / dug myos dang / sbyar dub drag po dang / dug sbyar ma dang / sbyar dug bye ma dang / khyad rnams la bslus pa tsam dang / chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis dug med par 'gyur ro//
305a2(rgyud): tsam gyis klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug kyang med par 'gyur ro// rims nyin bzhi pas thebs pa la dpral bar bskus na ku co 'don cing 'bros so// rims thams cad dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa
305a3(rgyud): dag nyin gsum pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / lba ba dang / pho ba'i nang dang / mchin pa na ba dang / ljon pa dang / sman dang /
305a4(rgyud): gcin bri ba dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na pa dang / mgul ba na pa dang / kha na ba dang / 'khyil zhing na ba dang / tshang ba dang / mdoms na ba dang / yan lag dang nying lag na ba chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis/
305a5(rgyud): yongs su sos par 'gyur ro// gzhogs byed na pa dang / mgon pa dang / mig na ba dang / nA ban ba la bslus pa tsam gyis sos par 'gyur ro// thig le byas na chos rkun dang / gnod sbyin dang / me dang / chu dang / bying
305a6(rgyud): zabs 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// nyes par byas pa thams cad las yongs su thar par
305a7(rgyud): ro// lhag pa gdengs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus shing bar chad bya bar mi nus so// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas
305b1(rgyud): 'khod ngo do// rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang dang gang du sbyar ba rang gi blos bye ba phrag 'bum sbyar na las sgrub par byed de/ sman gyi mchog shin tu
305b2(rgyud): 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o// sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas de'i phyir gser gyi ri lu'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i snying po// de banan/
305b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i rnam par gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin/
305b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig
305b5(rgyud): 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing bsngags pa byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba/ rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa/ lung bstan pa/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
305b6(rgyud): gi btsug gi nor bu cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid kyi thig le yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa/ rig sngags dang /
305b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig sbyi/ sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam la sogs pa 'dir tshad bstan par
306a1(rgyud): lha su zhig gis nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par mngon sum du mthong ba dang
306a2(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag nyid mngon sum du mchod par gzung ba dang / lung ston pa 'thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi
306a3(rgyud): phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nor bu gser gyi kha dog tu bstan pa'i ril bu 'di gang gis mthong zhing 'chang ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyed par 'gyur/ nor bu'i ril bu 'di mthong
306a4(rgyud): btsam gyis sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sngon gyi tshe rabs
306a5(rgyud): nas bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig cing spangs par 'gyur/ rims dang nad thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ gang gi lag na sman 'di yod par gyur pa'i sems can de
306a6(rgyud): ni lung bstan par 'gyur ro// ril bu gang la yod pa ni// phyir mi ldog par lung bstan cing // mgon po sa bcu dag la gnas// rtag tu mchod rten gyur pa ste// sku gdung snying po'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu/
306a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'gyur// dus gsum dag la bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa gang // sangs rgyas dpa' bo de kun gyi// sras gcig tu ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
306b1(rgyud): ba'i sras// thugs las skyes dang zhal las skyes// chos kyi dbyings sprul chos las skyes// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// phyag g.yas rtag tu hU~M/
306b2(rgyud): bor ni// 'jog mdzad 'di ni the tshom med// ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis ni// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu 'grol// sdig pa thams cad lhag par 'tshed// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'dag/ de ni ngan
306b3(rgyud): 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// phyir zhing gnas mchog zhi ba 'thob// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'od dpag med// mgon po rtag tu mngon sum mthong // bde ba can du 'jug par byed// gang na de yi mngon dpa' ba// de
306b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa// rtag tu mi 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing // de bzhin mi g.yo mi 'gul te// sems dpa' ri rab che dang mnyam// gzung du med pas mtsho dang 'dra// de la bgags dang log 'dra/
306b5(rgyud): dag/ nams kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur la// sems dpa' phyag bya'i gnas su 'gyur// gang la nor rgyal 'di yod la// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ dpung dang bcas pa bkol dang bcas// rtag tu srung phyir
306b6(rgyud): gnas byed de// 'dir ni nyin mtshan de bzhin no// lha tshogs thams cad srung bar ni// the tsom med par byed par 'gyur// gzi brjid dpal yang rab tu 'phel// de la legs par 'jug par 'gyur// 'jigs
306b7(rgyud): med rtag tu rmi lam ni// dngos po chen po sna tshogs mthong // gru 'dzin ri la gzhal med khang // tshal dang bcas shing rin chen bcas// gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / drim
307a1(rgyud): lnga min gsang ba ba/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// de bzhin lto 'phye 'khor dang bcas// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ni// kun nas bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// rin chen lha'i/
307a2(rgyud): seng ge'i gdan// khang pa brtsegs pa rin chen dang // nor bu chen pos brgyan pa dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug thub pa'i gtso// pad+ma snying po la bzhugs nas// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor
307a3(rgyud): bcas pa'i chos bstan to// gsung kun thob par gyur nas ni// thub pa rang gi ngo bo mthong // de ltar rmi lam bzang rmi ba// nyin gcig bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur// nor bu rgyal po'i mthu ni de 'dra bas// de bas
307a4(rgyud): mi yis 'bad pa chen pos gzung // dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang rgyal rigs dang // dmangs rigs nyid dam yang na rgyal po 'am// btsun mo slas sam dpung gi gtso bo'am// skyes pa 'am bud med khye'u dang bu mo
307a5(rgyud): dag/ nor bu'i rgyal po rtag tu 'chang byed pa// de ni ston pa nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur// chom rkun gyis ni mi slu zhing // gnod byed kyis ni 'jigs mi 'gyur// 'jigs pa mi bzad brgyad las thar// de la dus/
307a6(rgyud): dang sbyar ba'i dug/ sbyar dug drag pos mi tshugs shing // de la byad kyis tshugs mi 'gyur// gang la nor bu'i rgyal po yod// de la nad kyis mi tshugs shing // na bas ma yin sdig pas min// pad+ma chu yis mi
307a7(rgyud): chags ltar// rtag tu chags pa med par gnas// g.yul 'gyed pa yi nang na 'am// 'thab bam 'gyed dam rtsod pa na// lan thebs rtag tu rgyal bar ni// thob par 'gyur te the tsom med// de nas rdzas ni bshad
307b1(rgyud): bya ste/ slar ni bkra shis dang ldan pa// grub pa'i mtha' ste mchog tu gtsang // 'jig rten mgon dang mnyam par gsungs// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / shi 'am sha'i me tog dang /
307b2(rgyud): a pa marga dang / me ru dang / na la da dang / chu srin gyi sen mo dang / ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang / tsan dan gyi 'bras bu dang / pad+ma'i 'bras bu dang / rdo dreg dang / med dang / btsod dang / sU ka ri dang / ma ka nI dang / dza
307b3(rgyud): dang / bi dza ya dang / pa ri pe la ba dang / ra sa dang / bI rA dang / d+h+ya ma ka dang / rgya spos dang / bu sA dang / a brta ka dang / ru rta dang / bya gra na kha dang / pata tra dang / tra tsa dang / ka dam b+ha rA dang / pri yang ku dang / giT
307b4(rgyud): wang dag sI ka dang / skyeg rkang dang / yungs kar dang / nA ga puSh+pa dang / e la dang / ldong ros dang / gur kub dang / ga pur dang / glaN+DI dang / spang spos dang / na le shas dkar po dang / su ma dang / 13
307b5(rgyud): shing dang / shu ti dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tsam pa ka ste/ de bzhin rdzas ni de dag kun// su bar+Na ni dkar po sbyar/ ril bu nam cig tsam du ni// skyes bu mkhas pas bya ba yin// su bar+Nas ni bkab nas su//
307b6(rgyud): rdzas rnams bsres nas sbyar bar bya// cha rnams 'phel bar bya ba ste// gla rtsi yis ni dri skyed do// phye ma zhib mor btags nas su// tsan dan dkar po'i chus sbyar nas// grib ma la ni bskam par bya// tshes brgyad dag
307b7(rgyud): nas brtsams nas ni// tshes ni bco lnga nya yi bar// nyin gcig bzhin du don yod pa'i// rgyal pos brgya rtsa brkyang du bzlas// khro bo'i rgyal pos nyin gcig bzhin// lan bdun bar du dbang bskur ro// phyag rgyas dbang
308a1(rgyud): bskur bar yang bya// de nas tshes ni bco lnga ste// nya la chu dang yungs kar dag/ dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya// de nas nor bu'i rgyal po ni// gzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya//
308a2(rgyud): cha rnams ma nor legs par dbye// rgya ra ni ko la'i tshad du bya// shin tu 'jam la byi bdar legs// tshon rtsi sna tshogs mdzes pa dang // dkyil 'khor mchog ni thig gdab bo// sgo bzhi dod cing grwa bzhi dod//
308a3(rgyud): kun nas shin tu ma bye zhing // dkyil 'khor snying po che bye ba// tshad dang shin tu ldan par bya// pad+ma chen po bzhi dag dang // de bzhin phyag dang spyan du bcas// don yod dngos grub bri bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal po
308a4(rgyud): ba yis// phyag rgyar bcas pa bri bar bya// chu yi rgya mtsho'i nang du ni// las kyi rdo rje legs par bri// dkyil 'khor snying po dam pa la// kun nas kha khyer rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri// dkyil 'khor gyi
308a5(rgyud): rol kun tu ni// nor bu pad+ma legs par bri// sgo bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su// pad+ma zhags pa mdung rtse gsum// rdo rje'i tshul mchog legs par bri// grwa bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su// lag na nor bu yod pa bri// bar+thi/
308a6(rgyud): steng na rab tu gnas// dkyil 'khor bzang po phan phran dang // bum pa bkang dang me tog dang // bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ ci bdog bungs cher gzhag par bya//
308a7(rgyud): kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang // mchod yon chu dang a ka ru// tsan dan bdug spos dbul bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal po 'jigs med pa// snod bzang legs par bkang nas su// rgya dar la yis kha g.yog
308b1(rgyud): te/ dkyil 'khor de nyid rig pas gzhag/ dkyil 'khor snying por 'jig rten dbang // gzhag ste de nas las rdo rje// snod kyi steng du gzhag pa ni// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// de nas rig sngags
308b2(rgyud): 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig pu 'bum tshang bar bzlas brjod bya ste/ 'bum
308b3(rgyud): bkras brjod byas na nor bu'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lag/ g.yas dang ldan pas bzung nas ni// chang ba dam du bsdam par bya// bsdams pa tsam gyis mod dag la// rdzu 'phrul/
308b4(rgyud): gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/ nor bu dri ma med pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa zhes bya ba// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob la/ 'khor rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba
308b5(rgyud): phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur/ khung gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya/
308b6(rgyud): dag kha ton du lobs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang 'dud pa dag gis gsong por smra bar byed/ thams cad du'ang don
308b7(rgyud): yod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba thob par 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su ring bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad+ma'i 'khor lo mdun nas 'gro bar 'gyur
309a1(rgyud): ro// gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na sngar bstan pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams thob par 'gyur la/ mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i nor du rgyal po'i ril du/
309a2(rgyud): ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las rnams sgrub pa yin no// tshe brdzes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur la/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs
309a3(rgyud): dran par 'gyur/ nor bu'i ril bu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing lta bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du mthong zhing rtag tu
309a4(rgyud): lta bar 'gyur/ ril bu rang gi lus la yod pa de'ang phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po mchod rten dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di la som nyi dang yid gnyis
309a5(rgyud): bskyed par mi bya'o// mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyi mod la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa grangs dang bgrang ba'i tshul gyi bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba/ mtshams med pa
309a6(rgyud): lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
309a7(rgyud): gi mthu dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po'i mthus thams cad par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ bde 'gro'i lam la
309b1(rgyud): gnol bar 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na legs par sgrub pa'i mthar thug par bya zhing bsgrub par bya/ mthu stobs kyis sbyar bar bya/ shin tu
309b2(rgyud): gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'i bsam pas 'bad pas sbyar bar bya/ rang gi sha dang khrag kyang yongs su btang nas btsal bar bya zhing / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yongs su btsal bar bya ba yin/ phyi rol gyi dngos
309b3(rgyud): bo nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams yongs su btang nas yongs su btsal bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ srog gtang bar bya'i/ de gtang bar mi bya'o//
309b4(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba sgrub pa 'di btsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o// 'di dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
309b5(rgyud): pa byed par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas sangs rgyas nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / nams kyang ngan 'gro log par 'gro/
309b6(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu'i ril bu sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas de'i phyir don yod pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos
309b7(rgyud): grub kyi sman nor bu dang gsang sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/ sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i mthu des phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi
310a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang dag par ston par mdzad/ bkraH/
310a2(rgyud): pas grub pa/ rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba thams cad du nye bar ston par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi ngal ba 'bras bu med pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// ngal ba dang / dub pa dang / 'bad
310a3(rgyud): pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems kyi rgyud dad pa dang / gus pa dang / gsang chen dang / gsang bar bya ba gzhan la bstan par mi bya ste/ dngos grub med par/
310a4(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas na gsang sngags sgrub pa ni shin tu gsang bar bya zhing legs par smyung ba byas la 'bad par bya/ kha zas ngan pa spang bar bya/ gos ngan pa dang sems can ngan pa'ang yongs su spang bar
310a5(rgyud): bya/ mi bsrun pa dang / mi bden pa dang / phra ma dang / sems can srun par byed pa dang / gsang sngags rku ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rku bar byed pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rku bar byed pa de dag gis rtogs pa/
310a6(rgyud): ni gang na'ang med de/ dus gsum gyi mgon pos smad cing byang chub sems dpas kyang smad la/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smad pa yin no// sems can sdong dum bsregs
310a7(rgyud): pa 'di// gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs pa// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// rtag tu smad par bya ba yin// lha rnams kyis ni yongs su btang // ma rungs pas ni bdud kyis zos// ma rungs pas ni bgegs kyis
310b1(rgyud): zos/ bslab gzhi tshul khrim nyams pa dang // mgon po'i bstan pa sun 'byin pa// de la dngos grub ji ltar 'byung // de la skyob pa gang yang med// mgon med kun tu spang ba yin// de bas de la dngos grub ni// chung
310b2(rgyud): du'ang med la nyes pa yis// gsang sngags dang ni sman mi 'grub// nyes pa de dag rang gis byas// gzhan yang ma rungs byed pa yin// de bas sems can mkhas la sbyin// slob pa 'dod cing yon tan dga'//
310b3(rgyud): snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/ de yi lag tu sbyin bya ste// de yi dngos grub bla na med// gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gsang ba yin te// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/
310b4(rgyud): snying po gsang ba de'ang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub sla ste/ bklags pas 'grub pa de bzhin du sman nor bu 'di la rtag tu 'jug cing
310b5(rgyud): dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rab tu ston par byed pa yin no// rig sngags 'chang ni bdag nyid kyis// mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub bya ba// rig sngags 'chang ni gtsang ma yis// khrus byas gos gtsang gyon byed
310b6(rgyud): la/ 'dir ni nyin zhag smyung ba dang / dad dang gus pas mchod pa dang // don yod 'khor lo sgrub byed pas// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa sgrub// sman smi ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang // a ka ru dang /
310b7(rgyud): pad+ma ge sar dang / badz+ra dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / de bzhin du gi'u wang dang / ldong ros dang / tsam pa ka dang / su ma na ste/ de bzhin cha ni mnyam sbyar te/ bye ma dag tu byas nas ni// de nas don
311a1(rgyud): yod rgyal po yis// tshes brgyad nas ni bco lnga'i bar// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad rtsa brgyad// bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur ro// de'i 'og tu cha
311a2(rgyud): lngar bya ste/ mig bsku ba dang / ril bu dang / phye ma dang / til mar chos pa dang / kha gdong bkru zhing khrus bya'o// mig sman ni so'u byi raM dang lhan cig sgras la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya stong bzlas brjod
311a3(rgyud): bya'o// ril bu ni sbrang rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig spu'o// phye ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i me tog dang lhan cig spu'o// til mar bcos pa ni brah+ma ti la ste/ shing pa la sha'i mar dang lhan cig
311a4(rgyud): spu'o// kha gdong bkru ba ni tsan dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig spu zhing / su ma na dang / gur kum dang / spos chus lhan cig sbrus la so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal pos nyi shu rtsa
311a5(rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang nyir zhag gcig smyung ba byas pas gcig tu sbrus te/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la/ so sor brgya rtsa brgyad
311a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la/ de nas so sor dar gyis kha gcad de dkyil 'khor gyi snying por
311a7(rgyud): gzhag la/ don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya/ dbang bskur bar byas nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gis dbang
311b1(rgyud): bskur bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor snying por ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste// gdug spos lnga dag dbul bya ba/ a ka ru dang tsan dan dang / spri ka gu gul du ru ka/ mchod yon snod ni lnga dbul
311b2(rgyud): zhing // gtor ma lnga ni dgang bya ste// ro ldan sna tshogs dgang gis dgang // ro ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i// gtor ma cha lnga dbul bar bya// kun 'phreng ba nyi shu dang // mar me nyi shu lnga dag dang // spos kyi
311b3(rgyud): phye ma lnga dag dang // spos kyi cha lngar phye bas byug/ 'phan phran nyi shu rtsa lnga dadags// tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes par bya// gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs pa yi// bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga// rin po che ni lnga/
311b4(rgyud): gzhug go// sgo bzhi grwa bzhir bum pa brgyad // brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras yos dang // yungs kar nyid kyis mngon par dgram// slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni// gos dang sdod
311b5(rgyud): dang yon gyis so// thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ltar// ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas su// dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas// de nas dkyil 'khor gshegs par gsol// de nas las
311b6(rgyud): rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yid la snga tshogs bya// don yod chen po'i gzhal med khang // rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gsang // de nyid dngos grub sgrub sla ba// de bzhin nor bu sman sngags so// don 'di shin tu bkra
311b7(rgyud): shis so// mkhas pa mi yis bya ba yin// phra ma'i tshig kyang mi bsten te// brdzun ni nam kyang smra mi bya// 'di ni sgrub pa'i de nyid de// de la 'grub pa the tsom med// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// kun nas gru bzhi
312a1(rgyud): lham pa ste// gru bzhi pa ni legs par byed// ko la'i tshad de legs pa dang // sna tshogs tshon gyi thig skud kyis// dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab bo// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying /
312a2(rgyud): bor ni// 'khor lo bzang po bri bar bya// dbus kyi lte bar pad+mo yi// 'khor lo gsal ba bri bar bya// pad+ma'i snying po'i gser dang ni// dngul lam tsan dan las byas pa// 'bar bar 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs/
312a3(rgyud): 'khor lo kun tu rtsibs dang ni// mu khyud dag gis cha dbye'o// dkyil 'khor snying po'i grwa rnams der// lha'i dbang po tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po bri// kun tu kha khyer rnam pa dang // pad+ma 'phreng ba
312a4(rgyud): rnams bya'o// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni// rtags dang phyag rgya rnams bri ste// rdo rje dgra swA mdung rtse gsum// ral gri zhags pa tho ba dang // gshin rje be con pad+ma gdugs// dbyug to mda' bo che rnam
312a5(rgyud): so// grwa rnams kun tu 'phreng ba dang // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dgram// sgo sgo der ni dkyil 'khor gyi// lha ste gshin rje chu lha dang // lus ngan dang ni gzhon nu bri// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi rnams su ni// rgyal po
312a6(rgyud): chen po bzhi po dag/ go cha legs par bgos pa dang // khro bar lta ba 'jigs byed bri// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dgos pa rnams// legs pa yongs su rdzogs par ni// rig
312a7(rgyud): sngags je bzhin bstan pa yin// de nas legs par khrus byas la// gos gtsang bgos pa 'jigs med pas// sman mchog gzung ste las bya'o// rmongs pa'i dra ba sna tshogs dang // sgyu ma lta bu'i rna ba sprul pa/
312b1(rgyud): gang gis ngan 'gro thar 'gyur ba// sems can kun la bskrun par bya// rtag tu dga' dang dad pa dang // gus pa de nyid thob par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gis sgrub pa'i mchog/ dngos grub de nyid thob par
312b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gis sngar khrus byas la rdzas kyi nga chab gtsang ma ngor yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ tsan dan gyi tshul lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas slalan
312b3(rgyud): tshad tsam byug la tshad zin par bskus nas kha gdong bkru bar bya'o// mig spar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas bslus na mig bzang bar 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyang tshang bar bzlas brjod byas nas bdag
312b4(rgyud): nyid dang phyogs bcur gtor ro// de bzhin du til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas sgra yan chad bslu ba dang / tshod zin par bsku ba dang / lus rkang mthil yan chad bsku'o// yi ge gcig pu yid
312b5(rgyud): la bya ba la sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i sgo 'am/ skye bo'i nang ngam// 'dus pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngas/ tshogs dang phrad pa 'am/ de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang ru
312b6(rgyud): kye de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs dang kha dog tu mthong zhing sa'i steng nas rkang pa khru gang tsam gyis sngags te 'dug la/ ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dang pa de lha da sku
312b7(rgyud): gzugs rnams ston par byed de rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba 'am/ mi'i seng ge 'am/ phag gam/ sred med kyi bur ston pa 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po'ag/ dbang phyug
313a1(rgyud): po mig gsum pa 'am/ gzhon nu 'am/ chu lha 'am/ gshin rje'am/ ram thos kyi bu 'am/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi 'am/ nag po chen po 'am/ dga' byed dbang phyu/
313a2(rgyud): gam/ ser skya 'am/ gsang ba pa 'am/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che 'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu 'am/ gang ba bzang po 'am/ stobs kyi lha 'am/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung lha 'am/ drang srong nyid de/
313a3(rgyud): ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed do// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na de sangs rgyas kyi
313a4(rgyud): gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs su snang zhing gzhal med khang gi rnam pa dag kyang ston par byed do// ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid la byas pa de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed do// 'khor tshogs pa
313a5(rgyud): 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ 'chag sa dag kyang sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshogs su ston par byed do// 'gron po 'brog gi nang du phyin pa nyam thag pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/ chu med
313a6(rgyud): pa/ mu ge'i dgon par mgon med pa/ sdug bsngal drag po de lta bu'i nang du chud pa'i skye bo sdug par gyur pa/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med par gyur pa/ skyob pa med pa dpung gnyen med par gyur pa na de la rig
313a7(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis phye ma 'dis phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad par bya/ phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ri mo bris la ril bu lnga dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag go// yungs kar la til mar gyi rgyal pos
313b1(rgyud): bzlas la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos brgyad bzlas brjod byas te dbang bskur nas/ khro bo'i rgyal pos hUM zhes bya bas phyag rgya bcings la/ sa la bsnun cing phyogs
313b2(rgyud): bzhir gtor bar bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i
313b3(rgyud): gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur/ phye ma'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyer dang khang bzang 'byung bar 'gyur/ khyim gyi gnas lnga stong 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang /
313b4(rgyud): skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyo tshang dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / rta dang / glang po'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / tshong pa dang / khyim dang / khang
313b5(rgyud): pa bzang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du bsams pa de srid du 'dug go// chu dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yungs kar de g.yul
313b6(rgyud): 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgras 'jigs shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro//
313b7(rgyud): grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mod la 'obs bcad cing ra ba kha khyer gyis bskor la/ grong khyer kun tu skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas grong khyer mnan pa 'am gtse bar sus kyang
314a1(rgyud): mi nus so// mtshan mo'i dri'i ti la mar de nyid yungs kar la bskus te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas chang pa gang me'i nang du gtor/ chang pa gang grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi
314a2(rgyud): kun tu gtor na kun nas mar ma'i 'phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'bar ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ 'chag sa'i gnas sam/ khyim du gtor na
314a3(rgyud): mar me'i 'phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chu dang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/ grong khyer gyi sgor yungs kar gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mod la dgra thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer
314a4(rgyud): mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gang na phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gnas pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ tshal gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gtor na 'brog dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/
314a5(rgyud): thams cad phan tshun ngo mi shes nas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos rab tu 'bros par byed do// dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na mtshon cha thams cad dang / 'gyed pa'i go cha thams cad mi snang zhing gcer
314a6(rgyud): bur 'gyur ro// zhal che 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na 'gyed zla gtso bo de gcer bur 'gyur ro// dgra'i steng du gtor na me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las 'bum
314a7(rgyud): snyesnyid byed do// de nas las rgya chen po byed par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa spos kyis lus bskus pa des/ yungs kar dang til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus pa la brgya
314b1(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gtor bar bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur nas phyag rgya bcas pa'i lag pas ril bu skya bor ba 'ag
314b2(rgyud): phye mas gdab par bya/ til mar gyi rgyal pos rkang pa la byug par bya// don yod pa'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya ste/ yongs su sbyang ba'i las lhan cig bya ba legs par byas pas 'phags pa spyan
314b3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs g.yo ste gar dga' bar 'gro la/ gzugs brnyan gang du 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro/ lha'i steng du gtor na lha lha'i gnas nas 'pho zhing gar dga' ba der 'gro'o//
314b4(rgyud): phye mas lha'i steng du gtor na khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya ba mi sdang bar 'gyur to// til mar gyi rgyal po la lan brgya brgya bzlas brjod byas la bdag nyid kyi pus mo dang byin pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro
314b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rkang mthil la bskus na sa'i steng na rkang pa sor bzhi tsam mi reg go// rdo'i steng du rkang pa gzhag pa dang / rkang rjes byung ba'i steng du rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa gzhag pa'i rku ba la bskus
314b6(rgyud): na sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'dug go// yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas mes sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ til mar gyis sbrus pa la
314b7(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur nas mig la bslus na mig gsum gyon cing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do// thal bas lus la byugs na tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to//
315a1(rgyud): shing ba la sha dang barma Sha bsres pas lus byugs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / shugs dang / gzugs su ston to// til mar chen pos khar bskus la thal bas dpral bar/
315a2(rgyud): thig le byas na gzhon nu'i gzugs su ston to// yungs kar gyi 'bru kha dog sna tshogs can la til mar chen po byugs pas bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ phyag rgyas
315a3(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur la/ de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gzhag/ de nas las thams cad byed de nam mkha' la gtor na nor bu dang rin po che'i char 'bas/
315a4(rgyud): par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i tshe nam mkha' la gtor na me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i nang du nam mkha' la gtor na 'bras bu dang nor gyi rgyun sna
315a5(rgyud): tshogs pa ston to// tshal gyi nang du gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa ston to// raM phug tu gtor na rdzas dang sman sna tshogs ston to// mchod rten rnying pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i
315a6(rgyud): gnas su gtor na yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang zhing rdzogs pa khang pa bzang po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog ston to// grong khyer stong par gtor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun
315a7(rgyud): sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yul rgyal po dang / slas dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdun na 'don pa dang / blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag ston to//
315b1(rgyud): yang khro ba'i rgyal po'i hUM zhes bya bas gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ston to// dur khrod kyi nang du gtor na shrI ba'i rus pa gang dang gapal bab pa de dang de gang du sems can dmyal ba/
315b2(rgyud): 'ab dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ ga shin rje'i 'jig rten na/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri ba 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lho 'phye chen po 'am/ bya 'am/ la'am/ rus sbal gyi rigs su skyes
315b3(rgyud): ba'ag/ lha'i 'jig rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de'i rus pa 'am thod pa las tshig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gang du skyes pa de'i gtam yang pa'o// gang dang gang gi skye gnas su skyes pa de tham
315b4(rgyud): cad spru la/ thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o// yungs kar des kyang rus gong 'brel bar ram/ shi ba'i ro 'am/ rus pa 'thor ba la bab na bab pa tsam gyis mod la sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar
315b5(rgyud): nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// zong bkram pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad mi mngon par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gtor na skar ma rnams mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du
315b6(rgyud): gtor na thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad bro rdung bar byed do// dge 'dun gyi nang du gtor na dge slong thams cad bsam gtan 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyi gtso bo la
315b7(rgyud): gtor na rnal 'byor spyod par 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na thams cad bong bu dang / wa dang / khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// sbyor ma'i sgor gtor na sbyor ma thams cad 'bar la pa
316a1(rgyud): he'i gzugs can du snang ngo // shi ba'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar byed do// thod pa'i steng du gtor na bro rdung bar byed cing rgyug la phan tshun rgyug par byed do// lam gyi ba ni mdor gtor/
316a2(rgyud): na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la/ ji srid 'tsho'i dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// nyin gcig bzhin bdag nyid la gtor na mchod pa chen po'i//
316a3(rgyud): gnas su 'gyur te/ gzhan yang rang gi blo rnams kyis las 'bum snyed byed do// don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta bu'i cho ga'o// / 'phagra
316a4(rgyud): pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bco brgyad pa// de nas de'i phyir 'gugs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bstan pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gang
316a5(rgyud): gis lha rnams myur du 'ong ba dang / phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs myur du smon to// rdo rje'i sku dang stobs po che// rta mgrin dang ni mgul sngon dang / de bzhin rta ni rgod ma'i ga/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ldan gzugs po che// log 'dre/
316a6(rgyud): rnams ni rab 'joms dang // khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed spya ma/ ke le'i ke li'i rgyal po che// khro bo tshol ba stobs po che// de bzhin rdo rje sa 'og gzugs// rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang // klu chen rab 'joms spyan yangs
316a7(rgyud): dang / sog ma med ni 'dul ba dang // de bzhin thigs khro khros chen dang // de bzhin mche ba gtsigs mdzad dag/ rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i srog / klu yi dbang po stobs kyis gnod// mgrin po gos sngon gyon pa dang /
316b1(rgyud): dbyug blod dag las rgyal ba dang / 'jig ces dang byug pa'i skye phyag na badrab drug de ba'in 'jigs pa btud sel dang / de bzhin mchod tan 'jig rten tha/ lnga thogs gdugs te babang po dag//
316b2(rgyud): srid med bu dang tshangs pa dang // drag po daN+Di dbang phyug dang // nag po chen po gzhon nu dang // ga shin rje dang ni chu lha nyid// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // rgyu skar sgra gcan mjug rings dang // de bzhin gza' dang lham/
316b3(rgyud): yin/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'ab ci// gnod sbyir srin po lho 'phye che// 'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bukade bzhin yul skyong mig mi bzang // 'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang // khe'u thung dang ni drang
316b4(rgyud): srong gzugs// nor bu bzang sras gang ba bzang // sna tshogs gzugs can ston pa dang // rgyal po dang ni ded dpon dang // tshong dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang // bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang // dge sbyong stag dang
316b5(rgyud): seng ge dang // khyu mchog de bzhin nags kyi lha// shing lha de bzhin lo tog lha// gap+sA sI ta ya mu na// zla ba skal ldan rus sbal nya// lag 'gro dang ni thod pa can// skal yod de bzhin 'bras bu dang // me/
316b6(rgyud): tog rgya rlabs chen po dang // sna tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs// de ltar dgug pa bstan pa dang // de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid// sbyin sreg dra ba 'di nyid kyis// sgyu 'phrul rmad byung gas
316b7(rgyud): sngags grub/ rdzas grub nor bu til bar grug// don yod zhags pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// de nyid dngos grub rab ston pa/ mchod rten dgon pa gtsug lag khang // lha yi gnas dang de bzhini grong // khro khyer nyid
317a1(rgyud): dang 'bab chu'i do // mtshe'u dang lteng ka chu bo dang // rdzing dang de bzhin char 'bab dang // 'brug sgrogs dang ni glog 'gyu dang // gzhan yang me ni 'bar ba dang // dud pa'i phung po bde/
317a2(rgyud): 'gyed dang // skyes bu go cha gyon pa dang // de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong // khyu mthong grub pa mthong ba dang // de nyid rmad du byung ba ste// rdzas nyung sbyar ba nyung gyur kyang // de nyid dngos grung bla na med//
317a3(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas// bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad// rig sngags 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub// dbul po rnams ni nor 'thob cing // sdang ba rnams ni byams par
317a4(rgyud): bgyid// mu stegs gzhan rnams dang par bgyid// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid// gdul dka' rnams ni thar par 'tshal// dge sbyong rnams ni bsam gtan thob// ting 'dzin bla na med pa thob//
317a5(rgyud): chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong // sdig pa byed rnams sdig pa 'jig/ mi rigs byas rnams thar pa thob// mtshams med lnga rnams rnam dag don// dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byir
317a6(rgyud): mchog/ ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dul// ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba'i glu/ thar pa'i lam du 'gro bar gnas// ma grol ngan 'gro kun las 'grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// lung ma bstan pa lu
317a7(rgyud): ston byed// skyon dang dri ma sdig pa rnams// thams cad mod la spong bgyid du// de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// bklags pas grub pa bgyid pa lags// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ don gyi dngos grub
317b1(rgyud): bla na med// gang dang gang du sbyor ba bgyid// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ yid la bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dir ni yid kyis rab bsam pa// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang // ji ltar ngo
317b2(rgyud): kun bsams pa// de ltar rnam 'phrul ston par bgyi// chos grangs rgyu skar sbyar mi 'tshal// smyung ba bgyi ba mi 'tshal te// cho ga ji bzhin dus ji bzhin// cho ga rig sngags rgyal po bzlas// rig sngags
317b3(rgyud): 'chang ba gtsang gyur cing // legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang dag/ bgos pa bden par spro ba dang // bla ma la ni gus byed pa// rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas// sems can la ni brtse ba'i mchog/
317b4(rgyud): sdom la gnas shing tshangs par spyod// chos ma yin pa spong byed pa// gal te de nyid grub 'dod na// chang dang sha dang kun dong dang // 'dres dang za 'phro sbags pa spangs// sems can ngan pa sun 'byin pa/
317b5(rgyud): rig sngags rku dang cho ga tu// chos chu gsang sngags rku ba dang // de bzhin rkun mo chom rkun dang // ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis// de dag la ni dngos grub med// ma rungs pa ni dam tshig nyams// ying bcu gra
317b6(rgyud): pa ni med par byed// sdig pa'i chos ni kun tu spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis smad// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spar// rtag tu chos kyi sdong dum 'gyur/ shi nas sems can dmyal bar
317b7(rgyud): gzhol// rtag tu smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dbul po lus ni bskams pa dang // mdzo dang khyi chos 'debs pa dang // sdug bsngal rkun ma chos sun 'byin// chos rku ba yi lus can ni// 'jig rten 'dir ni
318a1(rgyud): #bder mi 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol ga la bde// sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin// de lu bas na chen po 'dod pas ni rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing /
318a2(rgyud): rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang / pha dang / ma dang / bla ma dang / ston pa ni skyob pa dag skyabs dang / dpung mnyen mdzad pa/ ston pa/ mchog sbyin pa/ dngos grub dang mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ rga shi las thar par
318a3(rgyud): byed pa/ dbang phyug sbyir ba/ nor sbyin pa/ longs spyod sbyin pa/ dang ba mchog bskyed pa de nyid 'jig rten gyi bla ma/ mgon po'i 'jig rten dbang phyug/ dbang phyug chen po// dbang phyug mgon po// mchog
318a4(rgyud): sbyin par mdzad pa// gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa// dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa// mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongasu thar par bgyid pa/ nad sna tshogs sbyong bar grub pa// ri po
318a5(rgyud): tshe sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ 'jig rten gyi sdig pa sna tshogs sel por bgyid pa/ bla ma la gus pa sna tshogs bgyis pa lags te/ de lta bas na rtag tu 'bad pas dgos pa thams cad
318a6(rgyud): rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ rtag tu 'bad pas shin tu gus par bgyid pa lags so// / de nas rdzas kyi sman sgrub pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ seng ge'i lce dang /
318a7(rgyud): snying da / mig dag de bzhin du nya phyis kyi phye ma dang / ldong ros dang / bra h+ma'i 'o ma dang / gu gul dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / na ga bus pa dang / li shi dang / rgya spos dang / de bzhin du
318b1(rgyud): gi'u lang dang / bla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur kum dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / smai ga ka dag twe dza ba ti g+he/ de ltar ma mnyam par byas pa de dag thams cad bye ma'i ba mo byas la dngus gyi sdong bkang rje/
318b2(rgyud): dar gyis g.yogs/ ngor long ba'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsum du khri bzlas brjod bya'o// dus gsum du khro bo'i rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas dpas
318b3(rgyud): bskur zhing / phyag rgyas kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur ro// khri tshang nas cha lnga byas te phye ma dang / til mar dang / nor bu dang / mig bslu ba dang / til mar chos pa dang cha lnga'o// phye ma'i pad+ma mu ru ka'i phye ma/
318b4(rgyud): dang sbyar la bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos ni lnga stong ngo // til mar ni ma hA ru ti ras 'grub ste brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo // nor bu ni sbrul gyi khrag gis spras te khri
318b5(rgyud): tshi ga stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos lnga stong lnga brgya'o// mig sman ni rma bya'i mig chu dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang / klad pa dang sbyar la khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po stong du
318b6(rgyud): brgyad do/ khra h+ma te la srang nyi shu/ gan d+ha ra ba te'i la srang brgyad/ yungs mar la srang bcu drug/ 'o ma la srang brgya pa ser mo grub pa'i 'o ma dang / ba'i lci ba dang / ba gcin srang bdun/ du ru ka'i mar du
318b7(rgyud): grang gnyis te/ rdzas 'di rnams chu dang bsres nas pad+ma'i sdong bus dkrug cing bangs sbed du btso'o// mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas// chog dag gis bsrung bar bya/ cho ga bzhin du to/
319a1(rgyud): ma sgru ba me tog bdug spros dag gis bdug/ ti la mar mchog ni bsgrub par bya// chung ngur me 'bud grub par mchog/ spos kyi shing gis bud pa bzang // 'di ltar grub pa/
319a2(rgyud): shes pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba/ nyi shu gcig tu dbang bskur ro// til mar de ni sdod gtsang ma// zangs snod yang na dngul snod bzang // smyig ma'i snod du gzhag par bya// de nas
319a3(rgyud): rig sngags brgyad stong dang // khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid// so so dag tu bzlas brjod bya// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa der gzhag par bya ba ni/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bya ba de ltar
319a4(rgyud): byas nas gzhag cing / slob dpon gyi las kyang bya ste/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba dang /
319a5(rgyud): phyag bya ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / srung ba'i cho ga dang / nye reg bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / mchod phyir thogs pa ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon kun gyis de dag
319a6(rgyud): thams cad bstan por bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por gzhag la rig sngags 'chang sbyang ba'i cho ga byas pas 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po skyong rtsa brgyad bzlas
319a7(rgyud): brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur/ phyag rgyas kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur la/ phyag rgya bcings nas rnam pa gsum 'dra bar dbang bskur ro// de nas las thams cad
319b1(rgyud): byas te yungs kar dkar po grub pa la rig sngags 'chang gis brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas la pad+ma'i mchog gtso bo gtsang ga gtsang mar byas pa/ legs par bkrus pa/ sbyangs pa/ phye ma nig
319b2(rgyud): tu btags pa/ thal ba lta bu la brgyad spong bzlas brjod byas nas snod dgang / gu gul dang / tsan ngan dang / a ka ru dang / smig ka la srong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod kyi nang du bkang
319b3(rgyud): dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i steng du so sor gzhag go// de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas na/ gang gi don du bya ba byung ba'i tshe bya ba thams cad byed do//
319b4(rgyud): gser ram/ yang na dngul lam/ zangs las pad+ma'i tshad du byas pa 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / ze ba can dang / de bzhin du sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad la sdong bu sor bcu drug pa'i tshad
319b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i rnam pa can du bya/ skud pa dmar po'i zhags pa pad+ma'i tshon dmar pos bzhen pa/ gzhon nus bkal ba grub pa dang / de dag la brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing
319b6(rgyud): phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas la/ mkhas pas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag go// gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe las thams cad grub pa ston to// shin tu gtsang zhing gtsang bar bya ste/ sul
319b7(rgyud): mi sbyin no// sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par gyur pa/ dam tshig nyams pa yang ba la bgegs 'jug par 'gyur zhing / 'phral du mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ rmongs pa'i dra ba de la dngos grub rnams
320a1(rgyud): kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan ni bla ma la gus shing // sangs rgyas chos la sten byed pa// 'phags pa'i tshogs la dad pa dang khyams sems snying rje'i bdag nyid can// de yi laH/
320a2(rgyud): tu rab tu sbyin// bdag gi srog bzhin btang bar bya// de dag dngos grub mchog sbyin te// bklags dang mthong ba tsam gyis na// ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin// rjes su mthun pa'i las byed do// 'jig rten 'dir ni/
320a3(rgyud): rtag tu bong // 'jig rten pha rol bde ba yin// 'gro ba lam ni bde bar 'gro/ gang ni lod dpag med bzhugs pa/ bde ba can du rtag tu 'gro/ rdzus te skyes pa'i pad+ma las// rgyan rtags kun gyis rnam par brgyan
320a4(rgyud): tshe rabs dag ni dran 'gyur te// sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang rmongs pa chen po'i dam tshig ston par 'dod pa gtsang mas legs par khrus byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos
320a5(rgyud): nas nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba byas pas lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du gzhag ste/ me tog dang bdug spos dbul zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang
320a6(rgyud): phyug gi sku gzugs lo// phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la mchod pa'ang bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ka ru'i bdug spos kyis bdug/ lag na rdo rje la gu gul gyi bdug spos
320a7(rgyud): kyis bdug/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha bshos dkar po dbul/ lag na rdo rje la ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha bshos phul la/ nyin par don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya// mtshan
320b1(rgyud): solba ba'i rgyal po ngal ba med par bzlas brjod bya ste/ kha gdong khro gnyer bad pa dang / dri ma dang ser snga med pas nas 'angs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang
320b2(rgyud): byug 'bar bar 'gyur la/ lag na rdo rje'ang pus mo 'dzugs par 'gyur te/ de gnyis mig nas 'dzag pa rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mig la bslus
320b3(rgyud): ne nam mkha' la 'gro'o// khar bcug na rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol
320b4(rgyud): gnon par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'dug cing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis spyo bar byed/ lag na rdo rje'i stobs
320b5(rgyud): dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon pa rjes su sbyin par byed/ de ltar lag na rdo rjes 'gugs par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su til mar chen po ran par bdag nyid la bsku/
320b6(rgyud): mig sman gyis mig byug/ phye mas gtor zhing bdag nyid la thig le bya/ nor bu mgo la bzhag nas gu gul gyis bdug bdag nyid gos ngur smrig bgos nas sangs rgyas yid la bya ba sgom zhing / zhi
320b7(rgyud): dang / dul ba'i yid kyis sde can gyi nang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o// de nas dge slong de dag gis sde can gyi nang du zhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa'i rig sngags 'chang de bcom ldan/
321a1(rgyud): 'das kyi sku dang / mdog dag rtags dang / spyod lam du mthong ste/ mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod ga'od 'jos gang ba/ stan pad+ma/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i mdun gyi bdar bzhi/
321a2(rgyud): lha'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis gzugs mthong bar ston to// dge slong de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang mdog tu mthong nas thams cad zhabs gnyis la 'dud par byed do// rig sngags 'chang
321a3(rgyud): des brnyas par mi bya zhing / bdag la bstod par yang mi bya/ brnyas pa tsam gyis khyod kyi bsod nams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya'o// 'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rdzu 'phrul chen pos stobs
321a4(rgyud): bcu dang ldan par dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ rgyu des na brnyas par mi bya'o// de nas grong khyer dang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya/ de nas 'dus pa'i nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas grong dang / tshang tshing dang / yul
321a5(rgyud): dang / ri brags kyi nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas btsun mo'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ yul gyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtang
321a6(rgyud): dag dbyibs su mthong zhing mchod pa chen po dang rim gro sna tshogs byed par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yin no zhes swa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i cho ga 'thob bo// yungs kar nga
321a7(rgyud): til mar gyis rang gi 'khor gyi spyi bor gtor cing byugs na/ thams cad lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po'i gzugs su
321b1(rgyud): ston to// rkang pa til mar gyis bskus na sa'i steng nas sor brgyad tsam gyis spags te nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ ji srid dum bkrus pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du ston to// mgon po spyan ras gzigs/
321b2(rgyud): mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'i chang des nang par sngar langs nas gtsang ma khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la yungs kar la til mar gyis byugs nas phyogs bzhir gtor
321b3(rgyud): nang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / btsun mo dag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang des nor
321b4(rgyud): bu bzhis dbu rgyan dang 'phreng ba byas la mgo la gdags so// til mar gyis yan lag tsa ma la bsku bar bya/ dpral bar thig le bya/ mig spar gyis mig bsku/ phye mas bdag nyid la gdab/ ras bzang
321b5(rgyud): po yug gcig bgo bar bya/ byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad du bya/ nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skud kyis bcings na de dag thams cad rgyan dang / sdud pa dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang /
321b6(rgyud): rdo rje dang / bai DUR+Ya sna tshogs la sogs pas lus brgyad par snang ngo // lag na pad+ma thogs na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang ngo // yid la ji ltar bsams pa doran yong
321b7(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa brgyad dang / tshangs pa'i tshul dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / rgod ma'i kha dang / mgul sdor dang / rta mgrin du ston to// ji ltar gzugs yid la byas pa de ltar
322a1(rgyud): smon te/ ji srid du thig le yod cing dbu rgyun thogs pa de srid du tshul sna tshogs ston par byed do// ti la mar dang yungs kar bsres nas ki kuSh+Na dang lhan cig sbrus nas lus /
322a2(rgyud): bsku/ lag pa g.yas na rdo rje/ dpral bar dbang phyug chen po'i thig le byas nas pad+ma'i bye bas gtor la/ nor bu spyi gtsug tu bcing ngo // khrig sman gyis mig bsku/ bu gul gyis bdugs la shes rab
322a3(rgyud): can khro bo'i lta ba'i tshul byas na mngon sum du rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su snang ste/ de la the tsom mi bya'o// ji srid du bdag khrus ma byas pa de srid du rdo rje'i gzugs can du snang la/ las sna tshogs byed cig
322a4(rgyud): mi dang 'jig rten thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/ de la the tsom mi bya'o// seng ge'i khrag gis til mar dang nor bu sbrus nas lus la bskus na mi'i seng ge chen po'i gzugs su ston to//
322a5(rgyud): phag gi khrag gis skus nas lus la bskus na phag gi gzugs chen por ston to// til mar dang phye ma lhan cig tu smras nas yung ba dang shing ba la sha'i mdog tu byas la/ lus la bslus na sred med
322a6(rgyud): kyi bu'i gzugs su ston to// reg sngags 'chang gis pad+ma dang ti la mar lhan cig sbrus la lus la bskus na dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to// shing arga'i 'o ma dang / til mor dang mnyam
322a7(rgyud): par sbyar la lus la bskus na tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to// glang po che'i khrag dang til mar sbyar nas lus la bskus na tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston to// ra'i khrag dang sbrus nas lus
322b1(rgyud): 'khrugs na 'bri gzugs su ston to// ti la mar dang / bring shing dang / parda'i bye ma dang / glang po che'i khrag dang lhan cig sbyar nas lus la bslus na nag po chen po'i gzugs mngon sum du rang gi gzugs/
322b2(rgyud): su sgor la/ gang dang gang dag la thig le byas na ma mo'i tshogs kyi gzugs su ston to// sbrul gyi khrag dang / pags pa dang / til mar gyi rgyal po dang lhan cig sdus la rgal tshigs su bsku zhing / dpung pa
322b3(rgyud): g.yon par yang bskus na klu'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su ston te/ ji lta ji ltar khrag dang sbyar zhing / ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar gzugs su ston to// de nas gzhal med khang lta bar 'dod
322b4(rgyud): nayungs kar la til mar gyis bskus nas dge 'dun gyi nang du steng 'og tu gtor phye mas nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo kun tu bskus na dge 'dun rgan rims su bkod pa'i dbus su gzhal med khang
322b5(rgyud): chen po rgyan gyis brgyad pa ston/ dge slong rnams kyi snying du gtor na dge slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yid la ji ltar byas pa bzhin rgyal po'i gzugs su snang ba dang / gzhan dag blon po dang /
322b6(rgyud): gzhan dag bkrabs pa dang / gzha drug mdun na 'don pa dang / gzhan dag yongs su spyod pa'i gzugs su tshun la/ yungs kar la 'asus pas gtor na yang dge slong rnams sa ma //
322b7(rgyud): mna'a'am yus gar la bslus ras dge 'dun gyi dbus su dge slong rnams kyi mal sun gyi steng du gtor na/ ji lur dge slong thams cad 'azod pa ltar snang po// 'al ba'i ther chugs kyis brgyad pa la
323a1(rgyud): mgator na rgan po 'khar bathogs pa srur po ga bye tha dka 'a can nyas chung bar byung // mas ldan gyi byed du lus kang gtor ba gal tam can thog phrag nag gzugs
323a2(rgyud): gnan du mi 'gyur ro// lug gi steng na snod yod pa la gtor na de thur ma'i gze ba dang / sbrul nag por snang ngo // snod kyi steng du gtor na 'am bor du snang bar 'gyur ro// btung ba'i sdong sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i steng /
323a3(rgyud): du gtor na phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo // grong khyer gyi sgo dang grong khyer kun tu gtor na grong khyer kun nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer kun la yungs kar dang pad+ma'i phye ma gtor na skyes pa dang / bud med dang /
323a4(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo mi snang ba thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// seng ge'i khrag dang sbyar nas dud 'gro'i skyes gnas kyi steng du gtor na lam gyi bzhi mdo thams cad du seng ge'i gzugs su ston to// sde drag cing/
323a5(rgyud): gtum la yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i steng du gtor na thams cad wa'i gzugs su sdang la phyogs bcur rgyug go// g.yul 'gyed sar gtor na thams cad gnyid log par byas par
323a6(rgyud): 'gyur la/ mchodan cha thams cad dang go cha thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// me'i nang du gtor na mi snang ba rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// ti la mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na rtag tu 'bar por 'gyur ro//
323a7(rgyud): chu'i nang du gtor na chu mi mngon par 'gyur ro// bum pa chus bkang ba la gtor na srog chags chu'i nang na gnas pa thams cad chu'i nang nas 'byong zhing 'thang la gnas so// tshal gyi nang du lungs kar
323b1(rgyud): gyis gtor name tog dang 'bras bu mi spang bar gyur pa thams cad spa zhing / shi skam po dang tshal gyisathar me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad gron s+ho/ rnam mapa' la gtor daphyogs pa'i'i dge 'dun
323b2(rgyud): gyi nang ngam/ 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang du me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dgapa bab ste/ lha'i dri legs par smin pa yid dga' ba sim par byed pa 'bab bo// las dang ldan pa 'ag
323b3(rgyud): bzo'i gnas kyi las te/ las kyi snod thams cad la til mar gyi rgyal pos byugs la phye mas bsku/ pad+ma chen po'i phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas bsku/ yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor la/ de nas
323b4(rgyud): las kyi 'azo bzang po ji lta ba bzhin ston par 'dod na las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid g.yo la/ las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa du ma dag gyon par byed la nyo tshong byed pa 'byung ste/
323b5(rgyud): gal te phyir bzlog pa ma byas na rin ji lta ji lta ba de lta de ltar tsho tshang byed do// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur la/ dpag tshad brgya stong tsam gyi bar du khrid na de dang de nyid du ma
323b6(rgyud): lar 'gyur ro// babang bya 'kho la la byem pa drug cing lungs kor chags par byas la/ pad+ma chen po'i byams gtong nas 'jim pa 'azhag la thod sbyo ba dzisar 'dod pa bzhin bya ste/
323b7(rgyud): mi dngas mis byas pa 'ag gse las byas pa'i ga pa sa las byas pa'agazugs las byas pa 'di khrugs yulas byas pa na mam ba bar ba rdzo tshogs kyis smras pa'i lta ris ra
324a1(rgyud): spong bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ so tshod byed pa'ang 'byung ste/ rin chen pos tshong byed do// lungs kar gyi bye ma dag bad+ma'i bye ma lhun cig sbyar nas song /
324a2(rgyud): dus kyi dbus su gtor na kun tu zong bkram pa'i snod mi sdang bar byas pa thams cad snang bar byed do// thag pa'i steng du gtor na sbrul chen po ston to// khyim dang / ra ba'i ngos dang / sgo dang / shing sbyar ba dang /
324a3(rgyud): ka ba'i steng du gtor na khang pa dang / ra ba dang / 'khor gyi khyams rnams sbrul du ston to// ji srid du chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du sprul pa rnams 'dug go kha zlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur
324a4(rgyud): ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ khang bzangs kyi ngos la gtor na sbrul chen por snang ngo // lha'i steng du gtor la mig sman gyis mig bsku/ ril bus thig le byas na lha'i gzugs brnyan de ku tsa
324a5(rgyud): 'don cing 'gro ste/ gar 'dod pa der 'gro'o// bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug go// sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gtore na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs g.yo bar mdzad do// bzhud
324a6(rgyud): par mdzad do// 'jug par mdzad do// 'chag par mdzad do// tsan dan la bzlas brjod byas nas bdugs na phyir ba zhugs so// bum pa sbrang rtsis bslus pa rnams la gtor na g.yo bar byed do// ji tsam du phyir bzlos
324a7(rgyud): pam byas pa de tsam du g.yo'o// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog na phyir 'dug go// de nas rdo rje bskyod par 'dod na spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug/ de'ang yungs
324b1(rgyud): rnams sa sa sa u sa
324b2(rgyud): ga can tu 'gro bar byed/ mtho bar 'gro bar byed / dpa' bar 'gro bar byed / nam par 'gyu bar byed 'bar bachen pos 'bar bar byed pa/ ji bang du zlog pa byab pa di med du sa
324b3(rgyud): rlung 'asungs kar gyis 'azlog pa byas na de nyid du snang ngo // de nas 'khor lo bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ spos sna tshogs kyis bris nus me tog sna tshogs dgral par yang bya/ du
324b4(rgyud): gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs nas 'khor lo la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku phye mas bsku/ lte ba'i dbus su thig le byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par
324b5(rgyud): bya/ de la'ang yungs kar dang pad+ma chen po'i phye ma gdab par bya/ 'khor lo kun nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing se gol gyi sgra'ang byas na 'khor lo de dkyil 'khor las langs nas nam mkha' la 'bar
324b6(rgyud): zhing sdang ba thams cad la 'bab par byed de/ gal te g.yul 'gyed par 'bab na de'i tshe dgra thams cad kyi mgo gcod par byed/ sdang ba thams cad dang phyir rgol ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed de/
324b7(rgyud): bgegs thams cad la 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / gdon rnams la 'bab pa dang / klu sdang ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed de/ ji srid du
325a1(rgyud): bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar ro// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go// mdung rtse gsum pa bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor byas la
325a2(rgyud): thod pa gzhag par bya/ me tog dgram par yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs la/ mdung rtse gsum pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ bye mas gdab cing thig le bya/ rtse'i rgyun gsum la pad+ma chen po
325a3(rgyud): bye mas gtor nas thod pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/ yungs kar gyis gtor zhing hUM zhes se gol byas na mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar bar byed/ ldang bar byed/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ kun tu 'phar bar/
325a4(rgyud): byed/ 'gro bar byed/ phyogs bcur 'bar bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'phar bar byed do// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go// dung la til mar gyis byugs
325a5(rgyud): la phye mas gtor la thig le bya/ yungs kar gyis kyang phyi nang gtor la bus na ji srid du sgra thos pa de srid kyi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / khu mo thams cad rdo rdung bar byed/ rgyug par byed/ mchong par
325a6(rgyud): byed cing phyogs bcur rab tu rgyug par byed do// g.yul ngor bus na 'gyed pa'i mi thams cad dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha thams cad btang nas bro rdung bar byed/ gcer bur 'byung bar byed/ phyogs
325a7(rgyud): bcur rgyug par byed do// gal te dung lan bdun bus na phyir rgol ba dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs des nyon mongs pa bskyed par 'gyur te/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du mchong zhing phyogs bcur rgyag
325b1(rgyud): ko spos chus bzlog cing khrus byas na phyir bde bar gnas par 'gyur la/ rtag tu rgyal ba dang / dpal gyi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas sgyum de khon nyid sgrub par gsang sngags dang / rnam par 'brur
325b2(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gang du dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing / kun nas brgyan par yungs kar dang / til mar gyi rgyal
325b3(rgyud): bo dang / phye mar bsres pas byug pa dang / thig le kyang dbang bskur cing pad+ma chen po'i phye mas byugs la lag pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang / hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na/ brjod pa tsam dang / yungs kar gyis gtor
325b4(rgyud): ba'i mod la gtor ma'i snod dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu bkang ba thams cad dang / mtshon cha dang phyag cha thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas nam mkha' la sor bzhi tsam gyis spags
325b5(rgyud): te 'dug la/ ji srid du dkyil 'khor gyi las su bya ba thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi bar du nam mkha' la 'dug go// rig sngags 'chang ba sa'i steng gi sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug
325b6(rgyud): go/ las su bya ba thams cad zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad dri chab kyi cho gas dbang bskur na gtor ma dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu thams cad rang nyid 'bar bar byed la slar yang rang gi
325b7(rgyud): gnas su 'dug go// cho ga de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya ste/ thams cad du yon tan ston par snang la/ byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o zhes bshad do//
326a1(rgyud): de phyi nas pad+ma'i dngos grub bshad par bya ste// gser rag dngul lag/ sangs las shin tu legs shing mdzes pa snying po dang the ba dang bcas shing sdong bu tshad dang ldan par byas pa/
326a2(rgyud): 'dab ma byed kha bye ba 'khor bar 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa khru gang tsam gyi tshad sdong bu dang / snying po dang khe ba'i tshang sor bzhi tsam du byas pa la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku pad+ma'i phye ma dang / mig
326a3(rgyud): bsku ba dang / thig ler byas pa dang bcas pas kun legs par bskus la/ pad+ma'i sdong bu'i bar du nor bu rin po che bzhag nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun gyi bar du dbang
326a4(rgyud): bskur nas/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas ti la mar gyis bdag nyid la bsku bar bya/ mig bsku ba dang / thig le dang / bdug pas bdag nyid kyi lus la
326a5(rgyud): bdug par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa la nor bu gdags/ lag pa g.yon par pad+ma bzung la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma'i mchod pa 'bum bya ste/
326a6(rgyud): pad+ma 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas chu dang yungs kar gyis btab na'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khad+ma sprul pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad chu'i nang du bor na pad+ma mgal me bsko
326a7(rgyud): bltar 'khor bar 'gyur la/ pad+ma 'bum rnams char du 'bab par 'gyur ro// khadz+ra chu'i nang du gzhag par bya ba ni mtsho bran nag lteng ka 'a ga/ chung 'ag/ chu bo chen po'am/ 'o bas sam/ rdzi bdag mtsho
