326b1(rgyud): nang gang yang rung ba'i gnas su banag na gnas de dang de thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho chen po 'byung ste// ji srid du pad+ma ma byung ba de srid du/ dus rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug ste/ ston ka'am/ dgun nas/
326b2(rgyud): dpyid dag/ sos ka tsha ba'i dus su rtag tu pad+ma'i mtshor 'dug gonachal gyi 'gram du zhugs nas yungs ka ra la til mar gyis bskus pa phyi ba dang sbyar nas me tog gang yang rung bzhig lag gis bzung ste
326b3(rgyud): bskor la yungs kar gyis gtor na/ tshal gyi mtha'i shing thams cad la me tog rgyas par sdang ngo // dge 'dun gyi nangang ma/ tshogs pa'i nang la/ rgyal po'i pho drang 'khor ras/ skye bo'i nang du me tog ji snyed
326b4(rgyud): lag gis bskor la/ yungs kar gyis gtor na me tog mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ chu dang yungs kar gyis thams cad du zlog par byed pa yin no// 'bras bu ji snyed pa lag gis bzung nas yungs kar gyis
326b5(rgyud): gtor na 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gos lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor te bskor na gos dang bla re sna tshogs ston par byed do// rgyar lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na lha'i
326b6(rgyud): rgyan bzang po sna tshogs pa lag tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / skye bo 'dus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du byed la/ thams cad la rgyan btags par 'gyur ro// yungs kar dang chus bzlog par bya'o// yungs kar la
326b7(rgyud): mar gyis bslus/ phye mas bad+mo// gi'u wang dang / gur kum dang / shing kun dang / sU h+la'i 'o mas kyang bsgos la/ de dag gcig tu byas nas grib ma la bskam mo// de nas 'bras bu gcig khar bcug la phyoH/
327a1(rgyud): bzhir gtor na kha nas me 'bar bar snang zhing lus las 'bar ba sna tshogs 'byung bar sdang ste/ ji srid du yungs kar kha na yod pa'i bar du lus las 'od zer 'bar gang dog rnam pa
327a2(rgyud): sna tshogs 'byung ngo // til mar dang lhan cig btags pa'i snying por bya/ skong bur ti la mar byi rgyal pos bkang ste mar me 'bum ston par byed do// me thab khung bu'i nang du bcug na ji srid du ma phyung ba de srid du me 'bar
327a3(rgyud): bar ston to// mar me'i sdong bu'i nang du bcug la ma phyung na rtag tu 'bar po// mgal me 'bar ba'i rang du bcug na 'bar ba'i 'greng ba 'dzum snyed du sdang ngo // gtor ma'i rdza ma dang bum pa'i nang du gtor na gtor mam
327a4(rgyud): rdza ma dang bum pa thams cad 'bar bar snang ngo // lag cha dang mtshon cha thams cad la byugs na gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs la ril bu gtsang ma spyi bor bzhag na/ lus thams
327a5(rgyud): cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ba nas lus ril bsregs pa ltar snang ngo // 'o ma dang / yungs kar gyis gtor na lus slar snang bar 'gyur ro// lag pa dang rkang pa la bskus la ril bu gtsang ma 'bar ba lag
327a6(rgyud): pa g.yas pas bzung ba 'am/ rkang pa'i mthe bos bzung na lag pa dang rkang pa gcig pu 'bar ba dang 'brel bar sdang ngo // 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo 'dus pa mang po 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor rag/ sde
327a7(rgyud): can gyi nang ngam/ rig byed bzhi'i nang thams cad du yan lag nyams par snang / dri chab dang yungs kar gyis gtor na lus slar rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo ril bu bsregs pa lam gyi bzhi mdor
327b1(rgyud): nganag nas yungs kar gyis phyogs pa'ir gtor namar me 'bus phrab bye ba pang po// kun ras phyogs pa'ir su dang yungs kar byos bzlog par bya ba yin mo/ chal chen po'i mtha' dang nang du gtor la ga
327b2(rgyud): gcig la ril bu gtsang ma ba 'gar shing da / rtsa dag shing gel pa dang / 'dang ma dang / lo ba thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo // ro'i rtse mor mar me bus nas ri kun tu gtor ra ri kud nas gcag
327b3(rgyud): tu'abar zhing mchod par snang la sems can thams cad kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rku pa dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / sdang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang /
327b4(rgyud): phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / sdang sems can nas/ ri dgas gtum po dang bya la sogs pa' bar ri la gnas pa rnams de'i mtshan po nyid phyogs bcu kun tu bros shing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin to// spos
327b5(rgyud): chab kyis bzlog par 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gtor la/ gtsang ma'i ril bu 'bar bar bzhag na gzugs brlar thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ spos chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog
327b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// mar me'i ril bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor sbar te gnas gtsang mar gzhag/ dkyil 'khor gcig byas nas gtor ma'i cho ga bum pa bkang ba gzhag/ grong khyer kun tu yungs kar gyis
327b7(rgyud): gtor zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcing zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po'ang dran par byas na grong khyer kun nas mar po'i 'phreng ba 'bar ba gcig tu sdang ngo // grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byas la
328a1(rgyud): shar phyogs kyi so nas zhugs nagang grong byed gnas pa skyes pa dang zung me dang khye dang khra mo dadag bams cad dga' ba chen po rgyache bas chis par 'gyur ro/ slong byerd de/
328a2(rgyud): nagang sdang ba'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra dang / chom rkun dang/ g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / glags tshol dang skabs tshol bar gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha \u0f7f
328a3(rgyud): dang brjed byed dang / bi ma yin pa gang yang rung ba grong khyer de na gnas pa de dag lang long du gyur cing gdungs la bu ning ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing grong khyer gyi sgor byung nas phyogs bcu rab tu 'bros so// khrong
328a4(rgyud): khyer de'ang kun nas gnod pa med cing 'khrug pa med par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ mchen po 'das nas
328a5(rgyud): spos chu dang yungs kar gyis grong khyer gyi sgor gtor zhing dbang bskur na bzlog par 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhing mo'i rgyal po bam
328a6(rgyud): po bcu dgu pa// ldong ros dang / thing shun gyi phyi ma dang / yungs kar dang / ma hA trail dang / arga'i 'o ma dang / pha gu'i 'o ma dang gcid du sbyar ro// nya'i mig mkhris pa dang bcas pa dang /
328a7(rgyud): na ga pus pa dang / pad+ma'i chu ba rnams kyang lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mor bya'o// phye ma snga ma legs par sbyar la chus ril bur byas pa dang / phye mas gzhan yang bcang ngo // phye ma 'di dang pad+ma chen po'i bye ma bcang ba
328b1(rgyud): lhan cig tu bsres pa'i phye mas lus bskus la phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ ril bu khar bcug la hUM zhes bya ba bsdams te brjod ma de'i lus las chu 'dzag cing / de kho na bzhin du rang gnyis nas
328b2(rgyud): kyang lha rdzas kyi chu 'byung bar snang / lus las spos kyi rigs yid du 'ong ba rab tu sim par byed pa 'byung ba ni nang thams cad grub par spang ste/ rgyal ba'i phyag bzhin no// yungs kar gyi phye ma blangs te nam
328b3(rgyud): mkha' la gtor la ril bu lag pas bskor na char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// ril bu nam mkha' la 'phangs na mi 'bab bo// g.yul chen po 'gyed pa'i nang du phye ma de yungs kar dang bsres te nam ma
328b4(rgyud): la gtor la ril bu de'ang khar bcug ste/ steng du bltas la hUM zhes bya ba'i sgras bos la/ gnam lcags chen po 'bab ste yid mi 'chad pa dang sdug bsngal skyed par 'gyur ro// chu'i nang du zhugs te phye ma de
328b5(rgyud): gtor la yungs kar dang ril bu chu'i nang du gdab par bya/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te til mar gyis lus la bskus na klu chen po'i gzugs su sdang ngo // ril bu dang yungs kar mo'i mdog lta bu
328b6(rgyud): chu dang bsres pa'i yungs kar nam mkha' la gtor na 'brug sgra chen po 'byung zhing glog cher po gsal ba sdang bar 'gyur ro// chu'i nang nas 'byung na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// khron pa'i nang du btab na chu lud nas
328b7(rgyud): phyogs kun tu chu 'bab par 'gyur ro// rdza ma 'ag bum pa 'am/ rdze'u 'am/ rol ba slong gar 'am/ ril ba la bye bas byugs te/ de'i steng du yungs kar gyis gtor nas chus bkang ste khrus byas na de chu ba
329a1(rgyud): bar sdang zhing / de'i sdod ni mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa mang po byed de mchog tu grub pa yin no// de nas raM chen po'i ched du 'bru mar gyi rgyal po byas te 'bru mar gnan/
329a2(rgyud): dang / de bzhin du til las 'bru mar gyi rgyal po de bzhin du sbyar ro// lag pa dang rkang pa bzhag la 'dir nyam drod kyang shes par bya'o// bzhag pa thams cad du nyam drod shes par bya ba ni mar gsar bzhin du/
329a3(rgyud): 'jam par 'gyur zhing / skad cig de nyid la mtho ba dang dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin du ri'ang 'gyur ro// snying po thur ma 'dra ba dang / zlum po 'am/ yang na lcug ma lta bur byas pas ka ba'ang 'dud pa
329a4(rgyud): dang / ri'ang dma' ba 'am/ yang na mthon por 'gyur bar byed do// yungs kar dang pad+ma chen po'i phye ma lhan cig bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos bsgos te phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na ri thams cad mi
329a5(rgyud): snang zhing 'brog dgon par snang bar 'gyur ro// yang ri bor snang bar 'gyur ro// yang na mis bgrod par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na seng ge dang stag gis gang ba 'am/ lcug ma dang tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa
329a6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis gang ba 'am/ rtsub pa 'am/ dum bu 'am/ khong stong du snang bar 'gyur ro// ci ste rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong /
329a7(rgyud): bar 'dod na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du nas kyi 'o thug gi zas zos te gtsang ma shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas ra'i gsab tu zhugs la/ sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gaR+Ya
329b1(rgyud): der shing bri pa po'i me sbar ba la yungs kar bye ma dang bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal po dang sbyar la 'bras so ba dang bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun du dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o// lha ba shos dang
329b2(rgyud): gtor ba dkar po 'bul lo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chos brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas spos sna tshogs kyis luso bslus/ gos bzang po gtsang ba
329b3(rgyud): bgos te/ 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gi lus bskus/ phye mas lus byugs/ mig sman gyis mgo bskus/ thig le byas la nor bus mgo bcing zhing / mgul ba dang / lag pa dang / dpung pa dang / rkeng par
329b4(rgyud): yang bcings la/ yungs kar dang mtshal bsres pas ri'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/ pad+ma chen po'i phye ma de'ang phyogs bzhir gtor/ rang gi lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang pad+ma gzung zhing /
329b5(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pas rnam par lta ba spang ba dang / don yod pa chen po dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya gzung ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo lan cig bzlas brjod byas na/ ji ltar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
329b6(rgyud): mdo sde bshad pa las bstan pa de ltar ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang de'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar
329b7(rgyud): ri bo Ta la'i gzhal med khang bzhir du ri de la'ang gzhal med khang sdang ste/ ri de la rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs sdang ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyi gzhol med khang sdang ngo // sA la dang tA la dang / ta
330a1(rgyud): mA la dag tsam ba ka dang / a sho ka dang / a ka dang / a shod+hi puk+ti ka dang / kha ri sha ka dang / ka dam pa dag nI la dang / kha Ta la dang / pa lA sha dang / u dus wa ra dang / dong
330a2(rgyud): ka'i me tog sna tshogs dang / snga ma'i me tog dang / tog dang / tA ra Na dang / na ba ma li ka dang / kub bya ka sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro// bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa dang / ri dgas
330a3(rgyud): kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang bsdang bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe phyir bsdu ba byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba
330a4(rgyud): bzhin bya'o// dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o// /
330a5(rgyud): don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni// pad+ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon// bad+ma/
330a6(rgyud): kha ni phyed bye ba// phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzin// phyag gnyis phyung zhing brkyang nas kyang // bskum pa'am 'dzin stangs de nyid kyis// kun nas 'phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags// mtshon cha phyag rgya bsdams pa ni// 'di lta
330a7(rgyud): ste/ ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'phreng zlum dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / zur gsum ma zhes bya dang / 'khor lo dang / dung
330b1(rgyud): dag thong dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / dbyug tro dang / me tog gi thum po dang / bub pa gang ba dang / ring po che'i sdong dang / bad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i 'phreng brum dang / ut+pa la'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog gi 'bre //
330b2(rgyud): dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / zla ba dang / ri rab dang / me long dang / klu dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi sa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / be con dang / gshing rje'i be con dang / chu srin gyi kha dang / sngags
330b3(rgyud): de'i 'breng ba dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'breng rdum dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsgyings pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / glegs bam bsdams pa dang / 22
330b4(rgyud): gsil dang / lhung bzed dang / gdugs dang / dbu rgyan dang / nor bu brgyus pa dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / me'i thab khung ngo // kun nas 'bar 'phreng phyag
330b5(rgyud): rgyu de/ sna tshogs rmad du byung bas spras// mtshon cha sna tshogs bsdams pa yi// pad+ma 'dzin la rab tu gnas// ras la bris pa 'am dkyil 'khor ram// rtsig pa 'am gang yang rung ba la// tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs
330b6(rgyud): kyis/ gang du bris pa mthong ba de// ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar ni// phyir yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang gis rtag mchog sbyin// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// gang zhig nyes byas ni/
330b7(rgyud): bzad pa// mtshams med lnga po byed pa nyid// mnar med pa yi gnas dang ni// dmyal ba gzhan du gzhol ba gang / phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis// 'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur// skye dang 'chi las rnam par
331a1(rgyud): grol/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal bar 'gyur// de dag skye ba phyi mar ni// phyir yang mngal gyis mi gos te// yang dang yang du pad+ma las// rdzus te skye ba dag tu 'gyur// rtag tu bde ba can
331a2(rgyud): du 'gro// gang na 'dren pa tshe dpag med// bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu der// skye 'gyur the tsom mi za zhing // don rnams bde bar 'grub 'gyur zhing / rig sngags sna tshogs bde bar 'grub// bde bar dkyil 'khor/
331a3(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mi ldogs nas 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la// bla med dge rtsa bskyed par
331a4(rgyud): 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// bsod nams phung po chen po 'thob// de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa// de nyid 'grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// 'dod pa thams cad
331a5(rgyud): rab tu spyir// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel// gang zhig mtshams med byed pa dag/ mi bzad mnar med gnas pa yi// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas ri/
331a6(rgyud): mtho riso sgo phye the tsom med// sgo phye gyur pa rnangs la ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams sdang bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i dkyil
331a7(rgyud): 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis sems ca'i phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na shi 'phos pa'i mod la bde sa can du skye bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis ga
331b1(rgyud): dathub pa 'dren pa 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la/ kun nas cha ni mdzes par bya// gru bzhi go la'i tshad tsam la// glo ba'i them smras pa'i
331b2(rgyud): yis brgyan// shin tu legs par bskus dang ldan// 'jam zhing mnyan la mnyam pa yi// sa yi cha dang ldan pa la// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis dbye// dkyil 'khor de nyid thig btang la// phyag rgya bri ba rnam
331b3(rgyud): par dbye// phyogs bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa yi// dbus na dkyil 'khor snying po yin// gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang // mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba rnam par dbye'o// gru bzhi pa'i dbus su
331b4(rgyud): phyag rgya don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bla na med pa dang / phyag rgyan gyis brgyan pa tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyag rgya bri ba'ang /
331b5(rgyud): shin tu 'byes par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas gos dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan la kun tu yungs kar dkar po gtor ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyogs bzhi/
331b6(rgyud): kun tu bya ba ni ba lang gi lci ba sa dang bsres pas shin tu legs par byugs pa dang ldan pa la tshon rtsi'i phye mas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / kun nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba rgya chen po dang / mtshon cha bris la 'di'i sgo
331b7(rgyud): bzhi'ang rnam par 'byes par dri'o// ji ltar phyag rgya dang mthun pa'i ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la'ang mchod yon phul la/ dbyib mo dang / khru ba dang / bum pa dang / kham por dang /
332a1(rgyud): b+he'u gtor mas bkang la gzhag go// kun tu bum pa gang ba dang // bdug spos kyi ni sdod dag dang // me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gtor ma dkar po dag gis bka'// me tog/
332a2(rgyud): rnam par bkram byas la// kun tu 'phreng bas gzhag par bya// 'phreng bas bzang po bzhag nas kyang // de bzhin kun tu bdug spos dbul// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / sa la ki dang / sprik+ka dang /

332a4(rgyud): yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byas te bskor la/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya zhing phyag rgya thams cad la me tog bkram zhing me tog gtor ro// gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil
332a5(rgyud): 'khor 'di sgrub pa gang dgos pa la sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa la mchog tu mdzes par byas la/ phyis las thams cad bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la/
332a6(rgyud): ji ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa// de bzhin du ni las bya'o// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bla med pa/ dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs tsam/
332a7(rgyud): gyis/ 'thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i// spyi yi rigs ni thams cad du// phyag rgya dkrigs dang gtams rnams kyis// dam tshig kun tu shes par 'gyur// spyi rigs kun gyi cho ga yis// da mchis
332b1(rgyud): d+hus zhugs de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor sun tu zhugs pa dang / rgyal bas lung ni bstan par 'gyur// kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yis// phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ chos kyi ron bdud rtswa
332b2(rgyud): yi gzi ba d+hi mod la 'jug par 'gyur// rnam snang mdzad gsungs dkyil 'khor du// don yod dngos grub stsol ba mdzad// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gang bzhugs pa// kun tu spyi yi rigs rnams kyi//

332b4(rgyud): kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag ni tshe 'di yin par khong du chud par bya'o// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skyo bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs su tshe
332b5(rgyud): rabs dran zhing 'od zer bye ba 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing / tshe bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// yon tan thams cad dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa bkod
332b6(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston par byed do// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i spyi'i rigs de
332b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen
333a1(rgyud): po dag mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas rtag tu rjes su 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor rnams 'byor
333a2(rgyud): par gzigs nas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad phyi bzhin 'brang zhing mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
333a3(rgyud): kyis mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad gcig tu bla mar byed par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma bri
333a4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnam dag gi/ de nyid sgrub pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// spyi yi
333a5(rgyud): rigs rnams thams cad kyi// cho ga zhib mo bla med yin// gang gis sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// phyogs kun rnam par gzigs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs rnams byon 'gyur zhing // byang chub sems
333a6(rgyud): dpa' dgongs par 'gyur// rig sngags dngos grub rjes stsol cing // rtag tu srung ba mdzad par 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// the tsom med par myur du byon// mgon po 'khor
333a7(rgyud): bcas gnas nyid na// rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu stsol// rtag tu mchog ni stsol ba nyid// nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni// rnam par gzigs 'gyur the tsom
333b1(rgyud): med/ dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni rgya chen po ko la'i tshad tsam la/ legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu gsal gagru bzhi sgo bzhi
333b2(rgyud): dang / them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byes pa/ mchog tu mdzes pa/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bya'o// me yi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la// kun nas them
333b3(rgyud): skas bzhi dag dang // steng du grwa ni bzhi pa bya// rtag tu pad+ma'i snying po dang // snying po rgyas pa'i steng du yang // kun nas 'dab ma mdzes par bya// grwa bzhir pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bya// de bzhin du grwa gnyis kar rdo rje
333b4(rgyud): pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// gsum par mdung rtse gsum pa pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// bzhi par 'khor lo pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// lnga par bum pa gang ba gzhag go// sna tshogs tshon gyis rnam mdzes pa'i// kun nas
333b5(rgyud): 'dab ma'i myu gu bya// rin chen snod ni bkang ba dang // me tog 'breng dang ngang pa dang // phye ma pad+mar bcas pa dang // de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyid// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan brgyan pa'o// nub kyi gnas dang
333b6(rgyud): grwa dag tu// pad+ma'i 'dab ma ut+pa la bcas// bum pa du ra bas bkang ba bri// rtsa ba'i bum pa dbu ma la// 'dir ni kha khyer thig kyang gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya ba// thig gis kun nas cha mnyam
333b7(rgyud): zhing // sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni// tshon sna lnga yi skud pas gang ba// me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can// grwa dang grwar ni me lha bri// lus ni me mdog 'bar ba dang // lag na me
334a1(rgyud): 'bar 'dzin pa dang // mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga bzhin// ba dan mnga' dang snga lnga yi// srud pas bum pa gang dkris
334a2(rgyud): dang/ de bzhin bdug spos snod dag gis// kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya// sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che yi// sna tshogs ro yi gtor ma gzhag/ rdze'u dang kham por rnam gsum gyi// dkar pos
334a3(rgyud): bkang ba gzhag par bya'o// rdze'u dang dbyib mo bum pa ni// gtor mas bkang ba kun tu gzhag/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag/ kun nas me tog dgram bya zhing // 'phreng ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya//
334a4(rgyud): 'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni// kun tu mar me 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang de bzhin du// dri yi phye ma lha bshos dang // dkyil 'khor kun la gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad
334a5(rgyud): la/ blugs gzar dur ba rtag tu gzhag/ shing ni arga shi mi dang // yungs kar 'bras ni so ba dang // zhun mar dang ni mar dkar dang // kun du ru ka tsan dan dkar// sbyin sreg cho gar 'dir bzhag ste/
334a6(rgyud): dus gsum rtag tu rig 'dzin gyi// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la// dkar gsum gyi ni zas bza' zhing // gzhan ni bza' dang
334a7(rgyud): bca' mi bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas// dkyil 'khor shes pa 'jug bya zhing // d+ha ra b+ha'i stan la skyil krung du// shar phyogs kha b.lus 'dug par bya/ byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag ste/
334b1(rgyud): don yod rgyal po dran bya zhing // snga dro'i dus du sbyin sreg bya// gung la slob ma gzhug bya zhing // spyi yi rigs kyi sreg blugs ni// phyi 'phreng dus su bya ba'o// gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs la/
334b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang // grub pa kun tu cho ga yi// bdag nyid dbang bskur med kun gyi// sbyin sreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs// kun tu gnas ni thams cad na// rgyas pa gnas mchog ma
334b3(rgyud): gcig dang // gar ge de bzhin phur bu dang // mdun na 'don pa me lha ni// sbyin sreg byed pa 'jig rten par// mtshungs shes ston pas lung bstan to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa// rig 'dzin dab
334b4(rgyud): po chen po dang // phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang // mnyam pa bas kyang lhag pa nyid// me yi sbyin sreg byed pa la// de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob// gal te zhag
334b5(rgyud): bdun dus gsum du// de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// me la sbyin sreg byed pa la// mod la mngon shes lnga thob ces// de skad 'jog rten 'dren pa gsung // las ni byas nas de nas ni// sbyin sreg
334b6(rgyud): las ni brtsam par bya// sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// lha rnams rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing // de bzhin gshegs kun dgyes par 'gyur// byang chub
334b7(rgyud): sems dpa' byon nas ni// mod la mthong ba'i sbyin par mdzad// sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur// shin tu mi bzad sngon gyi las// sreg blugs tsam gyis mod la sreg/ 'bar ba'i me yis phye leb
335a1(rgyud): bzhi ma// de la sogs pa'i sdig pa ni// sreg 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// sdang ba'i phyir ni rgol nyid dang / mi bzang bas kyi dgra rnams dang // pha rol dpung gis 'jigs pa nyid/
335a2(rgyud): de bzhin du yang rgyal po'i dpung // de kun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// mi gnang bar 'gyur the tsom med// de bzhin mi ngas gcong kun dang // nad kun rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs nyid kyang //
335a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang // de bzhin bgegs dang log 'dren dang // sha za brjed byed yi dgas dang // de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs gdon// 'di kun sbyin sreg byas
335a4(rgyud): tsam byis// 'jig par 'gyur bar the tsom med// rtag tu 'jigs med lo legs shing // gling dang bde bar 'gyur ba yin// rtag tu sems can thams cad ni// kun tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyal po dpung
335a5(rgyud): dang bcas pa nyid// btsun mor bcas pa nyid kyang ni// rtag par kun tu gsal bar ni// mi 'jigs sbyin par the tsom med// rtag tu nad med 'gyur ba dang // dga' zhing yid ni bde ba dang // lus can dag ni
335a6(rgyud): thams cad la// rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gnas// rtag tu me yi lha nyid ni// rgyun du mthong bar 'dod pa yi// me la sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// me lha nyid ni bzhugs 'gyur te// rtag tu las ni thams
335a7(rgyud): cad mdzad// rgyun du phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lha ni rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing // thams cad du ni mthong ba ster// rgyu skar zla ba nyi ma dang // gshin rje dang ni chu lha dang // rgyal po chen po bzhi po dang // dpung bcas
335b1(rgyud): bzhon par bcas pa yang // nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni// rjes 'brang bsrung 'gyur the tsom med// ci ste rig sngags 'chang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des
335b2(rgyud): shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing // shing arga'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar la pad+ma dang / zhun mar dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas nas sreg
335b3(rgyud): blugs lan cig byas pas/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'dod
335b4(rgyud): na rig sngags 'chang des byang chub kyi shing gis me sbar la rigs spyir pad+ma/ ut+pa la sngon po dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
335b5(rgyud): cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob ste/ thams cad mog chen po zhib mo dang / sbyin sreg chen po'i cho gar 'gyur ro// de nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin
335b6(rgyud): tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te/ seng ldeng gi me spar la/ zho dang / zhun mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg brgyad stong byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag
335b7(rgyud): tshogs bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra gzhom par 'dod pa dngag / dpung gzhig par 'dod na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis shing ka ra l+li ra'i ma spar la/ sbrul gyi pags pa
336a1(rgyud): brjes pa dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa 'bras sA lu dang bsres pa yungs mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dpag tshogs dang / dgral/
336a2(rgyud): gnas lcags chen po dang / rlung grang mo 'bab pas 'phongs pa dang / yid mi bde ba skyed par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// klus char 'bebs par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang
336a3(rgyud): des nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang / me tog 'greng ba dang / yungs kar dang / sha ta bus pa zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg mtshan gcig la dus gsum
336a4(rgyud): du byas na klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par 'gyur ro// char de nyid ha cang chos na thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na ha cang char
336a5(rgyud): ches pa 'chad par 'gyur ro// yang me lha 'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des gos gtsang ma bgos la/ nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pas
336a6(rgyud): shing snga ma'i me sngar la 'bras so ba dang / zhun mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sha kha ra dang / bu ram dang bcas pa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / snga ma'i me tog bsres pa brgyad srong sbyin sreg bya'o// brgyad skyong
336a7(rgyud): tshang ba dang / me lha me'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste 'dug nas/ rig sngags 'chang la ci bgyi bka' stsol cig ces zer zhing / ji ltar rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba de bzhin du smra'o//
336b1(rgyud): thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ mchog thams cad sbyir ba zhes bya ba/ bdud rtsi 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i me'i kha/ kha'i mchog sbyin par byed do// gang bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i me'i kha thob pas gang du dbugs
336b2(rgyud): phyung ba dang brngubs pa der me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang du phu zhes byas pas me 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mun gnag tu dbugs phyung na me 'bar te snang bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sre
336b3(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do// sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad zhi bar byed do// 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal
336b4(rgyud): po dbang du byed do// phub ma dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis ni zhe 'gras par byed do// 'bras yos dang yungs kar gyi sbyin srog gis ni sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// yungs kar dang / gu gul
336b5(rgyud): dang / zhun mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni gnod sbyin 'gugs so// ka ra wI ra'i me tog dang gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni srin mo 'gugs so// de bzhin du 'dir las thams cad byed do//
336b6(rgyud): spyir sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ kun tu thun mong sgrub pa'i mchog/ dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste// sangs rgyas
336b7(rgyud): thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing // bla med bsod nams chen po sogs// don yod rgyal po de nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag tu// 'jig rten 'dren pa snang bar bya// mthu dang dngos grub sna tshogs
337a1(rgyud): pa'i// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i gzugs bya ba// grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas// so so'i gzugs su bya ba ni// ras sam yang na dar dag la// 'jigs pa med pas gzugs
337a2(rgyud): bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad dam/ yang na tshad shin tu rnam par 'byos pa/ pad+ma'i mdog lta bu/ phyag brgyad pa/ dbu gsum pa/ de bzhin du spyan gsum gzhi ba'i zhal du bri
337a3(rgyud): bar bya ste/ de bzhin du 'gas pa 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / be con dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / bgrang 'breg
337a4(rgyud): dang / me tog thum po 'dzin par bya'o// g.yon du ni dkar mo'o// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbyar la dbu yid tsam 'dud pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras
337a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug ni ral pa'i thor tsugs can/ dbu rgyan 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas phyogs kyi dbu zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ ri dgas kyi pags pa bsnam pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/
337a6(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang dang ldan pa'o// nang rim du pad+ma'i 'phreng ba'o// rim pa gnyis par rdo rje 'phreng ba lcags kyu dang bcas par bya'o// rim pa gsum par nor bu rin po che
337a7(rgyud): 'phreng ba dang rin po che sna tshogs mdzes pa'o// rim pa bzhi par mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba'o// rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'o// steng dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang
337b1(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// g.yon du gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu rnams bya ba
337b2(rgyud): ni me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// lha po sgrol ma'i rgyab tu khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni khros pa/ gtum pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ phyag bzhi ga/ 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs pa/
337b3(rgyud): sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas pa zla bas brgyad cing ral gri 'dzin pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse
337b4(rgyud): gsum pa 'dzin pa dang / dgra sta 'dzin par bya'o// dkar mo'i rgyab tu rig sngags kyi po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag med
337b5(rgyud): can thogs pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'dzin par bya'o// 'og tu pho nya mo dang / dbyangs can dang / dung can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpe red ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / pho nya mo
337b6(rgyud): zhi ba dang / lo tog gi lha dang / sa'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// steng dang g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam bya'o// nyi ma dang zla ba'i lha rgyu skar
337b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa bya'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyi rol gyi// rnam pa kun tu phyag rgya dang // phyag mtshan sna tshogs rdzogs par bri'o// klu brgyad bya zhing kun nas 'khor ba dang bcas par bya'o// rig sngags dngos grub
338a1(rgyud): bla med pa'i/ ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di ni// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel// mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar byed// phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i ri mo'i gzugs grub pa/
338a2(rgyud): 'di ni spyi'i rigs thams cad du 'jug pa ston pa yin no// spyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems
338a3(rgyud): dpas kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o// don yod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por gyur pa de kho na
338a4(rgyud): nyid gsang ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par thar pa thob cing lung bstan par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thams cad 'grub bo// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
338a5(rgyud): ldan par snang ba bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor bcas kyi// rig sngags cho ga bla med pa// spyi rigs yang dag
338a6(rgyud): 'byung ba ni// thub pa rnam sngang mdzad kyis bstan// de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang // gang yang pad+ma'i rigs de bzhin// nor rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang // rdo rje'i rigs gang bla med pa// spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong /
338a7(rgyud): pab ni// ri mo mthong ba'i khyad par yin// phyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing // dmyal ba ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de// mtho rigs kyi ni sgo yang phye// bla na med pa ston pa yi// phyag rgya'i ri bo'i dkyil khA di// bsod nams bla na med/
338b1(rgyud): pa yin/ ci ste don yod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'don na/ rig sngags 'chang des tsan dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad
338b2(rgyud): tsam la/ gnad kyi gnas kyi cha'i sor tshad shan tu rnam par 'byes pa/ dbu dang / mgur dang / rked pa dang / pus mo dang / yan lag dang / zhabs kyi tshigs dang / phyag sor dang / phyag sor gyi tshigs dang / sen mo
338b3(rgyud): thams cad mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang sen mo tshad shin tu 'byes shing cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na zla gam zhi ba'i gzugs can/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi shin tu mdzes pa dang / dbu skra
338b4(rgyud): shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa 'od dpag med can phyag na pad+ma bsdams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang / dbugs 'byin
338b5(rgyud): cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// sgrol ma dang dkar mo'ang 'od 'dom gang dang bcas par dgod do// mgon po shin tu mdzes pa nor bu dang mu tig gi rgyan gyi mtshams
338b6(rgyud): su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yogs pa'i cod pan nam/ yang na spyi gtsug tu ring bsrel bzhag par byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing / gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis mchod la/ dkyil 'o'o/
338b7(rgyud): byi snying po 'di'i dbus su pad+ma ge sar dang bcas pa 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris la/ de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten dang phyag dar gyi cod pan gyis bcings pa bzhag la/ a ka ru dang can
339a1(rgyud): ngan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing me tog dgram par bya/ me tog gi 'breng bas mchod par bya'o// rag sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas spya/
339a2(rgyud): ba byas la/ mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ mchod yon dang lha ba shos phul la byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran/
339a3(rgyud): pa bsgom mo// sems can thams cad la rtse bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom zhing / gtam gzhan mi smra bar shin tu yongs su sbyang ba legs par spyod cing / gzhan 'jigs pa med pas bdag bsrung ba
339a4(rgyud): dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bsrung ba dang bcas pa'ang byas la/ bzlas brjod de nyid stong rtsa brgyad dang / phyag rgya'ang stong rtsa brgyad brtsams na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/
339a5(rgyud): 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang / bdag kyang 'bar ba dang snying dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin par mdzad pa'i phyag brkyang nas spyi bor gzhag ste legs so legs
339a6(rgyud): so// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod pa dam pa dang gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byos so// sgrub pa dam pa byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi'i rigs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams
339a7(rgyud): cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang khyod la 'grub kyis/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rjes su zung zhig
339b1(rgyud): dang / rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsams pa de thams cad rjes su sbyin no// 'di ni khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba tha ma yin te/ skye ba dang /
339b2(rgyud): rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mngal du gnas pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
339b3(rgyud): gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mngon sum du chos nyan par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med bgrang du med par
339b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes tshig tu gsung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po gang la khro bo'i rgyal pos me tog gam/ cod pan la mngon par gtor na/ des na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
339b5(rgyud): phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// yang pa chen pos rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
339b6(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// sku gzugs sgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di gal te rig sngags 'chang skal ba chung ga mnar med par gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa des
339b7(rgyud): lan cig nges par bsgrubs pa tsam gyis mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par mchis par bgyi'o// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la spang bas
340a1(rgyud): zag dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis bdun
340a2(rgyud): te rig sngags 'chang sgrub na rmi lam du bdag gis gzugs mthong ba stsal bar bgyi zhing / yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi zhing / sdig
340a3(rgyud): pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o// dri ma med par rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// sang nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i/
340a4(rgyud): 'os chen po gcig pur 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa sgo kun tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa 'thob
340a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral zhing nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gdol pas kyang dad pa dang /
340a6(rgyud): gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang / cho ga gzhan gyis kyang nges par yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ba stsal bar bgyi na// mir gyur pa dad pa'i rjes
340a7(rgyud): su 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing / yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ 'di la the tsom
340b1(rgyud): dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de lha mod kyi bcom ldan 'das sems can tshe gcig pu pa de la rig sngags sgrub pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bdag gis rngo mi thogs lags so// gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i
340b2(rgyud): dus na dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can/ sems gya gyu ba/ yid gnyis su byed pa/ ngo gnyis can/ ser sna can/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ pha rol gyi rdzas la brkam chags can/ gas
340b3(rgyud): sngags rku ga yi ge rku ba gdug pa/ phrag dog che ba/ khengs pa/ gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa/ mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor ston pa'i bla ma la mgus pa/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di ston pa
340b4(rgyud): la ma gus pa nyid brkam chags can/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la bskyang bar bstan pa 'am/ dngos grub bstan par rngom thogs lags so// bdag la'ang brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems
340b5(rgyud): can de lta bu mang du 'byung ste/ bdag la'ang sun par bgyid pa/ bdag la'ang ma gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas mnar sems dang sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdag la'ang
340b6(rgyud): 'khu bar bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o// rig
340b7(rgyud): sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dam tshig kun nas 'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin
341a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba dang /
341a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems can de dag sdig pa gdol pa zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong dag dang / rig sngags
341a3(rgyud): 'chang de dag ni smad par 'os par rig par bgyi'o// tshig pa ka ba tshig pa lta bu/ rig sngags nyams pa/ log 'dren gyis zin pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa dang /
341a4(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa chud gzan pa/ rig sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni bdag gis ma nongs te bdag gis yongs su spangs pa ma lags so// de lha mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
341a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su spangs pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spangs pa/ rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad spangs pa/ thub pa rnam par
341a6(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig yongs su spangs pas/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag
341a7(rgyud): gis ma nongs te/ bdag gis yongs su ma spangs so// de lta mod kyi rig sngags bsregs pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa/ phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsregs pa/ gsang ba bsregs pa/ de bzhin gshegs/
341b1(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal pa mang po rdul phra mo bsags pa'i bskal par sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig
341b2(rgyud): rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do// de lta bas na sems can rig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags rjes su sems pas byams pa'i sems su bya'o// gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig
341b3(rgyud): sngags gsang ba rnyed par 'gyur ba de la des gus pa chen po dang / bla mar bgyi ba chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pa dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi / pha dang ma'i gus pa bgyi/ ston pa'i gus pa bgyi/ rang gi sha dang /
341b4(rgyud): khrag dang / rkang yang gtang bar bgyi/ gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / stan dang / khago bas rim gro dang mchod pa bgyi ste/ de la ni bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ rje dpon dang bla mar bgyi'o// rtag
341b5(rgyud): tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gis gzugs mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi rgyun du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bdag rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba ni/ ji ltar chab kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs
341b6(rgyud): ba stsal ba lhar dngos grub kun tu mchi bar bgyi/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams cad du mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag gis zhags pa dang lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa'i
341b7(rgyud): lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/ thams cad du sgrub pa dang / dngos grub dang / mchog stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas tsan dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas
342a1(rgyud): @'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/ de mtshungs par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ bdag rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o// gang na cho ga 'di/
342a2(rgyud): gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas pa der mtshungs par rig par bgyi'o// sa phyogs de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o// gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
342a3(rgyud): spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o// de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thang du byung ba zhes rig par bgyi'o// lha thams cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin
342a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so zhes rig par
342a5(rgyud): bgyi'o// sa phyogs 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas bkod pas brgyan par rig par bgyi ste/ de la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad du
342a6(rgyud): gtogs pa'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs las 'phags pa spyan ras
342a7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa shin tu mdzes pa/ sku shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ phyag drug pa/ de bzhin du zhal gsum pa bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ spyan
342b1(rgyud): gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam can no// zhal g.yas pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs can khros pa/ gzugs bsgyur ba spyan gsum pa
342b2(rgyud): ral pa'i thor tsugs can gyi steng gi ral pa la 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o// g.yon pa ni zhal khro gnyer can// khros pa'i lha stangs su lta ba/ spyan gsum pa/
342b3(rgyud): ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ga 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ga g.yas phyogs zla gam can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'don gang gis legs par brgyan gzhags pa thogs pa/ pad+ma thogs
342b4(rgyud): pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra sta thogs pa/ dbugs 'byin pa/ rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma thal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o// g.yon
342b5(rgyud): na dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam du 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o// zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa// lag na me
342b6(rgyud): tog thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la kha bltas nas pus mo btsugs te 'dug par bya'o// lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis tshad dang tshad ma 'dres par spyan dang / smin ma dang / mchu
342b7(rgyud): dang / sen mo'i gnas kyi gnas su sbyang bar bya'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu pa// de nas rdzas bshad
343a1(rgyud): par bya ste/ 'jigs pa med pas spos kyi rigs tsan dan dang / ta ga ra dang / pu shel ci dang / li shi dang / na ga puSh+pa dag smi ka dag rgya skyegs dang / kha baN+DI kha dang / spang spos dang / na la da/
343a2(rgyud): dang / gu kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / sbron shing dang / ga na da pri yang ku dang / kun tu ru dang / sha kha ra dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / du ru ka dang / til mar dang / spra tshil dang lhan cig sbyar ba'i phye ma
343a3(rgyud): zhib mo shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ mchog 'di gtsang ba gtsang sbra spyod pas thub pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dges shing shin tu dul ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin tu mdzes
343a4(rgyud): par bya'o// gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan gcig bsgrubs pa ni mchog yin te/ 'di yongs su rdzogs nas khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad la mngon du gtor te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las
343a5(rgyud): brtsam mo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ shin tu khrus byas la dris byugs pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa gsal ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor ba
343a6(rgyud): po legs par byug pa shin tu gsal bar bya'o// dri sna tshogs kyis byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa la tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyis dbus su las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar bya'o// 'dir pad+ma'ang bya ste/ 'dab ma
343a7(rgyud): rgya rtsa brgyad pa ge sar dang snying por bcas pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu bzang ba tsan dan dang gur kum gyis bri bar bya ste/ der tshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o// bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang / de bzhin du dri chu
343b1(rgyud): dang gtor ma thams cad dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa dang / ci yod pa'i gtor ma bzhag ste/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba ni gnas sam/ dgon pa 'am/ khyim mam/ gang du gnas par gyur pa der khru gang /
343b2(rgyud): tshad dam/ khru do 'am/ khru gsum mam/ lhag par yang bya'o// de bzhin du bdug spos dang / tsa na dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / kun tu ru'o// ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan pa
343b3(rgyud): bya'o// me tog 'phreng ba dgras bya zhing // dri dang byug pa de nyid dang // kun tu mar me'i 'breng bya'o// de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa spya ni res gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma'i ge sar gyi steng du ban
343b4(rgyud): pab la/ rig sngags 'chang mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyad stong brtsam par bya'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / 'phags bA ras gzigs dbang phyug
343b5(rgyud): gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung zhing sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur/ rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan las rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'dod pa'i las thams
343b6(rgyud): cad grub pa'o// don yod pa chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub dang / thams cad du dgos pa grub pa de kho na nyid grub bo// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub pa'o// khyod kyis
343b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchog tu grub bo zhes spa 'byung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste/ slob ma gtsug pa dang dam tshig ni 'dir
344a1(rgyud): dgos pa zhes bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe dri las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/ de nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyura'angaH/
344a2(rgyud): paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du bzhag la/ dazlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na dgos pa sna tshogs rmi lam du ston ci / ji ltar bsams pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ de'i mdun du tsan dan dkar po las dkyil
344a3(rgyud): 'khor byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// de nas thal ba la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brkyang bya ste/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing ga thal ba de nyid dang yungs kar gyi byug pa phyogs
344a4(rgyud): bzhir gtor na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji lta ba de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar
344a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dri chu dang yungs kar gyis mngon du phyogs par gtor na phyir bsdu ba byas par 'gyur ro// thal ba des rab tu bdugs te/ dur khrod kyi nang du zhugs na 'byung po'i bdag po dpung dang 'khor dang bcas pa
344a6(rgyud): mdun na lte bar gnas par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyor dang / sring po dang / 'byung ba dang / sha ba thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed/
344a7(rgyud): rang la byugs te tshegs kyi nang ngam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du bdugs na ston pa mthong ba ji lta ba de ltar de rig sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// don/
344b1(rgyud): dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// thal bas lus bslus te klu'i mchor zhugs na klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te bka' ba'in byed par 'gyur zhing / ji sring/
344b2(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du lte bar gnas par 'gyur/ rang la byugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed cing mdun na nye bar gnas par
344b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ smon pa dang 'dren
344b4(rgyud): pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gang dang gang la thal bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad
344b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// byas pa mi gzo ba/ gsang sngags kyi gdol pa/ ma gus pa/ bla mar mi byed pa/
344b6(rgyud): rlom sems can/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi phyogs pa/ skyes bu gti mug can bsogs pa la zhen pa/ khengs pa/ nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du'ang dngos grub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
344b7(rgyud): ngo// de dag yun ring por thar pa mi rnyed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye ba
345a1(rgyud): brgyud pa rang gi rgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol chud gson pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ de sa yod kyi 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang mnongs te/ sdug bsngal/
345a2(rgyud): mang po dang chen po'i sems can dgrol bar rngo mi thogs lags so// sangs rgyas thug rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'i yid la bgyi ba bskal pa bgrangs par yid la bgyis pas dgrol bar rngo thogs lags so// de lta/
345a3(rgyud): mod kyi sdug bsngal mang po brgyud par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub ni byams pas 'thob ste/ byams pa dang gsang sngags kyi go cha bgos pa byams pa'i ral gri thogs pa/ sems can thams cad la
345a4(rgyud): phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas rjes su gnang ngo // mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyi gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang / 'jig rten
345a5(rgyud): 'dren pa rang gi gzugs su mngon sum du mthong ba mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba kho na dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshung
345a6(rgyud): pa kho nar khong du chud par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o// de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/
345a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ rig sngags 'chang ngas/ gzhar gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'tshang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'dod pa dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
345b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa
345b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin mthong bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod pa na cho ga 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ snying po dang bcas khyab dang bcas pa des myur ba dang / shes gyu
345b3(rgyud): ba dang / mgyogs par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba gsang ba bstan par mthong ste/ 'di la som nyid dang nom nur bskyed par mi bya'o// the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas
345b4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can sor bzhi'i tshad tsam tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ga ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/ shin tu ched dang ldan pa/ cha byad
345b5(rgyud): mdzes pa/ cha shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/ phyag g.yon na pad+ma dang ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas
345b6(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sku'i rang ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / ring bsrel gyis bkang ba/ g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te yid tsam bdud pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / g.yon na dngus
345b7(rgyud): las dkar mo thal mo sbyar te/ yid tsam 'dud pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dang / g.yon na shAkya'i rgyal po skyil mo krung bcas
346a1(rgyud): bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o// 'od 'dom gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan par bya zhing / gnang dang gnang shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ skra dang / dpral ba dang / smin ma dang / shangs
346a2(rgyud): dang sman dang / zhal dang / mgul pa dang / dpung pa dang / nu ma dang / rked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang / zhabs dang / phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad mdzes pa/ sku chu zheng gab cing mtho
346a3(rgyud): dman ran pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po 'chang bar bya'o// las shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu mthar phyin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs zin par rig nas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang
346a4(rgyud): gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla banya ba 'am/ chos brgyad dam/ bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum mas/ bcu bzhi 'am/ rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyi nyi ma dang mthun pa rnyed nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shin tu/
346a5(rgyud): mdzes par bya ba ni gru bzhi la cha legs par phye ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam la them skas bzhis brgyan pa/ khru gsum par rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ chung bar dang lhag par ni mi bya'o// legs par byugs pa/ shin tu
346a6(rgyud): 'jam pa/ snyi ga mnyen pa/ dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab pa ni shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+ma'i
346a7(rgyud): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su cha rnam pa brgyad du phye la/ lho'i grwa'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o//
346b1(rgyud): de nas byang gi grwar bri ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o// de nas nub kyi grwar bri ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar dri'o// de nas
346b2(rgyud): shar gyi grwar glang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang / shin tu gsal bar bri'o// shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor ri bo bo Ta la me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs
346b3(rgyud): kyis legs par brgyan pa ri'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor ni spos kyi ngad ljang dri
346b4(rgyud): za'i tshogs kyis gang ba/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu mdzes pa bri'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyi gnas me tog sna tshogs dang / 'khri shing dang / shing ljon pa sna tshogs mchog gis rtag tu gang ba
346b5(rgyud): bri'o// legs par zin nas kun tu ni// mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'bar 'phreng ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje'i rigs nyid gzhag go// nor bu'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa bzhag cing /
346b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / thams cad du rdo rje 'dzir pa bzhag na spyi'i rigs 'grub bo// lha mo sgrol ma ni ri bo po Ta la la gzhag go// ri rab la ni gos dkar mo'o// dpe med ma ni ti se'i rtse mor ro// sgrol ma bdun
346b7(rgyud): ni spos kyi ngad ldang la gzhag go/ shar phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo zhi ba pho nya mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ni srin mo ral pa gcig ma srin mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje
347a1(rgyud): lu gu rgyud lu gu rgyud bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor khro gter can gyi rgyal po khro gnyer can bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// de nas 'jigs pa med pas mgon po 'jig
347a2(rgyud): rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyi mdog can ring bsrel dang ldan pas don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o// grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi stonga'o//
347a3(rgyud): che go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can/ mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs pa gzhag par bya'o// gang zhig thub pa rnam par sdang mdzad kyi sprul pa/ spyi'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul
347a4(rgyud): ga 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa dang bcas pa 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa sgrub pa'i ched du cho ga sna tshogs dran par bya'o// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// rnam par dkyil 'khor de nyid
347a5(rgyud): ni// legs par sgrub pa mthong tsam dang // bklags pas dngos grub bla med 'gyur// de bas rtag tu 'bad pa yis// sgrub par byed pa ni mkhas so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsa
347a6(rgyud): ma bgos pas dar dang ba dan sna tshogs bzang pos dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o// ro bro ba'i mchog rgya chen pos sdod sna tshogs legs par bkang ba dang / gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon dbul zhing ro sna tshogs kyi gtor
347a7(rgyud): ma gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin 'bras bu sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i kha zas kyi gtor ma'ang bsgrub bo// me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bum pa dang /
347b1(rgyud): rje'u dang / bor zlum dang / kham por dang / dbyib mo dag kyang dgang ngo // kun tu dri chus bsgos pa yi// rgya chen gtor ma kun tu'o// sna tshogs pa yi bog bor nas// sna tshogs bdug spos dbul ba ni/ a ka ru dang /
347b2(rgyud): tsan dan dang / spre ka dang / du rus ka dang / kun tu ru dang / gu gul dang / sgron shing dang / shrI preSh+Ta ka dang / sa ra dang / sar dza ra sa dang / de bzhin du ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur kum dang / sha kha ra'i
347b3(rgyud): bdug spos 'di dag ni rab tu phul/ thams cad du bsgrub pa bla na med pa yin no// sna tshogs pa yi dri dag dang / phye ma byug pa sna tshogs nyid// shes rab can gyis kun tu ni// dkyil 'khor dag la gzhag par
347b4(rgyud): byas lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / byu ru dang ni mu ti ga dang // an+d+ra nI la dag dang ni// pad+ma rA ga dag kyang ngo // gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rin po che sna
347b5(rgyud): bdun can yang grwa bzhir gzhag par bya'o// 'bras yos dang yungs kar bsres pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor ro// kun nas me tog 'phreng ba ni// rmad byung dkyil 'khor la bzhag cing // kun nas mar me'i
347b6(rgyud): 'phreng ba yang // dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la gzhag/ rig sngags 'chang nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pas yang bzlas brjod rgya cher byas la cho gas bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / kun nas dkyil
347b7(rgyud): 'khor bcing ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o// de nas slom gzhug par bya ste/ bla ma mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon nam/ pa 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba
348a1(rgyud): bstan te/ mgon po 'jig rten gyi blam mthong zhing dkyil 'khor rmang du byung ba mthong nas phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dbul bar byas la bskor ba bya'o// de nas rig/
348a2(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis thams cad la byams pa'i sems mnyam par bzhag ste/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la ma~M smra bar ya mtshan du sdang bar mthong gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas
348a3(rgyud): la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur zhing yungs kar dang / chu dang / me tog gis dkyil 'khor kun tu lan brgya rtsa brgyad gtor ba'i mod la rtag tu phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcings la
348a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri phul nas mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa mthong na don yod pa nyid mchod par bya'o// de nas mgon po phyag na rdo rje dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal
348a5(rgyud): bo bla na med pa mchod par byed do// de nas lha mo sgrol ma dang kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la'o// de nas ri'i rgyal po rnams la gnas pa'i ri'i lha thams cad la'o// thams cad dang sgo
348a6(rgyud): srungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o// de nas phyogs bzhi kun tu rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu mchod nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la 'jigs pa med pas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang
348a7(rgyud): snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran par bya zhing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo// gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dang sa gzhi g.yo zhing / gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs
348b1(rgyud): pa'i mod la snying dga' ba dang sems bde ba 'thob bo// 'od zer bye ba kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po na don yod pa'i zhags pa 'gul bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'bar bar/
348b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha dang lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dkyil 'khor kun nas
348b3(rgyud): legs so zhes sgra grags par 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar gser bkod pa de ltar dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang / mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
348b4(rgyud): phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo gser gyi mdog gis bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas bzhengs par 'gyur/ sku gser mdog can gzugs bzang pos bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo sto/
348b5(rgyud): pa snang bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun tu rtag tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rtag tu sems brtan por bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang byams pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtan por gyur pas/ me tog dang rol mo'i sgra
348b6(rgyud): dbul zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po'ang dran par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing / rig sngas/
348b7(rgyud): 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba grub ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su lung bstan
349a1(rgyud): gyis rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag nas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang gi ngo babo phyir mi ldog pa dang / don/
349a2(rgyud): yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig/ dkyil 'khor 'di la brten pa'i skye bo dge ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa'i sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
349a3(rgyud): par lung bstan gyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// co ste sems can ngan pa rig sngags kyi gdol pa spang po dag der zhugs na gzugs brnyan las khrag 'dzag cing sgra mi bzad pa 'byung ste/ mgon po 'di mi mthong / sa 'di/
349a4(rgyud): g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang la rmi lam du ston te/ de nyid kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar mngon sum pa de bzhin du rmi lam du ston cing yid la bsam pa thams
349a5(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis legs par brtag cing so sor rtag tu sems can dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o// sgrub pa po bden par smra ba dang / dbang po yang dag par bsdam
349a6(rgyud): ga sems can thams cad la byams pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba can/ gzhan la yang dag par smra ga tshig brtags pa dad pa can/ gus pa dang ldan pa nyid mar 'dzin pa/ phar 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum pa/
349a7(rgyud): skyabs su song ga rtag tu bla ma la gus pa nyid kyi sems can 'di dag gzhug par bya'o// rab tu bag yod pa dang / rtag tu gtsang zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'bags pa dang /
349b1(rgyud): 'dres pa dang / gcig tu bsres pa dang / cung bzang bkrus pa dang / chang dang / sha dang / kun dong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang bsres pa'i kha zas dag spang bar bya zhing / rang gi kha 'phro'ang spang bar bya'o//
349b2(rgyud): lhag ma ni rtag tu spang bar bya ste/ 'di dag sgrub pa'i cho ga la dran par bya'o// lag pa 'bags pas gdong la reg par mi bya/ lhung bzed bor bar mi bya'o// rtag tu kham phyed phyed du gcod pa dang / mchog tu 'bag pa 'di dag
349b3(rgyud): nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o// gtsang mas zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong la sogs pa la mi rig par 'di dag zab nyid ni mchog tu mdzes shing blo dang ldan pa yin no// de nas rig sngags
349b4(rgyud): 'chang gis las shin tu yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par rdzogs na de la khrag 'dzag par mi 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang nas rig sngags
349b5(rgyud): 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing / shin tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu nyid kyi mgul pa nas bkrol te rig sngags 'chang gi mgul du 'dogs par mdzad do//
349b6(rgyud): spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing 'di la sras kyi thu bo zhes gsung ngo // mgul par nor bu bcings pa tsam gyis mod la de nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi gsang
349b7(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang
350a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po rtag tu mngon du 'gyur zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mtshams na 'dug par 'gyur ro// rgya chen po dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i
350a2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang ting nge'adzin rjes su thob pas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa dang
350a3(rgyud): dam tshig dang / gsang ba thams cad kyi mthu chen po ston par 'gyur ro// don yod pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs dang /
350a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha' yas pa 'thob ste/ gang dam tshig thob pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang mtshungs par shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
350a5(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ring bsrel dang /
350a6(rgyud): bcas pa de'ang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas gtsang mar gos gtsang ma'i gdan bshams la de'i steng du gzhag par bya'o// a ka ru'i bdug spos 'bul zhing nyin gcig bzhin du nang par sngar gzhan mi smra bar bzlas
350a7(rgyud): brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur te/ nyin gcig bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
350b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan smra bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro// da ltar gyi bzhin du de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de/
350b2(rgyud): thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring ba 'am/ tshe yongs su zad pa de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po brje ba 'am/ dgra 'thab pa 'am/ pha rol gyi dpag tshogs 'thab pa 'am/ lo nyes pa dang / ma ngas dang /
350b3(rgyud): dgon pa dang / nad dang / na ba dang / gdon dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / sbom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun mo'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jig pa dang /
350b4(rgyud): sbrul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'bras bu 'phel ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing / de'i thabs thams cad kyang rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'cha
350b5(rgyud): la nyin gcig bzhin du khyad par du gyur pa rnam pa mang po rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// kha cig la bstan par mi bgyi ste/ sdang sems can/ rig sngags kyi gdol pa/ rkun ma/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ brlang ba/ 'phags
350b6(rgyud): pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa/ bslab pa mi 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de dag gi lag tu bstan par mi bgyi/ rna bar bsgrags par mi bgyi/ skra'i rtse mo tsam du snang ba'ang stan
350b7(rgyud): papar mi bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo 'di ni yi ge'i 'bru gcig tsam yang bstan par mi bgyi'o// rjes su 'jug par mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur te/ mchog tu yid brtan pa/ rnam par
351a1(rgyud): thar pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi drung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang bla ma'i 'du
351a2(rgyud): shes skyed par bgyid/ bdag dang 'dra bar mchod pa sna tshogs kyis gus par bgyid na bdag la gus pa dang bla mar bgyis pa lags/ mchod pa dang rjed pa bgyis pa lags so// de lta bas na ngad pa'i rjes su 'dras
351a3(rgyud): bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang / snying rje bskyed pas dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// ci ste bgyi ba 'di las 'da' bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par dran pa dang /
351a4(rgyud): bdag brjod pa tsam gyis rang gi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos bdag mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing / yid la re ba thams cad dang mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// ci ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa
351a5(rgyud): las gzhan du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bslus pa lags so// rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun mar gyur pa la ni mi bgyid de/ dam bcas pa bzhin du smra bar mi bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang
351a6(rgyud): gis rtag tu gtsang bar bgyid/ rtag tu 'dzum pa dang / rtag tu byams pa dang snying rje sgom pa yid la bgyid na/ de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar bgyi/
351a7(rgyud): dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan par bgyi/ don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la/ rgya mtsho'i/
351b1(rgyud): dus rlabs ltar thams cad kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o// ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par lhung ba thams cad yongs su zad par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dga' bas kun tu mchi bar bgyi'o// sems can gang
351b2(rgyud): la byams pa dang snying rje mchis pa'i sems can pha rol de rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis shin tu sdom pas bsdam zhing rig sngags
351b3(rgyud): brjod par bgyi'o// yongs su gtong ba'i lag par bgyi zhing sngar 'chums par mi bgyi ste/ lag pa brkyang bar bgyi'o// gtong ba mang bas de bzhin gshegs pa dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o// sngar legs par
351b4(rgyud): spyad par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyad pa bgyi zhing rtag tu yid la bgyi'o// de nas bdag dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes bgyi'o// rang gi gzugs brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//
351b5(rgyud): de nas khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ don yod rgyal po rmad byung che// kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing // dkyil 'khor kun la dbang bskur ba// sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// bdud dang bgegs
351b6(rgyud): ni rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa// 'byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros// gdon gyi gtso bo slod cing // sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sdang ba'i klu rnams rnam 'jig cing /
351b7(rgyud): 'jigs 'phongs rnams la mi 'jigs stsol// rig 'dzin rnams la grub stsol ba// don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ston// spyi yi rigs ni rab ston pa// don
352a1(rgyud): yod spyi yi gsang ba ni// rtag tu gnan yin snying po nyid/ khro bo'i rgyal po bla med pa// de ni bdag gis rab tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
352a2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i rgyal po'i khro bo'i gzugs su gnas te/ sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par byed par gyur cing lag na zhags pa thogs te khro bo 'di smras so// na maHsarba ta thA ga
352a3(rgyud): ta/ Ar+ya a bo lo ki te shwa ra badz+ra d+ha re b+huHo tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsi raM/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA s+yA ma prAp+ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra ni shA tsa re/ shwa ra e h+ye hi/
352a4(rgyud): bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hU ba d+hA ba/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ba ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ hA hA hI hI hU hU/ oM ka ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra ba ra ba ra/ ba ra ra sh+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti/
352a5(rgyud): man+to ta/ sha r-I ra dza ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ru / mu ru mu ru/ sa nang ku mA ra ru tra biSh+Ta bA sa ba/ d+ha na da ri Shi NA ya ka ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta
352a6(rgyud): ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mu ya mu ya/ mu N+ya muSh+Ta/ ban d+ha ban d+ha na tA Da na tardza na/ rA dza tas+pha ra/ ag+ni u da ka bi Sha shaswa pa ri mo tsa ka/ kaN ka Na/ tsa la tsa la/ bo d+h+ye ga / tsa tu rA r+ya sat+ya sa pra kA sha ka
352a7(rgyud): ta ma ta ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mon d+ha kA ra/ pra sha ma na/ mi li mi li/ e Ne ya/ tsarma pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ka shwe ta yadz+nyo ba bI ta/ rat+na/
352b1(rgyud): mu ku Ta mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dzA shi ra si kr-i ta/ ka ra pu Ta/ sa mA d+hi pra kaM bya/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka ma hA sarba satwa san+ta/ ti pa raM bA tsa ka/ sarba mA rA di duSh+Ta pra mdza ka/ sarba sid+d+ha A shA ba re b+hu/
352b2(rgyud): ra ka/ a b+hi Shi ny+tsa tu mAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA bi Shi ke ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ a mo g+ha rA dza hUM pha/ na mo stu ti swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// oM bi kri ta Sh+Te/ a mo g+ha sa mo ye a b+hiShiny+tsa
