352b3(rgyud): tu mAM/ sarba bid+ha a mo g+ha a b+hi She kir hUM ma~M laM mi li swA hA/ de khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsung ma thag tu/ de nas
352b4(rgyud): ri chen po po Ta la rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo bar brtsams te klu'i tshogs ni 'khrugs so// lha'i tshogs thams cad ni dga' bar gyur to// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'drer na
352b5(rgyud): 'bar bar gyur to// bdud la sogs pa sdang ba ni yang dag par rab tu zhi bar gyur to// ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad ni mchog tu dga' bar gyur to// sdang ba
352b6(rgyud): dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad ni mi snang bar gyur to// nad thams cad ni rab tu zhe'o// rims thams cad las ni rnam par grol lo// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las ni yongs su
352b7(rgyud): grol lo// me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par gyur to// sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar gyur to// de nas dus gsum du
353a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tshig
353a2(rgyud): gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so// snying rje chen po can mchog tu don yod pa'i rig sngags 'di smras zin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang /
353a3(rgyud): snying po dang / khro bo'i de kho na nyid gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu spros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
353a4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don sod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bshad do// dkyil 'khor gru ba ni pa shin tu mdzes pa/ ko la'i tshad tsam shin
353a5(rgyud): 'byes pa'i gru bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / them skas bzhi dang / chu babs dang / mda'i kha khyer dang / kun nas rdo rje'i rnam pa dag kyang bya ste/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par 'byes pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil 'khor
353a6(rgyud): thig gdab par bya'o// ri mo mkhan gtsang mas snod gsar pa dang pir gtsang mas dkyil 'khor dam pa legs par bri'o// dkyil 'khor snying po rnams dbye ba/ dbus su legs par rnam phye la// kun nas/
353a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'breng ba dang // rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod// dbus su 'khor los rtag bri ba// shin tu blta sdug 'khor lo dgod// dbus der rgyal ba gzhag par bya// shAkya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// g.yas
353b1(rgyud): su khro bo'i rgyal po yi// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po// g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin gzhag pa// rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs gzhag/ de'i 'og tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang
353b2(rgyud): go cha dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta lu gu rgyud can dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bam mo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen mo dang / gos
353b3(rgyud): dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo ral pa can dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo ral po gcig ma zhes bya ba ni mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung zhing mi sdug
353b4(rgyud): pa/ sbrul se ral khar thogs pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dgra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma yin dang log 'dren la bsdigs shing khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo'i tso to nas 'dzin pa dang /
353b5(rgyud): khrag gi snod yongs su 'dzin pa/ glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'phyang ba dang smad g.yogs can bya'o// mtha'i glar pad+ma dang rdo rje gzhag pa ni 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can shin tu bzang po gzhag par
353b6(rgyud): bya'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed mig de'i sku 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can gzhag par bya'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa phyag na
353b7(rgyud): thogs par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo bya ba ni phyag na pad+ma thogs par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i cho gas rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag
354a1(rgyud): na thogs pa'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan dan gyi chu gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis bsgos pa'i chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos dkris shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa rin po/
354a2(rgyud): che sna bdun can rtag tu gzhag par bya'o// ji snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs yongs su bshams pas kyang mchod par bya/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o// bdug spos kyis bkang ba
354a3(rgyud): dang / mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog dang / dr-i dang / byug pas mchod par bya'o// ji srid 'jug gi bar du slobs rnams cho gas bsrungs la/ de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing don yod pa'i khro ngos
354a4(rgyud): dbang bskur bar bya'o// dbang bskur ba tsam gyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
354a5(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// gang bsams pa dang gang bcol ba de thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/
354a6(rgyud): ro de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// nga tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho gzhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / las kyi
354a7(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / rig sngags 'chab
354b1(rgyud): gi gnas phug dri ma med pa/ nas mkha'i rjes su rgyu ba dang / chun rgyu ba dngag/ nags dang skyed mos tshal na spyod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa
354b2(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'di'i mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// gang zhig de la mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
354b3(rgyud): mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams cad kyi de dag gi gnas dang lus nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi
354b4(rgyud): tshad tsam byas te/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tsugs bcings pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zla ba dbu la thogs pa/ zhal/
354b5(rgyud): dang po khro bo'i gzugs/ g.yon pa dang g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs/ zhal cung zad 'dzum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ ral gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas
354b6(rgyud): su lha mo sgrol ma me tog 'bul ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// g.yon du lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du rig
354b7(rgyud): sngags lachang pus mo btsugs pa/ lag na pog por dang bgrang 'phreng thogs te bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'o// gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun na tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur kum gyis mchod par bya'o//
355a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhag ste/ de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyur/ 'od zer 'byung
355a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/ phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'a
355a3(rgyud): de'ang bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur nang don yod par yang bar snang ba/ dngos grub dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags
355a4(rgyud): 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba brgyad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi gtso bo dang rgyal por 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro// bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi
355a5(rgyud): mtshan mo 'das pa dang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ji ltar bde ba can bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhal med khang gi rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur zhing / tshe'i tshad bskal pa dpag tu med par
355a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi chos ston par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o// bzlas
355a7(rgyud): brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil
355b1(rgyud): 'khor thams cad dang / mig 'phrul dang / kha nang gang dang / phur bas gdab pa dang / bsreg pa dang / 'phang ba dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgyu ma bstan pa dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / gan bsrung ba/
355b2(rgyud): dag mi snang ba'i cho ga smra ba dang / nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / sa gzhi smra ba dang / rgyu ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu brgal ba dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las brgal ba dang / rmongs byed dang //
355b3(rgyud): rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po bskyod pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / bden pa bstan pa dang / nad la sogs
355b4(rgyud): ba thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dgug pa dang / srin po dgug pa dang / 'byung po dgug pa dang / klu dang lha dgug pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang /
355b5(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo dgug pa dang / gtang ba dang / dgos pa la sogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mod la dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/
355b6(rgyud): bklag pa tsam gyis las dang / dngos grub dang / sgrub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / spang ba'i sem
355b7(rgyud): can thams cad phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur te/ skal ba ngan pa dang / nor chud za ba dang / mi 'grub pa dang / sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa dang /
356a1(rgyud): sdig pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog tu grub pa yin no// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ sngon bsags pa'i bsod nams dang skal ba mngon du 'gyur/
356a2(rgyud): te/ tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po dang che ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// rked pa'i gnas nas bzung ste bzlas/
356a3(rgyud): brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/ rgyal po btsun mo dpa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang nor gyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//
356a4(rgyud): cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbul bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o//
356a5(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'khor gyi
356a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor der nam mkha' las babs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang bkur sti mngon du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan
356a7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba
356b1(rgyud): der logs su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas so// me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / 'phreng/
356b2(rgyud): ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgya dang / lub lbub dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchong nas lan bdun bskor ba byas so// ri bo Ta la'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha dang /
356b3(rgyud): klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dag mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so// dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag la'ang mchod pa byas so// 'khor chen po de dag
356b4(rgyud): la'ang mchod pa byas so// lhan cig lhags pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la'ang mchod pa dang / mngon du bstod pa dang / phyag byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar
356b5(rgyud): 'dug par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje 'gying bag dang brji dpag gi 'gros kyis langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing / bcom ldan
356b6(rgyud): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
356b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mo gzhib mo 'di shin tu zab
357a1(rgyud): pa/ shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bur shin tu zab pa/ ri rab chen po lta bur shin tu mi g.yo zhing mi bskul ba/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ shin tu gzung bar dka'/
357a2(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ri mo'i sku gzugs bri ba mang po dang / sgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
357a3(rgyud): pa mang po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur na/ ji ltar 'gyur
357a4(rgyud): bar rngo thogs/ ji ltar nges par gzung bar rngo thogs lags/ gsang sngags tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad pa dang /
357a5(rgyud): gtor ma tha dad pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / dgug pa dang
357a6(rgyud): dam tshig dang / khrus dang / smyung ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rab tu 'jug pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / slar gshegs su gsol ba'am/ nges par gzung ba 'am/ dran par bgyi
357a7(rgyud): thogs/ bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa chen po sems kyi spyod pa rmugs par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams sam/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/
357b1(rgyud): dge sbyong ngas/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di nges par gzung bar ji ltar rngo thogs pa rig
357b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ji ltar sgrub par rngo thogs/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying la mchog tu ya mtshan skyes pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tsom gcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom
357b3(rgyud): ldan 'das the tsom gcod pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyir gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na
357b4(rgyud): rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod pa dang gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags sgrub pa po sgrub pa bsgrub pa la/ gang gi tshe dngos grub las dbugs phyung ba de'i tshe blo glos chen po'i chen por 'bogs par 'gyur/ dngos grub chen
357b5(rgyud): po'i chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ lag
357b6(rgyud): nordo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos grub gang gis sgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub dam pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag mdze rje gang la yungs kar
357b7(rgyud): gyi 'bru tsam gyi byang chub kyi sa bon gyi 'bras bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog tu 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am
358a1(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan gang su'ang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa dang /
358a2(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig thob par gyur la/ des ring bsrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa dang
358a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / khrus la sogs pa byed cing 'dug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed na/ lag na rdo
358a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang / mchog dang / bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du dgos par sbyar ba de dang der dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur ro// ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam
358a5(rgyud): gcig la mchod pa byas pa de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan bud med dang / skyes pa 'am/
358a6(rgyud): khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ rjed pa dang / gus pa dang / bstod pa dang /
358a7(rgyud): phyag byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ de dag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi
358b1(rgyud): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngas/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan gang su'ang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs
358b2(rgyud): sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro// shes rab da
358b3(rgyud): thabs la mkhas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi ngo//
358b4(rgyud): grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags rim par
358b5(rgyud): phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de ltar ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen po'i chen por brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi
358b6(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par yang dag par 'gyur ro// de ltar dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lha mod kyi lag na rdo rje khyod song la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
358b7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dag /
359a1(rgyud): yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang nab
359a2(rgyud): de logs su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te lar gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang /
359a3(rgyud): gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing / 'phags pa spyan nas gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas rdo rje gsor zhing gdong du b.lus te rtog cing 'dug go
359a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje khyod mi g.yo bar mdun du 'dug ste rdo rje
359a5(rgyud): gsor zhing ngal ci zhig blta/ ci zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/ ci zhig gsol ba 'debs par 'dod/ lag na rdo rje de nga la spros shig/ lag na rdo rje khyod la skabs phyes yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de thams cad lung bstan
359a6(rgyud): pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sun ras gzigs dbang byug la 'di ga cos smras so// bcom ldan 'das
359a7(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/ shin tu zab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang sngags mang po dang / phyag rgya mar
359b1(rgyud): bo dag dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ras kyi sku gzugs bri ba mang po yongs su bsgrags pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nges par gzung bar nus/ dngos grub ji ltar shes par 'byag rgya mtsho chen po lung ba sa/
359b2(rgyud): che ba/ ri rab dang mtshungs par mi g.yo ba/ nam mkha' ltar mthar thug pa ma mchis pa/ shin tu rtogs par dka' ba 'di ji ltar shes par bgyi/ gnas ni gang / 'gro ba ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang / sgrub pa
359b3(rgyud): gnas ni gang / dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni gang / snga ma ni gang / phyi ma ni gang / dbus ni gang / tha ma ni gang lags/ mang du yongs su zhu'o// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang //
359b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / dam tshig so so tha dad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga zhib mo// byang chub sems dpa' thab/
359b5(rgyud): cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ste rjes su gzung ba de nges par gzung bar ji ltar nus/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi the tsom chen po dang / mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur pa de
359b6(rgyud): thugs rje chen pos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ ji ltar grub na phyag rgya dang gsang mgrang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / ras kyi'i mo'i cho ga mtha' dag nges par gzung bar 'gyur ba the tsom gcad pa'i
359b7(rgyud): slad du'o// sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di
360a1(rgyud): skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje yun ring po zhig nas spobs pa gang zhig skyes te la yongs su 'dri/ yag na rdo rje nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
360a2(rgyud): zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog gcig pa/ rtags gcig pa/ chos gcig la zhugs pa/ dbyings dang / khams dang / snying po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo
360a3(rgyud): rab tu bskor ba gcig pa'o// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'das pa/ ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang
360a4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshogs pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
360a5(rgyud): kyi dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs pa nyid dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par shes so// de lha mod kyi lag na rdo rje de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan/
360a6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di'ang gcig nyid las de thams cad rjes su 'gro'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i
360a7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar
360b1(rgyud): 'dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos grub rjes su 'thob cing / de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skyed par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan
360b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par
360b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste dpung rgyan kyi
360b4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs dpa byug gi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting
360b5(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad
360b6(rgyud): snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi smon /
360b7(rgyud): ting 'dzid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skye gtsug la rnam par lu ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul la rnam par 'phrul pa kung tu bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smod pa 'bar 'a ting nge 'dzin papa/
361a1(rgyud): chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu/
361a2(rgyud): rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu phyag rgya'i rnam
361a3(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin
361a4(rgyud): dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i ti
361a5(rgyud): denge 'dzin dang / rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod pa rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin
361a6(rgyud): dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'dren
361a7(rgyud): pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pa dri ma med pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i
361b1(rgyud): rab tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag 'thob pa 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin re re la'ang 'khor bye ba brgya
361b2(rgyud): stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul pa 'di'i byir gyis brlabs kyis kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
361b3(rgyud): snying po bklag pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / phyag rgya 'ching bas yon tan de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'chang ba dang / rjod pa dang / klog pa dang /
361b4(rgyud): kha ton byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par byed na/ lag na rdo rje sems can de dngos grub don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lta
361b5(rgyud): ba don yod pa 'thob pa dang / gzungs don yod pa 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin don yod pa 'thob pa dang / bsod nams sogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul
361b6(rgyud): pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
361b7(rgyud): pa don yod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba don yod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba don yod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro ba don yod pa dang / blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang / shes rab
362a1(rgyud): zab mo rnam par 'phel ba don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bla ma la gus
362a2(rgyud): par bya ba don yod pa de'i phyir/ lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes ming du gdags pa byas na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ sems 'khrug par 'gyur dran pa
362a3(rgyud): dang blo gros rmongs par 'gyur te/ de'i gnas na mi snang na su zhig smra bar rus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de don yod pa zhags pa'i/
362a4(rgyud): ming du dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa'
362a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni don yod pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// ye shes gang yin pa de zhags pa'o// de'i snying po'o// snying
362a6(rgyud): po gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so// ga
362a7(rgyud): yid la sems pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ 'gugs par 'gyur/ len par 'gyur te/ shin tu ring po nas kyang ye shes kyi zhags pas 'gugs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de bas na/
362b1(rgyud): de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so// lag na rdo ldegang gis teng nge 'dzin 'di 'thob pa de la ji mur rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ blo dman par 'gyur te/ gnas 'don mi sdang ngo // lag na rdo rje gzhan/
362b2(rgyud): yang gzungs kyi sgo dum 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs 'thob pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mcho ga zhib mo 'di gsang sngags mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags
362b3(rgyud): rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor kha ton nyid du gnas te/ thams cad so sor yang dag par shes so// 'di lta ste/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang //
362b4(rgyud): don yod pa'i pad+ma'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa lhun
362b5(rgyud): bo'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
362b6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa
362b7(rgyud): rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa yangs pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs
363a1(rgyud): dang / don yod pa'i blo rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / de bzhin
363a2(rgyud): gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs de rnams thob pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
363a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang /
363a4(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha ton du gnas shing thams cad so sor yang dag par shes te/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa la rmongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur/ dran pa zhan par mi 'gyur//
363a5(rgyud): dran pa rmugs par mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'khums par mi 'gyur/ dran pa mi brtan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar mi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna
363a6(rgyud): dang / zag dog gi rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa sdig pa can du mi 'gyur dran pa 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba byed par mi 'gyur te/ rtags tu blo yangs shing rag tu gsal par gyur ro// rtag tu mi mnyam pa pa
363a7(rgyud): mnyam pa'i dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro// rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho chen po bsags pa lta bur 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po de ltar/
363b1(rgyud): go skabs yangs pa la/ gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de/ lag na rdo rje ji ltar dran pa rmongs par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus yongs su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag/
363b2(rgyud): pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mdangs yongs su dag pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang / rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sna yongs su dag pa dang / lce yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po yongs su
363b3(rgyud): dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bklags pa tsam dang / mnyan pa tsam dang / mthong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa tsam gyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po'i chen
363b4(rgyud): po 'di 'thob ste/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa de la/ lag na rdo rje ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po 'di'i
363b5(rgyud): dbus su ji ltar mngon sum du 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par bstan par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
363b6(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po bstan par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phagras/
363b7(rgyud): paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi ra
364a1(rgyud): pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ snying dga' bas dga' ba chen po nyid thob par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas//
364a2(rgyud): yongs su dga' ba yid la bgyid pas nges par gnas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyid pa mchog tu dag pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / som nyir gyur pa dang bral ba dang / 'gyod pa ma mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o// /
364a3(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di
364a4(rgyud): ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri ma med par kun tu snang ba'i nor bu
364a5(rgyud): rin po che chen po chos kyi dgab par phul nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas song ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing / 'gying bag dang brjid pag gi 'gros kyis song/
364a6(rgyud): nas rang gi stan la 'dug ste bzhin 'dzum pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas snying yongs su dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
364a7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba/ snying rje dam pa rgya chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dmigs pas sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir/ 'od zer dri ma med par snang ba'i
364b1(rgyud): nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul te nam mkha' la 'phags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis nor bu
364b2(rgyud): rin po ched dam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di cher g.yos par gyur to// 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to//
364b3(rgyud): snang ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ngan song gi/
364b4(rgyud): 'gro ba las yongs su grol bar gyur to// gang yang gling bzhi pa'i yi dgas dang dmyal ba de dag la'ang snang ba des snang bar gyur pas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi gtub pa med par gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang
364b5(rgyud): yongs su thar nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ lus yongs su dag par gyur to// gang yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag kyang 'od zer gyi sdang ba
364b6(rgyud): des reg pas dmyal ba de dag thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho byung bar gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par pad+ma las rdzus
364b7(rgyud): te skyes so// grang ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dro zhing bde ba dang / reg na bde bar gyur to// tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil bar gyur cing reg na bde ba dang / rab tu dga' bar gyur to// gang yang
365a1(rgyud): dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dgas dang / bya dang / tha na sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan du lha rnams kyi nang /
365a2(rgyud): duskyes so// sems can gang dag bcings par gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas sems can bcings pa las yongs su grol bar gyur to// su mi 'dod pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / lcags kyu lu gu rgyud kyis
365a3(rgyud): bcings pa de dag kyang dus bur gyur to// gang sdod ma yin pa de'ang 'od zer de phog pas mthong ba yongs su dag pa 'thob bo// gang sha ba kra dang mdze'i nad kyis lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna ma tshang ba /
365a4(rgyud): 'od zer de phog pas lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lus yongs su dag par gyur to// gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / me tog gi shing ljon pa'i shing ljon pa yongs su bskams par gyur pa'ang 'od zer de reg
365a5(rgyud): pas me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu byung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od zer bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa de na yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so'i de bzhin
365a6(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa
365a7(rgyud): brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / seng ge'i khri dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang byung bar gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil gang du 'od zer gyi snang bas reg pa'i nam ma pa'i dkyil der yang phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che'i
365b1(rgyud): rang bzhin gyi sprin gyi sprin brtsegs pas khebs par gyur te/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / cod pan dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / do shal
365b2(rgyud): dang / se mo do dang / rna rgyan dang / gser gyi skud pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo// tshen kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi dri sna tshogs kyi char
365b3(rgyud): rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi byug pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi bdug pa sna tshogs dang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char rab tu 'bab bo// tshon kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang ba dan snga
365b4(rgyud): tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mud da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a d+hi muk+ta ka dang / a sho ka dang / skya snar dang / ka dam pa
365b5(rgyud): dang / man dar ba dang / man da ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char rab tu babs te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las byed do// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yang rin po che sna bdun gyi
365b6(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/ gru bani pa/ ka ba bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ shin tu 'bar ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs lan kan gyis yongs su bskor cing mu tig gi dra ba sna tshogs
365b7(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu sna tshogs 'phyang ba/ gos sna tshogs kyi 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ chu shing gi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/ grwar lha rdzas kyi rnga
366a1(rgyud): yang sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ go skabs rgya che ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing snang ngo // nam mkha'i dkyil na'ang lha rnams lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug
366a2(rgyud): spos dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom
366a3(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing 'khod de/ de ltar don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs rmad du byung ba chen po'i chen po rab tu bstan cing ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
366a4(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i chen po sngar bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan
366a5(rgyud): nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa chen pos rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan
366a6(rgyud): 'das la mngon du bltas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
366a7(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor ras
366b1(rgyud): par bye ga gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen po bdag gi snying po gsang ga rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang / don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu dang /
366b2(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o//
366b3(rgyud): gang gis dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon du gnas par 'gyur te/ thams
366b4(rgyud): cad som nyir gnas so// gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas thams cad du mngon du gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
366b5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu smras pa legs so lags
366b6(rgyud): so// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na da smros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
366b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon du
367a1(rgyud): phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so// dus
367a2(rgyud): gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang
367a3(rgyud): bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags/
367a4(rgyud): pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
367a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phag pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu mtha'
367a6(rgyud): yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
367a7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad
367b1(rgyud): kyi sku sems can thams cad la byams pa kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdang ba dang / bdud la sogs//
367b2(rgyud): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sems dpa' chen po mchog sbyin lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM A kaR+Sha ya/ pad+ma ha sta na ma hA a mo g+ha aM ku shi / tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra sany+tsa ra/ sa
367b3(rgyud): man+te na/ ma hA pA sha/ aM ku sha b+hu dza ba ra da b+hu dza aM ku sha pA sha d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu dra/ man+t+ra maN+Da la/ pa Ta la/ d+ha ra aM ku sha/ pA she na/ d+ha rA ya hUM hUM/ ma hA brah+ma/ be Sha d+ha ra a mo g+ha rU pa/
367b4(rgyud): aM ku sha d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ta ra/ san+ta rA ya/ ma hA mu drA/ maN+Da la/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tri lo tsa na/ pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA
367b5(rgyud): b+hu te/ shwa ra ya ma ba ru Na/ na maskri ta/ ku mA ra/ trai lo kya ba ra da ma hA ka sha ma ka/ shA sa ka/ rak+Sha ka/ ma hA bid+yA/ a mo g+ha/ mar+tha la/ pu dzi ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA aM ku sha
367b6(rgyud): ak+Sha d+ha ra hUM hUM/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu drA/ man tA la mar+tha laM pU ra ya/ hUM hUM/ hr-i da ya aM ku shi/ a ba lo ka ya/ mAn sA d+ha ya sid d+hir/ A kaR+Sha ya/ mu dra man+ta/ maN+Da la/
367b7(rgyud): pa Ta kha ma/ sa ma ya/ big+h+nAn pa sA d+ha ya mA rAM/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba pA pa kil+li Sha ma la/ mAd sar+ya/ hu ru hu ru ma hA aM ku shi hUM hUM bud+d+ha bud+d+ha bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya / tu ru tu ru/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa
368a1(rgyud): aM ku sha rat+na pA sha d+ha ra/ nA nA bi tsi tra/ A b+ha ra Na bi b+hU Shi ta/ a mi tA b+hA/ dzi na mu ku Ta d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma bA sha aM ku sha d+ha ra/ sarba bid+yA man+t+ra mu trA maN+Da la/ pra ba/
368a2(rgyud): ra sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/ sa ha sra b+hu dza/ sa ha sra ne tra/ sau mya mu kha pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka satwa bta sa la/ sarba man+t+ra mu drA pra sa ha ka/ ma hA ba ra da satwa na mo stu te/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha
368a3(rgyud): pad+ma b+hu dza swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di smras ma thag tu ri bo po Ta la chen po brag dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal du
368a4(rgyud): bcas pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po 'bab bo// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/
368a5(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di'ang so sor le'ur phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnas so// gang gsang
368a6(rgyud): sngags kyi yig 'bru'ang gser la bai DUR+Yas yi ger bris pa sprin gyi rim pa na sdang ste/ yi ge'i 'phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zur phyin par bris pa/ thig gi 'phreng ba gshibs pas brgyan pa sdang ngo //
368a7(rgyud): gang lag pa'i phyag rgya rang pad+ma'i nang nas byung ba/ phyag rgya bcing ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so// gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'ang rin poche sna bdun gyi papral rab tu gnas pa nam mkha' la
368b1(rgyud): gnas par gyur to// gang ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba/ cho ga dang yo byad dang bcas pa rim par bye ba bris pa'ang nam mkha' la gnas so// gang dkyil/
368b2(rgyud): 'khor rim par bye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi pa/ gru bzhi ma mnyam pa/ rnam par phye ba/ dkyil 'khor shin tu sbas shing brgyan pa/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gzhal med
368b3(rgyud): khang yang nam mkha' la gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha pho nya dang / khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal med khang na rjes su rgyu ba dag kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom
368b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs
368b5(rgyud): par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras/
368b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so// rig sngags kyi mchog dam pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' dag rdzogs par smras pa/ gang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
368b7(rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba de dag thams cad don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drangs
369a1(rgyud): so// 'khor 'di'i nang na nam mkha'i dkyil na rab tu gnas pa de phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngas/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
369a2(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su'ang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo rig sngags
369a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di dran par byed na/ lan cig dran pa tsam gyis kyang mod la don yod
369a4(rgyud): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang /
369a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo de thams cad so sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim gyis dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho bsags pa dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
369a6(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro// nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur zhing / nam yang brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
369a7(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ lag na pad+ma mchog
369b1(rgyud): tu snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po smras pa legs so legs so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yon tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong
369b2(rgyud): nas dbugs cher 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 'di'i nang
369b3(rgyud): du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i zhags pa zhes bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de nas rig sngags 'chang gang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
369b4(rgyud): dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub par 'tshal ba dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
369b5(rgyud): 'am/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su'ang rung ba bud med/
369b6(rgyud): dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bklag par 'tshal ba dang / bstan par 'tshal ba dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang / mtha' dag rdzogs
369b7(rgyud): bar bsgrub par 'tshal ba des sngon rol tu phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su kha b.lus te mchis la/ gzhan mi smra bar ngon yod pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum dran/
370a1(rgyud): par bgyi zhing / yang thal mo sbyar te phyag bgyi'o// des na dran pa tsam gyis mod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
370a2(rgyud): bkug par 'gyur te/ ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
370a3(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa den yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhingab mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu gnyis pa//
370a4(rgyud): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa gsang sngags rim par bye ba'i cho ga zhib mo dag sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rnas
370a5(rgyud): pa rgya chen po mtha' dag rdzogs pa 'di'ang bkug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur te/ thams cad yid rab tu dga' bar gyur pas
370a6(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar shin tu rgya cher yid la bgyis pa de ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
370a7(rgyud): phyug nyid kyi kha nas dran pa mnyan zhing rgya che ba dang / blo dang mdangs dri ma ma mchis par 'jug par bgyid de zhugs pa tsam gyis mod la lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur 'jam par gyur cing / kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung
370b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang / 'jam pa dang / zab pa dang / tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// mi 'am ci'i dbyangs dang / sgra snyan pa dang / dbyangs mnyen pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i
370b2(rgyud): dbyangs su 'gyur zhing / ka la bing ka'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// ci ste dus gsum du lan gsum du dran par bgyid na/ gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /
370b3(rgyud): cho ga thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs spyi'i dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur zhing spyod par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa sdang ba'i 'jigs pa/
370b4(rgyud): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrib pa dang dmyal bar mchi ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po
370b5(rgyud): don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'di lan gsum dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis skad cig de nyid kyi mod la bdag rang dang / rang gi gnas kyi khang pa dang / slob ma dang / bsnyen bkur dang / 'khor dang bcas pa mi gtsang ba'ang
370b6(rgyud): gtsang bar 'gyur/ yongs su ma dag pa'ang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bcas pa'ang shin tu dri ma ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhe sdang dang bcas pa'ang zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
370b7(rgyud): gti mug dang bcas pa'ang gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'dod chags dang bcas pa'ang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bcas pa'ang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bgegs dang bcas
371a1(rgyud): pa dang / bdud dang log 'dren gyis yongs su zin pa'ang bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sems kyi sdig pa'ang sdig pa dang bral bar 'a
371a2(rgyud): ro/ thun song ma yin pa'ang thun song du gyur cing bsrungs par 'gyur ro// mi sba ba'i brtul zhugs ma mchis pa'ang mi sba ba'i brtul zhugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// smyung ba ma bgyis pa'ang smyung ba bgyis
371a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi gnas dang / yul dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa'ang tshangs par spyod pa chen por 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gnas par 'gyur ro//
371a4(rgyud): dge ba mi spyod pa'ang dge ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos mi spyod pa'ang chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsod nams mi bgyid pa'ang bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// /
371a5(rgyud): dul ba'i spyod pa ma mchis pa'ang dul ba'i spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags ma mthong ba dang / dam tshig ma mchis pa'ang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag
371a6(rgyud): rgya dang / gosang sngags mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi gnas dang / 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas dang chos mthong bar mi 'tshal ba'ang byang chub dang / chos
371a7(rgyud): dang / dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thabs cad kyis pa bsalnga pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi yul
371b1(rgyud): ngur gyur ba'ang byang chub kyi sa bor dang ldan par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// tshul khris
371b2(rgyud): dang ri 'bral zhing ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang yongs su gtong ba dang mi 'bral zhing sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzod pa
371b3(rgyud): dang mi 'bral zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod pa'i rjes su spyod par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral zhing brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen po'i go cha brtan pa bgos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan dang mi 'bral
371b4(rgyud): zhing bsam gtan chen po 'thob pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// rig sngags dang gsang sngags nyams pa'ang gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya
371b5(rgyud): yongs su tshang ba dang / cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad du snying du
371b6(rgyud): sdug pa dang bla mar bgyis par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa dang mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro// bsam pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// de ltar do/
371b7(rgyud): yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ dge ba den yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dren par bgyid do// dngos grub thams cad
372a1(rgyud): ma'ajugs par bgyid do// sgrung ba thams cad 'dren par babyed do// sangs rgyas kyimo sa ji byed pa dbazhi gshegs pa'i thob pa bcu dang / sas rgyas kyichos pa 'dreg bya
372a2(rgyud): brgyad dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgyad dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / don dam pa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de/ don yod pa'i
372a3(rgyud): lcags kyu 'dis 'dren par bgyid/ yangs par bgyid/ dngos grub mchog 'dren par bgyid do// de ltar mthu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen por brjod pas bsod nam
372a4(rgyud): kye 'bras bu chen po stsol bar bgyid do// de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing kun tu sogs par bgyid pas rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
372a5(rgyud): phyubyuphyug gi snying po ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa lags so// de nas rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/
372a6(rgyud): dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su'ang rung ba/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
372a7(rgyud): dbang phyug lang gi gzugs kyis dgug par 'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'tshal na des chog 'di 'gyi'o// gsa'am shin tu
372b1(rgyud): khrus dbyis pa/ gos gtsang ba bgos pa/ ba'i rdzas lnga'i chus bsangs pa'i mchod phyir thogs btags pas ras dmar po'i skung pa'i mchod phyir thogs kha dog babang po gnas bdun du yongs su bzung ste/ 'tshogs/
372b2(rgyud): ma dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / gnas gsum po dpung pa gnyis su bcing ba dang / lag ngar gnyis su bcing ba dang / de nas rked par bcings pas sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas sam/ gnas
372b3(rgyud): gzhan gang yang rung ba dben zhing 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi stegs gru bzhi pa shin tu rnam par 'byes/ khru bzhi'i tshad tsam pa la 'phang sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam kun nas zlum po legs
372b4(rgyud): bar byugs pa shin tu 'jam par bgyi'o// de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi srung ba rnam par 'byes par thig gdab cing tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bris par bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor mi thu gang cam gyi chad la gru ba'i pa
372b5(rgyud): rnam par phye ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o// dbus su pad+ma bgyi ste/ 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'dab ma thams cad la lcags kyu bri zhing / dbus kyi snying po gi sar
372b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o// 'od kyi 'phreng ba zlum po tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byes par bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa zhir lcags kyu dang zhags pa kun nas zlum po'ang bgyi
372b7(rgyud): phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya sna tshogs kyang bri bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi gru bzhir rnam par phye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi 'bar ba'i nang na go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jig par
373a1(rgyud): bgyid pa bri'o// sgo bzhi rnam par phye bar yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha bri bar bgyi ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'cha bzhi pa'i gzugs can/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ rdo rje 'gying bag can du 'dzin/
373a2(rgyud): pa/ ri rab kyi steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor khro bo'i rgyal po drag shul gyi gzugs can/ 'jigs par bgyid pa/ pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ me tog kha phye ba'i steng na 'bar
373a3(rgyud): pa'i nang na mchis pa'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor dbang po rdo rje thogs pa/ mig gsum pa/ ri'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa gdong khro gnyer can/ pad+ma dang zhagra
373a4(rgyud): pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na lcags kyu dang lhan cig mchis pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu gos dang / ba dan dang / mda' dang / rgyal mtshan kun gyis brgyan pa
373a5(rgyud): bgyi'o// tshon sna lnga'i skud pas kho ra khor yug tu dkri bar bgyi'o// gtor ma thams cad dkar po gzhag go/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun tu dngul dang gser gyi snod rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag go// snying po'i
373a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu dngul gyi snod bkang ba bzhi dang / 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil gyis bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang / dri'i snod bzhi dang / dris bkang ba'i snod bzhi
373a7(rgyud): dang / dngul gyi pog bor a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug spos bsregs bani gzhag go// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu sa las byas pa'i sdod bkang ba dang / gtor ma'i sdong bum
373b1(rgyud): pa yongs su bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / bdug pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i pog por brgyad 'jigs pa med par gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshe sa bcu bzhi nas zla ba nya ba'i tshes bco
373b2(rgyud): lnga'i bar gyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas/ 'bras yos dang yungs kar la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bgyi'o// yungs kar dang dri chab
373b3(rgyud): la khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun tu gtor zhing dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu mar me drug cu rtsa bzhi spar bar bgyi'o// me tog
373b4(rgyud): ji snyed pa mang po dgram zhing kho ra khor yug tu 'phreng ba gzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i lcags kyus yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun dang /
373b5(rgyud): phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og tu gtor na dkyil 'khor bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / bdag bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang /
373b6(rgyud): 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
373b7(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag mthong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa de dag thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba'i slad du gshin rje dang /
374a1(rgyud): mu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / ku be ra dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang 'khor dang bcas pa/ lcags kyu dang zhags pas bkug par 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor kun nas srung ba dang /
374a2(rgyud): skyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'og gi sa'i lha mo sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro// steng nas
374a3(rgyud): nam mkha' la tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar dang bcas par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyis par 'gyur
374a4(rgyud): ro/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis phyis bgyi ba'i las bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtswa ku sha'i bam po'i steng du shar phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te
374a5(rgyud): mchis la/ gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhag par bgyi zhing /
374a6(rgyud): me tog re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dor bar bgyi'o// de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar gyi 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas
374a7(rgyud): gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang brug gi sbyong po don yod pa'i nags pa'i lugs kyus pa zlas brjod sdong rtsa brgyad dgyis pas dbul bar brgya'o// ril bu'i rel bzlas brjod/
374b1(rgyud): bgyis pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bgyi'o// yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod pagyis pa/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / thun tha ma'i nas nangs kar gya nob pa
374b2(rgyud): yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar bgyid par sa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sgra mnyen pa dang / sman cing 'jengs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab mo dang / ka la bing ka dang / mi 'am ci'i
374b3(rgyud): sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis sems brtan por bgyi zhing mchog tu dga' ba yid la bgyid pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po nas 'od zer
374b4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu mchi zhing snang bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na sprin brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du 'od zer gyi gdugs su gyur nas gnas par 'gyur/
374b5(rgyud): ro// de nas sngon ma byung ba'i dri zhim po rmad du byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lha'i tsan dan dang / gor shi sha'i tsan dan dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi'i dri 'byung ste/ dpag tshad brgya
374b6(rgyud): kho ra khor yug tu dra gnas par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dri zhim po sngon ma byung ba rmad du byung ba bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i sprin brtsegs pa lta bu'i bdug spos kyi sprin nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas par yang 'gyur
374b7(rgyud): te/ phyogs bcu kun tu bdug spos kyi dri rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur/
375a1(rgyud): te/ tshangs pa bzang po'i cha lugs can// ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs lag pa bzhi ga/ pad+ma dang nags pa thogs ga/ rgyal ba 'od dpag
375a2(rgyud): tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu rgyan zla ba tshes pas brgyad pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs shing dbugs 'byin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyad pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus brgyan pa/ rang gi
375a3(rgyud): 'od dang gzi brjid kyis shin tu 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum zhing nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa/ khru brgyad tsam gyi bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad+ma'i stan las langs
375a4(rgyud): nam mkha' la mchis nas zhi ba'i gzugs can byams pa'i sems dang snying rje chen po yid la bgyis pas dkyil 'khor kun tu lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang la
375a5(rgyud): legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag mthil shin tu bzang po 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag stong gis legs par brgyan pa'i lag pa
375a6(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa spyi bor bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas rig sngags 'chang do nam mkha' la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang /
375a7(rgyud): lcags kyu rgya chen po'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba sgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong /
375b1(rgyud): gi bye ma snyed 'thob bo// kun tu don yod par lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grags pa don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/
375b2(rgyud): gang gis gzungs thob pa'i mong la don yod pa'i zhugs pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par bye ba'i cho ga zhib mo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar
375b3(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton nyid du gnas so// gzhan yang pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs
375b4(rgyud): dang / glang po che'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags rim par phye ba gsang ba dang /
375b5(rgyud): cho ga zhib mo'i rnam pa thams cad kha ton nyid du gnas so// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa rnams kyi gtso bo dang / mchog
375b6(rgyud): dang / rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi/ rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed/
375b7(rgyud): pa dang bsam pa spros shig dang / mchog de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang / mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing
376a1(rgyud): mchog yid la re ba thams cad byin par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da ltar byung ba rnams smra zhing / 'das pa dang / ma
376a2(rgyud): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba smra'o// lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / bde ba dang / nang dang / 'jigs pa dang / lhag par 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang /
376a3(rgyud): phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / yams kyi nad dang / mi ngas dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'tsho ba dang / gza' 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed
376a4(rgyud): pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / char ches pa dang / char dkon pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe yongs su zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'byor pa dang /
376a5(rgyud): rgud pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'grub pa dang / mi 'grub pa dang / bgegs dang / bgegs med pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / nor 'phel ba
376a6(rgyud): dang / nad mang ba dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyur ro// sarba/
376a7(rgyud): can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang /
376b1(rgyud): dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa ri dgas dang phyir skye ba dang 'chib de dag thams cad phyin ci ma log par smra zhing / de dag gi thabs thams cad kyang ston par 'gyur ro// lhar skye ba dang / klur skye ba dang / sangs rgyas/
376b2(rgyud): kyi zhing du 'gro zhing skye ba dang / rgyal po nyid dang / bud med dang / skyes pa nyid dang / bu rnyed pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs su skye ba dang / rgyal rigs su skye ba dang / khyab
376b3(rgyud): bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / smad pa'i rigs su skye ba sna tshogs de dag thams cad ston cing sprul/
376b4(rgyud): thabs kyang ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar bsams pa'i don de thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mngon sum du smra zhing thams cad gtam zer ro//
376b5(rgyud): gzhan yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna tshogs dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa de thams cad de la stsol bar bgyid de/ 'di lta ste/ nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / zhing smra ba
376b6(rgyud): dang / mig sman gyi dngos grub dang / mi sdang ba dang / mig 'phrul dang / gter smra ba dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang / spo ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / roladra
376b7(rgyud): bslang ba dang / nad zhi bar bya ba dang / gos 'thob pa dang / grong 'thob pa dang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dang / chu klung chen po brgal ba dang / dug bza' ba dang / gsang sngags sna tshogs
377a1(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / drang ba de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams cad/
377a2(rgyud): stsol bar bgyid do// de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// bsam pa dang / don du gnyer ba
377a3(rgyud): dang / yid la re ba'i dgos pa de thams cad shin tu ring po nas kyang don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings nas thams cad drangs te lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa mchog gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid thams cad
377a4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur te/ mi snang bar gyur/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams gang dang gang du mchi 'tshal ba de dang de thams cad du
377a5(rgyud): mchi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du gtso bor 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchod par 'gyur ro// ci ste rmi lam mthong bar 'tshal na gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas/ nyal kar 'phags pa spyan ras
377a6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la bdug spos su phul te nyal na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'i cha byang du mthong ba stsol cing / gang bsams pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba dang / gang dris pa de
377a7(rgyud): thams cad sba bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog stsol cing sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mdangs 'jug par 'gyur ro//
377b1(rgyud): tshangs pa dgug par 'tshal zhing mthong bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe shing arka'i 'o ma dang / gu gul dang / rgya skyegs ril bur bgyis pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ tsha pa la bdug spos su/
377b2(rgyud): phul na/ tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing mchog 'tshal ba thams cad rjes su stsol to// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar gyi tshangs pa'i gnas dang gzhal med khang mthong bar
377b3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi cha byad 'chang ba'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas thams cad du mes po yin no zhes tshig mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'dzam
377b4(rgyud): bu'i gling pa'i mi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs de thams cad thams cad du tshangs pa'o zhes
377b5(rgyud): sems par 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pas mchod pa'i sprin chen po bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas sred med kyi bu dbug par 'tshal na/ des lha'i gnas su sred med kyi bu'i
377b6(rgyud): gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du lte bar sbyin sreg gi cho ga ni gyi s+ye/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa/ shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsangs 'gos pa/ snum dang shing arka'i lam sreg
377b7(rgyud): shing gis me sbar ba la gu gul dang / yungs kar dang / sbrang rtsi dang gzhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis
378a1(rgyud): shing rig sngags 'chang la/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so zhes smra'o// sgrub pa dam pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs shing / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i
378a2(rgyud): chos lugs chen pos bkug na rig sngags 'chang ci zhig bya/ dgos pa ci zhig yod/ mchog ni ci zhig don du gnyer ba de smros shig dang / thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don
378a3(rgyud): gang yin yid la bsams te smras pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/ gzugs snga tshogs pa'i mchog kyang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchog gtso bo dang /
378a4(rgyud): dgos pa'i las sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des lha'i gnas su mchis pa
378a5(rgyud): la/ lha chen po'i mdun du gu gul dang / pad+ma'i phye ma dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro//
378a6(rgyud): dodedo nas nag po chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dur khrod du mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas pad+ma/
378a7(rgyud): gsar ba'i phye ma dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag dang / yungs kar dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba brgyad stong don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod kyis dur khrod kyi shing gi me la bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// ra khrag
378b1(rgyud): gi gtor ma dang / 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi lha bshos dang / me tog dmar po dbul bar bgyi'o// las 'di yongs su rdzogs par bgyis na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa mdur
378b2(rgyud): na mchis shing / rig sngags 'chang la legs so legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// sgrub pa'i cho ga babang po 'dis bdag yongs su mgus/ rig sngags
