378b3(rgyud): 'chang smos shig dang / mchog rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o// mchog 'dod pa thams cad rjes su long zhig dang / ji ltar yid la byed pa'i re ba de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o// khyod bsrung ba dang yongs su
378b4(rgyud): bskyang ba'i don du bdag rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bgyi'o// ji ltar bsams pa de mngon sum du smras na/ gang don du gnyer/
378b5(rgyud): ba de thams cad 'thob cing thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam la sogs pas las thams cad bgyid cing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//
378b6(rgyud): rtag tu lta zhing spyir thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang / las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas
378b7(rgyud): te/ las thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par mi bgyid do// thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ci ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can
379a1(rgyud): ma dgug par 'tshal na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas shin tu dri zhim po'i dris lus lhag par bsgos la/ gang na me tog gi/
379a2(rgyud): shing ljon pa mchis pa der mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshe sa bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas shin tu dri zhim po'i dri'i shing gis me sbar ba la/ pu shel ci dang / ta ka ra dang / spang spos dang / yungs
379a3(rgyud): kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad dkyi'o/ gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / can dan gyi chus bsgos pa'i 'bras yos dang / me tog gis bkang ba'i mchod yon gyi sdod
379a4(rgyud): bum pa gsar ba brgyad sul lo// dkar gsum gyi gtor las bkang ba ga pur gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ba'i bum pa gsum stsal lo// me tog shin tu dri zhim po srul bar bgyi zhing/ gla rdze dang / tsan dan dang /
379a5(rgyud): ga pur dang / kun tu ru'i bdug spos sul bar bgyi'o// de nas las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma bzang mo de lha'i gzhal med khang du mchis shing mdun na mchis te/ de mthong nas ma 'am/
379a6(rgyud): sring mo 'am/ chung ma 'am/ las byed pa 'am/ mngag gzhug ma 'am/ pho nya mo rnam pa ji lta bur ji ltar tshig tu brjod pa de la smros shig dang / ci ste mar gyur na de'i tshe bu bzhin du snying nas yongs su skyong bar
379a7(rgyud): byed do// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyeg dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lbab lbub dang / mal chas yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// ci ste sring mor gyur na de'i tshe longs spyod thams cad kyis yongs su
379b1(rgyud): skyong bar bgyid do// ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i bud med dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol nas kyang bkug ste/ yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir yongs su spyod par bgyid cing / phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar/
379b2(rgyud): bgyid do// ci kye chung mar gyur na de dang lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dam pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ste/ lho rdzas kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do// rob
379b3(rgyud): ba'i mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do// mchog tu dga' ba'i rtse mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod par bgyid do// lha rdzas
379b4(rgyud): kyi dri dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba yongs su/
379b5(rgyud): gang zhing mchis par 'gyur ro// nor bu dang / gser dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUrma dang / gser phye dang / shang ka shi la dang / b+hu ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul sgyogs dpag tu med pa thob
379b6(rgyud): pa'i gter stsol bar bgyid do// rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / phyugs dang / bran po dang / bran mo rab tu mang po mang por 'phel zhing mchis par 'gyur ro// mal cha'i longs spyod sna tshogs stsol
379b7(rgyud): bar bgyid do// lha rdzas kyi chung ma'i longs spyod bud med gzugs sna tshogs pa'i 'khor brgya dang ldan pa nyin gcig bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pas ji srid/
380a1(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// rig snga grangs shis bag yod par bgyi ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa dang / 'phags pa
380a2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'dzin la mchog tu gus par bgyi'o// rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi zhing / sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o//
380a3(rgyud): gzhan du mi smra bar bgyi'o// gal te las byed par gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyi ba bzhin du las thams cad bgyid de/ shin tu yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du las la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// ci ste
380a4(rgyud): mngag gzhug mar gyur na gnas gang du mngags pa de'i gnas thams cad du mchi ste/ dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing / skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o// thams cad du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid// 'dren/
380a5(rgyud): par bgyid do// dpag tshad stong gi pha rol nas bud med 'gugs par bgyid cing / nor dang / 'bru dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / rta dag 'gugs par bgyid do// slar yang gtong bar bgyid do// bag yod
380a6(rgyud): pas bsgo bar bgyi ste/ bdag nyid shin tu ring po'i yul dang gnas su 'phen par bgyid/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'deg par bgyid de/ der srog gi
380a7(rgyud): bar chad du mi 'gyur bar bgyid do// ci ste pho nya mor gyur na phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lha'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// klu'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi'o// nam mkha' rdzi
380b1(rgyud): gi gnas su mchi'o// mi 'am ci'i gnas su mchi'o// lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su mchi'o// gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas su mchi'o// 'byung po'i gnas su mchi zhing thams cad du po nya'i bya ba bgyis
380b2(rgyud): nas slar mchi'o// skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du mchi zhing slar mchi'o// skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du phyin nas pho nya'i bya ba bgyid do// ji srid sa'i 'og gi
380b3(rgyud): bar du 'jug cing phyir yang mchi'o// bya ba shin tu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bag yod pas kyang las thams cad bgyi ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du mchod yon dang / rkang pa bkru ba stsal bar
380b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du phyin cing bya ba 'grub pa bla na ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des gzhan gyis ma reg pa'i shing leb
380b5(rgyud): gsar pa la gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi zhing / gnas dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu
380b6(rgyud): khrus bgyis pas gaus gtsang ma bgos pas 'o ma dang 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi gtor ma srul bar bgyi'o// shing ka ra wI ra'i me sbar ba la/ yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag dang
380b7(rgyud): zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / me tog dmar po stsal na gnod sbyin mo de'ang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang
381a1(rgyud): slongs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis khyod nga'i ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa yin no// nga'i las thams cad byed pa yin no// nga la dbyig mang po byin cig ces
381a2(rgyud): brjod par bgyi'o// de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo de ltar legs so zhes smras nas mi sdang bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe yungs kar dang gu gul la yongs su bzlas nas mer
381a3(rgyud): gtor na de mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad dgyid par 'gyur/ dbyig stong stsol bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur/ rtag tu ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas
381a4(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des spra tshil las lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang /
381a5(rgyud): dben pa dang / sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad par bgyis la/ de'i mdun du
381a6(rgyud): skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos sul cing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu bzlas brjod yungs kar la bzlas pas bu mo de la lan stong
381a7(rgyud): brgyad brdeg par bgyi'o// las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang der dgos pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro//
381b1(rgyud): de'i las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ thams cad du bachi bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// ci ste srin po dang srin mo dgug par 'tshal na gu gul dang ba glang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres/
381b2(rgyud): pa la don yod pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas/ dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs na srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te/ srin po dang srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas
381b3(rgyud): te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// gdugs gcig bzhin du dngul srang khri stsol bar bgyid do// de nas
381b4(rgyud): rig sngags gis cha gsum du dbye bar bgyi ste/ gcig ni dkon mchog la mchod par bgyi'o// cha gnyis pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin par gtang ngo // srin po rnams la zan dang tshod sngon rlon pa'i gtor ma stsal
381b5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyur ro// de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu mgyogs par 'gyur te/ shugs chen pos dgos pa thams cad sgrub cing nam yang gzhan
381b6(rgyud): du bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gtor ma gtsang ma stsal bar bgyi'o// ci ste sha za dang sha za mo dgug par 'tshal na ba lang gi mkhris pa dang / de'i so dang / gu gul dang / shing arka'i 'o ma sbyar te lam gyi
381b7(rgyud): bzhi mdor bdug par bgyi zhing / lhag ma dang 'bags pa'i gtor ma stsa la na/ sha za mo de mchi zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur/ las thams cad
382a1(rgyud): 'byed par 'gyur ro// dpag chad stong ga pha rol tu ma ba zhig skad cig gis srung sang mchi'o// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyid do// dus gsum du gdo ma skrag pa'i gtong sa
382a2(rgyud): sgo drung du stsal bar bgyi'o// nyin gcig bzhin du gser gyi dong tshe brgya sngas su 'jog par 'gyur te/ des thams cad zad par bgyis ni phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ci ste rgyal po'i btsun mo dgug
382a3(rgyud): par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des yungs kar dkar po dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / gi'u wang dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / rgya ma tshwa dang / lan tshwa bsres
382a4(rgyud): pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas phye ma'i rdzas su bgyis la/ yungs kar dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi'i sa bon lan cig mnyes la/ yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
382a5(rgyud): te/ rgyal po'i sgo 'am/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ lam po che 'am/ grong khyer gyi sgor gtor na gang der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do// rgyal po btsun mo'i
382a6(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa bkug cing dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad du ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang bslangs pa de ster te/ dngul dang / gser dang / gos dang
382a7(rgyud): rgyan dang / lha lhub dang / srung ba dang / banon pa dang / mal cha dang / 'bru la sogs pa stsol bar bgyid do// gang smras pa de bgyid cing gang bsgo ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de'i yul gcig tu la
382b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad du dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas bram ze dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang nges nas dang / til dang //
382b2(rgyud): 'bras sA lu dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyes na/ rig byed pa'i dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyur ro//
382b3(rgyud): cad du mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing / bram ze thams cad la dbang bgyid pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na ti la dang / 'bras thug chen po dang / sran mud ga dang /
382b4(rgyud): zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bgyis na thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// thams cad dbang du 'gyur bar
382b5(rgyud): bgyid do// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bgyid de/ ci bgyi ba bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas dmangs rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na lan tshwa dang / 'bras sA lu'i phub ma dang / su mu kha'i sa bon
382b6(rgyud): dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyis na dmangs rigs thams cad bran du gyur nas gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang
382b7(rgyud): pas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des shing mngar gyi shing gi me sbar ba la sa bon bdun dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o// brgya
383a1(rgyud): #stong rdzogs pa dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / pas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na shing tsher ma can gyi/
383a2(rgyud): me sbar ba la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par
383a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa bzlog par 'tshal na ske tsho'i sa ben dang gu gul dang / b+hang ga'i sa ban dang / zho ga chu dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyis na g.yul 'gyed pa'o//
383a4(rgyud): nang du son pa'i sems can thams cad slar bzlog par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gdon thams cad las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des
383a5(rgyud): bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bgyid par 'tshal te/ k+She ma ka dang shing mngar dang // tsa rong dang ni gu gul dang / mu ra yak+Sha mur dang / b+hu te ka shrI mnyam par gzhal// phub ma dang ni ba li ka/ khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun
383a6(rgyud): ljags pa dang // sbrul lpags dang ni yungs rnam gnyis// b+haM ga'i sa bon pa lang mkhris/ nya dang legs par sbyar bgyis te ka ra yi gcin gyis bsgos pa la/ lcags kyu'i gsang sngags bzlas pa
383a7(rgyud): yis// bdug pa dam pa'i gtso bo 'di// thams cad du ni rigs pa ste// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gdon// gang dag sa steng gnas pa rnams// bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing /
383b1(rgyud): mi bzad gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // sum cu'i lha dang ri rab g.yo// gnod sbyin srin po'i gnas dag dang // sdang ba'i srog chags chen po
383b2(rgyud): 'tshig/ gzhan yang sna tshogs drug bcas pa'i// srog chags thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba// ji tsam gyis ni dog pa medo// bdug pa 'dis ni bdug byas na// der ni rims nad mi gnas/
383b3(rgyud): nyin gcig pa yi rims dang ni// nyan gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rims// gang yang mi bzad khyab 'jug rims// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing // skad cig gis ni gtan nas 'joms//
383b4(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu gsum pa// de nas mig bsdu ba'i sman brjod par bya ste/ gdon tham/
383b5(rgyud): cad 'joms pa gang gis mig la bskus pa tsam gyis gdon ma rungs pa 'bros par 'gyur ro// ro stod kyi nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur te/ mig la bslus pa tsam gyis de thams cad med par
383b6(rgyud): gyur te dogs pa mi bya'o// mig gi nad ni ling tog dang / skya bor gyur pa dang / rab rib dang / chu bur can dang / chu zag pa dang / tshag po dang / haM sa ra dza dang / byis pa'i mchi ma dang / mig tu sme ba byung
383b7(rgyud): ba dang / zag dang / rlung dang / ba da kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / 'brum bu dang / g.ya' ba dang / mig bskams pa dang / mdongs pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / klad pa'i gzhogs
384a1(rgyud): phyed na pa dang / kha nad dang / kha na pa dang / dpral ba na ba de dag thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// mig sman gyis mi bskus pa tsam gyis rims thams cad rab tu
384a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / nad thams cad sel ba dang / mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// de ltar na mig sman mchog tu grub pa/ bgegs thams
384a3(rgyud): cad sel ba dang ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad la dbang byed pa/ thams cad du rgyal bar byed pa/ mig sman rtag tu mchog tu dkon pa// gsad pa la thug pa
384a4(rgyud): thar bar byed pa/ btson ra nas gang thar par byed pa/ rgyal po dag gang la khros pa las dgod cing smra bar 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu bu bzhin yongs su skyong zhing gnas pa/ dug thams
384a5(rgyud): cad mod la med par byed pa ni mig sman mchog yin no// bsam pa ngan cing sdang ba'i sems can dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / 'gyed pa dag mig sman gyis bskus pas/
384a6(rgyud): mthong na dbang du 'gyur te gnas so// ma he gtum po dang / glang po che dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / kha mthon po nas ga yang du ltung ba dang / me'i phung po chen po dang / khyim rdib pa dang / g.yang sa
384a7(rgyud): srubyung ba rnams mig sman gyis mig bsdus pas mthong na zhi bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ 'di la dogs par mi bya'o// lung ba dang / skyer ba dang / na le shas dang /
384b1(rgyud): bi pi ling dang / shi ring ga be ra dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / ldong ros dang / gur kum la sogs pa'i mig sman dang / rgya mtshwa dang / spangs spos dang / rgya mtsho'i lbu ba
384b2(rgyud): dang / dung bye dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mor byas pa la gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te ga pur dang / gla rtsir bsnan pa'i mig bsku ba'i sman lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i
384b3(rgyud): gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ migo la bskus na dri ma thams cad sel cing sdig pa dang gzhan sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// mun pa thams cad
384b4(rgyud): kyi nang du nyi ma bzhin du skye bo thams cad kyi nang du mdzes par 'gyur ro// de nas ril bu bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa/ nad thams cad sel bar 'grub pa//
384b5(rgyud): bgegs thams cad med par byed pa/ gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ mod la dug thams cad med par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams
384b6(rgyud): cad sel ba/ bcings pa thams cad gcod par byed pa/ g.yul thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag tu dug thams cad 'joms pa/
384b7(rgyud): rgyal po'i sgor mdzes par 'gyur ba/ nor dang 'bru 'phol bar 'gyur ba/ rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu dang / mi dang / dug dang / glang po che med par byed pa/ sbrul ma rungs pa dang / byi ba'i dug gis 'jig
385a1(rgyud): ba dang / khyim 'jig pa dang / ri nyil ba dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom la sogs pa rab tu rgyu ba dang / gnod pa dang bcings pa'i tshe 'gro bar dka' ba 'byung ba dang /
385a2(rgyud): nad dang rims 'joms pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par byed pa// tshe dang nad med par byed pa 'phel ba/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu ma rnams mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba ste// /
385a3(rgyud): gang gis ril bu bcangs na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing gdon 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rnam par log 'dren gyis ma yin no// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjod
385a4(rgyud): byed ma rungs pa rnams ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'dir byis pa gsod par mi byed do// sman 'di la reg pa tsam gyis khyim der dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
385a5(rgyud): na ba thams cad dang / nad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / 'brum phran mched pa dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu
385a6(rgyud): mched pa dang / sha bkra la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro// lus thams cad du zhugs pa'i nad la chu dron po dang 'thungs pa tsam la sogs pas yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jim
385a7(rgyud): skrag pa thams cad las rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa chen po las thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du song ba la sbyar ba byas na thams cad du
385b1(rgyud): mkho bar 'gyur ro// de nas rdzas su bya ba ni bu shel tsi dang / tsan dan dang / rmya spos dang / ru rta dang / rdo rjeg dang / pad tra dang / tsha ma ka dang / sha mi dang / pad+ma ba tra dang / ut+pa la dang /
385b2(rgyud): na la dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sug spel dang / btsod dang / su ga ri dang / ra dza N+ya rnam gnyis dang / spri ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gur kum la sogs pa dang rab tu ldan
385b3(rgyud): ba dang / de dag kun bsres te zhib mor btags la kha ra dang chu dang sbyar bas ril bu byas la/ gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te grib ma la bskams pa de ni sman grub pa yin te/
385b4(rgyud): thams cad rgyal bar byed cing dge ba yin no// rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la ri lu mchog bskus te gnas mthon por song ste/ dung gi sgra dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga sgra ji srid du thos pa de srid tsam du
385b5(rgyud): 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// dug dang bcas pa ni thams cad dug med par 'gyur te dogs pa mi bya'o// nad thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / lo nyes tham/
385b6(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde ba zhing lo legs pa nyid 'du 'gyur ro// gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems can sdig pa can dmyal ba la gzhol ba dag gis sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa
385b7(rgyud): thams cad byang ste/ bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// gos la bdugs na bdag nyid mchod pa chen po 'thob cing thams cad la dbang byed par gnas pa dang / don
386a1(rgyud): grub pa bla na med pa yin no// nor dang 'bru rab tu 'brel zhing dgos pa sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no// thams cad mchod pa dang rtag tu tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur ro//
386a2(rgyud): rgyal po gang la khros pa las rgod cing smra bar 'gyur ro// bud med rnams kyi gnang chen du 'gyur zhing rtag tu nad med par 'gyur ro// rtag tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang //
386a3(rgyud): rtag tu dpal dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / shi nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// / byang chub sems dpa' sems
386a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya
386a5(rgyud): ba don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs chen po'i cho ga nib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang / sgrub pa dang / bklags pas 'grub/
386a6(rgyud): pa/ don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi dam grub pa lags so// gang gis pad+ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag dang
386a7(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / bde bar sgrub pa mtha' dag ni rigs kyi spyi thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rjes su 'jug pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lags so// /
386b1(rgyud): sta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po mchog dang po rdo rje rin po che rtse mo'i
386b2(rgyud): mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la thams cad du rjes su zhugs shing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba de rig sngags 'chang ba de
386b3(rgyud): thams cad mchog tu grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrags par
386b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o// grub pa yang
386b5(rgyud): dag pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
386b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing shin tu yongs su dag pa yin te/ legs so legs so// rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can tham cad/
386b7(rgyud): dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bstan par bya shod cig/ de bzhin gshe/
387a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i grub pa dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so// ngas kyang de bzhin du de dag byin/
387a2(rgyud): gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa'i rgyas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i dkyil
387a3(rgyud): 'khor chen po bshad pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i yang dag pa mchog grub pa/ sgrub pa dam pa ni sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya ba ni shin tu mdzes pa shin tu 'jam por
387a4(rgyud): bya'o// tshon sna lngas rnam par dbye ba ni grwa dang bcas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o// tshon sna tshogs kyis bri ba dang dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig gdab pa ni mnyam par thig gis dbye bar bya ste/ sgo
387a5(rgyud): bzhir cha dbye bar bya'o// chu zheng du khru bzhi'i ched tsam du dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po ni tshad khru do par byas la tshon sna lnga'i sgal bu dang tshon sa las dbye bar bya'o// dbus
387a6(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la pad+ma dkar po kha bye ba zlum por bya'o// pad+ma kha bye ba'i dbus su zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / pad+ma gnas par bya ba ni klu mgo'i gdengs ka 'dra ba lcags kyu/
387a7(rgyud): dang bcas pa dang / lag pa dang bcas pas pad+mo'i lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang / 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o// tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o// pad+ma kha phye ba'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni lcags kyu dang sa
387b1(rgyud): pa'i skal bur bya'o// nang dang phyi'i bar du ni rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o// lcags kyu'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o// zla ba yid du 'ong badz+ra/
387b2(rgyud): ma med pa'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni phyag rgya phyag na thogs par bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs dang me tog
387b3(rgyud): rnams so// kun la 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba dang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bri bar bya'o// phyag gi phyag rgya'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni sdigs bu dang 'dra bar bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi skal duH
387b4(rgyud): 'khor bar lcags kyu bri bar bya'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa ni rgyal po chen po bzhi go bgos pa/ lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ rgyan thams
387b5(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te pad+mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tho ga thag tu 'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad+ma la 'dug pa bri
387b6(rgyud): bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral pa gcig ma/ nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ byang du pho nya mo dang rig sngags kyi lha mo/
387b7(rgyud): rnams bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi skal bu ni me tog gi stegs bu 'dra bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni kun tu ba'i lci bas bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de la nas byed
388a1(rgyud): pad+ma bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba dang / dar btags pa'i mda' dang / dri'i snod bkang bas brgyan cing byug pa'i chu dgang ba dang / bdug spos kyi snod/
388a2(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyad pa dang / dri chab dang / mchod yon gyi cha ba dang / 'bras bu dang / yon chab dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me
388a3(rgyud): tog gis 'jigs pa med par brgyan par bya'o// mu tig dang / byu ru dang / rin po che bai DUR+Ya sngon po dang / mar gad dang / pad+ma rA ga rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan to// dkyil 'khor kun tu dung
388a4(rgyud): dang / bil ba dang / rtswa dar b+ha dang / kaser dang / dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang / sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyi
388a5(rgyud): bum pa dar gyis brgyan te gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa dang / bum bu dang khyam bum dang / bum pa dang / rte gu dang / kham por dang /
388a6(rgyud): bum pa gang ba rnams byas te gzhag go/ pog por dang / gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang // me tog sna tshogs bkram par bya// 'phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya// tshon sna tshogs lnga pa'i ba dan gdags
388a7(rgyud): tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu seng ldeng gi phur pa la btags pa gzugs par bya'o// kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang mar me'i sdong po bzhi'ang de bzhin no// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni
388b1(rgyud): a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du rus ka dang / s+thi ka rnams kyi bdug pa ga pur dang gla rtsis bskos pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug pa ni gu gul dang / sa la li ka dang / kun tu ru'i bdug pa
388b2(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas gos gsar pa bgos te gtsang mar byas nas maN+Dal gyi las su bya ba'i cho ga dang / lcags kyu'i rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang / slob ma
388b3(rgyud): gzhug cing dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod cing don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen mo ni
388b4(rgyud): thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang /
388b5(rgyud): bskor ba dang / de dag thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// sbyin sreg dang bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang /
388b6(rgyud): de bzhin du yang dag par sprul pa dang / las thams cad la rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du sbyar ba myur zhing rdzogs par 'chang zhing / des na grub pa bla na med par 'gyur ro// bgrang 'phreng dang //
388b7(rgyud): khrig ma'i gdu bu dang / srad bu se ral kha gtsang ma dang / rtswa dar b+ha dang / yungs kar dang / chu dang bsro ba dang / rtswa dang b+ha'i stan la mchod phyir thogs te skyil mo krung bcas nas las bya zhing / pad+ma dang
389a1(rgyud): mchod yon gyis dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang / de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dus thams cad du nges par bya'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya ste/ grub pa mchog
389a2(rgyud): dang / las thams cad sgrub pa dang / gang dang gang dgos pa la dran par bya'o// gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gshegs su gsol lo// gsang sngags gzhan dang bsre bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya dang gsang
389a3(rgyud): sngags 'di ni dpa' bo gcig tu bklags pas grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
389a4(rgyud): dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni sdig pa thams
389a5(rgyud): cad rnam par 'dag cing // slob pa dang sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa sngar bsags pa rnams rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu
389a6(rgyud): 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang / shi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du song ste/ pad+ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar rdzus te skye ba dang / kha ton byed na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig 'chad pa ni
389a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dug cing gang 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing
389b1(rgyud): spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun tu bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// 'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar dang / byang chub
389b2(rgyud): kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du yin gyi/ gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing / bla ma dang / chos can dang / nor gyis mchod pa dang / sems can kun gyis mchod
389b3(rgyud): bar 'os pa ni ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel ba dang / gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / rgyal po dang btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod ces
389b4(rgyud): bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang /
389b5(rgyud): sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / byams par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis lus can shin tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mchod
389b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sdug cing bzang ba mchog tu blta bar 'os par 'gyur ro// dpal gyis dus rtag tu/
389b7(rgyud): 'bar zhing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung nas dge
390a1(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig zhugs pa tsam dang / dkyil 'khor
390a2(rgyud): lta bu la me tog gcig dbul ba dang / ril bu gcig tsam gyi bdug pa 'bul ba'i sems can de dag ni gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog
390a3(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bus dgu pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sna tshogs kyis
390a4(rgyud): mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// bdug pa mang po rnam par phye ba'i sprin las tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang go shir shi'i bdug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin
390a5(rgyud): rin par phye ba rab tu 'khrigs par 'gyur ro// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba rab tu sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de bzhin gshes/
390a6(rgyud): pa rnams la mchod pa 'di ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no// de dag gis me tog dang bdug pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
390a7(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mthong
390b1(rgyud): bar bzhed par 'gyur ro// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzhin 'dzum par 'gyur ro//
390b2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams srung ba dang / sred pa dang / skyob pa'i phyir rjes su
390b3(rgyud): 'brang ba chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems shing mchod rten ring bsre
390b4(rgyud): can du 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag de la lta ba'i phyir song ba'i sems can de dag sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / rims dang /
390b5(rgyud): mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro// nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyi tha
390b6(rgyud): mar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad las phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las thar par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro//
390b7(rgyud): 'di nas shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// tha na ri dgas dang bya dag gnas te phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang / de'i sngon gyi tshe la yongs su bsags
391a1(rgyud): pade dag lcags ma lus par yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mtha' byung chub /
391a2(rgyud): la thug gi bar du'o// de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bya ste/ gnas thams cad du bla na med pa 'grub pa ni sdig pa thams cad mod la sreg par byed pa dang / nyon mongs
391a3(rgyud): pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de bzhin du nad thams cad sel ba/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gang
391a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por kun tu lung bstan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon pa/ yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ bkra shis thams cad sgrub pa kha sod
391a5(rgyud): nams thams cad sogs pa/ myur du nor dang 'bru sbyin pa mdzad pa/ sgrub pa yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'grub pa/ bzlas brjod 'grub pa/ yid la re ba thams cad mongs
391a6(rgyud): su rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod nams chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// nam byang chub yang dag par 'thob kyi bar du dge
391a7(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho 'phrul chen po'i ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba la sogs pa ni phyis ngan 'gro'i gnas su mi 'gro zhing / sdig pa'i las
391b1(rgyud): kyis mi gos pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song las thar par 'gyur ba dang / dmyal ba mi bzad pa rnam
391b2(rgyud): las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kun tu bde ba dang / da ltar gyi 'di la mchog tu dgon pa'i bde ba lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// bkren pa'ang longs spyod dang phyug po mtshungs pa med pa mchog
391b3(rgyud): mod la thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro// 'khor bzang po bdog par 'gyur ro// rgyal po rnams kyis bla mar bya zhing / rtag tu dus thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro//
391b4(rgyud): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa rnams rtag tu dbang du bya ste/ 'dug cing thams cad bsnyen bkur byed cing 'jug pa
391b5(rgyud): ni ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa bla na med pa yin no// ras gru bzhi khyod kun khru gang ngam/ khru do pa la legs par btags pa/ ras 'jam po thag ran bzang po mnyen po shin tu dag par
391b6(rgyud): bkrus pa gtsang mar byas pa 'am/ yang na dar yug gam/ yang na man dar ram/ shun phrags la zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga tshang ba'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa bri bar bya'o// snod gtsang
391b7(rgyud): ma gsar pa'i nang du tshon lhag ma ma yin pa blugs te/ ras kyi sku gzugs gsal bar bri ba ni tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye bar bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
392a1(rgyud): mgon po bri ba ni skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mchog tu bzang ba/ zhal dang po ni mdzes shing sdug pa/ dbu lcang lo dang thor tsugs kyis
392a2(rgyud): brgyan pa gcod pan la 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o// me tog gi 'phreng ba bcings par bya'o// 'phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag med bya'o// cod pan la zla ba byed pa dang 'od 'dom
392a3(rgyud): gang ba bya'o// kun tu lcags kyu bya'o// kun tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba bya'o// phyag bzhi la phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i lcags kyu/ g.yas na mdung rtse gsum pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yon gcig na don yod pa'i
392a4(rgyud): zhags pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o// gdan seng ge'i pad+mo bya'o// g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o// g.yas su dkar mo ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/
392a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing
392a6(rgyud): lcug phran dang / yal gdang chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbas par bya'o// ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / shing shang te'u dang / rma bya dang / byaM ka la bing ka rin po che'i gseb na rgyu bar bya'o// shing
392a7(rgyud): gi gong spyi bo la khang bu brtsegs ma dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdon
392b1(rgyud): du srin mo ngal pa gcig ma bya'o// g.yas su lag na rdo rje khros pa'i gad mo 'byin pa'i gzugs mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra rkyen du brdzes pa/ spang lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gsor ba/
392b2(rgyud): nam mkha' la blta bar bya'o// slad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon du dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// gong du dbang po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu bcom
392b3(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yas phyogs su tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yon du dga' bo dang / bsnyen
392b4(rgyud): dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung ngu bus mo//
392b5(rgyud): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang / pog por dang / bgrang 'phreng lag na thogs pa bya'o// phyogs bzhi ngos kun tu ris bskor ba la ri dgas kyi tshogs sna
392b6(rgyud): tshogs kyis gang ba/ shing sna tshogs me tog dang lcug ma can bya'o// rdzing bu chu zag pa bya'o// 'bras bu sna tshogs can gyi shing dang lcug ma bya'o// gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang / grul bum gyi
392b7(rgyud): shing bya'o// tshul de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la bris te gnas gtsang ma dben par bzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos mchod par bya'o// a ka ru sa dang / du rus ka dang /
393a1(rgyud): tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o// nyi ma re rer ras la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam
393a2(rgyud): gyis mod la mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang / 'jig
393a3(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad yongs su zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar/
393a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gzungs grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po rnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi
393a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis rgyun du bsrungs shing rjes su bzung
393a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o//
393a7(rgyud): gang zhig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba byed pa dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu
393b1(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi ning la mchod par 'gyur ro/ dedas rang gis sa rgyas kyi zhing narab tu zhugs pa 'di zhi na dge su dag 'i sod pakyi su na po la su bzung bar/
393b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dge ba bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/
393b3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
393b4(rgyud): gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par gyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar bgyi ba'i bya
393b5(rgyud): don yod pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rig
393b6(rgyud): sngags 'chang thams cad kyi khro bo chen po'i las grub pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa dang yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa/ brtson pa med pa dang / brtse
393b7(rgyud): ba'i bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad thag
394a1(rgyud): 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rab tu dul bar mdzad pa/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang phung bar byed pa/ sems
394a2(rgyud): can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang / gcod pa dang / rab tu 'bigs pa dang / rdung ba dang / gtor ba dang / lus rnam par zhig par byed pa de ni/
394a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis pad+mo rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don
394a4(rgyud): yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad du srung bar byed pa/ 'chos par byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzin pa/ gnas thams cad la rjes su skyong ba ste/ don sgrug
394a5(rgyud): par byed pa/ sgrub pa 'grub par byed pa'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su gnang ba mdzod
394a6(rgyud): cig dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o//
394a7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras
394b1(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang phyug phyag rgya chen po sa phyag rgyas btab ste ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas/
394b2(rgyud): gtab cing byin gyis brlabs kyis/ smos shig/ gsang ba pa lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i snying po thams cad dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham
394b3(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba smos shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su
394b4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i go skabs dang mchog grub par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bas
394b5(rgyud): zhing dbugs phyung ba thos nas snying dga'/ smin ma bskums/ dpral ba phyed khros par byas/ gdong khro gnyer du byas/ mche ba ni gtsigs/ spyan ras gzigs kyi lus 'khor mang po'i nang du
394b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras pa/ dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
394b7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang /
395a1(rgyud): 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// shA ra/
395a2(rgyud): dra ti'i bu blo gros can la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la phyag
395a3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal
395a4(rgyud): po chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag
395a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM bi kr-i ta/ ba da na ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA ba yaM ka ra/ ma hA b+haiSh+Ta/ aT Ta hA sa na/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA dzA la/ mA la ma hA r-i rba/ rU pa b+ha yaM ka ran/ ha na he na/ sarba duSh+TA ga/ yak+Sha rAk+Sha
395a6(rgyud): san/ da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ nA gA nAn/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba duSh+TaH/ big+h+na/ bi nA ya kAn/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta satwA nAM/ b+ho b+ho ma hA kro d+ha rA dza/ ma Ni ka na ka badz+ra/ bai nuR+Ya/ a lang kr-i ti sha rI ran/
395a7(rgyud): badz+ra pa ra shu bA sha ha s+thA ya/ ma hA pad+ma/ aM ku sha b+hu dzA ya/ ma hA pad+ma A sa nA ya/ ma hA pad+ma bi ka tsa gar+b+hA ya/ a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ sa ha sra/ bi d+yA ya/ sarba b+hU ta/ b+ha yaM ka rA ya/ san/
395b1(rgyud): deb b+ha ba ma ka ma pa ud d+ya bA ya/ ma hA ba kr-i ta/ ba da rA yA/ nA ra sa ha mu khA ya/ d+ha rad+ha ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ be ga d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ tsa tsar/ ni shA tsar/ I shwa ra/ mr-i ku rbima?/
395b2(rgyud): ga ts+tsha hUM phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa rapra sa ra/ sarba pA ba/ kil+li Sha ha ra/ ma hA ma no/ te dza d+ha ra/ pip+pa hasta/ oM bad+da a~M ku sha/ b+hu dzo/ ta rA ya/ man+ta ma ya/ big+h+nAM/ shA sa ya/ duSh+TA na/ nA sha ya/ @
395b3(rgyud): ba ba ra Na/ hUM phaT swA hA khA sha hastA ya swA hA/ bad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ sa mA shA sa kA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha b+ha ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha ra dza b+ha yaM ka rA ya sA hA ke prah+ma be Sha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ trai likya pU dza tA ya swAhA/
395b4(rgyud): ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be re/ na maHkr-i tA le sAhA/ badz+ra d+ha ra pU dzi tA ya swAhA/ ma hA kA la ma tri ga Na/ ban di ta/ pU dzi tA ye swAhA/ de ba ga Na/ ban di tA ye swA hA/ nA ga A kaR+Sha ya swe hA/ oM b+ha re b+ha ra/ d+hi ra~M b+hai ri/
395b5(rgyud): b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba maN+Da la a d+hiSh+Thi ta sa ma ya swAhA/ sarba mu drA a d+hiSh+NI ta mu dzA ya swAhA/ oM a mo g+ha ba ra de/ ma hA daSh+Te/ a~M ku sha badz+re hUM/ ma hA pad+ma/ A shwa sa d+ha re/ ma mo stu te/ a mo gyi a~M ku
395b6(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang / ri rab dang bcas pa'o rgya mtsho gnas dang bcas pa dang / gzhal med khang rnams kun tu 'gul lo//
395b7(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// ma rungs pa'i klu dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad dang / bdud la
396a1(rgyud): sogs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa rnams kha sbub tu 'gyel lo// ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim kun tu tshig ste 'bar ba/ kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/
396a2(rgyud): 'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa dang / ngu zhing 'dre ldog ste/ tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo // lha thams cad shin tu 'khrugs shing skrag go/ bdud kyi rigs rnams bred nas khas btag
396a3(rgyud): so// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kun tu 'khrugs so// rgya mtshon gnas pa'i klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dag kyang kun tu 'khrugs shing shin tu skrag ste snying
396a4(rgyud): 'dar ro// gzhan yang sa'i steng na klu stong phrag brgya gnas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i chu'i nang gi klu gang dag dang / ril gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun tu 'khrugs shing skrag ste gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing /
396a5(rgyud): gdungs so// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na'ang skrag go/ nag po chen po dang / tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba de dag thams cad skrag cing snying 'dar ro//
396a6(rgyud): gnas la brten pa'i bdud kyi gnas rnams 'dar ro// 'bar kun tu 'bar te gnas dang bcas par sreg go/ de nas 'khor de'i nang gi lha dang klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas bcom
396a7(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro// lha rdzas kyi rgyan spud pa sna tshogs dang chos gos kyi char pa 'bebs so// mchod pa'i las byed cing tsan dan gyi chu'i char pas sa la
396b1(rgyud): chag chag 'debs so// wa rdzas kyi gser dang dngul gyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rje dpon chen po byan/
396b2(rgyud): na rdo rje lus 'bar zhing rdo rje gsor te/ shin tu 'gying pag tu seng ge'i 'gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song
396b3(rgyud): stenye bar phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog
396b4(rgyud): gi rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i 'phreng ba bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma la phul te/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri mi med pa'i me tog gi 'breng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'di dbu la longs spyod
396b5(rgyud): pa'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thugs rje chen pos bzhes su gsol/ gang gis bdag yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba lags so// khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad
396b6(rgyud): cing gang dran pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung
396b7(rgyud): bo dang / sha za ma rungs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang bcas te lus kun tu tshig cing rab tu 'bar nas kha sbub tu 'gyel cing sreg go/ shi la thug pa dang srog bskams par 'gyur/
397a1(rgyud): ba'i don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po ni dus thams cad du mgo'i spyi bor blangs par bgyi'o// bcang ngo // skom mo// mchod do// rgyas par bgyi'o// rig sngags
397a2(rgyud): 'chang gang gi lag na khro bo'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang //
397a3(rgyud): rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi lag na thogs pa 'am/ lus la thogs pa'am/ lta ba 'am/ dri ba 'am/ tha na khro bo'i rgyal po nyan bcom de'ang bcom ldan 'das bdag gi/
397a4(rgyud): khur du bskur bar bgyi'o// spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsam pa dang yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// grub pa chen po'i
397a5(rgyud): chen po rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / ma rungs pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba
397a6(rgyud): dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel cing phun sum tshogs par yongs su
397a7(rgyud): bskyang bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzi brjid bskyed cing bsod nams dang ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o// dgra thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// nor dang / 'bru dang
397b1(rgyud): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// bu gcig pa 'dra bar rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o// dad pa dang gus pas dus kun tu mchog tu mos par bgyi'o//
397b2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces lag na rdo rje khyod kyis khas blangs
397b3(rgyud): pa mchog tu bzang po byas pa 'di legs so legs so zhes smras te/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi 'phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa blangs te//
397b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir//
397b5(rgyud): dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am tsi dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gang yin pa 'dir
397b6(rgyud): 'jug cing dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gong du gtor ro// de nas 'phreng ba de nam mkha' de la gtor ma thag tu
397b7(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i steng du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog de khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ 'od 'tsher ba/ ka ba bzhi dang sgo bzhi
398a1(rgyud): legs par rnam par 'byes pa// grub ni lham pa/ chu zheng shin tu rgya che ba/ shin tu nang yangs pa/ me tog kang lca dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal med khang sna tshogs yongs su/
398a2(rgyud): gyur te gnas so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dbu'i steng thad kar yang de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang du
398a3(rgyud): shin tu gnas so// de lag na rdo rje'i dbu'i steng gi thad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs par shin tu nas so// de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
398a4(rgyud): steng thog thag tu'ang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyis spras pa me tog ka ta lcis mdzes par byas te gnas so// khang bu brtsegs
398a5(rgyud): pa'i nye 'khor kun gshin rje dang / chu lnga dang / lus ngan po dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyu /
398a6(rgyud): po rnams lag na rnga yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug go// de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas so// dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de dag
398a7(rgyud): thams cad kyang nam mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa'i 'phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang na 'khod pa ni/ nyi ma dang zla ba
398b1(rgyud): sba ba bzhin dang / nam mkha' la zla ba nyang na rgyu skar dang skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba spa ba bzhin du sba bar gnas so// me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i
398b2(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / man da ra ba dang / ma hA man da ra ba dang / me tog ro tsa dang / ma hA ra tse dang / me tog sa la dang / tA la ka dang / me tog tam
398b3(rgyud): la dang / tsam pa ka dang / me tog a d+hi mug ta ka dang / me tog a sho ka dang / me tog pa ta la dang / me to ga nI la dang / me hA nI la dang / me tog gan d+ha b+haR+Sha ka dang / me tog sum na dang / ta ra Na dang /
398b4(rgyud): ku ya ka'i me tog gi char gyi rgyun phab bo// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos sdud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi char ji srid du char 'bab
398b5(rgyud): cing / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do// de ltar na cho 'phrul che ba'i che bdag snang ngo // rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par nam mkha' la sgra byung ngo //
398b6(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu bzhi pa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thu
398b7(rgyud): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te/
399a1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ sdig pa thams cad sreg pa bshad pa legs so legs so// 'di ni phyir
399a2(rgyud): ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa sman
399a3(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba'i sbyin pa'i 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i grub pa chen po rab tu ston par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis yangs shing rgya che ba'i chen po
399a4(rgyud): thams cad byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig pu mchog 'grub par 'gyur te/ las sgrub pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro// de nas khros pa'i
399a5(rgyud): gang rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin chen po stong phrag brgya'i bdag po stobs che ba/ dpung che ba/ brtan zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gi lag mthil
399a6(rgyud): gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po skul bar byed pa/ lha'i gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas te rgya mtsho chen po na gnas te 'khor bye ba phal po che dang ldan pa/ drag po gzi brjid drag po stobs che ba/
399a7(rgyud): pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par byed pa de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
399b1(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa skya
399b2(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags bshad pas ni bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang dang bcas pa
399b3(rgyud): bsregs so// gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'khor dang bcas pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te bsregs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhig ste tshig cing zhu bar gyur to// bcom ldan
399b4(rgyud): 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bdag la skyob pa su lags/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par zhig go// dus kyi zhags pas bcings/
399b5(rgyud): so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ khros pa'i gang
399b6(rgyud): rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyod ma 'jigs par khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes
399b7(rgyud): su song zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la skyabs su nye bar song zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
400a1(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen pa/ skyob pa dang / rten du 'gyur te/ gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin stong /
400a2(rgyud): phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yin no// kye gnod sbyin chen po myur ba myur bar song ste skyabs su 'gro bar byos shig/ de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs can gtsug bud 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi
400a3(rgyud): sde dpon chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba rtogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste khyab
400a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ngu zhing brgyal nas lag pa brkyang ste/ zhabs la btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
400a5(rgyud): 'das bdag bskyab tu gsol/ thugs rje chen po bdag bskyib tu gsol/ bdag la srog stsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsregs shing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur to// bcom
400a6(rgyud): ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag brgya bye ba 'khor dang bcas pa srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// shes pa ni stor/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro bar byed pa ni nyams na/ bcom ldan
400a7(rgyud): 'das bdag gi lus su zhig gis gso bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras ka'i bra yang phyug gis/ khros pa'i gang rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces
400b1(rgyud): sprul to// kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig/ nga ji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la rnam par gtso bar byas/
400b2(rgyud): khyod kyis bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po ni zos na/ khyod kyis 'phags pa'i spyan mang po ni nyams par byas/ khyod kyis rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo
400b3(rgyud): mang po'i bar chad ni byas/ grub pa rnams ni med par byas/ ma grub pa rnams kyang med par byas/ skal ba can mang po ni med par byas/ skul ba med pa ni yod par byas/ mi 'tshe ba dang / srog
400b4(rgyud): dang / longs spyod kyi bde ba ni med par byas/ 'che ba dang srog rnam par 'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas/ khyod kyis legs par bshad pa ni yongs su bor/ khyod kyis nyes par bshad pa dang ser sna
400b5(rgyud): ni mang du byas/ rig sngags 'tshang thams cad dang sems can thams cad la khyod nag po dang rnam par 'jig pa rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis ngan sems thams cad ni spel/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa
400b6(rgyud): ba rnams ni nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod shin tu mi bzad pa sngags na yin/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i
400b7(rgyud): nang na khyod gcig pu ngan sems can bar chad byed par skyes pa yin te/ rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas/ kye gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dam tshig dang / bslab pa dang / sdom
401a1(rgyud): ba khas blang ba dang / dge ba'i chos byos shig/ 'on tang kho bo khyod kyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen du gyur par bya'o// khyod sdug bsngal bas nyam thag pa dang khacing ba/
401a2(rgyud): mi bzad pa dang / me 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las ngas yongs su thar bar bya'o// mtho ris kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o// de nas zos pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod
401a3(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btung
401a4(rgyud): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems/
401a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis te dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o// chos kyi rjes su sems pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
401a6(rgyud): su mchis pa la gnas par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po lcags kyu'i gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge
401a7(rgyud): slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
401b1(rgyud): 'don pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga kun spyod pa de la ni/ bdag gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma rnams kyis 'og dang / bla dang / phyogs bzhi kun tu bsod nams su dmigs te bsrung ba dang / swa
401b2(rgyud): ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang / spo ba dang / gzi byin mang du bskyed par bgyi'o// de'i yul phyogs su 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed//
401b3(rgyud): pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / ma legs pa dang / le nyes pa dang / mi ngas dang / rims dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyam thag par byed pa'i gdon dang bcas pa dang / nad dang / gcong
401b4(rgyud): dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// rab tu bsal bar bgyi'o// rkun po dang / zol po dang / mi rgod dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams bsal
401b5(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa byung ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// /
401b6(rgyud): char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / sad dang / than pa dang / byi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang /
401b7(rgyud): 'byor pa sbyar bar bgyi'o// sems can mi dge ba spyod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o// dge ba la sbyor bar bgyi'o// sems can dge ba spyod pa rnams kyi grogs bdag 'khor dang bcas pas bgyi'o//
402a1(rgyud): yang dag par dad pas rjes su 'brang bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems can thams cad/
402a2(rgyud): bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// chos la zhugs pa'i yid dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khral yod pas gnas par bgyi'o// thams cad du bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// ji ltar rang gi srog
402a3(rgyud): 'di yongs su bskyang ba bzhin du/ gzungs dang rig sngags grub pa 'di'ang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o// khur du bskur bar bgyi'o// sgrub par 'grub pa chen po stsal/
402a4(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi chad pas so sor gnod pa so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
402a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khros pa'i ga rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi sde
402a6(rgyud): dpon chen po legs so logs so// khyod kyis de bzhin du bya bar rigs so// sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba chen pos gzung bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba la bdag
402a7(rgyud): kyis bsrung ba bcang bar bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de skyabs gsum pa la gnas shing / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab
402b1(rgyud): tshig 'dzin pa la gnas par gyur to// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang ldan par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
402b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan gyi phung po mchog tu bzang ba la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khas len du bcug
402b3(rgyud): cing bzhag pa legs so legs so// khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga nyo bar spyad pa de smras shig/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams ji ltar mchog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig dran pa tsam gyis
402b4(rgyud): ji lta ji ltar myur ba myur bar las sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ji ltar dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa dang yid la re ba 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro ba'i
402b5(rgyud): rgyal po 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis rlobs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
402b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung stsal pa rtogs nas nye bar bshad pa'i cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang ba rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
402b7(rgyud): 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa 'am/ gzhan dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang /
403a1(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo rnams khro bo'i rgyal po 'di sgrub par 'dod na/ des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la 'bras chan dang 'o ma za zhing / nang par sngar langs la 'phags pa
403a2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas mi sba bar gaN+DI brdung ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du 'bras chan khyor ba bkang ste/ gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul
403a3(rgyud): ba byas na/ des khro ba'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i cho ga de dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ltar bsgrubs nas/ de nas bzlas brjod gcig dang dran pa gcig gis thams cad 'grub
403a4(rgyud): par byas na/ thams cad du bya ba thams cad mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba las byed par 'dod cing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na/ khro bo'i rgyal/
403a5(rgyud): po lan cig dran par bya'o// dran pa tsam gyis mod la bgegs dang lag 'dren thams cad skrag par 'gyur zhing / dpag tshad tshun chad du rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du 'ong bar mi nus te/ rgyang ring
403a6(rgyud): pon 'dug go/ 'di lan cig dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / sgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
403a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin par mdzad par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad tshun chad du 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po 'phang du ri chen po tsam 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad gsum gyi/
403b1(rgyud): tshad tsam dang / 'og tu g.yang sar gyur te/ su'ang 'ong bar mi nus so// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
403b2(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi mi yin pa dang bcas pas gnas der 'ong bar ma nus na/ mi ma yin pa la phal pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te gnas
403b3(rgyud): med do// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa med par yang dgos pa thams cad grub pa sgrub par byed do// bgegs med par thams cad du sgrub pa 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
403b4(rgyud): 'chang las thams cad bya bar 'dod cing / gdon bsal bar 'dod na gu gul dang yung kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ gdon la bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// yungs kar gyis brdeg par
403b5(rgyud): bya'o// lan cig dran par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mos khros pas bsdigs par bya'o// bdug pa dang / rdeg pa dang / zan pa lhan cig tu byas na mod la gdon thams cad 'jig
403b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// ci ste nag po chen po rang nyid dam/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ sgra gcan nam/ 'jigs byed kyang 'jig par byed na/ gdon gzhan 'ong bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ mod lagaci
403b7(rgyud): tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang gdon gyis yongs su zin pa thams cad la dur khrod kyi thal ba la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ spyi bor gtor zhing lan cig dran par byas na/ mod
404a1(rgyud): la 'byung po dang gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro// na la da dang / and ni dra ka ba tsa dang / gu gul dang / ha sa dang / ba la ka dang / ma tu la dang / pad+ma dang / kuSh+ma rnam gnyis dang /
404a2(rgyud): ra dza ni dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / nar pad+ma dang / bi sha ra dang / tsan tri ka rnams ra'i gcin gyis sbrus te/ ril bu nas kyi 'dzel ma tsam byas te grib ma la bskams la/ lcags kyu lan
404a3(rgyud): bdun bzlas pa byas nas las thams cad la bdug pa'i rgyal po mchog gi ril bu gcig bdug pa byas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang / nags tshal dang / gtsong rong
404a4(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams 'gul lo// rgya mtsho chen po na 'khrugs so// ri rab chen po ni g.yos so// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas pa ni cher g.yos te 'gul lo// lha thams
404a5(rgyud): cad skrag go// lha ma yin thams cad ngu zhing phyogs phyogs su 'bros so// sa ni g.yos so// klu gang dag rgya mtsho na gnas pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed
404a6(rgyud): byed dang / gsang ba pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / bgegs dang / gdon mi bzad pa gzhan ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji tshor ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o//
404a7(rgyud): lus rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ bcom ste rus pa lpags par 'gyur/ 'chi bdag gi zhags pa'i khar 'gro bar 'gyur/ des rnam par zhig par 'gyur ba de la dogs par mi bya'o// dug dang bcas pa ni mod ladug
404b1(rgyud): med par 'gyur ro// klu 'jog po dang nor rgyas kyis gal te zin pa'am/ sbrul gyis zin pa la bdugs pa dang byugs pa tsam gyis thams cad du drug med par 'gyur ro// gang dag 'jig rten na drug snga
404b2(rgyud): tshogs mi bzad pa yod pa la bdug pa'i dri tsam dang / bskus pa dang / ril bu tsam gyis mod la dug thams cad med par 'gyur te the tsom mi bya'o// 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lu ta dang / shu ba dang /
404b3(rgyud): sha bkra dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / lhag pa rnam pa mang po dang / nad mched pa dang / lnga ba'i 'phreng ba dang / khong 'bras dang / rkub na ba dang / sman dang / 'khru ba dang / rtsib logs na pa dang /
404b4(rgyud): snying kha na ba dang / gre ba 'gags pa dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / mig na ba dang / mgo bo na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba la ril bu bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron 'thungs pa tsam dang / bdugs pa tsam
404b5(rgyud): dang / bsnams pa tsam gyis thams cad de ma thag tu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad la ril bu dam pa lan cig bzlas brjod byas te byin na thams cad du dgos pa thams cad byed pa bla na med/
404b6(rgyud): pa yin no// shin tu char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo'i tshogs dang / mtsho'i klu de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro//
404b7(rgyud): char dus su 'bebs so// lo tog dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog yod par 'gyur ro// phyis ser ba mi 'beb go// sad dang / rlung dang / than pa mi 'byung ngo // phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
405a1(rgyud): grub par byed cing bkru shis pa thams cad grub par byed do// sa dra pos chus ba kun tu 'an pa mas ma da pa dang / dus pa nga dang / rims drag po'i 'jigs pa chen po dang /
405a2(rgyud): me 'bar ba shin tu che ba dang / zhag bzhi pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / grang ba'i rims sdug bsngal che ba dang / rims gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa 'bar ba 'khrug pa drag po mi bzad pa
405a3(rgyud): dang / zlas pa'i rims gso dka' ba dang / nyin gcig pa'i rims dang / nyin gnyis pa'i rims dang / nyin gsum pa'i rims dang / de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa/
405a4(rgyud): dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / mchil ma las gyur pa'i rims dang / rims rnying pa dang / zug gzer dang / gzhang 'bru ma dang / gcin snyi ba mi bzad pa dang / rims thams cad la bdugs
405a5(rgyud): pa tsam gyis the tsom med par rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / gang dag mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang /
405a6(rgyud): gang dag gzhan mi'i gdon thams cad bdug pas bdugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i gsang sngags dam pa lan cig dran par byas nas skem
405a7(rgyud): byed dang / bskams pa dang / brjed byed dang / gdon ra za lag g+hA dang / bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang / grib gnon dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa gang du skye bo zhe spang ba rnams 'byung ba dang //
405b1(rgyud): gang du gnod pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdugs pa tsam gyis thams cad las de thar par 'gyur ro// rgyal po khros pa dang / gang zhig rkun po dang /
405b2(rgyud): mi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/ gcong rong bgrod dka' ba'i nang du song ngam/ dog pa mi bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan cig dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad
405b3(rgyud): du rtag tu bde bar 'gro ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba na bde bar 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ chu chen pos 'khyer bar mi 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran pa dang
405b4(rgyud): bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bde zhing legs pa shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ gsang sngags
405b5(rgyud): mchog tu drag pos ma yin/ de la byad kyis mi tshugs/ nad kyis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin no// gsang sngags dran pa tsam dang / bdug pas bdag bdugs pa ni thams cad du
405b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur te/ 'di la dogs pa mi bya'o// dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i mi sems can ma rungs pa mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed/
405b7(rgyud): pa na bdag nyid bdug pas bdug cing rig sngags lan cig dran par byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam la dogs par mi bya'o// gang zhig rig sngags 'grub par mi
406a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig bgegs kyis zin te nyams pa dang / blo zhan cing le lo can la bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bya zhing / gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod
406a2(rgyud): byas na des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// skal ba med pa bdag nyid bdug pa dang / ril bu mchog gis bkru ba dang / mig bslu ba dang / mchog thig le byas na thams cad du
406a3(rgyud): skal ba can dang / dga' ba dang / dbang phyug mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du stobs thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// thams
