406a4(rgyud): cad du mchog 'grub pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi sa bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang zhing
406a5(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur ro// bsrung ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pa rig sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// bde ba thams cad kyis tshim pa thob par 'gyur ro// gnas gcig
406a6(rgyud): gnas ril du bdun blangs la khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze bkren pa sdug
406a7(rgyud): 'phongs pa'i bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'i don du rol bu gcig gis khrus byas/ gcig gis bdag bdug/ gcig gis gos bdug/ gcig ni ba'i rnam lnga dang skye
406b1(rgyud): te btung bar bya/ gcig ni mgo'i spyi bor gzhag/ gcig ni dpung pa g.yas par gdags/ ril bu gcig ni rked par btags na thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing / thams cad/
406b2(rgyud): mchog bla na med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ rgud pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// rma dang / nyam chung ba dang / de bzhin du chag grugs dang / bgegs
406b3(rgyud): kyis zin pa dang / gdon ra za yag shwas zin pa de dag thams cad rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te dogs par mi bya'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/
406b4(rgyud): sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa'i thams cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ gsang sngags bsten pa dang / gsang sngags dran cing dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdug par byas pas dogs par mi
406b5(rgyud): bya'o// mnar med pa dang / mi bzad pa'i sdig pa dang / dug dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang / phung ba rnams thams cad mod la med par 'gyur ro// mes phye ma leb bzhin rtag
406b6(rgyud): tu myur du sreg par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing bdug pa 'dis bdugs na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro// thams cad du sbyar ba la dogs par mi
406b7(rgyud): bya'o// 'khor las sbyar ba thams cad kyis khro ba'i lcags cu spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang sgo chen por nam langs ka dang mun pa sros khar bdug cing gas sngam/
407a1(rgyud): lan cig dran par byas na/ khyim gyi nang der gang dag mi sdang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon/
407a2(rgyud): ma rungs pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du phyir 'byung zhing dus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang / khyim dang rta babs rnams 'bar bar 'gyur/
407a3(rgyud): zhing dmyal ba'i srung ma mi bzad pa thams cad phyogs bslab par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye
407a4(rgyud): chen po dang / klu mthu bo che thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyur ro// bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang / lus bsregs pa dang / phyogs
407a5(rgyud): dang phyogs mtshams 'khrul pa dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// g.yul 'byed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab cing /
407a6(rgyud): 'gyod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang / thams cad du dpal thob par 'gyur ro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za
407a7(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu rnams kyis bsrung ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rjes su skyong ba dang / dus thams cad bla na med pa'i gzi byin skyed par
407b1(rgyud): byed do// khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu bla na med pa 'grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o// thig le skar ma lta bu ni// lha mi nyi ma bzhin du dpa'/ nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// bsod nams gzi badz+rad/
407b2(rgyud): ngag gis 'bab// mu mthong sngon chen 'od bzhin du// mun pa'i nang na sdang bar 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyil na mdzes pa ni// skar ma'i tshogs lngar zla ba bzhin// bsod nams bye ba stong phrag
407b3(rgyud): dang / dpag med gzhal du med pa yis// lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur// mkha' la rin chen mchod sdong ltar// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// ril bu bsten pa byas na ni//
407b4(rgyud): lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed// gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang / shin tu bzang po kho nar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu// phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad// rtag tu
407b5(rgyud): mchog ni sbyin pa dang / kun tu bla med grub par 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang // gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi// rims par phye ba 'grub
407b6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ kun tu 'grub pa bla na med// gi'u wang dang / gur kum dang / ru rta cha bsnams te sbyar la khro bo'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par spyod pa
407b7(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pa/ khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsangam bgos shing gtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo chos bcu ga sum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe chu gtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgya gug
408a1(rgyud): gi 'bru tsam byas te grib ma la bskams pa la/ gang gi tshe dgos brtsom pa de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu la lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te smin mtshams su/
408a2(rgyud): thig la bya'o// smin mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te byin gyis brlabs pa byas
408a3(rgyud): pa'i mod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang mnyam par mtshungs par brgyan par 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchod par bya ba dang /
408a4(rgyud): rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig ma nyams pa dang / rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang btsun mo'i nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur
408a5(rgyud): ro// sems can kun gus pa dang dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten dran pa la bya ba bzhin byed do// nor dang / 'bru dang / lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// dbang po
408a6(rgyud): dang 'tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba grags chen dang / klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'o sa pa chen por 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gas
408a7(rgyud): babapa dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'phel
408b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nad med pa dang / rims nad med pa dang / sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang / sdig pa dang / dgra thams
408b2(rgyud): cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// dgra dang phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun tu rgyal ba chen po sbyin
408b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// thig le de lta bu byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas la/ yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te phug gi sgor gtor na phug thams cad sgo gdangs par 'gyur
408b4(rgyud): ro// ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par 'gyur ro// lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan 'jug pa'i gnas su khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan thams
408b5(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan pa/ bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta bar 'os pa/ mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'khrig pa dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin tu dpa' zhing 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ lus ngo tsha tsha ltar byed
408b6(rgyud): pa/ 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ spyi bo yid tsam btud nas gser gyi snod rin po ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la 'bul bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang bas cang mi
408b7(rgyud): sla bar bya'o// rin po che'i snod kyang blang bar mi bya'o// gsang sngags 'ba' zhig dran par bya zhing yungs kar gyis gzhon nu ma la brdeg par bya'o// ci ste mi sdug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba
409a1(rgyud): khro bo'i gzugs mchu 'phyang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ sgra ral pa ser la gyen du brdzes la/ ral bcod pan gyis brgyan par ston na/ rig sngags 'chang bas skrag par
409a2(rgyud): mi bya'o// khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o// yang yungs kar gyis mgo'i spyi bor brdeg cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe de sa la 'gyel te 'dre ldog cing / kye rig
409a3(rgyud): sngags 'chang thugs rje can khyod rig sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum mo gum mo zhes sgra 'byin to// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas rjes su brtags te/ gal te kha chu dbu bar 'byung
409a4(rgyud): na rig sngags 'chang bas de blangs la rkang pa dang byin pa bskus na rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhing /
409a5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro// skad cig tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar song zhing slar yang 'ong bar
409a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra zhing skrag yid tsam 'khril zhing 'khyil ba rna cha gdu bu dri ma med cing spen tog 'phyang ba dang / ma khrig ma gdu bus brgyan pa/
409a7(rgyud): lus pad+ma 'dra zhing dkar sha ma du 'gyur ro// tshe bskal pa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba stong phrag brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor
409b1(rgyud): gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du dpon par 'gyur ro// gal te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyis khyim gyi sgo bye ste 'du/
409b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du 'dug go// mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad
409b3(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ro// khyim thams cad du re rer yang dpon po dang bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshogs mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa
409b4(rgyud): gsum gyi ris kyi bdag pa'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur
409b5(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' kun tu spyod par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thub par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su theg
409b6(rgyud): li byas te klu mtshor zhugs pa tsam gyis med la klu'i rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas/ chung ma dang bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ thams cad mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad smra ste/ rig sngags
409b7(rgyud): 'chang ba bka' stsol cog dang / las bgyi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing nam 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o//
410a1(rgyud): klu'i lha'i longs spyod mchog tu longs spyad pas rtse bar bgyi'o// lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su gnas par bgyi'o// nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rin/
410a2(rgyud): po che rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / ga ser dang / mu tig dang / in+da nI la dang / ma ra ka ta dang / pad+ma rA ga dang /
410a3(rgyud): bai DUR+Ya dang / shin tu bzang po rnams su stsal bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi bza' ba mchog dang / lha rdzas kyi nor gyi phung pos bang mdzod rnams rab tu dgang bar bgyi'o// shin tu char ches
410a4(rgyud): pa gcad par bgyi'o// char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o// dus ma yin pa'i char gcad par bgyi'o// dus su char dbab pa dang / dus su char pa'i rgyun 'byung bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi
410a5(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas te bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa spyi bos blang bar
410a6(rgyud): bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang ba de'i tshig dang bsam pa rjes su sbyang bar bgyi'o// dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na glang po che stong gi stobs yod par 'gyur te/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra
410a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi stobs kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// 'thab cing dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnon pa'i stobs thogs pa med de rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha ma
410b1(rgyud): yin kun las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad 'di la bsrung ba dang / sra ba dang / sbyang ba'i phyir rtag tu zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed/
410b2(rgyud): pa dang / dngogs byin pa dang / mtshangs 'dru ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// lto bar thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags lan cig dran par/
410b3(rgyud): byas la/ yid la ji ltar bsams pa ji bzhin byas na ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te/ 'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas ji ltar 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro// sker thig le byas te khro bo'i
410b4(rgyud): lcags kyu sker lan cig bzlas brjod byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na ji tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan thob par 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang
410b5(rgyud): bcas pas mchod par bya bar 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i chen po thob pa grub par 'gyur ro// lag mthil du thig le byas te lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la reg/
410b6(rgyud): bde dbang du 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin zhing bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la bskus la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ grong khyer gyi rgo la
410b7(rgyud): brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te mdunan gnas shing / de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// grong de na skye bo gang dag gnas
411a1(rgyud): ba bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te mdun na gnas shing / ji sring grong khyer der 'jug par 'dod pas de srid du thams
411a2(rgyud): cad ci bya ba thams cad byed cing gnas pa dang mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pa la bskus te rgyal po'i sgo la brdabs na ji srid 'dug par 'dod na de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur pa
411a3(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la bsku zhing lan cig bzlas brjod bya ste/ phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab pa byas na gsang ba'i khyim thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug cing / khyim na gnas pa de dag
411a4(rgyud): thams cad dbang du gyur te 'dug go// rkang pa gnyis la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas te dur khrod du song na/ dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang /
411a5(rgyud): sha za thams cad mdun na gnas shing dbang du 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ba dang / thams cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'gyur ro// brla gnyis la bskus te nags tshil gyi nang
411a6(rgyud): du zhugs na zhugs pa tsam gyis khyim ni gnas pa thams cad mdun na gnas shing khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro// sman gyi rdzas thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing gel
411a7(rgyud): sman dang / rtswa dang / mgo lcogs kyi nags tshal gyi rang gi ngo bo thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa blangs pa bzhin du mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo chen mo'i nu ma'i bar du bsku zhing tshwas
411b1(rgyud): pas gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing / gu gul la bzlas brjod byas te bdug pa dbul zhing mig mi mdzums par bltas na/ dpal lha mo chen mo bka' stsol cing mchog thams
411b2(rgyud): cad sbyin par byed do// nor shin tu mang po rnyed pa sbyin par mdzad do// dpal lha mo chen mo rtag tu khyim na gnas par 'gyur ro// yo byad rnam pa thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro//
411b3(rgyud): nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// mi'i 'o ma dang lhan cig tu brdar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te mig la bskus na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan ma'ang nyin
411b4(rgyud): par bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchu'i thor to la thig le bya zhing lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la smra ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing / gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// tshig
411b5(rgyud): gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// kha nas ut+pa la'i dri mnam par 'gyur ro// gdon la thig le byas na zin pa dang ma zin pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la thig le bya zhing lan cig gas
411b6(rgyud): sngags dran par byas na mod la tshangs pa'i srin po la sogs pa'i bar du thams cad du zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// thig le tsam dang dran pa tsam gyis thams cad las yongs su thar par
411b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad la thig le byas na yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// phrag pa gnyis la thig le bya zhing khro bo'i lan cig dran par byas na phrag pa gnyis 'bar bar 'gyur/
412a1(rgyud): ro// mtshal dang sbyar te dri chab dang / bsres nas lag pa dang rkang pa la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas nas su zhes byas na me 'bar bar 'gyur te/ ji
412a2(rgyud): tsam 'dod kyi bar du 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchu la bsku zhing bzlas brjod byas na dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag bsku zhing gsang sngags
412a3(rgyud): mang du bzlas brjod byas na lus mtha' dag 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu dang nyungs kar gyis bskrad nas bum pa dang bum pa la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ dri chus steng du gtor ba dang bcas pa byas
412a4(rgyud): na phyir yang gnas par 'gyur ro// ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung la bsku zhing rjes su
412a5(rgyud): dran par byas na skad cig tu thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// lhung bzed la bskus na 'bar bar 'gyur ro// mgo la bskus na spa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// dung la bskus te de gnas mthon
412a6(rgyud): por bus na sgra gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi khro ba thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ngan pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sprin los
412a7(rgyud): su bus na rlung sprin dang ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dbus na byung dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / lo nyes dang / nad ma rungs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa
412b1(rgyud): ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dang / grib
412b2(rgyud): gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / byad dang / sbod gtong dang / dug gi 'jig
412b3(rgyud): pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i bus na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
412b4(rgyud): zhing lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ba lang 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'chi ba dang / mi 'chi ba dang / rta 'chi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang / rnga mo 'chi ba dang / byur dang / lo nyes pa dang /
412b5(rgyud): nad dang / mig nad dang / nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba la khang pa'i steng du skad drag po lan cig dung sgra 'bud cing bzlas brjod byas na/ bus pa tsam gyis mod la thams cad rab
412b6(rgyud): tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gnas 'tsho 'gram du bus na mod la klu'i rgyal po rnams char pa'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// char ches pa'i tshe sprin logs su bus na shin tu char che ba
412b7(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang mtshan ma ngan pa dang bkra mi shis pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshams chen po gcad na ri mthon po'i khar bus te/ ji tsam du nga sgra thos pa de tsam tshun chad mtshams
413a1(rgyud): chen po bcad par byas par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad na bskor zhing bus na dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bcad par byas par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i rgyal/
413a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub pa bla na med pa thams cad bya ba la/ sems can thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni nas dang nyungs kar mar dang bsres la shing arka'i me bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas/
413a3(rgyud): po tsam gyis dpag tshad kyi nang kun tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad kyi gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya/
413a4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad kun tu zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyur ro// rgyas pa byas na yungs kar dang / 'bras sA lu dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres/
413a5(rgyud): te sbyin sreg bya ba ni lan bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpag ched brgya tshun chad rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// lan/
413a6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya stong kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// shing dri mi zhim pa'i bus te/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang / lan tshwa dang / yungs kar mar dang bsres te shing
413a7(rgyud): tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'dod pa thams cad mngon spyod kyi las rnams
413b1(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags sgrub par 'dod na 'bras yos dang / nyungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ shing arka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun byas/
413b2(rgyud): na rang gi khro bo'i gsang sngags sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// lan bcu bzhi byas na don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyur ro// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg byas na don yod pa'i zhags/
413b3(rgyud): pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi spyi grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
413b4(rgyud): dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs rnams so// gzhan yang khro bo chen po stong phrag brgya mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// til dang / 'bras so ba dang / zho dang /
413b5(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar rnams sbyar te chang pa bdun sbyin sreg byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin la sogs pa lha thams cad lha'i tshogs dang
413b6(rgyud): bcas pa'ang 'ong zhing rig sngags 'chang ba la bsnyen bkur byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la 'dud par 'gyur ro// gnod/
413b7(rgyud): sbyin dang srin po dbang du byas na 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na gnod sbyin
414a1(rgyud): dang srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// klu char 'bebs par bya na 'bras los dang / yungs kar dang / nA ka puSh+pa dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams pa mar dang /
414a2(rgyud): sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ des na klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bebs par 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod par char pa'i rgyun gtong zhing 'bebs so// shin tu char che ba
414a3(rgyud): gcod na de nyid kyi thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na shin tu char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi g.yul bzlog par 'dod na ske tshe'i 'bru dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/
414a4(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed cing mtshang 'dru ba thams cad la pri yang ku'i me tog dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan nyi shu
414a5(rgyud): gcig sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// 'tha ba rtsod dang 'gyed pa rnams kyi smra ba'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad zhi bar bya ba la sran ma ku lan tha dad //
414a6(rgyud): zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du byan sum na'i me tog gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin
414a7(rgyud): sreg byas na bud med thams cad mchog tu dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin zhing thams cad du mchog grub par 'gyur ro// de nas sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang
414b1(rgyud): ba des 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyir sreg byas na sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam
414b2(rgyud): par dag par 'gyur ro// 'on te khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngag
414b3(rgyud): grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur zhing / khro bo'i gosang sngags thams cad spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib ma/
414b4(rgyud): rgyal po bam po nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so// / de nas hUM zhes bya ba dran pas khro ba'i rgyal po gshegs par 'gyur ro// las 'grub pa ston pa dang / mthong ba sbyin pa dang / 'dod pa'i
414b5(rgyud): mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'on te phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po spyan drang bar 'dod na/ shing su ra bi sa me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / pad+ma dang /
414b6(rgyud): ut+pa la dang / yungs kar dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// rig sngags 'chang bas khrus legs par bya zhing gos gtsang ma bags
414b7(rgyud): te gtsang bar bya'o// de nas 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku mdun no bzhugs shing rig sngags 'chang ba la dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// mchog gang
415a1(rgyud): ci 'dod cing gsol ba'i mchog de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad do// gal te skal ba chung ba zhig ste mngon du zhal mi
415a2(rgyud): mthong na de'i tshe rmi lam du bstan te/ thams cad bka' stsol cing ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin te/ gsang sngags grub pa chen po dang / cho ga zhib mo grub pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang /
415a3(rgyud): rim par phye ba grub par sbyin no// dam tshig grub pa chen po rab tu ston to// dbang phyug thob par bya na 'bras so bstu ra sa dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas
415a4(rgyud): na dbang phyug so sor thob par 'gyur ro// grong thob par bya na tan ta li ya kha dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na grong thob par 'gyur ro// yul gyi
415a5(rgyud): bdag por bya na 'bras sA lu dang ras bal gyi sa bon rnams mar dang bsres te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro// mi snang bar bya na ske tsho dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// nam
415a6(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro bar bya na sha ta pad tri ka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar byan shing la dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / du ru ka rnams til dang sbyar te lon brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg
415a7(rgyud): byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba legs so legs so zhes gsung zhing dbugs 'byin to//
415b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis mtha' spyi bar phyag 'jog cing mchog grub pa chen po stsal bar mdzad do// thams cad du mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi
415b2(rgyud): 'jog rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten kun gyi bla mar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad gzhom par 'dod na 'bras ma grugs pas skyon
415b3(rgyud): sreg bya'o// gatrer bskul na de nas don yod pa chen po'i spyan brjod par bya ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub chen po'i sgyu ma'i dngos grub bla na med pa/ bklags pas grub pa/ so sor bstan pa'i
415b4(rgyud): dngos grub bla na med pa/ sgrub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa lhur len pa/ bde ba skyed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid/ de bzhin gshegs
415b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ngogs su zhugs pa rnams kyi rab tu sgrub pa/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba
415b6(rgyud): rnams kyi rnam par sel ba/ don gyi stegs mchog tu grub pa/ mal cha dang stan med pa rnams kyi gos/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba chen po// thams cad du las thams cad
415b7(rgyud): legs par grub pa/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa/ rgyal po mnyes par byed pa/ rnam par thar pa dang dul ba'i grong khyer nyid de dge bsnyen nam
416a1(rgyud): kyi mchog tu skyed pa/ dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i yon tan rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pagrub pa nas gtsang ma gtsang sbrar
416a2(rgyud): spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos te bzang ba mchog shin tu gsang ba dang bag yod cing bden par smra ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu dad pa/ bla ma la gus pa/ rtag par rgyun du byams pa'i sems
416a3(rgyud): la mnyam par bzhag pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa/ sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid can/ 'byung po thams cad la brtse ba'i sems dang byams pas bla na med pa'i sgrub
416a4(rgyud): pa 'di bya'o// bslab pa dang sdom pa blangs pa/ don yod pa chen po'i sgyu ma bla na med pa ni 'di'o// gi'u wang dang / sdik+ka dang / pu shel ci dang / tsan dan dang / ldong ros dang / shing kun dang
416a5(rgyud): spang spos dang / na la da dang / ru rta dang bcas pas dang / de bzhin du 'bras dgang ste/ 'di rnams thams cad cha mnyam ste phye mar byas nas thams cad zhib mor btags la ga pu ra/
416a6(rgyud): dang gla rtsis bsgos te snyigs ma 'di dag tsha ba'i til mar gyis btsos pa/ nye'u shing dang / bil ba dang / me tog brgya pa dang / puska ra dang / gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / sa mu sta
416a7(rgyud): dang / pra puN+Da rI ka dang / shing mngar rnams chu bre bdun gang bar sbyin par bya ste/ drug cha lhag mar lus pa dang / snyogs ma ze gang dang / 'o ma'i snyigs ma bor te til mar srang gnyis
416b1(rgyud): la rtag tu btso bar bya'o// legs par grub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma dang / dkyil 'khor du me tog dang / dri bzang po'i bdug pa dang / til mar btso ba'i cho ga bzhin/
416b2(rgyud): du rab tu sbyar la/ gong las grub pa khyad par du bskyed cing babs pa'i til mar byas pa bsrung ba'i cho ga bya ste/ snod gtsang ma bkang nas slar yang gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas
416b3(rgyud): brjod byas nas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o// de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug ste/ rig sngags 'chang khrus legs par byas pa/ dris bsgos pa'i til mar rtag tu lus
416b4(rgyud): la byugs pa 'dis lus de mi snang zhing dngos po med par ston par byed do// ngag tho sa la reg par mi byed do// gang gis lus khrus ma byas kyi bar de srid du bdag nyid mi snang ste lus mi mthong
416b5(rgyud): // dpral bar thig le byas nas yan lag dang nying lag rnams la reg ste/ gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur te/ skad cig la dga' bar byed pa
416b6(rgyud): dang / lha dang bcas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis lhan cig tu til mar mgo la byugs pas mdog sngo ba dang / skra cung zad li zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// /
416b7(rgyud): til mar grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro// reg pa tsam gyis tshe ba skal pa khri thub par 'gyur ro// lus pad+ma dkar sham lta bur
417a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lus rdo rje ltar bstan pa dang / gnas kyi sgo thams cad bya ste 'dug go// gang du 'dod par 'jug par byed do// dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i dus su rig sngags ca/
417a2(rgyud): la thig le byas nas lag tu rdo rje dang nor bu byas na nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ mod la dkyil 'khar grub pa ston par byed do// til mar gyis rkang pa la byugran nam mkha' la 'ong bar byed do//
417a3(rgyud): lus la byugs na mi snang bar ston par byed do// ma tshal dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te ka ya na lag dang nying lag la thig la byas na lus 'bar ba'i snying po mthong bar byed do// 'di dag rig sngags
417a4(rgyud): 'chang gi rnams 'phrul so sor bstan pa'o// yungs kar la bzlas te lan cig bskus sam/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor na dkyil 'khor g.yo bar 'gyur te/ 'khor lo bzhin du skor bar byed do//
417a5(rgyud): gtor ma'i snod gang ba rnams dang / bum pa gang ba rnams sor mo brgyad kyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug go// rang nyid se gol gyi sgras yongs su 'don par byed na slar yang snod nam
417a6(rgyud): mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa rang rang gi gnas su gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di rnams dkyil 'khor gyi dgos pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub bo// de nas seng ge'i khrag dang til mar lhan cig sbyar te/
417a7(rgyud): bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs na me'i seng ge chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid lus khrus ma byas pa de srid du mi'i seng ger kun tu gnas so// gzhan yang ji ltar bsams pa
417b1(rgyud): bzhin du nam mkha' la 'phags te 'jug pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / me 'bar ba ston par byed do// phag gi khrag dang sbyar na phag gi gzugs su ston par byed de/ shugs dang stobs
417b2(rgyud): chen por ston par byed do// glang po che'i khrag dang sbyar bas tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do// rta'i khrag dang sngon po lhan cig sbyar ba lus la byug sa pa tsam gyisad+ha
417b3(rgyud): mgrin gyi gzugs su ston par byed do// ji srid khrus ma byas pa de srid du mthong bar byed do// ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na khyu mchog chen po la zhon par mthong bar 'gyur ro//
417b4(rgyud): mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na klu'i rgyal po chu bdag chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro// sbrul dmar po'i khrag dang bsres nas sbyar na sbrul chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro//
417b5(rgyud): khrag dang bsres pa sa ra chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i lo ma dang / phye ma dang / rtsa ba dang bcas pa dang / 'dab ma dang / me te ga dang / sdong bu dang bcas pa til mar gyis
417b6(rgyud): lhan cig sbyar bas yungs kar la bskus te lus la byugs la til mar gyi thig le bya'o// mkhas pa sa yan lag dang nying lag la byugs pa byas na rgyal po chen po'i cha lugs su mthong bar
417b7(rgyud): 'gyur te/ ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa sa yongs su bskor bas dgos pa sna tshogs pa dang / rgyal po'i dgos pa rnams byed par 'gyur ro// yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub
418a1(rgyud): par byed par 'gyur ro// ldong ros kyi mig sman dang lhan cig bsres nas mig la byugs na 'khor chen po'i dbus su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su
418a2(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas te yungs kar de nam mkha' la gtor na 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char 'bab par mthong bar 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i snying pos sbyar na pad+ma chen po'i char
418a3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ut+pa la sngon po'i khu bas sbyar na ut+pal sngon po chen po'i char 'byung ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar me tog gi khu bas sbyar ba de lta de ltar me tog gi char chen po 'byung
418a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs su mthong bar 'dod pa de lta de ltar lha'i til mar rnying pa dang lhan cig sbyar na de lta de ltar de dang de nyid kyi
418a5(rgyud): gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhal yas khang yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// lag pas nor bu gcig blangs te yid la rjes su dran par byas na rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma'i bdag nyid du mthong bar
418a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gos dang rgyan sna tshogs pa rnams ston par byed do// lag pas snod la bzung na snod sna tshogs pa ston par byed do// lag pas bum pa la bzung na bum pa brgya stong phrag ston par byed do//
418a7(rgyud): rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na gang du rdo ba la rkang pa bzhag pa de dang de nyid du rkang pa'i rjes 'dzag par byed de/ mar gsar la nye bar 'jog pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ mar gsar mnyen du rdo ba'ang/
418b1(rgyud): 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gtun shing la byugs na rtags 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma mo'i dkyil 'khar gyi gnas su zhugs nam mo'i lha rnams kyis so tha dad pa'i rdul bzung ste/ ti la mar dang lhan ci
418b2(rgyud): sbyar nas so so'i gdong la byugs na lha de dang de lta bu'i gzugs su ston par byed do// gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos las bya'o// de nas blo 'phel bar byed
418b3(rgyud): pa ni til mar dang 'o ma lhan cig zos na blo dang dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nub gsum gyi sbyor bas tshigs su bcad pa stong klog par byed cing 'dzin par byed do// zhag bdun gyi
418b4(rgyud): sbyor bas blo gros rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'phel bar byed cing sogs par byed de// zhag bcu bzhi'i sbyor bas tshe lha'i lo stong du 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sbyor ba sa bcud len sgrub pa'i
418b5(rgyud): dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gnyer ma dang sgra dkar spangs pa dang / skra cung zad 'khyil par 'gyur ro// lus 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang pad+ma'i kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// skyes nas lo//
418b6(rgyud): bcu lon pa dang 'dra bar gzugs dang lang tshe dang ldan par 'gyur ro// glang po che stong phrag bcu'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sbyor bas glang po ches srungs kyi stobs su 'gyur /
418b7(rgyud): zhagasung cu so lnga'i sbyor bas nasamakha' ldi chen po'i stob su 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sbyor bas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang 'dra bar brtson 'grus dang stobs chen por 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i sbyor bas ri rab lhun po chen po'i dkyil
419a1(rgyud): 'khor dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo sa yongs su bskor ba/ mi g.yo zhing mi bskul pa/ reg par bya ba ma yin zhing mi mthong ba/ mi ma yin pa/
419a2(rgyud): rnams kun tu spyod pa/ lha rnams thams cad kyis phyag byas shing phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ drang srong rnams kyis bstod pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i
419a3(rgyud): 'os su gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa'i 'os su gyur pa/
419a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba'i dbang po thams cad kyis gsang ba'i dam tshig grub pa/ lha'i dbang po rnams kyis lhan cig 'gran pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug
419a5(rgyud): chen po rnams kyis mngon du smra ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis nye bar bgrod par bya ba ste/ de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba til
419a6(rgyud): mar gyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yon tan chen po rmad du byung ba brgya stong phrag gis gang ba'o// til mar gyi rgyal po'i rig sngags 'chang 'dis til mar gyi rgyal po ral gri la byugs na byung/
419a7(rgyud): btsam gyis ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// rdo rje
419b1(rgyud): byugs na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor sbyar ba nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / rdo rje'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo la byugs na 'khor ma/
419b2(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bstan thug pa'i 'khor lo'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar mod la 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad rab tu 'dzam
419b3(rgyud): so// mdung rtse gsum pa la byugs na 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te nam mkha' la gnas par byed do// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon/
419b4(rgyud): pa dbang phyug chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang pho la mig dang / lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / shu ba dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / rtsa'i rma dang / mgul ba 'gags pa dang / rna ba'i
419b5(rgyud): rtsa nad dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / dmu chu dang / sman dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa nyid la'ang mkhas pas chu dron mo 'thungs pa tsam dang / byugs pa tsam gyis
419b6(rgyud): nad thams cad sel lo// til mar gyis nad thams cad sel ba de bzhin du rtsib logs na ba dang / tshad pa dang / snying na pa dang / mchin pa na ba dang / bshang ba 'khyim pa dang / pho ba'i nad kyi
419b7(rgyud): nyes pa de rnams thams cad 'thungs pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par the tsom med do// nyams pa dang / zad pa dang / de bzhin du rgyal po'i dpal bcom pa dang / ga sos spya dngan pa rnams
420a1(rgyud): bslus pa tsam mam zos pa tsam gyis stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lus rnams rgyas pa dang / mgu ba dang / spro ba chen por 'gyur ro// gdon rnam pa sna tshogs
420a2(rgyud): par gsungs pa dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa la'ang reg pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par the tsom med do// byad mi bzad pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / dug dang / sbyar dug/
420a3(rgyud): nyid kyang reg pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang mche ba 'am/ sbrul gau Na sa dang sdig pa'ang rung / srin bu dang phye ma le ba gdug pa
420a4(rgyud): 'am/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang 'jog po 'am/ sbrul gyis mthong ba'i dug gam/ dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / hA lA ha lI'i gdug pa gang
420a5(rgyud): yin pa dang / gzhan da ra da'i dug gang yin pa dang / rtsa ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / sdong po'i dug dang / 'dab ma'i dug dang / me tog gi dug dang / mdangs kyi dug gang yin pa dang /
420a6(rgyud): gzhan dug rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// til mar reg pa tsam gyis lam mchog dang la mgol bar song ba rnams dang / rgyal po'i rko drung
420a7(rgyud): du song ba'ang rung / gsad par 'os par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / bcings par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang dgra'i gzing
420b1(rgyud): dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa nyid dang / mi mdza' ba dang / phyir rgol ba gang yin pa'ang til mar 'di mngon par sbyar bas skad cig de la thams cad 'joms so// rgyal po/
420b2(rgyud): khros pa gang yin pa 'dzum bzhin du bka' stsol to// g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du'am phan tshun 'thab bzhin pa thams cad la til mor rgyal po bla na med pas rtag tu rgyal ba ster ro// mkhas pa/
420b3(rgyud): mig la byugs na/ mi thub cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dngos grub kyi gnas thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir
420b4(rgyud): ro// de nas khros po lcags kyu bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba/ mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ mod la thams cad du
420b5(rgyud): grub pa bla na med pa/ nad thams cad zhi ba/ de kho na nyid khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa'i ras ris kyi sku gzugs brjod par bya ste/ ras ris kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyis
420b6(rgyud): mod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa'i gnas thams cad rtog par khang du chud par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin ga shegs/
420b7(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrog brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mthong ba dang / mched pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / zhesarapa
421a1(rgyud): bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ras ris kyi sku
421a2(rgyud): gzugs gang yin pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyis mod la mtha' klas pa tsam dang 'di mtshungs par 'gyur te/ 'di dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/
421a3(rgyud): ro 'a de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// ras gru bzhi pa 'bru bzhir cha mnyam pa shin tu thag sa bzang ba ga shin
421a4(rgyud): tu gsar pa/ shin tu 'jam pa/ mchog tu mdzes pa/ khru gnyis pa'i tshad kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba 'am/ yang na dar gtsang ma gru bzhi shin tu rnam par 'byes pa la ri mo mkhan
421a5(rgyud): gtsang ma sbyang bar gnas pas lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon snod gsar par bzhag la tshon sna tshogs rnam par 'byes pas 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i khro bo lcags kyu bri bar bya'o//
421a6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bzhi pa/ zhal dang po ni zhi ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med cod pan du 'chang ba/ zla bas nye bar mdzes
421a7(rgyud): pa phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal drag po'i gzugs can/ 'jigs par byed pa/ tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa'i
421b1(rgyud): ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ g.yon pa drag po chen po mche ba tsigs pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ dbu sgra 'khyil zhing gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa kun tu bcings pa/ 'od dpag med kyi/
421b2(rgyud): cod pan can/ drag tu bzhad pa'o// zhi ba'i zhal ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i steng du sku byed pa'i khro ba'i rgyal po 'bar ba'i snying por chud pa bya ste/ sku ut+pa la sngon po'i kha dog can//
421b3(rgyud): dbu skra dmar po cung zad 'khyil pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis kyi gcig gis ral gri dang / gnyis pas thob 'bar ba can
421b4(rgyud): bya'o// phyag gnyis gcig gis pad+ma 'chang ba ste/ pad+ma'i ge sar 'bar ba'i snying po can no// gnyis pas lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gsum ste/ g.yas pa na'o// g.yon pas khro bo chen po
421b5(rgyud): drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can/ don yod pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa dbugs 'byin pa'i rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs pa/ phyag thams cad 'bar ba'i snying po 'od
421b6(rgyud): zer kha dog sna tshogs pa bya ste/ pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bya'o// rgya mtsho'i snying por ri rab la gnas pa \u0f7fklu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos dkris pa bya'o//
421b7(rgyud): nya dang / chu srin dang / nor bu rin po sna tshogs kyis dkris pa/ pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar pos gcal du ba kram pa/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / dur ba dang / shang
422a1(rgyud): shang te'us khyab par bya'o// g.yas logs su lha mo sgrol ma dbu cung zad 'dud pa/ thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/
422a2(rgyud): 'dzes ba ga dang bcas pa bya'o// da ka ra sha ma chen mo thal mo sbyar te cung zad 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// srin mo chen mo ral
422a3(rgyud): pa gcig ma khrag 'dzag pa'i thod pa dang / drag mo drag tu rgod pa bya ste/ 'bar ba'i snying por khro bo lcags kyu la lnga bzhin pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang /
422a4(rgyud): zhags pa dang / rdo rje thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya'o// g.yon phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bya ste/ zhal khro gnyer can drag po'o// dbu skra gyen du
422a5(rgyud): brdzes pa/ 'jigs par byed pa/ 'bar ba'i snying por pus mo g.yas pa btsugs pa/ ral gri dang dgra sta thogs pa/ phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis
422a6(rgyud): rnam par brgyan pa// zo ba'i rgyal po lcags kyu la nges par blta bzhin pa/ kho ra khor yug tu 'od 'dom gang ba/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar bar bya'o// lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i khor
422a7(rgyud): khor yug gi steng du tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs kyi pur ma thogs te mchod pa byed bzhin pa
422b1(rgyud): bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po don yod lcags kyu'i rgyab tu rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i shing ljon pa bya ste/ yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma rnam par bkra ba bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs
422b2(rgyud): kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang bya ste/ pus mo btsugs pa/ me tog sna tshogs thogs shing / lag na bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po la steng du blta bzhin pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis pa
422b3(rgyud): drung gi gnas su pho nya mo bya ste/ zur mig can/ drag mo lag na ral gri thogs pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag thal mo sbyar ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bya'o// ras ris kyi sku
422b4(rgyud): gzugs kyi bya ba yongs su mthar phyin nas byin gyis brlabs te/ de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o// de'i drung du gtsang mas zas mi bza' bar do'i spyan sngar khro bo lcags
422b5(rgyud): kyu brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya'o// ras ris kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga 'dis sgrub pa'i/
422b6(rgyud): tshe ga rgyas pa gzhan yang bya'o// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re rer ras ris kyi mdun du gtsang mas zas mi za bar de'i spyan sdang me tog dang bdug spos phul nas/ khro bo'i rgyal
422b7(rgyud): po lan cig bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad bya'o// 'di ni de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bklags pas 'grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis gsang ba
423a1(rgyud): mchog gi las bsgrub pa bya'o// de nas sku gzugs mthong ba tsam la sogs pas mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spangs pa
423a2(rgyud): rnams 'di mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa bsags pa dang bcas pa dang / bskal pa
423a3(rgyud): brgyar bsags pa'i sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// nad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang / dgra thams
423a4(rgyud): cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi sku gzugs shin tu chung ba byed pa gang yin pa de'ang phan pa byed par 'gyur te/ me tog gam/
423a5(rgyud): bdug pa'am/ dri 'am/ byug pa'am/ dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byed pa 'am/ khrus kyi bum pa gang ba bkod pa 'am/ rdul sel bar byed pa tsam yang rung ste/ rig sngags 'chang de'i
423a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
423a7(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su
423b1(rgyud): rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyangs shing bskal pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gzugs 'dod par/
423b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// skye ba brjes nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i
423b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po// don yod pa'i khro bo lcags kyu'i gzungs 'di'ang mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par kha ton dugarba
423b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi dam tshigs gsang ba rnams dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / ga sang sngags dang
423b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
423b6(rgyud): mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud par yang 'gyur ro//
423b7(rgyud): bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro// tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur

424a3(rgyud): 'khor dang gsang ba'i phyag rgya bla na med pa bshad par bgyi'o// khor yug tu them skas bzhi dang ldan pa// sa dang ba byung ba sres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ gzings kyi rgya dang tshad/

424a6(rgyud): sti dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying por yang // shin tu rnam 'byes tshad la bab// khru yi tshad du bya ba'o// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pa yi// snying po'i dkyil 'khor dbus su yang // mkhas r+b+ba shin/

424b1(rgyud): drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// ral gri dang ni dgra sta'i phyag/ ral ba'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lus phyed pa dang / zhags pas kun nas/
424b2(rgyud): dkris pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa/ nam mkha' la phyir phyogs pa/ pad+ma dang bcas pa byas pa la/ grA grA 'bar ba'i gdong bya'o// mdung rtse gsum dang pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa/ drag po'i zhal 'jigs

424b4(rgyud): snying po dang bcas pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i tshe na rtsi bya'o// ri mo gnyis pa'i nang du pad+ma kha phyed bye ba ge ser 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya'o// ri mo gsum pa'i nang du 'khor lo'i rnam pa

425a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su mtshan ma sna tshogs bri bar bya ste/ rigs chen po bzhi thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// shar gyi gnas su de bzhin

425b1(rgyud): las kyi cho gas 'byor pa dang / rjes su mthun par gzhag par bya'o// bum pa gang ba dang / pog por dang / bum bu dang / bum pa dang / gtor ma dkar pos bkang ba dang / 'bras bu rnam

426a7(rgyud): ba can du 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar the tsom med do// lha'i gzugs shin tu mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos
426b1(rgyud): grub chen po thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub dang / phyag rgya'i dngos grub dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i

426b3(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad dang / thams cad du dngos grub bla na med pa gang yin pa grub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dang rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// de rtag tu rjes su/
426b4(rgyud): 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyal po dang blon por bcas pa rnams kyis dus rgyun du bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ljongs thams cad blta zhing mchod pas rjes

427a1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing mthong ba la'ang dus rtag tu srung ba dang 'arjes su 'brang bar 'gyur//
427a2(rgyud): te the tsom mi bya'o// yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ rtag tu smra ba nyung zhing mkhas pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'jug pa la dga' bar 'gyur/ sangs
427a3(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang dgyes pa dang bcas pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
427a4(rgyud): dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras ji lta ba bzhin no// 'di ni de rnams kyi mngal gyi gnas su skye ba'i tha ma yin no// rtag tu skye ba'i skye ba dran par/

427a6(rgyud): tsotsam med do// 'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// dgos pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / khro bo lcags kyu'i las brgya phrag/
427a7(rgyud): stong rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos bya'o// thams cad du lan cig bzlas brjod byas la/ thams cad du las thams cad bya'o// bklags pas 'grub pa'i cho ga'o//
427b1(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ bzhin 'dzum pas khro bo chen po lcags kyu'i gzungs/
427b2(rgyud): kyi kun tu snang bzhin pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba'i snying po lus las byung ngo // gang gos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar byas so// 'od zer gyi snang ba
427b3(rgyud): gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa'i snying po rab tu 'bebs par 'dod pa'i don dang / lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs
427b4(rgyud): pa'i don dang / lha'i dri dang mthun par gsal ba'i dri dang / rjes su mthun pa'i dri rnam par bkra ba'i char rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bab
427b5(rgyud): bo// rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis lha'i chu gas la zhing rgya che ba/ dri 'phro bas rnam par mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i chu mu tig dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ dzA ti'i 'bras bu dang 'ja bar rnamapas
427b6(rgyud): mdzes pa'i dpral ba'i lha'i chus yongs su dbang bskur te/ thigs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bzhu ba'i mig 'bral las lhung ba'i chu skar ma las rab tu lhung ba'i gos// de lta bu'i dpral
427b7(rgyud): bar thig le 'bar ba nyi ma dang smig rgyu rnam par mdzes pa'i 'od zer sa la lhung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du lhung ngo // pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgya stong phrag kha phye ba ltar rab tu
428a1(rgyud): 'dzum pas rnam par mdzes pa/ pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru ltar mnyen pa byung bar 'gyur to// bai DUR+Ya'i sdong bu nyi ma brgya stong phrag pas lhag pa'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i 'od/
428a2(rgyud): zer snang bas 'bar bzhin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la mi gang gi ched lta bur gnas par gyur to// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po chen po rdo rje 'chang gis chu'i thigs pa 'dab ma mnyam pa/

428a5(rgyud): lags so// sems dpa' chen po bdag gis ltad mo'i mchog mthong lags so// sems dpa' dag pa chen po khyod kyis bdag gi ltad mo'i the tsom med par mdzod cig ces so// de nas
