434a2(rgyud): ldan 'das la'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba yang dag par snang ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin gyi char che zhing che ba rab tu 'bab pa dang / bcom ldan
434a3(rgyud): 'das dngos grub kyi mtshan ma che zhing che ba snang ba dang / wA dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma/
434a4(rgyud): yin pa'i 'khor chen po 'dus par gyur pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po skyes par mthong bar snang ba dang / cho 'phrul che zhing che ba snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang / byang chub
434a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rig sngags chen po 'byung bar snang ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de ci'i mthus
434a6(rgyud): sngon gyi mtshan ma yang dag par snang ba lags/ 'od rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gang zhig mang dag par snang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems la the tsam de skyes par gyur
434a7(rgyud): pas/ de nges par bstan du gsol/ zhu ba lung ston par 'gyur ba gang gis bdag gi dog pa rnam par sel ba dang / som nyi rnam par sel bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la
434b1(rgyud): skabs dbye ru gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje nges par/
434b2(rgyud): bstan par bya ba nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// sgyum /
434b3(rgyud): bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus
434b4(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa'o// lag na rdo rje spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul snang bar byed do// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu sdang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag
434b5(rgyud): rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rig sngags kun tu snang ba dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po rnam par snang bar
434b6(rgyud): byed do// de'i mthus snang ba 'di dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul 'di snang ngo // lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mthong ba dang / ming bzung ba tsam gyis kyang de
434b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthob
435a1(rgyud): ba dang / mtshan bzungs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
435a2(rgyud): rigs kyi dam tshig dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / snying po'i mthu rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhug
435a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas pa de rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
435a4(rgyud): kyi drung du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam
435a5(rgyud): tshig dang / gsang sngags chen po rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i phyir
435a6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du snying po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang /
435a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsang ba la rab tu zhugs shing dbang sgyur ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying por gyur pa gcig pu'o// 'di lta ste/ 'o ma dang chu yang dag par 'byung ba
435b1(rgyud): bzhin no// snying po gcig pu 'di rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rjes su zhugs pa'o// des na lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po//
435b2(rgyud): 'di kun nas rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya'o// lag na rdo rje rgyu des na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma rig sngags
435b3(rgyud): rgyal po 'di'i ming lan cig bzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi drung du gsang ba thams cad kyi snying po dang / gzungs dang
435b4(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rab tu ston pa dang / mtshan bzung bar byas par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi
435b5(rgyud): drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang //
435b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas legs so zhes bya ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa yangs pa chen po'i dngos grub rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro// mchog tu grub chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshes/
435b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub sa sar rnyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rig sngags kyi snying po dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
436a1(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi rgyan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su song bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi/
436a2(rgyud): lha thams cad kyi rjes su sbyar zhing dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de bzhin du rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
436a3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// lag na rdo rje de bas na de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthu chen po'o// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgya
436a4(rgyud): bo 'di me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ dri dang / byug pa dang / rol mo gcig gis mchod pa dang / lan cig tsam gyis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi snying /
436a5(rgyud): po gsang ba dang / mchod pa rnams byas pa dang / mnyes par byas pa dang / klog par byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / dkyil
436a6(rgyud): 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis gnod
436a7(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi lha de rnams thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do// yams thams cad/
436b1(rgyud): dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams thams cad dang /
436b2(rgyud): gtam ngan gyi 'jigs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do// gdug pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams ca
436b3(rgyud): rnam par grol bar byed do// mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbugs byin
436b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha rnams thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po rjes
436b5(rgyud): su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sbed pa byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang dpung
436b6(rgyud): dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas kun nas phyogs bzhir srung bar byed do// thams cad du cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya'i dngos grub mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin/
436b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro// pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dang / don yod zhag pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/
437a1(rgyud): gyi gsang ba don yod pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
437a2(rgyud): dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po thams cad kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi drung du mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// bkra shis dang yid la bsams pa
437a3(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gshed byed dang / byed stems dang / gsang sngags dang / ro langs dang / sems bsgyur ba dang / sbod gtong gi sbyor ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams thams
437a4(rgyud): cad 'byer bar byed do// dug dang / sbyar dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams thams cad 'byer bar byed do// rims rnams thams ca 'byer bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa
437a5(rgyud): dang nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / mtshan gcig pa dang / nyin gcig pa dang / grang ba'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang /
437a6(rgyud): 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / mgo gzer dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / mig nad dang / gzhogs phyed na pa dang / ma ro tsa ka dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / bshang/
437a7(rgyud): ba 'khyil ba dang / rna ba na pa dang / so na ba dang / rtsig logs na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / chad pa dang / gcin nad dang / gsud pa dang / lto ba na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa nas
437b1(rgyud): dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do// sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang
437b2(rgyud): dpal dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rma dang / mgrin pa 'gags pa de dag thams cad byabs pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par byed do// phyis kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro//
437b3(rgyud): 'di de ltar go skabs yangs la rgya che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes
437b4(rgyud): bya bdus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pas rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya'o// /
437b5(rgyud): de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar zhus pa'i dge mtshan dang / bkra shis pa gsang ba byin gyis rlob pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i
437b6(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa thos nas tshim pa dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
437b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa 'di ni shin tu dkon no// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
438a1(rgyud): cad dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa'i /
438a2(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po mchog tu dkon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam par blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mnyam
438a3(rgyud): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i bar nas nges par byung ba ni/ rig pa 'dzin pa de dag thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
438a4(rgyud): dngos grub mthong ba'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa grub pa'i ched du 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu nye bar bsags par 'gyur ba las gzhan ma yin no// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam
438a5(rgyud): gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / grangs med pa nye bar bsags par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das nyin
438a6(rgyud): mtshan du'ang rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran par bgyi ba skad cig kyang mi brjed par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ci ste slar yang snga dro'am/ nyin mo 'am/ mtshan mo 'am/ zla ba 'am/ lor yang rung
438a7(rgyud): ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjed na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad brjod par 'gyur/ yongs su dor bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su dor/
438b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de de bzhin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lag tu 'on/
438b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i sems can de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chung ngu skyed pa ma yin no// lag na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin
438b3(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba dang bsnyen bkur ma byas pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po
438b4(rgyud): ma thos shing ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des ni/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di de'i lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro// mi thos shing mi mthong la/ ming gi sgra grags pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// 2ga
438b5(rgyud): na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba des ni/ lag na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin
438b6(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams de'i lag tu son par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du rigs kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag
438b7(rgyud): rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par bye ba dang / snying po dang / gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo thams cad lag tu sor bar 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du song zhing rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// thams
439a1(rgyud): cad rjes su song zhing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro// rig sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro// rig sngags
439a2(rgyud): 'chang thams cad kyi mchog dang / gtso bo dang / thu bor 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi drung na sras kyi gtso bor dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/
439a3(rgyud): rnams kyis lung ston par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa dang bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gi lag tu son cing
439a4(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de ni de'i yon tan dang phan yon gzhal du med pa thob par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba de/ sangs rgyas kyi phun
439a5(rgyud): sum tshogs pa thams cad so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras nA//
439a6(rgyud): rang gi gzugs kyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru'i dbus su rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags par bltas nas/ don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba nor bu rin po che chen po
439a7(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phul bar gyur to// oM a mo g+ha tsan+ti ma Ni ba ra dpad+me dz+wa la dz+wa lan b+hu dze hUM/ 'di ni don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i snying
439b1(rgyud): po'o/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i dri ma thag/ de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das la/
439b2(rgyud): spyan mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od rig sngags kyi rgyal po nor bu rin po che chen po de la'ang ngog sngags kyi rgyal pos rgyun
439b3(rgyud): nas dbang bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang / nags dang / 'brog dgon par ba
439b4(rgyud): pa rnams rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so// phyogs bcu'i kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur to// des na dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
439b5(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings su rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la legs so//
439b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po 'dis mngon par dab bskur ba 'di legs so legs so// dus gsum du gshegs
439b7(rgyud): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dbang bskur ro// nged thams cad kyis kyang tshig gcig tu mthun pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od
440a1(rgyud): la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ro// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs de rnams kyang phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/
440a2(rgyud): de rnams thams cad la rig pa'i rgyal pos spyi bo'i gtsug nas mngon par dbang bskur ro// 'din mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'o// oM a mo g+haH
440a3(rgyud): ro tsa na ma hA mu drA ma Ni pad+me dz+wa la pra badz+rA ya hUM/ phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs
440a4(rgyud): nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas su bskor ba gsum byas nas
440a5(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyag byas nas spyan sngar 'dug ste sems par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang de'i rig pa'i rgyal po sems par gzigs nas/ ji ltar da ltar yid
440a6(rgyud): la byed pa yang dag par rab tu gsal bar mdzad do// oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la pad+ma a b+hi ka pa Ni badz+re sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ke hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal po des dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur/
440a7(rgyud): babs mngon par dbang skur ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs thun mong ba'i dam tshig rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin
440b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtan
440b2(rgyud): ba mthong ngo // rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad mthong ngo // rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul che zhing che ba dag byung ngo // don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen
440b3(rgyud): po shin tu ngo mtshar ba dag mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu mthong
440b4(rgyud): nas don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba dang ldan pa'o// oM a mo g+ha pU dza ma Ni pad+ma badz+re ta thA ga
440b5(rgyud): ta bi lo ki te sa man+ta pra sa ra hUM/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po byin ma thag tu mchod pa rgya chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma rab tu byung ste/ ji ltar rang /
440b6(rgyud): rang gi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa chen po rnams rab tu byung ngo // rtsa rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba yangs pa rgya chen po go skabs kun tu gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
440b7(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pa rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yangs dag par mthong ngo // de nas rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pas bcom ldan 'das
441a1(rgyud): la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das las ring por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du/
441a2(rgyud): phyogs nas stan la 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul//
441a3(rgyud): pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs byin gyis rlob pa'i khyad par phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo'i mthu stobs pad+ma yangs pa chen po'i gsang ba den yod zhags pa'i rnam
441a4(rgyud): par 'phrul pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i de kho na nyid kyi snying po grub pa/ dam tshig dang rjes su mthun pa/ mthu stobs dang yon tan 'byung ba la phan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rnam
441a5(rgyud): par 'phrul pa yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad kyi mchog rab tu sbyin pa la ltos/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rjes su sbyin te/ rig
441a6(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad kyi snang ba byed par 'gyur ro// skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang /
441a7(rgyud): 'azas dang / yid kyi shing rta ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// dgra thams cad rab tu 'dul bar byed do// bgegs dang log par
441b1(rgyud): 'dren pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do// char ches pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// char med na char 'bebs so// rlung dang / sad dang / ser bzlog par byed do// mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar byed do//
441b2(rgyud): nad thams cad zlog par byed do// gdug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// tshe dang nad med pa 'phel bar byed do// bsod nams sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / 'bru 'phel bar byed/
441b3(rgyud): do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad dang / cho ga bklags pas 'grub
441b4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub gsungs so// de nas snying po 'di bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig pa'i rgyal po bklags pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// stong phrag brgya bzlas pas
441b5(rgyud): pad+mo yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan mtha' dag dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / pags pa spyan ras gzigs
441b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi gzhal med khang dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang mtha' dag mthong ngo // de la lha rnams rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig shes par yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi dkyil
441b7(rgyud): 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang rjes su mthun par yang 'gyur ro// dang po rmi lam mthong ba tsam gyis 'gro'o// gnyis par rmi lam mthong ba la de
442a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/
442a2(rgyud): rnams kyis rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor du brtags pa mthong ngo // gzhal yas khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa'ang mthong ngo // der yang rab tu 'jug par byed de dam tshig kyang 'dzin par byed do//
442a3(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba'ang so sor thob bo// rig sngags dang bcas pa'i dngos grub rab tu thob bo// gsum par rmi lam mthong na rdo
442a4(rgyud): rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang bcas pa rang gi rgyan dang dkyil
442a5(rgyud): 'khor du brtags pa dang / gzhal med khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa mthong ngo // de la'ang rdo rje 'chang rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig gi phyag rgya sbyin par byed do// mngon par dang bskur bar mngon/
442a6(rgyud): par dbang bskur bar byed do// rig sngags thams cad dang / don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i dngos grub chen po dang / mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos
442a7(rgyud): grub chen po dang dam tshig thams cad so sor thob bo// bzhi par rmi lam mthong ba na nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i rims par bye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / rang gi rgyan
442b1(rgyud): dang / dkyil 'khor mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / lha'i tshogs dang / dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i lha dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'ang mthong
442b2(rgyud): skye/ de la'ang rab tu 'jug par byed do// phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / cho ga dang bcas pa rjes su thob ste/ mngon par dbang bskur ba'ang rab tu thob bo// dngos grub chen po dang mchog sbyin pa la
442b3(rgyud): so sor thob cing thams cad du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// lnga par rmi lam mthong ba na rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtag
442b4(rgyud): pa dang / po Ta la ka'i ri'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / lha dang bcas pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i
442b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mthong ste/ de la'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyid sems can de la rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang /
442b6(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / gzungs kyi dngos grub so sor thob bo// rang nyid kyang don yod pa'i rig sngags kyi dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur te mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// cho ga zhib mo
442b7(rgyud): thams cad dang dngos grub kyang rjes su stsal bar byed do// mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin pa so sor thob bo// drug par rmi lam mthong ba na dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras
443a1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa mthong ngo // gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin/
443a2(rgyud): dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mthong ste/ de la'ang rab tu 'jug par byed do// phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dam tshig dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba so sor thob ste/
443a3(rgyud): rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin pa so sor thob bo// bdun par rmi lam chen po mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por gshegs nas rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa
443a4(rgyud): mthong ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskur ba dang bdud 'dul ba mthong ngo // de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mjed phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ rang nyid kyi phyag gis bzung nas rab
443a5(rgyud): tu 'jug par byed do// rang nyid mngon par dbang bskur zhing mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos
443a6(rgyud): grub kyi mchog sbyin pa rjes su stsol bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston par byed do// nad sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa thams cad rig sngags
443a7(rgyud): 'chang gi rgyal po gcig pur 'gyur ro// skye ba brje ba 'chi 'pho ba'i dus su dran pa nye bar gnas shing dus byed par 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye ba'i skal pa/
443b1(rgyud): dang bcas par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mchod par byed do//
443b2(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong nas nye bar ston par byed do// thams cad du'ang de rnams rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar ston par byed do// thams cad du'ang rang gi
443b3(rgyud): gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig nye bar ston par byed do// bskal pa brgya stong phrag gi bar du'ang sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog
443b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags rnams la mngon du
443b5(rgyud): phyogs par 'gyur ro// skye ba skye bar yang rang gi bsod nams kyi las kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// thams cad du gnas thams cad du yongs su dag pa'i las kyi sgrub thabs kyi tshe
443b6(rgyud): ga'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes pa rtsa ba'i snying po'i dngos grub bla na med pa bklags pas 'grub pa'o// de nas 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed
443b7(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad nges par sreg pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// gang dang gang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams
444a1(rgyud): rjes su bcings par 'gyur ro// de'ang nyi ma bdun gyis rang gi lus de'ang rang gi gzugs kyis nges par 'gro ste mdun du nye bar 'dug ste sbyin par byed pa dang / sngon gyi
444a2(rgyud): sgrib pa nye bar bsags pa 'di dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su zad pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bdag zhum pa dang / 'khrug pa mtha' dag bzlas pa tsam gyis yang dag
444a3(rgyud): par smra bar byed cing mi snang bar byed do// rims thams cad la skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas rims thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do// nad
444a4(rgyud): thams cad la byabs pas yongs su grol bar byed do// mtshon chas sam/ rma bya'i spros sam/ mdas kyang rung sde nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do// gdon thams cad la tshen srud smra
444a5(rgyud): skud pa la mdud pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te gdon gyis zin pa de'i mgul par bcings te lan bdun du byab par bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin/
444a6(rgyud): bar bya/ bzlas brjod lan bdun bya bzhin pa dang bcas pas gang dang gang gi gdon gyis zin par gyur pa de'ang rang gi lus kyis nges par 'gro ba ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du nye bar 'dug
444a7(rgyud): nas thams cad smra bar byed do// rang gis dris pa de thams cad smra bar byed do// bka' bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab rtsod dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams
444b1(rgyud): thams cad la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bsam gtan dang sbyin sreg gis yongs su grol lo// kha ra mur te rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs na rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur
444b2(rgyud): nas gnas so// dug 'thungs pas tshu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste dug med par 'gyur ro// dug gi zos pa la byab par bya ste dug med par 'gyur ro// dug dang / byad ste ma sa dang / gsang
444b3(rgyud): sngags dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad la dri dang bsres pa'i bum pa la stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas la bkru bar bya ste/ bkrus pa tsam gyis mod la thams cad nyams par byed do//
444b4(rgyud): gang yang lus zad pa dang / nyams pa dang / bskams pa dang / rgyal po'i dpal med pa dang / lus yongs su gdungs pa la rig sngags 'chang des ma reg pas dri'i chus yongs su gang ba'i bum pa
444b5(rgyud): dgu yungs kar gyis gtor te stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas An+ta ra sap+ta dang / bI ka dang / A Ta dang / bil ba dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / e ka sa thA na dang / mo lo
444b6(rgyud): kya dang / lus kyi mar gyis bsku mnye byas nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te A Ta byug par bya'o// gzugs brnyan bya ste gong bu de mtshon chas dum bu brgyad du bya ste/ snod yongs
444b7(rgyud): su gang ba ba ni mtshams bzhir 'phang bar bya zhing / snod gang ba bzhi mtshams bzhir 'phang bar bya'o// de nas snying po sa lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byab par bya'o// de nas ne'u gsing sngon po gang /
445a1(rgyud): du chu rgyun 'bab par dri'i chu'i bum pas khrus bya zhing gos dkar po dgus g.yogs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / dkon
445a2(rgyud): mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa'i bram ze'i ston mo yon dang bcas pa bya'o// de nas rang nyid byams pa dang ldan par bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa gya nom pa gya nom pas dkar ba'i zas
445a3(rgyud): kyi bza' ba dang btung bas tshim par bya'o// de nas dpal med pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis mi reg pa dang / 'byung po dang
445a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grib gnon dang / brjed byed dang / gza' dang / log 'dren gyis zin pa las yongs su grol lo// bza' nyes dang / 'go mnyes dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las
445a5(rgyud): yongs su grol bar byed do// lus kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / kun
445a6(rgyud): nas nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skye ba brjed nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar
445a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu'ang dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' dang lha thams cad kyis ji srid byang chub tu mngon par
445b1(rgyud): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de 'dzin par 'gyur ro// mig na ba la pa lA sha'i chu dang / shing mngar gyi chu dang / dri ma med pa'i tshu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyar bar bya ste mig nad 'phral/
445b2(rgyud): du zhi bar byed do// mgo bo'i zug rngu dang gzhogs phyed na ba la mar dang til mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas 'jam par bsros pas sman shu ti la bsgos nas mgo la bsum nye byas
445b3(rgyud): na/ mgo bo'i nad thams cad dang gzhogs phyed na pa'i nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo// so'i zug rdul me tog sna ma dang so shing la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas nas bza' bar
445b4(rgyud): byas na so'i zug rngu yongs su grol lo// rna ba'i zug rdul shu ti dang til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas bkang bar bya ste/ rna ba'i zug rngu thams cad yongs su grol lo// khan pa la
445b5(rgyud): smin ma gyu ro'i chu dang mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas 'jam par bsros pa btung bar bya ste/ kha'i nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo// lto ba'i zug rdul lan tshwa dang tshul lan brgya rtsa
445b6(rgyud): brgyad yongs su bzlas nas btung bar bya ste/ lto ba'i zug rngu yongs su grol lo// snying gi zug rngu la so so rtsal ma dang / go stong dang / pu ska ra'i rtsa ba rnams bzhi 'gyur gyi chus sum cha lhag
445b7(rgyud): mar lus kyi bar du bskol bar byas nas btung bar bya'o// lan brgyad bzlas pas snying gi zug rngu dang / gzhogs na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / gsung pa dang / smyug za
446a1(rgyud): ba dang / gcin nad rnams te/ de bzhin du nad thams cad 'phral du sel bar 'jig rten gyi mgon pos 'di gsungs so// rgyal po'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams kyis
446a2(rgyud): yungs kar la yongs su bzlas nas rgyal po rnams kyi sgor gtor bar bya ste/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du'ang rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur ro//
446a3(rgyud): na le sham la stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sha na le sham gyi 'bras bu kha'i rtse mor bcug ste bcangs na gang smras pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gang blangs bde so sor rnyed do// gnas thams ca
446a4(rgyud): du 'gro ba rnams la rgyal ba'i mchog chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro// klu'i char 'bebs pa la bal po se'u'i lcug mas bya ste gang du 'dod pa dar klu'i char 'bebs so// klu'i mtsher song nas mtshan mo/
446a5(rgyud): bdun du zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad du byas na gter chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug thob pa la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang bsres
446a6(rgyud): pas sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad du byas na dbang phyug chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro// dgra 'joms pa la sA lu'i phub ma dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba'i til mar dang bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad/
446a7(rgyud): du sbyin sreg byas na dgra rnams thams cad med par 'gyur ro// dgra rnams thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// slong bar 'dod pas de nyid kyi thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te dkri'i
446b1(rgyud): sgor gtor bar bya ste/ mtshan mo gcig tu mi gnas te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do// 'khrug pa'i g.yul ngor 'jug par 'dod pas yungs kar la lan stong phrag
446b2(rgyud): brgyad du yongs su bzlas te 'khrug pa'i g.yul ngo'i dbus su gtor bar bya ste/ thams cad du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur
446b3(rgyud): zhing / thams cad phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do// gnas na gnas pa thams cad kyi'ang rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang /
446b4(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// ldong ros la lan stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ mig gi mig sman du byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po
446b5(rgyud): thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// gi haM la lan stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas te thig le byas na bu ga thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byed cing / bu ga'i sgo thams cad bye ste sgor ga na?
446b6(rgyud): par byed do// gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par byed do// gi haM gis snying khar thig le byas na gang du 'jug par byed pa de dang de nyid du mchod pa chen por 'gyur te/ nor che ba dang 'bru 'phel bathob bo//
446b7(rgyud): lag po gnyis la byugs pas gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur te/ gang blangs pa de thams cad so sor rnyed do// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'dod pas lag pa g.yas pa la gau hi gis byugs nas lan stong rtsa brgyad yongs su
447a1(rgyud): te/ rgyal po'i sgo la thal lhag sbyin par bya ste/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo sras dang / 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du byed/
447a2(rgyud): pa la me tog dang 'bras bu la lan stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya/ yang na mngag par bya ste 'phral nyid du dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa de dang de nyid du 'gror/
447a3(rgyud): slar yang 'ong ngo // yang na mi smos pas nam mkha' la phang bar bya ste/ gang gi ming smos pa de 'gugs par 'gyur zhing mtshan mo 'ong bar byed do// mthu stobs kyis slar yang phyir ldog ste 'gro'o//
447a4(rgyud): skyes pa dbang du byed pa la dzA ti dang sna ma'i me tog la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// yang na mngag par bya ste reg pa tsam gyis bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang dbang du byed par 'gyur/
447a5(rgyud): ro' gang smras pa dang gang blangs pa de thams cad byed do// 'bangs dang ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la 'bras bu la lan brgyam brgyad yongs su zlas te sbyin par bya ba 'am mngag/
447a6(rgyud): par bya ste bzung ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'azang bar 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho bar nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// rje'u rigs dbang du byed pa la ba sha ka'i me tog la/
447a7(rgyud): lan rgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so// bram ze dbang du byed pas zho dang 'o ma'i bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/
447b1(rgyud): bram ze dbang du byed pa grub bo// rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la bu ram dang 'o ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la gag
447b2(rgyud): dang gang gi bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste zos pa tsam gyis mod la dbang du 'gyur ro// rang gi 'dod pa'i bya ba gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa bya ba rnams ni bklags
447b3(rgyud): bas grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa pad+ma'i chu skyes kyi rtsa ba'i snying po'i yod byad dang cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// // de nas don yod pa'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi yo byad
447b4(rgyud): dang cha gar 'gyur te/ gzungs 'di rig sngags 'chang gi sadzan pa tsam dang / bklags patsam dang / phyag rgya bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yod bzhin gyi nor bu rigs
447b5(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya dang dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dran par 'gyur ro// ga pa'i rgyal po'i gzung stong phrag bzlas pa 'dis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par
447b6(rgyud): dbang bskur 'bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang des kyang dang por rmi lam gyi nang du mthong ngo // dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rnam par snang
447b7(rgyud): mdzad yid bzhin nor bu'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag
448a1(rgyud): rgyal rab tu 'jug par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rang rang rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba rjes su sbyin par 'gyur ro// legs so zhes bya ba'o//
448a2(rgyud): sgra brjod par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams bye bar gyur pa'i sgor mthong ngo // gang du 'dod pa der 'jug go// des kyang de bzhin gshegs po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya
448a3(rgyud): stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rig sngags 'chang de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rtags tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par gnas so//
448a4(rgyud): stong phrag gnyis bu bzlas pas gnyis par rmi lam mthong bar blta'o// pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang la'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / gzungs dang / gzhal med khang mtha' dag yo
448a5(rgyud): su rdzogs par mthong ngo // der yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ngo // de la'ang de gzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i rig
448a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi yi de bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang dkyil
448a7(rgyud): 'khor rnams ston par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang rang nyid la'ang mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed do// pad+mo langs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
448b1(rgyud): du'ang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang /
448b2(rgyud): bskur bar 'gyur zhing yongs su 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro// stong phrag gsum pa bzlas pas rmi lam chen po gsum pa bstan pa mthong ste/ gzhal med khang mtha' dag tu rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje'i rigs
448b3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba rjes su stsol bar mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dus gsum du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid bzhin
448b4(rgyud): gyi nor bu rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgya 'ang mthong ngo // de'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la rdo rje'i phyag
448b5(rgyud): rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// rang rang rnams kyang rdo//
448b6(rgyud): rje'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba rjes su stsol bar mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i dam tshig la rab tu 'jug par mdzad do// rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i mngon par
448b7(rgyud): dbang bskur ba legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i rigs yang dag par byin gyis rlob pa'i dngos gru bo nye bar ston par mdzad do// thams
449a1(rgyud): cad du rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// stong phrag bzhi pa bzlas pas nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i dbang smra/
449a2(rgyud): ba thob bo// de la'ang nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba thob bo// rmi lam ston pa de'ang dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'id/
449a3(rgyud): 'khor rnams mthong ngo // dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyang rig sngags 'chang de la nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / mngon/
449a4(rgyud): par dbang bskur bas yang mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// rang rang rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi nor bu gsang ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba gtsug gi nor bu byin gyis
449a5(rgyud): rlob pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par mdzad
449a6(rgyud): do// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dngos grub kyi dam tshig gis dbang bskur ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par
449a7(rgyud): byed cing rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang ji srid sangs rgyas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob par yang dag par
449b1(rgyud): dgongs par 'gyur ro// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog
449b2(rgyud): tu 'gyur ro// bzlas pa lnga pas rmi lam chen po'i phyag rgya ston par byed pa ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag rdzogs par phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas kyi mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par
449b3(rgyud): dbang bskur bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang phyir mi ldog pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen por mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// dkyil 'khor chen po thams
449b4(rgyud): cad dang phyag rgya chen po mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// bzlas pa drug pas rmi lam yang dag par ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub kyi snying por gshegs te/ rdo rjer
449b5(rgyud): gdan byin gyis rlob pas byin gyis brlabs te mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa mthong ste seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs
449b6(rgyud): ba'o / kha de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang rang rang gi rig sngags 'chang phyir mi ldog par mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i gsung brjod par mdzad do//
449b7(rgyud): dgongs pa cher brtan pas dgongs par 'gyur ro// ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mtha' thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su 'bring bar 'gyur ro// bzlas pa bdun pas
450a1(rgyud): rmi lam chen po ston pas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char 'be
450a2(rgyud): pa dang / chos kyi sgron me spor ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi dung 'bud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur bar mthong
450a3(rgyud): ngo'adi bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / phyag rgyas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang
450a4(rgyud): bskur bar mdzad do// legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par mdzad do// phyag rgya chen po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / kun nas rgasang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid kyi
450a5(rgyud): dngos grub dang / mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de bzhin du bklags pa dang bzlas pa tsam gyis cho ga dang las kyi 'bras bu ston par mdzad do// don yod pa'i nor bu rnam par snang mdzad
450a6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho ga 'di'ang rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di bklags pa dang dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi/
450a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad du gnas la gnas pa'i dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro// bzlas pa tsam gyis mod la dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin ga
450b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas smos nas mngon sum du ston par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ston par mdzad par 'gyur ro// mtshan smos nas 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin/
450b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gdug pa thams
450b3(rgyud): cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa sngon gyi ldog pa dang / sgrib pa rnam par 'joms par byed do// bklags pa tsam dang / lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyis de thams cad yongs su zad padang
450b4(rgyud): yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// sems can gyi sdig pa'i chos gang cung zad kun tu spyad pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i sems can de'i mdun du
450b5(rgyud): lan gsum du dbyangs gsangs bstod pas brjod cing dran par bya ste/ de'i sgra thos pa tsam gyis mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med par song ba thams cad dang / mnar
450b6(rgyud): med pa la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sems can de'ang sdig pa thams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// yang na sdig pa can gyi sems can shi bar gyur pas
450b7(rgyud): nams kyi 'dad pas/ sems sa de'i don du lungs kar la lani nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te/ sems can da'i don du rob sregs pa 'am/ mchad pa 'am/ sras pa'am/ rus pa'i keng /
451a1(rgyud): sam/ dur khrod kyi dbus su de'i steng du gdab cing der gtor bar bya'o// gtor ba tsam gyis mod la sems can de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de nyid du sems can de'i lus pa byung chub
451a2(rgyud): chen po'i yan lag gi chu'i dri'i mchog bsgos par 'gyur ro// 'phral nyid du dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang / yi dag sa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin gyi lus las yongs su grol bar
451a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// der yang ngan 'gro rnams las 'phos par 'gyur zhing / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di la/
451a4(rgyud): som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// gang gi tshe nad drag pos thebs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ rig sngags 'chang gis rna bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin par bya ste/ de'ang nad yun ring po
451a5(rgyud): las grol te rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro// nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// spyi bo'i gtsug tu phyag rgyas btab ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste 'phral
451a6(rgyud): nyid du yongs su grol lo// gal te nag po chen pos rang gi phyag rgyas btab na de ltar de nyid la bltas pas phyag rgya thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// gal te sun ring du ma grol na gang gis phyag rgyas
451a7(rgyud): btab par gyur pa de'i mig gnyis po dag 'byin par 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa la bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig
451b1(rgyud): byas la bcing bar bya ste/ gdon dang brjed byed thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bcing bar bya ste nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo//
451b2(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te kha ton du bzung na thams cad du smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// na leg ma/
451b3(rgyud): dang brgya spos dang / ru rta dang / yung ba gnyis dang / ro'i mig sman la sngags stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas la phye ma zhib mor byas te/ mig sman dang mnyam par sbyar nas gdon gyis zin pa rnams kyi mig la
451b4(rgyud): bskus na bskus pa tsam gyis mod la gdon thams cad yongs su grol lo// gal te yun ring por ma grol ni gdon gyi mig gnyis 'byin par 'gyur ro// rim sa nyin bzhi pa la mig gnyis la bsku bar bya//
451b5(rgyud): gal te yun rang du ma grol na mgo bo tshal pa bdun du lwa 'gas par 'gyur ro// lus la ma 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la bskus pa tsam gyis yongs su grol lo// gal te yun ring du ma
451b6(rgyud): grol na mge bo dum bu bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro// dug gis zos pa'i mig la bsku bar bya zhing ma ngag gzhug par bya'o// dug 'thungs pa la bskus na du ga med par 'gyur ro// shi ba'i
451b7(rgyud): mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur te/ de smra bar byed do// chu dang yungs kar brdegs na slar yang 'gyel bar byed do// mgo bo'i zug rngu dang gzhogs byed na pa rnams kyi mig la bskus te phyag rgya thams
452a1(rgyud): cad 'jig par byed do// rgyal po khros pa gang gis skye bo gnas nas 'byin pa dang / de bzhin du mtshon cha mang po 'bab pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo nyid la'ang 'dis
452a2(rgyud): bskus pa'i mig gis bltas na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// de rnams thams cad rtag tu dbang du gyur nas gnas te 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// don yod pa'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po dang
452a3(rgyud): gzungs kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// / de nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po pad+ma'i dbang bskur ba'i nor bu'i gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad du 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
452a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rigs thun mong bar rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pas mi 'pham pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor pad+ma chen po'i dbang bskur
452a5(rgyud): ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i pad+ma bcings pas spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de nas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis bzlas pa tsam gyis mod la de'i rmi lam mthong
452a6(rgyud): ba nye bar ston par byed do// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par mthong ba dang cho 'phrul ston par byed do// gzhal yas khang dang bcas/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas//
452a7(rgyud): lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams nye bar ston par byed do// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
452b1(rgyud): dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying
452b2(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams thams cad kyang so so so so'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mtha' dag nye bar ston par
452b3(rgyud): byed de/ ji srid du byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba'i bar gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar ston par byed do// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
452b4(rgyud): de rnams kyis kyang dkyil 'khor chen po de rnams kyi so so so so'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// dkyil 'khor gyi mchog thams cad du mngon par
452b5(rgyud): dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de nas rig sngags 'chang de de lta bu'i rmi lam chen po mthong nas/ dga' ba chen po rgyas par 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang rab tu mgu ba'i snying des
452b6(rgyud): kyang don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i mngon por dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang de la legs so legs so zhes rjod par mdzad
452b7(rgyud): de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rigs thun mong ba'i dam tshig gis mngon par dbang bskur bas khyod mngon par dbang bskur ro// grub
453a1(rgyud): pa thob pa de rnams rig sngags 'chang chen po dang dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bor 'gyur ro zhes so//
453a2(rgyud): sor sad do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzlas pa dang bklags pa tsam gyis de ma thag par rgya chen po'i yon tan gsal ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ro// slar yang 'di'i gong nas gong du rnam par 'du/
453a3(rgyud): pa ston par byed do// rig sngags 'chang gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang yang rung bar gyur kyang rung / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mar gyur
453a4(rgyud): kyang rung ste/ dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang dbang skur bar byed par 'dod pa des/ gzungs kyi snying po 'di'i bzang 'phreng ngam/ cod pan nam dar dpyangs sam/
453a5(rgyud): dbu rgyan la lan stong rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu la bcings nas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mngon par dbang bskur te/ rig sngags 'chang de 'am/
453a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po re re'i dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
453a7(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i nor bu chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan 'od zer
453b1(rgyud): sna tshogs brgya stong phrag 'bar bas yang dag par brgyan pa'i dbu rgyan chen po dang / dang dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing /
453b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de ltar rgya che zhing yangs pa che ba'i gzhal med khang 'di mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba nye bar gnas par
453b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gang gis dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang /
453b4(rgyud): bsnyen bkur ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// snying po 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gdug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ rnam par nyas par byed/
453b5(rgyud): rnam par zhig par byed/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa dang bral zhing nges par grol bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po sogs
453b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos grub chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / tshig btsun
453b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thun tshags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// lus la dri bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu de dran pas kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byin no// lus tsan dan gyi dris bsgos par 'gyur
454a1(rgyud): ro// sems can thams cad mchog tu byams pa dang mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// thams cad du dngos grub chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// bgegs dang log par 'dren/
454a2(rgyud): pa thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dag sa dang / sha za thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis ring du 'bros par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
454a3(rgyud): nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// rtag tu'ang mthong bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po'ang rtag par rgyun du rjes
454a4(rgyud): su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// dus rgyun du rtag tu mthong ba rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du mngon
454a5(rgyud): par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// don yod pa pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang bskur ba'i gzungs so// /
454a6(rgyud): de nas don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho gar 'gyur te/ dran pa dang / bklags pa dang / bzlas pa tsam gyis gzhal med khang chen po rgya che ba yangs pa'i mthu
454a7(rgyud): stobs yangs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthu stobs chen po'i yon tan 'byung zhing mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod//
454b1(rgyud): ba'i sprin gyi char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam dang bzlas pa tsam gyis
454b2(rgyud): mod la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ pad+ma
454b3(rgyud): dang ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdag mdzes chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / zla ba mdzes pa dang / drim
454b4(rgyud): med pa ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ skam las skyes pa'i me tog sA la dang / tamA la dang / tsam pa ka dang mya ngam 'chang dang / a ti muk+Sha ka dang / skya nar dang /
454b5(rgyud): mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / dong ka dang / sin d+hu bA ri ki'i me tog dang / sna ma'i me to ga dang / yU thi ka dang / mA li ka ga sar pa dang / ta ra Na dang / ku pya ka dang / ma
454b6(rgyud): ru ba ka'i me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas sna tshogs pa rnams dang / ku mu da'i rigs rnams dang / gzugs dang / kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / ri dang / chu dang / dgon dung dang / this
454b7(rgyud): bo dang / chu rlabs dang / nags dang / nags 'dab dang / skyed mos tshal dang / chu klung dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu dang / a sA hi ta dang / phug dang / dgon par 'bab pa'i sa las skyes pa'i me
455a1(rgyud): tog dang / dri ma med pa'i lha rdzas dang / lha rdzas kyi dri bzang dang / yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang / rab tu sim par//
455a2(rgyud): byed pa'i reg pa las skyes pa'i char 'bab par byed do// me tog chen po dang me tog skyes pa rnams kyi phung po chen po gcal du bkram pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i sprin du
455a3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dran pa dang bsams pa tsam gyis me tog gi mchod pa chen po byed do// 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang bsams pa tsam gyis gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rnam//
455a4(rgyud): par bkra ba'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po phyogs bcu kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ do shal dang / gdu bu rgyan can dang / dpung rgyan
455a5(rgyud): dang / rna rgyan dang / gser skud dang / mu tog gi dra ba dang / rked chings dang / nyis skor dang / sum skor dang / skar ma'i 'phreng ba dang / gtsug tor 'ching ba dang / zla ba phyed pa can dang / gsar/
455a6(rgyud): byed pa can dang / gdu bu rgyan can zla ba phyed pa dang / shang shang te'u can dang / dbu rgyan dang / cod pan gyi dra ba dang / gser gyi dra ba dang / a bi ka dang / kar+N+Na ba li ka dang / pre tsa ka dang /
455a7(rgyud): tra mA'i skud pa dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / ka spa'i 'phreng ba dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba dang / rin po ches spras pa'i 'phreng ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu dang / rna ba gang ba dang /
455b1(rgyud): gtsug tor 'ching ba dang / yongs su bkri ba dang / gtsug gi nor bu'i char rab tu 'bab par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs/
455b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin chen por gyur
455b3(rgyud): nas/ rang rang gi gzhal med khang gi 'byor par rab tu 'gyur ro// char dang tshon sna tshogs su btsos pa'i phyogs bral gyi gos sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
455b4(rgyud): pa thams cad phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang rjes su 'thun pa'i ri mo'i gos dang /
455b5(rgyud): ri mo'i gzhal med khang gi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs so// 'di lta ste/ yul ka shi ka'i gos tshon sna tshogs su btsos pa dang / gos kyi gzhal med khang dang / dar gos rnams kyi char
455b6(rgyud): 'bebs so// 'di lta ste / nyi ma'i 'od dang / zla ba dang / seng ge skyes dang / dar thod dang / ka shi ka dang / ko sa la pa'i mi'i dbang po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i snang ba dang / pad+mo dang /
455b7(rgyud): ut+pa la can gyi kha dog dang / ko dri kA dang / gser gyi gdu bu dang / mu tig gi 'bras bu dang / klu'i go cha dang / rnam par snang ba dang / lha'i rgyan dang / me tog sna ma dang / ko sha dang / tsam paka
456a1(rgyud): dang / kha dog can dang / dang thod can dang / kan+ta ra'i tshogs dang / zla ba'i rgyan can dang / dong ka'i me tog can dang / pad+ma dkar po can zhes bya ba dang / ba ma laM ka dang / ko shA/
456a2(rgyud): te ki dang / rdzogs par 'phel bar byed pa can dang / sngon gyi yul dang gling dang ldan pa kun nas 'od gsal ba dang / gdu bu ring po dang / dga' ba 'khyil ba dang / rgyan skor ba dang / sna ma'i me tog gi kha dog
456a3(rgyud): can dang / kan da'i 'dab ma can dang / dak+Shi NA kaM dang / kany+tsi nA sa'i kha dog can nam bskor ba dang / gser mdog dang / rin po che'i mdog dang / zla ba'i kha dog gi lag pa dang / me'i kha dog can dang /
456a4(rgyud): bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog can dang / nam mkha'i kha dog can dang / ka nag+ni shu kaM dang / kun nas 'khyil zhing yid bde ba'i ba spu rnam par snang zhing rnam par gsal ba can dang / kun nas 'od gsal zhing dri ma med
456a5(rgyud): pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi cod pan yang ngo zhes so// gos rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhal du med pa'i char 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnams gzhal du med pa'i mchod pa'i sprin dang bcas pa'i char
456a6(rgyud): 'bebs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / rig sngag
456a7(rgyud): 'chang gi dbang po rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskar ba'i mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// de ltar rig sngags dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod par 'gyur ro// rje
456b1(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i chu gzhal du med pa dang / dri'i phye ma gzhal du med pa dang / bdug pa gzhal du med pa'i mchod par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ tsan dan gau shIR+Sha dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang / tsan dan dang
456b2(rgyud): tsan dan dmar po dang / pad+ma can dang / dri zhim pa dang / sar li dang / gu kum dang / gos dang ldan pa dang / dri dang ldan pa dang / pu shel ci dang / rgya spos dang / tu ru ka dang / sprig dang / bo la dang / sra rtsi 'og
456b3(rgyud): dang rta na me ru dang / shrI beSh+ya ka dang / pog dang / sal gi dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dang / hwags dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lnga bskor ba dang / ka dza ka dang / bal+li ka'i shing dang / bawi ka dang / ga pung dang /
456b4(rgyud): gla rtsi dang / rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba'i bdug pa gzhan sbyar ba rnams dang / dri'i chu'i rnam pa rnams dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pas bsgos pa'i phye ma dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
456b5(rgyud): gshegs pa mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs so// sgron ma'i shing sna tshogs pa sbar ba gzhal du med pas snang bar byed bzhin pa 'bar bar byed do// phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas sgron ma'i shing
456b6(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dang mnyam pa'i sgron ma'i shing rab tu 'byung ngo // 'di lta ste/ tu ru ka'i til mar dang / tsam po ka'i til mar dang / ut+pa la'i til mar dang / sna ma'i
456b7(rgyud): til mar dang / bA rI ka gas mar dang / kon+ta'i til mar dang / a ti muk+Sha ka'i til mar dang pa la sha'i til mar dang / tsan dan gyi til mar dang / dzA ti'i 'bras bu'i til mar dang / bal+li'i til mar dang / a na/
457a1(rgyud): gan+d+ha la sogs pa'i til mar la sgron ma rab tu byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ ro brgya ba'i kha zas rnams phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
457a2(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yul dang dus su nye bar bzhugs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs
457a3(rgyud): pa'i gzugs dang / rnam pa dang / zhim zhing mngar ba/ myang bar 'os pa/ dga' bar bya ba/ yid dga' ba/ tsau lo dz+ya dang / tshim par 'os pa dang / dri'i rigs lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pas dus gsu/
457a4(rgyud): du gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
457a5(rgyud): rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang bcas pa rnams kun tu tshim par byed pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / sbrang rtsi mngar ba'i ra myong ba dang ldan
457a6(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par byed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur ro// 'di sa
457a7(rgyud): rtsa rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs pa dga' bar 'os pa'i rol mi log rdob pa rnams dang / 'di lta ste/ dbyangs kyi yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i ma'am ci dang dri ba'i glu dbyangs rnam pa sna chags
457b1(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa dang / klu'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lnga'i bu mo dang / chu las byung ba'i bu mo rnams kyis rnamapa tha dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi klu dbyangs kyi rol mo'i sgra rab tu
457b2(rgyud): 'khrol bzhin pa rnams kyi sa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi dus gsum pa'i rol mo chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// rnam pa sna tshogs par mdzes pa'i bstod pa'i
457b3(rgyud): rnam pas rol mo'i cho ga zhib mo ji lta ba bzhin du gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba dang rjes su 'thun pas yang dag par stong par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang
457b4(rgyud): bcas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lhas rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yang dag par bstod pa rnams kyang mtshan smos pas yang dag par bstod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du/
457b5(rgyud): yangs pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ mchog thams cad sbyin pa po/ thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin du gyur pa/ bla na med pa dpag bsam gyi
457b6(rgyud): shing lta bu'o// sna tshogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i mchog gi
457b7(rgyud): dngos grub ster bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ma dang bar gyur pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par gyur pa'o// gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog
458a1(rgyud): gi dngos grub dang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su myong bar byed pa/
458a2(rgyud): nad thams cad sel bar byed pa'o// sdug bsngal mi bzad pa gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o// bkra shis pa dang yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// de bzhin/
458a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par skul bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad
458a4(rgyud): spyan 'dzin par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par byed pa'o// klu thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /

458a6(rgyud): ma phyin pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o// ma grol ba rnams grol bar byed pa'o// skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs so// dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// mgon med pa
458a7(rgyud): rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa'o// 'khras med pa rnams kyi 'khra sa'o// bsnyen gnas ma byas pa rnams la bsnyen gnas sbyin pa'o// gtsang sbra ma byas pa rnams la gtsang sbar spyod pa'o// mi tshangs
458b1(rgyud): par spyod pa'i gnas la zhen pa rnams la tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas sbyin pa'o// thub pa'i brtul zhugs ma byas pa rnams la thub pa'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o// chos ma yin pa la spyod pa rnams
458b2(rgyud): chos la sbyor ba'o// mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'o// 'jigs pas nyam thag pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// dbul po rnams la nor sbyin pa'o//
458b3(rgyud): 'bru dang bza' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'bru 'phel ba chen po sbyin pa'o// mu ges nyi ma thag pa rnams la skya rgyal gyi tshogs pa la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'o// lam nyams pa rnams kyi lam
458b4(rgyud): ston par byed pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba so sor 'gog pa'o// long ba rnams kyi mig sbyin par byed pa'o// 'on pa rnams kyi rna ba sbyin par byed//
458b5(rgyud): pa'o// sna nyams pa rnams kyi sna rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'o// reg pa med pa rnams kyi bde ba'i reg pa la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'o// longs spyod kyi nyam thag pa rnams kyi longs spyod
458b6(rgyud): sbyin par spyad pa'o// dran pa nyams pa rnams kyi dran pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o// bsam pa nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su dag par byed pa'o// tshul khrims nyams pa rnams
458b7(rgyud): kyi tshul khrims sbyin pa'o// sbyin pa la rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus nyams pa rnams la stabs dang brtson 'grus kyi
459a1(rgyud): mchog sbyin pa'o// bzod pa dang bral ba rnams la bzod pa dang zhi ba sbyin pa'o// bsam gtan nyams pa rnams la bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par/
459a2(rgyud): byed pa'o// shes rab nyams pa rnams la shes rab kun tu snang ba dang / blo gsal ba dang / shes rab chen po'i snang ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dam tshig mi shes pa rnams la dam tshig
459a3(rgyud): sbyin pa'o// phyag rgya dang bral ba rnams kyi phyag rgya yongs su skyong bar byed pa'o// rig sngags dang gsang sngags la mi mkhas pa rnams la rig sngags dang gsang sngags rab tu sbyin pa'o// mu steg
459a4(rgyud): rnams la mu stegs smra ba dang / 'jug ngogs bzang po dang / lam rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub chen po'i mchog
459a5(rgyud): sbyin pa'o// 'khor ba las ma bsgral ba rnams sgrol bar byed pa'o// mun pas long bar byed cing bsgribs pa rnams la myos pa'i mun pa sel ba sbyin par byed pa'o// sgrib par bya ba rnams kyi
459a6(rgyud): sgrib pa dang bral bar byed pa'o// mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams kyi mtshams med pa lnga skyong bar byed pa'o// ngag nyams pa rnams kyi ngag rnam par dag par byed pa'o// ma grub pa rnams la
459a7(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// thun tshags dang bcas pa rnams kyi thun tshags dang bral zhing yongs su dag par byed do// ngan pa rnams la mchog sbyin pa'o// mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams kyi
459b1(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchog go// brda mi phrad pa rnams la brda sprod par byed pa'o// kun nas 'khrugs pa rnams kyi sems gnas pa'i mchog go// mchog med pa rnams la mchog sbyin pa'o// /
459b2(rgyud): lam ngan pa mthong ba rnams la rmi lam chen po'i mchog ston pa'o// bkres pa rnams la kha zas kyi mchog sbyin pa'o// skom pa rnams btung ba chen po'i ro la yongs su longs spyod par byed pa'o//
459b3(rgyud): gcer bu rnams kyis gos dang bgo ba so sor thob cing grub pa'o// mdze can rnams kyi mdze dang bral bar byed pa'o// sha bkra can rnams kyi sha bkra yongs su skyong bar byed pa'o// rims kyis
459b4(rgyud): btab pa rnams kyi rims dang bral bar byed pa'o// gdon gyis zin pa rnams kyi gdon dang / gshed byed dang / gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa'o// dgra bo phyin ci log pa rnams
459b5(rgyud): kyi dgra rnams dang bral bar byed pa'o// dbul po rnams la nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// bu bza' can rnams kyi bu bza' cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mun pas long bar byas pa thams cad kyi skyon
459b6(rgyud): ma'i shing dang nyi ma'i 'od zer stong gis kun tu snang ba'o// rgyal pos bcom pa rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po cher byin pa'o// khon pa rnams gcig tu byed pa'o// ser sna can rnams kyi sa
459b7(rgyud): sna shin tu 'joms pa'o// 'dod chags la chags pa rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu 'joms pa'o// rmongs pa chung ba ma yin pa rnams kyi rmongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i la
460a1(rgyud): gyis rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis dge ba'i lam gyi yid chos kyi nang du chud par 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'jigs pa med par
460a2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing yid chos kyi nang du chud par 'gyur ro// log par ltung ba rnams kyis shes rab dang / blo dang / shes bzhin dang / brkam pa rnams kyi blo bsnyen par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
460a3(rgyud): ma mthong ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'dod par 'gyur ro// chos thos pa dang bral ba rnams kyis chos chen po'i ro rgya chen po thos par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun la bste/
460a4(rgyud): bkur byed pa dang bral ba rnams kyis lha dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// dbang po nyams pa rnams kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yan lag rnam par
460a5(rgyud): nyams pa'i sems can rnams kyi so so'i yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po thong bar
460a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lhas yongs su spangs pa rnams kyi lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pas dkris pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa
460a7(rgyud): dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul
460b1(rgyud): che ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sngon/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa'i sprin/
460b2(rgyud): gyi char 'bebs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs par dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi shing chen po'i mchod pa'i
460b3(rgyud): sprin gyi char 'bebs par byed pa'i mchod sprin 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid sgrub par byed pa/
460b4(rgyud): rmad du byung ba'i dngos grub yang dag par ston par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha rnams dang / gsang sngags kyi lha thams cad spyan 'dren
460b5(rgyud): zhing 'gugs par byed pa'o// 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'di ni thams cad du gsang po'i sgo ston par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i mchod pa'i snying po'i
460b6(rgyud): gzungs 'di ni dus ma yin pa'i char dang / mu ge dang / dus kyi chu rnam par nyams pa la so sor skyed pa'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ yid rtse gcig
460b7(rgyud): tu byas nas sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse ba dang byams pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o// mchod rten gyi yan lag dang nye ba 'am/ khang stong ngam/ ri bo 'am/ nags thibs po 'am/
461a1(rgyud): dgon pa 'am/ skyed mos tshal lam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ chu klung ngam/ mtshe'u 'am/ rdzing bu 'am/ klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am ga lha'i gnas sa ma/ rgyal po'o/
461a2(rgyud): pho brang yang rung ste/ der rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gnas pas sa gzhi yongs su brtags pa cha mnyam pa mdzes par khru gnyis kyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor byas la sa dang ba byung du ldan pas gru bzhi par
461a3(rgyud): cha gzhal te legs par byi dor byas la shin tu 'jam par bya'o// der de'i steng du tsan dan dang dri'i chus byug par bya'o// gur kum gyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya rnams ri mor bri'o//
461a4(rgyud): de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po klu mgo bo dgu ba skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa bri'o// grwa bzhi'i nang du chud par don yong zhags pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi khor lug tu ji ltar thob pa'i
461a5(rgyud): phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rnams bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs pa'i ro'i gtor ma dkar po dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang /
461a6(rgyud): gang ba'i bum pa dang / gtor ma dang / bdug pa'i pog por gyis nye bar mdzes par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gis ches mngon du don yod zhags pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po la lan
461a7(rgyud): cig bzlas pas mngon par dbang skur bar bya'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang khro bo lcags kyu dus gcig tu brjod do// rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags
461b1(rgyud): 'chang gis dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te bzlas pa'i cho ga bya'o// don yod pa'i mchod pa nor bu'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya'o// nA ga ge ser dang ka na la di na dang / rgya spos dang /
461b2(rgyud): gur ku ma dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / li kha ra mnyam par sbyar ba'i bdug pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ klu'i dkyil 'khor du bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// klu'i lte ba'i steng
461b3(rgyud): du bdug spos kyi pog por gang ba gzhan par bya'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'i mod nyid la klu'i zhags pa chen po las char gyi rgyun chen po 'byin te ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du char 'bebs/
461b4(rgyud): so// klu'i rgyal po'i ming nas bzung ste bzlas par bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang kadaga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jog po dang / hu lu dang / u lam bu la dang / chu lha dang / yid/
461b5(rgyud): ldan dang / e la'i 'dab ma dang / klu'i rgyal po kun nas 'khor ba'i gdugs te/ klu'i rgyal po'i rnams las gcig smos par bya ste/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis bden par dam bcas pas rnam
461b6(rgyud): par bzhags pa'i modo nyid la char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed de/ ji srid 'dod kyi bar du kun nas sbyor bas char stong phrag 'bebra so// yang na yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas klu'i rgyal
