461b7(rgyud): po'i snying pa'i steng du sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis mod la 'phral nyid du stong phrag du mar a bi rI yi char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do// spar mo gang gis nyin mtshan gcig tu rgyun mi
462a1(rgyud): bar char 'bebs so// sbar mo gsum gyis nyin mtshan gsum du char 'bebs so// sngar mo bdun gyis nyin mtshan bdun du char gyi rgyun chen po klu'i rgyal pos 'byin par/
462a2(rgyud): byed do// yang dag pa kho nar char gyi rgyun ltung ngo // yang na klu'i ras ris bya ste/ khru gang gi tshad la kun nas grub bzhi pa'i tshad kyi ras la ri mor bya'o// de'i dbus su rig pa'i rgyal po 'phags pa spyan ras
462a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral gri dang / rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa dang / pad+ma thogs par bya'o// zhal khro gnyer can/ rgyan thams cad kyis
462a4(rgyud): rnam par brgyan po/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis sdud pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ ral pa zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang bas yang dag par brgyan pa/ chu dang bcas pa'i badz+ra/
462a5(rgyud): gdan bya'o// klu'i rgyal po de dag pus mo g.yas dang g.yon pa btsugs pa bya'o// klu'i gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ thal mo 'chang bas skyabs su 'grol bar byed pa bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang
462a6(rgyud): des ras ris de la mngon du phyogs te smra ba bcad nas don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya ste/ yungs kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas klu'i
462a7(rgyud): rgyal po rgya mtsho la bsnun par bya'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par byed do// gal te lo stong du char mi 'bab par 'gyur ba las 'phral nyid du lhas char 'bebs par
462b1(rgyud): byed par the tsom med do// rlung dang / sad dang / ser ba'i dus su de'i ras ris khang pa'i steng du gzhag ste/ chung dang / sad dang / ser ba thams cad phyir zhing mi 'byung ngo // phyogs gang du ras ris rnam
462b2(rgyud): par lta bar byed pa de'i phyogs kyi gnas su rlung dang / sad dang / sar ba mi 'bab ste/ ri'am dgon dung 'khrigs par yang mi 'bab bo// yang na rig sngags 'chang gis ras ris de bzungs nas klus
462b3(rgyud): gnas kyi mtshor song nas gnas kyi mtsho der gzhag par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs stong rdza brgyad du chu la bzlas te gnas pa'i mtshor 'phang bar bya'o//
462b4(rgyud): 'phangs pa tsam gyis mod la gnas der gnas pa'i klu khye'u'i gzugs kyis lus phyed gnas de nas 'thon te/ ras ris de la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang ba la smras pa/ rig snga
462b5(rgyud): 'chang gis bka' bsgo ba ci yin pa bdag gis bgyi'o zhes so// rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bya ste/ klu chen po 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu lta bar gyis shig/ khye'u de'ang phyogs bzhi kun tu rnam
462b6(rgyud): par lta bar byed do// ji lta ji ltar mtshan ma mthong ba de lta de ltar rig sngags 'chang la mtshan ma smra bar 'gyur te/ legs par byas pa 'am/ nyes par byas pa de thams cad smra bar byed do// de nas
462b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis brjod par bya ste/ klu chen po char pho ba la tshim par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu gling po'i rtswa dang / nags kyi bdag po dang / ri dang / tshang tshing dang / dgon pa dang / zhing dang /
463a1(rgyud): kun dga' ra ba rnams thams cad du char gyi rgyun 'byin par gyis shig/ lha'i chus kun nas char phob cig/ sems can thams cad kyi lha'i chu'i char gyi rgyun chen po phob/
463a2(rgyud): cig klu'i khye'u la smras pa/ kye bcud len mchog tu gya nom pa'i rig sngags kyi gzhi byin cig ces/ rig sngags 'chang gis brjod par bya'o// klu'i khye'u bdud rtsi bcud kyi lon gyi mchog zug
463a3(rgyud): zhig ces so// de nas klu'i khye'u de rig sngags 'chang la mngon du phyogs te thal mo sbyar nas nye bar 'dug go// rig sngags 'chang gis klu chen po nyon cig ces brjod par bya'o// de nas rig sngag
463a4(rgyud): 'chang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan par bya/ 'pha gos pa'i bden pa'i bzhi po rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
463a5(rgyud): pa bstan par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i mdo'ang bstan par bya'o// gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston bzhin pa na/ klu'i lus la 'dug pa 'khrigs pa'i
463a6(rgyud): sprin chen po nges par 'thon te nam mkha'i dkyil du g.yog par byed cing gnas so// chos ston pa'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par byed de/ sa'i mtsho dang char/
463a7(rgyud): pab 'bab pa ma yin no// rig sngags 'chang dang ras ris kyi steng du klu'i khye'u de ras ris de la mchod pa byed de/ rig sngags 'chang de la yon dang bcas pas chos la mchod pa 'bul bar byed do//
463b1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gis spras pa/ rig sngags 'chang gi sar khyod zhugs shig/ de rnams 'di skad ces rig sngags 'chang rang gi khyim gyis mchog go// rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bya ste/ gal te da/
463b2(rgyud): ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par len par byed na/ de'i tshe khyod kyi gnas mchog tu 'jug par bya'o// gal te mi byed na 'jug par mi bya'o zhes so// de nas khye'u de gal
463b3(rgyud): byed na dge ba ston pa mthong ba de'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par byed de lha rdzas kyi rna rgyan dri ma med pa g.yo ba/ sgra 'acod pan 'chang ba rgyun thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// gal
463b4(rgyud): te mi byed na khye'u de'i gzugs mi snang bar 'gyur te slar yang mi mthong ngo // yang na rdzu 'phrul chen po can gyi klu'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang des zangs kyi 'dab ma la don
463b5(rgyud): yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs de'i steng du bri bar bya ste sbrang rtsis byug par bya'o// yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas te gtor bar bya ste gnas pa'i
463b6(rgyud): mtsho der 'phang bar bya'o// gu gul zho gcig gi tshad kyis mchod nas bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// ji srid du gu gul byed kyi cha shas kyi lhag ma las kyi bar du bsreg par bya'o// skad cig yud tsan
463b7(rgyud): thang cig de la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bram ze'i gzugs kyis klu'i mtshor nye bar 'dug ste/ rig sngags 'chang la shis pa rjod par byed do// rig sngags 'chang gis kyang nad med par gyur//
464a1(rgyud): cig ces brjod par bya'o// kye chos kyi don gyi tshig nyon cig/ chos dang 'jig rten mang po'ang skyongs shig ces so// bram ze de'ang dga' ste/ rig sngags 'chang ci 'dod
464a2(rgyud): pa'i don gang yin pa'i don de smros shig dang / thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro zhes rjod par byed do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chen po bdun dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdun dang / nyan thos chen/
464a3(rgyud): po bzhi'i mtshan nas smos par bya'o// de nas bram ze de rnam pa de lta bu'i tshig gi sgra thos nas yid rab tu dga' ste snying mgu ba chen por gyur nas/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sna rjod/
464a4(rgyud): par byed de/ legs so leg so so zhes sgra 'byin par byed do// mtshan shin tu bsngags pa gang yin pa de khyod kyis yongs su 'dzin pa dang / legs par yongs su grags pa'i mtshan shin tu mnyan
464a5(rgyud): par 'os pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ mtshan khyod kyis yongs su bsgrags pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba nyid rig sngags 'chang gang gis 'di lta bu'i sems can de rin po che don yod pa chen po'i
464a6(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa sems can rnams kyi mchog thos par byed do zhes so// de nas bram ze de bram ze'i gzugs kyi cha byad de mi snang bar byas nas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i
464a7(rgyud): gzugs kyi cha byad dang rtags kyis ji lta ba bzhin du/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dug ste smra bar yang byed do// rig sngags 'chang mchog ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa smos shig/ de thams
464b1(rgyud): cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad brjod pa de ster bar 'gyur ro// yang na mchog tu 'jig par byed do// klu'i rgyal po//
464b2(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so// las thams cad bka' bsgo ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur te/ 'di la dogs pa dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// sbyar ba
464b3(rgyud): tsam gyis mod la bya ba 'di rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ras ris blangs te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags par byas nas/ zhing dang kun dga' ra ba thams cad la
464b4(rgyud): g.yas phyogs su bskor bar bya ste/ rlung dang / tshad pa dang / sad dang / ser ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / chag pa dang / byi ba dang / ne'u le dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang /
464b5(rgyud): gro ga sbur dang / sbrul go Na sa dang / sdig pa dang / sbrang bu tre ma khu ga dang / sbrang bu tri la Ta dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ 'phral nyid du yongs su grol bar/
464b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// ro bzang ba dang legs par smin par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i klu'i
464b7(rgyud): char 'bebs pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / pha rol kyi dmag tshogs dang / 'breg dgon pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa'i rig
465a1(rgyud): sngags 'chang des rig pa'i rgyal 'ba' zhig ras la bri bar bya ste/ dpal lha mo'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / rgyun thams cad kyis rnam par /
465a2(rgyud): pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya'o// tshon sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog gdags par bya'o// klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par
465a3(rgyud): bya'o// 'don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs 'di'ang brjod par bya zhing 'jug par bya ste/ dang por rgyal mtshan gyi mchog mthong ba tsam gyis mod la bud med dang /
465a4(rgyud): skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyi nad thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad yongs su grol lo// nyes
465a5(rgyud): bar byas pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su grol lo// dug dang / byad stems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba'i dug dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad yongs su grol lo// dgra'i 'jigs pa
465a6(rgyud): thams cad yongs su grol lo// sdig pa thams cad yongs su grol lo// rgyal mtshan gyi mchog la btags pa mthong nas mthong ba tsam gyis mod kho na la sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mtsham
465a7(rgyud): med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang / yid gnyis bsrung bar mi bya'o// dang por grong khyer gyi rgyal po'i bo brang du rgyal mtshan gyi mchog 'di zhugs pa/
465b1(rgyud): tsam gyis mod la mings dang / mu ge dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'brog dgon pa'i nye bar 'tsho ba dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / gdon dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin
465b2(rgyud): bo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / brjed byed thams cad dang / log par 'dren pa'i 'jigs pa mi bzang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa
465b3(rgyud): dang / 'gyed pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir brgol ba dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang /
465b4(rgyud): rkun mo'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// yul dang / grong dang / dgon
465b5(rgyud): pa dang / nags tshang tshing dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rnams thams cad du'ang bde ba byed par 'gyur ro// lo legs pa dang / dga' bar 'os pa dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba
465b6(rgyud): med pa dang / nad med par 'gyur ro// sems can de rnams thams cad du'ang phan tshun du dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen pos phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor
465b7(rgyud): bu'i snying po'i gzungs 'di yid rtse gcig pas tshes bco lnga'i nya la nyin mtshan thog thag tu smyung bar gnas pas gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o// be byung lnga'i nye reg gis gtsang sbra
466a1(rgyud): dang / khrus dang / dri'i chu tsam gyis rjes su mthun pa'i byug pa byas te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug nas rig pa'i rgyal po la mngon du phyogs nas bzlas brjod bya'o// mtshan
466a2(rgyud): thog thag tu mchod pa chen po rgyun mi 'chang bar bsgrub par bya'o// dri'i til mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya zhing / bgrang 'phreng dpag tu med pa byas pa'i bzlas brjod dbul bar bya'o// lan re re
466a3(rgyud): bzlas pas lan brgya stong phrag yongs su bzlas par 'gyur ro// ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po'i bris sku 'bar bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed do// rig sngags 'chang
466a4(rgyud): dga' bar byed cing spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'bar bar byed do// nam mkhar nas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchog tu byas pa legs so legs so zhes sgra 'byin par byed do// 'di/
466a5(rgyud): ni rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi mchog gi bzlas pa'i cho ga ste/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
466a6(rgyud): byas pa grub bo// khyod kyis don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi dngos grub kyang grub bo// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang //
466a7(rgyud): phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / thun mongs gi snying po dang / gzungs spras pas/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog de thams cad rjes su mthun par stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags kyi
466b1(rgyud): dngos grub bam/ gzungs kyi dngos grub bam/ cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub bam/ rigs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub bam/ phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi
466b2(rgyud): dngos grub bam/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang ba 'am/ gzugs sna tshogs su bsgyur ba 'am/ mig 'phrul lam/ rdzu 'phrul ston pa 'am/ klu'i gzhal med khang ngam/ lha'i gzhal
466b3(rgyud): med khang ngam/ gnod sbyin gyi gzhal med khang ngam/ dri za'i gzhal med khang ngam/ lha ma yin gyi zhal med khang ngam/ nam mkha' lding gi gzhal med khang ngam/ mi 'am ci'i gzhal med nga
466b4(rgyud): ngam/ lto 'phye chen po'i gzhal med khang ngam/ nyi ma'i gzhal med khang ngam/ zla ba'i gzhal med khang ngam/ skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang ngam/ rgyu skar gyi gzhal med khang ngam/ srin po'i
466b5(rgyud): gzhal med khang ngam/ 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi gzhal med khang yang rung ste/ de thams cad rjes su 'dzin no// 'di ni khyod kyis bya ba thams cad bklags pas 'grub cing bzlas pa tsam gyis
466b6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// kye rig sngag 'chang bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams rjes su 'dzin no// 'di lta ste/ nor sbyar bar smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang / nor bu smra ba dang / zhags pa'i dngos
466b7(rgyud): grub dang / mig sman sgrub pa dang / thig lo sgrub pa dang / dbang phyug dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdun na'i don nyid dang / stobs che ba nyid dang / longs spyod la dmigs pa dang / yul
467a1(rgyud): gyi bdag po nyid dang / dbang phyug dang / nor 'phel ba dang / gter g.yo ba dang / nyo tshong gi grogs byed pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / khung du 'jug pa dang / ri la 'jug/
467a2(rgyud): pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang / me la 'jug pa dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / klu'i char 'bebs pa dang / char gyi rgyun dang / ser ba'i rgyun dang / ser ba 'bebs pa dang / grong lta ba dang / g.yul
467a3(rgyud): du 'jug pa dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba nyid dang / ldong ros kyi mig sman sgrub pa dang / ral gri sgrub pa dang / rdo rje sgrub pa dang / rtse gsum sgrub pa dang / 'khor
467a4(rgyud): lo sgrub pa dang / dung sgrub pa dang / gtun shing sgrub pa dang / dgra sta sgrub pa dang / mda' bo che sgrub pa dang / tho ba sgrub pa dang / dril bu sgrub pa dang / rdzas sgrub pa dang / sman sgrub pa dang / bcud kyi
467a5(rgyud): len sgrub pa dang / ro langs slong bar byed pa dang / rang gi gnas 'bebs pa dang / gos 'bebs pa dang / rims 'bebs ba dang / shi ba slong bar byed pa dang / gdon thams cad 'bebs pa
467a6(rgyud): dang / thod pa 'bebs pa dang / bum pa 'bebs pa dang / bum bu 'bebs pa dang / lteng ka 'bebs pa dang / dril bu 'bebs pa dang / tho ba 'bebs pa dang / ral gri 'bebs pa dang / me long
467a7(rgyud): 'bebs pa dang / pad+ma 'bebs pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'bebs pa dang / mdzes par byed pa dang / gar byed pa de rnams thams cad bklags pas grub pa dang /
467b1(rgyud): bzlas pas 'grub pas rig sngags 'chang rjes su 'dzin te/ don mtha' yas shing don mtha' yas pa de rnams thams cad grub pa'i ched du gyis shig ces so// dgos pa thams cad yongs su/
467b2(rgyud): rdzogs par byed de/ rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba 'grub cing rig pa ste/ rig sngags 'chang 'grub pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags
467b3(rgyud): 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro'o// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyod phyir mi ldog par lung bstan no// 'di ni skye ba tha ma ste/
467b4(rgyud): mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro// khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mngon par phyogs pa dang / de bzhin ga shegs pa
467b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs kyi rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo la ji srid byang chub la mtha' thug pa'i bar du mngon du phyogs
467b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sgra sa lung ston par byed pa smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i ras ris des smin ma'i bar nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra
467b7(rgyud): zhing bkra ba 'byin par byed de/ de ma thag tu kun nas sdang bar byed do// kun nas snang bar byas nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gi lus la bab ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mi snang bar gyur
468a1(rgyud): ba'i de ma thug tu rig sngags 'chang des ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang bar byed/
468a2(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa rnam par
468a3(rgyud): 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dngos grub gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
468a4(rgyud): kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i gzungs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / kun
468a5(rgyud): tu gzigs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting
468a6(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / zhags pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtag par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyu
468a7(rgyud): skar kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dngos grub kyi 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nor bu'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
468b1(rgyud): dbang phyug gi mthu stobs dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blo yang dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gsal/
468b2(rgyud): bar khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya kun tu gzigs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtag par chur
468b3(rgyud): 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dngos grub yangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
468b4(rgyud): dang / kun nas kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas kun tu rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lce'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge
468b5(rgyud): rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yangs par byin gyis brlabs pa
468b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blo 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog mngon par bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa zhes bya ba
468b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs rnam par dag cing dri mo med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yan lag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
469a1(rgyud): so sor thob bo// mdor bsdu na ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams bklags pa tsam dang bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub so sor thob bo// gang zhig bzlas pa tsam gyi/
469a2(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang sngags dang / rnam par 'phrul pa rnams so sor thob bo// ting nge 'dzin gzhan de rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i dngos grub so sor thob bo// lag na/
469a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ting 'dzin gzhan yang bklags pas grub pa dang bzlas pa tsam la so sor thob bo// gang gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
469a4(rgyud): kyi gsang ba rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mong bar gyur pa mthong ba'i dngos grub so sor thob bo// ting nge
469a5(rgyud): 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dus gsum pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / spyi gtsug kun
469a6(rgyud): tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / chog zhib mo gang yin pa de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog/
469a7(rgyud): tu kun tu gnas so// gang gis skye ba brjes pa'i mod dang bsgoms pa'i mod la rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sgo mchog tu gnas so// 'di lta ste/ don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes byab/
469b1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi dag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i ma
469b2(rgyud): tog gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug kun tu rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / song ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od 'bar bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
469b3(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad
469b4(rgyud): kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nor bu rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i dri ma
469b5(rgyud): med pa'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi zhags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i
469b6(rgyud): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i 'od kyi snang ba rgyas po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di rnams la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mang po rnams so sor thob cing //
469b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gzhan 'jig rten las 'das pa brgya stong phrag bklags pa dang bzlas pa tsam gyis grub par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs kyi snying po 'di yon tan che ba dang / phan yon/
470a1(rgyud): che ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa che ba ste/ don yod pa lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras
470a2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs gsungs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa rjes su 'brang ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye bar byed pa/ sdig pa dang sgri thams/
470a3(rgyud): cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ gzungs kyi tshig gi snying po gang zhig bklags pa tsam dang bzlas pa tsam gyis 'di rnams byed pa'i dngos grub so sor thob pa'o// sgrub pa 'di rnams thams cad/
470a4(rgyud): ni las kyi rnam 'phrul du 'gyur ba ma yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang de smyung bar gnas te bzlas pa gcig dang bklags pa'i dngos grub kyis de lta bu'i rgyas shing gsal ba thob bo// de kha/
470a5(rgyud): na nyid kyi dngos grub kyang so sor thob ste/ don rgya che ba dang / longs spyod dang ldan pa dang / gzungs kyi dngos grub chen po so sor thob bo// bkod pa yangs pa rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
470a6(rgyud): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi gsang ba so sor thob bo// dpag bsam gyi shing yang dag par gang ba'i char 'bebs pa dang / gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa so sor thob bo// yid
470a7(rgyud): gyi nor bu chen po'i rgya mtsho dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pa dang / kun nas kun tu gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzungs kyi gsang ba'i char 'bebs pa'i dngos grub so sor thob/
470b1(rgyud): kun nas gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi char 'bebs pa'i gzungs kyi bkod pa rnam par bltas pa dang / don yong pa'i bkod pa rab 'byams kyi dngos grub rab tu thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa tha/
470b2(rgyud): cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul par so sor thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snang po dang / dkyil 'khor rnam par lta ba'i
470b3(rgyud): dngos grub so sor thob bo// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa thams cad so sor thob bo// phan yon chen po dang rnam par 'phrul pa chen po byin gyis brlabs pa 'di rnams so sor thob/
470b4(rgyud): bo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs pas byin gyis brlabs pas don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs gang bklags pa tsam gyis yon tan dang phan yon
470b5(rgyud): rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po so sor thob bo// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje mchog tu dga' ba skyes shing mchog tu kyi bung zhes byed pa skyes nas/ bcom
470b6(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs
470b7(rgyud): pa'i don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs gang yin pa 'di mchog tu rnyed par dka' 'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'i snying po'i gzungs gong yin pa ni mchog rnyed pa'i dka' 'o// mthu/
471a1(rgyud): chen po dang / phan yon chen po dang / yon tan chen po skyed pa dang mthun pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul che bar blta bar bya'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal/
471a2(rgyud): po de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/
471a3(rgyud): khye'u 'am/ bu mo'ang rung ste/ lan cig bzlas pa dang / dran pa tsam dang / bklags pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sdig pa thams
471a4(rgyud): cad zad par 'gyur ba de ci lags ka bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa rnams grub par 'gyur ba ci lags/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das
471a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs par 'gyur ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rtag tu mchog stsol ba de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la
471a6(rgyud): de'i skabs dbye bar mdzad du gsol/ de lta bu phan yon phul du byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog tu ngo mtshar bar gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/
471a7(rgyud): lag na rdo rje mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i dri ba dris pa de ngas ji lta ba bzhin du nga lta bshad par bya yi nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis mod dang brjod pa tsam gyis mod la byang chub
471b1(rgyud): sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu dga' ba dang bcas pas phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par byed do// mngon sum du rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar gnas te dbugs//
471b2(rgyud): 'byin par yang byed do// de ji ltar zhe na/ 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ring bzhin gyis lus yongs su dag pa bzung ba'i gzungs kyi snying po'o// 'di ni don yod pa'i rang bzhin gyi snying
471b3(rgyud): po'o// 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin mthong ba'o// 'di ni bcu gcig zhal mthong ba'o// 'di ni
471b4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mthong ba'o// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sprul pa'i sprin mthong ba'o// 'di ni grin pa sngon po dang sred
471b5(rgyud): med kyi bu'i gzugs mthong ba'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gsum mthong ba'o// 'di ni rta mgrin mthong ba'o// 'di ni pad+mo yangs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba'o// 'di ni de bzhin
471b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// 'di ni rdo rje'i snying po'i chen po mthong ba'o// 'di mgo'i snying po chen po'o// 'di ni sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin
471b7(rgyud): mthong ba'o// 'di ni don yod pa'i gzugs dang dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// 'di ni des thams cad du 'gugs pas mnags par brjod par bya'o// don yod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bum
472a1(rgyud): mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs su brjod par bya ste/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dam par gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku gzhan du/
472a2(rgyud): gyur pa mthong ba mtshungs pa ste/ don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di dag mthong ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// bklags pa dang brjod pa tsam gyis mod la dus gsum du gshegs
472a3(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i sku shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa dang mnyam par 'gyur te/
472a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i skur yang 'gyur ro// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog par lung ston cing / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par/
472a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mthong bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis yang dag par dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// bdud la sogs pa dang / gdug pa'i/
472a6(rgyud): rmilam dang / log par 'dren pa thams cad tshar bcad par byas par 'gyur ro// bcing ba lngas bcings shing gzir ba dang / gnod sbyir dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang /
472a7(rgyud): grul bum dang brjed byed dang / tshangs pa'i srin po rnams thams cad ring du 'bros par 'gyur ro// rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / 'bras dang / pho la mig dang / btsog shu dang /
472b1(rgyud): ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / rkang shu thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// lus kyi gzer thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do// ji ltar shel yongs su dag pa/
472b2(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang cho ga ning mo thams cad kyi dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
472b3(rgyud): cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag gis cher mchod par bya bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa gcig pur 'gyur
472b4(rgyud): ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro// bsam pa dang yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// chom rkun dang / g.yo can dang / rkun pos rnam par skrag pa dang / gcan gzan
472b5(rgyud): khro bo dang / g.yang sa dang / khyim rdib pa dang sa gsod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang chus dus byed pa dang / rlung dang / tshad pa
472b6(rgyud): dang / sad dang / ser ba rnams kyis mi tshugs so// dgra thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad byams pa'i yod du 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thaH/
472b7(rgyud): cad dbang du 'gyur bar byed do// 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yon tan chen po skyed pa dang rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur ro// de 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba cag
473a1(rgyud): khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song dang / khyod kyi sa lam yongs su dag
473a2(rgyud): par byas pa'o// 'chi ba'i dus su gyur pa na bsam pa nyid kyis mod la pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin ga/
473a3(rgyud): pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong ba tsam gyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang
473a4(rgyud): yangs pa'i gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo mngon du 'gyur zhing kha tan du kun tu gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
473a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rjes su dran par byed do// thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon sum du mtshungs par lhan cig lung ston pa so sor thob ste/ nam/
473a6(rgyud): du'ang phyir zhing rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bar dang / ji srid du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus su gyur gyi bar du 'jig rten wa/
473a7(rgyud): 'das pa'i phan yon dang rnam par 'phrul pa bklags pas grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bzlas pa tsam gyis dngos grub bshad par bya ste/ snga dro gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis mod la mtshamra med pa lnga'i sdig
473b1(rgyud): pa dang / mnar med pa'i mthar gtugs pa'i sdig pa dang / ri rab lhun po chen po bdun gyi tshad tsam pa spu'i khong bu re rer sgrib pa bsags pa dang / bskal pa stong phrag tu bsags pa'i sngon gyi sdig pa/
473b2(rgyud): dang sgrib pa de rnams thams cad snga dro gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa rnam par nyams par byed de/ zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i 'gro ba chen po
473b3(rgyud): bcu drug tu gzhol ba de rnams thams cad skad cig gcig gis yongs su grol lo// sbyang bar gnas pa gcig gis bzlas pas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
473b4(rgyud): su kun tu bzang po chen po nyid thob bo// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+mo yangs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po thams cad du dngos
473b5(rgyud): su rjes su 'jug par byed do// thams cad du dam tshig chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis dngos su mthong ba sbyin par byed do// /
473b6(rgyud): dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang gi gzugs kyis dngos su mthong bar nye bar gnas par byed do// dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad dngos su rjes su 'brang zhing gnas te/ rtag tu rnam
473b7(rgyud): par blta bar 'gyur zhing char bcings par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing dngos su mthong bar gnas par byed do// brgya stong phrag bzlas pa tsam gyis lce rdo rje ltar
474a1(rgyud): brtan par 'gyur zhing / rdo rje'i snying po dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ phyir zhing de'i lus la reg pa ngan pa 'byung bar mi/
474a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// phyir zhing lus 'pho ba'ang mi nus shing / yongs su dag cing dri ma med pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// lus pad+ma dkar po'i kha dog dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol
474a3(rgyud): ba dang / dgra thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa rnams dang / klu ma rungs pa mi bzad pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis
474a4(rgyud): lus dang phung po la za bar mi 'gyur ro// lus pad+ma dkar po'i kha dog dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ lha rnams lhan cig tu rjes su rgyu bar byed do// kha nas lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la sngon po'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus
474a5(rgyud): lalha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dris bsgos par 'gyur ro// rkang pa dang lag pa gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro// mig gis legs par mthong bar 'gyur ro// bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro//
474a6(rgyud): pa thos par yang 'gyur zhing lha rdzas kyi dri tshor bar yang 'gyur ro// bzang po la reg pa'i lus su'ang 'gyur ro// skrag bung ba dang mtshungs pa li zhing 'khyil ba'i sgrar 'gyur ro// nam yang phyir zhing lus kyi/
474a7(rgyud): nang gi rlung gi las dang dring ngan pas bsgos par mi 'gyur ro// dri ma thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro// 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang / mnyen pa'i ngag tu'ang 'gyur ro// lha'i nga ro dang / ngar bzang ba dang /
474b1(rgyud): ngararo zab pa snyan cing mnyen pa dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra lta bu dang / ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro// mdzes par 'gro ba dang zab par 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro// lag mthil shin tu 'jam pa dang / sor mo/
474b2(rgyud): ring ba dang / lag pa'i ri mo shin tu rnam par bkra bar yang 'gyur ro// seng ge'i 'gros dang rtsal gyis 'gro bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i 'gros su 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi
474b3(rgyud): gtso bo gcig pur mchod par 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// dpal rnam thos sras rjes su 'thun par rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// tshig mi mthun pa'ang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// thams cad du ngag rnam par
474b4(rgyud): dag par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub bo// 'jig rten las 'das pa ni skye ba brjes nas/ pags pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / bsams pa nyid kyis mod la skye bar 'gyur/
474b5(rgyud): te/ 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar mdun gyi pad+ma'i snying po las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shig
474b6(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba'i mchog byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / mngon par dbang bskur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
474b7(rgyud): 'phrul pa byin gyis rlab pas kyang byin gyis brlabs so zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas cho ga'i dngos grub bo// de nas bsod nam kyi phung po brjod par bya ste/ 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis
475a1(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang
475a2(rgyud): yang rung bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang bar byas pa dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog gis yongs su bkang nas dus
475a3(rgyud): gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ nyi ma re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba la nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun dang / gser gyi me tog
475a4(rgyud): dang / dngul gyi me tog gis bkang nas phul ba de bas kyang dge ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang bar bskyed do// gang zhig dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par byed cing / nyi ma re re zhing //
475a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa de kho na bzhin du 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de rnams gang gis nor bu rin po che chen po byin pas de rnams
475a6(rgyud): kyi dge ba'i bcu drug gi char yang mi yod do// de bzhin du bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes so// 'jig rten pa'i cho ga sna tshogs pa'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten las 'das
475a7(rgyud): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams nor bu rin pa che chen po sna bdun gyis bkang ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / gser dang dngul
475b1(rgyud): gyi me tog gis bkang ba rnams kyis dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing la'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bkang nas/
475b2(rgyud): phul bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur te/ ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du mi zad de/ de lta bu'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing
475b3(rgyud): nams kyi phu po chen por yang 'gyur te/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
475b4(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du phan yon chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba chen po gang yin pa dang / bzlas pa'i cho ga chen po dang / mchod pa'i sprin chen
475b5(rgyud): por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yon tan bskyed pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho ga'i khyad par so sor thob bo// dus rtag par rgyun du bzlas pa'i cho ga dang ldan par 'gyur bar bya'o// rtag tu 'ang byang chub sem/
475b6(rgyud): dpa' thams cad mthong 'dod par 'gyur ro// rtag tu'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang yang dag par 'grogs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gang yang rig pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i mchod
475b7(rgyud): pa'i nor bu'i snying po 'di tham snga tsam yang rna ba'i bu gar ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / bris pa rnams lta ba dang / ma ti 'am/ yi ge 'am/ cig pa 'am/ kyang la bris pa lta bar byed pa de/ mtshams med pa lnga
476a1(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// sngon bsags pa'i mnar med par gzhol ba'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa de thams cad rnam par nyams par/
476a2(rgyud): byed do// yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// nam yang phyis mngal du gnas pa'i dri mas
476a3(rgyud): gos par mi 'gyur ro// ji srid du byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du pad+ma las skye bar 'gyur zhing tshe rabs
476a4(rgyud): dran par yang 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bro bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das 'dri ba ni//
476a5(rgyud): pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skyed pa ci lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon dpag
476a6(rgyud): tu med do// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'i don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'dzi bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye ste/ phan yon dpag tu med pa dang mo
476a7(rgyud): tan dpag tu med pa las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa so sor thob bo// gang yang don mod pa'i zhag pa'i lcags kyu rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di 'dri bar 'gyur
476b1(rgyud): banyon cig/ lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og tu dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa/ chu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa de las chu'i thigs pa'i tshad kyi thigs pa re re'i grangs su byed/
476b2(rgyud): par 'dod pa 'am/ de lta bu'i tshad kyi ngos gnyis par mtsho chen po las thigs pa re re nas bcu bar bya ste/ de la thigs pa re re nas bgrangs te gtor bar bya'o// de nas rgya mtsho chen po chu'i thigs
476b3(rgyud): pa'i grangs kyis zad par 'gyur zhing chu skam par byed do// mtsho chen po gnyis pa las chus yongs su gang bar 'gyur gyi/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dang / don yod pa'i nor bu'i
476b4(rgyud): mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo de 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni gzung bar nus pa ma yin no// de ltar rgya che ba/ de ltar bzab pa/ de ltar yangs pa'i yon tan bskyed par bya ba ni// don yod pa'i nor bu'i
476b5(rgyud): mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga'i rgyal po'o// lag na rdo rje 'on kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po ni dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'og tu rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du nub bo// dpag tshad stong drug
476b6(rgyud): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi steng nyid du gnas so// skyes bu stobs chen po dang ldan par gyur pa gang la la ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po gang yin pa'ang yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du byed pa dang / ngos gnyis par rgya mtsho
476b7(rgyud): chen po'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po cho ga de lta bus yungs kar gyi 'bras bu tsam du byas pa las/ slar yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tu rab tu gnas par byed par nus kyi// cho ga zhi ba mo'i rgyal po gang yin pa 'di 'dzi
477a1(rgyud): bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang / de'i gsung gi tshad gzung bar mi nus so// de bzhin du yon tan dang phan lon/
477a2(rgyud): rgya che zhing bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro zhes so// rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang phyag rgya 'di/
477a3(rgyud): ji ltar bri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ zam ze 'am/
477a4(rgyud): rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di 'dri bar byed pa de/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil
477a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi las dang / yo byad dang bcas pa'i cho gas/ don yod pa'i nor bu pad+ma zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'tsha
477a6(rgyud): lo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dri bar byed do// des yongs su dag pa'i ngag dang yid kyis dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang
477a7(rgyud): bcas pa dang / yid der gyur pa dang / mchod pa'i mchog dang / gus pa la sogs pa'i 'dri mkhan gyis bri bar bya'o// mchog tu gus pa dang zhe sa dang bcas pas kha zas mi mthun pa spangs te/ legs par yongs su
477b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i kha zas re bro ba'i mchog dang / legs par 'dus byas shing yid dga' ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i btung ba gus pa dang bcas pas/ gnas su gi'u wang gi dkyil 'khor dang / me tog gcal du bkra ma nas dris
477b2(rgyud): bdugs te/ dar gyis spras pa'i chos kyi stan la 'jug pas bri bar bya'o// legs par khrus byas shing mgo la dris byug/ lus la gos bgos la mchod pa bya'o// tshes brgyad dam bco lnga la so so'i cha shas dang bcas pa'i dkyil
477b3(rgyud): 'khor rnam par phye nas gtor ma dang nye bar spyod pa dbul bar bya'o// mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bya ste/ yon dang bcas pas gser gyi rna rgyan sbyin par bya'o// bri bar bya ba yongs su phye nas ma spangs par don yod par bya'o// lag
477b4(rgyud): brkyang ba'i bya'o// legs par sbyang ba byas pas bya'o// 'di'i cho gas 'dri bar byed pa gang yin pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / gsang ba
477b5(rgyud): bris par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs gang ci yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de
477b6(rgyud): thams cad 'dri bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ chu gang yin pa thams cad chu klung chen po dang rgya mtsho chen po'i rjes su zhugs nas ro gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ nyi ma shar ba na mun pas ldongs pa thams cad kun tu
477b7(rgyud): snang bar byed do// de kho na bzhin du don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di dang / don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po 'di dang / don yod pa'i nor bu pad+ma'i zhags pa'i snying po 'phags pa spyan
478a1(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor ba'i klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di thams/
478a2(rgyud): cad du mtshungs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug go// dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / snying po rnams mtshungs par dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rab tu
478a3(rgyud): skyes pa'o// thams cad du mtshungs par mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// gang yang dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdul phra rab dang lhan cig pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tha snyad kyi/
478a4(rgyud): de kho na nyid yang dag pa'i snying po'o// don yod pa'i nor bu mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i nor bu pad+ma'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po dang /
478a5(rgyud): gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ba dang / klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
478a6(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa de thams cad gsang ba'i dam tshig gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so// rgyu de'i phyir 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i don yod pa'i las sgrub par byed pa'i mthu stobs kyi dngos grub ste/ don yod
478a7(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du 'dri bzhin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de/
478b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang mtshungs pa gcig gis mtshungs pa'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mor byin gyis brlabs so// 'dri bar byed pa dang / 'don pa
478b2(rgyud): byed pa dang / klog par byed pa dang / bzlas pa ni mchod pa'i sprin du byin gyis brlabs so// de'i phyir 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gis legs par rab tu dang ba dang las la spro zhing brtson pas bya'o// shin tu/
478b3(rgyud): gsal ba dang / spro ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pas bri bar bya'o// shin tu 'bad pas phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi snying po dang / gzungs dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dang / klu'i zhags pa
478b4(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa bri bar bya// bklag par bya/ mnyan par bya'o// mthu stobs kyis mnyan par bya'o// mthu stobs kyis bri bar bya/ mthu stobs kyis mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// mthu stobs kyis dam
478b5(rgyud): pa'i chos mchod pa dang / gus pas 'dra bar byed pa po dang / 'dri bzhin pa la bsnyen bkur dang / bla ma la sri zhu byed par bya'o// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o// don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
478b6(rgyud): gyi gsang ba'o// nor bu rin po che chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gzungs kyi gsang ba byin gyis brlabs pa ni gnyis te/ gcig ni don yod pa'i
478b7(rgyud): mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs so// gnyis pa ni don yod pa'i nor bu'i pad+ma zhags pa'i snying po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'khor lo dang / dkyil
479a1(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas sprul pa'o// 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen por 'gyur ba ste/ don/
479a2(rgyud): yod pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing gi mchod pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o//
479a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dam par gyur pa'i snying po don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/ 'di ni gnyis par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi nor bu rin po che chen po ste/ don yod pa'i rnam par
479a4(rgyud): 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yin no// de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dbang po du ma rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag gis yongs su bskor
479a5(rgyud): ba dang rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha brgya stong phrag du ma dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha brgya stong phrag du ma dang / dbang po dang / lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
479a6(rgyud): gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag rnams dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
479a7(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs stong phrag rnams kyis de lta bu'i gsung gi sgra dbyangs thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu mgu ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba
479b1(rgyud): skyes par gyur to// de bzhin du gnyis par nor bu rin po che chen po nyan pa la de rnams thams cad lhan cig tu mthun par rgyal po chen po bzhi sngon du 'gro bas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nu// /
479b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo dang / pheg rdob pa sna tshogs pas mchod pa byed par gyur to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug da la
479b3(rgyud): mchod pa byed par gyur cing / rig pa'i rgyal po de la'ang mchod par byed do// bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas legs so zhes rjod par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das legs so/
479b4(rgyud): legs so// bcom ldan 'das mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gang yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gnyis par nor bu rin po che chen po don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dzam bu'i gling
479b5(rgyud): du rab tu bzhags go zhes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs so// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
479b6(rgyud): ba'i snying por gyur pa thun mong bar mtshungs pa'o// thams cad du gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod
479b7(rgyud): pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' bar gsungs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag de dag thams cad mthun par gyur pas lhan cig pa kho nar rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing / rig pa'i rgyal po
480a1(rgyud): 'di yang dag par rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// 'di yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang /
480a2(rgyud): 'drir 'jug pa dang / nyan pa dang / bzlas pa'i las su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang de la'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// dngos grub kyang stsal bar bgyi'o//
480a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen na ma/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang
480a4(rgyud): yin pa de'ang cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang / de la bdag cag thams cad mthun par rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ srung ba dang kha skyab pa dang / sba ba dang / stobs dang / brtson
480a5(rgyud): 'grus dang / mdangs dang / dga' ba sgrub par bgyi/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ 'jigs pa dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang /
480a6(rgyud): 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ yams dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad so sor phyir bzlog par
480a7(rgyud): bgyin bde ba la yang dag par reg pa dang mchog tu dga' ba bsgrub par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ don med pa'ang so sor bzlog par bgyi/ don la'ang yang dag par sbyar bar bgyi/
480b1(rgyud): don thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ rtag tu mchog sprul bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu rgyas pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad du dgongs pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje
480b2(rgyud): sngon du 'gro bas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de rnams la legs so zhes bya
480b3(rgyud): ba byin te/ legs so legs so// drang srong chen po de lta bu byed pa de rnams yongs su bskyang bar bya/ bsrung bar bya/ dngos grub kyang sbyin par bya'o// ngas cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor dang / gsang
480b4(rgyud): sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su bsrung ba'i ched dang / sems can de rnams thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i ched dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i ched du'ang grogs po rnams la rjes su gtad do//
480b5(rgyud): 'di'ang bsrung bar bya'o zhes so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye
480b6(rgyud): pa'i cho ga smos shig/ don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub 'di thams cad du thun mong ba'i snying po grub
480b7(rgyud): pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa lcags kyu'i cho ga ni ba me'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang / dkyil
481a1(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga dang / ras ris rnams gsungs pa/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o// don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po bla na med pa ni dkyil 'khor grub bzhi pa byas te/ kun nas
481a2(rgyud): shin tu rnam par phye ba/ sa dang ba byung gis legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa la tshon sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i srid bus char gzhal cing bcad la/ dkyil 'khor bla na med pa'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying/
481a3(rgyud): por bdag gi khru'i tshad kun nas khru bzhi pa sgo bzhi rnam par bye ba bya'o// thams cad du gsang ba thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang pad+ma bya ste/ pad+ma stong phrag gis shin tu mdzesapa
481a4(rgyud): lnga lnga'o// pad+ma dkar po bla na med pa la ze'u 'bru dang ge sar gyi tshod la bab pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i ge sar dang ze'u gru bkra ba'i dra ba'i snying po lus dang lag tu 'chang zhing / lag pa'i phyag rgya g.yon pa dang gams
481a5(rgyud): pas bya'o// dar dbyangs dang 'khyil pas spras pa/ zur zur du dpag bsam gyi shing shin tu tshad la bab pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byed du gzhug go// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi re kha'ang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du shin
481a6(rgyud): tu tshad dang ldan par bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa bya zhing / de nas me tog gi bar du re kha bya'o// rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gos sna tshogs pas mdzes pa'o// sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyi phyi rol
481a7(rgyud): tu bad+ma dang ut+pal sngon po'i 'phreng ba'i ri mo'o// ut+pal sngon po'i 'phreng ba'i phyi rol tu nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pas rnam par bkra ba'i ri mo 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas mdzes pa'o// me tog snga ma dang tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba dag la rdzam
481b1(rgyud): kyi nor bu'i ri mo'ang bya'o// de'i phyi rol gyi khor yug tu snam bu'i rnam pa bya'o// ri bo la sna tshogs pa'i ljon shing dang / lcug ma bkram pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi sa nye bar mdzes pa'o// khor yug tu chu 'bab pa'i snying po'i
481b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di bri zhing / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu'ang bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bla na med pa phyag rgya sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi dang / bum pa dang / mchod pa'i rin po che'i snod sna tshogs pa
481b3(rgyud): dang / gang ba'i bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri'o// mtshan ma dang / phyag rgya dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa'i yal ga dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal 'chang ba/ gos dang rgyam sna tshogs pa thogs pa bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi kho
481b4(rgyud): yug tu me tog sna tshogs pa kun mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dar ba dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / wA R+Shi ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / sna ma dang / skya nar dang / yu thi ka dang / ka dam pa'i me tog/
481b5(rgyud): 'phreng bas mdzes par bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya ste/ rin po che'i lcug ma sna tshogs pa dang bum pa gang ba thogs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying por ba dan gyis brgyan
481b6(rgyud): par bya'o// gang ba'i bum pa yongs su bsags pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / bza' ba'i kha zas ro bro ba'i mchog gzhag par bya/ sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas
481b7(rgyud): bdugs la bdug pa'i pog por yongs su ba sham par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma sa gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ legs par khrus byas shing dri bzang po'i dris bsgos te/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bdug
482a1(rgyud): pas bdugs la ba byung lngas nye reg bya ste/ don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'o// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
482a2(rgyud): pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa yid la bya/ mchod pa'i sprin chen po yid la bya zhing bzla ste/ phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sas
482a3(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis ji ltar dkyil 'khor du yongs su bsags shing / rnam pa sna tshogs su gzhal
482a4(rgyud): du med pas ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bsags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa brgya stong phrag yongs su bsags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mched pa'i sprin chen/
482a5(rgyud): po byed do// sna tshogs pa'i gos dang / sna tshogs pa'i rgyun dang / lhab lhub dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi dri sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug smos sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi 'a
482a6(rgyud): bu dang me tog sna tshogs pa dang / ro brgya pa'i kha zas kyi mchog ra bro bo'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / sgron ma'i shing sna tshogs pa brgya stong phrag rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor gyi dkyil
482a7(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa la mched pa'i sprin chen po byed do// yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin byed do// de lta bu'i cho ga rnams phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas kyi/
482b1(rgyud): zhing re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs rnams mchod par 'gyur te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa
482b2(rgyud): thams cad du lhun grub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa'i mchod sprin gyis mchod par byed do// gang yang dkyil 'khor chen po der rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can dge sbyong dang /
482b3(rgyud): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de la mthong
482b4(rgyud): bar 'dod pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / lhan cig 'gro ba 'am/ tha na thos pa tsam gang yin pa de rnams thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa chen
482b5(rgyud): po yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// sems can re re'i yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag dgu
482b6(rgyud): bcu rtsa dgu dang / mnyam pa de'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis mod dang / rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyis med la 'phral nyid du mtsham
482b7(rgyud): med pa lnga'i sdig pa yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho zhing skye ba brje ba'i dus su son te 'chi ba'i/
483a1(rgyud): mthar thug pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mngon sum du ston zhing snang bar 'gyur ro// lam nye bar ston par byed cing dbugs 'byin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi
483a2(rgyud): zhing sna tshogs pa rnams su skal ba mnyam pa nyid kyis skye bar byed de/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa tsam gyis mod la skye ba thams cad d+he su dran par byed do//
483a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yang zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas
483a4(rgyud): par byed do// ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du thams cad rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bcings te gnas par byed de zhes so// 'di ni skye ba'i tha mar 'gyur te/ mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
483a5(rgyud): 'dis tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i ri dgas dang bya de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ mir gyur pa rnams kyis lta ci smos so// de
483a6(rgyud): ltar yon tan dang phan yon chen po'i mchod pa chen po dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / phan yon gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// /
483a7(rgyud): de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i ras ris bshad par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba/ 'phral du nad thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas
483b1(rgyud): mchog thams cad sbyin pa bshad par bya'o// ras sam/ gos gnan nam/ rgya dar la gun nas khru bzhi pa la gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gnas su ri mo mkhan gtsang ma nyid kyis khrus byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/
483b2(rgyud): ji sna tshogs pas bdug la/ tshon sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra zhing lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar bar bzhag pas ras ris bla na med pa bri bar bya'o// dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bya ste/ gzhal yas rang gi
483b3(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs par seng ge'i khri la pad+ma'i rdzing bur klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa'o// g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
483b4(rgyud): phyag bya ste/ don yod zhags pa skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ rgyun thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/
483b5(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dung rtse gsum 'dzin pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / nor bu rin po che 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la nye bar dud par byed bzhin pa'o// g.yas su rig pa'i
483b6(rgyud): rgyal po bya ste/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'phags ma sbrul ma'i cha byad 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gos 'dzin pa/ pad+ma dang / zhags pa dang /
483b7(rgyud): ral gri 'chang zhing / nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal mtshan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la nye bar 'dud par byed pa/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tuH
484a1(rgyud): mo sgrol ma bya ste/ thal mo sbyar ba smad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu gos dkar mo bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam brgyan pa/ rab tu bzhad cing /
484a2(rgyud): smin ma dpral bar g.yo zhing / bcom ldan 'das la zur mig gis lta bar byed pa bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'phags pa dpal mdzes pa bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das la
484a3(rgyud): lta bar byed bzhin pa/ sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phur ma 'chang bar byed pa'o// thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan bya ste/ skyil krung byed pas bzhugs pa bya'o// gos dkar mo'i brgyab tu khro bo chen po lcags kyu bya'o//
484a4(rgyud): dkar po'i gzhogs su don yod pa'i lcags kyu bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i 'og tu ral pa gcig ma ste/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/
484a5(rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa ste/ ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma 'chang ba bya zhing / sdigs mdzub byed pa bya'o// steng du phyogs pa/ skyil krung byed
484a6(rgyud): pas bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa'o// khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun bya ste/ 'od dpag med kyang dbus su bya'o// lhas mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// /
484a7(rgyud): phyag g.yon dang g.yas su rdo rje 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zas gsar pa 'dren par byed bzhin pa'o// gzhogs g.yas dang g.yon du khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang ba bya'o// 'og gi gzhogs g.yas su/
484b1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// gzhogs g.yon du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi mtshon cha 'dzin pa bya ste/ thams cad glu len bzhin pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi
484b2(rgyud): 'og phyogs kyi rdzing bu'i g.yas logs su rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bya ste/ bdug pa'i pog por dang me tog 'dzin cing bgrang 'phreng thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa
484b3(rgyud): bya'o// ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu ri bo bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi mgo lcogs bkram zhing / rin po che'i ljon shing sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ chu bo 'bab cing rjes su spyod pa/ ri dgas dang
484b4(rgyud): byas yang dag par brgyan pa bya'o// sna tshogs pa'i ri'i lha dang shang shang te'us kun tu khyab pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i klu'i gdengs ka dang mtshungs pa'i gnas su gnas par bya'o// de nas yongs
484b5(rgyud): su sbyang ba byas zin pa dang / ras ri sa la tshon sna tshogs pas bkra bar bya'o// de nas rog sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o// legs par khrus bya ste/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste sma
484b6(rgyud): ba bcad la/ don yad zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// de'i tshe ras ris 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa 'byin par
484b7(rgyud): byed de/ phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang dga' zhing 'dod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po dang / don yod zhags pa'i lcags kyu dang /
485a1(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di'i dngos grub tu shes par bya'o// de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur//
485a2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gam/ bud med dam/
485a3(rgyud): skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang ras ris chen po 'di mthong nas/ mthong ba tsam gyis mod la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rnam par sbyangs shing thun tshags su 'gyur ro// mnar med pa'i sdig pa
485a4(rgyud): dang sgrib pa rnams 'phral du yongs su 'grol lo// bsod nams kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid kyi shing rta dang / 'dod/
485a5(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thams cad rigs thun mong ba la 'jug pa'i thams cad du thun meng ba'i dam tshig dang / de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub byed
485a6(rgyud): pa'i gnas/ rdo rje'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor mchog byang chub kyi snying por nyer bar bgrod par byed pa/ de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyir mi ldog par 'jug par byed pa/ de
485a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas thams cad du son pa'i dngos grub/ cho ga nib mo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/ phyag rgya thams cad 'gugs par byed
485b1(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi gnas yongs su brtags te/ sa'i cha mdzes par gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa
485b2(rgyud): 'am/ gnas nyid dam/ ri phug gam/ tshang tshing ngam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ gzhan yang brang sa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ skyed mos 'tshal lam/ nags 'dab nyid/
485b3(rgyud): dang / kun dga' ra ba 'am/ chu klung ngam/ steng ka 'am/ 'bab chu'i dngos 'am/ 'tsho phran nam/ mtshe'u dag dang / rdzing bu rnam par bkra ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshen nam/ 'ane'u gsing sngon po 'am/ me tog skye
485b4(rgyud): ba'i gnas sam/ thams cad du rjes su mthun par brtag par bya'o// gnas gtsang mar ma nyams pa'i mod la dkyil 'khor der dgod par bya ste/ sa dang ba byung dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya'o/
485b5(rgyud): khor yug tu khru bzhi pa/ legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/ bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog tu bya'o// dkyil 'khor la tshon sna tshogs pa mdzes pas bye ba'i thig ga dab ste/ cha mnyam par rnam par phye nas zur bzhi pa
485b6(rgyud): logs bzhi pa// sku bzhi rnam par bye ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig gdab bo// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang dkyil 'khor khru'i ched la re kha lnga byas pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pas thig ga das
485b7(rgyud): bo// pad+ma'i ri mo dang / mdung rtse ga sum dang / rdo rje'i ri mo gsum pa dag go// ut+pal bzhi pa 'am/ nor bu rin po che chen po ni lnga par bshad do// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba byed du
486a1(rgyud): gzhug go// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/ ge sar dang ze'u 'bru dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya ste/ de la rig pa'i lha mo gzugs ji/
486a2(rgyud): ltar mdzes pa dgod par bya'o// ji ltar ras ris 'di la gzugs mdzes pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba de lta bu bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mdzes pa dang / zhi bdang /
486a3(rgyud): khro gnyer can ma/ drag po sna tshogs pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du'o// rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gos sna tshogs pa 'chang ba/
486a4(rgyud): skyes pa lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs dang / bud med lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa bsres pa rtag tu bris nas/ pad+ma'i gdan gyis brgyan cing / thams cad pad+ma 'chang ba byed du gzhug go// snying po'i dkyil 'khor
486a5(rgyud): gyi grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi byed du gzhug go// go cha dang ya lad bgos pa/ drag po'i gzugs 'jigs par byed pa'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bya ste/ khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thams cad la
486a6(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan 'chang ba'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi lta bya'o// gar+b+ha dang / shIt+tha dang / 'jigs ma dang / dpe med ma dang / nor bu bzang po dang / kA la~M ki la dang / gtsigs nalam ste/ dkyil
486a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi lha 'di rnams bri bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu ri bo'i 'phreng ba dag la me tog dang ljon shing sna tshogs pa'i lcug mas khyab cing / tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par 'phyes pa bri bar
486b1(rgyud): bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par mthar phyin pa dang / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la khor khor yug tu tshon sna lngas mdzes pa'i ba dan brgya dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa dang / rnam par/
486b2(rgyud): bkra ba'i bum pa gang ba dang / gtor ma dang / dril bu mdzes pa dang / gang ba'i bum pa dang / dum bu dang / dri sna tshigs kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang / ro sna chags pa'i gtor ma bzhag nas kham bor dang /
486b3(rgyud): ril ba gang ba dang / dri sna tshogs kyi byug pa dang / bdug pa sna tshogs pas mdzes pa dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba gcal du bkram pa dang / 'bras yos dang / yungs kar nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rnam
486b4(rgyud): dang / bza' ba'i rnam pa gzugs sna tshogs pa bzhag nas/ 'bras bu sna tshogs mdzes pa rnams bzhag ste/ khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / gser dang dngul las byung ba'i snod dris gang ba rnams
486b5(rgyud): gzhag go// thams cad ji ltar 'byor pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gzhal du med pa las man pa nyid du mi bya'i// lhag pa nyid byed du gzhug go// dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa dang / stobs dang /
486b6(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyis bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gis gtsang mar gyur nas/ legs par khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ bsrung ba'i cho gas phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams
486b7(rgyud): bcing ba dang / bsrung ba chen po'ang byed du gzhug go// de nas gsang sngags kyi las dang / phyag rgya'i las bla na med pa bya'o// de nas sems can gzhug par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gang 'dod par bcu gnas thams
487a1(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig dang phyag rgya sbyin du gzhug go// phyag bya ba dang bskor ba la thams cad bcug nas/ snyan gsan dbab pa dang spyan drang bar bya/ las kyi tsho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ me tog dang 'dug pa dbul/
487a2(rgyud): bar bya/ bzlas pa'i las rnams dang / las thams cad mdor bsdus pa byas nas gshegs su gsol ba 'dir bya'o// dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha rnams la gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga dang / de bzhin du me tog dang bdug pa/
487a3(rgyud): phul nas dkyil 'khor na gnas pa rnams gshegs su gsol lo// gang gi tshe gsang sngags rnams dang / cho ga zhib mo'i gzungs rab tu 'jug pa na sa'i mthil du ras ris 'bar ba'i mod la 'od zer 'byin par byed de/ dkyil 'khor tsha
487a4(rgyud): zhing rig sngags 'chang yang bar snang la gnas so// de'i skad cig la ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad rtag tu myur du 'byung la/
487a5(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub brjod do// ji ltar yid la byed pa thams cad myur du dziH
487a6(rgyud): no// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob ste/ 'di la the tsom med do// sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad phyir mi ldog pa dang / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang /
487a7(rgyud): chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do// sems can gang dkyil 'khor de mthong nas sdig pa da sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa/
487b1(rgyud): rnams dang man med par gno pa thams cad rnam par byams par byed cing 'a thag tams rgyas nyid du ma'o / de nas don mod pa'i sngags cu'i choganam mo can po dang khro bo sngags su dang / rig pa'i rgyas po dag do pon/
487b2(rgyud): zhags pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mong ba'i phyag rgya dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa// gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad
487b3(rgyud): 'bros par byed pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par skrag par byed pa/ 'dod pa'i ris rnams sreg par byed pa/ gdug pa'i klu rnams 'khrug par byed de/ sa'i mthil g.yo bar byed pa/ lha'i me tog dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi
487b4(rgyud): mdzes pa dang / lha'i gos dang lhab lhub kyi char 'bebs par byed pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par skul bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snyan gsan
487b5(rgyud): 'bebs byed pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams
487b6(rgyud): cad 'gugs par byed pa/ bde ba thams cad dang phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par byed pa/ bla na med pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa/ chos kyi sgron me 'bar bar byed pa/ chos
487b7(rgyud): kyi dung 'bud par byed pa/ phyag rgya dang chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/ cho ga zhib mo dang gsang sngags bla na med pa thams cad grub pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ phyag rgya dang mchog thams cad sbyin par byed/
488a1(rgyud): pa gsang sngags thams cad 'chang ba/ gzungs rnams kyi khyad par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/ gang /
488a2(rgyud): gis rnam par snang mdzad dang thub brgyad pa'i dam tshig gi gnas thams cad la gnas pa/ sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams sreg par
488a3(rgyud): byed pa/ rtag tu 'khor ba las 'don par byed pa/ bdud dang ma rungs pa rnams sgrol ba po// rtag tu chos kyi zam stegs mchog/ rga ba dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba las grol bar byed pa/ srid pa mi bzad pa ston par nus pa/
488a4(rgyud): tshul khrims dang / gtong ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi dri zhim po sbyin ning srung bar byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa'i rin
488a5(rgyud): po che'i phung po chen po rtag tu sbyin pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha thams cad la mchod par byed pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
488a6(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad ston par byed pa/ gzugs sna tshogs dang rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/
488a7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po 'di la gnas par byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad dang / gdon dang nad thams
