488b1(rgyud): rtag tu rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag chags thams cad zlog par byed pa sgrub par byed pa'o// 'jigs pa rnams thams cad dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad zo
488b2(rgyud): rnams kyis 'jigs pa med pa'o// dug dang / byad stems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad nyams par byed par the tsom med pa zhes bya ba bshad par bya'o// lag pa gnyis bzlog nas lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo'i so/
488b3(rgyud): mo dang sdig mdzub nyid bskums la/ sor mo gsum brkyang la snying kha'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam par mchog sbyin pa ste/ phyag rgya brgya
488b4(rgyud): stong phrag bye ba gnyis tsam du bcings par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i
488b5(rgyud): rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pas te/ phyag rgyas so so so ba 'di rnams thams cad phyag rgya bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams su 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu byed do// phyag rgya 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
488b6(rgyud): mchog sbyin pa po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po don yod pa'i snying po'o// shin tu gsang ba'i las thams cad du don yod pa'o// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa dang / rigs
488b7(rgyud): thun mong ba'i gsang ba dang / dam tshig thams cad du mthong ba'o// phyag rgya 'dis da ltar ba'i 'dod pa thams cad dang yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o// mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba'o//
489a1(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis gung mo'i sor mos mthe bong gi sor mo bskums la sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par bya/ ming med dang mthe'u chung dag gcig tu brgyang la/ sem mos sor mo mnyam/
489a2(rgyud): par bzhag nas snying kha'i gan su gzhag ste/ khro bo'i blta ba dang mtshungs par bzhag pas hUM yig gis btsir bar bya'o// 'di ni khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya khro bo thams cad kyi mchog dang gtso bor brjod par bya/
489a3(rgyud): ste/ rigs bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams kyi thun mong ba'i phyag rgya thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis khro bo'i phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su brjod pa dang /
489a4(rgyud): de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs gang yin pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs su brjod pa gang yin pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje drag pos 'jigs par byed do// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal por brjod par bya ste/ nor bu'i
489a5(rgyud): rigs gang yin pa'i khro bo'i rnams kyi phyag rnams gdug pa rnams 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// thams cad du phyag rgya'i gtso bo zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o// de bzhin du khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di/
489a6(rgyud): 'chang bzhin pa/ ri rab lhun po brgya stong phrag dang rgya mtsha'ang skams par byed do// ri rab lhun po'i rI ni rdul phra rab ji lta bar rnam par 'thong bar byed do// rgya mtsho thams cad kyang skams par byed do// ri dang ri
489a7(rgyud): po'ang nyams par byed do// lha ma yin ma rungs pa rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / de'i gnas kyi klu ma rungs pa rnams sreg par byed do// de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung ba dang /
489b1(rgyud): gdon ma rungs pa dang / bgegs byed pa'i lha ma rungs gang yin pa dang bdud kyi rigs rnams gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur la/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rtag tu nyams par byed ci/
489b2(rgyud): skad cig de la 'jig par byed do// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i sems can 'jigs par byed pa de rnams thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar byed do// phyag rgya dang /
489b3(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do// thams cad 'grub pa don yod cing dge ba thams cad 'grub par byed do// phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs 'dzub gnyis rnga
489b4(rgyud): rje'i rnam par bskums la/ gung mo yid tsam bskums te/ ming med dang mthe bong gi sor mo'i sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag ste/ mthe'u chung brkyang snying kha'i gan su bzhag pa 'di ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i
489b5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po don yod pa'i phyag rgya rmad du byung ba chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i phyag rgya rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bla na med pa/
489b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams mgon pos snyan par brjod cing lung bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa/ de bzhin du badz+ra
489b7(rgyud): rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang // rig pa'i rgyal po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang
490a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtso bo ste/ gang gis phyag rgya 'di 'ching ba de gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag gi phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings par 'gyur ro// sdig
490a2(rgyud): pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi bzang ba dang / gdug pa thams cad rnam par byed do// bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong phrag bskyed par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun nas skyed par 'gyur ro// phyag
490a3(rgyud): rgyu 'dzin pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs par byed cing dgongs par byed de the tsom med do// byang chub sems dpas thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur/
490a4(rgyud): ro// lha rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du srung bar byed do// phyag rgya 'di'i phan yon sngar brjod pa sa ga zhal du med cing grangs med la tshad med par rab tu bsgrag so shing the tsom med do// phyag rgya 'di
490a5(rgyud): mthong ba dang bcings pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skyed do// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du gcig brkyang la dpung pa bskums te/ ming med dang mthe bong gi sor mo 'dud la mthe/
490a6(rgyud): bu chung bskums par bya'o// ming med kyi mthar reg la/ gung mo bskum la sdigs 'dzub rab tu brkyang ste/ snying kha'i gnas su 'di gso ba tsam mo// me tog gam/ dri dang / bdug
490a7(rgyud): pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / sdud pa rnams kyang lag pa g.yon du bzung nas dbul bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems
490b1(rgyud): dadu 'brums cad dang / rnams dang / da bzhin dudus par rgyal po rnams dang / de bzhin du dkyil lakhor ba'i lharnams kyis de rnams thams cadas chad par 'gyur/
490b2(rgyud): rdzas kyis mchod paldan med pa dang / mchog dang / rab mchog dang / rgya nam pa'i mchod pa 'a rnams byed de/ rag chags pa'i slang na rnams dang / rabargya ba'i 'bras parnam pa
490b3(rgyud): ba dang / btung ba rnam pasna tshogs pa bdud rtsi bcud kyis len gyi mchod pa 'di rnams byed do// phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'byung ngo // gser dang
490b4(rgyud): dngul gyi me tog bla na med pa dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba nyi ma dang gzi brjid mtshungs pas 'bar bar byed do// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor/
490b5(rgyud): bu zhes bya ba 'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/ rtag tu phyag rgya'i gsang ba dang gas kyakra rnams yid kyis bsams pas de rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpag pasam rgya shing dang
490b6(rgyud): mnyam zhing mtshungs par ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mchod pa thams cad byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag stong rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum
490b7(rgyud): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya 'di'i mthus bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par byed do// de'i phyir phyag rgya 'di rtag tu byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par
491a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// phyag rgya gzung bzhin pa ni mchod pa bla na med pa dang tshogs chung ngus mchod pa chung ngu'ang tshad med par rab tu 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsam
491a2(rgyud): gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa byed do// ri rab lhun po bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs
491a3(rgyud): pa re re la phul ba de bzhin du/ phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pas de bzhin gshegs pa re re la de lta bu'i mchod pa'i cho ga byed do// de lta bu'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis
491a4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gung mo la reg pa ni dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / spyan drangs pa dang / dam tshig la 'jug pa dang /
491a5(rgyud): ba byed pa dang ka me tog dang / bdug pa dang de bzhin du dri dang mar me dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma 'bul bar byed pa dang / de bzhin du khrus dang / nye reg
491a6(rgyud): nyid dang / gos bgo ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / de bzhin nyid du grogs srung ba dang / bzlas bzhin pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / skyil mo krung
491a7(rgyud): bcing ba dang / sbyin sreg gi las dang / gzhan spyan drangs pa nyid dang / gsang sngags spyan drang ba nyid dang / dngos grub sgrub pa nyid dang / thams cad nas thams cad du bya ba thams cad phyag rgya 'dis byed de/
491b1(rgyud): gnas thams cad du song ba dang / gnas grub pa dang / bya ba thams cad legs par bsngags pa dang / thams cad du mchog gi phyag rgya don yod pa'i las rab tu grub pa dang / yon tan thams cad/
491b2(rgyud): skyed pa dang thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor du don yod pa'i sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par byed pa'o// don yod pa'i las zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di don yod pa'i
491b3(rgyud): sbyin pa zhes brjod par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po lnga po 'di rnams rmad du byung ba'i de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / don yod pa thos pa nyid dang / don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i bsod nams bsags
491b4(rgyud): pa'i de kho na nyid dang / don yod par sdigs pa nyams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang
491b5(rgyud): don yod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang / don yod par tshe 'phel bar byed pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa'o// snying po dang phyag rgya 'di 'jig rten
491b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsgrags pa'o// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis khyad par du nyin mtshan du dang / thun mtshams su'ang phyag rgya 'di 'ching na bkra shis pa'i
491b7(rgyud): mchog dang / bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub dam par gyur pa'i mchog sbyin par byed do// 'di ni thar pa mchog gi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa mchog
492a1(rgyud): / tu 'o// ga rgya'i gas sngags rnams su gru oM sam+b+ha m+ba kug nA n+nad+hu/ oMs mo mram d+ha \u0f7fts+tsha/ ma can dang rdzam dru yo yam pa pad+d+ha sa ma g+ha n+da
492a2(rgyud): ma Ni ba ba d+ha ya hUM/ oM a me g+ha sarba tra sA d+ha ya shi be hUM/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i sngags so// de nas dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags thams cad du sgrub pa'i thabs kyis de kho na nyid
492a3(rgyud): kyi gnas thams cad la 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ oM a mo g+ha maN+Da le hUM/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o// oM sa ma man+ta shu b+hi pr-i thi bI sa hA hUM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so// oM a ma/
492a4(rgyud): g+ha pa ri sho d+ha ni hUM dkyil 'khor yongs su skyong ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pr-i thi bI sa ra s+pha le hUM/ sa dang ba byung gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha dza la D+ha shra ba Ni hUM/ chu'i sngags so//
492a5(rgyud): a mo g+ha a mr-i tA ba re swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha bi b+hak+Sha b+ha ba na ba re hUM/ thig rnam par dbye ba'i sngags so// oM nA nA rat+na ba re dz+wa la hU~M/ tshon rtsi'i ri mo'i sngags
492a6(rgyud): so/ oM dz+wa la bi ma le a mo g+ha shud+he hUM/ khrus kyi sngags so// oM si d+hi dza le a mo g+ha bud+d+he hUM nye reg gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha bste ts+tsha da hUM/ gos bgo ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ma Ni/
492a7(rgyud): hUM/ gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Na ba rang hUM/ bdag srung ba'i sngags so// oM satwa rak+Sha Ni a mo g+ha dadz+dzi hUM/ thams cad du gzhan srung zhing bde ba'i ched du srung ba'i
492b1(rgyud): sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pra bI ga b+hu ba ne hUM/ gnas 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM na mo a mo g+ha ba ti hUM/ phyag byed pa'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha tsa kre hUM/ bskor ba'i sngags so// oM sa ma ya sad+d+ha/
492b2(rgyud): a mo b+ha ba ti hUM/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha puSh+pe prA ba tsa gan+d+hi ni dza ya swAhA/ me tog dang / dr-i dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha sar sa thu
492b3(rgyud): ras ras gra ba two hU~M/ thams cad du gtor ma'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha tu hri swA hA/ mar me'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ba ti ts+yai ra bi tsa ra sany+dza ra swA hA/ thams cad du gnas pa dang / gnas
492b4(rgyud): thams cad du song ba na rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o// thams cad du las thams cad byed par rig pa'i gsang sngags sbyar bar bya'o// gshegs su gsol ba nyid kyang sngags 'dis bya'o// las/
492b5(rgyud): shin tu rgyas pa gzhan thams cad ni rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o// legs par byas pa'i las dang / bya ba rnams dang / bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa gzhan rnams ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu
492b6(rgyud): dang / khro bo lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags chen po dang / dpa' bo gcig pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang rang gi las rnam
492b7(rgyud): bya'o// rtsa ba'i rig pa 'di nyid kyis las thams cad bya'o// de las phyi rol du gyur pa'i rig pa'i gzhan ni med do// rig pa 'di ni bklags pas grub pa'o// de nas de la yangs shing rgya che
493a1(rgyud): ba'i brtson pa bya ste/ 'byor pa ji lta ba dang / tshad ji lta ba dang / ji ltar gsal ba rnams 'byor pa dang bcas shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / shin tu gsal bar bya ba rnams/
493a2(rgyud): bya'o// gtsang ma gtsang mas khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ dad pa dang / gus pa dang / mchog tu dang ba bskyed par bya/ bden par smra bar bya/ bden par phyi rol du 'byung bar bya/ bden par spro ba dang /
493a3(rgyud): brtson pas 'byung bar bya/ gag tu smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ser sna med par 'gyur bar bya/ lag yangs par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam dang / bklags pas grub pa'i rig pa 'di smra bar byed
493a4(rgyud): par 'gyur bar bya/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba mchog tu bya/ bri bar bya/ 'dir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ mchod par bya/ ri mor bya/ kun chub par bya/ cho ga zhes
493a5(rgyud): mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar dkyil 'khor yang dag par rmad du byung ba 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa// de bzhin gshegs
493a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig thun mong gi gsang ba/ dkyil 'khor rim par bye ba thams cad kyi gsang ba/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho gzhib mo 'di pags pa spyan ras
493a7(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs so// de nas yang lha dang / gru dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri tha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am Ni dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi gang yin pa rnams
493b1(rgyud): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa gal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du gyur pa gal
493b2(rgyud): ba der song ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phagos pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar song ste/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thul mo sbyar bar gyur pas 'di da
493b3(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis gzung bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i yang lhag pa'i rgyal po/ cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su srung ba'i don dang / mi nus
493b4(rgyud): cing rgyas par 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ji ltar rnyed pa de bzhin bris pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// / 'di ni sngon gyi lo tsa ba mkhas pa bzhi tsam gyis bgos nas bsgyur ba la
493b5(rgyud): bar skabs su chad cing mjug ma tshang ba las/ bla ma dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po chos grags dpal bzang po'i phyag nas rgya dpe byung zhing / chad pa gsob pa dang mjug sgyur cig ces bkas bskul ba la nyen
493b6(rgyud): nas/ bam po bcu ba'i nang du/ las kyi don kun sgrub par byed/ ces pa nas/ gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog rgyas shig/ ces pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gnyis pa'i nang du bcom ldan 'das
493b7(rgyud): 'on kyang don khyad par can gyi ched du/ zhes pa nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar bar 'gyur te/ zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gsum pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di
494a1(rgyud): #/ thos pa tsam dang / zhes pa nas/ mi gang tshad du brko bar bya// zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bzhi pa'i nang du/ pad+ma dang / chu dang / yungs kar la yongs su bzlas
494a2(rgyud): te/ zhes pa nas/ ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing / lan bdun du/ zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bzhi pa dang bco lnga pa'i mtshams su/ dngul gyi pog por brgyad dang / zhes pa nas/ gnas
494a3(rgyud): rnam pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams cad du byed do// zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu drug pa dang bcu bdun pa'i mtshams su/ de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/
494a4(rgyud): zhes pa nas/ phyag rgya'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bdun pa/ zhes pa dang / de ma thag par bam po bco brgyad pa'i mtshams su
494a5(rgyud): nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog bshad par bya ste/ zhes pa nas/ 'jig rten mgon po'i 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo// zhes pa'i bar rnams kyi
494a6(rgyud): ho ra kong ba sabs shing mjug yongs su rdzogs par shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing nus pa'i yi ge pa ni yo ga pa grub pa dpal bzang po'o// kun
494a7(rgyud): tu lha mo thams cad la'o// zhes pa nas/ gter bskul na/ zhes pa'i bar rgya dpe la mi 'jug go//
